instruction: Wrong side surgery (wrong leg, wrong kidney) - legal action?
output: Serious negligence! "Never event" in medical terms. Action: 1) Document immediately (photos, records), 2) Consumer Forum - high compensation, 3) Criminal case (Section 338), 4) Medical Council complaint. Protocols violated: WHO surgical safety checklist. Hospitals have: Marking protocols, time-out procedures. Failure = gross negligence. Compensation: Significant damages awarded in such cases.

instruction: Mental hospital-la abuse nadakkuthu - complain enge?
output: Complaint options: 1) State Mental Health Authority, 2) Mental Health Review Board (district level), 3) Human Rights Commission (SHRC/NHRC), 4) Police (if physical/sexual abuse), 5) Health Department. Types of abuse: Physical restraints misuse, no consent treatment, inhumane conditions, denial of communication with family. Evidence: Photos if possible, witness statements, medical records.

instruction: Internship eppadi kidaikkum? Apply enge?
output: Internship sources: 1) College placement cell - company tie-ups 2) Internshala.com - largest platform 3) LinkedIn - direct apply 4) Company websites - careers page 5) Professor reference - industry contacts 6) Alumni network 7) Government internships - NITI Aayog, ministries. Tips: Apply early (6 months before), customize resume for each application. Unpaid internship: Experience valuable, accept if good company. Stipend: Negotiate politely.

instruction: Thirukkural Olympics-la mention aanadha?
output: Aam! 2004 Athens Olympics-la opening ceremony-la Thirukkural quote display aanadhu: 'Yaadhum oore yaavarum kelir' - 'Every land is my homeland, all people are my kin'. Ulaga sagodharaththuvathai kaattum indha kural Olympic spirit-a perfect-aa represent panniyathu. Idhu Tamil community-kku migapperiya perumai!

instruction: Part time job-nu YouTube video like panna panam kidaikkum-nu Telegram group irukku
output: Task-based scam ithu. Mudhal la 50-100 rupees kuduppanga, apram 'upgrade' panna investment kettuppanga. Thousands poirum. Join aagaadheenga.

instruction: TN-ல் இலவச வீட்டு மனை பட்டா எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: ஏழைகளுக்கு இலவச வீட்டு மனை. தகுதி: Houseless poor families, BPL card holder, No land ownership. Size: 2-3 cents (varies by area). Process: Panchayat/Taluk office-ல் apply, List publish, Selection, Registration. Documents: Income certificate, Family card, Aadhaar, No property certificate. Priority: SC/ST, Widows, Differently abled. PMAY-G: House construction-க்கு ₹1.2 lakh + state share.

instruction: Prescription illaama endha medicine vaangalaam?
output: OTC (Over The Counter) medicines: 1) Pain relievers (Paracetamol, Ibuprofen), 2) Cough syrups (non-codeine), 3) Antacids, 4) Antihistamines, 5) Vitamins, 6) Antiseptic creams, 7) Cold medicines. Schedule H/H1/X: Prescription mandatory. Antibiotics: Prescription required (mostly). Pharmacist advice: Can help with minor ailments. Self-medication: Risky for serious conditions.

instruction: Back pain/spine problems-க்கு Ayurveda?
output: Ayurveda effective for: Lumbar spondylosis, disc problems, sciatica, muscle spasm. Treatments: 1) Kati Basti (oil pooling on back), 2) Pinda Sweda (bolus massage), 3) Abhyanga, 4) Basti (medicated enema), 5) Internal medicines. Duration: 7-21 days depending on severity. Many avoid surgery: Through proper Ayurveda treatment. Best results: Early treatment, lifestyle changes. Kerala specialty: Spine care centers.

instruction: Age limit government college admission-ku irukkiradhaa?
output: UG courses: Generally no upper age limit for most courses. Exceptions: Medical (25 for general, 30 for reserved), Law integrated (20), NDA (19.5). Minimum age: 17 years usually. PG courses: No age limit mostly. PhD: No limit. Government jobs: Age limits apply (varies by post). Reality: Complete your education at any age - many successful late starters. Distance education: No age restrictions at all.

instruction: Rashtriya Vayoshri Yojana (RVY) endraal enna?
output: Free assistive devices for BPL senior citizens. Eligibility: 60+ years, BPL, age-related disability. Free Items: Walking stick, Elbow crutch, Walker, Tripod, Wheelchair, Hearing aid, Spectacles, Artificial dentures. Apply: ALIMCO assessment camps (announced in District). Documents: Age proof, BPL card, Aadhaar.

instruction: Salem/Erode region-la agriculture courses enge?
output: Agriculture education Salem/Erode: 1) Vanavarayar Institute Pollachi - B.Sc Agriculture 2) Agricultural College & Research Institute Madurai (affiliated) 3) Horticultural College Periyakulam 4) KVK - Short courses. TNAU affiliated colleges admission through TNAU counselling. Farmers' children priority. Practical training in farms included. Jobs: Agriculture department, banks, own farming with modern techniques.

instruction: Thokkanam massage எங்கே கிடைக்கும்?
output: Thokkanam = Traditional Siddha massage therapy. Types: 9 types including Thattal, Irukkal, Pidithal, etc. Where: 1) NIS Tambaram - specialized unit, 2) Government Siddha hospitals, 3) Private Siddha clinics (verify registration). For: Muscular problems, paralysis, rehabilitation, stress relief. Sessions: Usually 7-14 day course. Cost: Free at government, Rs.300-1000 per session private. Trained: Only by certified Thokkanam therapists.

instruction: Property registration எப்படி செய்வது?
output: Steps: 1) TNREGINET (tnreginet.gov.in)-ல் document draft, 2) E-stamp purchase, 3) Appointment book, 4) Sub-Registrar office visit (buyer, seller, 2 witnesses), 5) Biometric verification, 6) Document scan & registration. Required: Sale deed, EC, Patta, ID proofs, photos.

instruction: Kadan kodutten, thirumba thara maattengaraanga - legal option?
output: Amount based: <Rs.20,000 - Small Causes Court. >Rs.20,000 - Civil Court (money suit). Documents: Promissory note, acknowledgment, bank transfer proof, witnesses. Cheque bounce: NI Act 138 (criminal). Interest: 18% per annum claim possible. Limitation: 3 years.

instruction: Medicine expiry aanaa use pannalaamaa?
output: NO! Expired medicine risks: 1) May not work (lost potency), 2) May become toxic, 3) Can cause adverse reactions. Law: Selling expired medicine = criminal offence. Check: Expiry date on strip/bottle before purchase. If sold expired: 1) Return to pharmacy, 2) Drug Inspector complaint, 3) Consumer Forum. Storage: Keep as per instructions - some need refrigeration.

instruction: Passport reject ஆனது - என்ன செய்வது?
output: Rejection reason check: passportindia.gov.in. Common reasons: Police verification issue, document mismatch, pending cases. Appeal: Regional Passport Officer. Court case pending: NOC from court required. Reapply with correct documents. Tatkaal for urgent cases.

instruction: Ayushman Bharat (PMJAY) enna?
output: ₹5 lakh free health insurance per family per year. Eligibility based on SECC 2011 BPL data. Check eligibility at pmjay.gov.in. Get card FREE at govt hospital/CSC with Aadhaar + ration card. Covers 1,500+ procedures at empanelled hospitals. In TN, combined with CMCHIS.

instruction: Scam la maatindhadu ku romba guilty feel aagudhu, family ku sollala. Emotional support eppidi get pannuradhu?
output: Understanding: Scam victims experience real trauma - guilt, shame, anxiety, depression common. You are NOT stupid: Scammers are professionals, doctors/IIT/IAS officers get scammed, psychological manipulation is sophisticated. Steps: 1) Tell someone you trust (sharing reduces shame), 2) Join support groups (Facebook 'Cyber Crime Victims India', Reddit r/Scams), 3) Professional help - iCall 9152987821, Vandrevala 1860-2662-345, NIMHANS 080-46110007, Snehi Chennai 044-24640050, 4) Focus on action (complaints give control), 5) Forgive yourself (you trusted, that's not wrong). Family talk: Choose calm moment, focus on facts not self-blame, discuss recovery plan together.

instruction: PMAY-Urban eppadi peruvadhu?
output: Interest subsidy for first home buyers. EWS/LIG: 6.5%, MIG-I: 4%, MIG-II: 3% subsidy on home loan. Apply through bank or pmay-urban.gov.in. Condition: No pucca house anywhere in India. Affidavit required. Wife as co-owner recommended. Saves ₹2-2.5 lakh!

instruction: PM-KISAN திட்டம் என்றால் என்ன?
output: Direct cash transfer of ₹6,000/year (₹2,000 x 3 installments) to land-owning farmers. Register at pmkisan.gov.in with Aadhaar, land records, bank account. Exclusions: Income tax payers, govt employees, professionals. State verification required.

instruction: Veetuku oru aalu vandhaan, 'SBI la irundhu ayya, senior citizen account verification, Aadhaar xerox, passbook, ATM card photo edukanum' nu. ID card kaatinaan, kudukkalama?
output: Bank employees verification ku veetuku varaadhu ayya! ID card fake aa irukkum. Documents kuduthaa account takeover panniduvaanga. 'Verification' bank branch la nadakkum. Door la vara 'bank employees' avoid pannunga. SBI branch ku call panni verify pannunga.

instruction: Advance directive for mental health என்றால் என்ன?
output: Advance directive = When mentally well, write down treatment preferences for future crisis. Includes: 1) Preferred treatment methods, 2) Treatments to avoid, 3) Nominated representative, 4) Hospital preferences, 5) ECT consent/refusal. How: Register with Mental Health Review Board. Benefits: Your wishes respected even when unable to communicate. Can modify when competent. Legal document.

instruction: Hydrotherapy treatments என்னென்ன?
output: Water treatments: 1) Hip bath (pelvic area) - digestive, urinary issues, 2) Spinal bath - spine problems, stress, 3) Arm/foot bath - circulation, 4) Steam bath - detox, skin, 5) Enema - colon cleansing, 6) Wet pack - fever, inflammation, 7) Hot and cold compress. Home: Alternate hot-cold shower, foot bath. Centre: Full treatments under supervision. Benefits: Circulation, toxin removal, pain relief. Caution: Heart patients, BP - consult before.

instruction: NEET answer key-la mistake irundhal challenge panna mudiyuma?
output: Mudiyum. NTA official website-la answer key challenge window open aagum. Rs.200 per question pay panni challenge pannalam. Valid challenge-aa irundha money refund aagum, marks adjust aagum.

instruction: Traffic fine list Tamil Nadu-ல் என்ன?
output: Major fines (2019 MV Act): Helmet இல்லாம - Rs.1,000, Seat belt இல்லாம - Rs.1,000, Signal jump - Rs.1,000, Drunk driving - Rs.10,000 (first), Over-speeding - Rs.1,000-2,000, Without license - Rs.5,000, Without insurance - Rs.2,000.

instruction: NEET Biology eppadi padippathu? NCERT enough-aa?
output: Biology strategy: NCERT = Bible for NEET Biology. 90%+ questions NCERT-lirundhu direct/indirect. How to study: 1) Line by line reading 2) Diagrams by hand draw 3) Tables, flowcharts memorize 4) Previous year questions practice 5) NCERT exemplar problems. Additional: MTG, Trueman's for extra practice. Botany vs Zoology: Equal weightage. High scoring: Human Physiology, Genetics, Ecology.

instruction: WhatsApp message 'Reality show audition fee 2000. Selected get 1 lakh signing amount.' Reality show la chance irukka?
output: Legitimate reality shows don't charge audition fees - they invest in production. Auditions at announced venues, not through random WhatsApp payments. 'Signing amount' promise is bait. Famous shows announce through official channels. Paid auditions are scams.

instruction: Tamil Nadu la cyber crime report panna specific contacts enna?
output: State Cyber Crime Cell: DGP Office Complex, Mylapore, Chennai-4, Phone: 044-28512440, Email: ccps.tnpol@nic.in. District Cells: Chennai 044-28512440, Coimbatore 0422-2300106, Madurai 0452-2531500, Trichy 0431-2418717, Salem 0427-2211001, Tirunelveli 0462-2501500. Online: eservices.tnpolice.gov.in (Online FIR), Kavalan SOS App (Emergency). Special Cells: Women Cyber Crime 044-28592750, Child Online Safety 1098/childlineindia.org.

instruction: Heart attack symptoms enna? Enna seyyanum?
output: Symptoms: 1) Chest pain/pressure (elephant sitting on chest feeling), 2) Left arm/jaw pain, 3) Breathlessness, 4) Sweating, 5) Nausea. Women: May have different symptoms - fatigue, back pain. Action: 1) Call 108 immediately, 2) Chew aspirin if available (not allergic), 3) Loosen tight clothes, 4) Don't drive yourself. Golden hour: Treatment within 1 hour saves heart muscle. Don't ignore 'gas' feeling!

instruction: SMS vandhuchu 'COVID duty allowance pending. Send bank details for immediate transfer.' Allowance varalai, idhu genuine aa?
output: COVID allowances processed through your hospital/health department payroll. Government has your bank details through salary account. Never send bank details via SMS for 'pending amounts'. Check with your accounts section for any arrears. Scammers exploiting healthcare workers' COVID service.

instruction: LinkedIn premium DM vandhuchu 'We need urgent freelancer for US project, 5000 USD/month. Share bank details for advance payment.' Too good to be true aa?
output: Legitimate clients use proper freelancing platforms or company contracts. 'Advance payment needing bank details' is money mule recruitment. You could become complicit in money laundering. Real projects have clear scope, contracts, payment milestones.

instruction: Inter-caste/Inter-religion marriage register எப்படி செய்வது?
output: Special Marriage Act 1954-ன் கீழ் register செய்யலாம். 30 days notice period உண்டு. Any religion/caste மணமக்கள் register பண்ணலாம். Parents consent not required (if major). Inter-caste marriage-க்கு TN government Rs.50,000 incentive scheme உண்டு.

instruction: Suicidal thoughts இருக்கு - யாரை contact பண்றது?
output: Helplines (24x7): 1) iCall: 9152987821, 2) Vandrevala Foundation: 1860-2662-345, 3) AASRA: 9820466726, 4) Snehi: 044-24640050 (Chennai), 5) NIMHANS: 080-46110007. Immediate danger: Call 108 or go to nearest hospital emergency. Talk to: Trusted family/friend. Remember: Feelings are temporary, help is available. Professional help: Psychiatrist can help with treatment.

instruction: TNPSC Current Affairs eppadi prepare aavadhu?
output: Current Affairs strategy: 1) Daily newspaper - The Hindu/Indian Express Tamil 2) Monthly magazines - Shankar IAS, Vision 3) PIB daily bulletin 4) TN Government press releases 5) YouTube - free CA classes. Focus areas: TN government schemes, India-international relations, sports, awards, science. Weightage: 25-30% in TNPSC. Last 6 months - most important. Make short notes daily. Revision: Weekly once previous weeks review.

instruction: Panchakarma yaarukku nalladhu? Yaarukku vendaam?
output: Good for: 1) Chronic diseases (arthritis, skin, digestive), 2) Lifestyle disorders (obesity, stress), 3) Preventive detox (healthy people - yearly), 4) Pre-conception purification, 5) Anti-aging. Avoid: 1) Acute illness/fever, 2) Pregnancy, 3) Very old/weak, 4) Children (<12), 5) Certain heart conditions, 6) During menstruation (some procedures). Consultation: Doctor will assess suitability based on strength, condition.

instruction: Pradhan Mantri Suraksha Bima Yojana (PMSBY) enna?
output: Accident Insurance scheme. Premium: Only ₹20 per year. Coverage: Death/Total disability ₹2 lakh, Partial disability ₹1 lakh. Age: 18-70 years. Eligibility: Savings Account holders. Join: Form at Bank, Auto-debit consent. Renews June 1. PMJJBY + PMSBY together: ₹456/year → ₹4 lakh coverage!

instruction: Neighbour சத்தம் போட்டு தொல்லை தருகிறார் - என்ன செய்வது?
output: Steps: 1) Friendly talk முதலில், 2) Written complaint to RWA/Association, 3) Police complaint (IPC 290 - public nuisance), 4) Civil Court injunction. Night 10PM-6AM noise: Noise Pollution Rules violation. Decibel limit: Residential area 55dB day, 45dB night.

instruction: Meenakshi Amman Kovil (Madurai) patri sollungal?
output: Meenakshi Sundareswarar Kovil Madurai-oda heart. Sirappugal: 1) 14 gopurangal - therku gopuram 170 adi uyaram, 2) 33,000 sirpangal, 3) Porthamarai Kulam - punidhanaana tank, 4) Aayiram Kaal Mandapam - 985 pillars, 5) Chithirai Thiruvizha - 1 million+ per varuvaargal. Nayakkar kaalathil virivupaduththappattathu. World's new 7 wonders-la shortlist aanadhu!

instruction: Parents-க்கு children maintenance கொடுக்கணுமா?
output: ஆம். Maintenance and Welfare of Parents Act 2007 படி children (including married daughters) parents-க்கு maintain செய்யணும். Maintenance Tribunal-ல் claim பண்ணலாம். Max Rs.10,000/month. Non-compliance: 3 months imprisonment. Property transfer reverse ஆகலாம்.

instruction: Student bank account open பண்றது எப்படி?
output: Student account: 1) Zero balance accounts - SBI, Indian Bank offer 2) Documents: Aadhaar, college ID, photo, address proof 3) Benefits: ATM card, mobile banking, UPI 4) Scholarship DBT requires bank account 5) Education loan same bank = easier 6) Joint account option with parent 7) Fixed deposit for savings. Important: Keep minimum balance if required, avoid bounce charges. Link Aadhaar for DBT.

instruction: Konganar pulse diagnosis-a eppadi explain panniyirukkaar?
output: Konganar 'Naadi Paritchai' (pulse diagnosis) patri virivaga ezhuthiyuLLaar. Moondru viralgalaal manikattil naadiyai unarvadhu - Vaadha Naadi, Pittha Naadi, Kapa Naadi. 'Endha naadi eppadi adikkudhu, enna noi' endru formulas koduththuLLaar. Modern doctors-um appreciate panraanga indha ancient technique-a. Without any equipment-la diagnosis seiya mudiyum!

instruction: Defence personnel children-க்கு Prime Minister's Scholarship scheme என்ன?
output: PM's Scholarship Scheme for RPF/CAPF/Assam Rifles: Professional degree courses-க்கு. Amount: Boys - ₹2,500/மாதம் (₹30,000/ஆண்டு), Girls - ₹3,000/மாதம் (₹36,000/ஆண்டு). Duration: Full course. Eligibility: Children of serving/retired/deceased personnel. Apply: www.ksb.gov.in (Kendriya Sainik Board). Separate scheme for Ex-servicemen through Ministry of Defence - ₹5,000/மாதம்.

instruction: Apartment வாங்கும் போது UDS என்றால் என்ன?
output: UDS = Undivided Share of Land. Flat owner-க்கு land-ல் proportionate share. Building collapse/demolish ஆனாலும் land share உங்களுக்கு. Higher UDS = Better value. UDS % sale deed-ல் clearly mention இருக்கணும். UDS இல்லாம flat வாங்காதீங்க.

instruction: Arthritis/joint pain-க்கு Siddha treatment என்ன?
output: Effective for: Osteoarthritis (Moottu Vaatham), Rheumatoid arthritis (Ama Vaatham), Gout (Vali Azhal Keel Vayu). Treatments: 1) Internal - Rasagandhi Mezhugu, Sallaki, 2) External - Kottamchukkadi Thailam, Pinda Thailam, 3) Thokkanam (specialized massage), 4) Varmam therapy, 5) Ottradam (fomentation), 6) Kizhi (poultice massage). Diet: Avoid sour, cold foods. Duration: 1-3 months typically.

instruction: Minor child-க்கு யார் consent கொடுக்கணும்?
output: Parents/legal guardians. Rules: 1) Both parents equal right (married), 2) Single parent: That parent, 3) Guardian: Court-appointed guardian, 4) Emergency: Hospital can proceed without consent (life-saving), 5) Mature minor doctrine: 16+ may consent to some treatments. Conflict between parents: Court decides best interest of child. Orphan/abandoned: Child Welfare Committee.

instruction: Doctor credentials எப்படி verify பண்றது?
output: Verify: 1) NMC website (nmc.org.in) - Indian Medical Register, 2) State Medical Council register, 3) Specialist registration (for specialists), 4) Hospital website - doctor profile. Check: 1) MBBS registration number, 2) PG degree registration, 3) Disciplinary actions if any. Fake doctor: Report to police + Medical Council. Important: Any doctor must display registration number.

instruction: Call vandhuchu 'Ministry of Health survey about clinic facilities. Need your registration number, PAN, bank account for incentive payment.' Government survey aa?
output: Government surveys done through official department visits, not random calls asking bank details. Health Ministry uses NIC portals, not phone calls for data collection. Survey incentives never need bank account upfront. Verify from district health office.

instruction: Consumer Forum-ல் hospital-மேல் case போடலாமா?
output: Yes! Medical service = consumer service. Grounds: 1) Medical negligence, 2) Deficiency in service, 3) Overcharging, 4) Wrong treatment, 5) Denial of service. Claim: 1) Rs.1 crore வரை - District Forum, 2) Rs.1-10 crore - State Commission, 3) Above Rs.10 crore - National Commission. Fee: Nominal (Rs.100-5000). Limitation: 2 years from incident. Lawyer: Optional but recommended.

instruction: Owner thideernu current cut pannitaar, legal-aa?
output: Illegal! Owner basic amenities (water, electricity) cut panna koodaadhu - self-help eviction illegal. Actions: 1) Police complaint (criminal intimidation), 2) Rent Authority complaint, 3) Civil court injunction. Owner penalty: Fine + imprisonment possible. Tenant rights: Continue staying + demand restoration. Document everything - photos, videos.

instruction: Consumer Forum-la hospital-mela case podalaamaa?
output: Yes! Medical service = consumer service. Grounds: 1) Medical negligence, 2) Deficiency in service, 3) Overcharging, 4) Wrong treatment, 5) Denial of service. Claim: 1) Rs.1 crore varai - District Forum, 2) Rs.1-10 crore - State Commission, 3) Above Rs.10 crore - National Commission. Fee: Nominal (Rs.100-5000). Limitation: 2 years from incident. Lawyer: Optional but recommended.

instruction: Siddhar paadalgalai engge ketkalaam/padikkalaam?
output: Siddhar paadalgal access seiya: 1) Project Madurai - free Tamil texts online (projectmadurai.org), 2) Tamil Virtual Academy - government site, 3) YouTube - vilakkanagalodu paadalgal, 4) Books - Chennai Higginbothams, Pari Nilayam, 5) Apps - Siddhar Paadalgal app, 6) Libraries - University of Madras, Connemara Library. Original palm leaves Saraswathi Mahal Library (Thanjavur)-la preserve seiyappattuLLana.

instruction: 'Vinayaal vinayaakki kodal' - sombala patri kural enna solludhu?
output: Kural: 'Vinayaal vinayaakki kodal nanaigavul yaanaiyaal yaanaiyaath thatru'. Artham: Oru seyalai vaiththu innoru seyalai saadhippadu, madham pidittha yaanaiyai innoru yaanaiyaal pidippadu pondradhu. Puththisaalithanamana uzhaippai idhu vilakkugiradhu. Smart work-a patri 2000 varuda pazhaiya gnaanam!

instruction: Enna da, call vandhudhu - 'Unga SBI account block aairum innaiku raathiriku munnadhi KYC update pannunga' nu. OTP ellam keppanga. Enna pannuradhu?
output: Fraudu da idhu! Bank kaaran phone la OTP keppaanaa? Keppaane keppaane! 'Innaiku block' nu bayamudhuthuvaanga paaru. Branch ku nee poi pesu, phone la enna details um kudukkaadhe. Fraudu gang da ivanga ellam.

instruction: CMCHIS (முதலமைச்சர் மருத்துவ காப்பீடு திட்டம்) என்றால் என்ன?
output: குடும்பத்திற்கு ₹5 லட்சம் மருத்துவ காப்பீடு. Coverage: 1,000+ procedures, All family members. தகுதி: TN ration card holder, Annual income ₹1.2 லட்சத்திற்கு கீழ். Hospitals: Empanelled Govt + Private hospitals. Cashless: Card காட்டினால் cashless treatment. Card: cmchistn.com-ல் check/download. Documents: Ration card, Aadhaar linking. Ayushman Bharat: CMCHIS + PMJAY merged in TN.

instruction: Patient-kku ennenna rights irukku?
output: Charter of Patient Rights (NMC): 1) Right to information (diagnosis, treatment options), 2) Right to records, 3) Right to emergency care, 4) Right to informed consent, 5) Right to confidentiality, 6) Right to second opinion, 7) Right to choose treatment/refuse treatment, 8) Right to non-discrimination, 9) Right to safe treatment, 10) Right to complaint redressal. Display: Hospitals must display patient rights.

instruction: Tamil medium-la padichaa future-la problem varumaa? English medium better-aa?
output: Reality check: Tamil medium = Mother tongue strong, concepts clear. English medium = Language advantage. Both work! Important: 1) Foundation subjects (Maths, Science) any medium OK 2) English can be learned later 3) Many Tamil medium toppers in competitive exams 4) Government jobs no medium preference. Advice: Choose based on child comfort. Tamil medium + English tuition = balanced approach. Focus on learning, not medium.

instruction: Anticipatory bail endraal enna?
output: Arrest aavadharku munnaalaye bail peruvathu. Non-bailable offence-kku Sessions Court/High Court-la apply pannalam. FIR padhivana udanaye apply pannalam. Grant aanaal arrest aagaamal investigation-la cooperate seyyalam.

instruction: Power of Attorney eppadi seivathu?
output: Types: General (all acts), Special (specific act). Draft on stamp paper (Rs.100-500 based on state). Registration: Sub-Registrar office (optional but recommended for property). NRI: Indian Embassy attestation. Revocation: Same process + inform parties.

instruction: Thirukkural-a artificial intelligence (AI) eppadi payanpaduththugiradu?
output: 1) ChatGPT, Claude pondra AI-gal Thirukkural explain pannum, 2) Tamil NLP research-la Thirukkural corpus payanpadugiradhu, 3) AI-powered apps kural recommend pannum situation-kku etrapa, 4) Voice assistants Thirukkural sollum, 5) Machine learning Thirukkural translations improve panna udhavugiradhu. Tamil-kku AI develop panravanga Thirukkural-a test case-aa use panraanga!

instruction: Email vandhuchu 'MSME registration expiring. Renew with 15,000 fee or lose all benefits.' MSME certificate important for tenders, urgent aa?
output: MSME registration (now Udyam) doesn't expire - it's permanent. Updation is free through udyamregistration.gov.in. Government registration never costs 15,000. Scammers know MSME benefits importance - exploiting business owners' compliance anxiety.

instruction: TNPSC-ku Tamil medium vs English medium - edhu better?
output: Both equal opportunity. Tamil medium advantages: 1) TN textbooks Tamil-la padikkalaam 2) Answer writing easier 3) More candidates. English medium advantages: 1) Reference books availability 2) Current affairs sources more. Reality: Language doesn't matter, content matters. Toppers in both mediums. Choose your comfortable language. Paper can be written in either, no preference given. Focus on preparation, not medium.

instruction: Minority community students-க்கு என்ன scholarship?
output: Pre-matric, post-matric, merit-cum-means scholarship உண்டு. Muslim, Christian, Sikh, Buddhist, Jain, Parsi students eligible. minorityaffairs.gov.in-ல் apply செய்யலாம்.

instruction: Competitive exam preparation-க்கு daily routine எப்படி இருக்க வேண்டும்?
output: Ideal routine: 5:00 AM - எழுந்து, fresh topics படிப்பு (2-3 hrs). 8:00 AM - breakfast, current affairs. 9:00 AM - Practice/mock tests. 12:00 PM - lunch, short rest. 2:00 PM - revision, notes making. 5:00 PM - exercise/break. 6:00 PM - optional subjects. 9:00 PM - light revision, daily news. 10:00 PM - sleep. Weekly: 1 full mock test. Monthly: syllabus completion target வையுங்கள்.

instruction: Exam hall ticket tholaindhuviduthu - enna seiyvathu?
output: Panic vendaam. School/College-la duplicate hall ticket vaangalam. Board exam-kku DGE website-la download pannalam. Exam centre-la ID proof kaatti emergency admit card peralaam. Principal letter-um udhavum.

instruction: Menstrual hygiene products free-யா கிடைக்குமா?
output: Government schemes: 1) TN: Subsidized sanitary napkins at fair price shops, 2) School girls: Free sanitary napkins through schools, 3) Anganwadi: Distribution to adolescent girls. Jan Aushadhi: Cheap sanitary napkins (Rs.1/pad). NGOs: Many distribute free. Machines: Napkin vending machines in some government offices, colleges. Menstrual leave: Some TN government offices have period leave policy.

instruction: TNMSC pharmacy stores எங்கே இருக்கு?
output: TNMSC = Tamil Nadu Medical Services Corporation. Stores: All government hospitals, standalone Fair Price Medicine Shops. Prices: 20-50% cheaper. Quality: Government-procured, tested. Items: Medicines, surgical items, consumables. Location: tnmsc.com for store locator. Government hospital patients: Medicines from TNMSC pharmacy often free (in-patient).

instruction: Pharmacy license illaama operate panraanga - report?
output: Illegal! Every pharmacy needs: 1) Drug License (displayed), 2) Registered Pharmacist (during operating hours). Report: Drug Inspector, State Drugs Control, local police. Check: License number displayed, pharmacist name displayed. Risk: Unlicensed pharmacy may sell fake/expired/wrong medicines. Online: E-pharmacy also needs license - check before ordering.

instruction: Arrest ஆகும்போது என்ன rights இருக்கு?
output: Constitutional rights: 1) Arrest reason தெரிவிக்கணும், 2) Lawyer அழைக்க right, 3) Family-க்கு inform செய்ய, 4) 24 hours-ல் Magistrate முன் ஆஜர், 5) Medical examination, 6) Silent remain செய்ய right. Women: Only women police, not between sunset-sunrise.

instruction: Siddha + Allopathy together edukkalaamaa?
output: Possible with precautions! Important: 1) Inform BOTH doctors about all medicines, 2) Gap of 30-60 minutes between different system medicines, 3) Some interactions possible, 4) Don't stop allopathy suddenly for chronic diseases. Integration: Many hospitals practice integrated medicine. Best: Consult at integrated AYUSH-allopathy clinics. Examples: Diabetes, BP - can take both under supervision. Never self-combine without medical advice.

instruction: PAN Card tholaindhuvidadhu - Duplicate eppadi peruvadhu?
output: 1. e-PAN Download (Free): eportal.incometax.gov.in → Instant e-PAN, Aadhaar OTP verification, PDF download. 2. Physical Duplicate: onlineservices.nsdl.com → 'Reprint of PAN Card', Fee ₹50, comes in 15-20 days. 3. Forgot PAN Number: incometax.gov.in → Know Your PAN, find using Name + DOB + Mobile

instruction: Medical negligence-kku evvalavu compensation ketkalaamaa?
output: Claim include: 1) Medical expenses incurred, 2) Future treatment cost, 3) Loss of income, 4) Pain and suffering (mental agony), 5) Loss of life expectancy, 6) Punitive damages. Lakhs to Crores varai - case severity-a poruthadhu. Expert lawyer consult pannunga.

instruction: விவசாயக் கல்வி படிக்க என்ன வழி?
output: TNAU (Tamil Nadu Agricultural University) Coimbatore-ல் BSc Agriculture, Horticulture, Forestry courses உள்ளன. 12th Biology group-ல படித்தால் TNAU counselling மூலம் சேரலாம். Government job opportunities அதிகம்.

instruction: ஒற்றை பெற்றோர்/அநாதை மாணவர்களுக்கு என்ன scholarship?
output: Support schemes: 1) AICTE Swanath Scholarship - ₹50,000/ஆண்டு orphans-க்கு 2) PM CARES for Children (COVID orphans) - full support till graduation 3) Social Welfare Department orphan scholarship 4) NGO support - SOS Children's Villages, Udayan Care. Documents: Parent death certificate, guardian affidavit. Priority in government hostel admission. Apply through respective department.

instruction: Call vannille - 'Ningade account block aakum, KYC update pannulle' nu. OTP choikkunnu. Entha cheyyum?
output: Fraud alle idhu! Bank phone la OTP choikkillalle! 'Block aakum' nu bayappeduthunnu. Branch ku neeye poi pesu. Nagercoil, Marthandam la aalukal ipdi maatikittanga. Phone la details kodukkaadhe.

instruction: Neighbour வீட்டு construction என் வீட்டுக்கு damage - compensation கிடைக்குமா?
output: ஆம். Civil Court-ல் damages claim. Steps: 1) Written notice to neighbour, 2) Photos/videos of damage, 3) Engineer report (damage assessment), 4) Civil suit file. Compensation: Repair cost + inconvenience. Injunction to stop work-உம் possible.

instruction: Traffic police thappaa fine pottuttaaru, ethirkkalaama? (Tirunelveli style)
output: Aamaa ethirkkalam. Dashcam/CCTV proof irundhaa best. Court-la challan contest pannalam. Online grievance: tnpolice.gov.in. Time limit undu - delay aagaama ponga. Challan copy kattaayam vaangunga.

instruction: Stand Up India scheme endraal enna?
output: Business loan for SC/ST/Women. Loan amount: ₹10 lakh - ₹1 crore. Eligibility: SC/ST or Women entrepreneur, Above 18 years, New Manufacturing/Trading/Service business, At least 51% ownership. Benefits: Collateral-free (CGTMSE Guarantee), Low interest rate, 7 year repayment period. Apply: standupmitra.in

instruction: Expert witness எப்படி arrange பண்றது?
output: Expert = Doctor in same specialty who can opine on standard of care. Finding: 1) Through medical-legal lawyer, 2) Retired senior doctors, 3) Medical college professors. Cost: Fee for opinion + court appearance. Report: Written opinion on whether standard of care met. Court: May be cross-examined. Important: Expert from same specialty (surgeon for surgery case).

instruction: Clinical trial-la participate pannalaamaa? Risks enna?
output: Voluntary participation. Requirements: 1) Ethics Committee approval, 2) Detailed informed consent, 3) Insurance coverage for participants, 4) Right to withdraw anytime, 5) Compensation for injury. Risks: Unknown side effects, may receive placebo. Benefits: Access to new treatments, free care during trial, compensation. Verify: CTRI registration (ctri.nic.in). Never feel pressured.

instruction: Degree mudinjachu. Job search panradhaa, PG padikkiradhaa? Confused-aa irukken.
output: Decision framework: Job now if: 1) Financial need urgent 2) Work experience wanted 3) Industry-specific UG sufficient. PG if: 1) Academic/Research interest 2) Specific career needs PG (MBA for management) 3) Higher salary jump. Middle path: Job + Distance PG (IGNOU, University) OR Work 2-3 years → PG. Reality: Both paths successful. No 'wrong' choice. Career isn't linear. Many do job → PG → better job. Decide based on YOUR goals, not others' opinions.

instruction: Mental illness reason-ஆ job reject பண்ணினாங்க - action?
output: Illegal discrimination! RPD Act + MHCA protection. Action: 1) Written reason கேளுங்க, 2) State Commissioner for Disabilities complaint, 3) Labour court if existing job, 4) Court (writ petition). Exceptions: Very limited safety-critical jobs with specific requirements. Proof: Email/written rejection citing mental health. Remedy: Reinstatement, compensation, policy change order.

instruction: Exam-ல் wrong answer எழுதிட்டேன், cut பண்ணலாமா?
output: Yes, cutting allowed. Method: Single line through wrong text, write correct above/below. Don't: Overwrite, scribble, use whitener (some exams prohibit). For MCQ/OMR: Circle filling rules strict - follow instructions exactly. If OMR mistake: Some allow correction with specific method. Essay type: Neat cutting = no penalty. Messy = bad impression. Time management: Better to continue, cut later if time permits. Rough work: Designated area only.

instruction: Court fee எவ்வளவு கட்டணும்?
output: TN Court Fees Act based: Property suits - value based (1-10%), Money suits - amount based, Injunction - fixed fee. Consumer forum: Free up to Rs.5 lakh. Lok Adalat: No fee. Poor litigants: Court fee exemption available. e-payment: ecourts.gov.in.

instruction: Tree cut panna permission venumaa?
output: Aama. TN Forest Act + TN Preservation of Private Forests Act. Permission: District Forest Officer (forest land), Corporation/Municipality (urban area). Violations: Fine + imprisonment. Protected species: Sandalwood, Rosewood - strict restrictions. Compensatory plantation required.

instruction: Agathiyar yaar? Avar yaen mukkiyamaanavar?
output: Agathiyar (Agasthiyar) Siddhargaloda thalaivar, 'Guru Moorthi' endru azhaikkapadubavar. Tamil mozhikku ilakkanam ezhuthiyavar endru nambappadugiradhu (Agaththiyam). Sivaperumaan ivarukku neradiyaaga gnaanam aLiththathaaga nambikkai. Thennindiyaavukku vadakkilirundu vandhavar. Podhigai malaiyil indrum iruppathaga nambappadugiradhu. Siddha medicine-oda founding father.

instruction: 'Medical seat available - NRI quota remaining! Pay 50 lakh by tomorrow' urgent call வந்துச்சு. Genuine opportunity-ஆ?
output: 99% scam! Medical admission-ல crores fraud நடக்குது. 'Urgent payment' pressure தரும் scam tactic. NEET counselling மட்டும் official route. Unknown callers trust பண்ணாதீங்க. Police-க்கு report பண்ணுங்க.

instruction: School/College complaint enge koduppudhu?
output: Complaint hierarchy: School: 1) Class teacher → Headmaster → DEO. College: 1) HOD → Principal → University Registrar → UGC. Online: 1) CM Cell - www.cm.tn.gov.in 2) MHRD grievance portal 3) Anti-ragging: www.antiragging.in. Fee issues: Fee Committee. Documents: Keep written complaints, get acknowledgment. Serious cases: Police, Women's Commission (harassment).

instruction: Tubectomy/Vasectomy - rights என்ன? Compensation?
output: Rights: 1) Completely voluntary - no forced sterilization, 2) Informed consent mandatory, 3) Cooling-off period before surgery, 4) Minimum age 22 (women), 21 (men). Compensation: TN scheme - cash incentive after surgery. Complications: Government covers treatment, additional compensation. Failure: Pregnancy after sterilization - compensation scheme exists. Never sign blank forms - read consent fully.

instruction: Call vandhudhu 'Media insurance special scheme from Press Club. 3000 annual for comprehensive coverage.' Insurance edukalama?
output: Verify with your actual Press Club for any group insurance schemes. Independent 'media insurance' calls likely scams. Check PMJJBY/PMSBY for basic coverage at Rs 330-430. Real press clubs have proper membership processes, not cold calls.

instruction: கிராமத்துல delivery பண்ணலாமா? Hospital போகணுமா?
output: Hospital delivery best! Why: 1) Emergency handling (bleeding, cord problem), 2) C-section if needed, 3) Baby complications - immediate care. Government: PHC level delivery (normal cases), higher centre referral. 102 ambulance: Free transport - call early when labour starts. Incentive: JSY + Muthulakshmi scheme - Rs.18,000+ for hospital delivery. Dai (TBA): Not trained for emergencies. Register PHC early - they plan delivery place based on risk.

instruction: TN ரேஷன் கடையில் என்ன பொருட்கள் கிடைக்கும்?
output: TN PDS items list. Rice Card: 20 kg free rice/family. Sugar Card: 5 kg rice at ₹1/kg. Common: Sugar 1.5 kg (₹13.50), Wheat/Atta 2 kg (₹7), Palm Oil 500ml (₹27), Daal 1 kg (₹28). Specials: Pongal - 1 kg sugar free + cash; Diwali - 1 kg sugar free; Ramzan - dates + cash for Muslims. Eligibility: Ration card type-க்கு ஏற்ப. Shop: Monthly distribution, SMS alert.

instruction: ASHA worker yaar? Enna help seivaanga?
output: ASHA = Accredited Social Health Activist - village level health worker. Services: 1) Pregnant women tracking and support, 2) Child vaccination reminders, 3) Health awareness, 4) Medicine distribution (TB, malaria), 5) Nutrition counseling, 6) Family planning advice, 7) Escort to hospital, 8) COVID vaccination support. Contact: Through Village Health Nurse or PHC. Free service.

instruction: Packaged food-la foreign object kidaichadhu, action enna?
output: Serious matter! Steps: 1) Product preserve pannunga (don't throw), 2) Photos/videos edunga, 3) Batch number, manufacturing date note pannunga, 4) Company complaint + social media, 5) Food Safety Officer complaint (local municipal office), 6) Consumer Forum - compensation claim. FSSAI: Manufacturer license cancel aagalam. Health affected: Medical bills + additional compensation.

instruction: 10th/12th pass-க்கு எந்தெந்த government jobs apply செய்யலாம்?
output: 10th pass jobs: 1) Railway Group D 2) SSC MTS (Multi-Tasking Staff) 3) TNPSC Group 4 4) Police constable 5) Post office GDS. 12th pass jobs: 1) SSC CHSL (LDC, DEO) 2) TNPSC Group 4 (higher posts) 3) Bank clerk (some) 4) Railway NTPC 5) Defence - Army, Navy, Air Force. Age: 18-30 (varies). Apply: Respective recruitment websites. Free coaching available through Employment Exchange.

instruction: De-addiction centre-la treatment eppadi?
output: Government centres: Free treatment at district/medical college hospitals. Services: 1) Detoxification (medical supervision), 2) Rehabilitation (21-90 days), 3) Counseling, 4) Family therapy, 5) Aftercare. TN: Alcohol/drug de-addiction centres in major hospitals. Private: Verify registration with State Mental Health Authority. Helpline: De-addiction helpline for guidance. Forced admission: Only if danger to self/others.

instruction: Counselling-ல் seat confirm ஆனா, பிறகு change பண்ண முடியுமா?
output: Options: 1) Tentative allotment - wait for next round, better college possible 2) Self-reporting - confirm seat, can still upgrade in subsequent rounds 3) Final allotment - must join or forfeit. Upgrade: Each round, vacant seats filled. Your higher choices reconsidered. Risk: If you reject and don't get better, no seat. Safe: Confirm in hand, upgrade if available. Fees paid = refundable if upgraded officially.

instruction: Loan kodukkalama vendaama?
output: 'Eeyaadha selvaththin eeyum pasi' - kodukkaadhaa selvam payanillai. Aanaal: 'Koduppadu aatraami kooruvadhu azhagalla' - kodukka mudiyaadhabodhu 'illai' solvathu thavaRilla. Assess carefully - ungal financial stability paarthu, thirumba kidaikkum endru nambikkai irundhaal mattum kodungal. Afford panna mudiyaadhAdhai loan kodukkaadheergal.

instruction: 'Vinaikkan vinaiyudaiyaan' - velayoda mukkiyaththuvam patriya kural enna?
output: Kural: 'Vinaikkan vinaiyudaiyaan kenmai veraaga ninaippaanai neengum thiru'. Artham: Velai seiyum bodhu fully focused illaamal, vera vishayangal ninaippavanaai selvam vittu poyvidum. Work-la distraction = failure. Concentration and dedication needed for success.

instruction: Discord la someone 'trade skins' offer pannaan. I go first nu sonnaan since 'I have more reputation.'
output: 'I have reputation, you go first' classic scam line. Trade pannina - they block you, items gone. Use official trading systems with protection. Discord/random trades = high scam risk. If seems unfair, don't trade.

instruction: Sore throat-க்கு gargle options?
output: Gargle remedies: 1) Salt + warm water (most common), 2) Turmeric + salt + warm water, 3) Honey + warm water, 4) Apple cider vinegar diluted, 5) Licorice (Athimathuram) decoction. Frequency: 3-4 times daily. Drinks: 1) Warm water throughout day, 2) Honey + lemon + warm water, 3) Tulsi tea. Avoid: Cold drinks, spicy food, shouting. Persistent: If >1 week, see ENT doctor.

instruction: Builder specification maathi flat thandhaar - complaint podalaamaa?
output: Aama. Agreement/Brochure-la sonna specification maarinaal RERA complaint podalam. Options: 1) Specification match seyya order, 2) Price reduction, 3) Compensation, 4) Full refund. Photos, videos, original brochure evidence-aa vainga.

instruction: NEET-ku class 11 irundhae prepare aaganuumaa?
output: Ideal: Class 11 start. Why? NEET syllabus = 11th + 12th. Class 11 weightage: 45-50%. Strategy: 1) 11th: Concepts strong, NCERT master 2) 12th: Revision + new topics + mock tests 3) After 12th: Full revision + test series. Late starter (12th)? Focus 50% important topics, daily 10-12 hours. Dropper year: Structured coaching + self-study balance. Never too late - many crack in 2nd/3rd attempt.

instruction: Medical records copy கேட்கலாமா? Hospital தர மறுக்கலாமா?
output: Patient's absolute right! Records include: 1) Discharge summary, 2) Investigation reports, 3) Operation notes, 4) Prescription copies, 5) Bills. Hospital must provide within 72 hours of request. Cannot refuse. Charges: Nominal photocopying charges only. Digital records: Soft copy also must provide. Retention: Hospital must keep records 3 years minimum. Missing records: Hospital liable.

instruction: Matrimony site la US ponnu, visa problem nu 50K kekkudhu saami. Genuine aa?
output: Scam saami! Meet pannama, family verify pannama money anuppaadheenga. 'Visa emergency' classic excuse. Video call request pannunga - avoid pannaa scam confirm.

instruction: FIR எப்படி பதிவு செய்வது?
output: Visit nearest police station with written complaint. Zero FIR: Can file at ANY station. Online for some crimes: eservices.tnpolice.gov.in. Get FIR copy FREE (your right!). If police refuse: Complain to SP/District Collector. For cyber crimes: cybercrime.gov.in or call 1930.

instruction: BC/MBC/SC/ST Scholarship eppadi peruvadhu?
output: Apply at tneservices.tn.gov.in or scholarships.gov.in through school/college. Documents: Community certificate, income certificate, marksheet, Aadhaar, bank account. Benefits: Full fee waiver + monthly stipend ₹500-1,500. Apply within deadline each year.

instruction: ESI hospital-ல் treatment எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: ESI card + ID proof காட்டுங்க. Dispensary-ல் OP treatment free. Serious cases: ESI hospital referral. Tied-up hospitals-லும் treatment available. Emergency-க்கு any hospital-ல் treatment பெற்று reimbursement claim பண்ணலாம். Dependent family members-க்கும் cover உண்டு.

instruction: Hospital insurance claim-க்கு cooperate பண்ணல - என்ன செய்வது?
output: Hospital must cooperate for cashless. Issues: 1) Won't file pre-auth, 2) Asking cash despite insurance, 3) Not providing documents. Action: 1) Escalate to hospital administration, 2) Call TPA directly, 3) Insurer helpline, 4) Pay and claim reimbursement (last resort). Network hospital agreement: They must facilitate cashless. Complaint: Insurer can de-empanel non-cooperative hospitals.

instruction: Mental health insurance cover aagumaa?
output: Yes! Mandatory since MHCA 2017 + IRDAI guidelines. Coverage: 1) Psychiatric hospitalization, 2) Day care treatment, 3) OPD (some policies), 4) Medicine costs. Exclusions: Some policies exclude substance abuse (check terms). Claim: Same as physical illness - cashless/reimbursement. Denied: Complaint to IRDAI, Insurance Ombudsman. Important: Don't hide history - disclose for valid claims.

instruction: Phone vandhuchu 'PM Kisan installment problem. Pay 500 service charge to fix account issue.' PM Kisan money varalai, idhu genuine call aa?
output: PM Kisan payments through DBT - no service charge. Check status at pmkisan.gov.in with Aadhaar. If payment delayed, contact agriculture department. Government schemes never need 'service charges'. Scammers target farmers knowing they depend on these payments.

instruction: Online application submit ஆகல, error வருது
output: Common fixes: 1) Clear browser cache, try incognito mode 2) Different browser (Chrome/Firefox) 3) Check file size limits (usually <200KB photos, <500KB docs) 4) PDF/JPG format correct? 5) All mandatory fields filled? 6) Internet stable? 7) Deadline passed? 8) Server busy - try late night. Still failing: Screenshot error, contact helpline. Alternative: Try from e-Sevai centre - they have dedicated lines.

instruction: TNHB (Tamil Nadu Housing Board) வீடு எப்படி வாங்குவது?
output: TNHB affordable housing. Types: EWS (Economic Weaker Section), LIG, MIG, HIG flats/plots. Apply: tnhb.tn.gov.in-ல் online. Selection: Lottery/First-come-first-serve (scheme-க்கு ஏற்ப). Cost: Market விலையை விட குறைவு. Loan: Banks-உடன் tie-up, easy EMI. Documents: Income proof, Aadhaar, Address proof. Projects: Chennai, Coimbatore, Madurai, other cities. Rental Housing: Low-income-க்கு TNHB rental schemes உண்டு.

instruction: LinkedIn la oru IT recruiter message pannirukku 'Senior Developer role at Microsoft, $150K package. Send resume and current company credentials for background verification.' Legit recruiter aa?
output: Never share company credentials for 'background check'! Real recruiters ask for resume, not passwords. Microsoft recruits through official channels with @microsoft.com emails. This is credential harvesting disguised as recruitment.

instruction: PAN Card pattriya common thavarugal enna?
output:
Wrong Beliefs vs Truth:

1. ❌ Cannot open Bank Account without PAN → ✅ PAN mandatory only for ₹50,000+ transactions
2. ❌ Minor doesn't need PAN → ✅ Required in some cases (Investment, Income)
3. ❌ PAN-Aadhaar link is optional → ✅ Mandatory, else PAN becomes inoperative
4. ❌ Having two PANs is okay → ✅ Illegal, ₹10,000 fine
5. ❌ PAN card needs renewal → ✅ Lifetime valid, no renewal needed
6. ❌ PAN number changes → ✅ Lifetime same number
7. ❌ e-PAN is not valid → ✅ e-PAN is legally valid

Common Mistakes:
- Wrong DOB in PAN → Aadhaar mismatch
- Father's name instead of Husband's name
- Not linking despite ₹1,000 late fee

instruction: Video call screenshot eduthu blackmail pannuraanga. Report panna bayam - video spread aagumaa?
output: Critical understanding: Paying NEVER stops blackmail - increases it. Reporting DOES NOT spread content. Scammers rarely actually share (want money, not revenge). You're VICTIM, not criminal. Immediate: DO NOT PAY, DO NOT ENGAGE, document everything, secure accounts (change passwords, 2FA). Reporting: cybercrime.gov.in → 'Cyber Crime Against Women' (anonymous option), Women Helpline 181/1091, Platform report to remove content. FIR Sections: 384 IPC (Extortion), 506 IPC (Intimidation), 67A IT Act. Support: IT for Change, Cyber Peace Foundation. Your image is YOUR property.

instruction: Affidavit eppadi ezhudhuvadhu? Enge notarize panradhu?
output: Affidavit format: 1) Title (I, [Name], do hereby solemnly affirm...), 2) Personal details (age, address, occupation), 3) Statement of facts (numbered paragraphs), 4) Verification (true to knowledge and belief), 5) Deponent signature. Notarize: Any Notary Public - Rs.50-200 fee. Stamp paper: Rs.10-100 (depends on purpose). E-stamp available at banks.

instruction: Tamil gopura kattidakkalai endraal enna?
output: Tamil kovil kattidakkalai Tamil Nadu-oda unique temple architecture. Features: 1) Gopuram - piramaanda nuzhaivaayil gopurangal, 2) Vimanam - karuvrai mel amaippu, 3) Mandapam - pillared halls, 4) Prakaaram - temple corridors, 5) Kulam - temple tank. Pallavargal (7-9th century) thodangi, Chozhargal (9-13th century), Pandiyargal, Nayakkargal idhai develop panninaargal. World-la unique style!

instruction: NEET/JEE-ku Free Coaching enga kidaikkum?
output:
**Free NEET/JEE Coaching:**

**1. TN Government:**
- Naan Mudhalvan Program: naanmudhalvan.tn.gov.in
- District Collector free coaching

**2. TNSF:** Free residential for rural - tnsf.org.in

**3. Super 30 Programs:** NGOs, Free everything for SC/ST/EWS

**4. Scholarship Exams:**
- ANTHE (Aakash): Up to 100% off
- TALLENTEX (Allen): Up to 90% off

**5. Online Free:**
- SWAYAM, Khan Academy
- Physics Wallah, Kalvi TV

**6. SC/ST/BC Specific:**
- Dr. Ambedkar Free Coaching
- BC/MBC Scheme: bcmbcmw.tn.gov.in

**How to Find:**
- School HM, Collector Office
- Social Welfare Dept
- Local MLA sponsorship

instruction: Marriage-ல் mental illness ground for divorce-ஆ?
output: Complex issue. Law: Mental disorder is a ground under Hindu Marriage Act, but: 1) Must be incurable/very severe, 2) Must be before marriage or continuous after, 3) Court considers treatment possibility, 4) Living together impossible. Safeguards: 1) Medical evidence needed, 2) Treatment efforts considered, 3) Maintenance rights protected. Progressive interpretation: Courts increasingly protective of mentally ill spouse.

instruction: E-challan pay eppadi seivathu?
output: Online: echallan.parivahan.gov.in or TN Traffic Police app. Enter: Vehicle number/Challan number. Payment: Net banking, UPI, credit/debit card. Offline: Traffic police station, court. Non-payment: License suspension, vehicle seizure possible.

instruction: Visitation rights endraal enna?
output: Custody illadha parent-kku child-ai sandhikkum right. Court order: Weekly/monthly visits, holiday stays, phone/video calls. Visitation deny panninaal contempt of court. Both parents cooperate seivathu child-kku nalladhu.

instruction: Madurai region-la top engineering colleges evai?
output: Top engineering colleges Madurai region: 1) Thiagarajar College of Engineering (TCE) - Autonomous, top ranked 2) Government College of Engineering Tirunelveli 3) National Engineering College Kovilpatti 4) Mepco Schlenk Madurai 5) PSNA College of Engineering Dindigul. Admission: TNEA counselling. TCE cutoff high - 195+ for popular branches. Government colleges affordable - ₹50,000/year approx.

instruction: Scholarship eppadi peruvadhu?
output: BC/MBC/SC/ST students-ku free education + stipend. Apply: tneservices.tn.gov.in. Documents: Community certificate, Income certificate, Marksheet. Key schemes: CM Higher Education Scholarship, BC/MBC Post-Matric Scholarship, SC/ST Scholarship

instruction: Kanyakumari Thiruvalluvar silai evvalavu uyaram?

instruction: Divorce-ல் child custody யாருக்கு கிடைக்கும்?
output: 'Welfare of child' principle - யார் better care கொடுக்க முடியுமோ அவர்களுக்கு. General preference: Below 5 years - mother. 5+ years - child's preference consider ஆகும். Father-க்கும் custody கிடைக்கலாம் if mother unfit. Joint custody possible.

instruction: Private hospital rate display பண்ணணுமா?
output: Yes! Mandatory under Clinical Establishments Act. Display: 1) Room charges (all categories), 2) ICU charges, 3) OT charges, 4) Common procedure rates, 5) Consultation fees, 6) Emergency charges. Where: Reception area, website. Not displayed: Complaint to DHS. Rate revision: Must give notice. Hidden charges: Consumer Forum complaint.

instruction: TN Slum Clearance Board வீடு எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: Slum-dwellers-க்கு punarvasam. தகுதி: Recognized slum-ல் 10+ years வசிப்பவர், Survey-ல் பெயர் உள்ளவர். Types: In-situ development (அதே இடத்தில்), Resettlement (புதிய இடம்). Cost: Free or subsidized (income-க்கு ஏற்ப). Facilities: Basic amenities - water, electricity, toilet. Apply: TNSCB office/Local body. Documents: Slum survey ID, Aadhaar, Ration card. Projects: Multi-storey tenements in Chennai, other cities.

instruction: Pradhan Mantri MUDRA Yojana (PMMY) - loan eppadi peruvadhu?

Eligibility: Manufacturing/Trading/Service sector, Non-Corporate Small Business. Apply: mudra.org.in or nearby Bank. Need: Business Plan, ID Proof, Address Proof

Free services: Consultation, medicines (basic), counseling. DMHP: Outreach to community, schools, PHCs. Appointment: Usually walk-in OPD or through PHC referral.

instruction: School admission marukkiraargal - RTE-la seat irukke?
output: RTE Act 25%: EWS/disadvantaged group-kku reserved. Apply: Online portal (rte.tn.gov.in). Rejection complaint: Block Education Officer, DEO, State RTE Authority. Documents: Income certificate, caste certificate, residence proof. Age: 6-14 years.

instruction: NEET Exam Pattern என்ன? Marks எப்படி calculate ஆகும்?
output:
**NEET Exam Pattern 2024:**

**Exam Details:**
- Mode: Offline (Pen & Paper)
- Duration: 3 hours 20 minutes
- Total Questions: 200 (180 to attempt)
- Total Marks: 720

**Subject-wise Distribution:**

| Subject | Section A | Section B | Total |
|---------|-----------|-----------|-------|
| Physics | 35 | 15 (10 attempt) | 45 |
| Chemistry | 35 | 15 (10 attempt) | 45 |
| Botany | 35 | 15 (10 attempt) | 45 |
| Zoology | 35 | 15 (10 attempt) | 45 |

**Marking Scheme:**
- Correct Answer: +4 marks
- Wrong Answer: -1 mark (Negative marking!)
- Unattempted: 0 marks

**Marks Calculation:**
```
Total = (Correct × 4) - (Wrong × 1)
```

**Example:**
- Correct: 150, Wrong: 20, Unattempted: 10
- Score = (150 × 4) - (20 × 1) = 600 - 20 = 580

**Cut-off (Approximate):**
| Category | Marks (out of 720) |
|----------|-------------------|
| General | 600+ (Top colleges) |
| OBC | 550+ |
| SC | 450+ |
| ST | 400+ |
| Govt Medical (General) | 550+ |

**Important Tips:**
- Don't guess randomly (negative marking)
- Section B gives choice - attempt easier ones
- Time management crucial

instruction: Home remedies safe-ஆ? எப்போது avoid பண்ணணும்?
output: Some safe: Ginger for nausea, turmeric milk, salt water gargle, honey for cough (not <1 year). Avoid home remedies: 1) Serious illness (high fever, breathing difficulty), 2) When already on prescription medicines (interactions), 3) Wounds/burns (infection risk), 4) Children/pregnant (specific risks). Rule: Home remedy not working in 2-3 days = see doctor. Never apply: Cow dung on wounds, kerosene on head lice (dangerous!).

instruction: Parents-kku children maintenance kodukkanuumaa?
output: Aama. Maintenance and Welfare of Parents Act 2007 padi children (including married daughters) parents-kku maintain seyyanum. Maintenance Tribunal-la claim pannalam. Max Rs.10,000/month. Non-compliance: 3 months imprisonment. Property transfer reverse aagalam.

instruction: WhatsApp group la add aanaen - stock tips kuduppaanga. Admin profit screenshots post pannuvaar, members ellam 'thanks anna 50K profit' nu solluvaanga. Invest pannalaama saami?
output: 'Pig butchering' scam saami idhu. Screenshots fake, 'members' ellam gang part dhaan. Small withdrawal allow pannuvaanga first - trust build panna. Big amount pottaa - 'technical issue', 'tax pay pannunga' nu mudiyaadha loop. SEBI registered brokers mattum use pannunga - Zerodha, Groww. RS Puram la oru textile merchant ipdi 15 lakh lose pannitaar.

instruction: Commercial property-kkum same rules-aa?
output: Basic principles same. But commercial tenancy-kku: 1) Advance limit 6 months (residential-kku 3 months), 2) Rent increase reasonable-aa irukkanum, 3) Goodwill compensation ketkalam (long-term tenants), 4) Business loss-kku compensation ketkalam.

instruction: Government Schemes pattriya common thavarugal enna?
output:
PM-KISAN:
❌ All farmers get it → ✅ Income Tax payers, Govt employees excluded
❌ ₹6,000 one-time → ✅ ₹2,000 x 3 installments
❌ Just apply → ✅ State Govt verification mandatory

Ayushman Bharat:
❌ Valid in all hospitals → ✅ Only empanelled hospitals
❌ All treatments covered → ✅ Only 1,500 specific procedures
❌ OPD free → ✅ Only IPD covered
❌ Everyone eligible → ✅ Only BPL (SECC 2011 data)

MUDRA Loan:
❌ Government gives loan → ✅ Banks give loan, Govt only guarantees
❌ Guaranteed approval → ✅ Bank's discretion, credit check needed
❌ Has subsidy → ✅ No subsidy, only collateral-free

PMAY:
❌ Free house → ✅ Only subsidy, not full cost
❌ Eligible even with existing house → ✅ Ineligible if pucca house exists

instruction: Pet animal-க்கு என்ன legal responsibilities?
output: Responsibilities: Registration (some municipalities), vaccination, leash in public, damage liability. Pet cruelty: PCA Act - 3 months imprisonment + Rs.100 fine (old law, amendments pending). Noise nuisance: Neighbour complaint valid. Banned breeds: Check local rules.

instruction: Court marriage எப்படி செய்வது?
output: Steps: 1) Marriage Registrar office-ல் form submit (30 days before), 2) Notice board-ல் display, 3) Objection period (30 days), 4) Marriage ceremony (Registrar முன்), 5) Certificate issue. Witnesses: 3 பேர். Documents: Birth certificate, address proof, photos, affidavit.

instruction: Medical negligence prove பண்ண என்ன evidence வேணும்?
output: Essential evidence: 1) Complete medical records (admission to discharge), 2) Prescription copies, 3) Test reports, 4) Bills (shows what was done), 5) Consent forms, 6) Photos if applicable, 7) Witness statements (family who were present), 8) Expert medical opinion. Preserve: Original documents, don't alter. Timeline: Note dates, times of events. Digital: Screenshots of online communications.

instruction: Chitta என்றால் என்ன? Patta-விட வித்தியாசம் என்ன?
output: Patta = Owner details, survey number, area. Chitta = Same info + land classification (wet/dry), soil type, cultivation details. Chitta is more detailed. Agriculture land-க்கு Chitta முக்கியம். Both available at Taluk office or online.

instruction: Kayakalpa treatment என்ன? எங்கே available?
output: Kayakalpa = Rejuvenation/anti-aging therapy. Purpose: Longevity, vitality, reverse aging effects. Methods: 1) Special medicines (Kayakalpa pills), 2) Dietary regimen, 3) Yoga, pranayama, 4) Lifestyle modifications. Duration: 40-90 days typically (intensive). Where: 1) NIS specialized program, 2) Selected Siddha hospitals, 3) Traditional practitioners. Not for: Acute illness, certain chronic conditions. Preparation: Requires purification therapies first.

instruction: Tamil medium-ல் படிச்சா future-ல் problem வருமா? English medium better-ஆ?
output: Reality check: Tamil medium = Mother tongue strong, concepts clear. English medium = Language advantage. Both work! Important: 1) Foundation subjects (Maths, Science) any medium OK 2) English can be learned later 3) Many Tamil medium toppers in competitive exams 4) Government jobs no medium preference. Advice: Choose based on child comfort. Tamil medium + English tuition = balanced approach. Focus on learning, not medium.

instruction: Spy / ulavali patri enna solkiraar Valluvar?
output: Kural: 'Otrum uraisaandra noolum ivaiyirandum thetrrenka mannavan kan'. Ulavaligalum, nalla noolkalum arasanoda kangal. Melum: 'Otrinaan otrip porulthERiyaa mannavan kotrrang kolakkidandhadhu il'. Ulavu illaamal aatchi nadaththa mudiyaadhu. Intelligence gathering is essential for governance - RAW, IB concepts 2000+ years ago!

instruction: Exam-la time management eppadi seivathu?
output: Strategies: 1) Question paper muzhuvathum mudhalil padiyunga (5 mins) 2) Easy questions mudhalil attempt 3) Marks-ku erpa time allocate (1 mark = 1 minute rule) 4) Stuck aanaal skip, later return 5) Last 10 minutes revision-ku keep 6) Answer length = marks (2 marks = half page, 5 marks = 1 page) 7) Watch/clock parunga regularly. Practice: At home, exam conditions-la previous papers ezhuthunga.

instruction: PMJJBY/PMSBY Insurance enna?
output: PMJJBY: Life insurance ₹2 lakh for ₹436/year (18-55 age). PMSBY: Accident insurance ₹2 lakh for just ₹20/year (18-70 age). Both together: ₹456/year for ₹4 lakh coverage! Enroll through bank with savings account. Auto-debit on June 1.

instruction: எந்த vaccines adults-க்கு வேணும்?
output: Recommended: 1) Influenza (flu) - yearly (especially elderly, diabetics), 2) Pneumococcal - 65+ years, 3) Tetanus booster - every 10 years, 4) Hepatitis B - if not taken earlier, 5) HPV - up to 26 years, 6) COVID - as per current guidelines. Pregnancy: Tetanus, Pertussis. Travel: Yellow fever, etc. based on destination. Cost: Some free at government, others subsidized. Consult doctor for personalized schedule.

instruction: Chettinad architecture sirappu enna?
output: Chettinad - Sivaganga district-la ulla paguthi. Nattukottai Chettiars vasikkum idam. Architecture sirappu: 1) Piramaanda maaligaigal - 50-100 rooms, 2) Burma teak, Italian marble, Belgian glass, 3) Athangudi tiles - handmade, 4) Spacious courtyards, 5) Ornate pillars. 19th-20th century-la vanigathil panakaararkalaga irundhaargal. Ippodhuu pala houses heritage hotels. Karaikudi famous for Chettinad food too!

instruction: TNPSC free coaching எங்கே கிடைக்கும்?

instruction: Consumer case-kku time limit irukkaa?
output: Aama. Problem therinja naalilirundhu 2 years-kkul complaint kodukkanum. Special circumstances-la delay condone aagalam - valid reason irukkanum. Medical negligence cases-kku discovery date-la irundhu count aagum.

instruction: Pregnancy-ல் free checkup எங்கே கிடைக்கும்?

Documents: Mother and Child Protection Card issued. Important: Register early for complete care.

instruction: Offer letter வந்தாச்சு, joining-க்கு முன்னாடி என்ன check பண்ணணும்?

instruction: Call vandhuchu 'Legal aid society registration mandatory for all advocates. Pay 3000 registration fee.' Idhu genuine requirement aa?
output: Legal aid registration through District Legal Services Authority (DLSA), free of cost. Advocate registration only needed once with Bar Council. Legal Services Authority never charges fees from advocates. Visit your district court's legal services authority for genuine enrollment.

instruction: Travel package போனது worst experience, compensation கிடைக்குமா?
output: Yes, if: 1) Promised amenities இல்ல (hotel downgrade, no AC bus), 2) Itinerary மாற்றம் without consent, 3) Hidden charges. Claim: 1) Package cost difference, 2) Mental agony compensation, 3) Travel Forum/Consumer Forum complaint. Evidence: Brochure, booking confirmation, photos, videos. instruction: கோவையில் engineering படிக்க நல்ல college எது?

instruction: Caste, religion பார்த்து treatment refuse பண்ணலாமா?
output: Absolutely ILLEGAL! Non-discrimination is fundamental right. Action: 1) Police complaint (SC/ST Act if applicable), 2) Human Rights Commission, 3) State Medical Council, 4) Consumer Forum. Hospital license: Can be cancelled.

instruction: Skin diseases-kku Siddha effective-aa?
output: Yes! Siddha strong for skin: Psoriasis (Kalanjaga Padai), Eczema (Karappan), Vitiligo (Venpulli), Fungal infections, Acne. instruction: ITI-la ennenna trades padikkalaam? Edhu popular?
output: Popular ITI trades: 1) Electrician - mikavum demand 2) Fitter - manufacturing jobs 3) Welder - construction, shipyard 4) Motor Mechanic - automobile industry 5) COPA (Computer Operator) - IT support 6) Electronics Mechanic 7) Plumber - house construction 8) Turner - machine shop. instruction: Cervical/breast cancer screening free-yaa?
output: Yes! Population-based screening program. Available: PHC, government hospitals. Cervical: VIA (Visual Inspection with Acetic Acid) - simple, painless. Breast: Clinical breast examination. Age: 30+ years, every 3-5 years. HPV vaccine: Available for cervical cancer prevention (9-26 years ideal). Early detection: Curable. Camps: Regular screening camps conducted. Ask at PHC.

instruction: Prakriti (body constitution) என்றால் என்ன?
output: Prakriti = Your natural body type/constitution. Types: 1) Vata (air+space) - thin, active, anxious, 2) Pitta (fire+water) - medium build, sharp intellect, irritable, 3) Kapha (earth+water) - heavy, calm, slow. Most people: Combination (Vata-Pitta, Pitta-Kapha, etc.). Importance: Treatment personalized based on Prakriti. Diagnosis: Pulse examination (Nadi Pariksha), physical examination, questionnaire. Treatment: Balances your specific imbalances.

instruction: KVPY scholarship என்ன? Science students எப்படி apply செய்வது?
output: Kishore Vaigyanik Protsahan Yojana (KVPY): IISc Bangalore நடத்தும் science aptitude test. Streams: SA (Class 11), SX (Class 12), SB (1st year BSc). Scholarship: ₹5,000-7,000/மாதம் + annual contingency grant. Selection: Aptitude test + Interview. Benefits: IISc/IISERs admission priority. 2022 onwards INSPIRE SHE-ஆக merge ஆனது, but similar benefits continue through INSPIRE.

instruction: Scam la maatikitten nu realize aana udane enna pannanum?
output: GOLDEN HOUR - First 1 hour most critical! Step 1 (0-5 min): STOP all communication, block scammer. Step 2 (5-15 min): Call BANK 24/7 helpline, freeze account, report unauthorized transaction. Step 3 (15-30 min): Call Cyber Crime Helpline 1930. Step 4 (30-60 min): File FIR at cybercrime.gov.in. Within 24 hours action = 40-50% recovery chance. 72 hours later = only 10-15% chance.

instruction: Management quota vs Government quota - enna difference?
output: Government quota (65%): Counselling-based merit admission, low fees. Management quota (35%): College direct admission, higher fees (2-5x). NRI quota: Foreign citizen children, highest fees. Reality: Same degree, same placement opportunity. Management quota useful if: Marks low but can afford, specific college wanted, late application. Government quota: Always try first - significant cost savings. Private self-financing colleges: 100% management, higher fees.

instruction: Resume/CV எப்படி எழுதுவது?
output: Resume essentials: 1) Contact info - email (professional), phone 2) Education - reverse chronological, CGPA 3) Skills - technical + soft skills 4) Projects - 2-3 relevant ones with outcomes 5) Internships/Experience 6) Achievements - quantify where possible 7) Extra-curricular - leadership roles. Format: 1 page for freshers, clean design, no photos (India OK), PDF format. Avoid: Spelling errors, lying, lengthy paragraphs. Templates: Canva, Novoresume free options.

instruction: Consumer forum order implement ஆகல - என்ன செய்வது?
output: Execution petition file பண்ணுங்க. Order implement செய்யாத party-க்கு: 1) Fine, 2) Imprisonment (up to 3 years), 3) Property attachment. Forum-க்கே execution petition போடுங்க. District Collector மூலமும் execution நடக்கும்.

instruction: Scholarship status எப்படி check செய்வது?

Payment delay: 2-3 months normal. Rejected ஆனால்: Defect list பார்த்து correct documents upload. Grievance: helpdesk on portal.

instruction: NEET result varaadhu, panicked aa irukken. 'Management quota seat guaranteed - MBBS 50 lakhs, no donation receipt' nu call vandhudhu. Desperate aa irukken, trust pannalama?
output: 'Guaranteed seat without proper process' impossible. Management quota transparent fees irukkum with receipts. 'No receipt' = illegal = scam. 50 lakhs vaangitu seat varaadhu, complain panna mudiyaadhu (no receipt). Desperation exploit pannuvaanga - official counselling wait pannunga.

instruction: SMS vandhudhu - 'Dear Customer, your SBI account will be blocked. Update KYC immediately: [link]'. Reading glasses illa, pera kitta padikka sonneen, genuine aa?
output: Fake SMS ayya! SBI official SMS la suspicious links anuppaadhu. 'Account blocked' bayamudhuthal tactic. Link click pannina fake website - login details enter pannina account empty aagum. Ignore pannunga. Doubt irundhaa SBI branch ku ponga.

instruction: Second-hand Car vaanginen. RC Transfer eppadi seyvadhu?
output:
**RC Transfer for Used Vehicle:**

**Seller Must:**
1. Sign Form 29 & 30
2. Get NOC if different state
3. Give: Original RC, Insurance, PUC, Signed forms

**Buyer Must:**

**Step 1:** Apply at parivahan.gov.in → Transfer of Ownership

**Step 2: Documents**
- Form 29 & 30 (both signed)
- Original RC
- Insurance (transferred)
- PUC
- Both Aadhaar + Address proof
- Sale receipt

**Step 3:** RTO Visit - Both parties, Vehicle inspection

**Step 4: Fee**
- Transfer: ₹300-500
- Smart Card: ₹200

**Step 5:** New RC in 7-15 days

**Deadline:** 14 days from sale
**Penalty:** ₹50/day delay (max ₹500)

**Loan Vehicle:** Bank NOC mandatory

instruction: En paiyanukku 6 vayasu aachu, Government school-la eppadi serpathu?
output: Class 1 admission: Age 5+ (as on June 1st). Process: 1) Nearest government primary school-la neradigava sellunga 2) Application form vaangunga 3) Documents: Birth certificate, Aadhaar, parent ID, address proof, photos 4) Admission free - no donation 5) TC not needed for new admission. RTE Act: 25% seats private schools-layum EWS/DG category-ku reserved. Online: www.tnschools.gov.in for RTE admission.

instruction: Tenant-aaga ennenna responsibilities irukku?
output: 1) Time-kku rent kattuvathu, 2) Veetai nalla condition-la maintain seivathu, 3) Illegal activities seyyaamal iruppathu, 4) Neighbors-kku disturbance kodukaamal iruppathu, 5) Agreement terms follow seivathu, 6) Vacate seyyum mun notice koduppathu.

instruction: TNSDC free courses enna?
output: TNSDC offers 100+ free courses: 1) IT/Software - Web development, Data entry 2) Manufacturing - CNC, Welding 3) Healthcare - Nursing assistant, Lab technician 4) Retail - Sales, customer service 5) Hospitality - Hotel management basics 6) Construction - Mason, plumber. Duration: 1-6 months. Certification + placement assistance. Apply: www.tnskill.tn.gov.in. Age: 18-35. Free hostel for outstation candidates.

instruction: Golden hour endraal enna? Adhula hospital poganumaa?
output: Golden hour = First 60 minutes after trauma/heart attack. Critical because: 1) Brain damage starts in minutes without oxygen, 2) Bleeding control crucial, 3) Heart attack - early treatment = more heart saved, 4) Trauma - internal bleeding stops. Action: 1) Call 108 immediately, 2) Don't move spine injury victims, 3) CPR if no pulse (if trained), 4) Control visible bleeding. Nearest hospital first - don't travel far.

instruction: CS (Company Secretary) padippu enna? Eppadi seruvathu?
output: ICSI nadathum padippu. Levels: 1) Foundation (+2 aprom) 2) Executive 3) Professional. Total duration: 3-4 years. Practical training 15 months. Fee: Foundation ₹4,500, Executive ₹16,000, Professional ₹20,000. Corporate law, governance specialization. Good salary in companies.

instruction: என் பையனுக்கு 6 வயசு ஆச்சு, Government school-ல் எப்படி சேர்ப்பது?
output: Class 1 admission: Age 5+ (as on June 1st). Process: 1) Nearest government primary school-ல் நேரடியாக செல்லுங்கள் 2) Application form வாங்குங்கள் 3) Documents: Birth certificate, Aadhaar, parent ID, address proof, photos 4) Admission free - no donation 5) Transfer certificate not needed for new admission. RTE Act: 25% seats private schools-லும் EWS/DG category-க்கு reserved. Online: www.tnschools.gov.in for RTE admission.

instruction: Police vehicle seize panninaal eppadi release peruvathu?
output: Steps: 1) Challan pay, 2) Required documents produce (license, RC, insurance), 3) Release order perunga, 4) Vehicle collect. Court custody-la irundhaal Court order venum. Seizure fee applicable. 24 hours-kkul Magistrate inform aaganum.

instruction: Burns-kku first aid enna?
output: Immediate: 1) Cool water (not ice) for 10-20 minutes, 2) Remove jewelry/tight items, 3) Cover with clean cloth (not cotton wool), 4) Don't apply toothpaste/butter/egg - myth!, 5) Don't break blisters. Hospital needed: 1) Large burns, 2) Face/hands/genitals, 3) Deep burns (white/charred), 4) Chemical/electrical burns, 5) Difficulty breathing (smoke inhalation). Free treatment: Government hospitals for burns.

instruction: RTI fee evvalavu? Eppadi pay panradhu?
output: Central Government: Rs.10 (postal order, DD, cash). Tamil Nadu State: Rs.10. BPL card holders: Fee exempted. Additional: Rs.2 per page for copies. Online: rtionline.gov.in (central), rtionline.tn.gov.in (state). Court fee stamp-um accept.

instruction: Siddhargal meditation patri enna solkirargal?
output: Siddhargaloda meditation techniques: 1) Andhar mounam - inner silence, 2) Manthira japam - mantra repetition, 3) Oli dhiyaanam - light meditation, 4) Suvaasa kavanippu - breath awareness, 5) Kundalini dhiyaanam - chakra meditation. 'Manam odunginaal anaiththum odungum' enbadhu core teaching. Daily practice-kku even 10 minutes bodhum endru solkiraargal. Naveena mindfulness-oda Tamil moolam idhuvae!

instruction: Piles/hemorrhoids-க்கு Siddha treatment?
output: Effective Siddha treatment! Moola Noi (piles) treatments: 1) Internal - Chitramutti Lehyam, Abhaya Arishtam, 2) External - Elathi Choornam application, Sitz bath with herbal decoction, 3) Agni karma (cauterization) for advanced, 4) Kshara application. Diet crucial: High fiber, avoid spicy. Duration: 1-2 months for mild, longer for severe. Surgery alternative: Siddha procedures for Grade 2-3 piles.

instruction: SC/ST/BC Scholarship TN-ல் என்ன உள்ளது?
output: Community-வாரி Scholarships. SC Students: Post-matric scholarship (₹550-1,200/month), Free education (all levels), Hostel stipend. ST Students: Similar to SC + extra coaching. BC/MBC/DNC: Post-matric (₹300-700/month), BC-இல் MBC-க்கு higher amount. Apply: bcmbcmw.tn.gov.in (BC), adwb.tn.gov.in (SC/ST). Documents: Community certificate, Income certificate, Institution bonafide, Aadhaar. Hostel: Free accommodation + food in govt hostels.

instruction: Social media-la Thirukkural eppadi popular aanadhu?
output: 1) #Thirukkural hashtag Twitter/X-la trending aagudhu, 2) Instagram-la artistic kural posts popular, 3) WhatsApp status-la kuralgal share aagindrana, 4) YouTube-la vilakka videos millions of views perugindrana, 5) Reels-la quick kural explanations viral aagindrana. Gen Z kooda Thirukkural-a 'ancient wisdom' endru appreciate panraanga. Memes kooda irukku - 'Valluvar said it 2000 years ago' format!

instruction: Tholkappiyam endraal enna? Yaar ezhudhinar?
output: Tholkappiyam - Tamilin migap pazhamaiyaana ilakkana nool. Tholkappiyar ezhuthiyathu. Ezhutthu, Sol, Porul endra moondru adhikaarangal. Tamil mozhiyoda grammar mattumalla, vaazhkai murai, panpaadu ellam idhil ullana. Agathiyaroda maanavan endru korappadugiradhu. 'Tholkappiyam katravan sol kaappiyam' enbadhu pazhamozhi. Indrum Tamil studies-kku aadharam.

instruction: HIV/AIDS patient-ஐ hospital refuse பண்ணலாமா?
output: ILLEGAL! HIV/AIDS Act 2017 + Supreme Court judgments. Hospital must: 1) Provide all necessary treatment, 2) Not segregate discriminatorily, 3) Follow standard precautions (for all patients anyway), 4) Maintain confidentiality. Refusal = criminal offence + license action. Report: TANSACS, State Medical Council, police. Private hospitals also bound by this law.

instruction: Bank exam Reasoning section எப்படி crack பண்றது?
output: Reasoning topics: Puzzles & Seating Arrangement (30-40% weightage), Syllogism, Blood Relations, Direction, Coding-Decoding, Inequality. Strategy: 1) Puzzles - daily 10 practice 2) Logic rules memorize 3) Speed improve through timed practice 4) Easy questions first in exam 5) Skip time-consuming Qs. Resources: RS Aggarwal, Rakesh Yadav, Testbook app. Time: 35 questions in 20-25 minutes. Practice = key to success.

instruction: Private hospital registration check panradhu eppadi?
output: Check: 1) TN Clinical Establishments Registration (mandatory), 2) Display: Registration certificate must be displayed, 3) NABH accreditation (optional but quality indicator), 4) Fire safety certificate, 5) Bio-medical waste authorization. Verify: Directorate of Medical Services (DMS) website or office. Unregistered hospital: Illegal - report to DHS. Also check: Doctor registrations displayed.

instruction: Thirukkuralil eththanai kuralgal ullana?
output: 1330 kuralgal. 133 adhigaarangal, ovvoru adhigaarathilum 10 kuralgal. Indha ennikkayai ninaivil vaikka: 133 x 10 = 1330.

instruction: Government Schemes-ku apply seyyum pothu common thavarugal enna?
output:
Documentation Errors:
1. ❌ Submitting expired Income Certificate → ✅ Must be issued within 6 months
2. ❌ Aadhaar-Bank mismatch → ✅ Name, DOB must match exactly, else DBT fails
3. ❌ Wrong bank account (inactive/closed) → ✅ Active account with correct IFSC
4. ❌ Wrong photo size/format → ✅ Passport size, recent, white background

Eligibility Mistakes:
5. ❌ Applying despite exceeding income limit → ✅ Rejection + possible blacklist
6. ❌ Claiming same benefit in multiple schemes → ✅ DBT system catches, recovery + penalty
7. ❌ Not mentioning family member already availed → ✅ Must declare

Timeline Mistakes:
8. ❌ Missing deadline → ✅ Academic scholarships especially strict
9. ❌ Missing renewal → ✅ Many schemes need yearly renewal
10. ❌ Waiting without status check → ✅ Regular check helps correct deficiencies

instruction: RTI reject aanaal enna seivathu?
output: First Appeal: Appellate Authority-kku 30 days-kkul (PIO-vin senior officer). Second Appeal: State/Central Information Commission-kku 90 days-kkul. No fee for appeals. Commission penalty podalam - Rs.250/day, max Rs.25,000.

instruction: Owner repair seyya marukkiraar - rent kattaamal irukkalaama?
output: Rent kattaamal irukka koodaadhu - idhu eviction-kku grounds aagividum. Instead: 1) Written notice kodunga, 2) Owner response illaattal repair seydhu receipt vaangunga, 3) Rent-la irundhu deduct seydhu balance kattunga, 4) Rent Authority-kku complaint kodunga.

instruction: Nayanmaargal yaar? Eththanai per?
output: Nayanmaargal - Saiva bhakthi iyakkathoda 63 punithargal. 'Nayanmaar' endraal 'thalaivar' endru porul. Ivargal Sivaperumaaanai vanangi, bhakthi maarggathai parappinaargal. Vevveru jaadhi, thozhil, pinnaniyilirundhu vandhavargal - arasar, vanigar, velaikkarar, pengal ellaarum undu. Sekkizhaar ezhuthiya 'Periya Puranam' ivargal varalatrai koorugiradu. Saiva samayathoda aadharam.

instruction: IBPS PO/Clerk Exam Pattern enna? Eppadi prepare seyvadhu?
output:
**IBPS PO/Clerk Pattern:**

**PO:**
- Prelims: English 30 + Quant 35 + Reasoning 35 = 100 (1 hour)
- Mains: 200 marks (3 hours) + Interview 100

**Clerk:**
- Prelims: Same 100 marks
- Mains: 200 marks (2 hrs 40 min)
- No Interview!

**Books:**
- Quant: RS Aggarwal
- Reasoning: RS Aggarwal, MK Pandey
- English: Wren & Martin
- Banking: Arihant

**6-Month Plan:**
- Month 1-2: Basics + Current affairs
- Month 3-4: Advanced + Speed
- Month 5-6: Mock tests daily

**Daily:** Quant 2hr + Reasoning 2hr + English 1hr + GK 1hr + Mock 1hr

instruction: Therukoothu endraal enna?
output: Therukoothu - Tamil Nadu-oda traditional street theatre. Iravu muzhuvathum nadakkum. Mahabharata, Ramayana kathaigal popular. Sirappugal: 1) Vanna makeup - face painting, 2) Elaborate costumes, 3) Live music - harmonium, thavil, 4) Dialog + song + dance, 5) Audience participation. Kanchipuram, Villupuram areas-la famous. UNESCO Intangible Cultural Heritage list-la consideration-kku. Village entertainment before TV/cinema vandhadhu!

instruction: College senior 'insider crypto tips' share pannaan - 'This coin 10x confirmed, invest now, I'll guide.' Trust pannalama?
