output: 'Insider tips' in crypto - usually pump and dump. Senior buy panniruppaan already, your buying increases price, senior sells, you hold worthless coins. Seniors um scammed aagiruppaan, chain continues. Own research pannunga, 'tips' avoid.

instruction: Animation/VFX படிப்பு career-க்கு நல்லதா?
output: Growing industry! Courses: 1) B.Sc Animation 2) Diploma (Arena, MAAC, Frameboxx) 3) Certificate courses. Duration: 6 months - 3 years. Skills: Maya, 3ds Max, After Effects, Photoshop. Jobs: Animation studios, Game companies, Ad agencies, Film industry (VFX). Chennai: Major hub for animation studios. Salary: ₹15,000-40,000 starting. Freelancing possible. Portfolio = key to jobs.

instruction: Hospital bill excessive-aa irukku - enna seyyalam?
output: Itemized bill kelunga - hospital thara venum. Rate list display kattaayam (Clinical Establishments Act). Overcharging complaint: 1) State Health Department, 2) District Collector, 3) Consumer forum. Insurance involved-aa irundhaal TPA-kkum complaint podunga.

instruction: Telegram group la job posting paathen '5 LPA remote job, interview tomorrow. Pay 2000 for technical assessment platform access.' Salary good, but assessment ku pay pannanum - legitimate aa?
output: Companies never charge for assessments! HackerRank, CodeSignal - all free for candidates. Scammers target tech job seekers with 'assessment fees'. Real tech companies invest in hiring, don't charge candidates. Report and leave such groups.

instruction: கோயில் darshan timings எப்படி தெரிந்துகொள்வது?
output: Darshan timings தெரிய: 1) Official temple websites - major temples maintain, 2) Dinamalar/Dinakaran temple section, 3) Temple phone numbers - call and ask, 4) Google Maps reviews - visitors update timings, 5) TN Tourism website. General pattern: Morning 6-12, Evening 4-8. Noon break (உச்சி சாந்தி) 12-4pm closed. Special darshan (VIP) tickets available in big temples - book online. Festivals-ல் extended hours. Arrive early for popular temples!

instruction: Aadhaar correction எப்படி செய்வது?
output: Online: myaadhaar.uidai.gov.in (demographic update). Offline: Aadhaar Enrolment Centre. Documents: Supporting proof for correction. Fee: Rs.50 (biometric update free). Time: 10-30 days. OTP verification required. Address update: Aadhaar app-லும் possible.

instruction: Patient-க்கு என்னென்ன rights இருக்கு?
output: Charter of Patient Rights (NMC): 1) Right to information (diagnosis, treatment options), 2) Right to records, 3) Right to emergency care, 4) Right to informed consent, 5) Right to confidentiality, 6) Right to second opinion, 7) Right to choose treatment/refuse treatment, 8) Right to non-discrimination, 9) Right to safe treatment, 10) Right to complaint redressal. Display: Hospitals must display patient rights.

instruction: Cyber stalking-க்கு என்ன law இருக்கு?
output: IPC 354D (stalking) - 3 years imprisonment (first offence), 5 years (repeat). IT Act 66D (cheating by personation). Evidence collect: Screenshots, call logs, messages. Platform block + police complaint. Women: Protection order under DV Act-உம் பெறலாம்.

instruction: SIM card KYC fail aagum-nu message vandhudhu, link click pannanum-nu irukku
output: Fake message ithu! Telecom company link anuppaadhu. SIM problem irundhaa direct service center poonga. Link click pannaa phone hack aagum.

instruction: 'Piranpazhi kooruvan thanpazhi' - idhu enna solludhu?
output: Kural: 'Piranpazhi kooruvan thanpazhi yullum thirantherindhu koorap padum'. Artham: Piraraip pazhippavan, than kuraigalai maRaikka mudiyaadhu. Avan kuraigalum aaraayappattu veliye varum. Others-a criticize panravan own flaws expose aagum. Gossip panraadheeargal - ungal secrets-um veliye varum!

instruction: Class 6-8 students-ku enna scholarship kidaikkum?
output:
**Middle School Scholarships (Class 6-8):**

**1. SC/ST Pre-Matric:**
- Day: ₹150/month, Hostel: ₹350/month
- Books: ₹750/year
- Income < ₹2.5 lakh

**2. BC/MBC Pre-Matric:**
- Day: ₹100/month, Hostel: ₹250/month

**3. Minorities Pre-Matric:**
- ₹100/month + ₹500/year
- Muslim, Christian, Sikh, Jain, Buddhist, Parsi

**4. NMMS (Class 8):**
- ₹12,000/year for Class 9-12
- Through exam

**5. INSPIRE MANAK:**
- ₹10,000 for science projects

**Apply:** scholarships.gov.in through school

instruction: Polytechnic Diploma என்ன? ITI-யிலிருந்து என்ன வித்தியாசம்?
output: வித்தியாசம்: ITI = Trade training (practical focused), Diploma = Technical education (theory + practical). Diploma: 3 years after 10th. Branches: Mechanical, Civil, Electrical, Electronics, Computer Science, Automobile. Job level: Supervisor/Junior Engineer. ITI: Technician/Operator level. Salary difference: Diploma holders ₹5,000-10,000 more starting. Higher studies: Diploma → B.E. lateral entry possible.

instruction: Single mother rights என்னென்ன? Documents-ல் father name வேணுமா?
output: Rights: 1) Birth certificate - mother name only acceptable, 2) School admission - father name not mandatory (Supreme Court), 3) Passport - mother as sole guardian okay, 4) Aadhar - single parent sufficient. Challenges: Some private institutions insist - quote Supreme Court judgment. Government schemes: Single mother pension available in TN. Child custody: Automatic to mother (unwed).

instruction: WhatsApp message 'Swiggy/Zomato premium partner program. Pay 10,000 for top listing and more orders.' Premium partner aanalaam aa?
output: Swiggy/Zomato partnerships through official partner app, not WhatsApp payments. Listing algorithms based on ratings, delivery time, not 'premium payments'. 10,000 to unknown person won't change your visibility. Contact official Swiggy/Zomato partner support for any programs.

instruction: IBPS Clerk vs IBPS PO - edhu apply panrathu better?
output: Comparison: Clerk - 12th pass eligible, ₹20,000-45,000 salary, clerical work. PO - Degree required, ₹40,000-80,000+ salary, managerial track. Difficulty: PO > Clerk. Career growth: PO faster promotions. Recommendation: Apply both! Same preparation works. Clerk = safe backup while aiming PO. Age: Clerk 20-28, PO 20-30. Competition: Both high, PO slightly more. Interview: PO has, Clerk doesn't (most banks).

instruction: 'RBI Special Bond - 15% guaranteed return, senior citizens ku special allocation' nu broker call pannaan. Government bond safe la, invest pannalama?
output: RBI bonds 15% return kudukkaadhu ayya - current rate 7-8%. 'Special allocation' lie. Fake brokers senior citizens target pannuvaanga - life savings thiruduvanga. RBI bonds through banks only available - not random callers. Ignore this call.

instruction: 10th padikkura students-ku enna scholarship irukku?
output:
**Class 9-10 Scholarships:**

**1. Pre-Matric (SC/ST):**
- Day: ₹150/month
- Hostel: ₹350/month
- Books: ₹750/year

**2. Pre-Matric (BC/MBC):**
- Day: ₹100/month
- Hostel: ₹250/month

**3. Minorities:**
- ₹100/month + ₹500/year

**4. NMMS:** ₹12,000/year (if qualified in Class 8)

**5. Private:**
- Tata Trust, Reliance Foundation, L&T
- Sitaram Jindal: ₹750/month

**Apply:** scholarships.gov.in
**Deadline:** September-October usually

instruction: Hit and run case-la compensation eppadi peruvathu?
output: FIR podunga (vehicle details theriyaaviitalum). Motor Accident Claims Tribunal (MACT)-la claim. Hit and run compensation: Death - Rs.2 lakh, Grievous injury - Rs.50,000 (Solatium Scheme). Driver identify aanaal full compensation + criminal case.

instruction: Phone vandhudhu, crying voice la 'Thatha, naan Ravi pesuren, accident aaiduchu, police station la irukken, 50,000 bail vendum, yaar kittayum sollaadha please' nu. En pera voice maadhiri irukku, enna pannanum?
output: Ayya, idhu 'grandparent scam' - voice imitate pannuvaanga or AI voice clone use pannuvaanga. 'Yaar kittayum sollaadha' nu solradhu red flag - verify panna vidaama irukkuraanga. Phone cut pannitu unga pera ORIGINAL number ku call pannunga. Real emergency na family ku theriyum.

instruction: Campus placement-ku eppadi prepare aavadhu?
output: Placement preparation: 1) Aptitude - RS Aggarwal, IndiaBix daily 2) Technical - Core subjects revision 3) Coding - HackerRank, LeetCode (for IT) 4) Resume - 1 page, achievement focused 5) Communication - Mock interviews practice 6) GD - Current affairs, articulation 7) HR questions - self-intro, strengths, goals. Timeline: Start 6 months before placement season. CGPA matters - maintain above 7 minimum. Internships boost resume significantly.

instruction: Ayushman Bharat வேற, CMCHIS வேறா?
output: TN has CMCHIS (state scheme) - Ayushman Bharat (central) இல்ல. CMCHIS advantages: 1) Higher coverage (Rs.5 lakh vs Rs.5 lakh), 2) More procedures covered, 3) State-specific hospitals, 4) Better implementation. Other states: Ayushman Bharat applicable. TN residents: Use CMCHIS only. Traveling outside TN: Limited coverage - check empanelled hospitals.

instruction: Therkku maavatta maanavarkalukku special scholarship ethavathu irukka?
output: Aama. BC/MBC scholarship, first graduate scholarship, merit scholarship ellam apply pannalam. Tirunelveli, Thoothukudi, Kanyakumari district students-kku special priority irukku some schemes la.

instruction: Anganwadi-ல் children-க்கு என்ன services?
output: ICDS (Integrated Child Development Services): 1) Supplementary nutrition (hot meal/take home), 2) Growth monitoring (weight/height), 3) Immunization support, 4) Health referral, 5) Pre-school education (3-6 years), 6) Nutrition education for mothers. Beneficiaries: Children 0-6 years, pregnant/lactating women. Free: All services. Location: Every village/urban ward has Anganwadi centre.

instruction: FedEx call vandhuchi - 'Unga name la drugs parcel Mumbai customs la seized, CBI case file aagum' nu. Video call la uniform la oru aalu, 2 lakh pay pannina case close nu solraan. Bayam aa irukku da, genuine aa?
output: Fake da! 'Digital arrest' nu solluvaanga - police video call la case nadathaadhu, money kekaadhu. Uniform costume da. Egmore, Adyar la professionals kuda maatinanga ipdi. Don't pay. Cut pannu, Cyber Crime Shastri Nagar office ku complaint kudu.

instruction: Bro, Telegram task job la first 500 vandhudhu. Now 5K invest pannanum advanced tasks ku nu. Worth aa da?
output: STOP da! Initial payment bait - 5K pottaa '10K more for withdrawal' nu solluvaanga. Classic scam, students mass aa maatikuraanga. Whatever you paid - consider lost, don't pay more.

instruction: Veetla repair velai yaar poruppu?
output: Major repairs (roof leak, plumbing main line, electrical wiring, structural issues) - Owner responsibility. Minor repairs (tap washer, bulb, fuse) - Tenant responsibility. Agreement-la clearly mention irukkanum. Owner refuse pannina rent-la irundhu deduct seyyalam (with notice).

instruction: WhatsApp la oru link vanthuchu - click panna prize kidaikkum-nu soldraanga
output: Prize scam ithu. Link click pannaadheenga! Unga phone la virus varum illa details thiruduvanga. Delete pannidhunga message-a.

instruction: Paralysis/stroke rehabilitation Ayurveda-ல்?
output: Ayurveda rehabilitation: Complements physiotherapy well. Treatments: 1) Abhyanga with specific oils, 2) Pinda Sweda (Navarakizhi), 3) Basti (medicated enema - key treatment), 4) Nasya, 5) Internal medicines. Best time: Post-acute phase (after stabilization). Duration: 21-90 days intensive. Outcomes: Improved mobility, speech, daily activities. Combination: Ayurveda + Physiotherapy + Yoga gives best results. Where: Specialized centers in Kerala, some TN facilities.

instruction: Owner திடீர்னு current cut பண்ணிட்டார், legal-ஆ?
output: Illegal! Owner basic amenities (water, electricity) cut பண்ண கூடாது - self-help eviction illegal. Actions: 1) Police complaint (criminal intimidation), 2) Rent Authority complaint, 3) Civil court injunction. Owner penalty: Fine + imprisonment possible. Tenant rights: Continue staying + demand restoration. Document everything - photos, videos.

instruction: RTI reject ஆனால் என்ன செய்வது?
output: First Appeal: Appellate Authority-க்கு 30 days-க்குள் (PIO-வின் senior officer). Second Appeal: State/Central Information Commission-க்கு 90 days-க்குள். No fee for appeals. Commission penalty போடலாம் - Rs.250/day, max Rs.25,000.

instruction: 10th public exam-ku eppadi prepare aavadhu? Topper tips enna?
output: Topper strategies: 1) Textbook muzhmaiyaaga padiyunga - 80% questions textbook-lirundhu 2) Previous 5 years question papers practice 3) Blue print padi chapter-wise weightage kavaniyunga 4) Maths & Science: daily problem solving 5) Tamil/English: grammar + essay practice 6) Social: Map pointing + dates memorize. Time: Daily 6-8 hours. Last month: Revision only. TN Government question bank: www.dge.tn.gov.in

instruction: Mock test எத்தனை முறை எழுதணும்? எப்படி analyze பண்றது?
output: Mock test frequency: Last 2 months - weekly 2-3. Last month - daily. Analysis steps: 1) Check answers immediately 2) Category-wise error (silly mistake, concept gap, time issue) 3) Track weak areas 4) Revise mistakes same day 5) Redo wrong questions after 3 days 6) Score tracking graph maintain 7) Time per question analysis 8) Attempt strategy review. Sources: Official previous papers, coaching test series, free online (Testbook, Gradeup). Quality > quantity of mocks.

instruction: Call vandhudhu 'NCTE registration update mandatory for all teachers. Pay 3000 processing fee through this link.' School la principal pressure podraanga, genuine aa?
output: NCTE registration done through colleges and official NCTE portal, not individual payments. Inform your principal this is a scam. NCTE fees go through institutional channels, not individual teacher payments. Check ncte.gov.in for genuine requirements.

instruction: Rich aaga aasai - aanaal shortcut vendaam. Enna vazhi?
output: 'Arulodum anbodum vaaraap porulaakkam pullaar purala vidal'. Arul, anbu illaamal sambaadhikkum panathai vittuvidunagl. Melum: 'Theeyavai seidhar kedudhal' - wrong ways-la earn panninal kettuppoveergal. Hard work + smart work + integrity = sustainable wealth. Shortcuts lead to downfall!

instruction: Kalaignar Magalir Urimai Thittam enna?
output: Monthly ₹1,000 for woman head of family. Eligibility: Family head should be woman, Family income below ₹2.5 lakhs, Should not receive any other pension. Apply: Anganwadi center / Village Administrative Officer. Documents: Aadhaar, Ration card, Bank account

instruction: Police vehicle seize பண்ணினால் எப்படி release பெறுவது?
output: Steps: 1) Challan pay, 2) Required documents produce (license, RC, insurance), 3) Release order பெறுங்க, 4) Vehicle collect. Court custody-ல் இருந்தால் Court order வேண்டும். Seizure fee applicable. 24 hours-க்குள் Magistrate inform ஆகணும்.

instruction: Documents sambanthamana common thavarugal enna?
output:
Birth Certificate:
❌ Cannot register after 21 days
✅ Can register, but needs late fee + Affidavit

Marriage Certificate:
❌ Cannot prove married status without it
✅ Can prove via wedding photos, invitation, witnesses

Driving License:
❌ Can take DL test immediately after LLR
✅ Must wait 30 days

Voter ID:
❌ Automatic when turning 18
✅ Must apply (Form 6)

Passport:
❌ Police Verification fail = Rejection
✅ Re-verification chance and appeal process available

EC (Encumbrance Certificate):
❌ EC clear = property is clean
✅ EC only from 1987 onwards, manual check needed for earlier records

instruction: Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojana (PMKVY) endraal enna?
output: Free Skill Training. Duration: 150-300 hours. Courses: IT, Healthcare, Construction, Retail, etc. Benefits: Free Training, Certificate (Industry recognized), Placement assistance, Up to ₹8,000 reward (if assessment passed). Join: pmkvyofficial.org → Find Training Center, Nearby PMKVY Training Center, Need Aadhaar, Photo. RPL: Certificate for those with existing skills, ₹500 assessment fee (refundable)

instruction: நான் கிராமத்தில் உள்ள அரசு பள்ளியில் படிக்கிறேன். BC மாணவன். என்னென்ன benefits கிடைக்கும்?
output:
**BC மாணவர்களுக்கான அரசு நலத்திட்டங்கள்:**

**பள்ளியில் (School Level):**

1. **இலவச கல்வி**
   - Tuition fee இல்லை
   - Government/Aided schools

2. **இலவச பாடப்புத்தகங்கள்**
   - எல்லா subjects
   - School-லேயே கொடுப்பார்கள்

3. **இலவச சீருடை**
   - 2 sets per year
   - School-ல் distribution

4. **Mid-Day Meal**
   - காலை உணவு + மதிய உணவு
   - Weekly: Egg, Milk, Banana

5. **இலவச Bus Pass**
   - School ID காட்டி Bus Depot-ல்

6. **Scholarship (BC)**
   - Pre-Matric: ₹150-500/month
   - எங்கே Apply: School through, tneservices.tn.gov.in

**Higher Secondary (11th-12th):**

7. **இலவச Laptop**
   - Government School students
   - 11th-ல் கொடுப்பார்கள்

8. **BC Scholarship**
   - Tuition fee + ₹500/month stipend
   - Income limit: ₹2 lakh/year

**College Level:**

9. **முதலமைச்சர் உயர்கல்வி உறுதி திட்டம்**
   - First Generation Graduate
   - Free education + Laptop + ₹1,000/month

10. **BC Post-Matric Scholarship**
    - Full fee waiver
    - Hostel fee
    - ₹500-1,500/month stipend

**Apply செய்ய:**
- School/College scholarship committee
- tneservices.tn.gov.in
- scholarships.gov.in (Central)

**Documents:**
- Community Certificate
- Income Certificate
- Aadhaar
- Previous year marksheet
- Bank account

instruction: Free legal aid eppadi peruvathu?
output: Eligible: Women, children, SC/ST, disabled, victims of trafficking, industrial workers, custody persons, income < Rs.3 lakh/year. Apply: District Legal Services Authority (DLSA), Taluk Legal Services Committee. Court-lum request pannalam. Toll-free: 15100.

instruction: Marriage registration kattaayamaa? Enge panrathu?
output: Tamil Nadu-la Compulsory Registration of Marriages Act 2009-in keezh kattaayam. Register: 1) Hindu Marriage Act - Registrar of Marriages (Sub-Registrar office), 2) Special Marriage Act - Marriage Registrar. Online apply: serviceonline.gov.in. Documents: Age proof, address proof, photos, invitation card, witnesses.

instruction: ஆதார் தொலைந்துவிட்டது - என்ன செய்வது?
output: Download e-Aadhaar from eaadhaar.uidai.gov.in using Aadhaar number or Enrollment ID + OTP. It's FREE and legally valid. For PVC card, order at uidai.gov.in for ₹50. If forgot Aadhaar number, retrieve at myaadhaar.uidai.gov.in → Retrieve Lost UID.

instruction: Rural students-ku enna special schemes irukku?
output:
**Rural Student Benefits:**

**1. PMSSS:** Full fee + maintenance for meritorious

**2. Eklavya Schools:** Free residential (tribal) - emrs.tribal.gov.in

**3. KGBV:** Rural girls Class 6-12 residential

**4. Free Hostels:** BC/MBC/SC/ST hostels in all districts

**5. Transport Allowance:** ₹500-1,000/month

**6. Special Coaching:**
- TNSF rural NEET
- Block-level centers

**7. Agri Education:** Special quota in TNAU

**8. Distance Education:** IGNOU/TNOU in rural areas

**How to Get:**
- Rural certificate from VAO
- Apply through school
- Contact BEO

instruction: 'Thoonguka thoongich seyarpala' - patience patriya kural enna?
output: Kural: 'Thoonguka thoongich seyarpala thoongarka thoongaadhu seyyum vinai'. Artham: Kaaththirukka vendiya kaariyangalukku kaaththirukka vendum. Udane seiya vendiyathai thaamadhikkak koodaadhu. Right timing-a understand panradhu success-kku key. Some things need patience, some need immediate action!

instruction: Home remedies எப்போது avoid பண்ணணும்?
output: Avoid home remedies when: 1) Serious symptoms (high fever, breathing difficulty, chest pain), 2) Symptoms lasting >2-3 days, 3) Children under 2 (many remedies not safe), 4) Pregnancy (many herbs contraindicated), 5) Taking prescription medicines (interactions), 6) Known allergies to ingredients, 7) Wounds with signs of infection (pus, spreading redness), 8) Chronic disease flare-up. Rule: Home remedies for minor, acute issues. Anything serious = doctor.

instruction: Kabasura Kudineer - COVID-kku effective-aa?
output: Government approved: For COVID prevention and mild symptoms. Ingredients: 15 herbs including Kabasuram, Adathodai, Chukku, etc. Benefits: Respiratory immunity, cough, cold. Preparation: Same as Nilavembu - boil powder, strain. Dosage: 60ml twice daily. Research: CCRS conducted clinical trials. Note: 1) Not substitute for COVID vaccine, 2) Severe COVID = hospital treatment, 3) Prevention + mild symptoms only. Available: Government free distribution, pharmacies.

instruction: Warranty period mudinja piragum complaint seyyalaamaa?
output: Manufacturing defect-kku warranty period mudindhaalum complaint seyyalam. Product reasonable lifespan-kkul fail aanaal complaint valid. Example: TV 6 months-la blast aanaal, warranty 3 months mudindhirundhalum case podalam.

instruction: Bail எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: Bailable offence: Police station-லேயே bail கிடைக்கும் (matter of right). Non-bailable: Court-ல் application போடணும். Documents: ID proof, address proof, surety documents. Bail bond + surety sign வேண்டும். Lawyer through apply பண்றது better.

instruction: ESI card benefits என்னென்ன?
output: Benefits: 1) Free medical care (ESI hospitals/dispensaries), 2) Sickness benefit (70% wages), 3) Maternity benefit (100% wages - 26 weeks), 4) Disability benefit, 5) Dependent benefit (death case), 6) Funeral expenses. Salary Rs.21,000/month வரை ESI applicable.

instruction: NEET/JEE coaching-க்கு லட்சக்கணக்கில் செலவாகும், எங்களால் afford பண்ண முடியாது. Chance இல்லையா?
output: Hope உள்ளது! Free/Low-cost options: 1) Government free NEET/JEE coaching centres 2) School-based free coaching (apply through HM) 3) YouTube: Physics Wallah complete course free 4) NPTEL, SWAYAM free courses 5) Scholarship-based coaching: FIITJEE, Allen poor student schemes 6) Library resources - reference books available. Success stories: Many toppers from poor families using free resources. Key: Self-discipline and hard work. Money doesn't guarantee success.

instruction: Hospital medical records தர மறுக்குது - என்ன செய்வது?
output: Patient's right - cannot refuse. Actions: 1) Written demand with delivery acknowledgment, 2) RTI (if government hospital), 3) Consumer Forum application for production of records, 4) Police complaint (if suspicious tampering), 5) Court application for preservation order. Tampering: Serious offence - evidence destruction. Hospital must provide within 72 hours of written request.

instruction: Consumer complaint எங்கே கொடுக்கலாம்?
output: Claim amount based: 1) Rs.1 crore வரை - District Consumer Forum, 2) Rs.1-10 crore - State Commission, 3) Rs.10 crore மேல் - National Commission. Online: consumerhelpline.gov.in அல்லது NCH app மூலம். Toll-free: 1800-11-4000.

instruction: Mediation vs Arbitration என்ன difference?
output: Mediation: Neutral person facilitates, parties decide, non-binding. Arbitration: Arbitrator decides, binding like court order, faster. Pre-litigation mediation: Compulsory for some cases. Arbitration agreement: Contract-ல் clause இருக்கணும். Both: Court-ஐ விட faster, cheaper.

instruction: Delivery government hospital-ல் free-யா?
output: Yes! Completely free. Includes: 1) Normal delivery, 2) C-section if needed, 3) Anesthesia, 4) Medicines, 5) Post-delivery care, 6) Baby care. Additional: 1) 102 ambulance free transport, 2) JSY cash incentive for institutional delivery, 3) Dr. Muthulakshmi scheme Rs.18,000. Private: CMCHIS covers complicated deliveries. Register: PHC for referral chain.

instruction: Online fraud-க்கு complaint எங்கே போடுவது?
output: 1) Cyber Crime portal: cybercrime.gov.in (national), 2) Local Cyber Crime police station, 3) 1930 helpline (financial fraud), 4) Bank-க்கு immediately inform. Screenshots, transaction details, communication records - எல்லாம் save பண்ணுங்க. 24 hours-க்குள் report பண்ணினால் money recover chance அதிகம்.

instruction: Traffic police wrongly fine pottaal enna seivathu?
output: Options: 1) On-spot - evidence kaatti argue (dashcam, photos), 2) Court-la contest (challan dispute), 3) Online grievance: tnpolice.gov.in, 4) RTO officer complaint. Challan copy kelunga. Court contest-kku time limit undu.

instruction: Bank loan EMI கட்ட முடியல, என்ன ஆகும்?
output: EMI default ஆனால்: 1) 90 days delay = NPA (Non-Performing Asset), 2) Bank notice அனுப்பும், 3) Recovery agent வரலாம் - ஆனால் அவங்க threaten பண்ண கூடாது, 4) Restructure/one-time settlement கேளுங்க, 5) Home loan: SARFAESI Act-ன் கீழ் property auction ஆகலாம். RBI guidelines: Recovery agent harassment-க்கு complaint போடலாம்.

instruction: Surrogacy legal-aa? Rules enna?
output: Surrogacy Act 2021 rules: 1) Only altruistic surrogacy (no payment beyond expenses), 2) Commercial surrogacy banned, 3) Surrogate: Married woman, own child, related to couple, 4) Couple: Indian, married 5 years, medical need, 5) Single women/men: Not allowed. Registration: Surrogacy clinics must register. Certificate: National/State Surrogacy Board certification needed. International: Surrogacy for foreigners banned.

instruction: Moottu vali aaru maasama irukku, scan edukkanumaa? (Senior citizen)
output: 6 months joint pain - orthopedic consultation needed. Tests: 1) X-ray first (usually sufficient), 2) MRI if X-ray normal but pain persists, 3) Blood tests (RA, uric acid). Government: Orthopedic OPD - free consultation and basic tests. Common causes: Osteoarthritis (wear and tear), rheumatoid arthritis. Treatment: 1) Medicines, 2) Physiotherapy (free at government), 3) Joint replacement if severe (CMCHIS covers). Self-care: Weight control, walking, avoid squatting.

instruction: Birth certificate eppadi peruvadhu?
output: Birth certificate pera: 1. Nearby municipality/panchayat office ponga 2. Form No. 1 fill pannunga 3. Documents: Hospital record, parents ID proof 4. Fee: 21 days-ku free, adha pinna ₹50 late fee 5. Online: tnreginet.gov.in la apply pannalam

instruction: Sports-ல் interest இருக்கு, படிப்பும் sports-ம் combine பண்ண முடியுமா?
output: Absolutely yes! Benefits: 1) Sports quota admission in colleges 2) Government jobs-ல் extra marks 3) Scholarships for sportspersons 4) Health and discipline. How: 1) Join school sports team 2) District sports coaching centres - free 3) SAI (Sports Authority of India) training 4) Balance: Morning sports, evening study. Careers: Sports quota → College → Job OR Professional sports. Many IAS officers, doctors are sportspersons. Time management key.

instruction: Bank service complaint eppadi seivathu?
output: Steps: 1) Bank branch-la written complaint, 2) 30 days response illaattal Banking Ombudsman-kku complaint (rbi.org.in), 3) Still no resolution - Consumer forum. Online banking fraud-kku Cyber Crime portal-lum report pannunga.

instruction: 'Vanja manaththaan paditrrozhukam' - nadippu patriya kural enna?
output: Kural: 'Vanja manaththaan paditrrozhukam bhoothangal aindhum agaththe nagum'. Artham: Vanjaka manam kondavan nallavan pol nadikkum bodhu, aimbhoothangalum (nilam, neer, neruppu, kaatru, aakaayam) ullukul sirikkum. Fake people-a universe kooda keli panradhu! Authenticity-yoda mukkiyaththuvam.

instruction: Subletting seyyalaamaa? Roommate serkkalaama?
output: Owner permission illaamal subletting seyyakoodaadhu - idhu eviction-kku valid ground. Roommate seipathu owner consent-udan irukka venum. Agreement-la specifically allowed na mathume okay.

instruction: உண்மையா பொய்யா: Myth: SC/ST reservation = undeserving students getting seats
output: உண்மை: Fact: Reservation = Equalizing historical disadvantage. SC/ST students also clear cutoffs, just in their category. Many top performers are from reserved categories. Reservation doesn't mean zero merit - minimum marks required. Social mobility happening due to reservation - breaking caste barriers in education. Focus on your preparation, not others' category.

instruction: NEET-ku prepare aaga enna pannanum-pa? Free coaching irukkuma?
output: NCERT Biology, Physics, Chemistry - line by line read pannu/pannunga. Free coaching: Government centres-la apply pannu through school. Online free: YouTube (Physics Wallah), SWAYAM. 7.5% reservation govt school students-ku. Daily 6-8 hours padikka venum. Previous year papers practice important.

instruction: Duplicate RC eppadi peruvathu?
output: Steps: 1) FIR (if lost/stolen), 2) Form 26 fill, 3) Affidavit, 4) Newspaper advertisement, 5) RTO application + fee. Documents: ID proof, address proof, insurance, PUC. Time: 15-30 days. Fee: Rs.300-500 + penalties if applicable.

instruction: Agriculture education padikka enna vazhi?
output: TNAU (Tamil Nadu Agricultural University) Coimbatore-la BSc Agriculture, Horticulture, Forestry courses irukku. 12th Biology group padichirundha TNAU counselling moolam seralam. Government job opportunities niraiya.

instruction: Court fee evvalavu kattanum?
output: TN Court Fees Act based: Property suits - value based (1-10%), Money suits - amount based, Injunction - fixed fee. Consumer forum: Free up to Rs.5 lakh. Lok Adalat: No fee. Poor litigants: Court fee exemption available. e-payment: ecourts.gov.in.

instruction: TNPSC Pothu Tamil எப்படி படிப்பது?
output: Pothu Tamil sections: 1) Ilakkanam (Grammar) - Ezhuthiyial, Solliyal, Porulathigaram 2) Ilakkiyam - Sangam to Modern literature 3) Tamil culture and heritage. Books: 6th-12th Tamil textbooks, TNPSC previous papers. High scoring: Grammar rules, author-work matching, literary periods. Daily practice: 50 questions. Ilakkanam: Vinaigal, Pechu vazhakku, Ezhuthuvazhi rules. Tamil literature: Thirukkural mandatory (1330 kurals meanings).

instruction: College-la stress athigamaa irukku. Handle panrathu eppadi?
output: Stress management: 1) Sleep 7-8 hours - non-negotiable 2) Exercise 30 min daily - even walking helps 3) Healthy food - avoid junk during stress 4) Break big tasks into small 5) Talk to friends, family 6) College counsellor - free service 7) Hobbies continue - music, sports, art 8) Social media break 9) Deep breathing when overwhelmed 10) Professional help if severe - no shame. Remember: Grades ≠ Self-worth. You matter more than marks.

instruction: Pharmacy prescription இல்லாம antibiotic கொடுக்கலாமா?
output: NO! Most antibiotics = Schedule H - prescription mandatory. Reason: Antibiotic resistance is serious health threat. Pharmacy violation: Drug Inspector complaint, license action. Exception: Some topical antibiotics (creams) may be OTC. Good practice: Complete prescribed course, don't share antibiotics, don't use leftover. Doctor: Can prescribe over phone in genuine emergency.

instruction: Community Certificate எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: Apply at tneservices.tn.gov.in or Taluk Office. Documents: Parent's community certificate, school TC, Aadhaar, address proof. VAO verification, RI check, Tahsildar approval. Time: 15-30 days. Fee: ₹25-50. Essential for reservation benefits.

instruction: Mutual consent divorce எவ்வளவு time ஆகும்?
output: Minimum 6 months, maximum 18 months. Process: 1) Joint petition file, 2) 6 months cooling-off period, 3) Second motion, 4) Decree. 2023 Supreme Court ruling: Genuine cases-ல் 6 months waive ஆகலாம். Contested divorce: 2-5 years.

instruction: Lok Adalat-ல் என்ன cases settle ஆகும்?
output: Cases: Motor accident claims, labour disputes, matrimonial (except divorce), electricity bills, telephone bills, cheque bounce, bank loan recovery, compoundable criminal offences. Benefits: No court fee, no appeal, quick settlement. Permanent Lok Adalat: Public utility services.

instruction: Lock-out period-la rent kattanumaa?
output: Lock-in period (not lock-out): Agreement-la specify pannirukkum. During lock-in: 1) Tenant vacate panninal - remaining months rent pay pannanum, 2) Owner evict panna mudiyaadhu. After lock-in: Normal notice period applies (usually 1-2 months). Negotiate: Lock-in waiver possible with mutual consent. Always read agreement before signing!

instruction: Scholarship endha websites-la theduvadhu?
output: Important websites: 1) scholarships.gov.in (NSP) - Government schemes 2) buddy4study.com - All scholarships aggregator 3) vidyalakshmi.co.in - Education loans + scholarships 4) respective state welfare department sites 5) University websites. Apps: Buddy4Study app, ScholarPlus. Set Google alerts for 'scholarship Tamil Nadu [year]'. Follow scholarship pages on social media.

instruction: En medical information yaarukkum share panna koodaadhu - right irukkaa?
output: Yes! Doctor-patient confidentiality. Protected info: 1) Diagnosis, 2) Test results, 3) Treatment details, 4) HIV status, 5) Mental health records, 6) Reproductive health. Exceptions: 1) Patient consent, 2) Court order, 3) Public health (notifiable diseases), 4) Harm to others. Breach: Medical Council complaint + civil damages. Employer: Cannot demand medical records without consent.

instruction: Pattinaththaar yaar? Avar kadhai enna?
output: Pattinaththaar Kaaveripoompattinathil periya vanighar. Migavum selvandar. Oru naal avar magan oru packet thandhaar - ulle paarthal oosiyum noolum. 'Idhuvum unakku vendaam' endru solli sendruVittaar magan. Idhai unarntha Pattinaththaar ella selvaththaiyum vittu thuravi aanaar. 'Enna punniyam seidhanai nenjamae' endra paadal famous.

instruction: Aadhaar pattriya thavraana nambikkaigal enna?
output:
Wrong Beliefs vs Truth:

1. ❌ Aadhaar is citizenship proof → ✅ Only identity proof, not citizenship
2. ❌ Mobile change online possible → ✅ Must visit Aadhaar Seva Kendra
3. ❌ School can deny admission without Aadhaar → ✅ RTE Act prohibits this
4. ❌ Hospital can deny treatment without Aadhaar → ✅ Cannot deny emergency treatment
5. ❌ Sharing Aadhaar number = money loss → ✅ Need Aadhaar + OTP both
6. ❌ DOB can be changed multiple times → ✅ Only once allowed
7. ❌ e-Aadhaar is not valid → ✅ e-Aadhaar = Physical (legally same)
8. ❌ Enrollment center charges fee → ✅ New enrollment is free

instruction: Body hospital-ல் detain பண்றாங்க bill கட்டும் வரை - legal-ஆ?
output: ILLEGAL! Dead body detention prohibited. Supreme Court + High Court orders: 1) Body cannot be held for bill payment, 2) Hospital can pursue legal recovery of dues, 3) Detention = criminal offence. Action: 1) Police complaint, 2) Magistrate petition, 3) Human Rights Commission. Bill dispute: Settle later through legal means - body must be released. Report: DHS, State Medical Council.

instruction: Hair fall/hair problems-kku Ayurveda?
output: Effective treatments: 1) Shirodhara, 2) Shiro Abhyanga (head massage), 3) Nasya (nasal drops), 4) Internal medicines - Bhringraj, Brahmi, 5) Specialized hair oils - Neelibringadi. Conditions: Hair fall, premature greying, dandruff, baldness (early stages). Duration: 3-6 months for visible results. Diet: Important - protein, iron rich. Underlying causes: Stress, hormones, nutrition - all addressed. Products: Branded Ayurvedic hair oils available widely.

instruction: ஆக்சிடென்ட் ஆயிடுச்சு, insurance company சரியா settle பண்ணல
output: Steps: 1) Written complaint insurance company-க்கு, 2) IRDAI grievance portal (igms.irda.gov.in), 3) Insurance Ombudsman (free, Rs.30 lakh வரை), 4) Consumer forum. Documents ready-ஆ வச்சுக்கோங்க - FIR, medical bills, repair estimate, photos.

instruction: 10th முடித்த பிறகு என்னென்ன courses இருக்கு?
output:
**10th-க்குப் பிறகு Pathways:**

**1. Plus Two (+2) / Higher Secondary:**
- Duration: 2 years
- Streams: Science, Commerce, Arts, Vocational
- Board: TN State Board / CBSE

**2. Diploma (Polytechnic):**
- Duration: 3 years
- Branches: Civil, Mechanical, ECE, EEE, Computer, etc.
- Lateral entry to Engineering 2nd year possible
- Apply: tnpolytechnic.org

**3. ITI (Industrial Training Institute):**
- Duration: 6 months - 2 years
- Trades: Electrician, Fitter, Welder, Mechanic, COPA
- Direct employment opportunity
- Apply: itidata.tn.gov.in

**4. Paramedical Courses:**
- ANM (Auxiliary Nurse Midwife)
- Lab Technician
- X-Ray Technician
- Duration: 1-2 years

**5. Skill Development Courses:**
- NSDC certified courses
- Free under PMKVY
- Duration: 3-6 months
- Job placement support

**6. Open Schooling (NIOS):**
- For those who can't attend regular school
- Same validity as regular +2
- nios.ac.in

**Comparison Table:**

| Course | Duration | Entry | Job/Higher Studies |
|--------|----------|-------|-------------------|
| +2 | 2 years | 10th pass | UG admission |
| Diploma | 3 years | 10th pass | Job / Lateral entry |
| ITI | 6m-2y | 8th/10th | Direct job |
| Paramedical | 1-2 years | 10th pass | Healthcare jobs |

**எந்த option best?**
- Higher studies interest: +2
- Quick job: ITI
- Technical job: Diploma

instruction: Sandwich pattern diploma என்ன? Regular-இலிருந்து என்ன வித்தியாசம்?
output: Sandwich Diploma: Theory + Industrial training combined. Pattern: 1st year theory → 2nd year industry (6 months paid training) → 3rd year theory. Benefits: 1) Real work experience 2) Stipend during training ₹5,000-8,000/month 3) Job placement better 4) Industry connections. Offered at: NTTF, Central Polytechnics, select government colleges. Duration: Same 3 years. Highly recommended for practical learning.

instruction: Employer PF கட்டல - என்ன செய்யலாம்?
output: Complaint options: 1) EPFO portal: EPFiGMS (online grievance), 2) Regional PF Commissioner office, 3) Labour Commissioner. Employer liability: PF amount + 12% interest + damages (up to 100%). Criminal prosecution-உம் possible. Salary slip-ல் PF deduction check பண்ணுங்க.

instruction: College/University degree certificate thara delay panraanga
output: Steps: 1) Controller of Examinations complaint, 2) University Grievance Cell, 3) UGC Grievance portal, 4) RTI (status enquiry), 5) Court writ petition (if excessive delay). Provisional certificate-udan job apply pannalam. Employer-kku explain pannunga.

instruction: Revenge porn/intimate images share பண்ணினால் என்ன punishment?
output: IT Act 66E: 3 years imprisonment + Rs.2 lakh fine. 67/67A: 5-7 years imprisonment. IPC 354C (voyeurism). Women: Section 499/500 defamation. Platform takedown: CERT-In report. Victim support: NCW helpline 7827-170-170. Don't blame victim - legal protection உண்டு.

instruction: PCOS/PCOD treatment எங்கே கிடைக்கும்?
output: Available at: 1) Government hospital gynecology OPD - free, 2) Medical college hospitals - specialized care. Treatment: 1) Lifestyle modification (diet, exercise), 2) Medicines for hormonal balance, 3) Metformin if diabetic tendency, 4) Fertility treatment if trying to conceive. Tests: Ultrasound, hormonal tests - available free at government. Long-term: Regular monitoring needed.

instruction: Mamallapuram monuments patri sollungal?
output: Mamallapuram (Mahabalipuram) - UNESCO World Heritage Site (1984). Pallavar kaalathil (7th century) kattappattathu. Mukkiya monuments: 1) Kadarkarai Kovil (Shore Temple) - sea-facing, 2) Aindhu Rathangal (Pancha Rathas) - single rock-la sedhukkappattathu, 3) Arjunan Tapasu / Gangai Irangudhall - world's largest bas-relief (96 feet x 43 feet), 4) Krishna Butter Cave, Mahishasuramardhini mandapa. Chennai-lirundhu 60 km. Beach + heritage combo destination.

instruction: CA (Chartered Accountant) padippu eppadi aarambippathu?
output: ICAI nadathum padippu. Levels: 1) Foundation (after 10th or +2) 2) Intermediate 3) Final. 3 year Articleship compulsory. Total duration: 4-5 years. Fee: Foundation ₹11,000, Inter ₹27,000, Final ₹32,000. Chennai-la ICAI coaching centers irukku. Work while studying possible.

instruction: Madurai-la MBBS padikka government college-la seat kidaikkuma?
output: Madurai Medical College-la 7.5% government school quota, OBC/BC/MBC reservation irukku. NEET-la 550+ vaangina government seat kedaikka chance irukku. Theni Medical College-layum try pannalam.

instruction: NEET-la seat kidaikkal, drop year edukkalaama? Waste aagumaa?
output: Drop year = Strategic decision, not waste. When good idea: 1) Close to cutoff - improvement chances high 2) Strong determination 3) Clear preparation plan. When risky: 1) First attempt poor score by big margin 2) No structured plan 3) Family pressure only. Statistics: Many successful doctors took 2-3 attempts. Alternative: Join backup course (B.Sc) + prepare NEET simultaneously. Drop year plan: Join test series, daily 8-10 hours, monthly assessment. One year invested wisely = lifetime career.

instruction: Retrenchment compensation evvalavu kidaikkum?
output: Formula: 15 days average pay × years of service. Applicable: 100+ employees company, 1 year+ service. Notice: 3 months advance or 3 months pay. LIFO principle (Last In First Out) follow aaganum. Re-employment preference undu.

instruction: CM Helpline-la complaint eppadi koduppadhu?
output: Tamil Nadu CM Helpline: 1100. Online: cmcell.tn.gov.in. Complaint categories: Corruption, service delay, government scheme issues. Tracking: SMS/Online. Escalation: Collector → Department Secretary → CM Cell. Response time: 15-30 days.

instruction: Agricultural land-ஐ non-agricultural use-க்கு convert பண்ணலாமா?
output: Land Use Conversion permission வேண்டும். Apply: District Collector/DTCP. Natham land-ஆக convert செய்தால் construction பண்ணலாம். Wet land (nanjai) conversion கடினம். Conversion fee + stamp duty difference கட்டணும். Illegal conversion-க்கு penalty + demolition.

instruction: School dropout-aagi vitten, padippai continue seiya enna vazhi?
output: Options: 1) NIOS (National Institute of Open Schooling) - 10th/12th complete 2) TN State Open School - Tamil medium available 3) Private appearance through Distance Education 4) Skill training + later education. NIOS: www.nios.ac.in, exams twice a year, study at own pace. Age no bar. After 10th/12th: Regular college admission possible. Many successful people are NIOS students.

instruction: Crop Insurance (PMFBY) eppadi peruvadhu?
output: Apply before sowing at pmfby.gov.in, bank, or CSC. Premium: Kharif 2%, Rabi 1.5%, Commercial 5% - rest paid by govt. KCC holders auto-enrolled. Documents: Land records, Aadhaar, bank account. Report crop loss within 72 hours for claim. Helpline: 14447.

instruction: En paiyan engineering vendaamnu solran - enna panrathu?
output: Paiyanoda interest ennannu purinjukonga. Arts, Commerce, Vocational, Creative fields-layum nalla career opportunities irukku. Aptitude test edunga. Career counsellor-kitta pesunga. Force pannaadheenga.

instruction: Counseling/therapy எங்கே கிடைக்கும்? Cost என்ன?
output: Options: 1) Government hospitals - free (limited slots), 2) NGOs - free/subsidized (iCall, Snehi, etc.), 3) Private practitioners - Rs.500-3000/session, 4) Online platforms - Rs.300-1500/session (Practo, Amaha, YourDOST). Types: Clinical psychologist, counselor, psychiatrist (for medicines). Verify: RCI registration for psychologists. Tip: Many offer sliding scale fees based on income.

instruction: உண்மையா பொய்யா: Myth: 30 வயசு கடந்தால் படிக்க late
output: உண்மை: Fact: Learning has no age limit! Distance education: IGNOU, TNOU - no age bar. Success stories: People completing degrees at 40, 50, even 60. Benefits: Career switch, personal satisfaction, promotion eligibility. Government job age limit = only restriction (up to 35-40 for many). Skill courses: No age limit. Your motivation to learn > Your age. Start today!

instruction: Aadhaar correction eppadi seivathu?
output: Online: myaadhaar.uidai.gov.in (demographic update). Offline: Aadhaar Enrolment Centre. Documents: Supporting proof for correction. Fee: Rs.50 (biometric update free). Time: 10-30 days. OTP verification required. Address update: Aadhaar app-lum possible.

instruction: Certificate delay ஆனால் என்ன செய்வது?
output: TN Right to Service Act: Specified time limit-க்குள் service கொடுக்கணும். Delay ஆனால்: 1) Appellate Authority-க்கு appeal, 2) Penalty: Rs.250/day delay, 3) CM Cell complaint. Income certificate: 7 days, Community certificate: 15 days (approximate).

instruction: Kadum mazhaiyaal en payir muzhuvathum naasamaagividuchu. Enna compensation, help kidaikkum?
output:
Within 72 hours:
1. PMFBY Claim - pmfby.gov.in / 14447 - Take photos
2. Inform VAO - Written complaint with acknowledgment

Assessment:
3. Crop Cutting Experiment - Agri Dept + Insurance
4. Claim Amount - Based on yield loss %

Other Relief:
5. SDRF - Natural disaster relief from District Collector
6. Input Subsidy - ₹6,800-13,500/hectare
7. CM Relief Fund - Severe cases

Loan Relief:
8. Loan restructuring - Apply at Bank
9. Fresh KCC Loan - 4% interest for next season

instruction: Poiyaamai-yoda palan enna?
output: Kural: 'Poiyaamai aatrin arampira seiyaamai nandru'. Poi sollaamal irundhaalae podhum, vera endha aramum seiya vendaam. Melum: 'Puralthoongal eydhuvar meyyae puralthookkaap poiyaay solli nindravaar'. Unmai pesupavargal pugazh adaivaargal. Truth = ultimate dharma!

instruction: Veettu owner nammala thitturaaru, ennaa panradhu? (Madurai style)
output: Thittradhu harassment-dhaan. Recording panni vachukonga (legal in TN). Police complaint podalam - IPC 504 (intentional insult). Women/SC/ST-kku additional protection laws irukku. Advocate-kitta consult pannunga.

instruction: Owner eppodhu venumanalum rent increase seyyalaamaa?
output: Mudiyaadhu. Agreement period-kkul rent increase seyya mudiyaadhu. Agreement mudinja piragu, pudhu agreement-la mutual consent-udan mathume increase seyyalam. Arbitrary increase-kku Rent Authority-la challenge seyyalam.

instruction: பயிர் காப்பீடு (PMFBY) எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: Apply before sowing at pmfby.gov.in, bank, or CSC. Premium: Kharif 2%, Rabi 1.5%, Commercial 5% - rest paid by govt. KCC holders auto-enrolled. Documents: Land records, Aadhaar, bank account. Report crop loss within 72 hours for claim. Helpline: 14447.

instruction: Social media-ல் fake account என் பேர்ல - complaint எப்படி?
output: Platform report: Impersonation report (ID proof upload). Legal: IT Act 66D (identity theft), IPC 419 (cheating by personation). cybercrime.gov.in complaint. Platform response: 24-72 hours. Multiple platforms: Each platform-லும் separately report.

instruction: En Car 15 varusham aagividuchu. Fitness Certificate eppadi vaanguvadhu? Endha test seivanga?
output:
**Vehicle Fitness Certificate:**

**When needed?**
- Private: After 15 years (every 5 years)
- Commercial: After 8 years (every year)

**Apply:** parivahan.gov.in → Fitness Certificate → Book ATS slot

**Documents:**
- RC Book, Insurance, PUC
- Previous Fitness Certificate
- Tax receipts

**Tests:**
- Brake, Emission, Headlight
- Suspension, Steering, Speedometer
- Horn, Body, Tyres, Mirrors

**Fee:** Testing ₹300-500 + Certificate ₹200

**Process:** ATS visit → 30-45 min test → Report → Certificate

**Validity:** 5 years (private 15+), 1 year (commercial)

**No Certificate:** Vehicle seized, ₹500-5,000 fine

instruction: School health program-ல் என்ன check பண்றாங்க?
output: School Health Program services: 1) Height/weight monitoring, 2) Eye checkup (vision), 3) Dental checkup, 4) Hearing test, 5) General physical examination, 6) Deworming tablets, 7) Iron supplements, 8) Referral for issues found. Who: Government school students - free. Frequency: Usually once a year. Issues found: Referred to PHC/hospital. Spectacles: Free for poor students.

instruction: FIR eppadi register seyvadhu?
output: Visit nearest police station with written complaint. Zero FIR: Can file at ANY station. Online for some crimes: eservices.tnpolice.gov.in. Get FIR copy FREE (your right!). If police refuse: Complain to SP/District Collector. For cyber crimes: cybercrime.gov.in or call 1930.

instruction: Free coaching enge kidaikkum? Government schemes irukkiradha?
output: Free coaching options: 1) Tamil Nadu Government Free Coaching Centres - UPSC, TNPSC, SSC-ku major cities-la 2) BC/MBC Welfare Dept coaching 3) Adi Dravidar Welfare free coaching (SC/ST) 4) District Employment Office coaching 5) TNSDC skill centers. Online: NPTEL, SWAYAM, Unacademy free tier. Apply through respective department websites. Selection based on marks and income.

instruction: PMGSY endraal enna? Endha gramangalukku salai kidaikkum?
output: Pradhan Mantri Gram Sadak Yojana - Rural road scheme. Eligible villages: Hilly areas 250+ population, Plains 500+ population, without road connectivity. Road Type: All-weather road (Concrete/Bitumen). Request: Through Gram Panchayat to Block/District. PMGSY-III: Upgrade existing roads. Maintenance: Contractor responsible for 5 years.

instruction: NEET Exam endraal enna? Yaar ezhudhalaam?
output:
**NEET Exam:**

**What:** Medical entrance exam by NTA

**Courses:** MBBS, BDS, BAMS, BHMS, Nursing, Veterinary

**Eligibility:**
- Age: 17+ (Dec 31)
- Education: 12th PCB
- Marks: General 50%, OBC/SC/ST 40%

**Attempts:** Unlimited

**Languages:** Tamil, English, Hindi + 10 more

**Apply:** neet.nta.nic.in (Dec-Jan)
**Fee:** ₹1,700 (General), ₹1,000 (SC/ST)

**TN Special:** 7.5% Govt school reservation

instruction: International Driving Permit (IDP) எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: Apply: RTO office (not online). Documents: Valid Indian DL, passport, visa, photos. Fee: Rs.1,000. Validity: 1 year or Indian DL validity - எது குறைவோ அது. IDP alone not valid - Indian DL-உடன் carry பண்ணணும்.

instruction: Hardware and Networking course படிக்கலாமா?
output: Good career option. Courses: 1) CCNA (Cisco) - Networking 2) CompTIA A+ - Hardware 3) MCSE (Microsoft) - Server admin 4) Hardware & Networking diploma. Duration: 3-12 months. Jobs: 1) Network administrator 2) System support 3) Hardware technician 4) IT helpdesk. Salary: ₹15,000-30,000. Demand: Every company needs IT support. NIELIT offers recognized courses. Self-employment: Computer repair shop.

instruction: Community certificate eppadi vaanguvadhu? Time evvalavu aagum?
output: Process: 1) Apply at Tahsildar office or e-Sevai 2) Documents: Aadhaar, parent community certificate, school TC mentioning community, family photo 3) Verification by RI 4) Issue by Tahsildar. Time: 15-30 days. One-time: Permanent certificate for lifetime. Required for: Reservation benefits, scholarships, government jobs. Tip: Get parents' certificate first, then children's easier. Online tracking: tnedistrict.tn.gov.in.

instruction: விவசாய நிலம் யார் வாங்கலாம்?
output: Tamil Nadu-ல் agricultural land ceiling laws உள்ளன. Farmer அல்லது farmer family member மட்டுமே wet land (15 acres limit) வாங்கலாம். Dry land-க்கு liberal rules. Company/Non-farmer வாங்க District Collector permission வேண்டும்.

instruction: என் பொண்ணு NEET-ல் fail ஆயிட்டா - அடுத்து என்ன வழி?
output: Discourage பண்ணாதீங்க. Options: Next year NEET retry, BSc Nursing/Allied Health Sciences, BDS (dental), BAMS/BHMS (alternative medicine), BSc Life Sciences. NEET-க்கு 8 attempts வரை try பண்ணலாம். Age limit: 25 years.

instruction: Ration Card pattriya thavraana purithalkal enna?
output:
Wrong Beliefs vs Truth:

1. ❌ Can only apply in person → ✅ Online apply at tnpds.gov.in
2. ❌ Benefits only for Rice Card → ✅ NPHH card also has some benefits
3. ❌ Cannot get Ration in other district → ✅ One Nation One Ration Card works anywhere
4. ❌ No Ration without Aadhaar link → ✅ Some exceptions exist, but linking is better
5. ❌ No Ration without Smart Card → ✅ Manual entry must also be allowed
6. ❌ Only one card per house → ✅ Separate family can get separate card

Common Mistakes:
- Not surrendering old card during address change → Legal issue
- Not removing deceased person's name → Ration loss

instruction: Naukri/LinkedIn la fake job scam - report eppidi?
output: Naukri.com: Job listing → 'Report this job', email grievance@naukri.com. LinkedIn: Job → Three dots → 'Report this job', report fake recruiter profile. Indeed: Job → 'Report job', support.indeed.com. Internshala: help@internshala.com. Monster: india-care@monster.com. General: Ministry of Labour labour.gov.in, if recruitment fee taken - Police FIR + Labour Department complaint. If overseas job scam: Protector of Emigrants complaint.

instruction: Builder specification மாத்தி flat தந்தார் - complaint போடலாமா?
output: ஆம். Agreement/Brochure-ல் சொன்ன specification மாறினால் RERA complaint போடலாம். Options: 1) Specification match செய்ய order, 2) Price reduction, 3) Compensation, 4) Full refund. Photos, videos, original brochure evidence-ஆ வைங்க.

instruction: Diabetes-kku Siddha medicine irukkaa?
output: Yes! Siddha for Madhumegam (diabetes): Medicines: 1) Seenthil Choornam, 2) Neermulli Kudineer, 3) Nilavembu Kudineer, 4) Aavarai Pattai, 5) Sirukurinjan. Research: CCRS has validated formulations. Important: 1) Don't stop allopathic suddenly, 2) Regular monitoring essential, 3) Integrated approach best, 4) Diet + lifestyle crucial. Complication prevention: Siddha foot care for diabetic foot.

instruction: Oruthan kadan vaangittu thirumba tharala, enna panradhu? (Chennai style)
output: Steps: 1) Written reminder anuppunga, 2) Legal notice (registered post), 3) Response illa = court case. Evidence: Cheque/transfer proof, WhatsApp messages, witnesses. Rs.20 lakh-kkul: Summary suit (faster). Criminal: Cheque bounce aana Section 138 case. Limitation: 3 years. Pro tip: Promissory note vaangiyirundhaa strong case.

instruction: LIC Golden Jubilee Scholarship enna?
output: LIC Golden Jubilee Foundation Scholarship: Economically weaker section students-ku. Amount: ₹10,000-20,000/year. Eligibility: 10th 60%+ marks, family income ₹2 lakh kizha. Special quota: LIC employees' children. Apply: Through LIC branch or www.buddy4study.com. Covers: School fees, books, uniform. Renewable annually based on marks.

instruction: Siddha medicine quality check eppadi panradhu?
output: Check on pack: 1) AYUSH License number, 2) Manufacturing license, 3) Batch number, 4) Expiry date, 5) Manufacturer name and address, 6) GMP certification (if available). Buy from: 1) Licensed pharmacies, 2) Hospital pharmacies, 3) Government AYUSH stores. Avoid: 1) Loose medicines without label, 2) Online from unknown sources, 3) Unregistered practitioners' preparations. Complaint: State Drug Controller for spurious products.

instruction: KCC eppadi peruvadhu?
output: Apply at any bank or through pmkisan.gov.in. Documents: Aadhaar, PAN, land records (Patta/Chitta), sowing certificate. Loan up to ₹3 lakh collateral-free at only 4% interest (with subvention). Crop insurance auto-enrolled. Repay after harvest.

instruction: முதலமைச்சர் உயர்கல்வி உதவித் தொகை என்றால் என்ன?
output: First Graduate-களுக்கு உதவித்தொகை. Amount: ₹12,000/year (UG), ₹18,000/year (PG). தகுதி: குடும்பத்தில் முதல் graduate, Govt/Govt-aided college, Annual income ₹2.5 லட்சத்திற்கு கீழ். Duration: Full course period. Apply: College itself processes, Income certificate, First graduate declaration, Aadhaar. Auto-credited: Semester-wise to bank account.

instruction: TikTok/Instagram la 'Send 1000 to this UPI, get 2000 back - money doubling challenge' nu viral aagudhu. Friends try pannuvaanga.
output: Money doubling impossible - basic logic. 'Viral' because scammers promote heavily. Friends who 'got money' - either lying or part of scam. 1000 anuppina - gone forever. Report such videos, warn friends.

instruction: Tuition போகணுமா? School படிப்பு மட்டும் போதாதா?
output: Depends on: 1) School quality - Government/Private 2) Child's self-study ability 3) Parent support at home 4) Specific subject weakness. Tuition alternatives: 1) Free government coaching centres 2) YouTube educational videos 3) Khan Academy, BYJU'S free tier 4) Group study with friends 5) Senior students help. When needed: Maths, Science weak subjects, competitive exam preparation. Cost: ₹500-2000/month for tuition. Self-study skill develop = best investment.

instruction: False FIR போட்டால் என்ன ஆகும்?
output: IPC 182 (BNS 213): False information to public servant - 6 months imprisonment + fine. IPC 211 (BNS 248): False charge with intent to injure - 2-7 years imprisonment. Defamation case-உம் வரும். Accused can file counter case. Think twice before filing.

instruction: Pregnant women-க்கு என்ன benefits உண்டு?
output: Pradhan Mantri Matru Vandana Yojana: Rs.5,000 cash benefit. Dr. Muthulakshmi Maternity Benefit: Rs.18,000. Free delivery in government hospitals. Anganwadi-ல் nutrition support உண்டு.

instruction: 'Thaamveezhvar menrol' - thunaiviyoda azhagu patriya kural enna?
output: Kural: 'Thaamveezhvar menrol thuyilin inidhukol thaamaraik kannaan ulagu'. Artham: Nammai nesippavar melliya tholil thoonguvadhu, Thirumaaloda (thaamaraik kannaan) sorgatthai vida inimaiyaanadhu. True love is heaven on earth! Romance-kku Valluvaroda azhagaana expression.

instruction: Multiple subjects எப்படி manage பண்றது?
output: Multi-subject strategy: 1) Timetable with specific slots 2) Alternate between easy/hard subjects 3) Active recall - test yourself 4) Spaced repetition - revise at intervals 5) Priority: Weak subjects more time 6) Daily targets: 2-3 subjects 7) Weekly review all subjects 8) Morning: Fresh topics, Evening: Revision 9) Sunday: Full revision + mock test 10) Track progress in journal. Don't study one subject for 5+ hours continuously - brain needs variety.

instruction: Abortion-க்கு husband consent வேணுமா?
output: NO! Woman's decision alone. MTP Act: Only woman's consent required (if adult). Husband cannot: 1) Force abortion, 2) Prevent abortion, 3) His consent not legally required. Minor: Parent/guardian consent needed. Confidentiality: Doctor cannot inform husband without woman's consent. Hospital asking husband consent: Wrong - complain.

instruction: Maternity leave rights ennenna?
output: Maternity Benefit Act 2017: 1) 26 weeks paid leave (first 2 children), 2) 12 weeks (3rd child onwards), 3) 12 weeks (adoption/surrogacy), 4) Work from home option (post leave), 5) Creche facility (50+ employees). Cannot terminate during pregnancy/leave. ESI: Maternity benefit through ESI if covered. Miscarriage: 6 weeks leave.

instruction: Orphan/single parent children-க்கு படிப்பு உதவி என்ன?
output: சலுகைகள்: 1) Social Welfare Department scholarship 2) Free education in government schools 3) Hostel facility free 4) PM CARES for Children scheme (COVID orphans) - ₹10 lakh insurance + monthly stipend + free education till graduation 5) NGO scholarships. Required: Death certificate of parent(s), income certificate. District Social Welfare Officer-ஐ அணுகுங்கள்.

instruction: Legal notice எப்படி அனுப்புவது? Lawyer வேணுமா?
output: Self அனுப்பலாம், but lawyer recommended for proper drafting. Format: 1) From/To addresses, 2) Subject, 3) Facts, 4) Legal grounds, 5) Demand/relief sought, 6) Time limit (usually 15-30 days), 7) Consequence warning. Send: Registered post AD (Acknowledgement Due). Keep copy + postal receipt. Reply not mandatory but advisable.

instruction: Siddha treatment-ல் என்ன வகைகள் உள்ளன?
output: Treatment types: 1) Internal medicines - Choornam (powder), Lehyam (paste), Kasayam (decoction), Thailam (oil), Maathirai (pills), 2) External - Pattru (poultice), Ottradam (fomentation), Nasiyam (nasal), Kattu (bandage), 3) Surgical - Siddha surgery, 4) Special therapies - Thokkanam (massage), Varmam, Yoga. Panchagavya: Cow products based. Kayakalpa: Rejuvenation therapy.

instruction: Builder pona loan EMI kattikittu irukken, possession tharala - enna option?
output: RERA-la complaint podunga. Builder EMI interest compensate seyyanum endru order vaangalam. Parallel-aa bank-kitta loan restructure/moratorium kelunga. Extreme case: Full refund + EMI interest compensation kidaikkum.

instruction: Siddha treatment government hospital-la free-yaa kidaikkumaa?
output: Yes! TN has strong Siddha infrastructure. Free at: 1) Government Siddha Medical Colleges (Chennai, Palayamkottai, etc.), 2) District AYUSH hospitals, 3) Taluk level Siddha dispensaries, 4) PHC attached Siddha units. Services: OPD, IPD, medicines. National Institute of Siddha (Tambaram): Specialized centre. Research: Central Council for Research in Siddha (Chennai).

instruction: Drip irrigation subsidy எவ்வளவு?
output: Micro irrigation-க்கு (drip/sprinkler) 55-100% subsidy உண்டு. Small/marginal farmers-க்கு அதிக subsidy. Horticulture department மூலம் apply செய்யலாம். pmksy.gov.in-ல் details பாருங்கள்.

instruction: Community certificate எப்படி வாங்குவது? Time எவ்வளவு ஆகும்?
output: Process: 1) Apply at Tahsildar office or e-Sevai 2) Documents: Aadhaar, parent community certificate, school TC mentioning community, family photo 3) Verification by RI (Revenue Inspector) 4) Issue by Tahsildar. Time: 15-30 days. One-time: Permanent certificate for lifetime. Required for: Reservation benefits, scholarships, government jobs. Tip: Get parents' certificate first, then children's easier. Online tracking: tnedistrict.tn.gov.in.

instruction: Kayakalpa treatment enna? Enge available?
output: Kayakalpa = Rejuvenation/anti-aging therapy. Purpose: Longevity, vitality, reverse aging effects. Methods: 1) Special medicines (Kayakalpa pills), 2) Dietary regimen, 3) Yoga, pranayama, 4) Lifestyle modifications. Duration: 40-90 days typically (intensive). Where: 1) NIS specialized program, 2) Selected Siddha hospitals, 3) Traditional practitioners. Not for: Acute illness, certain chronic conditions. Preparation: Requires purification therapies first.

instruction: Pen maanavar-kalukkaana Moovalur Ramamirtham Ammaiyar scheme enna?
output: Scheme details: 6th-12th padikkum pen students-ku monthly stipend. Amount: ₹1,000/month (₹12,000/year). Eligibility: Government/Aided school student, family income ₹2.5 lakh kizha. 18 years aanavudan ₹25,000 one-time panam (graduation-ku). Apply: School moolam automatic. Bank account theva.

instruction: ITI Course பற்றி full details தருங்க. Free-யா படிக்கலாமா?
output:
**ITI (Industrial Training Institute) - Complete Guide:**

**என்ன ITI?**
- Technical skill training
- Industry-ready workforce preparation
- NCVT/SCVT certified

**Eligibility:**
- 8th pass: Some trades (Welder, Wireman)
- 10th pass: Most trades (Electrician, Fitter, Turner)

**Duration:**
- 6 months to 2 years (trade based)

**Popular Trades:**

| Trade | Duration | Job Prospects |
|-------|----------|---------------|
| Electrician | 2 years | High demand |
| Fitter | 2 years | Manufacturing |
| COPA (Computer) | 1 year | Office jobs |
| Mechanic (Motor Vehicle) | 2 years | Automobile |
| Welder | 1 year | Construction |
| Plumber | 1 year | Building sector |
| Electronics Mechanic | 2 years | Electronics |

**Fees:**
- Govt ITI: FREE! (Only nominal ₹100-500)
- Private ITI: ₹10,000-50,000/year

**Free Training Schemes:**
- SC/ST: Full free + Stipend ₹500-1,000/month
- BC/MBC: Free tuition
- EWS: Free in Govt ITI

**Admission Process:**
1. Website: itidata.tn.gov.in
2. Online application
3. Merit list based on 10th marks
4. Counselling & Seat allotment

**Timing:** Apply: May-June

**After ITI:**
- Apprenticeship (1 year) - Earn while learn
- Direct job in factories, companies
- Self-employment
- Higher studies: Diploma (Lateral)

**Apprenticeship Sites:**
- apprenticeshipindia.gov.in
- Stipend: ₹5,000-9,000/month

instruction: Property vaangum pothu common thavarugal enna?
output:
Before Purchase:
1. ❌ Checking only 13 years EC → ✅ Check at least 30 years EC
2. ❌ Patta is enough → ✅ Patta = Possession, Title = Ownership (Different)
3. ❌ Trusting seller's word → ✅ Independent title search via Lawyer
4. ❌ Registering at Guideline Value → ✅ Under-reporting = Black money, legal issues
5. ❌ Buying agricultural land without verification → ✅ Check land ceiling, conversion

During Registration:
6. ❌ Taking anyone as witness → ✅ Only trusted persons
7. ❌ Signing without reading document → ✅ Read every clause, sign with Lawyer present

After Purchase:
8. ❌ Not transferring Patta → ✅ Apply within 3 months
9. ❌ Missing Property tax → ✅ Penalty + legal issues
10. ❌ Not claiming PMAY subsidy → ✅ First home buyers save lakhs

instruction: Community certificate எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: Tahsildar office-ல் apply செய்யலாம். பெற்றோர் community certificate, school TC, family card copy தேவை. Field verification நடக்கும். Online-லும் tnedistrict.tn.gov.in-ல் apply செய்யலாம்.

instruction: CBI officer-nu video call vandhudhu, unga name drug case-la irukku, panam kattuna case close pannuvaanga-nu solraanga
output: Digital arrest scam ithu madam! CBI video call-la case handle pannudhu illa. Uniform fake, ID fake. Call cut pannunga, 1930-la urgent-a report pannunga.

instruction: Ration card-la per seerkka/neekka enna seyyanum?
output: Seerkka: Marriage/Birth certificate + Aadhaar vendum. Neekka: Death certificate / Vera card-la serntha proof. Apply: tnpds.gov.in or Tahsildar office. Time: 15-30 days.

instruction: PAN-Aadhaar Link eppadi seyvadhu? Kattaayama?
output: Mandatory! If not linked, PAN becomes Inoperative. How to link: 1. Online: eportal.incometax.gov.in → Link Aadhaar 2. SMS: UIDPAN <Aadhaar> <PAN> → 567678 or 56161 3. Fee: ₹1,000 (late fee). Check status: eportal.incometax.gov.in → Link Aadhaar Status. If not linked: Cannot file ITR, Cannot do large bank transactions, Cannot open MF/Demat, Higher TDS deduction

instruction: En pillai career choice-a accept panna mudiyala. Enna seivathu?
output: Generation gap bridge: 1) Listen to their reasons - genuinely try to understand 2) Research that field - income potential, growth, stability 3) Meet professionals in that career - get real picture 4) Trial period suggestion - internship, shadowing 5) Your fears express - but don't impose 6) Compromise explore - related but acceptable field 7) Remember: It's their life to live. Reality: Many non-traditional careers successful today. Trust your upbringing - they'll be fine!

instruction: Headache-kku natural remedy?
output: Remedies: 1) Ginger tea, 2) Clove paste on temples, 3) Peppermint oil on forehead, 4) Cold/warm compress (depends on type), 5) Rest in dark room, 6) Hydration (dehydration causes headache), 7) Inhale ajwain steam. Pressure points: Press between thumb and index finger. Lifestyle: Regular sleep, avoid screen strain, stress management. Migraine: See doctor - may need proper treatment.

instruction: முதியோர் ஓய்வூதியம் எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: TN State: ₹1,000/month (60-79 years), ₹1,500/month (80+). Eligibility: BPL/low income, no other pension. Apply at tneservices.tn.gov.in or Taluk Office with age proof, income certificate, Aadhaar, bank account. VAO verification. Time: 30-60 days.

instruction: Thirukkural UN-ல் recognize ஆனதா?
output: Thirukkural formally UN-ஆல் recognize ஆகவில்லை, ஆனால்: 1) UN conferences-ல் Thirukkural quotes cite ஆகியுள்ளன, 2) UNESCO Tamil-ஐ classical language-ஆக recognize பண்ணியபோது Thirukkural-ஐ highlight பண்ணியது, 3) International scholars Thirukkural-ஐ 'Universal ethical text' என்று praise பண்றாங்க. Thirukkural-ஐ UN officially recognize பண்ண வேண்டும் என்று campaign நடக்கிறது.

instruction: Pharmacy license இல்லாம operate பண்றாங்க - report?
output: Illegal! Every pharmacy needs: 1) Drug License (displayed), 2) Registered Pharmacist (during operating hours). Report: Drug Inspector, State Drugs Control, local police. Check: License number displayed, pharmacist name displayed. Risk: Unlicensed pharmacy may sell fake/expired/wrong medicines. Online: E-pharmacy also needs license - check before ordering.

instruction: Government hospital-ல் free-யா treatment கிடைக்குமா?
output: Yes! Government hospitals = Free treatment for all. Free services: 1) OPD consultation, 2) Basic tests (blood, urine, X-ray), 3) Medicines (available stock), 4) Surgery (non-cosmetic), 5) Emergency care, 6) Delivery, 7) Vaccinations. Paid: Special rooms, specific tests (MRI/CT in some), outside medicines. Quality: Varies - GH Chennai, Madurai Medical College = good facilities.

instruction: Hotel Management படிப்பு தமிழ்நாட்டில் எங்கே உள்ளது?
output: Top institutes: 1) IHM Chennai - Central Government 2) IHM Guruvayur - Private 3) SIHM Madurai - State 4) SRM Hotel School. Admission: NCHM JEE entrance + counselling. Eligibility: 12th pass 45-50%. Duration: 3 years BSc HM. Fees: Govt ₹50,000-80,000/year, Private ₹1-3 lakh/year. Jobs: Hotels, airlines, cruise ships, resorts. Good starting salary: ₹20,000-35,000.

instruction: OTP share panniten, account empty aaiduchu. Bank liability evlo?
output: RBI Guidelines: Bank's fault = Zero liability, Third party breach (you not at fault) = Zero if reported in 3 days, Customer negligence (OTP sharing) = Full liability IF bank proves negligence. But you can argue: Social engineering defense (deceived, not negligent), Bank's duty of care (clear warnings?), Delayed debit argument (unusual pattern). Steps: Written complaint (say 'OTP obtained through fraud' not 'I gave OTP'), Banking Ombudsman at cms.rbi.org.in (90% get partial refund), Consumer Forum, Civil Court for large amounts.

instruction: Cyber stalking-kku enna law irukku?
output: IPC 354D (stalking) - 3 years imprisonment (first offence), 5 years (repeat). IT Act 66D (cheating by personation). Evidence collect: Screenshots, call logs, messages. Platform block + police complaint. Women: Protection order under DV Act-um peralaam.

instruction: Free borewell scheme எப்படி apply செய்வது?
output: SC/ST, small/marginal farmers-க்கு free borewell scheme உண்டு. Agriculture department-ல் apply செய்யவும். Land document, caste certificate தேவை. Waiting list இருக்கும்.

instruction: Misleading advertisement-kku complaint podalaamaa?
output: Aama. ASCI (Advertising Standards Council of India)-kku complaint podalam - ascionline.in. Consumer forum-lum case podalam. Celebrity endorsement false claims-kkum celebrity liable. Compensation + advertisement withdraw order kidaikkum.

instruction: Physical violence இல்லாமல் DV complaint போடலாமா?
output: ஆம். DV Act covers: 1) Physical abuse, 2) Sexual abuse, 3) Emotional/verbal abuse (insults, humiliation), 4) Economic abuse (money control, property denial). Dowry harassment, threat, intimidation - எல்லாம் DV. Evidence: Recordings, messages, witnesses.

instruction: Consumer-ஆக எனக்கு என்னென்ன rights இருக்கு?
output: Consumer Protection Act 2019-ன் கீழ் 6 முக்கிய rights: 1) Safety right - unsafe products-இல் இருந்து பாதுகாப்பு, 2) Information right - product details தெரிந்துகொள்ள, 3) Choice right - alternatives select செய்ய, 4) Hearing right - complaint கொடுக்க, 5) Redressal right - compensation பெற, 6) Education right - consumer awareness.

instruction: Hidden charges வசூலித்தால் என்ன செய்யலாம்?
output: Hidden charges unfair trade practice. E-commerce Rules 2020-ன் கீழ் all charges upfront display கட்டாயம். Complaint: Consumer forum, NCH helpline. Refund of hidden charges + compensation கேட்கலாம். Bank service charges-க்கு Banking Ombudsman.

instruction: Pharmacy prescription illaama antibiotic kodukkalaama?
output: NO! Most antibiotics = Schedule H - prescription mandatory. Reason: Antibiotic resistance is serious health threat. Pharmacy violation: Drug Inspector complaint, license action. Exception: Some topical antibiotics (creams) may be OTC. Good practice: Complete prescribed course, don't share antibiotics, don't use leftover. Doctor: Can prescribe over phone in genuine emergency.

instruction: SIM swap fraud-la irundhu eppadi protect panradhu?
output: Prevention: 1) SIM lock enable, 2) Don't share personal details, 3) Unusual network loss-kku alert, 4) Bank OTP to email (if available). If happened: Telecom provider + bank + police immediately. New SIM block request pannunga.

instruction: Kisan Credit Card (KCC) eppadi vaanguvadhu? Enna benefits?
output: Low-interest loan for farmers. Interest: 4% (after subvention - 7% base, 3% interest subvention for timely repayment). Credit Limit: Up to ₹3 lakh (based on land area). Uses: Seeds, fertilizers, pesticides, equipment, harvest expenses. Repayment: Flexible - based on crop cycle. Apply: Bank with land documents, Aadhaar, passport photo. Simplified for PM-KISAN beneficiaries. KCC available for fishermen, animal husbandry too.

instruction: Advance directive for mental health endraal enna?
output: Advance directive = When mentally well, write down treatment preferences for future crisis. Includes: 1) Preferred treatment methods, 2) Treatments to avoid, 3) Nominated representative, 4) Hospital preferences, 5) ECT consent/refusal. How: Register with Mental Health Review Board. Benefits: Your wishes respected even when unable to communicate. Can modify when competent. Legal document.

instruction: Court case எத்தனை வருஷம் ஓடும்? Fast track வழி இருக்கா?
output: Average: Civil case 5-10 years, Criminal 3-7 years. Fast options: 1) Lok Adalat (one-day settlement), 2) Mediation centres (free, court-annexed), 3) Arbitration (private, faster), 4) Consumer Forum (6 months-1 year), 5) Fast track courts (specific cases). Tips: Avoid adjournments, complete documentation, experienced lawyer. E-courts app-ல் case status track பண்ணலாம்.

instruction: Pre-existing disease claim எப்போது கிடைக்கும்?
output: Waiting period: Usually 2-4 years (policy varies). Pre-existing = condition before policy started. Rules: 1) Must declare at proposal, 2) Non-disclosure = claim rejection + policy cancellation, 3) After waiting period, fully covered, 4) IRDAI: Max 4 years waiting period. Tip: Disclose honestly, buy policy early when healthy, continuous renewal maintains benefits.

instruction: Avvaiyaarum Muruganum - enna kadhai?
output: Avvaiyar naaval pazham saappida oru maraththadiyil amarndhirundhaar. Oru siruvan (Murugan) marathil irundhaan. 'Sutta pazham venuma, sudaadha pazham venuma?' endru kettaan. 'Sudaadha pazham' endraar Avvai. Siruvan kilaiyai kulukka, pazhangal manalil vizhundhana. Avvai oodhi saappida, siruvan siriththaan - 'Oodhinaal sudaadha pazham aagividuma?' endru. Siruvanidamum katrukkolalam endru unarndhaar Avvai. Andha siruvan Murugan!

instruction: மீனவர் குடும்ப மாணவர்களுக்கு scholarship உள்ளதா?
output: ஆம், Fisheries Department Scholarships: 1) Pre-matric - ₹500-1,500/ஆண்டு 2) Post-matric - ₹2,000-5,000/ஆண்டு 3) Professional courses - ₹10,000-30,000 4) Higher education abroad - ₹10 lakh. தகுதி: Fishermen community certificate, registered fisherman's child. Apply: www.fisheries.tn.gov.in. Special quota in Anna University marine courses.

instruction: PMAY-Urban எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: Interest subsidy for first home buyers. EWS/LIG: 6.5%, MIG-I: 4%, MIG-II: 3% subsidy on home loan. Apply through bank or pmay-urban.gov.in. Condition: No pucca house anywhere in India. Affidavit required. Wife as co-owner recommended. Saves ₹2-2.5 lakh!

instruction: Yaaro irandhu vittargal - grief handle panna udhavum kural?
output: 'Nillaadhavatrai nilaiyina endrunarum pullari vaanmai kadai'. Nilaiyattravai (udal, uyir) nilaiyaanavai endru ninaippadu ariyaamai. Life is temporary - grieve, but understand impermanence. Melum: 'Pirappennm pedaimai neengach sirappendum semporul kaanba thaRivu'. Birth and death are natural - soul continues. Remember them with love.

instruction: Birth certificate illai - late registration eppadi?
output: Within 1 year: Normal fee at Registrar. 1-5 years: Late fee + affidavit. 5+ years: Court order required (Magistrate). Apply: Corporation/Municipality/Panchayat. Documents: Hospital records, school records, affidavit, ID proofs of parents. TN: e-Sevai centre-lum available.

instruction: Health problem vandhuVittathu - mentally strong-aa irukka enna kural?
output: 'Marundhena vendaavaam yaakkaiku arundhiyadhu atrradhu potri unin'. Sariyaana unavae marundhu. Melum: 'Udambhar azhiyin uyiraar azhivar' - udalai paenungal. Physical health-kku treatment edungal, mental health-kku positive thoughts maintain pannungal. Body is a temple - take care of it!

instruction: Padhinen Siddhargal (18 Siddhars) yaar yaar?
output: Padhinen Siddhargal: 1) Nandeesar, 2) Agathiyar, 3) Thirumoolar, 4) Punnakkisar, 5) Pulippaani, 6) Kaalaanginaathar, 7) Azhuguni Siddhar, 8) Agappey Siddhar, 9) Theraiyar, 10) Kudhambai Siddhar, 11) Karuvoorar, 12) Idaikaadar, 13) Kamalamuni, 14) Valmiki, 15) Bogar, 16) Machchamuni, 17) Konganar, 18) Sattaimuni. (Pattiyal maarupadalam - vera versions-um ullana).

instruction: Matrimony site la romance scam - report and recovery?
output: BharatMatrimony: Profile → Report → 'Fake/Fraud', support@bharatmatrimony.com, 044-45002300. Shaadi.com: Profile → Report, care@shaadi.com, 022-67448888. Tamil Matrimony: support@tamilmatrimony.com. Tinder/Bumble/Hinge: Profile → Report → 'Scam or Spam'. Important: Collect ALL chat history before reporting, profile screenshots (they'll delete), photos received, money transfer receipts. Police FIR essential for large amounts. Recovery very low (money usually abroad). Prevention better: Video call verify, never send money before meeting.

instruction: Police torture செய்தால் என்ன செய்வது?
output: Complaint options: 1) SP/DIG-க்கு written complaint, 2) Judicial Magistrate-க்கு complaint, 3) State Human Rights Commission, 4) National Human Rights Commission, 5) High Court writ petition. Medical report, photos, witnesses - evidence வாங்குங்க. Custodial torture serious offence.

instruction: Wrong side surgery (wrong leg, wrong kidney) - legal action?
output: Serious negligence! "Never event" in medical terms. Action: 1) Document immediately (photos, records), 2) Consumer Forum - high compensation, 3) Criminal case (Section 338), 4) Medical Council complaint. Protocols violated: WHO surgical safety checklist. Hospitals have: Marking protocols, time-out procedures. Failure = gross negligence. Compensation: Significant damages awarded in such cases.

instruction: Mental health treatment free-யா?
output: Government mental health hospitals-ல் treatment free. NIMHANS, Institute of Mental Health (Chennai) போன்ற institutes உண்டு. District Mental Health Programme கீழ் PHC-லும் counseling available.

instruction: திருமண பதிவு எப்படி செய்வது?
output: Apply at tnreginet.gov.in or Sub-Registrar Office. Documents: Age proof (groom 21+, bride 18+), address proof, wedding photos/invitation, 2 witnesses with Aadhaar. Both parties must be present at SRO. Fee: ₹100-500. Same day certificate.

instruction: RTI reply ethanai naalil kidaikkum?
output: Normal: 30 days. Life/liberty matter: 48 hours. Third party information: 40 days. Transfer to other department: 35 days (5 days transfer + 30 days). Reply illaattal deemed refusal - First Appeal podalam.

instruction: கார்த்திகை தீபம் - 'Thiruvannamalai girivalam online booking, VIP darshan 2000 Rs' link வந்துச்சு. Genuine-ஆ?
output: Fake! Thiruvannamalai temple official-ஆ இப்படி booking இல்ல. Karthigai time-ல temple scams peak. 'VIP darshan' என்று money திருடுவாங்க. Temple direct போங்க, middleman avoid பண்ணுங்க.

instruction: Domicile certificate vs Nativity certificate - enna difference?
output: Nativity: Born in Tamil Nadu endru prove. Issued by: Tahsildar. For: Reservation benefits, state quota seats. Domicile: Residing in state for specified period (usually 5+ years). For: Some central institution admissions. Both different! Don't confuse. TN admissions mostly need: Nativity OR studied in TN for specific years (varies by counselling). Documents: Birth certificate, school TC, Aadhaar showing TN address.

instruction: Doctor enga native language-la explain pannanumaa?
output: Yes! Right to information in understandable language. Includes: 1) Diagnosis explanation, 2) Treatment options, 3) Risks and benefits, 4) Consent form explanation, 5) Medicine instructions. If doctor doesn't speak Tamil: Hospital should arrange translator. Written materials: Should be in local language. Complaint: If communication barrier causes harm - negligence claim possible.

instruction: 12th exam-ல் centum வாங்க முடியுமா? எப்படி?
output: Centum possible subjects: Maths, Physics, Chemistry, Computer Science, Accountancy. Tips: 1) NCERT concepts தெளிவாக புரிந்துகொள்ளுங்கள் 2) Formula sheet தயாரியுங்கள் 3) Numerical problems: 50+ types practice 4) Diagram neat-ஆக draw பண்ணுங்கள் 5) Answer writing: Steps முழுமையாக 6) Time management: 3 hours mock tests. Centum scorers: 6 AM study, revision before sleep, doubt clearing same day.

instruction: மூட்டு வலி ஆறு மாசமா இருக்கு, scan எடுக்கணுமா?
output: 6 months joint pain - orthopedic consultation needed. Tests: 1) X-ray first (usually sufficient), 2) MRI if X-ray normal but pain persists, 3) Blood tests (RA, uric acid). Government: Orthopedic OPD - free consultation and basic tests. Common causes: Osteoarthritis (wear and tear), rheumatoid arthritis. Treatment: 1) Medicines, 2) Physiotherapy (free at government), 3) Joint replacement if severe (CMCHIS covers). Self-care: Weight control, walking, avoid squatting.

instruction: Farmer family-la pirandhavangalukku admission-la preference unda?
