output: Aama. TNAU-la farmer quota irukku. Farmer certificate vachchu apply pannalam. Rural area students-kku weightage kedaikum. KVK (Krishi Vigyan Kendra)-la free training-um undu.

instruction: Agricultural land-ai non-agricultural use-kku convert pannalaamaa?
output: Land Use Conversion permission venum. Apply: District Collector/DTCP. Natham land-aaga convert seydhaal construction pannalam. Wet land (nanjai) conversion kadinam. Conversion fee + stamp duty difference kattanum. Illegal conversion-kku penalty + demolition.

instruction: Home healthcare service legal-ஆ? Reliable-ஆ?
output: Legal, but verify. Check: 1) Company registration, 2) Nurse/attendant credentials, 3) Doctor supervision (for nursing care), 4) Agreement/contract terms, 5) Emergency protocols, 6) Insurance/liability coverage. Services: Nursing care, physiotherapy, doctor visits, sample collection. Caution: Verify ID of persons coming home. Complaint: If fraud/negligence - police + Consumer Forum.

instruction: Employer experience letter/relieving letter thara marukkiraar
output: Steps: 1) Written request (email/letter), 2) HR head escalation, 3) Labour Commissioner complaint, 4) Civil Court mandatory injunction. Documents rightfully yours. Background verification-la issue varum - previous employer-kku new employer-kitta explain pannunga.

instruction: Tamil Nadu-oda mukkiya kovil thiruvizhakkal enna?
output: Mukkiya thiruvizhakkal: 1) Chithirai Thiruvizha - Madurai (April/May) - 1 month, 2) Karthigai Deepam - Thiruvannamalai (Nov/Dec), 3) Panguni Uthiram - Srirangam, 4) Thaipusam - Pazhani, 5) Navarathri - Tanjore area, 6) Vaikunta Ekadasi - Srirangam, 7) Aarudhra Darisanam - Chidambaram, 8) Thirukalyanam - all major temples. Temple car (Ratham) Therthiruvizha spectacular!

instruction: 10th mudicha appuram ennenna courses irukku?
output:
**After 10th Options:**

**1. Plus Two (+2):** 2 years, Science/Commerce/Arts

**2. Diploma (Polytechnic):** 3 years, Engineering branches, Lateral entry to degree

**3. ITI:** 6 months-2 years, Trades like Electrician, Fitter - Direct job

**4. Paramedical:** 1-2 years, ANM, Lab Tech, X-Ray Tech

**5. Skill Courses (PMKVY):** 3-6 months, Free, Job placement

**6. NIOS:** Open schooling, Same validity

**Choice Depends On:**
- Higher studies → +2
- Quick job → ITI
- Technical job → Diploma

instruction: Journalism/Mass Communication படிக்க சிறந்த college?
output: Top colleges: 1) Asian College of Journalism Chennai 2) Loyola College MA Journalism 3) Stella Maris 4) Anna University Media Sciences 5) SRM Mass Comm. Courses: BA/B.Sc Mass Comm (3 years), PG Diploma (1 year), MA Journalism (2 years). Jobs: TV channels, Newspapers, Digital media, PR agencies, Advertising. Skills: Writing, communication, current affairs knowledge. Internships important.

instruction: இலவச சட்ட உதவி எங்கே பெறுவது?
output: TNSLSA (Tamil Nadu State Legal Services Authority) provides free legal aid. Eligibility: BPL, SC/ST, women, differently-abled, senior citizens, victims of trafficking. Helpline: 15100 (24x7). Legal Aid Cell at every district court. Lok Adalat for quick settlements.

instruction: Age limit government college admission-க்கு இருக்கிறதா?
output: UG courses: Generally no upper age limit for most courses. Exceptions: Medical (25 for general, 30 for reserved), Law integrated (20), NDA (19.5). Minimum age: 17 years usually. PG courses: No age limit mostly. PhD: No limit. Government jobs: Age limits apply (varies by post). Reality: Complete your education at any age - many successful late starters. Distance education: No age restrictions at all.

instruction: 'Guaranteed return', '100% profit' என்று investment offer வந்தது. Believe பண்ணலாமா?
output: Investment-ல் guarantee இல்லை. 'Guaranteed', 'risk-free', 'double your money' என்று சொன்னால் Ponzi scheme. SEBI registered platforms மட்டுமே safe.

instruction: 10th படிக்கும் மாணவர்களுக்கு என்ன scholarship இருக்கு?
output:
**Class 9-10 Scholarships:**

**1. Post-Matric Scholarship (SC/ST):**
- Wait - இது 11th-க்கு பிறகு!

**2. Pre-Matric Scholarship (Continues from Class 8):**

**SC/ST Students:**
- Day Scholar: ₹150/month
- Hosteller: ₹350/month
- Ad-hoc grant: ₹750/year

**BC/MBC Students:**
- Day Scholar: ₹100/month
- Hosteller: ₹250/month

**Minorities:**
- ₹100/month + ₹500/year

**3. NMMS Continuation:**
- Class 8-ல் qualify ஆனவர்கள்
- ₹12,000/year continues

**4. State Merit Scholarship:**
- Class 9 entrance based
- Merit students select
- Monthly stipend

**5. Private Scholarships:**
- Tata Trust
- Reliance Foundation
- L&T Educational Trust
- Apply: respective websites

**6. Sitaram Jindal Foundation:**
- ₹750/month (Class 9-10)
- Income < ₹2 lakh
- Apply: sjfounation.in

**Apply Process:**
1. Check eligibility
2. Get documents ready (Income, Community, Marks)
3. Apply through scholarships.gov.in
4. School verification
5. Submit before deadline

**Deadlines:** Usually September-October

instruction: Yoga therapy enge learn pannalaam?
output: Free options: 1) Government Yoga centres (every district), 2) AYUSH hospitals - yoga unit, 3) Parks - morning free sessions (many cities), 4) Schools/colleges - yoga programs. Paid: 1) Private yoga studios, 2) Art of Living, Isha centres, 3) Online courses (after basics learned). Certification: If want to teach - AYUSH certified courses. Therapy: For specific conditions - consult yoga therapist (BNYS or certified).

instruction: Chief Minister's Higher Education Scholarship endraal enna?
output: Scholarship for first-generation graduates. Amount: ₹12,000/year (UG), ₹18,000/year (PG). Eligibility: First graduate in family, Govt/Govt-aided college, Annual income below ₹2.5 lakh. Duration: Full course period. Apply: College processes, Income certificate, First graduate declaration, Aadhaar. Auto-credited: Semester-wise to bank account.

instruction: UPI fraud ஆனால் உடனே என்ன செய்யணும்?
output: Golden hour (first 24 hours முக்கியம்): 1) Bank-க்கு immediately call - transaction block, 2) 1930 helpline (cyber fraud), 3) cybercrime.gov.in-ல் complaint, 4) UPI app-ல் report, 5) Nearby police station FIR. Amount recover chance: 24 hours-ல் report = higher chance.

instruction: Consumer-aaga enakku ennenna rights irukku?
output: Consumer Protection Act 2019-in keezh 6 mukkiya rights: 1) Safety right - unsafe products-la irundhu protection, 2) Information right - product details therinjukka, 3) Choice right - alternatives select seyya, 4) Hearing right - complaint kodukka, 5) Redressal right - compensation pera, 6) Education right - consumer awareness.

instruction: Tally course படித்தால் என்ன job கிடைக்கும்?
output: Tally jobs: 1) Accountant - small/medium businesses 2) Billing operator 3) Inventory manager 4) GST filing assistant 5) Bank data entry. Salary: ₹10,000-20,000 starting. Course duration: 2-3 months. Government centres: NIELIT, TNSDC. Private: Tally Academy (authorized). Certification: Tally.ERP 9 / TallyPrime. Combined with GST knowledge = better opportunities. Self-employment: Freelance accounting services.

instruction: Friends எல்லாரும் phone use பண்றாங்க, study time waste ஆகுது, என்ன செய்வது?
output: Phone/Social media management: 1) Study time-ல் phone வேற room-ல் வையுங்கள் 2) App blockers use (Forest, Freedom) 3) Scheduled screen time - 1 hour/day 4) Study group with serious friends 5) Parents-கிட்ட phone control கொடுங்கள். Reality: Toppers also use phones - difference is discipline. Educational use OK: BYJU'S, Khan Academy, Doubt clearing. Self-control = life skill. Start with small goals.

instruction: Thiruvalluvaroda manaivi yaar? Avangala pathi enna theriyum?
output: Thiruvalluvaroda manaivi Vasuki. Avar oru karpu karasiyagavum, kanavanukkku muzhu panivudan irundhadhagavum potrappadugirar. 'Illaraviyal' adhigaarangalil Vasukiyoda gunangaloda thaakkam theriyudhu-nu solvar. Avar eppothum kanavar solradha mudhalil seivaar, thanni kooda kanavar ketkum mun kondu varuvaar-nu kadhaigal ullana.

instruction: Arts padiththaal enna velai kidaikkum?
output: Arts padippin job opportunities: 1) Government jobs - TNPSC, SSC, Banking 2) Teaching - B.Ed seithu teacher 3) Journalism/Media 4) Civil Services - IAS, IPS 5) Law - LLB sernthu lawyer 6) Social work 7) HR/Administration. NET exam ezhudhi Professor aagalam. UPSC-ku Arts background siranthidhu.

instruction: TN Mid-Day Meal Scheme endraal enna?
output: Free nutritious lunch for Govt school students. Coverage: Class 1-10 (Govt + Aided schools). Menu: Rice/Variety rice + Sambar + Egg/Banana + Boiled Egg (weekly). Morning: Nutrition breakfast (select areas). Nutrition: 450-700 calories, 12-20g protein. Aim: Increase school attendance, Nutrition, Prevent dropouts. Quality: Monthly inspection, Nutritionist supervision. Anganwadi: Integrated Child Development Services for 0-6 years kids.

instruction: Scholarship-ku apply panna enna document venum-nga?
output: Aadhaar, bank passbook (student name-la), income certificate, community certificate, marks card, photo, bonafide - ipdi ellam venum. Original + xerox + scan ready-a vechikko/vechikunga.

instruction: Theft vs Robbery என்ன வித்தியாசம்?
output: Theft (IPC 379/BNS 303): Secretly taking property - 3 years imprisonment. Robbery (IPC 392/BNS 309): Theft + force/fear - 10 years imprisonment. Dacoity (5+ persons): 10 years to life. House breaking: Additional charges. Recovery of property possible.

instruction: Bank account freeze ஆச்சு, ஏன்? என்ன செய்வது?
output: Freeze reasons: 1) Court order (loan default, legal case), 2) IT department notice, 3) Suspicious transactions (PMLA), 4) KYC not updated. Steps: 1) Bank-கிட்ட freeze reason கேளுங்க (writing-ல), 2) Court order = lawyer consult, 3) IT matter = CA consult, 4) KYC = documents update பண்ணுங்க. Wrongful freeze: Banking Ombudsman complaint.

instruction: 'Manaththukkan maaasilan' - indha kuraloda artham enna?
output: Kural: 'Manaththukkan maaasilan aadhal anaiththaran aagula neera pira'. Artham: Manam thooimaiyaaga iruppadhae aram. Matra ella sadangugalum, aasaarangalum velippadaiyaana show. Ullam suththamaga irundhaal podhum. External rituals-a vida internal purity mukkiyam enkiraar Valluvar.

instruction: ITI padicha piragu engineering seralaamaa?
output: Aam, Lateral Entry scheme ulladhu. ITI + 2 years relevant work experience or ITI + 1 year apprenticeship = Diploma 2nd year direct admission. Diploma mudicha piragu = B.E./B.Tech 2nd year. LEET (Lateral Entry Entrance Test) sila states-la ulladhu. TN-la marks basis lateral entry available. Career ladder: ITI → Diploma → B.E. → M.Tech.

instruction: 12th Board Exam-ku eppadi centum vaanguvadhu?
output:
**12th Centum Strategy:**

**6 Month Plan:**

**Month 1-2:** Complete syllabus, Notes, Formula sheets

**Month 3-4:** Deep study, Important questions, Diagrams, Numericals

**Month 5:** Previous papers, Model exams, Weak areas

**Month 6:** Quick revision, Mock exams, Exam practice

**Subject Tips:**
- Physics: Daily numericals, Derivations
- Chemistry: Equations, Named reactions
- Maths: 30 problems/day
- Biology: Neat diagrams, Flow charts

**General:**
1. 5 AM study time
2. Take breaks
3. 7 hours sleep
4. No new topics in last week
5. Neat writing

**Resources:** Kalvi TV, DIKSHA App, dge.tn.gov.in

instruction: Aadhaar-la address change eppadi seyvadhu?
output: Online: myaadhaar.uidai.gov.in → Login with OTP → Update Address → Upload new address proof → Pay ₹50. Address proof can be EB bill, bank statement, rent agreement. If no document, use Address Validation Letter (AVL) method where verifier at new address confirms.

instruction: WhatsApp message 'GST portal special access offer for CAs. 20,000 annual fee for priority processing of client returns.' Client work ku useful aa?
output: GST portal access same for all registered practitioners - no 'priority processing' tier. GSTN doesn't offer special CA packages outside official registration. This could be selling illegitimate access or simply fraud. Use official gst.gov.in only.

instruction: 'Premium Spotify/Netflix free - Download APK from [link]' nu Telegram la share aachhu. Official app paid, idhu free alternative aa?
output: Pirated APKs malware contain pannum - banking trojans, keyloggers. 'Free premium' bait. Phone data full aa steal aagum. Legitimate apps - Play Store/App Store only. Piracy shortcuts la malware risk always irukku.

instruction: நான் சிறு விவசாயி. Organic விவசாயம் செய்ய விரும்புகிறேன். என்ன உதவி கிடைக்கும்?
output:
Organic விவசாயத்திற்கு பல திட்டங்கள் உள்ளன:

1. **PKVY (Paramparagat Krishi Vikas Yojana)**
   - உதவி: ₹50,000/hectare (3 வருடம்)
   - Cluster அடிப்படையில் (50 விவசாயிகள்)
   - எங்கே: District Agriculture Officer

2. **PGS Certification (Free)**
   - pgsindia-ncof.gov.in
   - Group-ஆக apply செய்யவும்

3. **Tamil Nadu Organic Farming Policy**
   - Vermicompost unit: 50% subsidy
   - Bio-fertilizer: Free distribution
   - எங்கே: Block Agriculture Office

4. **Training**
   - KVK (Krishi Vigyan Kendra) - Free training
   - TNAU - Certificate courses

5. **Market Support**
   - Organic Mandi through e-NAM
   - Direct consumer sale permission

instruction: Golden hour என்றால் என்ன? அதுல hospital போகணுமா?
output: Golden hour = First 60 minutes after trauma/heart attack. Critical because: 1) Brain damage starts in minutes without oxygen, 2) Bleeding control crucial, 3) Heart attack - early treatment = more heart saved, 4) Trauma - internal bleeding stops. Action: 1) Call 108 immediately, 2) Don't move spine injury victims, 3) CPR if no pulse (if trained), 4) Control visible bleeding. Nearest hospital first - don't travel far.

instruction: College hostel-la mudhal murai stay panren. Enna eduthukkannum?
output: Essential items: 1) Bedding - mattress, pillow, blanket 2) Bucket, mug, toiletries 3) Clothes + hangers 4) Study materials, stationery 5) Lock for cupboard 6) Electric kettle (if allowed) 7) First aid basics 8) Important documents photocopies 9) Passport size photos 10) Emergency contact numbers. Don't bring: Costly items, too many clothes initially. Adjust first, buy locally if needed.

instruction: Scholarship panam eppo varum? Track pannalaamay?
output: NSP portal-la login pannu/pannunga, status paaru/paarunga. PFMS site-layum payment track pannalam. 2-3 months edukkum normally. Reject aanaa defect list check pannu/pannunga.

instruction: Rare disease medicine எப்படி கிடைக்கும்?
output: Challenges: Expensive, not always available in India. Options: 1) Government policy: Free treatment for some rare diseases (up to Rs.50 lakhs), 2) Crowdfunding platforms, 3) Pharma company compassionate access programs, 4) Import license for unavailable drugs, 5) Clinical trials. Centers: AIIMS, CMC Vellore have rare disease programs. Apply: Through treating hospital's rare disease cell.

instruction: SMS vandhuchu 'DIKSHA platform login issue. Click link to reset password immediately or training record deleted.' DIKSHA use pannuren, verify pannalama?
output: DIKSHA password reset only through official diksha.gov.in portal. Never click SMS links - type URL directly. Training records don't get 'deleted' - this is creating false urgency. Official DIKSHA issues communicated through school administration.

instruction: Naanu visually impaired. Board exam-la enna special facilities kidaikkum?
output: PWD exam facilities: 1) Scribe/Writer - you dictate, they write 2) Extra time - 20 minutes per hour 3) Separate room if needed 4) Large print question paper 5) Exemption from certain papers (language options). Apply: Through school with disability certificate (40%+). UDID card helps. Competitive exams: Same facilities available. Career: Many PWD-friendly government jobs reserved (4% reservation).

instruction: Email vandhuchu 'Teacher's Insurance scheme from State Government. Premium 2000, coverage 10 lakh. Limited period offer, pay now.' Idhu genuine government scheme aa?
output: Government insurance schemes announced through official GOs and school management. Education department never asks direct payment via email. Verify from DPI (Director of Public Instruction) website. Teachers already covered under GIS - check your existing coverage first.

instruction: Central Government helpline numbers enna?
output: Aadhaar: 1947, PAN/Income Tax: 1800-180-1961, PM-KISAN: 155261, Ayushman Bharat: 14555, NSP Scholarship: 0120-6619540, PMKVY Skill: 1800-123-9626, Consumer: 1915, Women Helpline: 181, Cyber Crime: 1930

instruction: NEET-ku prepare aaganum, Telugu medium-la padichirukken, mudiyumaa?
output: Mudiyum! NEET 13 languages-la ezhudhalaam - Telugu option irukku. TN state quota-ku: Native certificate venum OR 10th, 11th, 12th TN-la padichirukka venum. Border areas: Hosur, Krishnagiri students apply pannalam. NCERT Telugu version available. Focus on concepts - language secondary. Many Telugu medium students crack NEET!

instruction: Siddha medicine-la heavy metals irukkumaa? Safe-aa?
output: Some Siddha medicines use: Metals (Paashanam), mercury (Rasam), arsenic (Paadaanam) - after purification (Suththi). Licensed products: Processed as per traditional methods, tested for safety limits. Risk: Unregulated products, improper preparation. Safety: 1) Buy only licensed products, 2) Consult qualified doctor, 3) Inform if taking other medicines, 4) Follow dosage strictly. Research: CCRS validates safety of traditional preparations.

instruction: Legal Heir Certificate eppadi peruvathu?
output: Apply: Tahsildar office or eservices.tn.gov.in. Documents: Death certificate, Ration card, ID proofs of all heirs, Affidavit. Field verification nadakkum. Time: 15-30 days. Fee: Rs.50. Bank account, pension, insurance claim-kku avasiyam.

instruction: முதலமைச்சர் காப்பீட்டு திட்டம் (CMCHIS) என்றால் என்ன?
output: CMCHIS = Free health insurance for TN families. Coverage: Rs.5 lakh per family per year. Eligibility: Annual income below Rs.72,000 (rice card holders automatic). Benefits: 1,027 procedures covered - surgeries, treatments, follow-up. Cashless treatment at empanelled hospitals. Card: Family smart card issued. Renewal: Automatic for eligible families.

instruction: Aadhaar-bank account link aagala, scholarship reject
output: Linking steps: 1) Visit bank branch with Aadhaar 2) Fill seeding form 3) OTP verification 4) 48-72 hours to reflect. Check link status: Call bank customer care or use NPCI mapper. Common issues: Name mismatch (Aadhaar vs bank) - get corrected first. Multiple accounts: Only one can be primary for DBT. Alternative: Net banking/Mobile banking link option available. UIDAI website: Check Aadhaar-bank link status.

instruction: Insurance claim reject aanaal enna seivathu?
output: Rejection reasons: 1) Pre-existing disease (waiting period), 2) Excluded treatment, 3) Document missing, 4) Non-network hospital, 5) Fraud suspected. Appeal: 1) Written grievance to insurer (30 days), 2) IRDAI IGMS portal, 3) Insurance Ombudsman (free, up to Rs.30 lakhs), 4) Consumer Forum. Success tip: Get rejection reason in writing, provide complete documents, cite policy terms.

instruction: Bill illaama vaangina product-kku complaint podalaamaa?
output: Bill illaatalum complaint podalam. Alternative proofs: 1) Bank/card statement, 2) Online payment screenshot, 3) Warranty card, 4) Packaging with shop name, 5) Witness statement. Aanaal bill irundhaal case strong aagum.

instruction: Respiratory problems-kku (asthma, bronchitis) Siddha?
output: Siddha for Swasakasam (respiratory): Asthma, bronchitis, allergic rhinitis, sinusitis. Medicines: 1) Thalisathi Choornam, 2) Adathodai Kudineer, 3) Kantharasam, 4) Poorna Chandrodayam. Therapies: 1) Steam inhalation with herbs, 2) Nasiyam (nasal drops), 3) Chest application with specific oils. Preventive: Build immunity, avoid triggers. Works well: For chronic management, reducing frequency of attacks.

instruction: Pudhiya driving license eppadi peruvadhu?
output: Step 1: Apply for Learner's License (LLR) at parivahan.gov.in - age proof, address proof, medical declaration. Pass computer test. Step 2: After 30 days, apply for DL. Take driving test at RTO. Fee: ₹200-700. Age: 18+ for car/bike, 16+ for without gear.

instruction: Atal Pension Yojana (APY) endraal enna?
output: Pension scheme for Unorganized Sector. Age: 18-40 years can join. Pension at 60: ₹1,000/₹2,000/₹3,000/₹4,000/₹5,000 per month. Contribution: Varies by age + pension amount (joining at 18 = ₹210/month for ₹5,000 pension). Benefits: Government co-contribution, Pension continues for spouse, Corpus to nominee. Join: Bank/Post Office

instruction: Gopuram, Vimanam irandukum enna viththiyaasam?
output: Gopuram: Koviloda entrance gate tower. Piramaandamaga irukkum. Veliye theriyum. Sirpangal niraiya irukkum. Pirkala kovilkalil gopuram miga uyaram. Vimanam: Karuvrai (sanctum sanctorum) mel ulla tower. Moolavar meedhu neradiyaga irukkum. Aaramba kaala kovilkalil (Chozhar kaalam) vimanam miga uyaram - example: Thanjai Periya Kovil. Pirkaalathil gopuram uyaramanadhu, vimanam siriyathanadhu.

instruction: Company en data misuse pannuthu - complaint enge?
output: DPDP Act 2023 (implementation started): Data Protection Board-kku complaint. Current options: 1) Company grievance officer, 2) IT Ministry, 3) Consumer forum (service deficiency), 4) Court. Data breach notification: Company inform seyyanum. Consent withdrawal right undu.

instruction: 'Enni thunika karumam' - decision making patri enna solludhu?
output: Kural: 'Ennith thunika karumam thunindhapin ennuvam enbadhu izhukku'. Artham: Oru kaariyathai seiya mudivedukkum mun nandraga yosikka vendum. Mudivedutha pin meendum yosippadhu thavaru. 'Think before you act, don't act before you think' - idhai 2000 varudangalukkku munnabe Valluvar sonnaar.

instruction: Insurance policy lapse aagum-nu call vandhudhu, renew panna OTP venum-nu solraanga
output: Insurance company OTP kettuka maattaanga sir. Policy details official website-la check pannunga. Caller-ku OTP kodukkaadheega - scam ithu.

instruction: Free coaching எங்கே கிடைக்கும்? Government schemes இருக்கிறதா?
output: Free coaching options: 1) Tamil Nadu Government Free Coaching Centres - UPSC, TNPSC, SSC-க்கு major cities-ல் 2) BC/MBC Welfare Dept coaching 3) Adi Dravidar Welfare free coaching (SC/ST) 4) District Employment Office coaching 5) TNSDC skill centers. Online: NPTEL, SWAYAM, Unacademy free tier. Apply through respective department websites. Selection based on marks and income.

instruction: Second-hand Car வாங்கினேன். RC Transfer எப்படி செய்வது?
output:
**RC Transfer Process (Used Vehicle):**

**Seller செய்ய வேண்டியவை:**

1. **Form 29 & 30**
   - Transfer of Ownership forms
   - Seller signature
   - parivahan.gov.in download

2. **NOC (if different state)**
   - Original RTO-யிலிருந்து
   - Loan இருந்தால் Bank NOC

3. **Deliver to Buyer:**
   - Original RC
   - Insurance transfer letter
   - PUC Certificate
   - Signed forms

**Buyer செய்ய வேண்டியவை:**

**Step 1: Online Application**
1. parivahan.gov.in → Online Services → TN
2. Transfer of Ownership
3. Fill Form 29 & 30
4. Upload documents
5. Pay fee online

**Step 2: Documents**
- Form 29 & 30 (signed by both)
- Original RC Book
- Insurance (transferred or new)
- PUC Certificate
- Seller's Aadhaar + Address proof
- Buyer's Aadhaar + Address proof
- Sale receipt / Agreement
- NOC (if applicable)

**Step 3: RTO Visit**
- Book slot online
- Both parties present (or POA)
- Document verification
- Vehicle inspection (HPT check)
- Biometric/Photo

**Step 4: Fee Payment**

| Item | Amount |
|------|--------|
| Transfer Fee | ₹300-500 |
| Smart Card | ₹200 |
| Road Tax (if applicable) | Varies |

**Step 5: New RC**
- Processing: 7-15 days
- Collect or by post

**Timeline:** 14 days from sale (legal requirement)

**Penalty for Delay:**
- ₹50/day after 14 days
- Maximum ₹500

**Loan Vehicle:**
- Bank NOC mandatory
- Hypothecation removal first
- Or transfer with hypothecation

**Insurance Transfer:**
- Within 14 days
- Or take fresh policy
- NCB transfer possible

instruction: TN மதிய உணவு திட்டம் (Mid-Day Meal) என்றால் என்ன?
output: Govt school மாணவர்களுக்கு இலவச சத்தான உணவு. Coverage: Class 1-10 (Govt + Aided schools). Menu: Rice/Variety rice + Sambar + Egg/Banana + Boiled Egg (weekly). காலை: Morning nutrition breakfast (select areas). Nutrition: 450-700 calories, 12-20g protein. Aim: School attendance increase, Nutrition, Dropout prevention. Quality: Monthly inspection, Nutritionist supervision. Anganwadi: 0-6 years kids-க்கு Integrated Child Development Services.

instruction: SSC Exams endraal enna? TN students apply pannalaamaa?
output:
**SSC Exams:**

**What:** Central Govt job exams, TN students can apply!

**Major Exams:**

1. **SSC CGL:** Inspector, Auditor - Degree - ₹44,900+
2. **SSC CHSL:** DEO, LDC - 12th - ₹25,500+
3. **SSC MTS:** Peon - 10th - ₹18,000+
4. **SSC GD:** BSF, CISF - 10th - Physical test
5. **SSC Steno:** Stenographer - 12th - Skill test

**TN Advantage:**
- Chennai posting preference
- South zone vacancies

**CGL Pattern (Tier-1):**
Reasoning 25 + GK 25 + Quant 25 + English 25 = 200 marks, 1 hour

**Apply:** ssc.nic.in (SSC Southern Region Chennai)

instruction: ஆன்லைன்ல order பண்ணேன், வேற product வந்துடுச்சு
output: Steps: 1) Delivery போது video எடுங்க (unboxing), 2) App-ல் return/refund request, 3) Email complaint (company grievance officer), 4) NCH portal complaint. Evidence upload பண்ணுங்க. 7 days-ல் response இல்லன்னா consumer forum.

instruction: Hospital bill புரியல, itemized bill கேட்கலாமா?
output: Yes! Right to detailed bill. Must include: 1) Room charges (per day), 2) Doctor fees, 3) Surgery/procedure charges, 4) Medicines (with MRP), 5) Consumables, 6) Lab tests, 7) Nursing charges, 8) Any other charges. Hospital must provide: Written estimate before admission (planned), final itemized bill. Overcharging: Consumer Forum complaint. Compare: Check medicine MRP, verify tests done.

instruction: Child-kku ADHD/autism - treatment enge?
output: Assessment: 1) Child psychiatrist, 2) Developmental pediatrician, 3) Clinical psychologist. Government: 1) Institute of Child Health (Chennai), 2) District Early Intervention Centres (DEIC), 3) Medical college child psychiatry. Services: Diagnosis, therapy (occupational, speech, behavioral), medicines if needed. Free: Government facilities. Schools: Special needs provisions mandatory. UDID: Apply for benefits if certified.

instruction: Salem/Erode region-ல் agriculture courses எங்கே?
output: Agriculture education Salem/Erode: 1) Vanavarayar Institute Pollachi - B.Sc Agriculture 2) Agricultural College & Research Institute Madurai (affiliated) 3) Horticultural College Periyakulam 4) KVK (Krishi Vigyan Kendra) - Short courses. TNAU affiliated colleges admission through TNAU counselling. Farmers' children priority. Practical training in farms included. Jobs: Agriculture department, banks (agri officer), own farming with modern techniques.

instruction: Email vandhudhu 'Press council accreditation renewal. Pay 10,000 for journalist ID card.' Press card ku idhu process aa?
output: Press Council of India accreditation free through employer organization. PIB accreditation through government process, no fees. State press accreditation through Information & PR department. No 10,000 fee for any legitimate journalist ID. Check official PCI website.

instruction: PAN-Aadhaar link status check pannuvadhu eppadi? Link pannuvadhu eppadi?
output:
Status Check:
1. Go to: eportal.incometax.gov.in
2. Click: 'Link Aadhaar Status'
3. Enter: PAN + Aadhaar
4. Result: Linked / Not Linked

Link pannuvadhu:

Method 1 - Online:
1. eportal.incometax.gov.in → 'Link Aadhaar'
2. Enter PAN + Aadhaar + Name + Mobile
3. OTP validate
4. Pay ₹1,000 (late fee)
5. Done!

Method 2 - SMS:
- Send: UIDPAN <12-digit Aadhaar> <10-digit PAN>
- To: 567678 or 56161
- Example: UIDPAN 123456789012 ABCDE1234F

Link aagala na enna aagum:
- PAN 'Inoperative' aagum
- ITR file panna mudiyaadhu
- ₹50,000+ transactions blocked
- Higher TDS (20%)
- Mutual Fund / Demat open panna mudiyaadhu

instruction: Call vandhuchu baa - 'Nee account block aagum baa, KYC update pannu' nu. OTP kekkuraanga baa. Enna pannudhu?
output: Fraud baa idhu! Bank phone la OTP kekkumaa baa? Kekaadhu! 'Block aagum' nu bayamudhuthuraanga. Branch ku nee poi pesu baa. Katpadi, Ambur la leather businessmen ipdi maatikirukkanga. Phone la details kudukkaadhe baa.

instruction: Neighbour என் land-ல் ஆக்கிரமிப்பு செய்கிறார் - என்ன செய்வது?
output: Steps: 1) Survey செய்து boundary verify பண்ணுங்க, 2) Written notice அனுப்புங்க, 3) Tahsildar-க்கு complaint, 4) Civil Court-ல் injunction + possession suit. Documents: Patta, Survey sketch, Photos, EC. Forceful removal try பண்ணாதீங்க.

instruction: Library-யை effectively use பண்றது எப்படி?
output: Library tips: 1) Get library card first day 2) Know sections - reference, lending, periodicals 3) Silent study areas = best concentration 4) Group study rooms book in advance 5) Digital resources - e-journals, databases access 6) Inter-library loan facility 7) Photocopy limits know 8) Renewal option use 9) Reserve books in demand. Pro tip: Morning time library = peaceful. Regular schedule = habit formation.

instruction: Semester exam-க்கு last minute preparation tips?
output: Last week strategy: 1) Previous year papers - pattern identify 2) Important questions list make 3) Short notes revise, not new topics 4) Formula sheets ready 5) Sleep properly - memory consolidation 6) Light food, hydration 7) Morning revision of previous day 8) Group discussion for doubt clearing 9) Hall ticket, stationery ready. Avoid: All-night study, new topics, junk food, negative people. Trust your preparation!

instruction: International Driving Permit (IDP) eppadi peruvathu?
output: Apply: RTO office (not online). Documents: Valid Indian DL, passport, visa, photos. Fee: Rs.1,000. Validity: 1 year or Indian DL validity - edhu koraivo adhu. IDP alone not valid - Indian DL-udan carry pannanum.

instruction: Mental illness-க்கு treatment rights என்ன?
output: Mental Healthcare Act 2017 rights: 1) Access to mental healthcare, 2) Community-based treatment (not just hospitals), 3) Informed consent, 4) Confidentiality, 5) No discrimination, 6) Humane treatment, 7) Legal aid, 8) Complaint mechanism, 9) Advance directive right. Government duty: Provide affordable mental healthcare. Insurance: Must cover mental illness like physical illness.

instruction: Notes எப்படி எழுதுவது effective-ஆக இருக்கும்?
output: Effective note-making: 1) Cornell method - page divide into sections 2) Use your own words, not copy 3) Highlight keywords, underline important 4) Use diagrams, flowcharts 5) Color coding for topics 6) Short forms, abbreviations 7) One topic per page 8) Revision space at bottom 9) Index at front 10) Update regularly. Digital options: Notion, OneNote - searchable. Handwritten better for memory. Review notes within 24 hours of class.

instruction: NEET-க்கு class 11 இருந்தே prepare ஆகணுமா?
output: Ideal: Class 11 start. Why? NEET syllabus = 11th + 12th. Class 11 weightage: 45-50%. Strategy: 1) 11th: Concepts strong, NCERT master 2) 12th: Revision + new topics + mock tests 3) After 12th: Full revision + test series. Late starter (12th)? Focus 50% important topics, daily 10-12 hours. Dropper year: Structured coaching + self-study balance. Never too late - many crack in 2nd/3rd attempt.

instruction: Scholarship apply pannen, status eppadi check panrathu?
output: Status check methods: 1) NSP login - dashboard shows status 2) PFMS portal - payment tracking 3) State portal - respective department 4) SMS alerts (if registered) 5) College scholarship cell. Common statuses: Pending verification, Under process, Sanctioned, Disbursed, Rejected. Rejected: Check defect list, re-apply with correct documents. Timeline: 2-6 months from application. Grievance: Portal helpdesk option.

instruction: Wife maintenance evvalavu ketkalaamaa?
output: Fixed formula illa. Consider: 1) Husband income, 2) Wife income/earning capacity, 3) Standard of living, 4) Children custody, 5) Liabilities. Rough guide: Husband income-in 25-30%. Interim maintenance: 20-25%. Court discretion based on facts.

instruction: In-laws against DV case podalaamaa?
output: Aama. DV Act-in keezh 'respondent' includes husband + his relatives who abuse. 498A IPC-in keezh husband and relatives against criminal case podalam. Aanaal specific allegations + evidence venum - general accusation not enough.

instruction: 11th & 12th படிக்கும்போது என்ன scholarship கிடைக்கும்?
output:
**Plus Two Scholarships:**

**1. Post-Matric Scholarship (SC/ST) - Central:**
- Day Scholar: ₹230/month
- Hosteller: ₹750/month
- Maintenance: ₹750/month
- Income limit: ₹2.5 lakh
- Apply: scholarships.gov.in

**2. Post-Matric Scholarship (BC/MBC/DNC) - State:**
- Full fee reimbursement
- Monthly stipend: ₹500
- Income limit: ₹2 lakh
- Apply: tneservices.tn.gov.in

**3. Minorities Post-Matric:**
- ₹500/month (Hosteller: ₹1,000)
- Course fee: Actual or ₹7,000 (whichever less)
- Apply: scholarships.gov.in

**4. Free Laptop Scheme (TN Govt):**
- All Govt school 11th students
- Automatic distribution
- No separate application!

**5. TN CM Higher Education Assurance Scheme:**
- First Generation Graduates
- Free education + ₹1,000/month
- Apply: tneservices.tn.gov.in

**6. INSPIRE Scholarship (Class 11-12):**
- Top 1% in 10th board
- ₹5,000/year for 11th & 12th
- Auto-selection based on marks

**7. Merit-based Scholarships:**
- Various trusts based on 10th marks
- Tata, Reliance, L&T, etc.

**8. Pragati Scholarship (Girls):**
- For girls in technical education
- ₹50,000/year
- Apply: aicte-pragati-saksham-gov.in

**Apply Deadline:** Usually August-October

instruction: Naan gramathula ulla govt school-la padikkiren. BC student. Ennenna benefits kidaikkum?
output:
**BC Student Benefits:**

**School Level:**
1. Free education
2. Free textbooks
3. Free uniform (2 sets)
4. Mid-Day Meal + Egg, Milk, Banana
5. Free Bus Pass
6. Pre-Matric Scholarship: ₹150-500/month

**11th-12th:**
7. Free Laptop (11th)
8. BC Scholarship: Fees + ₹500/month

**College:**
9. CM Higher Education Scheme (First Gen Graduate): Free + Laptop + ₹1,000/month
10. BC Post-Matric: Full fee waiver + Hostel + Stipend

**Apply:** tneservices.tn.gov.in, School/College

**Documents:** Community Certificate, Income Certificate, Aadhaar, Marksheet, Bank account

instruction: Uzhavar number என்றால் என்ன?
output: Unique farmer ID for TN government schemes. Registration: Primary Agricultural Cooperative Bank அல்லது eservices.tn.gov.in. Benefits: Crop insurance, subsidies, PM-KISAN, crop loan eligibility. Required documents: Patta, Chitta, Aadhaar, Bank account.

instruction: Veetla current connection pudusa vaanganum - enna seiyyanum?
output:
TANGEDCO New Connection:

Step 1 - Apply Online:
1. nsc.tnebnet.org → 'New Service Connection'
2. Register with mobile
3. Select: Domestic/Commercial/Agricultural
4. Fill application
5. Upload documents

Documents: Ownership proof (Patta/Sale Deed/Rent Agreement), Aadhaar, Address proof, Building Completion Certificate (new building), Passport photo

Step 2 - Inspection:
- TANGEDCO officer visit
- Wiring check
- Meter location decide

Step 3 - Payment:
- Security Deposit: ₹500-2,000 (load based)
- Service Connection Charge
- Pay online or at TANGEDCO office

Step 4 - Connection:
- Meter installation
- Supply start
- Time: 7-15 days total

Agricultural Connection (Free electricity):
- Apply at TANGEDCO office
- Documents: Land (Patta/Chitta), Pump set details, Well/Borewell proof
- Processing: 30-60 days

Complaint/Status: 94987-94987 or TANGEDCO Mobile App

instruction: QR scan panna cashback kidaikkum-nu stranger solraanga
output: Reverse scam ithu! QR scan panna panam varaadhu, pogum. Cashback-ku QR scan thevai illa. Stranger QR scan panna sollaa - fraud.

instruction: Postmortem report eppadi challenge panradhu?
output: Challenge options: 1) Second opinion from forensic expert, 2) Exhumation and re-autopsy (court order needed), 3) Cross-examination of autopsy doctor, 4) Expert witness contradiction. Grounds: 1) Incomplete examination, 2) Wrong conclusions, 3) Procedural violations, 4) Bias. Important: Video recording of autopsy now mandatory in many cases. Evidence: Preserve body photos if possible.

instruction: Dr. Muthulakshmi Maternity Benefit Scheme enna?
output: TN government scheme: Rs.18,000 cash assistance. Eligibility: 1) TN resident, 2) Family income limit, 3) First two live births, 4) Institutional delivery, 5) Age 19+. Payment: 3 installments - during pregnancy, after delivery, after vaccination completion. Apply: PHC/Government hospital during registration. Documents: Ration card, Aadhar, bank account. Working women: Separate maternity benefit also applicable.

instruction: Lawyer fees evvalavu reasonable?
output: Varies: Junior lawyer - Rs.5,000-25,000 per case, Senior - Rs.50,000-5 lakhs+, Supreme Court - Rs.2 lakhs+. Fee agreement writing-la vaangunga. Excessive fee: Bar Council complaint. Free legal aid: DLSA (income <Rs.3 lakh). Legal fee insurance available.

instruction: Siddha + Allopathy together எடுக்கலாமா?
output: Possible with precautions! Important: 1) Inform BOTH doctors about all medicines, 2) Gap of 30-60 minutes between different system medicines, 3) Some interactions possible, 4) Don't stop allopathy suddenly for chronic diseases. Integration: Many hospitals practice integrated medicine. Best: Consult at integrated AYUSH-allopathy clinics. Examples: Diabetes, BP - can take both under supervision. Never self-combine without medical advice.

instruction: State board vs CBSE - edhu better preparation?
output: Comparison: State Board - Regional language strong, local competitive exams friendly. CBSE - National level exams (JEE, NEET) aligned, English medium uniform. For NEET/JEE: CBSE syllabus closer. For TNPSC: State board better. Reality: Both boards students crack all exams - preparation matters more than board. State board + NCERT combination = best for competitive exams. TN State board now NCERT aligned.

instruction: Lok Adalat-la enna cases settle aagum?
output: Cases: Motor accident claims, labour disputes, matrimonial (except divorce), electricity bills, telephone bills, cheque bounce, bank loan recovery, compoundable criminal offences. Benefits: No court fee, no appeal, quick settlement. Permanent Lok Adalat: Public utility services.

instruction: NEET preparation-ku what should I do-nga? Free options?
output: NCERT Biology, Physics, Chemistry - line by line read pannu/pannunga. Free coaching: Government centres-la apply pannu through school. Online free: YouTube (Physics Wallah), SWAYAM. 7.5% reservation govt school students-ku. Daily 6-8 hours padikka venum. Previous year papers practice important.

instruction: 'Vinayaka Chaturthi - live pooja streaming subscription 999 Rs yearly' - email வந்துச்சு. Subscribe பண்ணலாமா?
output: Most temples free-ஆ stream பண்றாங்க! Paid subscription scam இது. Temple official YouTube channels free. Chaturthi-ல religious sentiment exploit பண்றாங்க. Official temple website check பண்ணுங்க.

instruction: என் பிள்ளை marks குறைஞ்சு படிக்குது. Pressure கொடுக்கணுமா?
output: Approach wisely: 1) Understand reason first - health, interest, teaching quality, personal issues 2) Comparison avoid - every child different 3) Effort appreciate, not just results 4) Tutoring arrange if academic gap 5) Career alternatives discuss - marks ≠ only path 6) Mental health priority - pressure causes anxiety 7) Realistic expectations set. Reality: Many successful people were average students. Support > Pressure. Love unconditionally.

instruction: Suicidal thoughts irukku - yaarai contact panradhu?
output: Helplines (24x7): 1) iCall: 9152987821, 2) Vandrevala Foundation: 1860-2662-345, 3) AASRA: 9820466726, 4) Snehi: 044-24640050 (Chennai), 5) NIMHANS: 080-46110007. Immediate danger: Call 108 or go to nearest hospital emergency. Talk to: Trusted family/friend. Remember: Feelings are temporary, help is available. Professional help: Psychiatrist can help with treatment.

instruction: Thiruvalluvar Dhinam eppodhu kondadapadugiradhu?
output: Thai maadham 2-m thedhi (January 15 or 16). Pongalukku aduththa naal. Tamil Nadu-la government holiday. Schools-la Thirukkural competitions nadakkum.

instruction: Property பிள்ளைகளுக்கு transfer பண்ணிட்டேன், இப்போ வெளியேத்துறாங்க, என்ன செய்வது?
output: Senior Citizens Act protection: Property transfer-க்கு பிறகு neglect/eviction = transfer cancel பண்ணலாம். Steps: 1) Tribunal application (Collector office), 2) Prove neglect/ill-treatment, 3) Order for property return. Time limit: None specified - apply anytime. Evidence: Witnesses, medical records (if abuse), communication records. Preventive: Transfer with life interest retention safer.

instruction: Password hack aanaal enna seyyanum?
output: Immediate: 1) Password change (all linked accounts), 2) Enable 2FA, 3) Check login history, 4) Bank accounts verify, 5) Linked devices remove. If money lost: 1930 + bank + cybercrime.gov.in. Recovery email/phone verify pannunga.

instruction: வேலை செய்துகொண்டே படிக்க என்ன வழி இருக்கிறது?
output: Distance Education வழிகள்: 1) IGNOU - மிகப்பெரிய open university 2) Tamil Nadu Open University (TNOU) 3) University of Madras - IDE 4) Annamalai University Distance. UG/PG/Diploma எல்லாம் available. கட்டணம்: ₹5,000-20,000/ஆண்டு. Exams: ஆண்டுக்கு 2 முறை. Work experience + degree இரண்டும் கிடைக்கும்.

instruction: Aadhaar paadhukaappaaga vaikka enna seyyalam?
output: 1) Lock biometrics at myaadhaar.uidai.gov.in - prevents unauthorized authentication. 2) Use Virtual ID (VID) - 16-digit temporary number instead of Aadhaar. 3) Use Masked Aadhaar - shows only last 4 digits. 4) Check authentication history regularly.

instruction: Swiggy/Zomato delivery partner-க்கு labour laws apply ஆகுமா?
output: Gig workers classified as 'independent contractors' - traditional labour laws fully apply ஆகாது. Code on Social Security 2020: Gig workers-க்கு social security provisions (implementation pending). Accident/injury-க்கு company insurance check பண்ணுங்க. Union formation possible.

instruction: Free legal aid enga kidaikum?
output: Tamil Nadu State Legal Services Authority (TNSLSA). Eligibility: BPL family, SC/ST, Women, Differently abled. Phone: 15100 (toll-free). Every district court-la Legal Aid Cell irukku. Lok Adalat: Cases-a easily solve pannalam.

instruction: Kalaignar Magalir Urimai Thittam enna?
output: ₹1,000/month for woman head of family in TN. Eligibility: 21+ age, family income below ₹2.5 lakh, not govt employee/tax payer, no other pension. Apply through Anganwadi or kalaaboravu.tn.gov.in with Aadhaar, ration card, bank account.

instruction: Important helpline numbers ennenna?
output: Emergency: 112. Police: 100. Fire: 101. Ambulance: 108. Women helpline: 181, 1091. Child helpline: 1098. Cyber crime: 1930. Consumer: 1800-11-4000. Senior citizen: 14567. Anti-corruption: 1064. CM helpline: 1100. Railway: 139.

instruction: Pudhiya Aadhaar card eppadi peruvadhu?
output: Visit nearest Aadhaar Enrollment Center (find at uidai.gov.in), carry identity proof (Voter ID/PAN/Passport), address proof (Ration Card/EB Bill), and age proof (Birth Certificate/SSLC). Biometric capture will be done. First enrollment is FREE. Aadhaar delivered within 90 days.

instruction: Rent Authority order-kku edhiraga appeal seyyalaamaa?
output: Aama. Rent Authority order-kku edhiraga Rent Court (District Court)-la 30 days-kkul appeal seyyalam. Rent Court order-kku edhiraga High Court-la appeal seyyalam. Vazhakkamana civil procedure follow aagum.

instruction: 'New Year prediction: Your lucky number will bring 10 crore! Pay 5000 for full report' - call வந்துச்சு. Real astrologer-ஆ?
output: Fraud! 'Lucky number = crores' என்பது classic scam. New Year-ல astrology scams spike ஆகும். Lottery prediction என்றெல்லாம் இல்ல. Block the number. Astrology-க்கு money கொடுக்காதீங்க.

instruction: Resume/CV eppadi ezhudhuvadhu?
output: Resume essentials: 1) Contact info - email (professional), phone 2) Education - reverse chronological, CGPA 3) Skills - technical + soft skills 4) Projects - 2-3 relevant ones with outcomes 5) Internships/Experience 6) Achievements - quantify where possible 7) Extra-curricular - leadership roles. Format: 1 page for freshers, clean design, no photos (India OK), PDF format. Avoid: Spelling errors, lying, lengthy paragraphs. Templates: Canva, Novoresume free options.

instruction: SMS vandhuchu 'Trademark violation complaint against your business. Pay 50,000 settlement or face legal action.' Trademark issue vandhududhaa, settle pannidlama?
output: Trademark disputes handled through legal notices and courts, not SMS settlements. Check IP India portal for actual complaints. Real trademark holders send advocate notices through registered post. Never settle via SMS - could be extortion attempt.

instruction: Kisan Credit Card (KCC) எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: Apply at any bank or through pmkisan.gov.in. Documents: Aadhaar, PAN, land records (Patta/Chitta), sowing certificate. Loan up to ₹3 lakh collateral-free at only 4% interest (with subvention). Crop insurance auto-enrolled. Repay after harvest.

instruction: JEE-ku endha books padikkanum?
output: Essential books: Physics - HC Verma, DC Pandey, Irodov (Advanced). Chemistry - NCERT (must), OP Tandon (Physical), Himanshu Pandey (Organic), JD Lee (Inorganic). Maths - RD Sharma, Cengage series, Arihant. NCERT = Foundation. Beyond NCERT for JEE Advanced. Online: PYQs from NTA website, mock tests from coaching platforms. Quality > Quantity - one book per subject master pannunga.

instruction: Social media-வில் Thirukkural எப்படி popular ஆனது?
output: 1) #Thirukkural hashtag Twitter/X-ல் trending ஆகிறது, 2) Instagram-ல் artistic kural posts popular, 3) WhatsApp status-ல் குறள்கள் share ஆகின்றன, 4) YouTube-ல் விளக்க videos millions of views பெறுகின்றன, 5) Reels-ல் quick kural explanations viral ஆகின்றன. Gen Z கூட Thirukkural-ஐ 'ancient wisdom' என்று appreciate பண்றாங்க. Memes கூட இருக்கு - 'Valluvar said it 2000 years ago' format!

instruction: Online child abuse report eppadi seivathu?
output: Report: 1) cybercrime.gov.in (select child-related crime), 2) NCPCR helpline: 1098, 3) Police. POCSO Act: Strict punishment for child exploitation. Platforms: Report + block. Evidence preserve pannunga. Don't forward content - possess panradhe illegal.

instruction: 'Ayya, hospital la irundhu pesuren, unga son accident la admit, immediate surgery ku 1 lakh vendum, UPI pannunga' nu call vandhudhu. Bayama irukku, enna pannanum?
output: Ayya, FIRST unga son ku phone pannunga! Answer pannala na, daughter-in-law, office ku call pannunga. Real hospital random numbers la UPI kekkaadhu - admission formalities irukkum. Panic la verify pannama pay pannaadheenga. 30 seconds verification lakhs save pannum.

instruction: Velaikku pogum bodhe padikka mudiyuma?
output: Mudiyum. Evening colleges (5pm-9pm), Sunday classes, correspondence courses, online degree programs (SWAYAM, NPTEL) moolam velai paathukitte padikkalam. UGC approved distance education universities-la seralam.

instruction: Online-la order pannen, vera product vandhudutchu (Coimbatore style)
output: Steps: 1) Delivery podhu video edunga (unboxing), 2) App-la return/refund request, 3) Email complaint (company grievance officer), 4) NCH portal complaint. Evidence upload pannunga. 7 days-la response illanna consumer forum.

instruction: Mock test ethanai murai ezhuthanum? Eppadi analyze panrathu?
output: Mock test frequency: Last 2 months - weekly 2-3. Last month - daily. Analysis steps: 1) Check answers immediately 2) Category-wise error (silly mistake, concept gap, time issue) 3) Track weak areas 4) Revise mistakes same day 5) Redo wrong questions after 3 days 6) Score tracking graph maintain 7) Time per question analysis 8) Attempt strategy review. Sources: Official previous papers, coaching test series, free online (Testbook, Gradeup). Quality > quantity of mocks.

instruction: PMEGP loan-ku eppadi apply seivathu?
output: Prime Minister's Employment Generation Programme: Manufacturing-ku ₹50 lakh, Service-ku ₹20 lakh varai. Subsidy: General 15-25%, SC/ST/Women 25-35%. Process: 1) www.kviconline.gov.in-la register 2) Business plan submit 3) Bank verification 4) Loan sanction 5) EDP training (mandatory) 6) Disbursement. Age: 18+. Education: 8th pass (₹10 lakh+), any (₹10 lakh varai). District Industries Centre-la help available.

instruction: Tamil Nadu-la BBA/BCA admission eppadi nadakkudhu?
output: +2 any group pass. Govt colleges-ku: TNGASA counselling moolam. Private colleges: Direct application. BBA - Business padippu, BCA - Computer padippu. Duration: 3 years. Govt college fee: ₹3,000-8,000/year. Anna University affiliated colleges pala irukku.

instruction: Tubectomy/Vasectomy - rights enna? Compensation?
output: Rights: 1) Completely voluntary - no forced sterilization, 2) Informed consent mandatory, 3) Cooling-off period before surgery, 4) Minimum age 22 (women), 21 (men). Compensation: TN scheme - cash incentive after surgery. Complications: Government covers treatment, additional compensation. Failure: Pregnancy after sterilization - compensation scheme exists. Never sign blank forms - read consent fully.

instruction: PAN card-la mistake irukku - correct panradhu eppadi?
output: Online: tin-nsdl.com or onlineservices.nsdl.com. Form: Correction form + supporting documents. Fee: Rs.110 (Indian address) / Rs.1,020 (foreign). Documents: ID proof, address proof with correct details. Time: 15-20 days. Status track: UTI/NSDL websites.

instruction: Mattra districts-la Siddha hospital irukkaa?
output: Yes! TN Siddha infrastructure: 1) Government Siddha Medical Colleges - Palayamkottai, Tirunelveli (oldest), 2) District AYUSH hospitals - Every district, 3) Taluk level Siddha dispensaries, 4) PHC attached Siddha units. Major colleges: Tirunelveli, Chennai (2), Palani. All services free. Find: tnhealth.tn.gov.in or AYUSH department website. Total: 100+ government Siddha facilities in TN.

instruction: Consumer case-க்கு fees எவ்வளவு?
output: District Forum: Rs.5 lakh வரை - Nil fee, Rs.5-10 lakh - Rs.200, Rs.10-20 lakh - Rs.400, Rs.20-50 lakh - Rs.1000, Rs.50 lakh-1 crore - Rs.2000. State Commission: Rs.2500-5000. National Commission: Rs.5000. SC/ST/Women-க்கு 50% concession.

instruction: ஒரு பள்ளியிலிருந்து இன்னொரு பள்ளிக்கு TC எப்படி வாங்குவது?
output:
**Transfer Certificate (TC) Process:**

**Step 1: Application**
- பெற்றோர் பள்ளி தலைமையாசிரியரிடம் எழுத்துபூர்வ விண்ணப்பம்
- காரணம் குறிப்பிடவும் (Transfer, Moving, etc.)

**Step 2: Dues Clearance**
- Library books return
- Fees (if any) paid
- ID card return

**Step 3: TC Issue**
- Govt school: 3-7 days
- Private school: 7-15 days
- கட்டணம்: Govt - Free, Private - ₹100-500

**TC-ல் என்ன இருக்கும்:**
- Student name & DOB
- Class studied
- Conduct & Character
- Date of leaving
- Medium of instruction
- Community/Caste

**புதிய பள்ளியில் சேர:**
- Original TC
- Previous marksheets
- Aadhaar
- Community certificate

**TC மறுக்கப்பட்டால்:**
- DEO (District Education Officer) புகார்
- School-க்கு எதிராக action எடுக்கப்படும்

instruction: என் விவசாய நிலத்தை வீட்டு மனையாக மாற்ற என்ன செய்ய வேண்டும்?
output:
**விவசாய நில மாற்றம் (Land Conversion):**

**எங்கே Apply செய்வது:**
- District Collector Office
- Online: eservices.tn.gov.in

**வகைகள்:**
1. **NA Conversion (Non-Agricultural)**
   - விவசாயம் → Residential/Commercial
   
2. **Layout Approval** (பல மனைகள்)
   - DTCP approval தேவை

**தேவையான ஆவணங்கள்:**
- Patta (உங்கள் பெயரில்)
- Chitta & Adangal
- FMB (Field Measurement Book)
- EC (30 years)
- Tax receipts
- Location sketch
- NOC from Agriculture Dept (சில cases)

**கட்டணம்:**
- Conversion fee: Land value-ன் 1-3%
- Market value-ன் 50% stamp duty difference

**Process:**
1. Application submit
2. Revenue Dept verification
3. Agriculture Dept NOC
4. Site inspection
5. Collector approval
6. Patta-ல் land type மாற்றம்

**காலம்:** 2-6 மாதங்கள்

**தடைகள்:**
- Wet land (நஞ்சை) → கடினம்
- Prime agricultural zone → Not allowed
- 2 acre-க்கு மேல் → Special permission

**Penalty (without conversion):**
- Unauthorized construction
- Panchayat action
- Legal issues during sale

instruction: Legal Heir Certificate எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: Apply: Tahsildar office அல்லது eservices.tn.gov.in. Documents: Death certificate, Ration card, ID proofs of all heirs, Affidavit. Field verification நடக்கும். Time: 15-30 days. Fee: Rs.50. Bank account, pension, insurance claim-க்கு அவசியம்.

instruction: Sports-la interest irukku, padippum sports-um combine panna mudiyumaa?
output: Absolutely yes! Benefits: 1) Sports quota admission in colleges 2) Government jobs-la extra marks 3) Scholarships for sportspersons 4) Health and discipline. How: 1) Join school sports team 2) District sports coaching centres - free 3) SAI training 4) Balance: Morning sports, evening study. Careers: Sports quota → College → Job OR Professional sports. Many IAS officers, doctors are sportspersons. Time management key.

instruction: Engineering-ல் 5 arrears இருக்கு. Parents-கிட்ட சொல்ல பயமா இருக்கு. என்ன பண்றது?
output: First: Panic வேண்டாம், solve பண்ணலாம். Steps: 1) Anna University arrear exam schedule check - multiple attempts available 2) Subject-wise weak areas identify 3) Previous year papers - pattern same 4) Senior notes, YouTube tutorials 5) Group study effective. Parents-க்கு: Honest-ஆ சொல்லுங்கள் - support கிடைக்கும். Clearing strategy: Easy subjects first, confidence build. Max arrears allowed: 12 (can continue). Final year placement-க்கு clear பண்ணணும். Time இருக்கு.

instruction: Kaaranam sollaama job-la irundhu remove pannitaanga
output: Wrongful termination: 1) Written explanation demand, 2) Labour Commissioner, 3) Labour Court/Industrial Tribunal. Remedies: Reinstatement, back wages, compensation. Standing Orders: Company rules check pannunga. Workmen vs Manager: Different procedures apply.

instruction: ரேஷன் பொருட்கள் எவ்வளவு கிடைக்கும்? விலை என்ன?
output: Rice card: 20kg free rice per family. Sugar card: 5kg rice at Rs.1/kg. Wheat, sugar, palm oil-ம் subsidized விலையில் கிடைக்கும். Pongal, Diwali-க்கு special items உண்டு.

instruction: [Multi-turn dialogue] Lost Aadhaar and PAN - Recovery Process - Full conversation guide
output:
User: Ennoda purse tholainjuduchu. Aadhaar, PAN card ellam poyiduchu. Enna pannanum?

Assistant: Oh no! Don't worry, recover pannidalam. First few immediate steps:

**Urgently pannunga:**
1. **Bank Cards Block:** Bank helpline-ku call panni ATM/Debit card block pannunga
2. **Aadhaar Biometric Lock:** Misuse thadukka myaadhaar.uidai.gov.in la lock pannunga

**Apram documents recover pannalam.** Purse-la enna ellam irundhuchu?

User: Aadhaar, PAN, ATM card, Driving License irundhuchu. Bank card block pannitten already.

Assistant: Good, bank card block panneeteenga. Now one by one recover pannuvaom:

**1. Aadhaar Card (Easiest - 5 mins):**
- Website: eaadhaar.uidai.gov.in
- Enter: Aadhaar Number (remember pannunga or family member kitta irukka?)
- OTP: Registered mobile-la varum
- Download: e-Aadhaar PDF (Free!)
- Password: First 4 letters of name (CAPS) + Birth Year

Unga Aadhaar number nenaivil irukka?

User: Aadhaar number nenaivil illa. Mobile number register pannirukken but number maathiten recently.

Assistant: Hmm, slight complication but solve pannalam:

**Aadhaar Number Maranthu + Mobile Maariruchu:**

**Option 1: Family Member Check**
- Spouse/Parent Aadhaar-la sometimes linked family details irukku
- Old documents-la Aadhaar copy irukka? (Bank, College, Office)

**Option 2: Aadhaar Enrollment Center**
- Nearest center: uidai.gov.in → Locate Center
- Go with any ID proof (Voter ID, Passport, DL)
- Biometric match pannuvanga
- Mobile update pannalam + Aadhaar retrieve
- Fee: ₹50

**Option 3: myaadhaar.uidai.gov.in**
- "Retrieve Lost UID/EID"
- But needs registered email or mobile

Vera ID proof edhaachu irukka - Voter ID, Passport?

User: Voter ID veetla irukku. DL tholainjuduchu.

Assistant: Perfect! Voter ID irukku na process easy:

**Step 1: Aadhaar Retrieve**
1. Nearest Aadhaar Seva Kendra (ASK) poganum
2. Carry: Voter ID Original
3. Tell: "Aadhaar number retrieve pannanum, mobile update pannanum"
4. Biometric verify pannuvanga
5. New mobile link aagum
6. Aadhaar number kedaikum
7. Fee: ₹50

**Find ASK:** uidai.gov.in → Locate Enrollment Center

**Step 2: After Aadhaar Ready**
- Download e-Aadhaar immediately
- PVC card order: ₹50 (optional)

Voter ID eduthukitu ASK pogalaamaa? Apram PAN and DL paakalam.

User: Okay Aadhaar panniten nu vechukonga. PAN card eppadi?

Assistant: Good! Aadhaar ready na PAN super easy:

**e-PAN Download (Instant & FREE):**
1. Website: eportal.incometax.gov.in
2. Click: "Instant e-PAN"
3. Click: "Check Status / Download e-PAN"
4. Enter: PAN Number... 

**PAN Number Maranthuducha?**

**Know Your PAN:**
1. Same website: eportal.incometax.gov.in
2. "Know Your PAN" option
3. Enter: Name + DOB + Mobile Number
4. OTP verify
5. PAN Number display aagum!

Apram:
- "Instant e-PAN" la download
- Aadhaar OTP verify
- PDF ready - FREE!

PAN number nenaivil irukka?

User: PAN number nenaivila illa, but Aadhaar ready nu vechukonga. Aadhaar irundha PAN kedaikuma?

Assistant: Yes! Aadhaar irundha PAN retrieve pannalam:

**Method 1: Know Your PAN with Aadhaar**
1. eportal.incometax.gov.in
2. "Know Your PAN"
3. Enter: Full Name (as in PAN) + DOB + Registered Mobile
4. OTP
5. PAN display

**Method 2: If PAN-Aadhaar Linked**
1. Same portal
2. "Link Aadhaar Status"
3. Enter Aadhaar number
4. If linked, PAN number display aagum!

**Method 3: Form 49A (if above fail)**
- onlineservices.nsdl.com
- "Reprint of PAN Card"
- Enter details
- ₹50 fee
- Physical card varum

Try pannunga - most likely Method 1 or 2 work aagum. Driving License paaklamaa?

User: Okay try panren. DL eppadi recover pannuvadhu?

Assistant: **Duplicate Driving License:**

**Online Process:**
1. Website: parivahan.gov.in
2. Online Services → Tamil Nadu
3. "Duplicate Driving License"
4. Enter: DL Number (nenaivil irukka?)

**DL Number Maranthuducha?**
- parivahan.gov.in → "Know Your DL Number"
- Enter: Name + DOB + Mobile
- DL details varum

**Documents Upload:**
- Aadhaar Card
- Address Proof
- FIR Copy (Optional but recommended)
- Passport Photo

**Fee:** ₹200-500

**RTO Visit:**
- Online apply panna apram
- Slot book pannunga
- Document verification
- Photo capture
- Duplicate DL issue (Smart Card by post)

**Time:** 7-15 days

**Tip:** FIR file pannunga (online: eservices.tnpolice.gov.in) - future-ku safe, plus some RTOs ask for it.

Vera documents tholainjucha?

User: Illa, idhu dhan. Summary solunga please

Assistant: **Complete Recovery Summary:**

**1. Aadhaar Card**
- ASK visit with Voter ID
- Biometric verify + Mobile update
- Fee: ₹50
- Then: eaadhaar.uidai.gov.in la download (FREE)

**2. PAN Card**
- eportal.incometax.gov.in
- "Know Your PAN" → Retrieve number
- "Instant e-PAN" → Download (FREE)
- Physical card: ₹50 (optional)

**3. Driving License**
- parivahan.gov.in
- "Know Your DL" → Get number
- "Duplicate DL" → Apply
- Fee: ₹200-500
- RTO visit for verification
- Time: 7-15 days

**Bonus Tips:**
1. FIR file pannunga for records
2. DigiLocker app use pannunga - all documents digital-la safe
3. Aadhaar biometric lock pannunga until new cards varum

**Priority Order:** Aadhaar first → PAN → DL

All the best! Vendum na ask pannunga.

instruction: Telegram group la join aanaen - 'Like YouTube videos, earn 50 per like, daily 500-1000 possible.' Initial la payment vandhudhu, now 'premium task ku 5000 invest' nu solraanga.
output: Classic task scam - initial payments hook you. Premium investment ku endless demands varum - 'withdraw ku more invest pannu.' Students thousands lose pannuraanga. STOP NOW - don't invest more. Already paid aa - recovery very difficult.

instruction: Will eppadi ezhuthuvathu? Register pannanuumaa?
output: Will writing: Clear language, all properties list, beneficiaries name, date, signature, 2 witnesses signature. Registration kattaayam illa but recommended - disputes avoid. Registered will Sub-Registrar office-la safe custody-la irukum.

instruction: Lok Adalat என்றால் என்ன?
output: Alternative dispute resolution forum - Court fee இல்லை, compromise மூலம் settlement. Motor accident claims, labour disputes, matrimonial (except divorce), cheque bounce, compoundable offences - இவற்றை handle செய்வார்கள். Award final - appeal இல்லை.

instruction: Chief Minister's Girl Child Protection Scheme endraal enna?
output: Girl child protection + savings. Amount: ₹50,000 deposit (by Govt). Types: Scheme 1 - Single girl child family, Scheme 2 - Two girl children family. Eligibility: Poor family, parents below 35 years, family planning operation done. Benefit: ₹1 lakh+ maturity at 18, for higher education/marriage. Apply: ICDS/Taluk office.

instruction: Child custody order maatra mudiyumaa?
output: Aama, circumstances maarinaal. Modification petition file pannalam. Grounds: Custodial parent neglect, child's preference change, better opportunity with other parent, relocation. Court child's welfare basis-la decide seyyum.

instruction: 'Ondre kulam oruvane devan' - idhoda artham enna?
output: 'Ondre kulam oruvane devan'. Artham: Ella manithargalum ore kulam - jaadhi bedham illai. Kadavulum oruvare - ella madhangalum ore unmayai solkindrana. 2000 varudangalukkku munnbae jaadhi ozhippu, madha nallinakkam pesiya progressive thinker Thirumoolar!

instruction: TNPSC Group 4 Exam-க்கு எப்படி prepare செய்வது?
output:
**TNPSC Group 4 Preparation:**

**Eligibility:**
- Age: 18-32 (Relaxation for reserved)
- Education: SSLC (10th) pass
- Any stream accepted

**Exam Pattern:**

| Section | Questions | Marks |
|---------|-----------|-------|
| GK & Current Affairs | 50 | 150 |
| Tamil | 50 | 150 |
| **Total** | **100** | **300** |

- Duration: 3 hours
- Negative Marking: 1/3 for wrong answer
- Mode: OMR based

**Syllabus:**

**GK Section:**
1. History (India + TN)
2. Geography (India + TN)
3. Indian Polity
4. Indian Economy
5. Science (Physics, Chemistry, Biology)
6. Current Affairs

**Tamil Section:**
1. இலக்கணம் (Grammar)
2. இலக்கியம் (Literature)
3. தமிழ் பொது அறிவு
4. ஆங்கிலம் → தமிழ் மொழிபெயர்ப்பு

**Books:**

**Tamil:**
| Book | Publisher |
|------|----------|
| 6th-12th Tamil Textbooks | TN Govt |
| Pothu Tamil | Sura/Sakthi |
| Tamil Grammar | Agni/Tamilcube |

**GK:**
| Subject | Book |
|---------|------|
| History | 6th-12th NCERT + TN Books |
| Geography | 6th-12th NCERT + TN |
| Polity | Lakshmikant + TN Books |
| Science | 6th-10th Science Books |
| Current Affairs | Tamil Hindu, Monthly magazines |

**Preparation Plan (6 months):**

| Month | Focus |
|-------|-------|
| 1-2 | Basics from textbooks |
| 3-4 | Subject-wise deep study |
| 5 | Revision + Practice |
| 6 | Mock tests + Current Affairs |

**Tips:**
1. Tamil medium students advantage!
2. Read Tamil newspapers daily
3. 10th books = 60% syllabus covered
4. Focus on TN-specific content
5. Solve previous 10 years papers

instruction: Pudhiya PAN Card eppadi peruvadhu?
output: Online application: 1. NSDL: onlineservices.nsdl.com 2. UTIITSL: pan.utiitsl.com 3. e-Filing Portal (Instant e-PAN): eportal.incometax.gov.in (Aadhaar based - FREE!). Documents needed: ID Proof (Aadhaar/Voter ID/Passport), Address Proof, DOB Proof, Photo & Signature. Fee: Physical PAN ₹107 (India), e-PAN Free. Time: 15-20 days (Physical), Instant (e-PAN)

instruction: Internal assessment marks improve பண்றது எப்படி?
output: Internal marks strategy: 1) Attendance - 75% minimum, aim 90% 2) Assignment submit on time - presentation matters 3) Class participation - ask questions, answer 4) Lab records neat and complete 5) Internal tests - prepare like semester 6) Project work - original effort show 7) Behavior with faculty - respectful interaction. Impact: 20-25% of total marks. Easy marks if consistent throughout semester.

instruction: RC transfer எப்படி செய்வது?
output: Vehicle sale-க்குப் பிறகு: 1) Form 29, 30 fill, 2) Both buyer & seller sign, 3) NOC from financer (if loan), 4) Insurance transfer, 5) RTO submit + fee pay. Time: 30 days-க்குள். Delay: Fine + legal issues. Online: parivahan.gov.in partially available.

instruction: PF withdrawal எப்படி செய்வது?
output: Online: EPFO portal → Online Services → Claim. Conditions: Retirement (58 years), 2 months unemployment, medical emergency (partial), home loan (partial), marriage (partial). Full withdrawal: Job quit + 2 months gap. Aadhaar linked UAN வேணும். 5-10 days-ல் amount வரும்.

instruction: Siddha doctor qualification enna? Verify eppadi?
output: Qualification: BSMS (Bachelor of Siddha Medicine and Surgery) - 5.5 years. Higher: MD (Siddha). Registration: State Medical Council mandatory. Verify: 1) TN Siddha Medical Council register, 2) Display of registration certificate, 3) BSMS degree certificate. Unqualified practice: Report to council, police. Titles: Siddha Maruthuvam, Vaidhiyar - verify registration before consulting.

instruction: NRI property sell seyya POA kodukkalaama?
output: Aama, aanaal Special Power of Attorney (SPA) irukkanum - specific property, specific purpose mention aaganum. Indian Embassy/Consulate-la notarize + apostille venum. GPA alone not sufficient. SPA registration recommended.

instruction: Primary Health Centre (PHC) endraal enna? Enna services kidaikkum?
output: PHC = Village/block level government health facility. Free services: 1) Basic consultation, 2) Common illness treatment, 3) Maternal care, 4) Child immunization, 5) Family planning, 6) Minor wound dressing, 7) Basic lab tests, 8) Medicine dispensing, 9) Health education. Timings: Usually 9 AM - 4 PM. Staff: Doctor, nurse, pharmacist, lab technician. Referral: To CHC/District Hospital if needed.

instruction: Siddha treatment-la enna vagaigal ullana?
output: Treatment types: 1) Internal medicines - Choornam (powder), Lehyam (paste), Kasayam (decoction), Thailam (oil), Maathirai (pills), 2) External - Pattru (poultice), Ottradam (fomentation), Nasiyam (nasal), Kattu (bandage), 3) Surgical - Siddha surgery, 4) Special therapies - Thokkanam (massage), Varmam, Yoga. Panchagavya: Cow products based. Kayakalpa: Rejuvenation therapy.

instruction: E-challan pay எப்படி செய்வது?
output: Online: echallan.parivahan.gov.in அல்லது TN Traffic Police app. Enter: Vehicle number/Challan number. Payment: Net banking, UPI, credit/debit card. Offline: Traffic police station, court. Non-payment: License suspension, vehicle seizure possible.

instruction: WhatsApp message 'TCS requires your old employee data for tax compliance. Fill this form with PAN, previous salary details.' Munna TCS la work pannen, compliance ku genuine aa?
output: Ex-employers contact through official HR email, not WhatsApp. TCS has Form 16 data, doesn't need you to fill forms. This is PAN/financial data harvesting. If genuinely needed, visit TCS HR portal or call official numbers.

instruction: En paiyan 10th padikkiran. Future planning eppadi panrathu? Wrong decision edukka koodaadhu?
output: Balanced approach: 1) Child's interest observe pannunga - Science/Arts/Sports 2) Aptitude test - free online available 3) Career counselling - school/district level 4) Multiple options explore - don't fix one path early 5) Financial planning start - education costs rising. Avoid: 1) Forcing your dreams on child 2) Neighbour's child comparison 3) One exam = end of world mentality. Support: Encourage exploration, failure tolerance, self-discovery. Best investment = supportive environment. Trust your child!

instruction: Multiple subjects eppadi manage panrathu?
output: Multi-subject strategy: 1) Timetable with specific slots 2) Alternate between easy/hard subjects 3) Active recall - test yourself 4) Spaced repetition - revise at intervals 5) Priority: Weak subjects more time 6) Daily targets: 2-3 subjects 7) Weekly review all subjects 8) Morning: Fresh topics, Evening: Revision 9) Sunday: Full revision + mock test 10) Track progress in journal. Don't study one subject for 5+ hours continuously - brain needs variety.

instruction: GST Registration எப்போது கட்டாயம்?
output: Goods (intra-state): ₹40 lakh+ turnover. Services: ₹20 lakh+. E-commerce sellers: ₹0 - mandatory from first sale! Inter-state supply: Mandatory regardless of turnover. Register FREE at gst.gov.in with PAN, Aadhaar, address proof, bank details.

instruction: Trademark register பண்றது எப்படி?
output: Online: ipindia.gov.in. Classes: 45 different classes (goods/services). Search first: TM search portal. Fee: Rs.4,500-9,000. Process: Application → Examination → Publication → Opposition period (4 months) → Registration. Protection: 10 years, renewable.

instruction: ITI admission-ku enna thaguthi thevai?
output: Eligibility varies by trade: 1) Engineering trades (Electrician, Fitter) - 10th pass 2) Non-engineering trades (Welder, Painter) - 8th pass. Age: 14-40 years. Apply: www.skilltraining.tn.gov.in. Selection: 10th/8th marks basis. No entrance exam. Documents: TC, marks card, community certificate, Aadhaar. Government ITI-la seats limited, apply early.

instruction: Defence personnel children-ku PM Scholarship scheme enna?
output: PM's Scholarship Scheme for RPF/CAPF/Assam Rifles: Professional degree courses-ku. Amount: Boys - ₹2,500/month (₹30,000/year), Girls - ₹3,000/month (₹36,000/year). Duration: Full course. Eligibility: Children of serving/retired/deceased personnel. Apply: www.ksb.gov.in (Kendriya Sainik Board). Separate scheme for Ex-servicemen through Ministry of Defence - ₹5,000/month.

instruction: Naan siru vivasaayi. Organic vivasaayam seiyya virumburen. Enna udhavi kidaikkum?
output:
Organic vivasaayathukku pala thittangal ullana:

1. **PKVY Scheme**
   - Help: ₹50,000/hectare (3 years)
   - Cluster basis (50 farmers)
   - Where: District Agriculture Officer

2. **PGS Certification (Free)**
   - pgsindia-ncof.gov.in
   - Apply as group

3. **TN Organic Farming Policy**
   - Vermicompost unit: 50% subsidy
   - Bio-fertilizer: Free
   - Where: Block Agriculture Office

4. **Training**
   - KVK - Free training
   - TNAU - Certificate courses

5. **Market Support**
   - Organic Mandi through e-NAM
   - Direct sale allowed

instruction: Hostel mess sappaadu othhuvarala. Enna panrathu?
output: Solutions: 1) Initially stomach upset common - adjust period 2) Mess committee-la complaint raise 3) Healthy snacks keep - fruits, biscuits 4) Weekend home food bring 5) Nearby canteen/restaurants (budget friendly) 6) Cooking allowed rooms-la simple items prepare 7) Mess rebate apply if eating outside regularly. Health: Don't skip meals, drink boiled water, maintain hygiene.

instruction: Medical negligence-kku consumer court-la case podalaamaa?
output: Aama. Doctors, hospitals ellam 'service provider' category-la varum. Wrong diagnosis, treatment failure, surgery complications, hospital infection - ellaathukkum case podalam. Aanaal 'bonafide mistake'-kkum 'negligence'-kkum vithiyaasam prove pannanum.

instruction: Tamil Nadu-la Polytechnic Diploma admission eppadi?
output: 10th pass-ku aprom seralaam. DOTE counselling: 1) www.tndte.gov.in-la apply 2) 10th marks basis rank 3) Online choice filling 4) College allotment. Duration: 3 years. Govt college fee: ₹1,500-3,000/year. Engineering 2nd year-ku lateral entry possible.

instruction: PAN-Aadhaar Link eppadi seyvadhu?
output: Online: eportal.incometax.gov.in → Link Aadhaar → Enter PAN and Aadhaar → OTP verify → Pay ₹1,000 late fee. SMS method: Send 'UIDPAN <Aadhaar> <PAN>' to 567678. MANDATORY - unlinked PAN becomes inoperative!

instruction: PM Kisan la irundhu call vandhirukkappa - '6000 eligible, registration fee 200 pay pannungappa, Aadhaar sollunga' nu. Naan farmer dhaanappa, genuine aappa?
output: Government scheme ku fee illaappa! PM-KISAN registration free - pmkisan.gov.in la pannalam. Aadhaar kuduthaa AEPS fraud panniruvaangappa, bank account la irundhu kaasu pogumappa. Kumbakonam, Papanasam la farmers ipdi maatikirukkanga. Village office la apply pannungappa.

instruction: Cancer treatment-க்கு government support இருக்கா?
output: Yes! Multiple supports: 1) CMCHIS - cancer treatment covered (Rs.5 lakh), 2) Government cancer hospitals - free/subsidized, 3) PM-JAY for eligible, 4) State Cancer Institute (Adyar) - subsidized, 5) CM's Relief Fund - apply for additional support. Free screening: Breast, cervical cancer at PHCs. Support: Transport allowance, free medicines (chemo). Apply: Hospital social worker will help with paperwork.

instruction: Scholarship panam eppo varum-pa? Check panna mudiyuma?
output: NSP portal-la login pannu/pannunga, status paaru/paarunga. PFMS site-layum payment track pannalam. 2-3 months edukkum normally. Reject aanaa defect list check pannu/pannunga.

instruction: Project/Thesis work eppadi approach panrathu?
output: Project success: 1) Choose topic early - guide consultation 2) Literature review first - Google Scholar, journals 3) Weekly meetings with guide - progress show 4) Documentation parallel - don't wait till end 5) Plagiarism check - Turnitin/iThenticate 6) Presentation practice - viva preparation 7) Backup data - multiple locations 8) Deadline buffer - submit before last day. Tip: Original contribution expected, not just copy. Industry internship projects valuable.

instruction: தமிழக அரசின் merit scholarship எப்படி கிடைக்கும்?
output: CM's Merit Scholarship: 10th, 12th-ல் அதிக மதிப்பெண் பெற்றவர்களுக்கு. Amount: ₹5,000-10,000 one-time. Eligibility: State topper, district topper, subject topper. Selection: Board exam results அடிப்படையில் automatic. Higher education scholarship: ₹25,000-50,000 for state rank holders in entrance exams (NEET, JEE). Apply through School Education Department.

instruction: RTI reply எத்தனை நாளில் கிடைக்கும்?
output: Normal: 30 days. Life/liberty matter: 48 hours. Third party information: 40 days. Transfer to other department: 35 days (5 days transfer + 30 days). Reply இல்லாவிட்டால் deemed refusal - First Appeal போடலாம்.

instruction: No Claim Bonus (NCB) endraal enna?
output: Claim illaatha ovvoru varushamum premium discount. 1st year: 20%, 2nd: 25%, 3rd: 35%, 4th: 45%, 5th+: 50%. NCB transfer: Old vehicle sell pannum bodhu new vehicle-kku transfer aagum. Claim panninaal NCB reset.

instruction: MUDRA Loan eppadi vaanguvadhu? Enna documents vendum?
output:
Loan Types:
- Shishu: Up to ₹50,000 (Start small business)
- Kishore: ₹50,001 - ₹5 lakh (Expand business)
- Tarun: ₹5 - ₹10 lakh (Big expansion)

Eligibility: 18+ age, Indian citizen, Business plan ready, No collateral needed!

Documents:
1. Aadhaar + PAN
2. Address Proof
3. Business plan / Project report
4. Quotations (machines, equipment)
5. 2 passport photos
6. Bank statement (6 months - existing business)
7. ITR (if available)

Apply:

Method 1 - Bank:
1. Nearest bank branch pogga
2. MUDRA loan enquire
3. Application form fill
4. Documents submit
5. Bank verification
6. Sanction (7-15 days)

Method 2 - Online:
- mudra.org.in
- Udyamimitra.in (SIDBI)
- psbloansin59minutes.com (existing businesses)

Interest: 8-12% (bank discretion)

Rejection reasons: Poor CIBIL (< 650), Incomplete docs, Weak business plan, Existing default

instruction: Bail reject ஆனால் என்ன செய்வது?
output: Appeal options: Lower court reject → Sessions Court. Sessions reject → High Court. High Court reject → Supreme Court. Fresh application: New grounds/changed circumstances இருந்தால் same court-லேயே fresh petition போடலாம். Legal aid available.

instruction: 12th Board Exam-க்கு எப்படி centum வாங்குவது?
output:
**12th Board Exam - Centum Strategy:**

**6 Months Plan:**

**Months 1-2: Foundation**
- Complete syllabus first reading
- NCERT/State Board textbooks only
- Notes prepare (own handwriting best)
- Formula sheets create

**Months 3-4: Deep Learning**
- Chapter-wise thorough study
- Important questions identify
- Diagrams practice (Bio, Physics)
- Numericals practice (Maths, Physics, Chemistry)

**Months 5: Revision + Practice**
- Previous 10 years papers solve
- Model papers practice
- Time-bound tests
- Weak areas focus

**Month 6: Final Prep**
- Quick revision
- Formula revision daily
- Full-length mock exams
- Exam hall practice

**Subject-wise Tips:**

**Physics:**
- Numericals daily practice
- Derivations memorize
- Diagrams neat drawing

**Chemistry:**
- Equations balance
- Named reactions list
- Organic mechanisms

**Maths:**
- 30 problems/day minimum
- All example problems redo
- Previous paper patterns

**Biology:**
- Diagrams labeled neatly
- Flow charts for processes
- Definitions exact

**General Tips:**
1. Wake up early (5 AM study effective)
2. Take breaks (Pomodoro technique)
3. Sleep 7 hours minimum
4. No new topics in last week
5. Presentation matters - neat writing

**Free Resources:**
- Kalvi TV
- DIKSHA App
- YouTube channels
- Previous papers: dge.tn.gov.in

instruction: Insulin storage எப்படி? Travel-ல் carry பண்ணலாமா?
output: Storage: Refrigerator (2-8°C), not freezer. In-use vial: Room temperature okay for 28 days (most). Travel: 1) Carry in hand luggage (flight), 2) Cooling pouch for long journeys, 3) Doctor letter for security check, 4) Carry extra supply. Signs of spoilage: Discoloration, particles, frosted appearance. Airport: Insulin + syringes allowed with prescription letter.

instruction: WhatsApp message 'BOCW card renewal urgent. Pay 500 online or benefits stopped.' BOCW card irukku, renew pannalama?
output: BOCW renewal through labour department office - nominal government fees. Benefits don't stop immediately - grace period exists. Never pay through WhatsApp links. Visit district labour welfare office for genuine renewal process.

instruction: Overtime pay evvalavu kodukkanum?
output: Factories Act: Normal working hours = 8 hours/day, 48 hours/week. Overtime = Double wages (2x normal rate). Maximum overtime: 50 hours/quarter. Overtime refuse pannalam (reasonable grounds). Forced overtime illegal.

instruction: Owner veettu lock udaichu saamaan veliye pottaar - enna seivathu?
output: Idhu serious criminal offence - house trespass, criminal intimidation, theft aagum. Udanadi: 1) Police-la FIR podunga (IPC 448, 441), 2) Magistrate Court-la complaint, 3) Civil Court-la damages claim seyyalam. Photos, videos evidence-aa vaichukonga.

instruction: B.Ed admission Tamil Nadu-la eppadi nadakkudhu?
output: Eligibility: Any degree 50% marks (SC/ST/OBC 45%). Steps: 1) TNTEU announcement 2) Online application 3) Merit-based counselling 4) College allotment. Govt college fee: ₹4,000-10,000/year. Duration: 2 years.

instruction: Chennai-la free coaching centres enge irukku?
output: Free coaching Chennai: 1) Government Free Coaching Centre - Nungambakkam (UPSC, TNPSC) 2) Adi Dravidar Welfare coaching - Saidapet 3) BC/MBC coaching - Egmore 4) IAS Academy free batches - Anna Salai 5) Employment Exchange coaching - various locations. Apply: Respective department websites. Selection: Merit + income based. Also: Marina Library study hall, Connemara Library resources free.

instruction: PMKVY (Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojana) scheme என்ன?
output: Central Government skill scheme. Features: 1) Free training - 200+ job roles 2) Certification - NSDC recognized 3) ₹500-2,000 reward on certification 4) Placement support 5) Recognition of Prior Learning (RPL) - existing skills-க்கு certificate. Duration: 150-300 hours. Training centers: Skill India centres across TN. Register: www.pmkvyofficial.org. Age: 15-45 years. 10th pass preferred.

instruction: Right to be forgotten endraal enna?
output: Online-la ulla personal information delete seyya request pannum right. DPDP Act 2023-la provision undu. Google search results remove: Google legal removal request. Social media: Platform privacy settings. Court orders moolamum removal possible.

instruction: Senior citizen-ai pillaigal paarkala, maintenance ketkalaamaa?
output: Maintenance and Welfare of Parents and Senior Citizens Act 2007: 1) Children/relatives maintenance taranum, 2) Tribunal: SDM/Collector level, 3) Max: Rs.10,000/month per child, 4) Non-compliance: 1 month jail + fine.
