Property transfer-kku pin neglect: Transfer cancel pannalam. Free legal aid: District Legal Services Authority. Helpline: 14567 (Elder helpline).

instruction: Thirukkuralai dhinasari vaazhkaiyil eppadi payanpaduththalam?
output: 1) Kaalai oru kural padikkalam - motivation kidaikkum, 2) Prachananai varum bodhu sambandhapattta adhigaarathai padikkalam, 3) Kuzhanthaigalukkku ovvoru naalum oru kural katrukodukalam, 4) Office-la decision edukkum bodhu Porutpaal kuralgal udhavum, 5) Thirukkural apps download seiyalam - Tamil, English explanation kidaikkum.

instruction: ATM-la panam poachu aana account-la debit aachu, enna seivathu?
output: Steps: 1) Udane bank-kku call pannunga (customer care), 2) Written complaint kodunga - transaction ID mention pannunga, 3) RBI rule: Bank 5 days-kkul refund pannanum, 4) Delay aanaal: Rs.100/day compensation, 5) Resolve aagala = Banking Ombudsman complaint. Evidence: Transaction SMS, mini statement vachukonga.

instruction: ATM la irundhen, oru paiyan 'Ayya, UPI use pannunga easy aa irukkum, naan help pannuren setup panna' nu sonnaan. Phone eduthu enna enna yo pannaan. Aprom account la kaasu kammi.
output: Aiyayo ayya! Stranger kitta phone kudukkaadhu! UPI setup nu solli unga phone access vaangirukkan - PIN paathiruppan or transaction panniruppan. Bank ku poi complaint pannunga, police la FIR pannunga. ATM/bank la staff help only vaangunga, random people illa.

instruction: Community Certificate eppadi peruvadhu?
output: Apply at tneservices.tn.gov.in or Taluk Office. Documents: Parent's community certificate, school TC, Aadhaar, address proof. VAO verification, RI check, Tahsildar approval. Time: 15-30 days. Fee: ₹25-50. Essential for reservation benefits.

instruction: Stroke symptoms என்ன? FAST என்றால் என்ன?
output: FAST test: F - Face drooping (one side), A - Arm weakness (can't raise one arm), S - Speech difficulty (slurred), T - Time to call emergency. Other symptoms: Sudden confusion, vision problem, severe headache, walking difficulty. Action: 1) Call 108, 2) Note time symptoms started (important for treatment), 3) Don't give food/water (swallowing problem possible). Window: 3-4.5 hours for clot-busting treatment.

instruction: Online degree programs தமிழ்நாட்டில் எங்கே கிடைக்கும்?
output: UGC-approved online programs: 1) SWAYAM platform (free courses) 2) NPTEL (IIT courses) 3) Anna University online 4) Madras University online 5) Private universities (Amity, Manipal online). SWAYAM courses-க்கு credit transfer possible. MOOCs certificate-க்கு மதிப்பு அதிகரித்துள்ளது. Coursera, edX courses-ஐயும் பயன்படுத்தலாம்.

instruction: Ayurveda-படி என்ன food combinations avoid பண்ணணும்?
output: Viruddha Ahara (incompatible foods): 1) Milk + fruit (except banana, mango), 2) Milk + fish/meat, 3) Honey + hot water, 4) Curd at night, 5) Cold water after meals, 6) Fruit after meals (eat separately), 7) Milk + sour foods. Why: Causes Ama (toxins), indigestion, diseases. Good combinations: Rice + dal, bread + vegetables. Rule: Eat warm, freshly cooked food. Avoid: Refrigerated/reheated food regularly.

instruction: Ragging face panren. Enna seiyanum?
output: Immediate action: 1) Don't comply with unreasonable demands 2) Note names, time, place 3) Report to Anti-Ragging Committee (every college has) 4) Online complaint: www.antiragging.in 5) Helpline: 1800-180-5522 (toll-free) 6) College principal/warden 7) Police if physical harm 8) UGC complaint portal. Protection: Your identity can be kept confidential. Punishment: Expulsion, criminal case against raggers. Don't suffer silently!

instruction: Sports quota scholarship தமிழ்நாட்டில் உள்ளதா?
output: Sports Development Authority of TN (SDAT) Scholarships: 1) State level players - ₹10,000-25,000/ஆண்டு 2) National level - ₹25,000-50,000 3) International level - ₹1-5 lakh 4) Olympic participants - special pension. College admission: 5% sports quota. Free coaching, equipment, diet allowance. Apply: www.sfrtn.tn.gov.in. Sports certificate from recognized association தேவை.

instruction: Insurance claim reject ஆனால் என்ன செய்வது?
output: Rejection reasons: 1) Pre-existing disease (waiting period), 2) Excluded treatment, 3) Document missing, 4) Non-network hospital, 5) Fraud suspected. Appeal: 1) Written grievance to insurer (30 days), 2) IRDAI IGMS portal, 3) Insurance Ombudsman (free, up to Rs.30 lakhs), 4) Consumer Forum. Success tip: Get rejection reason in writing, provide complete documents, cite policy terms.

instruction: Online-ல் medicine order பண்ணலாமா? Legal-ஆ?
output: Legal with conditions. Rules: 1) Prescription medicines - must upload valid prescription, 2) Pharmacy must be licensed, 3) Schedule X (narcotics) - cannot be sold online. Platforms: Pharmeasy, 1mg, Netmeds, Apollo Pharmacy (licensed). Verify: Check if platform has Drug License. Benefits: Convenience, price comparison, home delivery. Caution: Verify medicine authenticity on receipt.

instruction: e-NAM endraal enna? Eppadi payanadaivadhu?
output: Electronic National Agriculture Market. Online trading platform - sell across India. Benefit: Better prices, fewer middlemen, transparent bidding. Register: enam.gov.in, nearby e-NAM mandi. Process: Produce → Quality testing → Online auction → Highest bidder wins → Payment to bank. In TN: UZHAVAR SANDHAIS connected. Quality Parameters: Grade based on moisture, foreign matter, damaged grains.

instruction: Amma Baby Care Kit என்றால் என்ன?
output: புதிதாக பிறந்த குழந்தைக்கு இலவச Kit. Value: ₹5,000+. Contents: Baby clothes (6 sets), Mosquito net, Baby bed, Towels, Diapers, Baby oil/soap/powder, Blanket, Toys. தகுதி: Govt hospital delivery, Dr. Muthulakshmi scheme beneficiary. Given: Hospital-லேயே discharge போது கொடுப்பார்கள். Documents: MCP card, Delivery details.

instruction: Madurai region-ல் top engineering colleges எவை?
output: Top engineering colleges Madurai region: 1) Thiagarajar College of Engineering (TCE) - Autonomous, top ranked 2) Government College of Engineering Tirunelveli 3) National Engineering College Kovilpatti 4) Mepco Schlenk Madurai 5) PSNA College of Engineering Dindigul. Eligibility: Certificate of Vending/Letter of Recommendation, Name in Urban Local Body survey. Apply: pmsvanidhi.mohua.gov.in

instruction: Abortion refuse panraanga (unmarried) - rights?
output: Illegal to refuse! MTP Act 2021: Explicitly includes unmarried women. If refused: 1) Ask for written reason, 2) Escalate to hospital administration, 3) Complaint to DHS, 4) Court (urgent petition). Marital status: Not relevant for abortion right. Judgment questions: Doctor should not morally judge. Alternative: Find another approved centre. Time sensitive: Don't delay - gestational limits apply.

instruction: Wrongful termination-க்கு என்ன செய்யலாம்?
output: Options: 1) Labour Commissioner complaint, 2) Labour Court (Industrial Disputes Act), 3) Civil Court. Remedies: Reinstatement, back wages, compensation. Document everything: Termination letter, emails, performance records. Time limit: 3 years from termination date.

instruction: Thevaram endraal enna? Yaar paadinaargal?
output: Thevaram - Saiva bhakthi ilakkiyam. Moovar endru azhaikkapadum moondru Nayanmaargal paadiyathu: 1) Thirugnana Sambandhar - mudhal moondru Thirumuraigal, 2) Thirunavukkarasar (Appar) - 4, 5, 6 Thirumuraigal, 3) Sundarar - 7-vadhu Thirumurai. instruction: Online-la oru ponnu friend aanaanga, ippo hospital bill-ku panam vennum-nu solraanga
output: Romance scam ithu. Photo vera yaar-dhu-o irukkum. Video call refuse pannaanga-na confirm scam. Online stranger-ku panam anuppaadheenga.

instruction: Coaching இல்லாமல் JEE crack பண்ண முடியுமா?
output: Possible but challenging. Self-study success factors: 1) Strong self-discipline 2) Proper study plan 3) Quality resources - YouTube (Physics Wallah, Unacademy free), NPTEL 4) Regular mock tests 5) Doubt clearing - online forums, Telegram groups. Advantages: Own pace, cost saving. Challenges: Motivation, structured approach, peer competition. Hybrid approach: Free online + self-study works well. Many toppers are self-study students.

instruction: Natural = Safe enbadhu correct-aa?
output: NOT always! Natural doesn't mean: 1) No side effects (many herbs have), 2) No interactions (herb-drug interactions real), 3) Safe for everyone (allergies, conditions), 4) Any amount is okay (overdose possible). Examples: 1) Neem - excess can harm liver, 2) Turmeric - blood thinner interaction, 3) Aloe - not for pregnant, 4) Some herbs toxic in large doses. Safe approach: 1) Moderate amounts, 2) Inform doctors, 3) Buy quality products, 4) Watch for reactions.

instruction: Shirodhara therapy enna? Benefits enna?
output: Shirodhara = Continuous pouring of medicated oil/buttermilk on forehead. Duration: 30-60 minutes per session. Benefits: 1) Stress relief, 2) Anxiety, depression, 3) Insomnia, 4) Headaches/migraines, 5) Hair problems, 6) Memory improvement. Types: Thaila dhara (oil), Takra dhara (buttermilk), Kashaya dhara (decoction). Sessions: 7-14 days typically. Where: Ayurveda centers, some wellness spas (verify authenticity).

instruction: Carnatic isai endraal enna?
output: Carnatic isai - South Indian classical music. Features: 1) Raagam - melody framework, 2) Thaalam - rhythm, 3) Keerthanai - composition. Thrithuvam (Trinity) - Thyagaraja, Muthuswamy Dikshitar, Syama Sastri - 18th-19th century-la isaiyai valarththavargal. Instruments: Veenai, Mridangam, Violin, Pullanguzhal. Chennai December Season - world's largest music festival. Tamil Nadu-oda pride!

instruction: TN-la vithai/uram subsidy eppadi peruvadhu?
output: Subsidized seeds/fertilizers for farmers. Seed Subsidy: 50% discount on certified seeds, buy at Agriculture dept office. Fertilizer Subsidy: Urea, DAP, MOP at subsidized prices. UZHAVAN Card: Track subsidy, check eligibility. Distribution: Co-operative societies, Agri office. Documents: Patta, Farmer ID, Aadhaar. Season: Announced before sowing season.

instruction: Social media-ல் abuse/threat வந்தால் என்ன செய்வது?
output: Steps: 1) Screenshot எடுங்க (URL visible-ஆ), 2) Report to platform, 3) Cyber Crime portal-ல் complaint, 4) Women-க்கு 181 helpline. Applicable laws: IT Act 66A (struck down), 67 (obscene content), IPC 506 (criminal intimidation), 509 (insult to modesty).

instruction: Law padikka enna entrance exam ezhudanum?

instruction: Delivery-la mother/baby-kku injury - claim pannalaamaa?
output: Yes, if negligence proved. Common claims: 1) Delayed C-section causing brain damage, 2) Birth injuries (brachial plexus), 3) Maternal death due to PPH mismanagement, 4) Infection, 5) Wrong forceps use. Proof: Partograph (labor record), CTG (fetal monitoring), timelines. Child injury: Long-term care compensation. Maternal death: Family claims. Time sensitive: Evidence deteriorates - act quickly.

instruction: NABH accreditation என்றால் என்ன? Important-ஆ?
output: NABH = National Accreditation Board for Hospitals. Means: Hospital meets quality standards in - patient safety, infection control, infrastructure, staff qualifications, processes. Benefits: 1) Quality assurance, 2) Insurance companies prefer NABH hospitals, 3) CGHS/ECHS empanelment, 4) Patient safety protocols. Levels: Entry level, Progressive, Full accreditation. Check: nabh.co website for list.

instruction: MRP-ஐ விட அதிகமாக விற்றால் என்ன செய்யலாம்?
output: MRP-க்கு மேல் விற்பது illegal (Legal Metrology Act). Complaint: 1) Legal Metrology Department (District level), 2) Consumer helpline 1800-11-4000, 3) Consumer forum. Seller-க்கு fine up to Rs.25,000 first offence, Rs.50,000 repeat offence.

instruction: TN Ration Kadai-la enna items kidaikkum?
output: TN PDS items list. Rice Card: 20 kg free rice/family. Sugar Card: 5 kg rice at ₹1/kg. Common: Sugar 1.5 kg (₹13.50), Wheat/Atta 2 kg (₹7), Palm Oil 500ml (₹27), Daal 1 kg (₹28). Specials: Pongal - 1 kg sugar free + cash; Diwali - 1 kg sugar free; Ramzan - dates + cash for Muslims. Eligibility: Based on ration card type. Shop: Monthly distribution, SMS alert.

instruction: Job offer vandhudhu abroad-ku, visa-vum ticket-um free, agent fee 1 lakh matum

instruction: TNPSC Group 1/2/4 - என்ன வித்தியாசம்? எது easy?
output: Groups comparison: Group 4 - 10th/12th pass, Clerk/Typist posts, easiest. Group 2/2A - Degree, Assistant/Accountant posts, medium. Group 1 - Degree, DSP/Deputy Collector, hardest. Exam pattern: All MCQ. Syllabus: 6th-12th TN textbooks + Current affairs. Group 4: 1.5 lakh+ applicants, 5000+ posts. Group 1: 50,000 applicants, 50-100 posts. Start with Group 4, then progress. Same preparation works for all.

instruction: கிராமப்புற மாணவர்களுக்கு சிறப்பு சலுகைகள் உள்ளதா?

instruction: Doctor credentials eppadi verify panradhu?
output: Verify: 1) NMC website (nmc.org.in) - Indian Medical Register, 2) State Medical Council register, 3) Specialist registration (for specialists), 4) Hospital website - doctor profile. instruction: Bail conditions ennenna irukkum?
output: Common conditions: 1) Court dates attend, 2) Don't leave jurisdiction without permission, 3) Don't tamper evidence/threaten witnesses, 4) Passport surrender (if flight risk), 5) Periodical police station visit, 6) Don't contact victim. Violation = bail cancel + arrest.

instruction: Defamation-க்கு case போடலாமா?
output: Civil defamation: Damages claim செய்யலாம். Criminal defamation (IPC 499/500, BNS 356): 2 years imprisonment + fine. Truth = defence (public interest-ல் சொன்னால்). Social media defamation-க்கும் apply ஆகும். Written complaint Magistrate Court-ல் file.

instruction: IGNOU-la ennenna padippugal ullana?

output: Buy-out option: Notice pay கொடுத்து immediately exit. Absconding: Risky - relieving letter, experience certificate கிடைக்காது. Background verification-ல் problem. Negotiate with HR - most companies accept buy-out. New offer delay ஆனால் wait பண்ணுங்க.

instruction: Email vandhuchu 'Your Jira license expiring, IT head approved renewal. Click to pay 50,000 from company account.' IT head name mention pannirukkanga, process pannalama?
output: Business Email Compromise (BEC) attack! Scammers research company structure, impersonate executives. Real renewals go through procurement, not random emails. Verify with IT head directly through phone/internal chat. Never pay based on email alone.

instruction: Bail eppadi peruvathu?
output: Bailable offence: Police station-layae bail kidaikkum (matter of right). Non-bailable: Court-la application podanum. Documents: ID proof, address proof, surety documents. Bail bond + surety sign venum. Lawyer through apply panrathu better.

instruction: Doctor death case-la enna compensation kidaikkum?
output: Death case compensation: 1) Lost income (future earnings multiplied), 2) Funeral expenses, 3) Medical expenses before death, 4) Loss of consortium (spouse), 5) Loss of parental care (children), 6) Mental agony to family. Calculation: Age, income, dependents, life expectancy. Young earning member death: Higher compensation. Ceiling: No fixed limit - based on facts. Criminal: Separate from compensation.

instruction: TNPSC free coaching enge kidaikkum?
output: Free coaching centres: 1) Government Free Coaching - Chennai, Trichy, Madurai, Coimbatore (Apply through Employment Exchange) 2) BC/MBC Welfare Department coaching 3) Adi Dravidar Welfare (SC/ST) 4) District Collectorate coaching programs 5) IAS Academy free batches. Online free: TNPSC Shouters, Group Exam Tamil YouTube channels, Telegram groups. Selection: Merit + income based. Apply early - limited seats.

instruction: Arrear/Supplementary exam eppadi clear aavadhu?
output: Arrear clear strategy: 1) Previous failures reason analyze pannunga 2) Important chapters mattum focus - 60% weightage chapters 3) Previous year arrear question papers practice 4) Time: 1-2 months dedicated preparation 5) Easy questions first attempt 6) Passing marks aim: 35/100. Exam: October (10th), June (12th). Same syllabus, slightly easier paper. Private candidates also apply possible. Attempt limit illai.

instruction: TNPSC Pothu Tamil eppadi padippathu?
output: Pothu Tamil sections: 1) Ilakkanam (Grammar) - Ezhuthiyial, Solliyal, Porulathigaram 2) Ilakkiyam - Sangam to Modern literature 3) Tamil culture and heritage. Books: 6th-12th Tamil textbooks, TNPSC previous papers. High scoring: Grammar rules, author-work matching, literary periods. Daily practice: 50 questions. Ilakkanam: Vinaigal, Pechu vazhakku, Ezhuthuvazhi rules. Tamil literature: Thirukkural mandatory (1330 kurals meanings).

instruction: NEET-ல் seat கிடைக்கல, drop year எடுக்கலாமா? Waste ஆகுமா?
output: Drop year = Strategic decision, not waste. When good idea: 1) Close to cutoff - improvement chances high 2) Strong determination 3) Clear preparation plan. When risky: 1) First attempt poor score by big margin 2) No structured plan 3) Family pressure only. Statistics: Many successful doctors took 2-3 attempts. Alternative: Join backup course (B.Sc) + prepare NEET simultaneously. Drop year plan: Join test series, daily 8-10 hours, monthly assessment. One year invested wisely = lifetime career.

instruction: பட்டா மாற்றம் எப்படி செய்வது?
output: After property registration at SRO, apply for Patta transfer at Taluk Office or eservices.tn.gov.in. Documents: Registered document, EC, ID proof, tax receipts. Field inspection by VAO/RI. Time: 30-45 days. Essential for proving ownership.

instruction: Marriage registration eppadi seyvadhu?
output: Hindu Marriage Act paadi: 1. Sub-registrar office-la application 2. Documents: Both age proof (Male 21+, Female 18+), Address proof, photos, Marriage invitation / photos, 2 witnesses (Aadhaar copy) 3. Fee: ₹100-500 4. Online: tnreginet.gov.in

instruction: Agriculture padikkanum-pa, enna college nalladhu?
output: TNAU (Tamil Nadu Agricultural University) best-pa. Coimbatore main campus, Thanjavur, Madurai-layum colleges irukku. Admission: 12th Biology marks basis counselling. Fees kammi - ₹5000-10000/year. Farmers pillaikku priority irukku. Scholarship, hostel free. Modern farming techniques learn pannalam. Own land irundha double benefit.

instruction: Water connection eppadi peruvadhu?
output: Urban area: twadboard.tn.gov.in. Rural: Village Administrative Officer. Documents: Property document, ID proof, Tax receipt. Fee: ₹500-1500 (connection charge)

instruction: Merchant Navy join ஆக என்ன படிக்கணும்?
output: Courses: 1) B.Sc Nautical Science (3 years) - Deck Officer 2) Marine Engineering (4 years) - Engine room 3) GP Rating (6 months) - Entry level. Eligibility: 12th PCM 60%+, Medical fitness strict. Institutes: IMU Chennai, AMET Chennai, MERI. Admission: IMU CET entrance exam. Career: High salary (₹50,000 - ₹5 lakh/month with experience), World travel. Challenges: Months away from family.

instruction: PG/Hostel-க்கு rent laws apply ஆகுமா?
output: PG/Hostel license agreement-under வரும், standard tenancy laws fully apply ஆகாது. ஆனால் basic rights (security deposit refund, notice period, harassment protection) apply ஆகும். Specific PG rules follow பண்ணணும்.

instruction: Cutoff marks quick guide
output: NEET 2024 (approx): General OC 720-137, BC 136-107, MBC 136-107, SC/ST 136-107. JEE Main: 90+ percentile for NITs. TNEA: Top colleges 195+, average 180+, minimum 150+. TNPSC Group 4: 80+ marks out of 150 safe. Engineering cutoff = Maths + Physics + Chemistry (max 200).

instruction: Property sell aanaal tenant enna aagum?
output: Registered agreement irundhaal new owner-um adhai honor seyya venum. Agreement period mudiyum varai tenant continue seyyalam. New owner arbitrary eviction seyya mudiyaadhu. Sale-kku mun tenant-kku inform seivathu good practice.

instruction: Coaching centre-க்கு அனுப்பணுமா, self-study போதுமா?
output: பையன்/பொண்ணோட learning style பாருங்க. Self-disciplined-ஆ இருந்தா self-study + online resources போதும். Otherwise coaching உதவும். Free government coaching (Naan Mudhalvan, TNPSC free coaching) try பண்ணுங்க முதல்ல.

instruction: Meenavar (fishermen) family students-ku scholarship ulladha?
output: Aam, Fisheries Department Scholarships: 1) Pre-matric - ₹500-1,500/year 2) Post-matric - ₹2,000-5,000/year 3) Professional courses - ₹10,000-30,000 4) Higher education abroad - ₹10 lakh. Eligibility: Fishermen community certificate, registered fisherman's child. Apply: www.fisheries.tn.gov.in. Special quota in Anna University marine courses.

instruction: Weight loss-kku natural-aa enna pannalaam? Gym poga time illa (Chennai urban style)
output: No gym needed! Natural weight loss: 1) Morning warm water + lemon + honey, 2) Green tea/Jeera water instead of tea/coffee, 3) Dinner before 7 PM, 4) Walk 30 mins daily (morning/evening), 5) Reduce rice, increase vegetables, 6) No packaged snacks - nuts, fruits instead, 7) Intermittent fasting (16:8) if suitable. Apps: Step counter helps. Consistency: 1-2 kg/month loss is healthy and sustainable. Quick fix: Usually temporary and unhealthy.

instruction: TNPSC endraal enna? Ennenna exams nadathuvanga?
output:
**TNPSC:**

**What:** TN Government job exams

**Major Exams:**

1. **Group 1:** Deputy Collector, DSP - Degree - ₹56,100+
2. **Group 2:** Sub-Registrar, Assistant - Degree - ₹35,400+
3. **Group 2A:** Jr Assistant, Typist - Degree - ₹19,500+
4. **Group 4:** Jr Assistant, VAO - 10th/12th - ₹19,500+
5. **Group 3:** Technical posts - Diploma/Degree

**Exam Pattern:**
- Prelims: 200 marks (GS + Aptitude)
- Mains: 300 marks (GS + Language)
- Interview: 40 marks (Group 1)

**Age:** General 21-32, BC/MBC +5, SC/ST no limit

**Apply:** tnpsc.gov.in

instruction: Trichy-la best medical colleges evai?
output: Medical colleges Trichy region: 1) KAPV Government Medical College Trichy - MBBS, affordable 2) Thanjavur Medical College - Oldest in region 3) Dhanalakshmi Srinivasan Medical College - Private 4) Nursing colleges: Government + private multiple. MBBS admission: NEET + state counselling. Govt college fees: ₹13,500/year. Bond service required. Allied health courses also available.

instruction: Ration card-la name serkka enna seyvadhu?
output: For birth: Apply at tnpds.gov.in with birth certificate + baby's Aadhaar. For marriage: Marriage certificate + spouse's Aadhaar. Remove old card entry if transferring. Taluk Office verification. Time: 15-30 days.

instruction: வேலைக்கு போறேன், ஆனா degree complete பண்ணல. இப்போ படிக்க முடியுமா?
output: 100% possible! Options: 1) IGNOU - most flexible, exams twice yearly 2) Tamil Nadu Open University (TNOU) - Tamil medium available 3) University of Madras Distance 4) Evening colleges in Chennai 5) Online degrees - recognized universities. Process: Work continues + study weekends + exams during leave. Duration: UG 3 years, PG 2 years. Benefits: Promotion eligibility, government job apply, self-satisfaction. Many working people complete degrees in 30s, 40s. Never too late!

instruction: Wedding season - 'Bridal makeup just 4999 Rs! Book now pay later' Instagram offer. Book பண்ணலாமா?
output: Verify first! Wedding season-ல makeup artist scams common. Booking வாங்கிட்டு wedding day-ல வர மாட்டாங்க. Reviews, previous work check பண்ணுங்க. Known artists refer பண்ணுங்க. Advance full amount தராதீங்க.

instruction: Operation-ல் கத்தரிக்கோல்/gauze உள்ளே விட்டுட்டாங்க - என்ன செய்வது?
output: Classic negligence case (Res Ipsa Loquitur - thing speaks for itself). Steps: 1) Get X-ray/CT evidence, 2) Medical records collect, 3) Complaint to hospital, 4) Consumer Forum case, 5) Criminal complaint (Section 338 IPC - grievous hurt). Compensation: Cost of removal surgery + damages + mental agony + loss of income. Hospital cannot deny - clear negligence.

instruction: Scholarship-க்கு தேவையான documents என்னென்ன?
output: Standard documents: 1) Aadhaar card 2) Bank passbook (student name) 3) Income certificate (latest) 4) Caste/Community certificate 5) Bonafide certificate from institution 6) Previous year marks card 7) Passport size photo 8) Fee receipt. Special cases: Disability certificate, EWS certificate, BPL card, domicile certificate. Tip: Keep original + 3 photocopies + scanned PDF ready.

instruction: Certificate delay aanaal enna seivathu?
output: TN Right to Service Act: Specified time limit-kkul service kodukkanum. Delay aanaal: 1) Appellate Authority-kku appeal, 2) Penalty: Rs.250/day delay, 3) CM Cell complaint. Income certificate: 7 days, Community certificate: 15 days (approximate).

instruction: 8th class-ல் group select பண்ணணுமா? Science/Commerce எப்போ choose பண்றது?
output: Group selection: 10th வரை common syllabus. 11th-ல் group choose. Early awareness: 8th/9th-ல் interests identify பண்ணுங்கள். Science-க்கு: Maths, Science strong இருக்கணும். Commerce-க்கு: Accounts, Business interest. Arts-க்கு: Language, Social studies interest. Advice: 10th முடிக்கும் வரை எல்லா subjects-ஐயும் properly படியுங்கள். Final decision 10th result வந்த பிறகு.

instruction: Agriculture padikkanum, endha college nalladhu?
output: TNAU (Tamil Nadu Agricultural University) best-pa. Coimbatore main campus, Thanjavur, Madurai-layum colleges irukku. Admission: 12th Biology marks basis counselling. Fees kammi - ₹5000-10000/year. Farmers pillaikku priority irukku. Scholarship, hostel free. Modern farming techniques learn pannalam. Own land irundha double benefit.

instruction: Sports quota-ல் scholarship உண்டா?
output: State/National level sports achievement இருந்தால் sports scholarship கிடைக்கும். SAI (Sports Authority of India), state sports council scholarships உண்டு. Certificate proof தேவை.

instruction: வெளிநாடு படிப்புக்கு என்னென்ன தேர்வுகள் எழுத வேண்டும்?
output: முக்கிய தேர்வுகள்: 1) IELTS/TOEFL - English proficiency 2) GRE - MS/PhD (USA, Canada) 3) GMAT - MBA 4) SAT - UG (USA) 5) PTE - Australia, UK. IELTS: 6.5+ score தேவை பெரும்பாலும். GRE: 300+ நல்ல score. Chennai-ல் பல coaching centers உள்ளன. British Council, IDP IELTS நடத்துகின்றன.

instruction: Cashless hospitalization eppadi velai seyyum?
output: Process: 1) Check hospital in network list, 2) Inform TPA/insurer before admission (planned), 3) Show health card at admission, 4) Hospital sends pre-auth request, 5) TPA approves amount, 6) Treatment happens, 7) Final bill - approved amount deducted, balance you pay. Emergency: Inform within 24 hours. Rejected: Appeal to insurer, pay and claim reimbursement.

instruction: Life insurance claim reject ஆனால் appeal எங்கே?
output: Steps: 1) Company grievance cell, 2) IRDAI IGMS portal (igms.irda.gov.in), 3) Insurance Ombudsman (Rs.30 lakh வரை), 4) Consumer forum, 5) Civil Court. Common rejection reasons: Non-disclosure, policy lapse, suicide clause. Documents: Policy, medical records, rejection letter.

instruction: Medical negligence என்றால் என்ன?
output: Medical negligence = Doctor/hospital standard of care fail. Elements: 1) Duty of care existed, 2) Breach of duty (below standard), 3) Injury occurred, 4) Injury caused by breach. Examples: Wrong surgery, missed diagnosis, wrong medicine, surgical tools left inside, infection due to poor hygiene. Not negligence: Treatment failure despite proper care, known complications.

instruction: Education Loan எப்படி வாங்குவது?
output: Apply through vidyalakshmi.co.in (40+ banks, single application) or directly at bank. Up to ₹7.5 lakh: collateral-free. Interest: 8-10%. EWS students get interest subsidy during study. Documents: Admission letter, fee structure, co-borrower details, ID proofs.

instruction: Call vandhudhu 'GST compliance issue detected in your business. Pay 20,000 immediately or face notice.' GST officer call pannaaraa, genuine aa?
output: GST notices come through official GST portal and registered email, not phone calls. Officers identify themselves with designation and give written notice. Check gst.gov.in for any actual notices. Never pay anyone calling as 'GST officer'.

instruction: MGNREGA endraal enna? Velai eppadi peruvadhu?
output: 100-day work guarantee for rural families. Eligibility: Rural household, above 18 years, ready for manual labor. Job Card: Apply at Gram Panchayat, get card in 15 days. Wage: ₹294/day in TN (varies by state). Works: Water conservation, roads, agriculture, tree planting. If no work in 15 days: Unemployment allowance. Wages: To bank account within 15 days.

instruction: Email vandhuchu company domain hosting provider name la 'Your domain hosting expired. Pay 15,000 immediately or website goes down.' Panic aagudhu, en company website down aagidumaa?
output: Check your actual hosting dashboard - not through email links. Real providers send multiple reminders before expiry. Scammers buy expired domain lists and target businesses. Verify sender email domain carefully - often slight misspellings like 'godady.com' instead of 'godaddy.com'.

instruction: Education Loan eppadi vaanguvadhu?
output: Apply through vidyalakshmi.co.in (40+ banks, single application) or directly at bank. Up to ₹7.5 lakh: collateral-free. Interest: 8-10%. EWS students get interest subsidy during study. Documents: Admission letter, fee structure, co-borrower details, ID proofs.

instruction: Upwork la client - 'Big project 50,000, but need you to buy specific software first, I'll reimburse with payment.' Software ku 10,000 upfront kekkuraan.
output: Classic freelance scam. Legitimate clients project tools provide pannuvaanga or cost include pannuvaanga in budget. 'Buy first, reimburse later' - reimbursement varaadhu. Upwork outside payment request = violation anyway. Decline and report.

instruction: Thiruvalluvar silai engge irukku? Adhoda sirappu enna?
output: Kanyakumari-la ulla Thiruvalluvar silai 133 adi uyaram kondadhu - ovvoru adiyum oru adhigaarathai kurikkiradhu (133 adhigaarangal). Idhu 38 adi uyara peedathil mela nikkudhu - 38 adi enbadhu Araththuppaal-oda 38 adhigaarangalai kurikkiradhu. Motha uyaram 171 adi. 2000-m aandu January 1-la thirakkapattathu.

instruction: Cheque bounce aanadhu - enna action edukkalam?
output: NI Act 138 procedure: 1) Bank memo receive, 2) Legal notice within 30 days, 3) 15 days wait for payment, 4) Complaint within 30 days (total 45 days from bounce). Court: Magistrate Court. Punishment: 2 years imprisonment + twice cheque amount fine.

instruction: Scholarship apply seiyum bodhu common mistakes enna?
output: Avoid pannunga: 1) Deadline miss panrathu - calendar-la note podunga 2) Incomplete application - ella fields nirappunga 3) Wrong documents - size, format check 4) Bank account mismatch with Aadhaar 5) Income certificate expired 6) Multiple applications same scheme 7) Fake certificates (blacklist aaveenga). Tips: Apply early, keep scanned copies ready, check status regularly.

instruction: Bharathidasan yaar? Yaen 'Puratchi Kavi' endru azhaikkappadugiraar?
output: Bharathidasan (1891-1964) - 'Puratchi Kavi' endru azhaikkappadubavar. Sirappugal: 1) Tamil mozhi patru - 'Tamizhukku amudhenru per', 2) Samooga seerthiruththam - jaadhi ethirppu, moodanambikkai ethirppu, 3) Pen urimai - 'Kudumba Vilakku', 4) Dravidian movement poet, 5) Bharathiyaaroda seedar. 'Irupadhu Nootraandu', 'Pandiyan Parisu', 'Kudumba Vilakku' famous padaippugal. Schools-la paadappadugiradhu.

instruction: Property வாங்கும் முன் என்னென்ன documents check பண்ணணும்?
output: Must check: 1) Title deed chain (30 years), 2) EC (30 years), 3) Patta & Chitta, 4) Survey sketch, 5) Tax paid receipts, 6) Approved building plan, 7) NOC (if apartment), 8) RERA registration (new projects), 9) Power of Attorney (if applicable). Lawyer verification recommended.

instruction: SIM swap fraud-ல் இருந்து எப்படி protect பண்றது?
output: Prevention: 1) SIM lock enable, 2) Don't share personal details, 3) Unusual network loss-க்கு alert, 4) Bank OTP to email (if available). If happened: Telecom provider + bank + police immediately. New SIM block request பண்ணுங்க.

instruction: WhatsApp message 'LTC claim deadline extending. Advance submission fee 3000 for priority processing.' LTC claim pending, priority ku pay pannalama?
output: LTC claims processed through official channels - no 'advance fee' or 'priority processing' exists. Submit through proper bill section. Government never asks payment for processing employee benefits. Check service rules - all processes are free for employees.

instruction: Concentration improve பண்ண என்ன செய்யணும்?
output: Concentration tips: 1) Pomodoro technique - 25 min study, 5 min break 2) Mobile silent/away 3) Study table clean, good lighting 4) One subject at a time 5) Break tasks into smaller parts 6) Reward yourself after targets 7) Sleep 7-8 hours 8) Exercise daily 9) Meditation 10 minutes 10) Healthy food - avoid heavy meals. Environment: Same place, same time daily. Brain trains itself. Start with 30 min, increase gradually.

instruction: Snake bite aanaal enna seyyanum? Enna koodaadhu?
output: DO: 1) Stay calm, 2) Immobilize bitten limb (don't move), 3) Remove jewelry (swelling), 4) Call 108/go to hospital immediately, 5) Note snake appearance if possible. DON'T: 1) Cut/suck wound, 2) Apply tourniquet tightly, 3) Apply ice/electric shock, 4) Give alcohol/traditional remedies, 5) Waste time catching snake. Antivenom: Available free at government hospitals. All snake bites need hospital evaluation.

instruction: 'Star Health la irundhu pesuren, unga policy lapse aaidum, renewal premium 15,000 pay pannunga link la' nu message vandhudhu. Policy irukku, renew pannalama?
output: Insurance companies SMS link la payment kekaadhu ayya. Lapse warning formal letter/email varum with reasonable time. Link click pannina fake site - card details pogum. Star Health official website la login panni check pannunga, illa branch ku call pannunga.

instruction: PM-KISAN scheme enna?
output: Direct cash support for farmers. Amount: ₹6,000/year (₹2,000 x 3 installments). Eligibility: Land-owning farmers. Exclusions: Government employees, Income Tax payers, Registered professionals, Those getting ₹10,000+ pension. Registration: pmkisan.gov.in, CSC/Agriculture Office. Need Aadhaar, Land Records, Bank Account. Status: pmkisan.gov.in → Beneficiary Status

instruction: Internal assessment marks improve panrathu eppadi?
output: Internal marks strategy: 1) Attendance - 75% minimum, aim 90% 2) Assignment submit on time - presentation matters 3) Class participation - ask questions, answer 4) Lab records neat and complete 5) Internal tests - prepare like semester 6) Project work - original effort show 7) Behavior with faculty - respectful interaction. Impact: 20-25% of total marks. Easy marks if consistent throughout semester.

instruction: Minor burns/wounds-க்கு first aid natural remedy?
output: Burns (minor): 1) Cool water (not ice) 10-20 mins, 2) Aloe vera gel (fresh), 3) Honey application (antibacterial), 4) Coconut oil after cooling, 5) Turmeric paste (wound healing). Wounds: 1) Clean with water, 2) Turmeric powder (traditional antiseptic), 3) Neem paste (antibacterial), 4) Honey. Don't use: Toothpaste, egg white, butter on burns - myths! Major burns/wounds: Hospital immediately.

instruction: Veetla structural changes seyyalaamaa?
output: Owner-oda written permission illaamal endha structural change-um seyya koodaadhu. Wall break panrathu, room partition poduvadhu, bathroom add seivathu ellam owner approval venum. Permission illaamal seydhaal restoration cost tenant kattanum.

instruction: Foundation for Excellence (FFE) scholarship enna?
output: FFE Scholarship: Engineering and Medical students-ku. Amount: ₹20,000-60,000/year. Eligibility: JEE/NEET cleared, family income ₹6 lakh kizha. Selection: Application review + verification. Benefits: Full tuition support + mentoring. Apply: www.ffe.org. Tamil Nadu-la 1000+ students benefitted. Deadline: Usually July-August.

instruction: TNPSC-ku Free Coaching enga kidaikkum?
output:
**TNPSC Free Coaching:**

**Government:**
1. **TNSF:** Residential, SC/ST/MBC - tnsf.org.in
2. **Dr. Ambedkar:** SC/ST - adwelfare.tn.gov.in
3. **BC/MBC Coaching:** bcmbcmw.tn.gov.in
4. **Minorities:** tamilnaduminoritywelfare.org

**Universities:** Anna, Madras, Bharathiar - For students

**District Collector:** Free weekend classes in all districts

**Online Free:**
- tnpsc.gov.in official materials
- TNSF YouTube
- Target TNPSC YouTube

**Documents:**
