- Income Certificate (< ₹2-3 lakh)
- Education certificates
- Aadhaar

instruction: IT company-la bond sign pannen - valid-aa?
output: Training bond: Valid if genuine training provided. Employment bond (2-3 years): Generally unenforceable - Indian Contract Act under 'restraint of trade'. Reasonable training cost recovery: May be valid. Exorbitant penalty: Not enforceable. Consult lawyer before paying.

instruction: NEET Exam Pattern enna? Marks eppadi calculate aagum?
output:
**NEET Exam Pattern:**

**Basics:**
- Offline exam, 3 hrs 20 min
- 200 questions (180 to attempt)
- 720 marks total

**Subjects:** Physics, Chemistry, Botany, Zoology - 45 each

**Marking:**
- Correct: +4
- Wrong: -1 (Negative!)
- Unattempted: 0

**Cut-off (Approx):**
- General top colleges: 600+
- Govt Medical General: 550+
- SC: 450+, ST: 400+

**Tips:**
- No random guessing
- Section B - choose wisely
- Time management key

instruction: PMAY-Gramin eppadi peruvadhu?
output: House construction assistance for rural poor. Amount: ₹1.20 lakh (plain) / ₹1.30 lakh (hilly). Selection from SECC 2011 data. Check eligibility at pmayg.nic.in. If not in list: Appeal at Gram Panchayat. Additional: MGNREGA wages, toilet under SBM. Total: ₹1.5 lakh+

instruction: Architecture padippu (B.Arch) eppadi seruvathu?
output: NATA exam compulsory. Eligibility: +2 Maths 50%. Duration: 5 years. Chennai Anna University, SAP, SRM nalla colleges. Govt college fee: ₹30,000-50,000/year. JEE Paper 2 moolamum admission kidaikkum. Creative field with good scope.

instruction: Old age home-la abuse nadakkuthu, complain enge?
output: Complaint options: 1) Police (if physical/sexual abuse), 2) District Social Welfare Officer, 3) State Commission for Senior Citizens, 4) National Commission for Elderly. Old age home registration: Social Welfare Department-kitta - unregistered homes-ai report pannalam. Elder helpline: 14567. Documentation: Photos, medical reports, witness statements.

instruction: 10 varushamaa same job panren, career change pannanum, new skill learn panna enge povadhu?
output: Career change options: 1) TNSDC free courses - 100+ skills 2) NSDC skill centers - PMKVY scheme 3) Online: Coursera, edX certificates (many free) 4) Coding: freeCodeCamp, Codecademy 5) Digital marketing: Google certifications free 6) MBA distance - career shift. Trending skills: Data Science, Digital Marketing, Cloud computing, Python. Strategy: Learn while working → Build portfolio → Apply new roles OR Entrepreneurship. Age no barrier - many successful career changes at 35-45.

instruction: Live-in relationship-ல் பிறந்த குழந்தைக்கு rights இருக்கா?
output: ஆம். Supreme Court: Long-term live-in-ல் பிறந்த children legitimate. Father's property-ல் share உண்டு. Maintenance கேட்கலாம். Birth certificate-ல் father name போடலாம். DNA test மூலம் paternity prove பண்ணலாம்.

instruction: Enna sir, bank la problem-a? OTP sollunga fix pannidren nu call vandhudhu
output: Indha call fake sir. Bank officer-a irundalum OTP kettuka koodadhu. Neenga OTP koduthaa, panam poirum. Phone cut pannunga, 1930-la complaint pannunga.

instruction: Aindhinai endraal enna?
output: Aindhinai - Tamil ilakkiyathoda unique concept. Aindhu nilapagudhigalum avattrodan thodarpudaiya unarvugalum: 1) Kurinji (malai) - punarchi (union), 2) Mullai (kaadu) - iruththal (waiting), 3) Marudham (vayal) - oodal (sulking), 4) Neydhal (kadaloram) - irangal (pining), 5) Paalai (paalaivanam) - piridhal (separation). Iyarkaiyum manidha unarvum inaindha azhagaana concept. Ulaga ilakkiyathil thanithuvam!

instruction: Infertility-kku Siddha treatment effective-aa?
output: Used traditionally for: Male infertility (low sperm count, motility), Female infertility (PCOS, irregular periods, hormone balance). Treatments: 1) Karpam (fertility medicines), 2) Nei Prasham (ghee preparations), 3) Specific Lehyams, 4) Shodhana (detoxification). Consultation: Detailed history, examination. Duration: 3-6 months typically. Combined: Many take with modern treatment. NIS: Fertility clinic available. Evidence: Research ongoing, traditional success claims.

instruction: Important Central Government websites enna?
output: All Services: services.india.gov.in, Aadhaar: uidai.gov.in / myaadhaar.uidai.gov.in, PAN: incometax.gov.in, Scholarships: scholarships.gov.in, Pension: maandhan.in, PM-KISAN: pmkisan.gov.in, Ayushman Bharat: pmjay.gov.in, PMAY Housing: pmay-urban.gov.in, Education Loan: vidyalakshmi.co.in, Skill Training: pmkvyofficial.org, MUDRA Loan: mudra.org.in, Street Vendor: pmsvanidhi.mohua.gov.in, LPG: mylpg.in, DigiLocker: digilocker.gov.in

instruction: Bank exam-ku prepare aavadhu eppadi? SBI/IBPS difference?
output: Banking exams: IBPS - Public sector banks (PNB, Canara, etc). SBI - Separate recruitment. Pattern similar: Prelims + Mains + Interview. Sections: English, Reasoning, Quantitative, General Awareness, Computer. Preparation: 1) RS Aggarwal for Maths/Reasoning 2) Word Power Made Easy for English 3) Banking Awareness - Arihant 4) Daily mock tests. Difference: SBI slightly tougher, more vacancies. Start with IBPS, apply SBI also.

instruction: Call vandhudhu 'Labour department insurance scheme. Pay 3000 annual premium for 5 lakh coverage.' Insurance nalla irukum, join pannalama?
output: Government labour insurance (PMJJBY/PMSBY) costs only Rs 330-436 per year through bank. Welfare board provides free/subsidized insurance to members. 3000 for 5 lakh is neither government scheme nor good private deal. Check with bank for official government insurance schemes.

instruction: Krishnavoda vennai urundai (Krishna's Butterball) enna?
output: Mamallapurathil ulla oru piramaanda paarai. 250 ton edai. Slope-la nirkkiradhu - aanaal vizhadu! Gravity-a meeruvathu pola therikiradhu. 1200+ varudangalaaga appadiye nirkkiradhu. Pallavar kaalathilaye attraction. Elephants kondu thalla muyarchiththum nagaravillai endru kadhai. 'Vaan Irai Kal' endru Tamilil peyar. Perfect photo spot - tourists favorite!

instruction: சித்த மருத்துவம் என்றால் என்ன?
output: Siddha = தமிழ்நாட்டின் பாரம்பரிய மருத்துவ முறை. Origin: 18 Siddhars (ஞானியர்) developed. Age: 5,000+ years old. Principle: உடல் (body), உயிர் (soul), மனம் (mind) balance. Based on: Pancha bootham (5 elements), 96 தத்துவங்கள், 3 doshas (Vatham, Pitham, Kabam). Treatment: Diet, herbs, minerals, yoga, lifestyle. Recognition: Government of India recognized AYUSH system.

instruction: Poramboke land endraal enna? Adhai vaangalaamaa?
output: Poramboke = Government reserved land (roads, water bodies, grazing land). Idhai yaarum own panna mudiyaadhu, sell/buy panna mudiyaadhu. Poramboke land-la construction illegal - demolish aagum. Land classification: eservices.tn.gov.in-la check pannunga.

instruction: Sports quota scholarship Tamil Nadu-la ulladha?
output: Sports Development Authority of TN (SDAT) Scholarships: 1) State level players - ₹10,000-25,000/year 2) National level - ₹25,000-50,000 3) International level - ₹1-5 lakh 4) Olympic participants - special pension. College admission: 5% sports quota. Free coaching, equipment, diet allowance. Apply: www.sfrtn.tn.gov.in. Sports certificate from recognized association theva.

instruction: PAN Card-la thavaru irukku - eppadi sari seyvadhu?
output: To correct: 1. onlineservices.nsdl.com → 'Changes or Correction in PAN Data' 2. Fill form 3. Upload correct documents 4. Fee: ₹107. Can correct: Name, DOB, Father's name, Address, Photo/Signature. Important: If PAN-Aadhaar linked, details must match in both

instruction: Abhyanga massage vs regular massage - difference?
output: Abhyanga = Ayurvedic whole body oil massage. Difference: 1) Medicated oils specific to condition/Prakriti, 2) Specific direction strokes (towards heart), 3) Marma points included, 4) Part of treatment protocol (not just relaxation), 5) Followed by steam bath typically. Benefits: Toxin removal, circulation, joint lubrication, skin health, relaxation. Self-Abhyanga: Daily oil massage at home recommended in Ayurveda. Professional: For treatment purposes.

instruction: Diagnosis miss ஆச்சு, cancer late-ஆ detect ஆச்சு - negligence-ஆ?
output: Depends on circumstances. Negligence if: 1) Symptoms clearly pointed to cancer, 2) Standard tests not ordered, 3) Reports misread, 4) Follow-up not done, 5) Patient's complaints ignored. Not negligence if: Symptoms were atypical, tests done but cancer not detectable at that stage. Prove: What a reasonably competent doctor would have done. Expert witness: Essential for such cases.

instruction: En Bank Account-la irundhu OTP illaama panam poyiduchu. Cyber fraud-ku enna seyvadhu?
output:
Immediately (Minutes matter!):
1. Call Bank - Freeze account, raise dispute
2. cybercrime.gov.in - File complaint online
3. 1930 Helpline - National Cyber Crime (24x7)

Within 24 hours:
4. Written Bank Complaint - Get acknowledgment
5. Police FIR - With all details + screenshots

Bank Liability (RBI Rules):
6. Report within 3 days → Full refund
7. 4-7 days → Max loss ₹10,000
8. Bank must resolve in 90 days

Escalation:
9. Banking Ombudsman - cms.rbi.org.in

Prevention:
10. Enable SMS alerts, set transaction limits
11. Never share OTP

instruction: Government office-la velai nadakkala, yaarukitta solrathu? (Chennai style)
output: Steps: 1) Andha officer-in higher officer-kitta complaint, 2) Collector office petition, 3) CM Cell - 1100, 4) RTI pottu file status kelunga. Ellaathaiyum writing-la kodunga, acknowledgment vaangunga.

instruction: Ancestral property-ai yaaraavadhu oruthar thaniyaa virkkalaamaa?
output: Mudiyaadhu. Ancestral property-la anaithu legal heirs-kkum pirappileye right undu. Virka ella coparceners consent + No Objection venum. Consent illaamal vitraal court-la challenge seyyalam.

instruction: Diagnosis miss aachu, cancer late-aa detect aachu - negligence-aa?
output: Depends on circumstances. Negligence if: 1) Symptoms clearly pointed to cancer, 2) Standard tests not ordered, 3) Reports misread, 4) Follow-up not done, 5) Patient's complaints ignored. Not negligence if: Symptoms were atypical, tests done but cancer not detectable at that stage. Prove: What a reasonably competent doctor would have done. Expert witness: Essential for such cases.

instruction: Chief Minister's Comprehensive Health Insurance Scheme (CMCHIS) endraal enna?
output: CMCHIS = Free health insurance for TN families. Coverage: Rs.5 lakh per family per year. Eligibility: Annual income below Rs.72,000 (rice card holders automatic). Benefits: 1,027 procedures covered - surgeries, treatments, follow-up. Cashless treatment at empanelled hospitals. Card: Family smart card issued. Renewal: Automatic for eligible families.

instruction: Traffic fine list Tamil Nadu-la enna?
output: Major fines (2019 MV Act): Helmet illaama - Rs.1,000, Seat belt illaama - Rs.1,000, Signal jump - Rs.1,000, Drunk driving - Rs.10,000 (first), Over-speeding - Rs.1,000-2,000, Without license - Rs.5,000, Without insurance - Rs.2,000.

instruction: Online order வரவில்லை - refund எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: Steps: 1) Website/App-ல் refund request raise பண்ணுங்க, 2) Email-ல் written complaint அனுப்புங்க, 3) Payment bank-க்கு chargeback request கொடுங்க (credit card), 4) Response இல்லாவிட்டால் NCH (1800-11-4000) complaint, 5) Consumer forum case போடுங்க. E-commerce company 5-7 days-ல் acknowledge செய்யணும்.

instruction: Pregnant women-க்கு என்ன free schemes இருக்கு?
output: TN schemes: 1) Dr. Muthulakshmi Maternity Benefit Scheme - Rs.18,000 cash assistance, 2) Free delivery at government hospitals, 3) Free antenatal checkups, 4) Iron/folic acid tablets free, 5) Free ultrasound scans, 6) 102 ambulance for transport, 7) Post-delivery nutrition support. Register: PHC/Government hospital within first trimester. Amma Baby Care Kit: Free baby items.

instruction: SSC CHSL என்ன post கிடைக்கும்? 12th pass-க்கு best option?
output: SSC CHSL (Combined Higher Secondary Level): 12th pass Central Govt jobs. Posts: LDC (Lower Division Clerk), DEO (Data Entry Operator), Postal Assistant, Sorting Assistant. Salary: ₹20,000-60,000. Exam: Tier 1 (CBT) + Tier 2 (Descriptive). Syllabus: English, Maths, Reasoning, GK. Typing test required. Age: 18-27. Best option for 12th pass - stable central govt job. Apply: www.ssc.nic.in.

instruction: RTI-la enna information ketka mudiyaadhu?
output: Exemptions (Section 8): 1) National security, 2) Foreign relations, 3) Trade secrets, 4) Cabinet papers, 5) Personal information (no public interest), 6) Investigation documents (pending case), 7) Fiduciary relationship. Public interest override possible for some exemptions.

instruction: Insurance claim reject ஆச்சு, appeal எப்படி?
output: Steps: 1) Rejection reason writing-ல் கேளுங்க, 2) Grievance to Insurance Company (Grievance Officer), 3) 15 days-க்குள் response இல்ல = IRDAI IGMS portal (igms.irda.gov.in), 4) Still no resolution = Insurance Ombudsman (free, no lawyer needed), 5) Final option: Consumer Forum. Health insurance: TPA issues common - escalate to insurer directly.

instruction: என் Car 15 வருடம் ஆகிவிட்டது. Fitness Certificate எப்படி வாங்குவது? எந்த test செய்வார்கள்?
output:
**Vehicle Fitness Certificate:**

**எப்போது தேவை?**
- Private Vehicle: 15 வருடத்திற்கு பின் (every 5 years)
- Commercial Vehicle: 8 வருடத்திற்கு பின் (every year)
- Transport Vehicle: Every year

**Online Application:**
1. parivahan.gov.in → Online Services → TN
2. Fitness Certificate
3. RC number enter
4. Book slot at Authorized Testing Station (ATS)
5. Pay fee online

**Documents:**
- Original RC Book
- Insurance (valid)
- PUC Certificate
- Previous Fitness Certificate (if any)
- Tax paid receipts

**Testing Parameters:**

| Test | What they check |
|------|----------------|
| Brake Test | Efficiency, Balance |
| Emission Test | Smoke, CO, HC levels |
| Headlight | Alignment, Intensity |
| Suspension | Shock absorbers, Springs |
| Steering | Play, Alignment |
| Speedometer | Accuracy |
| Horn | Sound level |
| Body | Rust, Damage, Safety |
| Tyres | Condition, Tread depth |
| Mirrors | Condition, Position |

**Fee:**
- Testing: ₹300-500
- Certificate: ₹200
- Re-test (if failed): ₹100-200

**Process:**
1. Reach ATS with appointment
2. Document verification
3. Automated testing (30-45 mins)
4. Report generation
5. Pass: Certificate issued
6. Fail: Rectify → Re-test

**Validity:**
- Private (15+ years): 5 years
- Commercial: 1 year
- Transport: 1 year

**Fail ஆனால்:**
- Defects rectify within 7 days
- Re-test at same station
- Partial fee

**No Fitness Certificate:**
- Vehicle seized
- Fine: ₹500-5,000
- Insurance claim rejected in accident

**Authorized Testing Stations (Chennai):**
- RTO premises
- Private ATS (ARAI approved)
- List at: parivahan.gov.in

instruction: Cancer treatment-kku government support irukkaa?
output: Yes! Multiple supports: 1) CMCHIS - cancer treatment covered (Rs.5 lakh), 2) Government cancer hospitals - free/subsidized, 3) PM-JAY for eligible, 4) State Cancer Institute (Adyar) - subsidized, 5) CM's Relief Fund - apply for additional support. Free screening: Breast, cervical cancer at PHCs. Support: Transport allowance, free medicines (chemo). Apply: Hospital social worker will help with paperwork.

instruction: Call vandhidichi le - 'Account block aaidum, KYC update pannule' nu. OTP kekkudhu le. Enna pannudhu?
output: Fraud le idhu! Bank phone la OTP kekumaa? Kekaadhu le! 'Block aaidum' nu bayamudhuthudhu paaru. Branch ku nee poi pesu le. Five Roads, Hasthampatti la businessmen ipdi maatikirukkaa. Phone la details kudukkaadhe le.

instruction: Government officer லஞ்சம் கேட்டால் என்ன செய்வது?
output: Options: 1) Vigilance and Anti-Corruption (DVAC): 1064 helpline, 2) Lokayukta, 3) CBI (central government). Trap operation request பண்ணலாம். Evidence: Recording (legal in TN), witnesses. Bribe giver-க்கும் protection உண்டு (if reports).

instruction: Vellinaadu padippuku ennenna thervugal ezhudha venum?
output: Important exams: 1) IELTS/TOEFL - English proficiency 2) GRE - MS/PhD (USA, Canada) 3) GMAT - MBA 4) SAT - UG (USA) 5) PTE - Australia, UK. IELTS: 6.5+ score theva mostly. GRE: 300+ nalla score. Chennai-la pala coaching centers irukku. British Council, IDP IELTS nadathukindrana.

instruction: Evening college-ல் படிக்கலாமா? Working people-க்கு option?
output: Evening college options: 1) University of Madras evening courses 2) Annamalai University distance + contact 3) IGNOU weekend classes 4) Polytechnic evening batches (limited). Timings: Usually 6-9 PM. Courses: BA, B.Com, BBA, LLB. Benefits: Work + study together, degree = regular degree value. Alternative: Distance education from TNOU, IGNOU - study anytime. Some employers sponsor employee education.

instruction: தமிழ் புத்தாண்டு offer - 'Flipkart 90% discount! Today only!' forward வந்துச்சு. Link safe-ஆ?
output: Scam forward! Flipkart 90% discount கொடுக்காது. Tamil New Year excitement-ஐ misuse பண்றாங்க. 'Today only' urgency create பண்றது red flag. Official Flipkart app-ல மட்டும் shop பண்ணுங்க.

instruction: Periya Kovil (Thanjavur) patri sollungal?
output: Brihadeeswara Kovil (Periya Kovil) Thanjavur-la ulladhu. Rajaraja Chozhan 1010 CE-la kattinaan. Features: 1) Vimanam 216 adi uyaram - India-vilaiye uyaramaana vimanam, 2) Mel ulla kal 80 ton edai - eppadi thookinaargal enbadhu mystery, 3) Gopuratthai vida vimanam uyaram - unique, 4) Nandi - 25 ton edai, ore kallil sedhukkappattathu. UNESCO World Heritage Site (2004).

instruction: Trademark register panradhu eppadi?
output: Online: ipindia.gov.in. Classes: 45 different classes (goods/services). Search first: TM search portal. Fee: Rs.4,500-9,000. Process: Application → Examination → Publication → Opposition period (4 months) → Registration. Protection: 10 years, renewable.

instruction: Guideline value என்றால் என்ன? எங்கே check பண்றது?
output: Government நிர்ணயித்த minimum property value - இதற்கு கீழே register பண்ண முடியாது. Check: tnreginet.gov.in → Guideline Value Search → Zone/Village select. Actual sale higher-ஆ இருந்தால் actual value-க்கு stamp duty.

instruction: Govt school-la LKG/UKG-ku admission eppadi? Enna vayasu vendum?
output:
**Govt School Admission:**

**Age Rules:**
- LKG: 3+ years (as on June 1)
- UKG: 4+ years
- Class 1: 5+ years

**Admission Time:** May-June

**Documents:**
- Birth Certificate
- Child Aadhaar (optional)
- Parents Aadhaar
- Address proof
- Photos - 4
- Community Certificate

**Where:** School directly or emis.tnschools.gov.in

**Fee:** FREE!

**RTE:** 25% seats in private schools for EWS - Apply at rte.tnschools.gov.in

instruction: 'Seiyaamal seidha uthavikku' - nandri patriya kural enna solludhu?
output: Kural: 'Seiyaamal seidha uthavikku vaiyagamum vaanagamum aattral aridhu'. Artham: Naam endha uthaviyum seiyaamal irukkum bodhu, yaaro oruvar namakku uthavi seidhaal, andha uthavikku indha bhoomiyum sorgamum kooda eedaagaadhu. Unexpected kindness-oda mathippu alavida mudiyaadhadu.

instruction: INSPIRE scholarship என்ன? Science students-க்கு எப்படி apply செய்வது?
output: Innovation in Science Pursuit for Inspired Research (INSPIRE): DST scheme for science students. 3 components: 1) INSPIRE Award - Class 6-10, ₹5,000 one-time 2) SHE (Scholarship for Higher Education) - BSc/BS/Int MSc, ₹80,000/ஆண்டு 3) INSPIRE Fellowship - PhD, ₹31,000-35,000/மாதம். SHE eligibility: Top 1% in 12th OR KVPY/JEE top 10,000. Apply: www.online-inspire.gov.in.

instruction: Gym friend introduce pannaan - 'Health supplements, become distributor, recruitment bonus + product sales commission, 25,000 starter kit.'
output: MLM red flags - expensive starter kit, emphasis on recruitment over sales. 'Bonus for recruiting' = pyramid structure. Products usually overpriced, hard to sell. 95%+ MLM participants lose money. Politely decline, friendship maintain pannunga but business avoid.

instruction: Call vandhudhu 'Medical Council license renewal overdue. Pay 15,000 penalty now or license suspended from tomorrow.' Panic aagudhu, enna pannanum doctor?
output: State Medical Council sends renewal notices months in advance through registered mail. Check NMC/SMC portal for actual status. Scammers create urgency targeting doctors' fear of license issues. Never pay without verifying from official council website.

instruction: Porumaiyoda palan enna?
output: Kural: 'Unnaadhu norpaar periyar pirarsollum innaachol norpaarin pin'. Kadunchorkkalai poRuppavargal viradham iruppavargalai vida periyavargal. Melum: 'Oruththaarai ondraaga vaiyaarae vaippar poruththaaraip pondraga vaippar'. Revenge eduppavarai makkal madhikka maattaargal, poRuppavarai madhippaargal. Patience earns respect!

instruction: கலைஞர் மகளிர் உரிமைத் திட்டம் என்றால் என்ன?
output: ₹1,000/month for woman head of family in TN. Eligibility: 21+ age, family income below ₹2.5 lakh, not govt employee/tax payer, no other pension. Apply through Anganwadi or kalaaboravu.tn.gov.in with Aadhaar, ration card, bank account.

instruction: TN இலவச Laptop திட்டம் என்றால் என்ன?
output: Govt school மாணவர்களுக்கு இலவச Laptop. தகுதி: +2 pass (Govt school), UG/Diploma சேர்ந்தவர்கள், Polytechnic students. Distribution: College-ல் கொடுப்பார்கள். Specs: Basic laptop with necessary software. Documents: +2 marksheet, College admission, Aadhaar. Usage: Education purpose, warranty உண்டு.

instruction: Siddhargal yaar? Avargaloda sirappu enna?
output: Siddhargal enbavargal Tamil naattoda gnaanigal, yogigal, maruththuvargal, rasavaathigal (alchemists). 'Siddhi' endraal supernatural power. Ivargal 8 vagaiyaana siddhigalai (Ashta Siddhi) adaindavargal. Maruththuvam, yoga, dhiyaanam, aanmeegam, rasavaadham aagiyavartril masters. 18 Siddhargal migavum pugazh petravargal - 'Padhinen Siddhargal' endru azhaikkapadugirar.

instruction: Thokkanam massage enge kidaikkum?
output: Thokkanam = Traditional Siddha massage therapy. Types: 9 types including Thattal, Irukkal, Pidithal, etc. Where: 1) NIS Tambaram - specialized unit, 2) Government Siddha hospitals, 3) Private Siddha clinics (verify registration). For: Muscular problems, paralysis, rehabilitation, stress relief. Sessions: Usually 7-14 day course. Cost: Free at government, Rs.300-1000 per session private. Trained: Only by certified Thokkanam therapists.

instruction: VAO certificate thara maattengaraar, enna panradhu? (Rural Tamil)
output: Tahsildar-kitta written complaint kodunga. Right to Service Act-in keezh time limit irukku - delay aana penalty. Collector Grievance Day (weekly) ponga. Last option: RTI pottu why delay-nnu kelunga.

instruction: Chidambaram Nataraja koviloda sirappu enna?
output: Chidambaram Nataraja Kovil - Sivan Ananda Thandavam aadiya idam. Sirappugal: 1) Chidambara Ragasiyam - karuvraiyil vettridam (empty space) - formless God concept, 2) Pon Sabhai - gold-plated roof, 3) Nataraja bronze - Chola bronze masterpiece, 4) 5 sabhaigal - Chit Sabha, Kanaka Sabha, Nritta Sabha, Deva Sabha, Raja Sabha, 5) Aakaya Lingam - one of Pancha Bhoota Sthalams. Dikshitars (special priests) nadaththugiraargal.

instruction: Pudhiya ration card eppadi peruvadhu?
output: 1. tnpds.gov.in website-la apply pannunga 2. Or nearby ration shop-la form vaangunga 3. Documents: Family members Aadhaar, Income certificate, Address proof, Photos 4. Types: PHH (₹1 rice), AAY (free rice), NPHH

instruction: A-Register endraal enna?
output: Village-level land record maintained by VAO. Contains: All survey numbers, owners, area, classification. Public document - anyone can inspect. Patta transfer, mutation ellam A-Register-la update aaganum. Discrepancy irundhaal Tahsildar-kku complaint.

instruction: Siddhargal udal patri enna solkirargal?
output: 'Udambhar azhiyin uyiraar azhivar' - udal azhindhal aanmaavum munnera mudiyaadhu. 'Udambinai munnam izhukkenru irundhen, udambinukku ulle uruporul kanden' - Thirumoolar. Udalai neglect seiyaamal, adhai karuviyaaga payanpaduththi aanmeega munnetram adaiyalam enbadhu siddhar thaththuvam. Yoga, maruththuvam idhoda adippadaiyilaye.

instruction: Lazy-aa feel aagum bodhu motivation-kku enna kural?
output: 'Madiyilaa mannavan eidhum adiyalandhaan thaavith thalarinum vellum'. Sombal illadhavan vetri peruvaan. Melum: 'Ookkamadhu kaividel' (Aathichudi). 'Udaiyar enappaduvadhu ookkam' - motivation-thaan real wealth. Start small, build momentum. Action creates motivation, not the other way!

instruction: Bank service complaint எப்படி செய்வது?
output: Steps: 1) Bank branch-ல் written complaint, 2) 30 days response இல்லாவிட்டால் Banking Ombudsman-க்கு complaint (rbi.org.in), 3) Still no resolution - Consumer forum. Online banking fraud-க்கு Cyber Crime portal-லும் report பண்ணுங்க.

instruction: WhatsApp message vandhudhu 'NABH inspection scheduled for your clinic. Pre-inspection fee 25,000 required. Transfer immediately to avoid penalty.' NABH accreditation process la idhu varudhaa?
output: NABH never asks for fees via WhatsApp! All NABH communications through official email and portal. Inspection fees paid through official channels after proper application. This targets healthcare facility owners - verify from nabh.co website directly.

instruction: Owner current/water cut panni force pannuraar - enna seivathu?
output: Idhu illegal harassment. 1) Police-la complaint kodunga, 2) Rent Authority-kku complaint, 3) Civil Court-la injunction peralaam. Essential services cut panradhu criminal offence. Owner-kku fine and imprisonment varai punishment.

instruction: Loan app harassment - illegal collection practices
output: RBI unregistered apps = illegal. Complaint: 1) RBI Sachet portal, 2) cybercrime.gov.in, 3) Police FIR (extortion, harassment). Harassment includes: Contact list access, morphed photos, threatening calls. Do NOT install unknown loan apps. Legal apps: RBI registered NBFC list check.

instruction: TN Employment Exchange-ல் பதிவு செய்வது எப்படி?
output: Govt job notification-க்கு Registration. Online: tnvelaivaaippu.gov.in-ல் register. Age: 18-40 (reservation-க்கு relaxation உண்டு). தகுதி: Educational qualification-க்கு ஏற்ப. Renewal: ஒவ்வொரு 3 வருடமும் renew. Benefits: Govt job notifications, Interview call, Unemployment assistance (some categories). Documents: Education certificates, Community certificate, Aadhaar. Priority: Seniority + Marks-based. Local Employment: Private companies-க்கும் referral.

instruction: Call vandhuchchi pa - 'Unga account block aagum, KYC update pannunga' nu. OTP kekkuraanga. Enna pannuradhu?
output: Fraud pa idhu! Bank phone la OTP kekaadhu. 'Block aagum' nu bayamudhuthuraanga. Branch ku neeye poi pesu. Srirangam, Cantonment area la pensioners ipdi maatikirukkanga. Phone la details kudukaadhae pa.

instruction: AC room-la irundhaa cold varum - unmaiyaa?
output: Myth! Cold caused by: Viruses, not temperature. AC connection: 1) Dry air irritates throat, 2) Poor AC maintenance = allergens, 3) Indoor crowding = virus spread, 4) Temperature shock going in/out. Prevention: Clean AC filters, adequate humidity, proper ventilation. Cold = viral infection - spread by contact/droplets, not AC itself.

instruction: Property document lost ஆனால் என்ன செய்வது?
output: Steps: 1) Police complaint (FIR), 2) Newspaper advertisement (lost notice), 3) Sub-Registrar office-ல் certified copy apply, 4) Affidavit notarize. Certified copy original-க்கு சமம். Online: tnreginet.gov.in-ல் post-2009 documents download பண்ணலாம்.

instruction: Fake website-la shopping panni fraud aanadhu - complaint eppadi?
output: Steps: 1) Payment bank-kku chargeback request, 2) cybercrime.gov.in complaint, 3) Consumer forum (seller fraud), 4) Police FIR (IPC 420). Evidence save pannunga: Website screenshots, payment receipts, communication. Domain registrar-kkum report pannalam.

instruction: Consumer forum order implement aagala - enna seivathu?
output: Execution petition file pannunga. Order implement seyyaadha party-kku: 1) Fine, 2) Imprisonment (up to 3 years), 3) Property attachment. Forum-kke execution petition podunga. District Collector moolamum execution nadakkum.

instruction: Government hospital-ல் waiting time அதிகமா இருக்கு, tips?
output: Tips: 1) Go early morning (6-7 AM for token), 2) Weekdays better than Monday, 3) Avoid month-end, 4) Use online appointment if available, 5) Get referral from PHC for direct specialist access, 6) Emergency = no waiting (use emergency entrance), 7) Follow-up visits - ask for specific date/time. Seniors/pregnant: Priority queue usually available. Avoid: Public holidays, exam result days.

instruction: Thiruvalluvar yaar? Avar eppo vaazhndhar?
output: Thiruvalluvar ulagap pugazh petra Tamilk kavignar, gnaani. Tamil marabinpadi avar 3000+ aandugalukkku mun vaazhndavar. Avar Mylapore-la pirandhadhagavum, nesavu thozhil seidhadhagavum korapadugiradhu. Ovvoru varudamum Thai 2-m thedhi (January 15/16) Thiruvalluvar Dhinamaga kondadapadugiradhu. Tamil naatkattiyinpadi Thiruvalluvar Aandu kanakkeedu seiyappadugiradhu.

instruction: Organic farming-க்கு support உண்டா?
output: Paramparagat Krishi Vikas Yojana (PKVY) கீழ் organic farming support உண்டு. Rs.50,000/hectare 3 years-க்கு கிடைக்கும். Cluster formation, certification support உண்டு.

instruction: Class 8-க்கு பிறகு என்ன படிக்கலாம்? எந்த stream select செய்வது?
output:
**Class 8-க்கு பிறகு Options:**

**Option 1: Regular Schooling (Class 9-12)**

**Class 9-10:** General curriculum (same for all)
- Tamil/English, Maths, Science, Social Science
- 10th Board Exam முக்கியம்!

**Class 11-12 Streams:**

| Stream | Subjects | Career Path |
|--------|----------|-------------|
| Science (Maths) | Phy, Chem, Maths, Bio/CS | Engineering, Architecture |
| Science (Bio) | Phy, Chem, Bio, Maths | Medicine, Pharmacy, Nursing |
| Commerce | Accounts, Economics, Commerce | CA, Banking, Business |
| Arts | History, Economics, Pol Science | Law, Civil Services, Teaching |
| Vocational | Trade-specific | Direct employment |

**Option 2: ITI (Industrial Training Institute)**
- After Class 8/10
- Trades: Electrician, Fitter, Mechanic, etc.
- Duration: 1-2 years
- Direct job opportunity

**Option 3: Polytechnic (Diploma)**
- After Class 10
- Engineering diploma
- Duration: 3 years
- Lateral entry to engineering

**எப்படி decide செய்வது?**
1. Interest என்ன?
2. 10th marks based eligibility
3. Career goal என்ன?
4. Family situation consider

**Guidance:**
- School counselor
- Career guidance centers
- tnsdc.in for skill courses

instruction: Manikkavasagar yaar?
output: Manikkavasagar - 'Thiruvasagam' ezhuthiya Saiva punidhiar. Pandiya mannaroda amaichcharaaga irundhavar. Thirupperunduraiyil Sivanai sandhiththu ellavattraiyum vittu bhakthan aanaar. 'Thiruvasagaththukku urugaadhaar oru vaasagaththukkum urugaar' enbadhu famous pazhamozhi. Chidambarathil Sivanidm aikyamaanaar endru nambappadugiradhu. 8-vadhu Thirumurai Thiruvasagam. Unarchi miguntha bhakthi poetry.

instruction: Business partnership dispute - partner பணம் தர மறுக்கிறார்
output: Options: 1) Partnership deed terms check, 2) Arbitration (if clause exists), 3) Civil Court suit (dissolution + accounts), 4) Criminal (if cheating proved - IPC 420). Partnership deed written இல்லாவிட்டால் proof difficult. Accounts settlement mandatory.

instruction: 'Write product reviews, 100 per review, unlimited earning' nu website paathen. 500 registration fee.
output: Review writing legit irundhaalum - registration fee kekaadhu. Paid review sites direct pay pannuvaanga. 500 fee site - either no payment later or endless 'premium membership' demands. Swagbucks, Toluna - legit survey sites irukku, free registration.

instruction: School dropout-ஆகிவிட்டேன், படிப்பை continue செய்ய என்ன வழி?
output: Options: 1) NIOS (National Institute of Open Schooling) - 10th/12th complete 2) TN State Open School - Tamil medium available 3) Private appearance through Distance Education 4) Skill training + later education. NIOS: www.nios.ac.in, exams twice a year, study at own pace. Age no bar. After 10th/12th: Regular college admission possible. Many successful people are NIOS students.

instruction: CMCHIS hospital-ல் treatment refuse பண்றாங்க, என்ன செய்வது?
output: Complaint options: 1) Hospital CMCHIS desk - escalate to manager, 2) CMCHIS helpline: 104, 3) District CMCHIS coordinator (Collector office), 4) Online: cmchistn.com grievance portal. Common issues: Card not working - call 104 for real-time activation. Hospital de-empanelment: Report to district coordinator. Emergency: Any hospital must treat - claim later.

instruction: Valluvar Kottam endraal enna? Angge enna irukkudhu?
output: Valluvar Kottam Chennai Nungambakkathil ulla Thiruvalluvar ninaividam. 1976-la thirakkapattathu. Ulle: 1) 133 adi uyara gopuram (133 adhigaarangal), 2) 1330 kuralgalum granite-la porikappattuLLana, 3) Auditorium - 4000 per amaralam, 4) Temple chariot replica, 5) Azhagiya thottam. Entry free. Morning 8 AM - Evening 6 PM thirandhirukkum.

instruction: Patta என்றால் என்ன? Patta பெயர் மாற்றுவது எப்படி?
output: Patta = Revenue record showing land ownership. Transfer: 1) Apply at Taluk office/eservices.tn.gov.in, 2) Submit: Sale deed, old patta, EC, ID proof, 3) Revenue Inspector verification, 4) Tahsildar approval. Time: 30-45 days. Online status track பண்ணலாம்.

instruction: Stamp duty எவ்வளவு கட்டணும்?
output: Tamil Nadu-ல்: Stamp duty 7%, Registration fee 4% = Total 11% of property value (guideline value அல்லது sale value - எது அதிகமோ அது). Women single owner-க்கு stamp duty 1% concession. Agricultural land-க்கு lower rates.

instruction: Exam day-ல் sick ஆயிட்டேன், alternative option இருக்கா?
output: Options vary by exam: Board exams - No re-exam, arrear attempt only. Competitive exams - Generally no re-test. College internal - Medical certificate submit, re-test possible. Medical emergency: 1) Get doctor certificate immediately 2) Inform exam authority same day 3) Apply for special consideration. Some exams: PWD/Medical emergency provisions exist. NEET/JEE: One attempt lost, next year continue. Prevention: Health priority before exams, insurance coverage.

instruction: WhatsApp message 'CBSE board training mandatory. Register with 5000 fee for CBSE certified teacher status.' Idhuvum mandatory aa?
output: CBSE training programs announced through schools, not WhatsApp. Official CBSE training through DIKSHA platform is free. 'CBSE certified teacher' is not an official designation. Schools receive training circulars officially - ask your administration.

instruction: Fake website-ல் shopping பண்ணி fraud ஆனது - complaint எப்படி?
output: Steps: 1) Payment bank-க்கு chargeback request, 2) cybercrime.gov.in complaint, 3) Consumer forum (seller fraud), 4) Police FIR (IPC 420). Evidence save பண்ணுங்க: Website screenshots, payment receipts, communication. Domain registrar-க்கும் report பண்ணலாம்.

instruction: Civil case file செய்ய என்ன procedure?
output: Steps: 1) Lawyer consult, 2) Plaint draft, 3) Court fee pay, 4) Filing, 5) Summons to defendant, 6) Written statement, 7) Issues framing, 8) Evidence, 9) Arguments, 10) Judgment. Time: 2-5 years (varies). e-Courts: ecourts.gov.in case status track.

instruction: Chennai-ல் புதிய Metro Water Connection எப்படி வாங்குவது? Online apply செய்யலாமா?
output:
**CMWSSB (Chennai Metro Water) - New Connection:**

**Online Application:**
1. Website: chennaimetrowater.tn.gov.in
2. Online Services → New Connection
3. Register / Login
4. Fill application
5. Upload documents
6. Pay fee online

**Offline Application:**
- Area Engineer Office
- CMWSSB Head Office

**Documents Required:**
- Property document (Patta / Sale Deed)
- Building Approval Plan
- Property Tax Receipt
- Aadhaar Card
- Passport Photo
- Existing water bill (if any)

**Types of Connection:**

| Type | Monthly Charge |
|------|---------------|
| Domestic | ₹70-400 (based on usage) |
| Commercial | Higher rates |
| Industrial | Highest |

**Process:**

**Step 1:** Application Submit

**Step 2:** Site Inspection
- Feasibility check
- Pipeline proximity
- Road cutting requirement

**Step 3:** Estimate
- Connection charge
- Road cutting charge (if any)
- Deposit

**Approximate Costs:**
| Item | Amount |
|------|--------|
| Connection Charge | ₹500-2,000 |
| Security Deposit | ₹500-1,000 |
| Road Cutting | ₹5,000-20,000 (if needed) |

**Step 4:** Payment

**Step 5:** Connection
- Time: 15-30 days (normal)
- Road cutting: 1-2 months

**No Water Supply Area:**
- Tanker request: chennaimetrowater.tn.gov.in
- Borewell permission from CMWSSB

**Complaints:**
- Helpline: 044-4567 4567
- App: CMWSSB Mobile App
- Email: customercare@cmwssb.tn.gov.in

**Bill Payment:**
- Online: chennaimetrowater.tn.gov.in
- PayTM, PhonePe, etc.
- Area Office
- Due: Monthly
- Delay penalty applies

instruction: NEEDS (New Entrepreneur-cum-Enterprise Development Scheme) endraal enna?
output: Self-employment loan for youth. Amount: Up to ₹5 lakh (25% subsidy on project cost). Eligibility: 21-35 years (up to 45 for SC/ST/Women), 8th pass, TN resident. Sectors: Manufacturing, Service, Trading. Subsidy: General 25%, SC/ST/Women 30%. Training: Free mandatory EDP training. Apply: DIC (District Industries Centre). Documents: Project report, Education proof, Community certificate, Bank no-objection. Repayment: 3-7 years.

instruction: புதிய ஆதார் அட்டை எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: Visit nearest Aadhaar Enrollment Center (find at uidai.gov.in), carry identity proof (Voter ID/PAN/Passport), address proof (Ration Card/EB Bill), and age proof (Birth Certificate/SSLC). Biometric capture will be done. First enrollment is FREE. Aadhaar delivered within 90 days.

instruction: Email vandhuchu 'Restaurant rating improvement service. 15,000 for 4.5 star guarantee.' Rating improve aagum aa?
output: Fake review services violate Swiggy/Zomato terms - can get you delisted. Ratings improve through genuine food quality and service. 'Guaranteed ratings' means fake reviews - illegal and risky. Focus on actual customer satisfaction, not bought ratings.

instruction: Colleague ennai backstab panninaal enna seiya vendum?
output: 'Piranpazhi kooruvan thanpazhi yullum thirantherindhu koorap padum'. Pirarai pazhippavan than kuraigalaiyum expose pannikolvaan. Karma works! Don't retaliate - stay dignified. 'Theeyavai theeya payaththalaal' - bad actions bring bad results to them. Focus on your work.

instruction: Road accident-ல் என்ன செய்யணும்?
output: Steps: 1) Injured-க்கு first aid, 2) 108 ambulance call, 3) Police 100 call, 4) Photos/videos எடுங்க, 5) Witness details collect, 6) FIR file (or police will file). Good Samaritan law: Help பண்றவர்களுக்கு legal protection உண்டு.

instruction: Fever 3 days aachu, hospital poganumaa?
output: Go to hospital if: 1) Fever >103°F (39.4°C), 2) Fever with rash, 3) Severe headache/stiff neck, 4) Difficulty breathing, 5) Persistent vomiting, 6) Confusion, 7) Not responding to paracetamol, 8) Underlying conditions (diabetes, heart), 9) Children/elderly - earlier threshold. Dengue season: Blood test after day 3 of fever. Self-care: Hydration, rest, paracetamol (not aspirin for dengue suspected).

instruction: Stray dog bite aanaal compensation kidaikkumaa?
output: Corporation/Municipality nilai poruthadhu. Complaint: Corporation + Animal Welfare Board. Compensation: Civil Court suit against local body (negligence). Medical expenses claim. ABC (Animal Birth Control) program failure prove pannanum. Police complaint-um possible.

instruction: Gym membership cancel பண்ண விடல, என்ன செய்வது?
output: Consumer rights: 1) Written cancellation request கொடுங்க, 2) Refund policy check - pro-rata refund கேளுங்க, 3) Unfair terms (no cancellation ever) = void under Consumer Protection Act, 4) Refuse பண்ணா: Consumer Forum complaint - Rs.1 lakh-க்குள் = District Forum. Medical reason cancellation: Doctor certificate கொடுத்தா usually accept பண்றாங்க.

instruction: Eviction notice vandhaal ethanai naal time kidaikkum?
output: Agreement-la mention seidha notice period (1-3 months) kidaikkum. Court through eviction na reasonable time koduppaanga. Rent default case-la 15 days notice koduthu arrears pay seiyya chance tharuvaanga.

instruction: Infosys Foundation scholarship students-ku kidaikkuma?
output: Infosys Foundation Programs: 1) Merit scholarships through partner NGOs 2) Rural education support 3) Research grants for PhD students 4) Infosys Prize - established researchers. Direct student scholarship: Through Buddy4Study partner programs. Engineering students: Campus recruitment preference. Apply: Check www.infosys.org annually for specific programs.

instruction: Online order varavilla - refund eppadi peruvathu?
output: Steps: 1) Website/App-la refund request raise pannunga, 2) Email-la written complaint anuppunga, 3) Payment bank-kku chargeback request kodunga (credit card), 4) Response illaattal NCH (1800-11-4000) complaint, 5) Consumer forum case podunga. E-commerce company 5-7 days-la acknowledge seyyanum.

instruction: DV case-la enna relief kidaikkum?
output: Reliefs under DV Act: 1) Protection order (abuse stop), 2) Residence order (shared household-la stay), 3) Monetary relief (maintenance, medical, compensation), 4) Custody order, 5) Compensation. Ex-parte order (urgent) 2-3 days-la kidaikkum.

instruction: 'Work from hostel - Data entry job, daily 3 hours, monthly 15,000, registration 1000' nu Instagram ad. Pocket money ku useful, join pannalama?
output: Legitimate data entry jobs registration fee kekaadhu. 1000 vaangitu simple work kuduppaanga initially - then 'software fee', 'certification fee' more demands. Monthly 15,000 for 3 hours - too good, basic math fail. Internshala, LinkedIn verified internships try pannunga.

instruction: Hall ticket missing, exam-ku poga mudiyumaa?
output: Emergency solutions: 1) Download duplicate from exam portal (DigiLocker link) 2) Contact exam centre - they have candidate list 3) Carry Aadhaar + Photo ID as backup 4) School/College principal letter 5) Reach early, explain to centre supervisor. For board exams: School coordinator can help. For competitive exams: Most allow with ID proof + declaration. Prevention: Download multiple copies, keep in phone, email to self. Last resort: Exam board helpline.

instruction: Banking and Financial matters-la common thavarugal enna?
output:
Bank Account:
❌ Jan Dhan needs minimum balance → ✅ Zero balance account
❌ Nomination = Legal Heir → ✅ Nominee is trustee, not owner
❌ Joint holder has automatic rights → ✅ Check Either or Survivor clause

Insurance:
❌ PMJJBY/PMSBY auto-renews → ✅ Must renew by June 1, need balance
❌ PMJJBY covers suicide → ✅ First year not covered
❌ PMSBY covers all accidents → ✅ Only permanent disability

Tax:
❌ Senior Citizens don't pay tax → ✅ Only up to ₹3 lakh exempt (60-80)
❌ Agricultural income fully exempt → ✅ State tax may apply
❌ PPF interest is taxable → ✅ Fully exempt (EEE status)

Loan:
❌ Education loan needs collateral → ✅ Up to ₹7.5 lakh collateral-free
❌ KCC interest is always 4% → ✅ Only for timely repayment

instruction: Followed celebrity page 'iPhone 15 Giveaway - Follow + Tag 3 friends + Pay 500 shipping to claim.' I won nu DM vandhudhu. Legitimate aa?
output: Fake celebrity pages - verification badge check pannunga. Real giveaways shipping fee kekaadhu. 500 pay pannina - more fees varum, iPhone varaadhu. 'Tag friends' = scam spread mechanism. Ignore fake giveaways.

instruction: Thirukkuralukku vera enna peyargal ullana?
output: Thirukkuralukku pala peyargal undu: 1) Muppaal - moondru pirivugal iruppathaal, 2) Utthara Vedam - therkku-oda vedam, 3) Deiva Nool - deiveega nool, 4) Podhu Marai - ella madhangalukkum podhuvana nool, 5) Tamil Marai - Tamilar-oda punidha nool, 6) Poiyaa Mozhi - unmaiyaana vaarthaikaal.

instruction: Competitive exam preparation-ku daily routine eppadi irukka venum?
output: Ideal routine: 5:00 AM - wake up, fresh topics study (2-3 hrs). 8:00 AM - breakfast, current affairs. 9:00 AM - Practice/mock tests. 12:00 PM - lunch, short rest. 2:00 PM - revision, notes making. 5:00 PM - exercise/break. 6:00 PM - optional subjects. 9:00 PM - light revision, daily news. 10:00 PM - sleep. Weekly: 1 full mock test. Monthly: syllabus completion target vaiyunga.

instruction: En paiyan accident nu hospital call pannudhu da. 1 lakh urgent nu. Bayama irukku.
output: Ayya, panic aagaadheenga! First unga paiyan number ku direct call pannunga. Real hospital ipdi random call panni UPI kekkaadhu. Verify pannunga first, transfer pannaadheenga.

instruction: TNMSC pharmacy stores enge irukku?
output: TNMSC = Tamil Nadu Medical Services Corporation. Stores: All government hospitals, standalone Fair Price Medicine Shops. Prices: 20-50% cheaper. Quality: Government-procured, tested. Items: Medicines, surgical items, consumables. Location: tnmsc.com for store locator. Government hospital patients: Medicines from TNMSC pharmacy often free (in-patient).

instruction: Marriage registration கட்டாயமா? எங்கே பண்றது?
output: Tamil Nadu-ல் Compulsory Registration of Marriages Act 2009-ன் கீழ் கட்டாயம். Register: 1) Hindu Marriage Act - Registrar of Marriages (Sub-Registrar office), 2) Special Marriage Act - Marriage Registrar. Online apply: serviceonline.gov.in. Documents: Age proof, address proof, photos, invitation card, witnesses.

instruction: Coaching centre-kku anuppanuma, self-study poduma?
output: Paiyan/ponnoda learning style paarunga. Self-disciplined-aa irundha self-study + online resources podhum. Otherwise coaching udhavum. Free government coaching (Naan Mudhalvan, TNPSC free coaching) try pannunga mudhalla.

instruction: Scholarship apply பண்ணேன், status எப்படி check பண்றது?
output: Status check methods: 1) NSP login - dashboard shows status 2) PFMS portal - payment tracking 3) State portal - respective department 4) SMS alerts (if registered) 5) College scholarship cell. Common statuses: Pending verification, Under process, Sanctioned, Disbursed, Rejected. Rejected: Check defect list, re-apply with correct documents. Timeline: 2-6 months from application. Grievance: Portal helpdesk option.

instruction: License renewal எப்போது பண்ணணும்?
output: Non-transport: 20 years validity (age 50 வரை), பிறகு 5 years. Transport: 3 years. Renewal: Expiry-க்கு 1 year முன் அல்லது 1 year பின் (late fee applicable). Online: parivahan.gov.in. Expired license-உடன் drive பண்ணினால் fine Rs.5,000.

instruction: நான் 65 வயது முதியவர். தனியாக இருக்கிறேன். என்னென்ன benefits, safety measures பெறலாம்?
output:
Monthly Income/Pension:
1. Old Age Pension (TN) - ₹1,000/month (60-79), ₹1,500 (80+)
2. PMVVY (LIC) - ₹15 லட்சம் → ₹9,250/month
3. SCSS (Post Office) - 8.2% interest quarterly

Healthcare:
4. CMCHIS/Ayushman Bharat - ₹5 லட்சம் free treatment
5. Rashtriya Vayoshri Yojana - Free walking stick, wheelchair, hearing aid
6. PM Janaushadhi - 50-90% மலிவான மருந்துகள்

Safety & Legal:
7. Elder Line - 14567 (24x7)
8. Maintenance Tribunal - பிள்ளைகள் பராமரிக்கவில்லை என்றால் - ₹10,000/month order
9. Police Senior Citizen Cell - Regular check-ups

Travel: Railway 40-50% discount, TN Bus free
Banking: Senior Citizen FD - Extra 0.5% interest

instruction: En bag-la ella documents-um thirudu poyiduchu (Aadhaar, PAN, DL, Voter ID, Bank Card). Enna seyvadhu?
output:
Immediately:
1. Police FIR - List all documents, get FIR copy
2. Block Bank Cards - Call helpline immediately (SBI: 1800-111-111)
3. Block SIM - If phone stolen

Get duplicate documents:
4. Aadhaar - eaadhaar.uidai.gov.in (Free instant download)
5. PAN - eportal.incometax.gov.in (Free e-PAN)
6. Driving License - parivahan.gov.in (₹200-500)
7. Voter ID - voters.eci.gov.in or Voter Helpline App
8. Bank Cards - Bank branch with FIR (7-10 days)
9. Ration Card - tnpds.gov.in

Important: Lock Aadhaar biometrics at myaadhaar.uidai.gov.in

instruction: தமிழ்நாடு அரசு வெளிநாடு படிப்புக்கு scholarship தருகிறதா?
output: ஆம், BC/MBC/SC/ST மாணவர்களுக்கு: 1) BC/MBC Welfare Department - ₹20 lakh வரை 2) Adi Dravidar Welfare - SC மாணவர்களுக்கு full scholarship 3) CM's Special Scholarship. Central schemes: 1) National Overseas Scholarship (SC/ST) 2) MOMA Scholarship (Minorities). Apply through respective department websites. Merit-based selection.

instruction: Scholarship status eppadi check seivathu?
output: Status check options: 1) NSP portal login - application status tab 2) PFMS portal (Public Financial Management System) - payment tracking 3) State scholarship portal - individual login 4) SMS alerts (registered mobile) 5) College scholarship cell. Payment delay: 2-3 months normal. Rejected aanaal: Defect list paarthu correct documents upload. Grievance: helpdesk on portal.

instruction: Arya Vaidya Sala, Kottakkal branch TN-ல் இருக்கா?
output: Yes! AVS Kottakkal branches in TN: 1) Chennai - Multiple clinics, 2) Coimbatore, 3) Madurai. Services: 1) OPD consultation, 2) Panchakarma, 3) Pharmacy. Other Kerala chains in TN: 1) Arya Vaidya Pharmacy (AVP), Coimbatore, 2) Nagarjuna, 3) SNA Oushadhasala. Authentic: These are established, registered organizations. Products: Available in many pharmacies.

instruction: Employment Exchange-ல் register செய்வது worth-ஆ?

instruction: Voter ID - New registration, address change, name correction - full process?
output:
New Registration:

Eligibility: Indian citizen, 18 years on Jan 1 (qualifying date), Ordinary resident

Apply Online:
1. voters.eci.gov.in OR Voter Helpline App
2. 'New Voter Registration' → Form 6
3. Fill: Personal info, Address (where you want to vote), Family/Neighbor reference (existing voter)
4. Upload: Age proof, Address proof, Passport photo
5. Submit

Verification: BLO (Booth Level Officer) visit → Verify residence → May ask neighbors (2-4 weeks)

Collection: SMS notification → Download e-EPIC (Voter Helpline App) → Physical card from BLO/Election Office

Address Change (Within State):
1. voters.eci.gov.in → Form 6 (new address)
2. Upload new address proof
3. BLO verification → Old entry deleted automatically

Address Change (Different State):
- Apply Form 6 in new state → Added to new constituency → Deleted from old automatically

Name/DOB/Photo Correction:
1. voters.eci.gov.in → Form 8
2. Select correction type
3. Upload supporting document
4. Submit → Correction in 15-30 days

Delete Entry (Shifted/Deceased): Form 7

Important: Jan 1 qualifying date, Electoral Roll revision Oct-Nov yearly

instruction: 99acres la flat paathaen - 2BHK Race Course la 7000 rent. Owner call pannaar 'NRI irukkaen, advance 40K transfer pannunga, key courier pannuren' nu. Photos nalla irukkudhae, genuine aa saami?
output: Scam saami. Market rate la half ku below irukkunu red flag. 'NRI' excuse - direct meet avoid panna. Photos vera listing la irundhu copy pannirukkanga. NEVER pay without seeing property. Race Course, Saibaba Colony la rental scam romba common. Owner/agent in person meet pannunga.

instruction: IGNOU-ல் என்னென்ன படிப்புகள் உள்ளன?

instruction: Legal heir certificate எப்போது தேவை?

instruction: DDU-GKY (Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Grameen Kaushalya Yojana) என்றால் என்ன?
output: கிராம இளைஞர்களுக்கு Skill Training + Placement. தகுதி: 15-35 வயது (SC/ST-க்கு 45 வரை), BPL/Low income குடும்பம், கிராமப்புற. Training: 576 hours minimum, Residential (உணவு/தங்குமிடம் free). Sectors: IT, Healthcare, Retail, Hospitality, Automotive. Placement: 70% mandatory placement, ₹6,000+ salary. Incentive: Training முடிந்த 3 மாதம் employment-க்கு bonus. instruction: Payir kadan (Crop Loan) kuraintha vattiyil eppadi vaanguvadhu? KCC endraal enna?
output:

- Withdraw anytime

instruction: Marks card-ல் name/DOB wrong, correct பண்ண எப்படி?

Time: 15-30 days. Portal: Online application available on DGE website. For university: Controller of Examinations. Gazette notification: For legal name change.

instruction: Tenant union form pannalaamaa? Collective bargaining legal-aa?
output: Legal! Tenant associations/unions form pannalam. Benefits: 1) Collective voice against unfair practices, 2) Negotiate with owner associations, 3) Legal aid pooling, 4) Information sharing. Registration: Societies Registration Act-in keezh. Apartment complexes: Resident Welfare Association (RWA) common. Protect yourselves through unity.

instruction: Facebook/Instagram/WhatsApp la scammer report eppidi pannuradhu?
output: WhatsApp: Open chat → Tap name → 'Report', forward scam to wa.me/919845098450 (India tip line). Instagram: Profile → Three dots → 'Report' → 'Scam or fraud', or help.instagram.com. Facebook: Profile/Post → Three dots → 'Find support or report', facebook.com/hacked if compromised. Telegram: Profile → Report, email abuse@telegram.org, @notoscam bot. Twitter/X: Profile → Three dots → 'Report'. LinkedIn: Profile → More → 'Report/Block', linkedin.com/help/linkedin/ask/fraud.

instruction: Final year-la irukken. Government job prepare pannanum. Campus placement-a vidalaamaa?
output: Don't skip placement! Reasons: 1) Government job = uncertain timeline (1-3 years) 2) Private job = income while preparing 3) Age limit allows both 4) Financial independence. Strategy: Campus placement attend + clear any job → Join → Prepare TNPSC/SSC evenings/weekends → Clear govt exam → Resign → Join government. Many success stories of working professionals clearing exams. Private job experience also valued. Safety net important - family shouldn't struggle while you prepare.

instruction: ITI படித்த பிறகு engineering சேரலாமா?
output: ஆம், Lateral Entry scheme உள்ளது. ITI + 2 years relevant work experience அல்லது ITI + 1 year apprenticeship = Diploma 2nd year direct admission. Diploma முடித்த பிறகு = B.E./B.Tech 2nd year. LEET (Lateral Entry Entrance Test) சில states-ல் உள்ளது. TN-ல் marks basis lateral entry available. Career ladder: ITI → Diploma → B.E. → M.Tech.

instruction: Ayurveda daily routine (Dinacharya) என்ன?

Benefits: Disease prevention, energy, longevity.

instruction: Sexual harassment complaint எப்படி செய்வது?
output: Internal Complaints Committee (ICC)-க்கு written complaint. ICC இல்லாவிட்டால் Local Complaints Committee (District level). Time limit: 3 months from incident. POSH Act 2013 protection. Anonymous complaint-உம் valid. Retaliation-க்கு protection உண்டு.

instruction: Dementia patient-க்கு legal protection என்ன?
output: Protections: 1) Guardianship: Court can appoint guardian for person/property, 2) Power of Attorney: Execute while still competent, 3) Senior Citizens Act: Protection from exploitation, 4) RPD Act: Disability rights. Financial: 1) Joint account with trusted person, 2) Nomination in all accounts, 3) Will execution early. Healthcare: Advance directive possible. Abuse: Report to police, Senior Citizens Tribunal.

instruction: Board exam-ல் Re-totalling vs Re-valuation - என்ன difference?
output: Re-totalling: Marks கூட்டுதல் மட்டும் check. Answer sheet re-read இல்லை. Cost: ₹50/subject. Time: 10-15 days. Success rate: Low. Re-valuation: Full paper re-evaluation by new examiner. Cost: ₹300-500/subject. Time: 30-45 days. Success rate: Higher if genuine mistake. Apply within: 15 days of result. Portal: DGE website. Choose wisely - re-valuation for major doubt only.

instruction: Mental illness treatment government hospital-la kidaikkumaa?
output: Yes! Free psychiatric services available. Where: 1) Institute of Mental Health (Kilpauk - Chennai), 2) District Mental Health Program (DMHP) centres, 3) Medical college psychiatry OPD. Services: 1) Consultation, 2) Medicines, 3) Counseling, 4) Admission if needed. DMHP: Every district has mental health team. Helpline: iCALL - 9152987821, Vandrevala - 1860-2662-345. Stigma-free treatment encouraged.

instruction: Board exam-ku eppadi thirambaada padippathu?
output: Tips: 1) Previous year question papers practice pannunga 2) Time table pottu padiyunga 3) Blue print padi important chapters-ku priority 4) Daily 6-8 hours study 5) Weekly revision 6) Health-a kavaniyunga - proper sleep, food 7) Group study avoid, self-study better. TN government question bank: www.dge.tn.gov.in. Sample papers free download.

instruction: Pollution complaint enge koduppadhu?
output: TNPCB (Tamil Nadu Pollution Control Board): tnpcb.gov.in. NGT (National Green Tribunal): Chennai bench. District Environment Engineer. Complaint types: Air, water, noise, hazardous waste. Evidence: Photos, videos, test reports. Public interest litigation-um possible.

instruction: Bank exam Reasoning section eppadi crack panrathu?
output: Reasoning topics: Puzzles & Seating Arrangement (30-40% weightage), Syllogism, Blood Relations, Direction, Coding-Decoding, Inequality. Strategy: 1) Puzzles - daily 10 practice 2) Logic rules memorize 3) Speed improve through timed practice 4) Easy questions first in exam 5) Skip time-consuming Qs. Resources: RS Aggarwal, Rakesh Yadav, Testbook app. Time: 35 questions in 20-25 minutes. Practice = key to success.

instruction: State board vs CBSE - எது better preparation?
output: Comparison: State Board - Regional language strong, local competitive exams friendly. CBSE - National level exams (JEE, NEET) aligned, English medium uniform. For NEET/JEE: CBSE syllabus closer. For TNPSC: State board better. Reality: Both boards students crack all exams - preparation matters more than board. State board + NCERT combination = best for competitive exams. TN State board now NCERT aligned.

instruction: Home remedies safe-aa? Eppodhu avoid pannanum?
output: Some safe: Ginger for nausea, turmeric milk, salt water gargle, honey for cough (not <1 year). Avoid home remedies: 1) Serious illness (high fever, breathing difficulty), 2) When already on prescription medicines (interactions), 3) Wounds/burns (infection risk), 4) Children/pregnant (specific risks). Rule: Home remedy not working in 2-3 days = see doctor. Never apply: Cow dung on wounds, kerosene on head lice (dangerous!).

instruction: Pain killers addiction ஆகுமா? Control என்ன?
output: Some can! Opioids (Tramadol, Codeine, Morphine): High addiction potential - Schedule H/X. NSAIDs (Ibuprofen, Diclofenac): Lower risk but long-term issues (stomach, kidney). Paracetamol: Relatively safe but liver damage if overdose. Rules: Opioids = strict prescription, register entry. Chronic pain: Doctor supervision essential. Addiction help: De-addiction centres, psychiatrist.

instruction: Scholarship panam eppo varum-nga? Status check panna mudiyuma?
output: NSP portal-la login pannu/pannunga, status paaru/paarunga. PFMS site-layum payment track pannalam. 2-3 months edukkum normally. Reject aanaa defect list check pannu/pannunga.

instruction: Appointment letter kodukkala - sattavirodhamaa?
output: Aama. Written employment contract kodukkanum. Appointment letter contents: Designation, salary, probation period, notice period, duties. Oral appointment-um valid aanaal prove panradhu kashtam. Always insist on written letter + copy vaangunga.

instruction: Yearly evvalavu percentage rent increase niyaayamanadhu?
output: Sattathula fixed percentage illa. Practice-la 5-10% yearly increase normal. But market rate, inflation, property value increase ivai consider aagum. Unreasonable increase-a Rent Authority moolam dispute seyyalam.

instruction: Shirodhara therapy என்ன? Benefits என்ன?
output: Shirodhara = Continuous pouring of medicated oil/buttermilk on forehead. Duration: 30-60 minutes per session. Benefits: 1) Stress relief, 2) Anxiety, depression, 3) Insomnia, 4) Headaches/migraines, 5) Hair problems, 6) Memory improvement. Types: Thaila dhara (oil), Takra dhara (buttermilk), Kashaya dhara (decoction). Sessions: 7-14 days typically. Where: Ayurveda centers, some wellness spas (verify authenticity).

instruction: Call vandhudhu 'Police welfare fund contribution audit. Pay 2000 to clear discrepancy.' Welfare fund la issue irukka?
output: Police welfare contributions deducted at source from salary. No separate payments for 'audit clearance'. Such calls are scams targeting police personnel. Check with your station accounts or district welfare office for any actual issues.

instruction: முக்கிய அரசு இணையதளங்கள் என்ன?

instruction: Free mental health treatment எங்கே கிடைக்கும்?
output: Government facilities: 1) Institute of Mental Health, Kilpauk (Chennai), 2) District Mental Health Program (DMHP) - every district, 3) Medical college psychiatry OPD, 4) Taluk/District hospital psychiatry unit. Free services: Consultation, medicines (basic), counseling. DMHP: Outreach to community, schools, PHCs. Appointment: Usually walk-in OPD or through PHC referral.

instruction: SMS vandhuchu 'Tax audit software license expiring. Renew at 8000 or face ICAI penalty.' Software license ku ICAI penalty varudhaa?
output: ICAI doesn't mandate specific software for tax audit. Software licenses are between you and vendor, not ICAI matter. No ICAI penalty for software issues. Check with your actual software provider for genuine renewals.

instruction: கோயிலுக்கு போகும்போது என்ன dress code follow பண்ணணும்?
output: Dress code guidelines: 1) Men - வேட்டி/துண்டு preferred, lungdi ok, shorts allowed in some temples, 2) Women - saree/churidar preferred, dress with dupatta ok, 3) No sleeveless, revealing clothes, 4) Remove footwear at entrance, 5) Big temples may rent dhotis if needed. Specific temples like Padmanabhaswamy (Kerala) strict - only traditional dress. Tirumala moderately strict. Most TN temples flexible but modest dress respectful. Carry plastic bag for footwear.

instruction: Rural students-ku special benefits ulladha?
output: Aam, special benefits: 1) 7.5% government school quota in Engineering/Medical 2) Rural area nativity certificate benefits 3) Panchayat Union school students special coaching 4) Moovalur Ramamirtham Ammaiyar Scheme - girl students monthly stipend 5) Free coaching for competitive exams. District Collector office moolam apply pannalam. EMIS number irundhaal automatically eligible.

instruction: Roommate-oda problem irukku. Handle panrathu eppadi?
output: Tips: 1) Communication first - politely discuss issues 2) Set ground rules - sleep time, study time, cleanliness 3) Respect personal space 4) Compromise needed from both sides 5) If serious issue - approach warden 6) Room change request (last resort) 7) Avoid gossip, direct conversation better. Remember: You're both adjusting. Patience required. Good roommate = lifelong friend possible.

instruction: Income Certificate eppadi peruvadhu?
output: Apply at tneservices.tn.gov.in or Taluk Office. Documents: Aadhaar, ration card, self-declaration of income, salary slip (if employed). VAO enquiry at home possible. Time: 7-15 days. Fee: ₹20. Valid for 6 months to 1 year.

instruction: QR code scan panna panam poachu (reverse scam). Special recovery procedure irukka?
output: Why tricky: YOU authorized transaction (entered PIN), bank sees as 'legitimate'. But still possible: Step 1 (within 30 min): Call bank - 'Fraudulently induced to make payment', request beneficiary bank freeze. Step 2: Contact beneficiary bank from UPI ID (@oksbi = SBI, @okicici = ICICI). Step 3: FIR - Section 420 IPC (Cheating by inducement), Section 66D IT Act. Step 4: Collect QR code image, chat where asked to scan. Legal argument: 'Consent obtained by fraud is no consent'. Recovery: 20-30% if reported within 1 hour.

instruction: MA/M.Sc/M.Com padippu govt colleges-la eppadi seruvathu?
output: Admission method: 1) TNGASA PG Admissions portal 2) UG marks basis rank 3) Online counselling. Eligibility: Related UG degree 50% marks. Fee: Govt colleges-la ₹2,000-5,000/year only. Duration: 2 years. NET/SET exam-ku prepare aagalam.

instruction: Scholarship reject ஆயிடுச்சு, again apply பண்ணலாமா?
output: Yes, re-apply possible in most cases. Steps: 1) Check rejection reason on portal 2) Common issues: Wrong documents, income limit exceeded, duplicate application, bank account mismatch 3) Correct the issue 4) Re-apply in same/next cycle. Tips: Read defect list carefully, upload correct format (PDF/JPG), size limits follow, bank account in student name, Aadhaar-bank linked. Grievance: File complaint if wrongly rejected - evidence attach.

instruction: TN-ல் விவசாயிகளுக்கு இலவச மின்சாரம் என்ன?
output: விவசாய pump-sets-க்கு இலவச மின்சாரம். Coverage: All agricultural pump connections. Timing: Designated hours (usually night/off-peak). Types: LT Agricultural service, Free. Limit: Registration-ல் உள்ள HP-க்கு ஏற்ப. New Connection: TANGEDCO online apply, land documents, farmer ID. Solar Alternative: PM-KUSUM மூலம் solar pump-க்கு subsidy.

instruction: Spoken English course free-யாக எங்கே உள்ளது?
output: Free English training: 1) TNSDC - Communicative English 2) British Council online resources 3) NPTEL/SWAYAM - English courses 4) Employment exchange - soft skills training 5) NGOs - Pratham, Teach India. Apps: Duolingo, Hello English (free tier). Library-based conversation clubs. Government college students - Language lab access free. Interview skills + English combined courses available through TNSDC.

instruction: 'Anbilaar ellam thamakkuriyar' - idhoda vilakkam enna?
output: Kural: 'Anbilaar ellam thamakkuriyar anbudaiyaar enbum uriyar pirarkkuk'. Artham: Anbu illadhavargal ellavattraiyum thangalukkae vaithukkolvaargal. Aanaal anbu ullavargal thangal udalayum uyiraiyum pirarukkaaga tharuvaargal. Anboda sirappai indha kural kaattukkiradhu.

instruction: Concentration improve panna enna seiyanum?
output: Concentration tips: 1) Pomodoro technique - 25 min study, 5 min break 2) Mobile silent/away 3) Study table clean, good lighting 4) One subject at a time 5) Break tasks into smaller parts 6) Reward yourself after targets 7) Sleep 7-8 hours 8) Exercise daily 9) Meditation 10 minutes 10) Healthy food - avoid heavy meals. Environment: Same place, same time daily. Brain trains itself. Start with 30 min, increase gradually.

instruction: 8th class-la group select pannanuuma? Science/Commerce eppo choose panrathu?
output: Group selection: 10th varai common syllabus. 11th-la group choose. Early awareness: 8th/9th-la interests identify pannunga. Science-ku: Maths, Science strong irukkanum. Commerce-ku: Accounts, Business interest. Arts-ku: Language, Social studies interest. Advice: 10th mudikkum varai ella subjects-aiyum properly padiyunga. Final decision 10th result vandha piragu.

instruction: HIV status employer-kitta sollanuumaa?
output: NO! HIV status = highly confidential. HIV/AIDS Act 2017: 1) No mandatory testing for employment, 2) No disclosure to employer without consent, 3) No termination based on HIV status, 4) Anti-discrimination protection. Violation: Legal action against employer. Medical fitness: Can be declared fit without disclosing diagnosis. Exception: Healthcare workers - restricted duties (not termination).

instruction: Adoption-க்கு eligibility criteria என்ன?
output: CARA rules: 1) Age: 25-55 years, 2) Married couple: 2 years stable marriage, 3) Single parent: allowed (restrictions apply), 4) Income: sufficient to raise child, 5) Medical: physically/mentally fit, 6) No criminal record. Age difference with child: max 45 years.

instruction: Bank Jobs-ku ennenna exams irukku? Eligibility enna?

instruction: Matrimony site-la abroad NRI match vandhudhu, India vara flight ticket panam venum-nu solraanga

instruction: Online natural remedy videos/tips - trust பண்ணலாமா?
output: Be careful! Red flags: 1) "Cure for everything" claims, 2) No credentials shown, 3) Extreme claims without evidence, 4) Asking to stop doctor's medicines, 5) Selling expensive products. Trust: 1) Government AYUSH websites, 2) Established medical institutions, 3) Registered practitioners, 4) Research-backed information. Verify: Cross-check with multiple sources. Best: Consult qualified practitioner in person for treatment.

instruction: Bommalattam (Puppet show) patri sollungal?
output: Bommalattam - Tamil Nadu-oda traditional puppet theatre. Vagaigal: 1) Thol Bommalattam - leather shadow puppets (Andhra border areas), 2) Nool Bommalattam - string marionettes (Thanjavur area), 3) Kambu Bommalattam - rod puppets, 4) Kai Bommalattam - hand/glove puppets. Ramayana, Mahabharata kathaigal popular. Thanjavur puppets UNESCO recognized. Handicraft shops-la decorative puppets kidaikkum. Revival efforts nadakkinrana.

instruction: CMCHIS hospital-la treatment refuse panraanga, enna seivathu?

Common issues: Card not working - call 104 for real-time activation. Hospital de-empanelment: Report to district coordinator. Emergency: Any hospital must treat - claim later.

instruction: Hospital-ல bill ரொம்ப போட்டாங்க, என்ன பண்றது?
output: First - itemized bill கேளுங்க. Medicine MRP check பண்ணுங்க - MRP-க்கு மேல charge பண்ண கூடாது. Estimate இருந்தா compare பண்ணுங்க. Reasonable இல்லன்னா: 1) Hospital manager-கிட்ட complaint, 2) Consumer Forum, 3) DHS complaint. CMCHIS card இருந்தா - பல treatment free. Bill dispute = pay under protest (writing-ல) and then fight.

instruction: Call vandhuduchu yi - 'Unga account block aagudhuyyi, KYC update pannungayyi' nu. OTP kekkuraangayyi. Enna pannurathu?

instruction: MBA padippu Tamil Nadu-la enge padippathu?
output: Best options: 1) IIM Trichy (CAT score) 2) Anna University - MIT (TANCET) 3) Govt Arts Colleges (TANCET). TANCET exam: February-March. Eligibility: Any degree 50%. Govt college fee: ₹30,000-50,000/year. IIM fee: ₹20+ lakhs total. Scholarship opportunities irukku.

instruction: Mental hospital-ல் abuse நடக்குது - complain எங்கே?
output: Complaint options: 1) State Mental Health Authority, 2) Mental Health Review Board (district level), 3) Human Rights Commission (SHRC/NHRC), 4) Police (if physical/sexual abuse), 5) Health Department. Types of abuse: Physical restraints misuse, no consent treatment, inhumane conditions, denial of communication with family. Evidence: Photos if possible, witness statements, medical records.

instruction: Mentally ill person treatment-க்கு யார் consent தரணும்?
output: Mental Healthcare Act 2017 rules: 1) Nominated representative (patient designates when competent), 2) Family members (spouse, parents, sibling - in order), 3) No one available: Hospital board decision. Advance directive: Patient can write treatment preferences when competent. Involuntary admission: Only if danger to self/others - magistrate approval needed within 24 hours.

instruction: Hostel mess சாப்பாடு ஒத்துவரல. என்ன பண்றது?

Health: Don't skip meals, drink boiled water, maintain hygiene.

instruction: Tulsi plant benefits enna? Eppadi use panradhu?
output: Tulsi (Holy Basil) benefits: 1) Immunity booster, 2) Respiratory health (cough, cold, asthma), 3) Stress relief (adaptogen), 4) Blood sugar regulation, 5) Antibacterial, 6) Heart health. Uses: 1) Fresh leaves - 3-5 daily (chew), 2) Tulsi tea - leaves boiled in water, 3) Tulsi drops - available commercially, 4) Tulsi honey - cold remedy. Note: Avoid during pregnancy (in large amounts), blood thinner users. Grow at home: Easy, brings positive energy (traditional belief).

instruction: TATA Scholarship for students என்ன?

Eligibility: Income ₹4 lakh கீழ், 60%+ marks. Apply: Buddy4Study portal or direct application. Deadline varies.

instruction: CMCHIS card எப்படி apply பண்றது?
