instruction: Yaaro ennaip patri gossip panraanga - eppadi handle panradhu?
output: 'Kannindru kannarach sollinum sollarka munnindru pinnokkach sol'. Munnaal nalladhu pesi, pinnaal kettadhu pesuvadhai avoid pannungal. Gossip panravargal own credibility izhappaargal. Ignore them. 'Manathukkan maaasilan aadhal' - ungal manam clean-aa irundhaal podhum. Their words can't hurt you.

instruction: Rent increase accept panna maruthal enna aagum?
output: Owner agreement renew seyya marukkalam. Proper notice koduthu vacate seyyach sollalam. But agreement period mudiyum varai existing rent-la continue seyyalam. Forceful eviction illegal.

instruction: Free laptop scheme-க்கு எப்படி apply செய்வது?
output: TN Government Free Laptop Scheme: College 1st year students-க்கு. Auto-selection based on: 1) Government/Aided college admission 2) +2 marks 3) Community (SC/ST/BC/MBC priority). Process: College அளிக்கும் list அடிப்படையில் distribution. தனியாக apply செய்ய தேவையில்லை. Laptop worth: ₹15,000-20,000. Pre-loaded educational software இருக்கும். Service warranty 3 years.

instruction: Case status online-ல் எப்படி check பண்றது?
output: Websites: ecourts.gov.in (all courts), highcourtmadras.gov.in (Madras HC), sci.gov.in (Supreme Court). Search by: CNR number, party name, case number, advocate name. e-Courts app-உம் available. Cause list (daily hearing list) check பண்ணலாம்.

instruction: Driving license renew eppadi pannuradhu?
output: Expiry-ku 1 year munnadi apply pannalam. Expiry aana pinna 5 years varaikkum renew pannalam. Online: parivahan.gov.in. Documents: Old DL, Aadhaar, Medical certificate (40+ age). Fee: ₹200 + smart card fee.

instruction: Marks card-la name/DOB wrong, correct panna eppadi?
output: Correction process: 1) Apply to examination board (DGE for board exams) 2) Documents: Original marks card, Aadhaar, birth certificate, school bonafide 3) Affidavit (court/notary) 4) Newspaper advertisement (name change) 5) Processing fee ₹100-500. Time: 15-30 days. Portal: Online application available on DGE website. For university: Controller of Examinations. Gazette notification: For legal name change.

instruction: Unmai (truth) patri enna kuralgal ullana?
output: Kural: 'Vaaimai enappaduvadhu yaadhenin yaadhodrum theemai ilaadha solal'. Unmai enbadhu yaarukkum theengu seiyaadha vaarthaigalae. Melum: 'Thannennju arivadhu poiyarka poiththapin thanenjae thannai sudum'. Nenju arindhu poi sonnaal, andha nenjae unnai varuththum. Conscience never lies!

instruction: PF account balance எப்படி check பண்றது?
output: Methods: 1) EPFO portal: epfindia.gov.in (UAN login), 2) UMANG app, 3) SMS: EPFOHO UAN ENG to 7738299899, 4) Missed call: 011-22901406. UAN (Universal Account Number) வேணும். Employer-கிட்ட கேட்டு activate பண்ணுங்க.

instruction: Scholarship-ku apply panna enna document venum-pa?
output: Aadhaar, bank passbook (student name-la), income certificate, community certificate, marks card, photo, bonafide - ipdi ellam venum. Original + xerox + scan ready-a vechikko/vechikunga.

instruction: Whistleblower protection irukkaa?
output: Whistleblower Protection Act 2014: Corruption, misuse of power report pannuravarkalukku protection. Apply: Competent Authority (state level). Identity protection, victimization protection undu. Retaliation-kku penalty. Anonymous complaints-um accept.

instruction: En kuzhanthai methuvaga padikkudhu, school-la special help irukkaa?
output: Slow learners support: 1) NEET programme - remedial classes 2) Resource teachers in schools 3) Learning disability screening available 4) Extra coaching hours - afternoon sessions 5) IEDSS for special needs. School-la class teacher-a santhiyunga. BRC special educators ullana. Private assessment: Rs.500-2000 at government hospitals. Early intervention helps - don't delay.

instruction: Accident case-la police illaama treat panraangalaa?
output: Yes! Supreme Court ruling - treat first. Good Samaritan Law: 1) Bystanders can help without legal hassle, 2) Hospital must treat without police clearance, 3) MLC formalities = AFTER stabilization, 4) No detention of patient/helper. Police role: Come to hospital for statement - not a condition for treatment. Refusal to treat: Report to police, Health Department, media.

instruction: First time IT Return file pannanum - eppadi seyvadhu?
output:
Who should file: Gross income > ₹2.5 lakh (below 60), > ₹3 lakh (60-80), > ₹5 lakh (80+), TDS refund needed

Before Filing - Collect:
1. PAN Card (Aadhaar linked)
2. Form 16 (from employer)
3. Bank Statements (interest income)
4. Investment Proofs (80C, 80D)
5. Form 26AS (TDS details)
6. AIS (all income sources)

Filing Process:

Step 1 - Register:
1. eportal.incometax.gov.in
2. Register with PAN
3. Set password
4. Link Aadhaar

Step 2 - Select Form:
- ITR-1 (Sahaj): Salary up to ₹50 lakh, one house
- ITR-2: More than one house, capital gains
- ITR-4: Business income (presumptive)

Step 3 - Fill: Personal info → Income → Deductions → Tax calculation → Bank account

Step 4 - Verify: Pre-filled data check, Form 26AS match

Step 5 - Submit & e-Verify (within 30 days):
- Aadhaar OTP (easiest)
- Net Banking/Bank EVC/Demat

Deadline: July 31 (usually)

Refund: If TDS > Tax liability → Direct to bank. Track at eportal.incometax.gov.in

instruction: Isai Kuzhu, Naatiya Kuzhu competitions la win pannina enna benefit?
output: District/State level-la win pannina certificate, cash prize kedaikum. College admission-la extra marks weightage undu. Cultural quota-la admission peralaam. State artist-aaga recognition kedaikum.

instruction: COVID pola emergency-la price capping irukkumaa?
output: Government can cap prices in emergencies. COVID example: TN government capped - room charges, oxygen, medicines, CT scan rates. Authority: Epidemic Diseases Act, Disaster Management Act. Violation: License suspension, heavy fines. Current: Some COVID caps may still apply. Check: DHS notifications. Overcharging complaint: DHS, Consumer Forum.

instruction: Land survey எப்படி செய்வது? Cost என்ன?
output: Apply: Taluk Surveyor office. Private licensed surveyor-ஐயும் hire பண்ணலாம். Government survey fee: Rs.500-2000 (area based). Private surveyor: Rs.2000-10,000. Survey sketch legally valid document - boundary disputes-க்கு முக்கியம்.

instruction: Thirukkural eththanai mozhigalil mozhipeyarkkapattuLLadhu?
output: Thirukkural 82-kkum merpatta mozhigalil mozhipeyarkkapattuLLadhu. Bible-kku aduthpadiyaga adhiga mozhigalil mozhipeyarkkappatta nool-nu sollapadugiradhu. Mudhal English mozhipeyarppu 1886-la G.U. Pope-naal seiyappattadhu.

instruction: Thirukkuraloda amaippu eppadi irukkudhu?
output: Thirukkural moondru pirivugalaga amaindhuLLadhu: 1) Araththuppaal (38 adhigaarangal) - dharmam, nallozhukkam, 2) Porutpaal (70 adhigaarangal) - arasiyal, porulaadhaaram, 3) Kaamaththuppaal (25 adhigaarangal) - kaadhal, illara vaazhkai. Mothum 133 adhigaarangal, 1330 kuralpaakal. Ovvoru adhigaarathilum 10 kuralkal.

instruction: Scholarship-ku thevaiyana documents ennenna?
output: Standard documents: 1) Aadhaar card 2) Bank passbook (student name) 3) Income certificate (latest) 4) Caste/Community certificate 5) Bonafide certificate from institution 6) Previous year marks card 7) Passport size photo 8) Fee receipt. Special cases: Disability certificate, EWS certificate, BPL card, domicile certificate. Tip: Keep original + 3 photocopies + scanned PDF ready.

instruction: Abortion-kku husband consent venumaa?
output: NO! Woman's decision alone. MTP Act: Only woman's consent required (if adult). Husband cannot: 1) Force abortion, 2) Prevent abortion, 3) His consent not legally required. Minor: Parent/guardian consent needed. Confidentiality: Doctor cannot inform husband without woman's consent. Hospital asking husband consent: Wrong - complain.

instruction: Streedhan (woman's property) - husband எடுத்துக்கலாமா?
output: Streedhan = Woman's exclusive property (gifts at marriage, inheritance, earnings). Husband cannot: 1) Take without consent, 2) Sell or mortgage, 3) Claim ownership. Misuse: Criminal breach of trust (IPC 406) + Dowry Act violation if demand. Recovery: Civil suit + criminal complaint. Keep receipts, photos of jewelry. Joint locker: Inventory maintain பண்ணுங்க.

instruction: Weight loss-க்கு Ayurveda treatment?
output: Ayurveda approach: Not just weight loss - metabolic correction. Treatments: 1) Udvartana (herbal powder massage), 2) Vamana/Virechana (detox), 3) Lekhana Basti (specific enema), 4) Internal medicines (Triphala, Guggulu), 5) Diet as per Prakriti, 6) Lifestyle modifications. Duration: 3-6 months for sustainable results. Benefit: Addresses root cause, prevents regain. Not: Quick fix - gradual healthy weight loss.

instruction: Subletting பண்ணலாமா? Owner-க்கு தெரியாம பண்ணினா என்ன ஆகும்?
output: Agreement check பண்ணுங்க - usually subletting prohibited. Without permission subletting: 1) Agreement breach, 2) Immediate eviction ground, 3) Deposit forfeit possibility. Commercial property: Subletting common but written permission வேணும். Safe approach: Owner consent in writing வாங்குங்க before subletting.

instruction: Email vandhuchu 'Gold testing certification course. 15,000 for BIS approved tester certificate.' Idhu useful certification aa?
output: BIS Hallmarking centre recognition has specific requirements and process. 'BIS approved tester certificate' through email course is not legitimate certification. Actual assayer training through recognized assaying centres. Check bis.gov.in for genuine training and recognition process.

instruction: Pudhiya driving license eppadi peruvadhu?
output: 1. parivahan.gov.in la slot book pannunga 2. First Learner's License (LLR) vaangunga: Age: Two-wheeler 18+, Car 18+ (gear), Commercial 20+. Aadhaar, address proof, medical certificate vendum. Fee: ₹200-500 3. 30 days kazhichu DL test ezhudhunga

instruction: 'Ayya, naan unga relative Murugan friend, Murugan daughter wedding ku shortage, 30,000 urgent loan vendum, direct aa kekka kovama irukkum nu en kitta sonnaru' nu call vandhudhu.
output: Ayya, 'relative friend' scam idhu. Murugan ku DIRECT call pannunga verify panna. Real shortage irundhaa Murugan own aa kepparu. 'Direct aa kekka kovama' excuse - verify panna vidama irukkuraanga. Unknown callers through money anuppaadhenga.

instruction: Final year-ல இருக்கேன். Government job prepare பண்ணணும். Campus placement-ஐ விடலாமா?
output: Don't skip placement! Reasons: 1) Government job = uncertain timeline (1-3 years) 2) Private job = income while preparing 3) Age limit allows both 4) Financial independence. Strategy: Campus placement attend + clear any job → Join → Prepare TNPSC/SSC evenings/weekends → Clear govt exam → Resign → Join government. Many success stories of working professionals clearing exams. Private job experience also valued. Safety net important - family shouldn't struggle while you prepare.

instruction: Board exam-la Re-totalling vs Re-valuation - enna difference?
output: Re-totalling: Marks addition only check. Answer sheet re-read illai. Cost: ₹50/subject. Time: 10-15 days. Success rate: Low. Re-valuation: Full paper re-evaluation by new examiner. Cost: ₹300-500/subject. Time: 30-45 days. Success rate: Higher if genuine mistake. Apply within: 15 days of result. Portal: DGE website. Choose wisely - re-valuation for major doubt only.

instruction: Arul / karunai (kindness) patri enna kuralgal ullana?
output: Kural: 'Arutselvam selvaththul selvam porutselvam pooriyaar kannum ula'. Karunai endra selvamae unmaiyaana selvam. Panam kettavargalidamum irukkum. Melum: 'Maraththalum innaa pirarnenju mannaadha potrum karunai'. Karunai illaadha vaazhkkai vaazhkkaiyae alla. Kindness = true wealth!

instruction: Needhi / Justice patri Thirukkural enna solludhu?
output: Kural: 'Sengonmai vendhanai sevvi thiRavaadhaavar naanani naadu'. Needhiyudan aalum arasanin naattil makkal bayamindri vaazhvaargal. Melum: 'Orndhukan nodaadhu iraipurindhu yaarmaattum therndhusei vaqdhae murai'. Baarapatchamindri, aaraainDhu needhi vazhanguvadhae sariyaana murai. Impartial justice = foundation of good governance!

instruction: Nagarathula Restaurant thodanga ennenna license vendum?
output:
**Restaurant Licenses Required:**

**Must Have:**
1. **FSSAI License** - fssai.gov.in, ₹100-7,500/year
2. **Trade License** - Corporation, ₹2,000-25,000
3. **Shop & Establishment** - tnlabour.tn.gov.in

instruction: Driving License apply pannanum - LLR to DL full process?
output:
Step 1 - Learner's License (LLR):

Apply Online:
1. parivahan.gov.in → 'Online Services' → Tamil Nadu
2. 'Apply for Learner's License'
3. Fill Form 1 (Application)
4. Fill Form 2 (Medical - self declaration)
5. Upload: Age proof, Address proof, Photo, Signature
6. Pay: ₹200-350

Age Requirements: Scooty (no gear) 16, Bike/Car 18, Transport 20

Book Slot: Select RTO, Choose date, Go for test

LLR Test: Computer-based, 15 questions on road signs/rules, Pass: 9/15, Result: Same day, Valid: 6 months

Step 2 - Driving Test for DL:

Wait Period: 30 days after LLR

Book DL Slot:
1. parivahan.gov.in → 'Apply for Driving License'
2. Enter LLR number
3. Fill Form 4
4. Pay: ₹500-700
5. Book slot

Test Day:
- Bring own vehicle (or rent near RTO)
- Documents: LLR, Aadhaar, Photos
- Tests: 8 formation (parking/reverse), Slope driving, Traffic signals, Road driving

Pass: Biometric capture → DL number → Card mailed
Fail: Re-test after 7 days + additional fee

Timeline: LLR same day, DL test after 30 days, DL card 7-15 days after test

instruction: TN Helpline Numbers enna enna?
output: Important TN Helplines: 1967 (Ration complaints), 1077 (CM Helpline), 108 (Emergency Ambulance), 104 (Health Helpline), 100 (Police), 101 (Fire), 1091 (Women Helpline), 1098 (Child Helpline - Childline), 181 (Women Helpline - central), 1912 (Anti-Corruption), 155300 (Cyber Crime), 14461 (Kisan Call Centre), 1800-180-1111 (Pensioners). Free: Most are toll-free 24x7.

instruction: Education loan thiruppich seluthuvathu eppadi?
output: Repayment: Padippu mudintha piragu + 6 months to 1 year moratorium. EMI thodangum. Repayment period: 5-15 years. Tax benefit: Section 80E-la vatti-ku deduction (no max limit, up to 8 years). Pre-closure penalty illai most banks-la. Auto-debit setup seithu EMI thavaramal kattunga.

instruction: '10,000 Instagram followers 500 only' nu website paathen. Growth ku useful aa irukkum.
output: Purchased followers - bots or inactive accounts. Instagram purge regularly - followers drop. Engagement rate drop = algorithm punishment. Account credentials kuduthaa - account steal possibility. Organic growth focus pannunga, shortcuts backfire.

instruction: ITI padippu yarukku errathu? Eppadi seruvathu?
output: 8th or 10th pass aanavargalukku. 130+ types of trades irukku (Electrician, Fitter, Welder, Computer Operator etc). Admission: www.skilltraining.tn.gov.in. Duration: 6 months to 2 years. Govt ITI fully free. Padicha approm Apprenticeship seiyalam, nalla job opportunity.

instruction: Small claims court-la case podalaamaa? Procedure enna?
output: Consumer disputes-kku: District Consumer Forum (Rs.1 crore varai). Civil disputes: Regular civil court. Small Causes Court: Chennai-la available - Rs.1 lakh-kkul claims, fast track. Procedure: 1) Complaint draft, 2) Court fee pay (nominal), 3) Filing, 4) Hearing dates, 5) Judgment. Lawyer optional for small claims. E-filing: ecourts.gov.in

instruction: ITI admission-க்கு என்ன தகுதி தேவை?
output: தகுதி trades வாரியாக மாறும்: 1) Engineering trades (Electrician, Fitter) - 10th pass 2) Non-engineering trades (Welder, Painter) - 8th pass. Age: 14-40 years. Apply: www.skilltraining.tn.gov.in. Selection: 10th/8th marks basis. No entrance exam. Documents: TC, marks card, community certificate, Aadhaar. Government ITI-ல் seats limited, apply early.

instruction: மதுரை Kamaraj University-ல distance education நல்லதா?
output: MKU distance education UGC approved, widely recognized. BA, BCom, BBA, MA, MCom courses available. Study centre city-லயே இருக்கும். Fees affordable. Contact classes weekend-ல நடக்கும்.

instruction: Email/social media account hack aaiduchu, scammer friends kitta kaasu kekuraan. Recovery process?
output: Immediate - Warn contacts: Call/SMS friends 'My account hacked, don't send money'. Platform recovery: Gmail - accounts.google.com/signin/recovery, Facebook - facebook.com/hacked (24-72 hours), Instagram - Help → Login → 'Can't log in' (video selfie verification), WhatsApp - Login with OTP kicks out hacker, enable 2-step. Post-recovery: Change ALL passwords, enable 2FA everywhere, check connected apps, check email forwarding rules, inform contacts about scam messages. If friends lost money: They file complaint, your account takeover FIR helps their case.

instruction: Aadhaar-bank account link ஆகல, scholarship reject
output: Linking steps: 1) Visit bank branch with Aadhaar 2) Fill seeding form 3) OTP verification 4) 48-72 hours to reflect. Check link status: Call bank customer care or use NPCI mapper. Common issues: Name mismatch (Aadhaar vs bank) - get corrected first. Multiple accounts: Only one can be primary for DBT. Alternative: Net banking/Mobile banking link option available. UIDAI website: Check Aadhaar-bank link status.

instruction: Myth or Fact: Myth: Government school-la padichaa success aaga mudiyaadhu
output: Fact: Fact: Pala IAS officers, Doctors, Engineers government school products. 7.5% reservation pona piragu government school NEET toppers athigaritthullanar. Quality depends on student effort + teacher dedication. Many district toppers from government schools. Free education + scholarships = excellent opportunity.

instruction: Headache-க்கு natural remedy?
output: Remedies: 1) Ginger tea, 2) Clove paste on temples, 3) Peppermint oil on forehead, 4) Cold/warm compress (depends on type), 5) Rest in dark room, 6) Hydration (dehydration causes headache), 7) Inhale ajwain steam. Pressure points: Press between thumb and index finger. Lifestyle: Regular sleep, avoid screen strain, stress management. Migraine: See doctor - may need proper treatment.

instruction: Scholarship apply செய்யும் போது common mistakes என்ன?
output: தவிர்க்க வேண்டியவை: 1) Deadline miss பண்றது - calendar-ல் note போடுங்கள் 2) Incomplete application - எல்லா fields நிரப்புங்கள் 3) Wrong documents - size, format check 4) Bank account mismatch with Aadhaar 5) Income certificate expired 6) Multiple applications same scheme 7) Fake certificates (blacklist ஆவீர்கள்). Tips: Apply early, keep scanned copies ready, check status regularly.

instruction: Dialysis free-யா செய்யலாமா?
output: Yes! Pradhan Mantri National Dialysis Program. Free dialysis: Government hospitals, empanelled private centres. Eligibility: BPL/low income patients. Sessions: Usually 2-3 per week. CMCHIS: Also covers dialysis. Kidney transplant: Covered under CMCHIS (Rs.5 lakh). Location: District hospitals, medical colleges. Registration: Through nephrologist referral. Medicines: EPO injections also subsidized.

instruction: Seasonal diseases-kku Siddha prevention?
output: Monsoon (Kaar kaalam): Nilavembu, avoid raw foods, warm water. Winter (Munpani): Chukku preparations, oil massage. Summer (Mudhuvenil): Cooling preparations, Nannari, tender coconut. Flu/dengue season: Papaya leaf juice, Nilavembu Kudineer. Government distribution: During epidemics, free Siddha immunity medicines distributed through PHC. Lifestyle: Seasonal diet (Paruva Unavugal) as per traditional calendar.

instruction: Domestic violence complaint enge koduppadhu?
output: Options: 1) Police station - FIR (498A IPC), 2) Protection Officer (District Social Welfare Office), 3) Women's helpline - 181, 4) Mahila Court, 5) Family Court. DV Act 2005 keezh protection order, residence order, monetary relief, custody order ellam ketkalam.

instruction: Hardware and Networking course padikkalaamaa?
output: Good career option. Courses: 1) CCNA (Cisco) - Networking 2) CompTIA A+ - Hardware 3) MCSE (Microsoft) - Server admin 4) Hardware & Networking diploma. Duration: 3-12 months. Jobs: 1) Network administrator 2) System support 3) Hardware technician 4) IT helpdesk. Salary: ₹15,000-30,000. Demand: Every company needs IT support. NIELIT offers recognized courses. Self-employment: Computer repair shop.

instruction: Endha vaccines adults-kku venum?
output: Recommended: 1) Influenza (flu) - yearly (especially elderly, diabetics), 2) Pneumococcal - 65+ years, 3) Tetanus booster - every 10 years, 4) Hepatitis B - if not taken earlier, 5) HPV - up to 26 years, 6) COVID - as per current guidelines. Pregnancy: Tetanus, Pertussis. Travel: Yellow fever, etc. based on destination. Cost: Some free at government, others subsidized. Consult doctor for personalized schedule.

instruction: Pollution complaint எங்கே கொடுப்பது?
output: TNPCB (Tamil Nadu Pollution Control Board): tnpcb.gov.in. NGT (National Green Tribunal): Chennai bench. District Environment Engineer. Complaint types: Air, water, noise, hazardous waste. Evidence: Photos, videos, test reports. Public interest litigation-உம் possible.

instruction: Password hack ஆனால் என்ன செய்யணும்?
output: Immediate: 1) Password change (all linked accounts), 2) Enable 2FA, 3) Check login history, 4) Bank accounts verify, 5) Linked devices remove. If money lost: 1930 + bank + cybercrime.gov.in. Recovery email/phone verify பண்ணுங்க.

instruction: NEET-க்கு எப்படி prepare செய்வது? எந்த books படிக்கணும்?
output:
**NEET Preparation Strategy:**

**2-Year Plan (Class 11-12):**

**Class 11:**
- NCERT thoroughly (Most important!)
- Concept clarity focus
- Regular practice
- Foundation building

**Class 12:**
- NCERT revision
- Previous years papers
- Mock tests
- Weak areas focus

**Subject-wise Books:**

**Physics:**
| Book | Purpose |
|------|--------|
| NCERT Class 11 & 12 | Foundation (Must!) |
| HC Verma | Concept + Problems |
| DC Pandey | Practice |
| Previous Years | Pattern understanding |

**Chemistry:**
| Book | Purpose |
|------|--------|
| NCERT | Must read multiple times! |
| MS Chouhan (Organic) | Organic mechanisms |
| VK Jaiswal (Inorganic) | Reactions |
| N Awasthi (Physical) | Numericals |

**Biology:**
| Book | Purpose |
|------|--------|
| NCERT | 90% questions from here! |
| Trueman's Biology | Extra MCQs |
| MTG NEET Guide | Practice |
| Previous Years | Must solve |

**Daily Schedule (Class 12):**
```
5:00 AM - Wake up, Fresh
5:30-7:30 AM - Physics/Chemistry (Alternate)
7:30-8:30 AM - Break, Breakfast
8:30-1:00 PM - School
2:00-4:00 PM - Biology
4:00-5:00 PM - Break, Snacks
5:00-7:00 PM - Weak subject
7:00-8:00 PM - Dinner, Relax
8:00-10:00 PM - Revision/MCQs
10:00 PM - Sleep
```

**Key Tips:**
1. NCERT = Bible (Read 5-6 times minimum)
2. Biology diagrams daily practice
3. Physics numericals daily
4. Chemistry equations balance
5. 50-100 MCQs daily
6. Weekly full-length test

instruction: Overtime pay எவ்வளவு கொடுக்கணும்?
output: Factories Act: Normal working hours = 8 hours/day, 48 hours/week. Overtime = Double wages (2x normal rate). Maximum overtime: 50 hours/quarter. Overtime refuse பண்ணலாம் (reasonable grounds). Forced overtime illegal.

instruction: Graamathula delivery pannalaamaa? Hospital poganumaa? (Rural style)
output: Hospital delivery best! Why: 1) Emergency handling (bleeding, cord problem), 2) C-section if needed, 3) Baby complications - immediate care. Government: PHC level delivery (normal cases), higher centre referral. 102 ambulance: Free transport - call early when labour starts. Incentive: JSY + Muthulakshmi scheme - Rs.18,000+ for hospital delivery. Dai (TBA): Not trained for emergencies. Register PHC early - they plan delivery place based on risk.

instruction: Ayurveda என்றால் என்ன? Siddha-விட வேறுபாடு என்ன?
output: Ayurveda = Sanskrit origin, 5000+ years old, pan-Indian system. Principle: Vata, Pitta, Kapha doshas balance. Difference from Siddha: 1) Language - Sanskrit vs Tamil, 2) Origin - Kerala/North vs Tamil Nadu, 3) Some unique medicines, 4) Emphasis - Siddha uses more metals/minerals. Similarities: Both holistic, natural medicines, similar principles. Recognition: Both government recognized AYUSH systems.

instruction: WhatsApp group-la defamatory message - admin liable-aa?
output: Admin liability: Controversial. Recent judgments: Admin not automatically liable, but may be liable if: 1) Aware of content, 2) Didn't remove after notice, 3) Promoted/endorsed content. Original poster primarily liable. Group rules + moderation important.

instruction: Panchakarma என்றால் என்ன? 5 treatments என்ன?
output: Panchakarma = 5 purification/detoxification procedures. 1) Vamana - Therapeutic vomiting (Kapha disorders), 2) Virechana - Purgation (Pitta disorders), 3) Basti - Medicated enema (Vata disorders), 4) Nasya - Nasal administration (head/neck disorders), 5) Raktamokshana - Blood letting (blood disorders). Pre-procedures: Snehapanam (oil intake), Swedanam (sweating). Post: Specific diet restrictions. Duration: 14-21 days ideally.

instruction: Suicide attempt criminal offence-aa?
output: NO! Decriminalized under MHCA 2017. Old: Section 309 IPC punished attempt. Now: Person attempting suicide presumed to be under severe stress - needs care, not punishment. Police: Cannot arrest or prosecute. Government duty: Provide care, rehabilitation. Family: Support, not blame. Hospital: Must treat without police formality. Exception: Abetment of suicide still criminal.

instruction: Scholarship deadlines summary
output: NSP (National): October-November. Post-matric SC/ST: September-October. BC/MBC welfare: August-September. Merit scholarships: After results announcement. INSPIRE: December-January. Private scholarships: Various - check Buddy4Study regularly. Tip: Apply within 2 weeks of portal opening.

instruction: Free uniform, books ellam school kodukkuma? Apply pannanuuma?
output: Government school benefits: 1) Free textbooks - ella subjects 2) Free notebooks - 4-5 books 3) Free uniform - 2 sets (₹600 worth) 4) Free footwear - Class 1-5 5) Free school bag - select schools. Apply: Admission-aanavudan automatic. Documents: Birth certificate, Aadhaar, parent Aadhaar, address proof. Private aided schools-layum books free. Distribution: June-July school opening.

instruction: RTI application எப்படி எழுதுவது?
output: Format: 1) To: Public Information Officer (PIO), 2) Subject: RTI application under RTI Act 2005, 3) Applicant details (name, address), 4) Questions/Information required - specific-ஆ கேளுங்க, 5) Period (from date to date), 6) Format preference (copy/inspection), 7) Fee payment details, 8) Signature, date.

instruction: Father's Day - 'Win smartwatch for dad! Fill survey' link வந்துச்சு. Fill பண்ணலாமா?
output: Survey scam! Personal info collect பண்றாங்க. Father's Day-ல இது common. 'Win' என்று attract பண்ணி data theft. Survey forms-ல sensitive info கொடுக்காதீங்க. No survey gives genuine prizes.

instruction: Psychiatrist vs Psychologist - yaarai paarkanum?
output: Psychiatrist (MD): Medical doctor, can prescribe medicines. See for: Severe depression, bipolar, schizophrenia, anxiety needing medication. Psychologist (MPhil/PhD): Non-medical, provides therapy/counseling. See for: Stress, relationship issues, mild-moderate depression/anxiety, trauma. Often work together: Psychiatrist for meds + Psychologist for therapy. First step: Can start with either, they'll refer if needed.

instruction: Arya Vaidya Sala, Kottakkal branch TN-la irukkaa?
output: Yes! AVS Kottakkal branches in TN: 1) Chennai - Multiple clinics, 2) Coimbatore, 3) Madurai. Services: 1) OPD consultation, 2) Panchakarma, 3) Pharmacy. Other Kerala chains in TN: 1) Arya Vaidya Pharmacy (AVP), Coimbatore, 2) Nagarjuna, 3) SNA Oushadhasala. Authentic: These are established, registered organizations. Products: Available in many pharmacies.

instruction: Thirukkuraloda mudhal kural edhu?
output: 'Agara mudhala ezhuththellam aadhi bhagavan mudhatre ulagu'. Artham: 'A' ezhutthu ella ezhutthukkkalkkum aadharam pola, iraivan ulagaththirku aadharam.

instruction: ME/M.Tech admission Tamil Nadu-la eppadi?
output: GATE score compulsory (govt colleges-ku). Steps: 1) GATE ezhuthunga 2) Anna University TANCA counselling-ku apply 3) GATE score + UG marks basis rank 4) College allotment. GATE illamalum sila colleges-la seralaam (sponsored/self-financing). Govt college fee: ₹10,000-30,000/year.

instruction: EC enga peruvadhu?
output: Online at tnreginet.gov.in (records from 1987 onwards) - instant download. Offline at Sub-Registrar Office - 3-5 days. Fee: ₹15 per year. Essential for property verification - shows if property has any legal dues or mortgages.

instruction: TATA Scholarship for students enna?
output: TATA Group Scholarships: 1) Tata Capital Pankh - ₹10,000-12,000/year for Class 6-12 2) Tata Trusts Higher Education - ₹50,000-2 lakh/year professional courses 3) Lady Tata Memorial Trust - Medical research. Eligibility: Income ₹4 lakh kizha, 60%+ marks. Apply: Buddy4Study portal or direct application. Deadline varies.

instruction: TN Differently Abled pension/assistance enna?
output: TN benefits for differently abled. Pension: ₹1,500/month (40%+ disability). Aids: Free wheelchair, hearing aid, artificial limbs, crutches. Education: Free education + special hostels. Employment: 4% reservation in govt jobs. Bus: Free travel (ordinary buses). Loan: Subsidy loan for self-employment. UDID Card: Unique Disability ID - mandatory for all benefits. Apply: Social Welfare dept/Taluk office.

instruction: புதிய PAN Card எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: Easiest: Instant e-PAN at eportal.incometax.gov.in using Aadhaar - FREE and instant! Alternative: Apply at onlineservices.nsdl.com or pan.utiitsl.com - ₹107 for physical card, 15-20 days. Need ID proof, address proof, DOB proof, photo, and signature.

instruction: Aathichudi endraal enna? Sila udhaarangal sollungal?
output: Aathichudi - Avvaiyar ezhuthiya needhi nool. Kuzhanthaigalukkku nallozhukkam karpikka. Ovvoru ezhuthilum thodangum ottrai vari arivuraigal. Famous examples: 1) 'Aram seiya virumbu' - do good deeds, 2) 'Aaruvadhu sinam' - control anger, 3) 'Iyalvadhu karavelv' - don't hide your capabilities, 4) 'Udaiyadhu vilambel' - don't boast, 5) 'Ookkamadhu kaividel' - don't give up enthusiasm. Tamil Nadu schools-la compulsory. Simple but powerful moral lessons!

instruction: Patta maatram eppadi seyvadhu?
output: After property registration at SRO, apply for Patta transfer at Taluk Office or eservices.tn.gov.in. Documents: Registered document, EC, ID proof, tax receipts. Field inspection by VAO/RI. Time: 30-45 days. Essential for proving ownership.

instruction: Soil Health Card endraal enna? Eppadi peruvadhu?
output: To know soil nutrient status. Card Info: N, P, K levels, pH value, micro nutrients, organic carbon. Testing: Once in 3 years (Govt-free). Benefit: Use right fertilizers, reduce cost, increase yield. Get it: Village Agriculture Officer/Krishi Vigyan Kendra. Check status: soilhealth.dac.gov.in. Sample collection: Agriculture officer collects soil from field.

instruction: Ex-servicemen பிள்ளைகளுக்கு படிப்பு சலுகைகள் என்ன?
output: சலுகைகள்: 1) TNPSC-ல் 2% horizontal reservation 2) Engineering/Medical admission-ல் reservation 3) Sainik School admission priority 4) AFMC, NDA-ல் முன்னுரிமை 5) Fee concession பல கல்லூரிகளில். Prime Minister's Scholarship: ₹36,000-60,000/ஆண்டு professional courses-க்கு. Kendriya Sainik Board scholarship available. Apply with father's discharge certificate.

instruction: SC/ST/BC Scholarship TN-la enna ulladhu?
output: Community-wise Scholarships. SC Students: Post-matric scholarship (₹550-1,200/month), Free education (all levels), Hostel stipend. ST Students: Similar to SC + extra coaching. BC/MBC/DNC: Post-matric (₹300-700/month), higher for MBC within BC. Apply: bcmbcmw.tn.gov.in (BC), adwb.tn.gov.in (SC/ST). Documents: Community certificate, Income certificate, Institution bonafide, Aadhaar. Hostel: Free accommodation + food in govt hostels.

instruction: Appointment letter கொடுக்கல - சட்டவிரோதமா?
output: ஆம். Written employment contract கொடுக்கணும். Appointment letter contents: Designation, salary, probation period, notice period, duties. Oral appointment-உம் valid ஆனால் prove பண்றது கஷ்டம். Always insist on written letter + copy வாங்குங்க.

instruction: Merchant Navy join aaga enna padikkanum?
output: Courses: 1) B.Sc Nautical Science (3 years) - Deck Officer 2) Marine Engineering (4 years) - Engine room 3) GP Rating (6 months) - Entry level. Eligibility: 12th PCM 60%+, Medical fitness strict. Institutes: IMU Chennai, AMET Chennai, MERI. Admission: IMU CET entrance exam. Career: High salary (₹50,000 - ₹5 lakh/month with experience), World travel. Challenges: Months away from family.

instruction: Government job salary ranges
output: TNPSC Group 1: ₹56,100-1,77,500 (DSP, DC level). Group 2: ₹35,400-1,12,400 (Assistant level). Group 4: ₹19,500-62,000 (Clerk level). Banking PO: ₹40,000-80,000+. SSC CGL: ₹35,000-1,50,000. Teaching (TRB): ₹35,000-70,000. Note: Includes DA, HRA, benefits.

instruction: Cheque bounce ஆனால் என்ன case வரும்?
output: Negotiable Instruments Act Section 138: 1) Cheque bounce = criminal offence, 2) Payee demand notice அனுப்பணும் (15 days-க்குள்), 3) 15 days-க்குள் pay பண்ணல = complaint file பண்ணலாம், 4) Punishment: 2 years jail + double amount fine, 5) Time limit: Cause of action-ல் இருந்து 1 month-க்குள் case போடணும்.

instruction: Domestic violence complaint எங்கே கொடுப்பது?
output: Options: 1) Police station - FIR (498A IPC), 2) Protection Officer (District Social Welfare Office), 3) Women's helpline - 181, 4) Mahila Court, 5) Family Court. DV Act 2005 கீழ் protection order, residence order, monetary relief, custody order எல்லாம் கேட்கலாம்.

instruction: Child choking - என்ன செய்யணும்?
output: If can cough: Encourage coughing. If can't cough/breathe: Infant (<1 year) - 5 back blows + 5 chest thrusts. Child (>1 year) - Heimlich maneuver: Stand behind, fist above navel, quick upward thrusts. Unconscious: Start CPR, call 108. Prevention: No small objects, cut food into small pieces, supervise eating. Learn CPR: Red Cross, hospitals conduct training.

instruction: Kayakalpam (Rejuvenation) endraal enna?
output: Kayakalpam enbadhu udalai puththunarchiyaakki, vayathai thaamadhappaduththum murai. Siddhargal neenda aayulodu vaazhndhathaga korappaduvatharkku idhuvae kaaranam. Idhil adangum: 1) Kurippittta herbs utkollal, 2) Detox seidhal, 3) Yoga matrum praanaayaamam, 4) Diet restrictions, 5) Manadhai suththappaduththudhal. Modern anti-aging research-la sila siddhar herbs study seiyappaduginrana!

instruction: Tamil Nadu-oda naattuppura kalaigal ennenna?
output: Mukkiya naattuppura kalaigal: 1) Karakattam - paanaiyai thalaiyil vaiththu aaduvathu, 2) Oyilattam - group dance, harvest celebration, 3) Kummi - women's circle dance, 4) Kolattam - stick dance, 5) Kavadi Attam - Murugan festival, 6) Therukoothu - street drama, 7) Poikkaal Kuthiraiyattam - dummy horse dance, 8) Mayilattam - peacock costume dance, 9) Thappattam - percussion instrument dance. Village festivals-la indrum popular!

instruction: Commercial property-க்கும் same rules-ஆ?
output: Basic principles same. ஆனால் commercial tenancy-க்கு: 1) Advance limit 6 months (residential-க்கு 3 months), 2) Rent increase நியாயமாக இருக்கணும், 3) Goodwill compensation கேட்கலாம் (long-term tenants), 4) Business loss-க்கு compensation கேட்கலாம்.

instruction: Thirumoolar yaar? Thirumandhiram endraal enna?
output: Thirumoolar Saiva Siddhaanthathoda founders-la oruvar. 'Thirumandhiram' endra magathaana noolai ezhuthiyavar - 3000 paadalgal. Idhu 10-vadu Thirumurai. 'Ondre kulam, oruvane devan' endra famous quote ivaradhu. Yoga, tantra, Saiva Siddhaandham, aanmeegam ellam idhil ullana. Oru pasuvoda udalil pugundu adhoda kanrai kaappattiya kadhai famous - adhanaal 'Moolar' endra peyar vandhadhu.

instruction: In-laws against DV case போடலாமா?
output: ஆம். DV Act-ன் கீழ் 'respondent' includes husband + his relatives who abuse. 498A IPC-ன் கீழ் husband மற்றும் relatives against criminal case போடலாம். ஆனால் specific allegations + evidence வேண்டும் - general accusation not enough.

instruction: உண்மையா பொய்யா: Myth: Marks மட்டும் important, extra-curricular waste
output: உண்மை: Fact: Balanced development essential. Extra-curricular benefits: 1) Sports quota admission 2) Stress relief = better study 3) Personality development 4) College applications value it 5) Soft skills development. Reality: Toppers also play sports, music, participate in activities. Time management skill learned. All-rounder students more successful in career long-term.

instruction: Doctor-mela criminal case podalaamaa?
output: Yes, for: 1) Death due to negligence (Section 304A IPC / Section 106 BNS), 2) Grievous hurt (Section 338 IPC), 3) Hurt (Section 337 IPC). Punishment: 304A - 2 years imprisonment + fine. Requirement: Gross negligence, not just error. Supreme Court: Doctors shouldn't be arrested for bona fide errors. But criminal recklessness = liable. FIR: Police can register on complaint.

instruction: Skin diseases-க்கு Siddha effective-ஆ?
output: Yes! Siddha strong for skin: Psoriasis (Kalanjaga Padai), Eczema (Karappan), Vitiligo (Venpulli), Fungal infections, Acne. Treatments: 1) Internal medicines - blood purifiers, 2) External - specialized oils (Karappan Thailam, Punga Thailam), 3) Pattru (poultice), 4) Diet modifications. Duration: Chronic conditions need 3-6 months. Advantage: Treats root cause, not just symptoms. NIS: Special skin clinic.

instruction: Theft vs Robbery enna vithiyaasam?
output: Theft (IPC 379/BNS 303): Secretly taking property - 3 years imprisonment. Robbery (IPC 392/BNS 309): Theft + force/fear - 10 years imprisonment. Dacoity (5+ persons): 10 years to life. House breaking: Additional charges. Recovery of property possible.

instruction: Doctor prescription எவ்வளவு நாள் valid?
output: General rule: 1) Acute illness prescription - use immediately, 2) Chronic medicines - usually for prescribed duration (30-90 days), 3) Controlled substances - single use only. Refills: Some pharmacies refill for chronic conditions (diabetes, BP) without new prescription. Best practice: Regular doctor checkup for chronic medicines. Expired prescription: Pharmacist discretion, usually won't dispense.

instruction: Infertility treatment government hospital-ல் available-ஆ?
output: Limited but available. Government: 1) Basic infertility workup - free at medical college hospitals, 2) Some IUI facilities, 3) Counseling. IVF: 1) Limited government centres (Institute of Obstetrics - Chennai), 2) Subsidized at some, 3) Mostly private (expensive). CMCHIS: Covers some infertility procedures. PM-PMSBY: Assisted reproduction not fully covered yet. Cost: IVF privately Rs.1-3 lakhs per cycle.

instruction: தேர்வில் time management எப்படி செய்வது?
output: Strategies: 1) Question paper முழுவதும் முதலில் படியுங்கள் (5 mins) 2) Easy questions முதலில் attempt 3) Marks-க்கு ஏற்ப time allocate (1 mark = 1 minute rule) 4) Stuck ஆனால் skip, later return 5) Last 10 minutes revision-க்கு keep 6) Answer length = marks (2 marks = half page, 5 marks = 1 page) 7) Watch/clock பாருங்கள் regularly. Practice: At home, exam conditions-ல் previous papers எழுதுங்கள்.

instruction: Polytechnic-la endha branch select seivathu? Job opportunity eppadi?
output: Branch wise opportunities: 1) Mechanical - Manufacturing, automobile companies 2) Civil - Construction, PWD, real estate 3) Electrical - TNEB, industries, electrician 4) Electronics - IT companies, telecom 5) Computer Science - Software, IT support 6) Automobile - Service centers, companies. Highest demand: Mechanical, Civil. Growing: Computer Science. Government jobs: TNPSC Diploma level posts available.

instruction: Patta endraal enna? Patta peyar maatruvathu eppadi?
output: Patta = Revenue record showing land ownership. Transfer: 1) Apply at Taluk office/eservices.tn.gov.in, 2) Submit: Sale deed, old patta, EC, ID proof, 3) Revenue Inspector verification, 4) Tahsildar approval. Time: 30-45 days. Online status track pannalam.

instruction: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY) endraal enna?
output: Crop insurance scheme for farmers. Premium: Kharif 2%, Rabi 1.5%, Commercial crops 5% only - rest paid by Government. Coverage: Natural calamities, pest attack, disease, post-harvest 14 days. Apply: Bank/CSC/Insurance Portal. Documents: Land records, Aadhaar, Bank details. Claim: Report loss within 72 hours. Loss calculated through Crop Cutting Experiments.

instruction: Da, oru call vandhuchu - 'Sir unga account block aaidum tonight ku munnadhi KYC update pannunga' nu. Aadhaar OTP ellam kekkuraanga. Legit aa bro?
output: Scam da idhu. Bank laam phone la OTP kekkave kekaadhu. 'Tonight block' nu pressure poduraanga paaru, classic tactic. Branch ku direct aa po, phone la yaarkum details kudukkaadha. Ivanga dalla gang da.

instruction: IGNOAPS (Indira Gandhi National Old Age Pension Scheme) endraal enna?
output: Monthly pension for BPL senior citizens. Central: ₹200/month (60-79 years), ₹500/month (80+ years). TN State: Additional ₹1,000/month. Total in TN: ₹1,200-1,500/month. Eligibility: 60+ years, BPL family. Apply: Village Panchayat/Taluk office. Documents: Age proof, Aadhaar, BPL card/Income certificate, Bank account. Payment: DBT through bank account.

instruction: Sangam Ilakkiyam endraal enna?
output: Sangam Ilakkiyam Tamilin migap pazhamaiyaana ilakkiya thoguppu. Moondru sangangal nadandhathaaga Tamil marabu koorugindradhu. Indha ilakkiyangal Agam (kaadhal), Puram (veeram, por, arasiyal) endru pirikkappaduginrana. Ettuthogai, Paththuppaattu mukkiya thoguppugal. Iyarkai varnanai, manidha unarvugal azhagaaga siththarikkappattuLLana. Ulagin migap pazhaiya secular ilakkiyangalil ondru.

instruction: Education loan meethana vatti subsidy scheme enna?
output: Central Sector Interest Subsidy Scheme: Padikkum bodhu + 1 year moratorium-la vatti muzhuvathum govt kattum. Eligibility: Family income ₹4.5 lakh/year kizha, Technical/Professional courses. Apply: Vidya Lakshmi Portal moolam. TN State Loan: SC/ST students-ku interest-free education loan available through Adi Dravidar Welfare.

instruction: 'Ayya, unga horoscope la Shani dosham irukku, next 6 months ku danger. Special puja 11,000 ku pannina dosham pogum' nu astrologer call pannaan.
output: Fear-based scam ayya idhu. Random astrologers phone la panni scare pannuvaanga. 'Danger' solliruvaanga, 'puja' ku kaasu vaanguvaanga - nothing will happen. Trusted family astrologer irundhaa consult pannunga. Unknown callers ignore pannunga.

instruction: Legal adoption எப்படி செய்வது?
output: CARA (Central Adoption Resource Authority) through only - cara.wcd.gov.in. Register → Home study → Child matching → Pre-adoption fostering → Court order. Hindu Adoption Act-ன் கீழ் deed registration-உம் valid. Private adoption risky - legal complications வரலாம்.

instruction: தெற்கு மாவட்ட மாணவர்களுக்கு special scholarship ஏதாவது இருக்கா?
output: ஆம். BC/MBC scholarship, first graduate scholarship, merit scholarship எல்லாம் apply பண்ணலாம். Tirunelveli, Thoothukudi, Kanyakumari மாவட்ட மாணவர்களுக்கு Sadras scheme-ல் priority உண்டு.

instruction: PF withdrawal eppadi seivathu?
output: Online: EPFO portal → Online Services → Claim. Conditions: Retirement (58 years), 2 months unemployment, medical emergency (partial), home loan (partial), marriage (partial). Full withdrawal: Job quit + 2 months gap. Aadhaar linked UAN venum. 5-10 days-la amount varum.

instruction: 'Nallavai ellam theeyavaam' - sombal patriya kural enna?
output: Kural: 'Nallavai ellam theeyavaam theeyavum nallavaam selvam seyarku'. Artham: Somberiyidam nalla vaaippugal vandhaalum kettadhaaga maarum. Aanaal active-aaga iruppavanukkku ketta soozh nilayum nalladhaaga maarum. Your attitude determines outcome, not circumstances!

instruction: Tamil Nadu Engineering Admission (TNEA) counselling eppadi nadakkum?
output: TNEA counselling steps: 1) www.tneaonline.org-la register pannunga 2) +2 marks basis-la rank 3) Online choice filling 4) Allotment result 5) College-la join. Fee: ₹500 (SC/ST free). Important: Cut-off mark parunga, popular colleges-ku high marks venum.

instruction: Ration card complaint எங்கே கொடுப்பது?
output: Options: 1) Ration shop-ல் complaint book, 2) Taluk Supply Officer, 3) District Supply Officer, 4) Food helpline: 1967, 5) TNCSC website. Issues: Fake entries, quantity shortage, quality issues, dealer misbehavior. Aadhaar seeding problems: UIDAI + DSO.

instruction: Child choking - enna seyyanum?
output: If can cough: Encourage coughing. If can't cough/breathe: Infant (<1 year) - 5 back blows + 5 chest thrusts. Child (>1 year) - Heimlich maneuver: Stand behind, fist above navel, quick upward thrusts. Unconscious: Start CPR, call 108. Prevention: No small objects, cut food into small pieces, supervise eating. Learn CPR: Red Cross, hospitals conduct training.

instruction: Social media-la abuse/threat vandhaal enna seivathu?
output: Steps: 1) Screenshot edunga (URL visible-aa), 2) Report to platform, 3) Cyber Crime portal-la complaint, 4) Women-kku 181 helpline. Applicable laws: IT Act 66A (struck down), 67 (obscene content), IPC 506 (criminal intimidation), 509 (insult to modesty).

instruction: Cutoff marks quick guide
output: NEET 2024 (approx): General OC 720-137, BC 136-107, MBC 136-107, SC/ST 136-107. JEE Main: 90+ percentile for NITs. TNEA: Top colleges 195+, average 180+, minimum 150+. TNPSC Group 4: 80+ marks out of 150 safe. Engineering cutoff = Maths + Physics + Chemistry (max 200).

instruction: Driving license eppadi peruvathu?
output: Steps: 1) Learner's License (LL) - parivahan.gov.in online apply, 2) 30 days wait, 3) Driving test - RTO, 4) Permanent License issue. Age: Two-wheeler - 18 years, Car - 18 years, Commercial - 20 years. Documents: Aadhaar, address proof, medical certificate (commercial).

instruction: I am transgender. College admission-la discrimination face pannuren. Enna pannalaam?
output: Your rights: 1) Transgender Persons Act 2019 - Equal education rights 2) Reservation for transgender in TN - 1% in education 3) Scholarship: Tamil Nadu Transgender Welfare Board scholarships 4) Discrimination complaint: National/State Human Rights Commission, UGC grievance. Support: Transgender welfare board, NGOs like Sangama, Nirangal. Legal help available. Don't give up - education is your right!

instruction: Enga pasangalukku free laptop eppa kidaikkum?
output: 11th class la serndhadhum government school students-kku laptop kidaikkum. Private school students-kkum income certificate kaattina kidaikkum. September-October la distribute aagum.

instruction: Police FIR poda maruthal enna seivathu?
output: Options: 1) Written complaint koduthu acknowledgment vaangunga, 2) SP/DSP-kku complaint, 3) Judicial Magistrate-kku complaint (Section 156(3) CrPC), 4) State Human Rights Commission, 5) Online: tnpolice.gov.in. FIR maruppathu offence - police-kku action aagum.

instruction: ITI-ல் என்னென்ன trades படிக்கலாம்? எது popular?
output: Popular ITI trades: 1) Electrician - மிகவும் demand 2) Fitter - manufacturing jobs 3) Welder - construction, shipyard 4) Motor Mechanic - automobile industry 5) COPA (Computer Operator) - IT support 6) Electronics Mechanic 7) Plumber - house construction 8) Turner - machine shop. Duration: 1-2 years. TN-ல் 130+ trades available. Government ITI free-யாக படிக்கலாம்.

instruction: Engineering-la 5 arrears irukku. Parents-kitta solla bayamaa irukku. Enna panrathu?
output: First: Panic vendaam, solve pannalam. Steps: 1) Anna University arrear exam schedule check - multiple attempts available 2) Subject-wise weak areas identify 3) Previous year papers - pattern same 4) Senior notes, YouTube tutorials 5) Group study effective. Parents-ku: Honest-aa sollunga - support kidaikkum. Clearing strategy: Easy subjects first, confidence build. Max arrears allowed: 12 (can continue). Final year placement-ku clear pannanum. Time irukku.

instruction: 'Udaiyar enappaduvadhu ookkam' - ookkam patriya kural enna?
output: Kural: 'Udaiyar enappaduvadhu ookkam aqdhilaar udaiyadhu udaiyaro matru'. Artham: Unmaiyaana selvam enbadhu ookkame. Ookkam illadhavargal vera edhai vaiththirundhaalum adhu unmaiyaana selvam alla. Motivation-a patri arputhamaana kural.

instruction: En appa construction worker, veru veru place-ku porom. School admission eppadi?
output: Migrant children rights: 1) RTE Act - Free education anywhere in India 2) Admission without TC - Self-declaration accepted 3) Mid-year admission allowed 4) Age-appropriate class placement 5) SSA (Sarva Shiksha Abhiyan) support. Contact: Nearest government school, District Education Officer. Documents: Aadhaar (if any), parent ID. Free: Books, uniform, mid-day meal. Language support provided for transition.

instruction: 'BGMI/FF unlimited UC hack - Download APK' nu YouTube video paathen. Free UC kedaikuma?
output: 'Hack APKs' malware contain pannum - phone data steal, banking apps access. UC/diamonds server-side - hacking impossible. Account ban guaranteed if detected. Game integrity maintain pannunga - play fair or pay official.

instruction: Arthritis/joint pain-kku Siddha treatment enna?
output: Effective for: Osteoarthritis (Moottu Vaatham), Rheumatoid arthritis (Ama Vaatham), Gout (Vali Azhal Keel Vayu). Treatments: 1) Internal - Rasagandhi Mezhugu, Sallaki, 2) External - Kottamchukkadi Thailam, Pinda Thailam, 3) Thokkanam (specialized massage), 4) Varmam therapy, 5) Ottradam (fomentation), 6) Kizhi (poultice massage). Diet: Avoid sour, cold foods. Duration: 1-3 months typically.

instruction: Rare disease medicine eppadi kidaikkum?
output: Challenges: Expensive, not always available in India. Options: 1) Government policy: Free treatment for some rare diseases (up to Rs.50 lakhs), 2) Crowdfunding platforms, 3) Pharma company compassionate access programs, 4) Import license for unavailable drugs, 5) Clinical trials. Centers: AIIMS, CMC Vellore have rare disease programs. Apply: Through treating hospital's rare disease cell.

instruction: Sondha thozhil aarambikka enna training irukkudhu?
output: Entrepreneurship training: 1) MSME-DI (District Industries Centre) - free EDP (Entrepreneurship Development Programme) 2) TNSDC business skills 3) NIESBUD courses 4) PMEGP training before loan 5) Startup TN programmes. Duration: 1-4 weeks. Topics: Business plan, finance, marketing, legal compliance. DIC-la register panninaal subsidies, loans easier. Free mentorship available.

instruction: Income Certificate எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: Apply at tneservices.tn.gov.in or Taluk Office. Documents: Aadhaar, ration card, self-declaration of income, salary slip (if employed). VAO enquiry at home possible. Time: 7-15 days. Fee: ₹20. Valid for 6 months to 1 year.

instruction: Call vandhudhu 'Fertilizer subsidy direct transfer scheme. Register with 2000 for 10,000 annual benefit.' Fertilizer cost romba, subsidy genuine aa?
output: Fertilizer subsidy already included in MRP - you already get it! No separate registration needed. DBT for fertilizer is point-of-sale, not farmer registration. This is exploiting farmers' input cost concerns. All genuine schemes through agriculture department.

instruction: Water supply complaint எங்கே கொடுப்பது?
output: Chennai: CMWSSB - 044-28454455, cmwssb.tn.gov.in. Other cities: Municipal/Corporation office. Rural: TWAD Board - Local Panchayat. Issues: No supply, contamination, billing, new connection. Response: 24-48 hours for emergency.

instruction: Doctor wrong treatment koduthaanga, sue pannalaamaa?
output: Yes, if negligence proved. Options: 1) Consumer Forum (compensation), 2) Civil court (damages), 3) Criminal court (if death/grievous hurt), 4) Medical Council (disciplinary action). Proof needed: Medical records, expert opinion, treatment protocol violation. Not every bad outcome = negligence. Consult medical-legal expert before proceeding. Time limit: 2-3 years.

instruction: En paiyan/ponnu college-la veliyoor poraanga. Eppadi support panrathu?
output: Parent support tips: 1) Regular communication - but not controlling 2) Visit once in first month - help settle 3) Emergency contact with warden establish 4) Bank account with adequate funds 5) UPI/GPay teach for daily expenses 6) Health insurance ensure 7) Trust them - allow independence 8) Listen without judging when they share problems 9) Homesickness normal - patience. Balance: Support without helicopter parenting. They're growing up!

instruction: Senior Citizens-க்கு Travel Concession என்ன உள்ளது?
output: Railways: Men 60+ 40% discount, Women 58+ 50% discount, Sleeper/AC classes. Booking: Counters-ல் age proof காட்டவும். Airlines: Some airlines offer 50% discount (varies). State Buses: TN-ல் 50% discount (65+ years) ordinary buses. Metro: Some cities 25-50% discount. Documents: Age proof (Aadhaar/Voter ID) carry பண்ணுங்கள்.

instruction: Expert witness eppadi arrange panradhu?
output: Expert = Doctor in same specialty who can opine on standard of care. Finding: 1) Through medical-legal lawyer, 2) Retired senior doctors, 3) Medical college professors. Cost: Fee for opinion + court appearance. Report: Written opinion on whether standard of care met. Court: May be cross-examined. Important: Expert from same specialty (surgeon for surgery case).

instruction: Veedu kaali seyyum bodhu advance thirumba tharuvaangala?
output: Aama, kattaayam thara venum. Veetukku damage irundhaal repair cost kazhichu meedhi thara venum. Normal wear and tear-kku kazhikka mudiyaadhu. Owner tharaattal Rent Authority or Civil Court-la case podalam.

instruction: Tamil Nadu-ல் Ayurveda hospital எங்கே இருக்கு?
output: TN Ayurveda facilities: 1) Arignar Anna Government Hospital of Indian Medicine, Chennai - Multi-AYUSH, 2) District AYUSH hospitals - Ayurveda unit available in most, 3) Selected Taluk dispensaries. Private: Many Kerala-based chains have branches (Arya Vaidya Sala, AVP). Note: TN has stronger Siddha infrastructure - Ayurveda less than Kerala. Integrated: Some allopathic hospitals have AYUSH wings with Ayurveda.

instruction: Surrogacy legal-ஆ? Rules என்ன?
output: Surrogacy Act 2021 rules: 1) Only altruistic surrogacy (no payment beyond expenses), 2) Commercial surrogacy banned, 3) Surrogate: Married woman, own child, related to couple, 4) Couple: Indian, married 5 years, medical need, 5) Single women/men: Not allowed. Registration: Surrogacy clinics must register. Certificate: National/State Surrogacy Board certification needed. International: Surrogacy for foreigners banned.

instruction: பொதுப் பாதையை block பண்ணிட்டாங்க - யாரை approach பண்றது?
output: Public road block: Corporation/Panchayat complaint. Right of way dispute: Tahsildar. Private encroachment on public land: Police + Revenue Department. Court: Easement right case. Documents: Old survey records, photos of traditional path use.

instruction: Birth certificate eppadi peruvadhu?
output: Register within 21 days at hospital location's Municipality/Panchayat - FREE! After 21 days: ₹50 late fee + affidavit. Documents: Hospital discharge summary, parents' Aadhaar. Online at tnreginet.gov.in or crsorgi.gov.in. Certificate in 3-5 days.

instruction: Pranayama types and benefits என்ன?
output: Main Pranayamas: 1) Anulom-Vilom (alternate nostril) - balance, calm, 2) Kapalbhati - energizing, weight loss, detox, 3) Bhramari (bee breath) - stress, sleep, 4) Ujjayi - focus, warmth, 5) Sheetali - cooling, BP reduction. Benefits: Lung capacity, stress relief, concentration, immunity. Start: 5-10 minutes daily. Precautions: 1) Empty stomach, 2) No forcing, 3) Heart/BP patients - gentle only, 4) Pregnancy - specific guidance needed.

instruction: 'Katrradhanaal aaya payanenkol' - indha kuraloda porul enna?
output: Kural: 'Katrradhanaal aaya payanenkol vaalariVan natraal thozhaar enin'. Artham: Thooya arivudaiya iraivanoada thiruvadigalai vanangaavittaal, katra kalviyaal enna payan? Kalviyoda unmaiyaana payan iraivanai vananguvadhae enkiraar Valluvar.

instruction: Penn Nayanmaargal yaaraenum irukiraargala?
output: Aam, moondru penn Nayanmaargal ullanar: 1) Karaikkal Ammaiyar - pei uruvil Sivanai vanangiYavar, Thiruvalangattil Sivan aadum bodhu isai vazhangiYavar, 'Ammaiye' endru Sivan azhaiththathaal 'Ammaiyar' peyar, 2) Mangaiyarkkarasi (Thirunavukkarasar sagodhari), 3) Isaignaaniyar (Thirugnana Sambandhar thaay). Pengalum bhakthi maargathil sirandhavargal enbadharkku proof!

instruction: Divorce endha court-la file seyyanum?
output: Family Court-la file seyyanum. Jurisdiction: 1) Kadaisiyaaga serndhu vaazntha idam, 2) Marriage nadandha idam, 3) Wife tharpodhhu vasikkum idam, 4) Husband tharpodhhu vasikkum idam. District Family Court-la petition podunga.

instruction: WhatsApp message 'CNG subsidy scheme for auto drivers. Register with 2000, get 10000 subsidy.' Fuel cost save aagum, apply pannalama?
output: Government subsidies announced through transport department, not WhatsApp. CNG pricing is regulated, doesn't need personal registration. 'Pay 2000 get 10000' is scam pattern. Actual schemes come through unions or RTO announcements. Don't pay strangers for 'subsidies'.

instruction: Safe abortion எங்கே கிடைக்கும்? Cost என்ன?
output: Safe facilities: 1) Government hospitals - free, 2) Approved private clinics (check registration), 3) Medical college hospitals. Cost: Government = free. Private = Rs.3,000-15,000 (depends on weeks, method). Method: 1) Medical (pills) - early pregnancy, 2) Surgical - later stage. Unsafe abortion risks: Infection, hemorrhage, infertility, death. Never go to unregistered places.

instruction: PM Vidya Lakshmi Portal endraal enna?
output: Education loan portal. Website: vidyalakshmi.co.in. Features: 40+ Banks, 125+ loan schemes, Apply to multiple banks with one application, Scholarship info available. Loan types: Up to ₹4 lakh - No collateral, ₹4-7.5 lakh - Co-borrower needed, Above ₹7.5 lakh - Collateral needed. Interest Subsidy: Govt pays interest during moratorium for EWS students

instruction: Life insurance claim reject aanaal appeal enge?
output: Steps: 1) Company grievance cell, 2) IRDAI IGMS portal (igms.irda.gov.in), 3) Insurance Ombudsman (Rs.30 lakh varai), 4) Consumer forum, 5) Civil Court. Common rejection reasons: Non-disclosure, policy lapse, suicide clause. Documents: Policy, medical records, rejection letter.

instruction: Online application submit aagala, error varudhu
output: Common fixes: 1) Clear browser cache, try incognito mode 2) Different browser (Chrome/Firefox) 3) Check file size limits (usually <200KB photos, <500KB docs) 4) PDF/JPG format correct? 5) All mandatory fields filled? 6) Internet stable? 7) Deadline passed? 8) Server busy - try late night. Still failing: Screenshot error, contact helpline. Alternative: Try from e-Sevai centre - they have dedicated lines.

instruction: நகரத்தில் Restaurant தொடங்க என்னென்ன license வேண்டும்?
output:
**Restaurant தொடங்க தேவையான Licenses:**

**1. FSSAI License (கட்டாயம்)**
- Website: fssai.gov.in
- Types:
  - Basic (₹12L turnover வரை): ₹100/year
  - State (₹12L-₹20Cr): ₹2,000-5,000/year
  - Central (₹20Cr+): ₹7,500/year
- Time: 7-60 days

**2. Trade License**
- எங்கே: Corporation/Municipality
- Fee: ₹2,000-25,000 (area based)
- Renewal: Yearly

**3. Shop & Establishment**
- எங்கே: tnlabour.tn.gov.in
- Fee: ₹500-2,000
- Within 30 days of opening

**4. Fire Safety NOC**
- எங்கே: Fire Department
- Seating 50+ கட்டாயம்
- Fire extinguishers required
- Annual renewal

**5. GST Registration**
- Turnover ₹20L+ (Service)
- gst.gov.in
- Free registration

**6. Health/Eating House License**
- Corporation Health Dept
- Kitchen inspection
- Staff health checkup
- Annual renewal

**7. Liquor License (if serving)**
- TASMAC permission
- Very strict process
- Additional fees

**8. Signage License**
- Corporation
- Board size limits
- Fee based on size

**9. Music/Entertainment License**
- Live music/DJ இருந்தால்
- Police permission
- Noise regulations

**10. Pollution NOC (if needed)**
- Kitchen exhaust
- Waste management
- TNPCB

**Staff Requirements:**
- PF Registration (20+ employees)
- ESI Registration (10+ employees)
- Minimum Wages compliance

**Timeline:**
- FSSAI: 7-60 days
- Trade License: 7-15 days
- Fire NOC: 15-30 days
- Total setup: 2-3 months

**Common Mistakes:**
- Opening without FSSAI
- No fire safety
- Staff without health cards
- Non-compliance fines heavy!

instruction: Madurai Kamaraj University-la distance education nalladha?
output: MKU distance education UGC approved, widely recognized. BA, BCom, BBA, MA, MCom courses available. Study centre city-layae irukku. Fees affordable. Contact classes weekend-la nadakkum.

instruction: College-ல் stress அதிகமா இருக்கு. Handle பண்றது எப்படி?
output: Stress management: 1) Sleep 7-8 hours - non-negotiable 2) Exercise 30 min daily - even walking helps 3) Healthy food - avoid junk during stress 4) Break big tasks into small 5) Talk to friends, family 6) College counsellor - free service 7) Hobbies continue - music, sports, art 8) Social media break 9) Deep breathing when overwhelmed 10) Professional help if severe - no shame. Remember: Grades ≠ Self-worth. You matter more than marks.

instruction: Court marriage eppadi seivathu?
output: Steps: 1) Marriage Registrar office-la form submit (30 days before), 2) Notice board-la display, 3) Objection period (30 days), 4) Marriage ceremony (Registrar mun), 5) Certificate issue. Witnesses: 3 per. Documents: Birth certificate, address proof, photos, affidavit.

instruction: Menstrual hygiene products free-yaa kidaikkumaa?
output: Government schemes: 1) TN: Subsidized sanitary napkins at fair price shops, 2) School girls: Free sanitary napkins through schools, 3) Anganwadi: Distribution to adolescent girls. Jan Aushadhi: Cheap sanitary napkins (Rs.1/pad). NGOs: Many distribute free. Machines: Napkin vending machines in some government offices, colleges. Menstrual leave: Some TN government offices have period leave policy.

instruction: Gym/Coaching centre refund thara marukkiraargal - sattapadi ketkalaamaa?
output: Service not availed-kku pro-rata refund ketkalam. 'No refund' policy unfair trade practice aagalam. Lock-in period reasonable-aa irukkanum. Consumer forum-la complaint podalam. Covid pola force majeure cases-la full refund kidaikkum.

instruction: Sex determination test legal-aa? Punishment enna?
output: ILLEGAL! PCPNDT Act 1994. Prohibited: 1) Sex determination of fetus, 2) Disclosure of sex, 3) Advertisement for sex selection. Punishment: 3-5 years jail + Rs.10,000-1 lakh fine. Who's punished: Doctor, lab, pregnant woman (if complicit), person who seeks test. Ultrasound: Must NOT reveal sex - if revealed, report to authorities. Female feticide: Serious crime - declining sex ratio issue.

instruction: Medicine expiry ஆனா use பண்ணலாமா?
output: NO! Expired medicine risks: 1) May not work (lost potency), 2) May become toxic, 3) Can cause adverse reactions. Law: Selling expired medicine = criminal offence. Check: Expiry date on strip/bottle before purchase. If sold expired: 1) Return to pharmacy, 2) Drug Inspector complaint, 3) Consumer Forum. Storage: Keep as per instructions - some need refrigeration.

instruction: DCA/PGDCA course என்ன? Value இருக்கா?
output: DCA (Diploma in Computer Applications): 6 months - 1 year. PGDCA (Post Graduate): 1 year after graduation. Contents: MS Office, Internet, Basic programming, Database. Value: Government jobs-ல் DCA mandatory சில posts-க்கு. Private sector: Entry level IT support, data entry. Better alternative: BCA degree or specific skill courses (Python, Web development). DCA sufficient for basic computer operator roles.

instruction: KVPY scholarship enna? Science students eppadi apply seivathu?
output: Kishore Vaigyanik Protsahan Yojana (KVPY): IISc Bangalore nadathum science aptitude test. Streams: SA (Class 11), SX (Class 12), SB (1st year BSc). Scholarship: ₹5,000-7,000/month + annual contingency grant. Selection: Aptitude test + Interview. Benefits: IISc/IISERs admission priority. 2022 onwards INSPIRE SHE-aaga merge aanadhu, but similar benefits continue through INSPIRE.

instruction: Case எத்தனை years ஓடும்? Settlement பண்ணலாமா?
output: Timeline: Consumer Forum 1-3 years, Civil court 5-10 years, Criminal 3-7 years. Settlement: 1) Lok Adalat (mutually agreed), 2) Mediation (court-annexed), 3) Direct negotiation. Benefits: Faster resolution, certain outcome, lower legal costs. Caution: Don't settle too low - get legal opinion on fair amount. Hospital insurance: Usually pushes for settlement.

instruction: Affidavit எப்படி எழுதுவது? எங்கே notarize பண்றது?
output: Affidavit format: 1) Title (I, [Name], do hereby solemnly affirm...), 2) Personal details (age, address, occupation), 3) Statement of facts (numbered paragraphs), 4) Verification (true to knowledge and belief), 5) Deponent signature. Notarize: Any Notary Public - Rs.50-200 fee. Stamp paper: Rs.10-100 (depends on purpose). E-stamp available at banks.

instruction: Medical negligence-kku evvalavu compensation kidaikkum?
output: Depends on: 1) Severity of injury/death, 2) Age of victim, 3) Earning capacity, 4) Future medical needs, 5) Mental agony. Components: 1) Medical expenses (past + future), 2) Loss of income, 3) Pain and suffering, 4) Disability compensation, 5) Loss of consortium (spouse), 6) Punitive damages (gross negligence). Range: Rs.5 lakhs to Rs.5+ crores. Death: Multiplier method based on age and income.

instruction: Instagram DM - 'We love your content! Become brand ambassador, free products + commission. Just pay 500 shipping for starter kit.'
output: Real brand deals - they pay you, you don't pay. 'Shipping for free products' contradiction. 500 pay pannina - cheap products or nothing. Real influencer deals through proper contracts, not random DMs to small accounts.

instruction: Builder flat thara delay pannuraar - enna seyyalam?
output: RERA (Real Estate Regulatory Authority)-la complaint podunga. tnrera.in - Tamil Nadu RERA portal. Delay-kku interest (SBI lending rate + 2%) ketkalam. Full refund with interest-um ketkalam. Consumer forum-lum parallel-aa case podalam.

instruction: Scholarship application reject ஆனது. Reason என்ன?
output: Common reasons: income certificate issue, caste certificate problem, document mismatch, duplicate application. NSP portal-ல் rejection reason பாருங்கள். திருத்தி re-apply செய்யலாம்.

instruction: Kabasura Kudineer - COVID-க்கு effective-ஆ?
output: Government approved: For COVID prevention and mild symptoms. Ingredients: 15 herbs including Kabasuram, Adathodai, Chukku, etc. Benefits: Respiratory immunity, cough, cold. Preparation: Same as Nilavembu - boil powder, strain. Dosage: 60ml twice daily. Research: CCRS conducted clinical trials. Note: 1) Not substitute for COVID vaccine, 2) Severe COVID = hospital treatment, 3) Prevention + mild symptoms only. Available: Government free distribution, pharmacies.

instruction: Drunk driving-க்கு என்ன punishment?
output: Blood alcohol limit: 30mg/100ml. First offence: Rs.10,000 fine + 6 months imprisonment. Second offence (3 years-ல்): Rs.15,000 + 2 years imprisonment. License suspension: 3 months - 1 year. Accident caused: Additional charges - up to 10 years imprisonment.

instruction: Water supply complaint enge koduppadhu?
output: Chennai: CMWSSB - 044-28454455, cmwssb.tn.gov.in. Other cities: Municipal/Corporation office. Rural: TWAD Board - Local Panchayat. Issues: No supply, contamination, billing, new connection. Response: 24-48 hours for emergency.

instruction: 'Arulillaarkku avvulagam illai' - arul patriya kural enna solludhu?
output: Kural: 'Arulillaarkku avvulagam illai porulillaarkku ivvulagam illai yaangu'. Artham: Karunai illadhavargalukkku marumai (after-life) illai. Panam illadhavargalukkku immai (indha ulagam) kashtam. Compassion = spiritual wealth, Money = worldly needs. Irandum thevai!

instruction: JEE vs TNEA - TN-ல் Engineering-க்கு எது better?
output:
**JEE vs TNEA Comparison:**

**TNEA (Tamil Nadu Engineering Admissions):**
- Based on: 12th marks only (Maths, Physics, Chemistry)
- No entrance exam!
- For: TN Engineering colleges only
- Website: tneaonline.org

**JEE Main:**
- Based on: Entrance exam score
- For: NITs, IIITs, GFTIs + TN colleges (optional)
- All India level competition

**Comparison Table:**

| Factor | TNEA | JEE |
|--------|------|-----|
| Basis | 12th Marks | Exam Score |
| Difficulty | Easy (marks based) | Tough exam |
| Colleges | TN only | All India |
| Competition | TN students | All India |
| Preparation | Board focus | Extra coaching |
| Cost | Low | Coaching expensive |

**TNEA Mark Calculation:**
```
TNEA Score = (Maths × 50) + (Physics × 25) + (Chemistry × 25)
Total: 200 marks
```

**Which is Better?**

**Choose TNEA if:**
- Want TN college (Anna Univ, Govt colleges)
- Not interested in IIT/NIT
- Limited coaching access
- Strong in 12th boards

**Choose JEE if:**
- Target IIT/NIT/IIIT
- Ready for competitive exam
- Can afford coaching
- Want All India opportunities

**Best Strategy:**
- Prepare for JEE → Automatically strong in boards
- Apply for both TNEA and JEE counselling
- More options = Better chances

**Top Colleges via TNEA:**
- CEG (Anna University)
- MIT (Anna University)
- GCT Coimbatore
- TCE Madurai

instruction: Government hospital-la free-yaa treatment kidaikkumaa?
output: Yes! Government hospitals = Free treatment for all. Free services: 1) OPD consultation, 2) Basic tests (blood, urine, X-ray), 3) Medicines (available stock), 4) Surgery (non-cosmetic), 5) Emergency care, 6) Delivery, 7) Vaccinations. Paid: Special rooms, specific tests (MRI/CT in some), outside medicines. Quality: Varies - GH Chennai, Madurai Medical College = good facilities.

instruction: 'Tirupati TTD la irundhu pesuren ayya, special Hundi donation ku select aairukkeenga, 5000 contribution pannina VIP darshan + prasadam' nu call vandhudhu.
output: TTD random calls panni donation kekaadhu ayya. 'VIP darshan for donation' official scheme illa. Phone donation scam - money pogum, darshan varaadhu. ttdevasthanams.ap.gov.in - official website only. Phone calls ignore pannunga.

instruction: Data Science/AI padikka enna vazhi?
output: Options: 1) B.Tech CS/IT + elective courses 2) Online certifications - Coursera, edX (Google, IBM certificates) 3) IIT/IISc online programs 4) NPTEL free courses 5) M.Tech Data Science - IITs, NITs. Prerequisites: Python, Statistics, Linear Algebra. Chennai-la pala institutes coaching tharukindrana. Kaggle competitions-la participate pannunga. Portfolio build pannunga.

instruction: என் நிலத்தில் புதிய ஆழ்துளை கிணறு (Borewell) அமைக்க என்ன permission வேண்டும்?
output:
Borewell permission process:

**Step 1: Permission வாங்குதல்**
- எங்கே: PWD Ground Water Wing / District Collector Office
- Online: tnpwd.gov.in

**Step 2: தேவையான ஆவணங்கள்**
- நில ஆவணம் (Patta/Chitta)
- FMB Extract
- Location sketch
- Adjacent borewell details (500m சுற்றளவில்)
- Aadhaar, Photo

**Step 3: கட்டணம்**
- Application fee: ₹100-500
- NOC fee: ₹500-1,000

**Step 4: Inspection**
- PWD officer visit
- Ground water level check
- Spacing norms verification (Minimum 200m from other borewells)

**Step 5: Approval**
- காலம்: 15-30 நாட்கள்
- Depth restriction இருக்கலாம்

**Free Electricity Connection:**
- Borewell complete-ஆன பின் TANGEDCO-ல் apply
- Agricultural free connection

**முக்கியம்:**
- Permission இல்லாமல் borewell போட்டால் legal action
- Over-exploited areas-ல் permission கிடைக்காது

instruction: Postmortem report எப்படி challenge பண்றது?
output: Challenge options: 1) Second opinion from forensic expert, 2) Exhumation and re-autopsy (court order needed), 3) Cross-examination of autopsy doctor, 4) Expert witness contradiction. Grounds: 1) Incomplete examination, 2) Wrong conclusions, 3) Procedural violations, 4) Bias. Important: Video recording of autopsy now mandatory in many cases. Evidence: Preserve body photos if possible.

instruction: Jan Aushadhi-ல் மருந்து ஏன் மலிவு?
output: Jan Aushadhi sells generic medicines with same quality as branded (WHO-GMP certified) at 50-90% lower price. No brand premium. Find stores at janaushadhi.gov.in. Example: Metformin 500mg - Market ₹25, Jan Aushadhi ₹3.50. Great for long-term medications.

instruction: Court-la case poda bayamaa irukku, vera option illaiyaa? (Chennai casual)
output: Alternatives: 1) Lok Adalat - free, quick, 2) Mediation centre - court-attached, 3) Consumer forum - simple procedure, 4) Labour Commissioner - workplace issues, 5) Legal Services Authority - free guidance. Ellamae Court-ai vida easy-yum cheap-um.

instruction: Internship எப்படி கிடைக்கும்? Apply எங்கே?
output: Internship sources: 1) College placement cell - company tie-ups 2) Internshala.com - largest platform 3) LinkedIn - direct apply 4) Company websites - careers page 5) Professor reference - industry contacts 6) Alumni network 7) Government internships - NITI Aayog, ministries. Tips: Apply early (6 months before), customize resume for each application. Unpaid internship: Experience valuable, accept if good company. Stipend: Negotiate politely.

instruction: Pudhiya kadaikku Commercial Electricity Connection eppadi vaanguvadhu?
output:
**Commercial Electricity Connection:**

**Step 1:** Apply at nsc.tnebnet.org

**Step 2: Documents**
- Ownership: Sale Deed/Rent Agreement
- Aadhaar + PAN
- Trade License/GST
- Building Certificate

**Step 3:** Calculate load (AC, Fridge, etc.)

**Step 4:** TANGEDCO inspection

**Step 5: Payment**
- Deposit: ₹1,500-15,000
- Service: ₹500-2,000
- Meter: ₹1,000-3,000

**Step 6:** Connection in 7-15 days

**Commercial Tariff:** Higher than domestic, slab based

**Complaint:** 94987-94987, TANGEDCO App

instruction: 10 வருஷமா same job பண்றேன், career change பண்ணணும், new skill learn பண்ண எங்கே போவது?
output: Career change options: 1) TNSDC free courses - 100+ skills 2) NSDC skill centers - PMKVY scheme 3) Online: Coursera, edX certificates (many free) 4) Coding: freeCodeCamp, Codecademy 5) Digital marketing: Google certifications free 6) MBA distance - career shift. Trending skills: Data Science, Digital Marketing, Cloud computing, Python. Strategy: Learn while working → Build portfolio → Apply new roles OR Entrepreneurship. Age no barrier - many successful career changes at 35-45.

instruction: Meenakshi Amman kovil la donation QR scan potten, 100 rupees donate panna 10,000 debit aaiduchu! Kovil QR dhaan da, enna aachhu?
output: Aiyooo! Fraudu gang original QR mela fake QR sticker ottirukkaanga da. Higher amount ku redirect aagirum. PIN enter pannumbodhu amount verify pannaama pottiye. Kovil la, temple la - ivanga vida maatanga. Ippo bank ku complaint pannu, cyber crime ku poi FIR podu.

instruction: Income certificate எங்கே வாங்குவது? Online-ல் apply பண்ணலாமா?
output: Online apply: www.tnedistrict.tn.gov.in or e-Sevai centres. Offline: VAO (Village Administrative Officer) → RI → Tahsildar. Documents: Aadhaar, ration card, employment proof (if any), self-declaration for non-employed. Time: 7-15 working days. Fee: ₹10-50. Validity: Usually 1 year, some schemes accept older. Types: Annual income certificate, income certificate for specific scheme. Tip: Apply in advance before scholarship deadline.

instruction: Daughter engineering mudichaa, 'TCS/Infosys direct hiring, training fee 25,000' nu email vandhudhu. Placement kedaikala, idhu genuine opportunity aa?
output: TCS, Infosys training fee kekaadhu - they PAY stipend during training. 'Direct hiring' emails fake. Company career pages la apply pannunga. Training fee kekkura 'IT companies' 100% scam. Daughter ku solla - legitimate companies candidate kitta fee kekaadhu.

instruction: Doctor sex சொன்னார்/கேட்டார் - complain எங்கே?
output: Report immediately! Complaint to: 1) District Appropriate Authority (Collector office), 2) State Supervisory Board (DHS), 3) Police FIR, 4) Medical Council. Evidence: If possible, record/witness. Confidential complaint: Identity protected. Reward: Some states offer reward for reporting. Action: Center sealed, license cancelled, criminal prosecution. Even asking = offence for both parties.

instruction: Property document lost aanaal enna seivathu?
output: Steps: 1) Police complaint (FIR), 2) Newspaper advertisement (lost notice), 3) Sub-Registrar office-la certified copy apply, 4) Affidavit notarize. Certified copy original-kku samam. Online: tnreginet.gov.in-la post-2009 documents download pannalam.

instruction: Old house tenant vacate aagum time, 'Tenant rights lawyer' call pannaan - 'Tenant ku extra compensation vendum, 20,000 legal fee pay pannunga handle pannuren' nu.
output: Random 'lawyers' calling = scam. Tenant disputes Rent Control court la handle aagum. Legitimate lawyers office la meet pannuvaanga, random calls pannaadhu. 'Legal fee advance' vaangitu nothing pannuvaanga. Known lawyers consult pannunga.

instruction: WhatsApp forward 'Free tractor scheme government. Register with Aadhaar and 5000 token.' Tractor kedaikum aa really?
output: No 'free tractor' scheme from central or state government. Tractor subsidies exist but through proper bank loan and agriculture department process. 'Free' anything with 'token money' is always scam. Check official government websites, not WhatsApp forwards.

instruction: Medicine missed dose - double dose edukkalaamaa?
output: Generally NO! Rules vary: 1) Most medicines - take when remembered, skip if close to next dose, 2) Never double dose unless doctor says, 3) Blood pressure/diabetes - specific rules, 4) Antibiotics - complete course important. Dangerous to double: Blood thinners, heart medicines, insulin. Safe practice: 1) Set reminders, 2) Pill boxes, 3) Ask pharmacist/doctor specific instructions. If unsure: Call doctor before taking.

instruction: Naanga Sri Lankan Tamil refugee. En pillaikku education kidaikkuma?
output: Sri Lankan Tamil refugee education: 1) Government schools - Free admission for refugee camp children 2) Special coaching provided 3) TN Government scholarship for refugee students 4) UNHCR education support 5) Higher education: Special quota in some colleges. Documents: Camp registration, UNHCR certificate. Support organizations: READ, OFERR. Many refugee children have succeeded - IIT, Medical, Government jobs. Don't lose hope!

instruction: Scholarship apply செய்ய last date எப்போது?
output: NSP portal-ல் fresh application: August-November, renewal: July-October (approximate). State scholarships-க்கு different dates. Deadline-க்கு முன்பே apply செய்யுங்கள், last minute rush தவிர்க்கவும்.

instruction: Fear of failure irukkidhu - eppadi overcome panradhu?
output: 'Olvadhu arivadhu arindhadan kan thangich selvaar peru nilaththu needu vaazhvaar'. Ungal thiRamayai arinDhu, adhil focus seiyungal. Melum: 'Ulluvadhu ellam uyarvullal' - always think positive. Failure is just feedback! Learn and try again. 'Thortraalum muyarchi sei' - effort matters more than outcome.

instruction: COVID போல emergency-ல் price capping இருக்குமா?
output: Government can cap prices in emergencies. COVID example: TN government capped - room charges, oxygen, medicines, CT scan rates. Authority: Epidemic Diseases Act, Disaster Management Act. Violation: License suspension, heavy fines. Current: Some COVID caps may still apply. Check: DHS notifications. Overcharging complaint: DHS, Consumer Forum.

instruction: Student budget எப்படி manage பண்றது?
output: Budget tips: 1) Monthly expenses list make 2) Essentials first - food, transport, stationery 3) Track spending - apps like Money Manager 4) Hostel food cheaper than outside 5) Second-hand books - seniors, book banks 6) Student discounts use everywhere 7) Part-time work if possible 8) Avoid peer pressure spending 9) Emergency fund small amount keep 10) Scholarship money wise use. Rule: Needs > Wants.

instruction: Cheating case-kku enna punishment?
output: IPC 420 (BNS 318): Cheating and dishonestly inducing delivery of property - 7 years imprisonment + fine. Cheque bounce: Negotiable Instruments Act 138 - 2 years imprisonment + twice cheque amount fine. Civil + criminal both options undu.
