instruction: En pillai marks kurainju padikkudhu. Pressure kodukkanumaa?
output: Approach wisely: 1) Understand reason first - health, interest, teaching quality, personal issues 2) Comparison avoid - every child different 3) Effort appreciate, not just results 4) Tutoring arrange if academic gap 5) Career alternatives discuss - marks ≠ only path 6) Mental health priority - pressure causes anxiety 7) Realistic expectations set. Reality: Many successful people were average students. Support > Pressure. Love unconditionally.

instruction: Tenant union form பண்ணலாமா? Collective bargaining legal-ஆ?
output: Legal! Tenant associations/unions form பண்ணலாம். Benefits: 1) Collective voice against unfair practices, 2) Negotiate with owner associations, 3) Legal aid pooling, 4) Information sharing. Registration: Societies Registration Act-ன் கீழ். Apartment complexes: Resident Welfare Association (RWA) common. Protect yourselves through unity.

instruction: cybercrime.gov.in la complaint eppidi file pannuradhu?
output: Website: cybercrime.gov.in. Step 1: Click 'File a Complaint', register with mobile, OTP verification. Step 2: Select category - Online Financial Fraud, Social Media Crime, Job Fraud, Crypto Fraud, etc. Step 3: Fill details - incident date/time, amount lost, mode (UPI/Card/NetBanking), scammer details, upload evidence (max 10 files, 5MB each). Step 4: Submit and note ACKNOWLEDGMENT NUMBER, screenshot confirmation. Status check: Login → 'Track Your Complaint'. Escalation if no response 30 days: State Cyber Cell, DGP Cyber Crime.

instruction: Weight loss-க்கு natural-ஆ என்ன பண்ணலாம்? Gym போக time இல்ல
output: No gym needed! Natural weight loss: 1) Morning warm water + lemon + honey, 2) Green tea/Jeera water instead of tea/coffee, 3) Dinner before 7 PM, 4) Walk 30 mins daily (morning/evening), 5) Reduce rice, increase vegetables, 6) No packaged snacks - nuts, fruits instead, 7) Intermittent fasting (16:8) if suitable. Apps: Step counter helps. Consistency: 1-2 kg/month loss is healthy and sustainable. Quick fix: Usually temporary and unhealthy.

instruction: Maintenance kodukkaavittaal enna action edukkalam?
output: Options: 1) Execution petition - salary attachment, property attachment, 2) Contempt of court - imprisonment up to 3 months, 3) Section 125 CrPC - Magistrate can order payment + imprisonment. Arrears + future maintenance ketkalam. Don't delay - act immediately.

instruction: Aadhaar tholaindhuvidadhu - enna seyvadhu?
output: Download e-Aadhaar from eaadhaar.uidai.gov.in using Aadhaar number or Enrollment ID + OTP. It's FREE and legally valid. For PVC card, order at uidai.gov.in for ₹50. If forgot Aadhaar number, retrieve at myaadhaar.uidai.gov.in → Retrieve Lost UID.

instruction: Back pain/spine problems-kku Ayurveda?
output: Ayurveda effective for: Lumbar spondylosis, disc problems, sciatica, muscle spasm. Treatments: 1) Kati Basti (oil pooling on back), 2) Pinda Sweda (bolus massage), 3) Abhyanga, 4) Basti (medicated enema), 5) Internal medicines. Duration: 7-21 days depending on severity. Many avoid surgery: Through proper Ayurveda treatment. Best results: Early treatment, lifestyle changes. Kerala specialty: Spine care centers.

instruction: Card details leak aaiduchu, transactions nadandhuruchu. Recovery process enna?
output: Immediate (within 1 hour): Call bank - BLOCK CARD, note last 4 legitimate transactions, report unauthorized ones. Within 24 hours: Written complaint at branch, request new card, file chargeback for each transaction. RBI Rules: Zero liability if reported within 3 days, max ₹10,000 if reported 4-7 days, full liability after 7 days. Documents needed: Card block confirmation, list of unauthorized transactions, FIR copy, cyber crime complaint acknowledgment. Recovery timeline: 7-90 days for credit card chargeback.

instruction: Cold/cough-kku veetu vaithiyam enna?
output: Effective remedies: 1) Chukku Kaapi - Dry ginger + pepper + palm jaggery boiled in water, 2) Turmeric milk (Manjal Paal) - Before sleep, 3) Steam inhalation with tulsi/eucalyptus, 4) Honey + ginger juice, 5) Pepper rasam, 6) Tulsi kashayam, 7) Gargle with warm salt water. Avoid: Cold water, ice cream, curd. When to see doctor: Fever >3 days, breathing difficulty, blood in phlegm.

instruction: Dr. Muthulakshmi Maternity Benefit Scheme endraal enna?
output: ₹18,000 assistance for pregnant women. 3 installments: ₹6,000 (at 12 weeks), ₹6,000 (at delivery), ₹6,000 (baby 9 months vaccines). Eligibility: 1 year TN resident, delivery at govt/govt-aided hospital. Amma Baby Kit: Additional ₹5,000 worth baby care items. Apply: PHC/Govt hospital/ICDS. Documents: Aadhaar, MCP card, Bank account.

instruction: 'Ayya, naan unga neighbor Lakshmi pesuren, WhatsApp la problem, OTP oru number ku forward aaiduchu, adha sollunga' nu call vandhudhu. Lakshmi voice maadhiri irukku.
output: WhatsApp OTP sollaadhenga ayya! Idhu account takeover scam. OTP kuduthaa unga WhatsApp account thirudiduvaanga, unga contacts kitta kaasu keppanga unga name la. Lakshmi kitta direct poi pesunga - probably avangooda account already hacked.

instruction: Affidavit enge panradhu? Cost enna?
output: Notary Public office (court complex nearby). Cost: Rs.50-200 (stamp paper) + Rs.100-500 (notary fee). Documents: ID proof, matter details. Self-drafted allowed. Notarized affidavit = legal document. e-Stamp paper available at banks.

instruction: Morphed photos upload pannitaanga - enna action?
output: Serious offence: IT Act 66E (privacy violation), 67/67A (obscene/sexually explicit content), IPC 500 (defamation), 509 (insult to modesty). Steps: 1) Platform report (takedown), 2) cybercrime.gov.in, 3) Police FIR. Women: Additional protection under POCSO (if minor), DV Act.

instruction: AC room-ல் இருந்தா cold வரும் - உண்மையா?
output: Myth! Cold caused by: Viruses, not temperature. AC connection: 1) Dry air irritates throat, 2) Poor AC maintenance = allergens, 3) Indoor crowding = virus spread, 4) Temperature shock going in/out. Prevention: Clean AC filters, adequate humidity, proper ventilation. Cold = viral infection - spread by contact/droplets, not AC itself.

instruction: Part-time job student-ஆக இருக்கும்போது செய்யலாமா?
output: Part-time options: 1) Tuition teaching - ₹200-500/hour 2) Content writing - freelance 3) Data entry - weekend work 4) Campus jobs - library, canteen assistance 5) Internships - stipend based 6) Online tutoring - Chegg, Vedantu 7) Weekend coaching classes assistant. Rules: College permission may be needed. Balance: Studies first priority. Tax: Above ₹2.5 lakh/year - tax applicable. Skills: Communication, time management develop.

instruction: Girl students-க்கு special scholarship உண்டா?
output: CBSE Single Girl Child scholarship, Pragati scholarship (AICTE), Indira Gandhi scholarship for single girl child உண்டு. State-level-லும் girl students-க்கு special schemes இருக்கின்றன.

instruction: Summer vacation - 'Kids summer camp FREE registration! Limited seats, pay 5000 advance' - genuine camp-ஆ?
output: Verify thoroughly! Summer-ல fake camp scams common. 'Free registration + advance fee' contradiction notice பண்ணுங்க. Known institutions மட்டும் trust பண்ணுங்க. Visit the place before paying. Online advance risky.

instruction: Vallalar (Ramalinga Adigal) yaar?
output: Vallalar (1823-1874) - 'Arutperunjothi' thaththuvathai parappiyavar. Jaadhi, madha verupaadugalai ethirthavar. 'Samarasa Suttha Sanmaarga Sangam' niruvinar. Vadaloor Sathya Gnana Sabhai kattinar - kovil without idol, pure light worship. 'Jeevakarunyam' (compassion for all living beings) mukkiya bodhanai. 1874-la 'Degathai oliyaaga maatri maraindhaar' endru nambappadugiradhu. Annadhaanam thodangiyavar - free food for all.

instruction: Son ku US admission apply panrom. 'Visa guaranteed, university scholarship arranged, processing fee 2 lakhs' nu consultant solraan. Trust pannalama?
output: 'Visa guaranteed' no one can promise - embassy decision. 'Scholarship arranged' - legitimate scholarships application through varum, agents arrange pannaadhu. 2 lakhs vaangitu basic work um pannaama ghost aaguvaanga. Verified consultants - check reviews, past student references.

instruction: New order WhatsApp la vandhuchchu nga - 'Dubai export ku 5 lakh order, advance QR scan pannunga receive panna' nu. Dindigul lock business ku genuine order aa nga?
output: QR scan panna receive aagaadhu nga - DEBIT aagum! Dindigul lock manufacturers specifically target pannuraanga scammers. 'Export order' excitement la maatikkaadhenga. LC through illana verified buyer dhaan deal pannunga.

instruction: Streedhan-kkum Dowry-kkum enna vithiyaasam?
output: Streedhan = Woman's personal property (gifts from parents, relatives - voluntarily given). Dowry = Demand-aa kettu vaangiyathu (illegal). Streedhan wife's absolute property - husband touch panna mudiyaadhu. Streedhan claim divorce-la pannalam.

instruction: Naan nilam / veedu vaanga porein. Ennenna check pannanum? Registration eppadi seyvadhu?
output:
Before buying - Verify:
1. Title - 30 years chain, Lawyer verify
2. EC - tnreginet.gov.in, 30 years
3. Patta & Chitta - Seller name correct?
4. FMB - Land measurement correct?
5. Tax Receipts - No dues?
6. Approved Layout - DTCP/CMDA/RERA
7. Land Use - Agricultural/Residential?

Registration:
8. Stamp Duty - 7% + 4% = ~11%
9. Sale Deed - Prepare with Lawyer
10. Sub-Registrar - Both parties + witnesses
11. Post-Registration - Patta transfer at Taluk Office

PMAY Benefit: First home buyers - 3-6.5% interest subsidy

instruction: 11th Admission எப்படி? Online counselling process என்ன?
output:
**11th Admission Process (TN):**

**Step 1: Online Registration**
- Website: tnschools.gov.in
- Period: Usually May-June (after 10th results)
- Fill personal details, school preferences

**Step 2: 10th Marks Entry**
- Results auto-fetch from board
- Verify correctness

**Step 3: School Selection**
- Select up to 10-15 schools (preference order)
- Government / Aided / Matriculation

**Step 4: Seat Allotment**
- Based on marks & preference
- Reservation rules apply:
  - SC: 18%
  - ST: 1%
  - MBC/DNC: 20%
  - BC: 26.5%
  - BCM: 3.5%
  - General: 31%

**Step 5: Reporting**
- Go to allotted school
- Submit documents
- Pay fees (if applicable)

**Stream Selection:**
- Choose based on career goal
- Science (Maths): Engineering
- Science (Bio): Medicine
- Commerce: CA, Business
- Arts: Law, Civil Services

**Documents Needed:**
- 10th Marksheet (Original + 3 copies)
- TC (Transfer Certificate)
- Community Certificate
- Income Certificate (for fee concession)
- Aadhaar Card
- Passport photos - 6

**Important:**
- Govt schools: FREE
- Aided schools: Minimal fees
- Matriculation: Higher fees

**Helpline:** DGE helpline number (varies each year)

instruction: 'Apollo Pharmacy la irundhu ayya, unga monthly medicines ready, delivery charge 200 rupees, OTP sollunga confirm panna' nu call vandhudhu. Naan Apollo la medicines vaanguven, genuine aa?
output: Apollo pharmacy OTP kekka maatanga ayya delivery ku. 'Delivery OTP' nu solradhu actually payment OTP - kaasu unga account la irundhu pogum. Pharmacy ku neenga call panni confirm pannunga. Unknown calls la OTP sollaadhenga.

instruction: Delivery-ல் mother/baby-க்கு injury - claim பண்ணலாமா?
output: Yes, if negligence proved. Common claims: 1) Delayed C-section causing brain damage, 2) Birth injuries (brachial plexus), 3) Maternal death due to PPH mismanagement, 4) Infection, 5) Wrong forceps use. Proof: Partograph (labor record), CTG (fetal monitoring), timelines. Child injury: Long-term care compensation. Maternal death: Family claims. Time sensitive: Evidence deteriorates - act quickly.

instruction: என் பிள்ளை career choice-ஐ accept பண்ண முடியல. என்ன செய்வது?
output: Generation gap bridge: 1) Listen to their reasons - genuinely try to understand 2) Research that field - income potential, growth, stability 3) Meet professionals in that career - get real picture 4) Trial period suggestion - internship, shadowing 5) Your fears express - but don't impose 6) Compromise explore - related but acceptable field 7) Remember: It's their life to live. Reality: Many non-traditional careers successful today. Trust your upbringing - they'll be fine!

instruction: Computer courses free-ya enge padikkalaam?
output: Free computer training: 1) TNSDC IT courses - Web, Data entry, Tally 2) NIELIT (Government) - CCC, O Level 3) Digital India Programme - Basic computer 4) CSC (Common Service Centre) - Digital literacy 5) Library-based free classes. Online free: SWAYAM, NPTEL, Coursera (audit mode). Employment exchange computer labs free practice available. Apply through respective websites.

instruction: முதியோருக்கு Bus/Train சலுகை என்ன?
output: TN State Bus: FREE travel in ordinary buses for 60+ (just show age proof). Railway: 40% discount for men 60+, 50% for women 58+ (auto-applied on IRCTC). Air India: 50% on select routes for 63+. Always carry age proof.

instruction: Neighbour en land-la aakkramippu seigiraar - enna seivathu?
output: Steps: 1) Survey seydhu boundary verify pannunga, 2) Written notice anuppunga, 3) Tahsildar-kku complaint, 4) Civil Court-la injunction + possession suit. Documents: Patta, Survey sketch, Photos, EC. Forceful removal try pannaadheenga.

instruction: Velayila irundhu nirutitaanga, F&F eppa kidaikkum? (Madurai style)
output: Full and Final settlement: 30-45 days-la kidaikkanum. Include: Salary, leave encashment, bonus, gratuity (if eligible), notice pay, reimbursements. Delay aanaa Labour Commissioner-kku complaint. Documents: Relieving letter, experience letter, salary slip, Form 16 - ellam kelunga.

instruction: Accident aayidutchu, insurance company sariyaa settle pannala (Coimbatore style)
output: Steps: 1) Written complaint insurance company-kku, 2) IRDAI grievance portal (igms.irda.gov.in), 3) Insurance Ombudsman (free, Rs.30 lakh varai), 4) Consumer forum. Documents ready-aa vachukonga - FIR, medical bills, repair estimate, photos.

instruction: Succession certificate எப்போது வேண்டும்?
output: When needed: Bank accounts, shares, securities claim செய்ய. Will இல்லாத cases-க்கு. Apply: District Court. Documents: Death certificate, legal heir proof, asset details. Fee: Asset value based. Time: 3-6 months. Alternative: Nominee-ஆக இருந்தால் தேவையில்லை.

instruction: 'Catering for wedding - 50% advance only! Best price guaranteed' unknown caterer. Deal பண்ணலாமா?
output: Risky! Wedding caterer scams அதிகம். Advance வாங்கிட்டு disappear or substandard food. References வாங்குங்க. Taste testing போங்க. Written agreement எடுங்க. Known caterers prefer பண்ணுங்க. Full advance தராதீங்க.

instruction: Steel business WhatsApp order vandhudichu le - new customer, 2 lakh order, advance transfer pannuren nu QR anuppinaa. Scan pannalaama?
output: Pannaadhele! QR scan panna nee KUDUKKA dhaan mudiyum, vaanga mudiyaadhu. Reverse UPI scam le idhu. 'Big order' nu excitement create pannudhu. Salem steel traders ipdi maatikirukkaa. Cash on delivery illa LC through dhaan deal pannu le.

instruction: Death certificate-ku enna documents vendum?
output: Deceased Aadhaar card, Hospital death certificate / Postmortem report, Applicant ID proof vendum. 21 days-kulla register pannanum.

instruction: Copyright registration எப்படி செய்வது?
output: Online: copyright.gov.in. Categories: Literary, artistic, musical, cinematograph, sound recording. Fee: Rs.500-5,000 (work type based). Process: Application → Diary number → Objection period (30 days) → Registration. Note: Copyright automatic - registration = evidence.

instruction: Physical violence illaamal DV complaint podalaamaa?
output: Aama. DV Act covers: 1) Physical abuse, 2) Sexual abuse, 3) Emotional/verbal abuse (insults, humiliation), 4) Economic abuse (money control, property denial). Dowry harassment, threat, intimidation - ellam DV. Evidence: Recordings, messages, witnesses.

instruction: Amma Baby Care Kit endraal enna?
output: Free kit for newborn baby. Value: ₹5,000+. Contents: Baby clothes (6 sets), Mosquito net, Baby bed, Towels, Diapers, Baby oil/soap/powder, Blanket, Toys. Eligibility: Govt hospital delivery, Dr. Muthulakshmi scheme beneficiary. Given: At hospital during discharge. Documents: MCP card, Delivery details.

instruction: Idaikaadar Siddhar patri enna theriyum?
output: Idaikaadar aadu meykkum idaiyar samoogathai serndavar endru nambappadugiradhu - adhanaal indha peyar. Jaadhi bedhamindri evarum siddharagalam enbadharkku example. 'Idaikaadar Gnaanam', 'Idaikaadar Vaiththiyam' pondra noolgal avar peyaril ullana. Eliya mozhiyil aanmeegaththai explain panniyavar.

instruction: 'SBI Home Loan pre-approved - 50 lakhs at 6.5%, lowest rate ever, processing fee 15,000 required' nu call vandhudhu. Home vaanga plan irukku, genuine offer aa?
output: Banks cold call la loan push pannaadhu. 6.5% - below current rates, impossible. Processing fee advance kekaadhu - loan amount la deduct pannuvaanga. 'Pre-approved' without application impossible. SBI branch ku direct apply pannunga.

instruction: HIV/AIDS treatment enge free-yaa kidaikkum?
output: Free at ART (Anti-Retroviral Therapy) Centres. TN has 100+ ART centres. Services: 1) HIV testing (free, confidential), 2) ART medicines (lifelong free), 3) CD4 count tests, 4) Opportunistic infection treatment, 5) Counseling, 6) PPTCT (pregnant women). Location: District hospitals, medical colleges. TANSACS: State AIDS control body. Helpline: 1097 (AIDS helpline). Confidentiality guaranteed.

instruction: Email vandhuchu 'CME credits verification failed. Pay 12,000 for audit clearance or face council action.' CME credits important, pay pannidlama?
output: CME credits tracked through official medical council portals. No 'audit clearance fee' exists. Check your CME status directly on NMC/SMC website. Scammers know doctors worry about continuing education compliance. Official communication comes through council letterhead and registered mail.

instruction: Bharathiyar yaar? Avar contribution enna?
output: Subramania Bharathi (1882-1921) - Tamilin migasirandha kavignargalil oruvar. Sirappugal: 1) Desiya kavignar - independence movement-kku inspiring poems, 2) Pen viduthalai - 'Pudhumaipenn' concept, 3) Jaadhi ozhippu - social reform, 4) Eliya Tamil - common people purindhukkolla, 5) Panchali Sabadham - epic poem. 'Sindhu nadhiyin misai', 'Vellainiraththorupoonai', 'Achamilai achamilai' migavum famous. Modern Tamil poetry father!

instruction: Myth or Fact: Myth: Drop year waste of time, stigma ulladhu
output: Fact: Fact: Drop year = Strategic investment. Many IIT/AIIMS toppers took drop. Reality: 60-70% NEET qualifiers are droppers. No employer asks about gap year for doctors/engineers. Better to take time and get right career than settle for less. Productive drop year > Rushed wrong decision. Society's opinion < Your career satisfaction.

instruction: Akshaya Tritiya - 'Digital gold at 50% off! Today only!' app notification வந்துச்சு. Buy பண்ணலாமா?
output: Scam alert! Gold 50% off என்றெல்லாம் இல்ல. Akshaya Tritiya gold buying sentiment exploit. Unknown apps-ல gold வாங்காதீங்க. Trusted platforms (MMTC, banks) மட்டும் use பண்ணுங்க. Too good offer = too bad trap.

instruction: Rent Authority endraal enna? Enge irukku?
output: 2017 Act-in keezh uruvakkappatta dispute resolution body. Ovvoru district-lum District Collector thalaimayil Rent Authority irukku. Rent disputes, eviction issues, deposit refund problems ivattrai handle seivaanga. Court-ai vida faster resolution.

instruction: Government Siddha hospital Chennai-la enge irukku?
output: Chennai facilities: 1) National Institute of Siddha (NIS), Tambaram - Premier institute, 200 beds, all specialties, 2) Government Siddha Medical College Hospital, Arumbakkam - Oldest college, teaching hospital, 3) Arignar Anna Government Hospital of Indian Medicine - Multiple AYUSH systems. Services: Free OPD, IPD, medicines, special therapies. Timings: Usually 8 AM - 4 PM OPD.

instruction: En nilathula pudhiya borewell amaikkka enna permission vendum?
output:
Borewell permission process:

**Step 1: Get Permission**
- Where: PWD Ground Water Wing / District Collector
- Online: tnpwd.gov.in

**Step 2: Documents**
- Land document (Patta/Chitta)
- FMB Extract
- Location sketch
- Adjacent borewell details (within 500m)
- Aadhaar, Photo

**Step 3: Fee**
- Application: ₹100-500
- NOC: ₹500-1,000

**Step 4: Inspection**
- PWD officer visit
- Ground water check
- Spacing norms (Min 200m from others)

**Step 5: Approval**
- Time: 15-30 days
- Depth restriction possible

**Important:** Without permission = legal action

instruction: Cancer medicine-kku subsidy irukkaa?
output: Yes! Options: 1) Government hospital pharmacy - free/subsidized, 2) CMCHIS covers cancer treatment including medicines, 3) Jan Aushadhi - generic cancer drugs cheaper, 4) Patient assistance programs (pharma companies), 5) NGO support (Cancer Institute, Adyar). Apply: Hospital social worker helps. Also: PM-BJKAY scheme for some cancer surgeries.

instruction: உண்மையா பொய்யா: Myth: Arts படிச்சா future இல்லை
output: உண்மை: Fact: Arts graduates options: IAS/IPS (UPSC - Arts background preferred), Banking, Teaching, Law, Journalism, Civil Services, HR, Social Work. Many IAS toppers are Arts graduates. Salary depends on job not degree. BA + competitive exam preparation = excellent career. Arts graduates excel in UPSC due to writing skills. Don't underestimate humanities!

instruction: CMCHIS-la ennenna treatment cover aagum?
output: Covered: 1) Heart surgery, bypass, stent, 2) Cancer treatment, chemotherapy, 3) Kidney transplant, dialysis, 4) Brain surgery, 5) Joint replacement, 6) Accident/trauma surgery, 7) Maternity (complicated), 8) Eye surgery (cataract), 9) ENT procedures. Not covered: OPD consultation, dental (cosmetic), infertility (basic). Full list: cmchistn.com

instruction: Exam day-la udambu sariyilla - enna option irukku?
output: Medical certificate vaangi submit pannunga. Board exams-kku supplementary exam ezhuthalaam. University exams-kku medical re-exam apply pannalam. NEET/JEE-kku next attempt try pannalam. Documents maintain pannunga.

instruction: College/University degree certificate தர delay பண்றாங்க
output: Steps: 1) Controller of Examinations complaint, 2) University Grievance Cell, 3) UGC Grievance portal, 4) RTI (status enquiry), 5) Court writ petition (if excessive delay). Provisional certificate-உடன் job apply பண்ணலாம். Employer-க்கு explain பண்ணுங்க.

instruction: Data Science/AI படிக்க என்ன வழி?
output: வழிகள்: 1) B.Tech CS/IT + elective courses 2) Online certifications - Coursera, edX (Google, IBM certificates) 3) IIT/IISc online programs 4) NPTEL free courses 5) M.Tech Data Science - IITs, NITs. Prerequisites: Python, Statistics, Linear Algebra. Chennai-ல் பல institutes coaching தருகின்றன. Kaggle competitions-ல் participate செய்யுங்கள். Portfolio build பண்ணுங்கள்.

instruction: சொந்த தொழில் ஆரம்பிக்க என்ன training இருக்கிறது?
output: Entrepreneurship training: 1) MSME-DI (District Industries Centre) - free EDP (Entrepreneurship Development Programme) 2) TNSDC business skills 3) NIESBUD courses 4) PMEGP training before loan 5) Startup TN programmes. Duration: 1-4 weeks. Topics: Business plan, finance, marketing, legal compliance. DIC-ல் register பண்ணினால் subsidies, loans easier. Free mentorship available.

instruction: Psychiatrist vs Psychologist - யாரை பார்க்கணும்?
output: Psychiatrist (MD): Medical doctor, can prescribe medicines. See for: Severe depression, bipolar, schizophrenia, anxiety needing medication. Psychologist (MPhil/PhD): Non-medical, provides therapy/counseling. See for: Stress, relationship issues, mild-moderate depression/anxiety, trauma. Often work together: Psychiatrist for meds + Psychologist for therapy. First step: Can start with either, they'll refer if needed.

instruction: Job interview-kku pogum bodhu courage-kku enna kural padikkalam?
output: 'Achchame keezhkaladhu aasaaram aqdhaal echchtham emaappu udaiththu'. Bayam enbadhu thaazhndhavrkalukkae uriyadu. Confident-aa irunngal. Melum: 'Ookkamadhu kaividel' - enthusiasm-a vidaadheeargal. Believe in yourself, prepare well, and face it boldly!

instruction: NEET Biology எப்படி படிப்பது? NCERT enough-ஆ?
output: Biology strategy: NCERT = Bible for NEET Biology. 90%+ questions NCERT-இலிருந்து direct/indirect. How to study: 1) Line by line reading 2) Diagrams by hand draw 3) Tables, flowcharts memorize 4) Previous year questions practice 5) NCERT exemplar problems. Additional: MTG, Trueman's for extra practice. Botany vs Zoology: Equal weightage. High scoring: Human Physiology, Genetics, Ecology.

instruction: Republic Day - 'Free flag with Tiranga photo frame! Register and share' WhatsApp forward. Genuine government initiative-ஆ?
output: Mostly scam! Government free-ஆ flag distribute பண்ணும், registration தேவையில்ல. 'Register and share' data collection trap. Republic Day patriotism exploit பண்றாங்க. Local government office-ல free-ஆ வாங்குங்க.

instruction: Will எப்படி எழுதுவது? Register பண்ணணுமா?
output: Will writing: Clear language, all properties list, beneficiaries பெயர், date, signature, 2 witnesses signature. Registration கட்டாயம் இல்லை ஆனால் recommended - disputes avoid. Registered will Sub-Registrar office-ல் safe custody-ல் இருக்கும்.

instruction: Solar pump scheme யாருக்கு கிடைக்கும்?
output: PM-KUSUM scheme கீழ் solar pump subsidy உண்டு. 60% government subsidy, 30% loan, 10% farmer share. Agriculture department-ல் online apply செய்யலாம். 3HP-10HP pumps available.

instruction: NEET-ku eppadi prepare seyvadhu? Endha books padikkanum?
output:
**NEET Preparation:**

**2-Year Plan:**
- Class 11: NCERT foundation, Concepts
- Class 12: NCERT revision, Mock tests, Previous papers

**Books:**

**Physics:**
- NCERT (Must!)
- HC Verma, DC Pandey

**Chemistry:**
- NCERT (Read multiple times!)
- MS Chouhan (Organic)
- N Awasthi (Physical)

**Biology:**
- NCERT (90% questions!)
- Trueman's, MTG Guide

**Daily Routine:**
- 5:30 AM: Physics/Chemistry
- Afternoon: Biology
- Evening: Weak subject
- Night: Revision/MCQs

**Tips:**
1. NCERT 5-6 times
2. Bio diagrams daily
3. Physics numericals daily
4. 50-100 MCQs daily
5. Weekly full test

instruction: IGNWPS (Indira Gandhi National Widow Pension Scheme) endraal enna?
output: Pension for BPL widows. Central: ₹300/month. TN State: Additional ₹1,000/month. Eligibility: 40-79 years widow, BPL family. 80+ years: Transferred to IGNOAPS. Apply: Taluk/Panchayat office. Documents: Death certificate of husband, Age proof, Aadhaar, Income certificate, Bank account. Remarried: Not eligible.

instruction: Insulin storage eppadi? Travel-la carry pannalaamaa?
output: Storage: Refrigerator (2-8°C), not freezer. In-use vial: Room temperature okay for 28 days (most). Travel: 1) Carry in hand luggage (flight), 2) Cooling pouch for long journeys, 3) Doctor letter for security check, 4) Carry extra supply. Signs of spoilage: Discoloration, particles, frosted appearance. Airport: Insulin + syringes allowed with prescription letter.

instruction: Aimperungaappiyangal endraal enna?
output: Tamiloda aindhu periya kaappiyangal: 1) Silapathigaram - Ilango Adigal, Kannagi kadhai, 2) Manimegalai - Seethalai Saatthanaar, Kannagi magal kadhai, 3) Seevaka Chinthamani - Thiruththakadevar, Jain kaappiyam, 4) Valaiyapathi - Jain kaappiyam (paguthi mattum kidaiththathu), 5) Kundalakesi - Buddha kaappiyam (muzhmaiyaaga kidaikkavillai). Silambum Manimekalayum irattai kaappiyangal endru azhaikkapadum.

instruction: ASHA worker யார்? என்ன help செய்வாங்க?
output: ASHA = Accredited Social Health Activist - village level health worker. Services: 1) Pregnant women tracking and support, 2) Child vaccination reminders, 3) Health awareness, 4) Medicine distribution (TB, malaria), 5) Nutrition counseling, 6) Family planning advice, 7) Escort to hospital, 8) COVID vaccination support. Contact: Through Village Health Nurse or PHC. Free service.

instruction: ECT (shock treatment) - consent venumaa?
output: Yes! Strict rules under MHCA 2017. Requirements: 1) Written informed consent (patient or rep), 2) Modified ECT only (with anesthesia), 3) Documented medical necessity, 4) Cannot be given as punishment. Minors: Not allowed except life-threatening situations. Unmodified ECT: Banned. Violation: Complaint to Mental Health Review Board. Alternative treatments: Must be discussed before ECT.

instruction: Ayurvedic products reliable brands எவை?
output: Established brands: 1) Arya Vaidya Sala (Kottakkal), 2) Arya Vaidya Pharmacy (AVP), 3) Dabur, 4) Baidyanath, 5) Himalaya, 6) Patanjali (controversial but licensed), 7) Nagarjuna, 8) Kerala Ayurveda, 9) SNA Oushadhasala. Check: 1) AYUSH license on pack, 2) Manufacturing date/expiry, 3) Batch number. Avoid: Unbranded, loose, online unknowns. Government: IMPCOPS (TN government pharmacy) for Siddha/Ayurveda.

instruction: Cheque bounce aanaal enna case varum?
output: Negotiable Instruments Act Section 138: 1) Cheque bounce = criminal offence, 2) Payee demand notice anuppanum (15 days-kkul), 3) 15 days-kkul pay pannala = complaint file pannalam, 4) Punishment: 2 years jail + double amount fine, 5) Time limit: Cause of action-la irundhu 1 month-kkul case podanum.

instruction: BP tablet daily எடுக்கணுமா? Stop பண்ணலாமா?
output: Usually lifelong! Why: 1) BP medicine controls, doesn't cure, 2) Stopping = BP goes up again, 3) Sudden stop can cause rebound high BP. Safe: 1) Never stop without doctor advice, 2) Regular checkups, 3) Lifestyle changes may reduce dose (weight loss, diet, exercise). Myth: "I feel fine, so I don't need" - BP is silent killer, symptoms come late. Monitoring: Home BP monitor useful.

instruction: Email vandhuchu 'Hospital promotion exam registration. Pay 5000 for staff nurse grade-2 to grade-1 exam.' Promotion exam ku pay pannalama?
output: Government hospital promotions through TNPSC or department exams - fees minimal and official. Private hospital promotions are internal HR process. No external 'promotion exam' services. Check with your hospital HR or nursing superintendent.

instruction: Expired product விற்றால் என்ன complaint செய்யலாம்?
output: FSSAI complaint: fssai.gov.in அல்லது Food Safety Officer (District)-க்கு. Consumer forum-ல் compensation case. Police complaint (IPC 273 - selling adulterated food). Seller-க்கு fine + license cancellation ஆகலாம். Product, bill வைத்திருங்க.

instruction: Varadatchanai kekkuraanga, enga poi solrathu? (Madurai style)
output: Recording vachukonga - phone calls, conversations. Messages screenshot edunga. Women helpline 181, or All Women Police Station-la complaint. Dowry Prohibition Act-la case podalam. 5 years jail + fine - kekkuravangalukkum kodukuravangalukkum.

instruction: 'Kerala Lottery la 10 lakh win panniteenga, tax 15,000 pay pannulle' nu call vannille. Ticket vaangiyilla, win aakumo?
output: Ticket illaama win aakumo alle? Kerala Lottery phone la call pannillalle, tax advance vaangillalle. Fraudsters alle ivanga. Muttom, Kollencode la fishermen ipdi maatikittanga. Block pannu number.

instruction: Gym/Coaching centre refund தர மறுக்கிறார்கள் - சட்டப்படி கேட்கலாமா?
output: Service not availed-க்கு pro-rata refund கேட்கலாம். 'No refund' policy unfair trade practice ஆகலாம். Lock-in period reasonable-ஆ இருக்கணும். Consumer forum-ல் complaint போடலாம். Covid போன்ற force majeure cases-ல் full refund கிடைக்கும்.

instruction: Close friend persistent aa 'business opportunity' explain pannaan - 'Amway/Vestige join pannu, both of us earn, just 15,000 starter kit.'
output: Friend genuine aa believe panniruppaan - but MLM structure problematic. 95%+ participants lose money (FTC data). Friendship strain aagum if you refuse or fail. Research MLM statistics, politely decline. Real friendship survives business rejection.

instruction: Abortion refuse பண்றாங்க (unmarried) - rights?
output: Illegal to refuse! MTP Act 2021: Explicitly includes unmarried women. If refused: 1) Ask for written reason, 2) Escalate to hospital administration, 3) Complaint to DHS, 4) Court (urgent petition). Marital status: Not relevant for abortion right. Judgment questions: Doctor should not morally judge. Alternative: Find another approved centre. Time sensitive: Don't delay - gestational limits apply.

instruction: Newborn-க்கு free screening tests என்ன?
output: Newborn screening at government hospitals: 1) Hearing screening, 2) Heart defect screening (pulse oximetry), 3) Eye examination (for retinopathy if premature), 4) Hip examination, 5) Thyroid screening (heel prick blood test). Rashtriya Bal Swasthya Karyakram (RBSK): Regular health checkup for children 0-18 years. Follow-up: If abnormality found, referred to higher centre - treatment free.

instruction: Sugar patient - என்ன food சாப்பிடலாம்?
output: Eat freely: 1) Most vegetables (leafy greens, bitter gourd, lady finger), 2) Whole grains (millets, brown rice - portion control), 3) Lean protein (fish, chicken, dal), 4) Nuts (limited). Limit: 1) White rice, maida, 2) Sweets, 3) Sugary drinks, 4) Fruits (portion control - 1 small fruit). Avoid: 1) Refined sugar, 2) Packaged juices, 3) Deep fried. Tip: Eat regularly, don't skip meals. Dietitian consultation: Free at government hospitals.

instruction: Foundation for Excellence (FFE) scholarship என்ன?
output: FFE Scholarship: Engineering மற்றும் Medical students-க்கு. Amount: ₹20,000-60,000/ஆண்டு. Eligibility: JEE/NEET cleared, family income ₹6 lakh கீழ். Selection: Application review + verification. Benefits: Full tuition support + mentoring. Apply: www.ffe.org. Tamil Nadu-ல் 1000+ students benefitted. Deadline: Usually July-August.

instruction: Credit card bill pay panna mudiyala, harassment varudhu, enna seivathu?
output: RBI Fair Practice Code: 1) Recovery agents 7AM-7PM only contact pannalam, 2) Office/relatives-kitta poga koodaadhu (without permission), 3) Threaten, abuse panna koodaadhu, 4) Violation: Bank-kku + RBI-kku complaint, 5) Settlement option kelunga - usually 50-70% pay panni close pannalam. Police complaint-um podalam harassment-kku.

instruction: New electricity connection eppadi peruvadhu?
output: Apply: nsc.tnebnet.org. Documents: Property document / Rental agreement, Aadhaar. Fee: ₹500-2000 (depends on load). Time: 7-15 days. Complaint: 94987-94987

instruction: Right to be forgotten என்றால் என்ன?
output: Online-ல் உள்ள personal information delete செய்ய request பண்ணும் right. DPDP Act 2023-ல் provision உண்டு. Google search results remove: Google legal removal request. Social media: Platform privacy settings. Court orders மூலமும் removal possible.

instruction: Fake medicine kidaichadhu - complain enge?
output: Serious offence! Complaint: 1) Drug Inspector (District Drug Control Office), 2) State Drugs Control Department, 3) FDA helpline, 4) Police (criminal case possible). Evidence: Keep medicine, bill, pack with batch number. Verification: Check authenticity - company website, QR code (some have), call company. Punishment: Up to life imprisonment for spurious drugs causing death. CDSCO: Central regulator.

instruction: 'Aakkam izhandhaemenru' - tholvi patriya kural enna solludhu?
output: Kural: 'Aakkam izhandhaemenru allaaVaar ookkam oruvandam kaiththudai yaar'. Artham: Selvam izhandhaalum 'izhandhuVittom' endru azhuvaar alla, ookkam ullavargal. Setbacks-kku cry panravargal weak. Strong people bounce back. Resilience is wealth!

instruction: Voter ID eppadi peruvadhu?
output: 1. voters.eci.gov.in or Voter Helpline App use pannunga 2. Form 6 fill pannunga 3. Documents: Age proof (must be 18+), Address proof, Passport size photo 4. BLO will visit your home for verification 5. Time: 30-45 days

instruction: Fasting therapy (Upvas) safe-ஆ? எப்படி செய்றது?
output: Therapeutic fasting types: 1) Fruit fast - only fruits, 2) Juice fast - fresh juices, 3) Water fast - only water (supervised only), 4) Intermittent fasting - 16:8 popular. Benefits: Detox, weight loss, digestive rest, autophagy (cell cleaning). Safe fasting: 1) Start slow (intermittent), 2) Stay hydrated, 3) Break fast gently (not heavy food), 4) Medical conditions - consult doctor. Avoid: Diabetes (uncontrolled), pregnancy, children, underweight.

instruction: 'Selvarkku azhagu sezhundhootti' - selvandharkku azhagu enna?
output: Kural related meaning: Panakkaarargalukkku azhagu ennavendral pirarukku uthavuvadhu. Ezhaigalukkku azhagu ennavendral ketkaamal iruppadu. True wealth = giving, True dignity = self-respect even in poverty.

instruction: Neighbour satham pottu thollai tharugiraar - enna seivathu?
output: Steps: 1) Friendly talk mudhalil, 2) Written complaint to RWA/Association, 3) Police complaint (IPC 290 - public nuisance), 4) Civil Court injunction. Night 10PM-6AM noise: Noise Pollution Rules violation. Decibel limit: Residential area 55dB day, 45dB night.

instruction: UPI fraud aanaal udane enna seyyanum?
output: Golden hour (first 24 hours mukkiyam): 1) Bank-kku immediately call - transaction block, 2) 1930 helpline (cyber fraud), 3) cybercrime.gov.in-la complaint, 4) UPI app-la report, 5) Nearby police station FIR. Amount recover chance: 24 hours-la report = higher chance.

instruction: National Scholarship Portal (NSP) moolam endhendha scholarships kidaikkum?
output: NSP scholarships: 1) Pre-matric SC/ST/OBC 2) Post-matric SC/ST/OBC 3) MHRD Merit scholarship 4) PM scholarship for defence personnel wards 5) Minority scholarships 6) Top class education scholarship. Apply: www.scholarships.gov.in. One portal for 100+ schemes. Documents: Aadhaar, bank account, income certificate, caste certificate, marks. Deadline: October-November usually.

instruction: Siddhargal jaadhi, madham patri enna solkirargal?
output: Siddhargal jaadhi, madha verupaadugalai kadumayaga ethirththargal: 1) 'Ondre kulam oruvane devan' - Thirumoolar, 2) 'Jaadhiyum illai samayamum illai' - Siva Vaakkiyar, 3) Ella siddhargalum vevveru jaadhi backgrounds-lirundhu vandhavargal. Padiththavargal mattumalla, idaiyar, nesavaalar ellaarum siddhargalaaga aanaargal. True spirituality-kku jaadhi thadai illai enbadhu avargal message.

instruction: SMS vandhudhu 'Film industry card registration. 3000 fee for FEFSI/TFPC membership.' Industry card kedaikum aa?
output: FEFSI/TFPC membership through proper union process with verification. Membership requires industry introduction and work history. No SMS-based instant registration. Visit official union offices. Scammers know artists want industry recognition - selling fake memberships.

instruction: Private college students-க்கு government scholarship கிடைக்குமா?
output: AICTE/UGC approved private colleges-ல் படிக்கும் students-க்கு government scholarships applicable. College recognition verify செய்யுங்கள். Self-finance college-க்கும் சில schemes உண்டு.

instruction: Kuzhanthaigalukkku Tamil saints patri eppadi karpikkalam?
output: Kuzhanthaigalukkku karpikka: 1) Aathichudi memorize pannunga - school-la karpikiraargal, 2) Kadhai sollungga - Kannappar, Avvaiyar kathaigal interesting, 3) Amar Chitra Katha comics - Tamil saints series, 4) YouTube videos - animated stories, 5) Kovil visit - samaadhigal kaattunga, 6) Thiruppaavai paadunga - Margazhiyil daily oru paasuram, 7) Periya Puranam children's version books. Make it story-based, not lecture-based!

instruction: Hospital bill adhigamaa pottaanga, enna seivathu?
output: Steps: 1) Itemized bill kelunga, 2) Each item verify - MRP check for medicines, tests actually done verify, 3) Duplicate charges check, 4) Compare with displayed rates, 5) Written complaint to hospital administrator, 6) No response: Consumer Forum. Evidence: Bill copy, displayed rates photo, admission estimate. Overcharging = Unfair trade practice.

instruction: Gratuity-க்கு eligibility என்ன?
output: Minimum 5 years continuous service வேண்டும். 10+ employees உள்ள establishment-க்கு applicable. Death/disability case-ல் 5 years வேண்டாம். Calculation: Last drawn salary × 15/26 × years of service. Maximum: Rs.20 lakhs.

instruction: Penn kuzhanthaikalukku property right irukkaa?
output: Aama. 2005 Hindu Succession Amendment Act padi magalkalukku magankalukku samamaana right undu - ancestral property-lum, self-acquired property-lum. Married/unmarried difference illa. Idhu retrospective-aa apply.

instruction: School reopening - 'Textbooks 80% discount! Order before stock ends' unknown site offer. Order பண்ணலாமா?
output: Risky! School opening time-ல textbook scams common. Advance வாங்கி wrong books or nothing அனுப்புவாங்க. Government schools free-ஆ books தரும். Private school-க்கு official bookshop-ல வாங்குங்க.

instruction: Government hospital-la waiting time adhigamaa irukku, tips?
output: Tips: 1) Go early morning (6-7 AM for token), 2) Weekdays better than Monday, 3) Avoid month-end, 4) Use online appointment if available, 5) Get referral from PHC for direct specialist access, 6) Emergency = no waiting (use emergency entrance), 7) Follow-up visits - ask for specific date/time. Seniors/pregnant: Priority queue usually available. Avoid: Public holidays, exam result days.

instruction: Daily immunity-க்கு Siddha tips என்ன?
output: Daily practices: 1) Nilavembu Kudineer (immune booster), 2) Chukku Kaapi (dry ginger coffee), 3) Turmeric milk, 4) Kabasura Kudineer (respiratory immunity), 5) Oil pulling (Gandusha), 6) Sesame oil application on head, 7) Pranayama. Seasonal: Different recipes for different seasons. Government: Distributed free during dengue, COVID seasons. Home preparation: Simple recipes available online from authentic sources.

instruction: Calculator/Mathematical tables exam-la allowed-aa?
output: Depends on exam: Board exams (10th, 12th): Not allowed. NEET: Not allowed. JEE: Virtual calculator on screen only. Engineering semester: Usually allowed (non-programmable). CA/CMA: Specific models allowed. GATE: Virtual calculator. SSC/Banking: Not allowed. Mathematical tables: Some exams provide, some allow bringing. Always check: Admit card instructions. Penalty for unauthorized items: Disqualification possible.

instruction: NRI property sell செய்ய POA கொடுக்கலாமா?
output: ஆம், ஆனால் Special Power of Attorney (SPA) இருக்கணும் - specific property, specific purpose mention ஆகணும். Indian Embassy/Consulate-ல் notarize + apostille வேண்டும். GPA alone not sufficient. SPA registration recommended.

instruction: Ayurveda endraal enna? Siddha-vida verupaadu enna?
output: Ayurveda = Sanskrit origin, 5000+ years old, pan-Indian system. Principle: Vata, Pitta, Kapha doshas balance. Difference from Siddha: 1) Language - Sanskrit vs Tamil, 2) Origin - Kerala/North vs Tamil Nadu, 3) Some unique medicines, 4) Emphasis - Siddha uses more metals/minerals. Similarities: Both holistic, natural medicines, similar principles. Recognition: Both government recognized AYUSH systems.

instruction: Two-wheeler-kku pillion rider helmet kattaayamaa?
output: Aama. Driver and pillion rider iruvarukkum ISI marked helmet kattaayam. Fine: Rs.1,000 + 3 months license suspension (repeat offence). Children-kkum helmet venum. Fashion helmets not acceptable.

instruction: TNHB (Tamil Nadu Housing Board) veedu eppadi vaanguvadhu?
output: TNHB affordable housing. Types: EWS (Economic Weaker Section), LIG, MIG, HIG flats/plots. Apply: Online at tnhb.tn.gov.in. Selection: Lottery/First-come-first-serve (based on scheme). Cost: Lower than market price. Loan: Bank tie-ups, easy EMI. Documents: Income proof, Aadhaar, Address proof. Projects: Chennai, Coimbatore, Madurai, other cities. Rental Housing: TNHB rental schemes for low-income.

instruction: Mental illness-kku treatment rights enna?
output: Mental Healthcare Act 2017 rights: 1) Access to mental healthcare, 2) Community-based treatment (not just hospitals), 3) Informed consent, 4) Humane treatment, 5) No discrimination, 6) Confidentiality, 7) Legal aid, 8) Complaint mechanism, 9) Advance directive right. Government duty: Provide affordable mental healthcare. Insurance: Must cover mental illness like physical illness.

instruction: Unnecessary tests/procedures solraanga - refuse pannalaamaa?
output: Yes! Your body, your choice. Rights: 1) Ask why each test needed, 2) Get written justification, 3) Refuse non-essential tests, 4) Second opinion for major procedures. Red flags: 1) Full body checkup push, 2) Expensive test for minor issue, 3) Surgery suggestion without trying medicine first. If pressured: Change doctor/hospital. Complaint: If unethical push - Medical Council.

instruction: ITI படித்த பிறகு என்ன வேலை கிடைக்கும்? சம்பளம் எவ்வளவு?
output: Job opportunities: 1) Government - Railways, TNEB, PWD, Ordinance factories 2) Private - Hyundai, TVS, Ashok Leyland, L&T 3) Gulf countries - high demand 4) Self-employment - own workshop. Starting salary: ₹12,000-18,000/month. With experience: ₹25,000-40,000. Apprenticeship முதலில் செய்யுங்கள் - stipend ₹8,000-12,000/month + experience.

instruction: Mudhiyor pension eppadi peruvadhu?
output: Eligibility: 60+ years, BPL family. Amount: Monthly ₹1,000. Apply: Online: pensionschemes.tn.gov.in, Offline: Tahsildar / Taluk office. Documents: Age proof, Income certificate, Aadhaar, Bank passbook

instruction: CMA (Cost Accountant) padippu pathi sollunga?
output: ICMAI nadathum padippu. Levels: 1) Foundation 2) Intermediate 3) Final. 3 year practical training. Total duration: 3-4 years. Fee: Foundation ₹6,000, Inter ₹23,000, Final ₹25,000. Manufacturing companies-la athiga demand. Costing, budgeting expertise.

instruction: Bharatanatyam, Carnatic music padikka government institution irukka?
output: Tamil Nadu Music and Fine Arts University, Kalakshetra Foundation (Chennai), Government Music Colleges irukku. Diploma, Degree courses available. Fee miga koraivau. Talented students-kku scholarship undu.

instruction: Stray dog bite ஆனால் compensation கிடைக்குமா?
output: Corporation/Municipality நிலை பொறுத்தது. Complaint: Corporation + Animal Welfare Board. Compensation: Civil Court suit against local body (negligence). Medical expenses claim. ABC (Animal Birth Control) program failure prove பண்ணணும். Police complaint-உம் possible.

instruction: காரணம் சொல்லாம job-ல் இருந்து remove பண்ணிட்டாங்க
output: Wrongful termination: 1) Written explanation demand, 2) Labour Commissioner, 3) Labour Court/Industrial Tribunal. Remedies: Reinstatement, back wages, compensation. Standing Orders: Company rules check பண்ணுங்க. Workmen vs Manager: Different procedures apply.

instruction: புதிய ரேஷன் அட்டை எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: Apply at tnpds.gov.in or Taluk Office. Documents: All family members' Aadhaar, address proof, income certificate, gas connection details, photos. Types: PHH (₹1 rice), AAY (free rice), NPHH. RI inspection, 30-45 days processing.

instruction: Sekkizhaar yaar? Periya Puranam endraal enna?
output: Sekkizhaar - Chozha mannan Kulothunga II-oda amaichar. 12th century. 'Periya Puranam' ezhuthiyavar - 63 Nayanmaargaloda varalaaru. 4286 paadalgal. 12-vadhu Thirumurai endru azhaikkapadugiradhu. Mannan Jain ilakkiyam padikka, Sekkizhaar 'idhai vida sirandha Saiva ilakkiyam ezhudhugiren' endru solli Periya Puranam padaiththaar endru kadhai. Tamil literary masterpiece!

instruction: Online natural remedy videos/tips - trust pannalaamaa?
output: Be careful! Red flags: 1) "Cure for everything" claims, 2) No credentials shown, 3) Extreme claims without evidence, 4) Asking to stop doctor's medicines, 5) Selling expensive products. Trust: 1) Government AYUSH websites, 2) Established medical institutions, 3) Registered practitioners, 4) Research-backed information. Verify: Cross-check with multiple sources. Best: Consult qualified practitioner in person for treatment.

instruction: Hospital pogum podhu enna precaution edukkanum?
output: Before: 1) Research hospital/doctor credentials, 2) Get referral if possible, 3) Carry complete medical history. During: 1) Ask questions - understand treatment, 2) Get written estimates, 3) Read consent forms fully, 4) Keep copies of everything, 5) Have family member present, 6) Note staff names. After: 1) Take discharge summary, 2) Clarify follow-up, 3) Keep medicines/bills safely.

instruction: Cancer medicine-க்கு subsidy இருக்கா?
output: Yes! Options: 1) Government hospital pharmacy - free/subsidized, 2) CMCHIS covers cancer treatment including medicines, 3) Jan Aushadhi - generic cancer drugs cheaper, 4) Patient assistance programs (pharma companies), 5) NGO support (Cancer Institute, Adyar). Apply: Hospital social worker helps. Also: PM-BJKAY scheme for some cancer surgeries.

instruction: Aandaal yaar? Thiruppaavai endraal enna?
output: Aandaal - 12 Azhvaargalil ore penn. Srivilliputhooril Periyaazhvaaraal valarkkappattavar. Ranganatharai (Srirangam) kanavaragaa karudhi, avaraiye manandhaar endru nambappadugiradhu. Thiruppaavai - 30 paasurangal, Margazhi maadhaththil paadappduvathu. 'Margazhith thingal madhiniraindha nannaalaal' endru thodangum. Kovilgal, veedugalil Margazhiyil dhinamum oru paasuram paaduvathu tradition. Naachiyar Thirumozhi matroru padaippu.

instruction: Misleading advertisement-க்கு complaint போடலாமா?
output: ஆம். ASCI (Advertising Standards Council of India)-க்கு complaint போடலாம் - ascionline.in. Consumer forum-லும் case போடலாம். Celebrity endorsement false claims-க்கும் celebrity liable. Compensation + advertisement withdraw order கிடைக்கும்.

instruction: UGC scholarship MA/MSc/PhD students-க்கு என்ன?
output: UGC Scholarships: 1) Non-NET Fellowship - ₹8,000/மாதம் MPhil/PhD 2) JRF (through NET) - ₹31,000/மாதம் 3) SRF (2 years after JRF) - ₹35,000/மாதம் 4) Rajiv Gandhi National Fellowship (SC/ST PhD) - ₹31,000-35,000/மாதம் 5) Maulana Azad National Fellowship (Minorities PhD). Apply: www.ugc.ac.in. NET தேர்வு pass ஆனால் automatic JRF.

instruction: Sexual harassment face panren. Yaarai approach panrathu?
output: Report to: 1) Internal Complaints Committee (ICC) - mandatory in every college 2) Women Helpline: 181 3) Police: Women's cell 4) National Commission for Women: ncw.nic.in 5) UGC grievance cell. Evidence: Screenshot messages, note incidents. Support: Counselling available. Legal: Sexual Harassment at Workplace Act protects students too. Confidentiality maintained. Don't blame yourself. Speak up - silence enables harassers.

instruction: Company layoff aachhu. 'Labour department' call pannaan - 'Wrongful termination compensation 2 lakhs eligible, processing fee 10,000' nu.
output: Labour department suo motu call pannaadhu. Compensation court through varum, not phone calls. 'Processing fee' government departments kekkaadhu. Genuine grievance irundhaa Labour Commissioner office ku direct ponga.

instruction: Ramana Maharishi yaar?
output: Ramana Maharishi (1879-1950) - Thiruvannamalayoda gnaani. 16 vayathil death experience-kkup pin Thiruvannamalai vandhu thavam seydhaar. 'Naan yaar?' (Who am I?) endra self-enquiry method karpithThavar. Arunachalam malaiyai vittu nagaravillai. Ulagengum bhakthargal vandhanar. Sri Ramana Ashram indrum active. Paul Brunton, Arthur Osborne pondror ivarai ulagirrku arimugappaduththinar. Modern-day saint!

instruction: High-risk pregnancy என்றால் என்ன? Special care எங்கே?
output: High-risk factors: 1) Age <18 or >35, 2) Previous C-section/complications, 3) Multiple pregnancy (twins), 4) Diabetes/BP/heart disease, 5) Rh negative blood, 6) Previous stillbirth/miscarriage. Care: 1) Referred to district hospital/medical college, 2) More frequent monitoring, 3) Specialist care. Identification: During ANC visits. Don't hide history - affects baby's safety.

instruction: Will illaamal irandhaal property yaarukku pogum?
output: Hindu Succession Act padi: Class I heirs (wife, sons, daughters, mother) samamaaga pangu peruvaargal. Class I illaattal Class II (father, siblings, etc.). Muslim-kku Shariat law, Christian-kku Indian Succession Act apply.

instruction: Cognizable vs Non-cognizable offence enna vithiyaasam?
output: Cognizable: Serious crimes (murder, rape, theft, assault) - Police FIR pottu warrant illama arrest pannalam. Non-cognizable: Minor crimes (defamation, cheating under Rs.500) - Court permission venum. NC case-kku NCR (Non-Cognizable Report) padhivu seivaargal.

instruction: 'Ayudha Pooja - Free bike service from TVS! WhatsApp to register' - genuine service camp-ஆ?
output: Fake! TVS official-ஆ WhatsApp registration வச்சிருக்காது. Ayudha Pooja-ல vehicle related scams அதிகம். Service camp-னா dealer-ஐ directly contact பண்ணுங்க. WhatsApp forward நம்பாதீங்க.

instruction: Property vaangum mun ennenna documents check pannanum?
output: Must check: 1) Title deed chain (30 years), 2) EC (30 years), 3) Patta & Chitta, 4) Survey sketch, 5) Tax paid receipts, 6) Approved building plan, 7) NOC (if apartment), 8) RERA registration (new projects), 9) Power of Attorney (if applicable). Lawyer verification recommended.

instruction: SDAT coaching centre-la sera enna seyyanum?
output: SDAT (Sports Development Authority of Tamil Nadu) ovvoru district-layum coaching centres vaichirikku. Age: 8-14 years. Selection trials nadakkum. Free coaching, kit, diet allowance kedaikum. District Sports Officer-a contact pannunga.

instruction: Infertility treatment government hospital-la available-aa?
output: Limited but available. Government: 1) Basic infertility workup - free at medical college hospitals, 2) Some IUI facilities, 3) Counseling. IVF: 1) Limited government centres (Institute of Obstetrics - Chennai), 2) Subsidized at some, 3) Mostly private (expensive). CMCHIS: Covers some infertility procedures. PM-PMSBY: Assisted reproduction not fully covered yet. Cost: IVF privately Rs.1-3 lakhs per cycle.

instruction: Free legal aid enga peruvadhu?
output: TNSLSA (Tamil Nadu State Legal Services Authority) provides free legal aid. Eligibility: BPL, SC/ST, women, differently-abled, senior citizens, victims of trafficking. Helpline: 15100 (24x7). Legal Aid Cell at every district court. Lok Adalat for quick settlements.

instruction: MBBS/BDS admission-ku Tamil Nadu-la enna seiya venum?
output: NEET exam compulsory. Steps: 1) NEET ezhuthunga 2) TN Medical Selection Committee counselling-ku apply pannunga 3) Online choice filling 4) Govt/Private medical college allotment. Govt college fee: Yearly ₹13,500. 7.5% govt school students-ku separate reservation.

instruction: Crypto investment-la double money guarantee-nu friend suggest panraanga
output: Crypto-la guarantee illa sir. Double money scheme ellam Ponzi fraud. Friend-um emaanthurukkalam. SEBI registered platform use pannunga, guaranteed return nambaadheenga.

instruction: Fashion Design படிக்க தமிழ்நாட்டில் எங்கே போவது?
output: Top institutes: 1) NIFT Chennai - National level 2) AIFD Chennai 3) JD Institute of Fashion. Admission: NIFT - entrance exam (January). Courses: B.Des Fashion Design (4 years), Diploma (1-2 years). Eligibility: 12th any stream. Fees: NIFT ₹2-3 lakh/year, Private ₹50,000-1.5 lakh/year. Jobs: Fashion houses, Garment industry, Freelance designer. Chennai = garment hub = good placement.

instruction: 'Agara mudhala ezhuththellam' - indha kuraloda artham enna?
output: Kural: 'Agara mudhala ezhuththellam aadhi bhagavan mudhatre ulagu'. Artham: Ezhuththukkal ellam 'A' endra ezhuththil thodanguvadhu pola, ulagam muzhuvathum iraivanaaal thodangiyathu. Idhu Thirukkuraloda mudhal kural. Kadavul Vaazhtthu adhigaarathil ulladhu.

instruction: Apprenticeship training eppadi join aavadhu? Stipend kidaikkuma?
output: National Apprenticeship Promotion Scheme (NAPS): ITI/Diploma mudithavargalukku. Register: www.apprenticeshipindia.gov.in. Duration: 1-3 years depending on trade. Stipend: ₹8,000-15,000/month (govt subsidy ulladhu). Companies: TCS, L&T, Hyundai, Railways, BHEL - all hire apprentices. Benefits: Real experience, permanent job chance 70%+. Documents: ITI certificate, Aadhaar, bank account.

instruction: Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana (SSY) endraal enna?
output: Savings scheme for girl children. Age: Can open account before 10 years. Deposit: Minimum ₹250, Maximum ₹1.5 lakh/year. Interest: 8.2% (2024) - Very high! Duration: 21 years or marriage (above 18). Tax Benefits: Section 80C deduction (up to ₹1.5 lakh), Interest tax-free, Maturity tax-free (EEE status). Open: Post Office/Bank, Birth Certificate, Parent's ID proof. Partial Withdrawal: 50% at 18 (Higher education/Marriage)

instruction: 'Pirivoora naanam thudaippadu' - pirivoda vali patriya kural enna solludhu?
output: Kural: Pirivutru kannootla verullaan kannootla punarvadhu sindhippaan pondru. Artham: Kaadhalan pirindhu sendraalum, avan thirumbi varuvaan endra nambikkayil kaadhali kaaththirukkiraal. Long-distance relationship-a 2000 varudangalukkku munnabe Valluvar purindhukkondaar.

instruction: Hospital medical records thara marukkthu - enna seivathu?
output: Patient's right - cannot refuse. Actions: 1) Written demand with delivery acknowledgment, 2) RTI (if government hospital), 3) Consumer Forum application for production of records, 4) Police complaint (if suspicious tampering), 5) Court application for preservation order. Tampering: Serious offence - evidence destruction. Hospital must provide within 72 hours of written request.

instruction: 'IPL match prediction - 100% accurate, join Telegram VIP group, 5000 subscription.' Demo predictions correct aa vandhudhu.
output: Demo predictions - they send opposite predictions to different groups, one group always 'wins.' VIP group la 'invest more for insider info' demands varum. Match fixing illegal anyway. Cricket betting apps - most unlicensed, money recovery impossible.

instruction: Colleague introduce pannaan - 'Monthly 5000 invest, 12 months la 75,000 return, plus referral bonus.' Initial members good returns vaanguraanga nu sonnaan.
output: Classic Ponzi/MLM structure - early investors ku late investors paisa kuduppaanga. 'Referral bonus' = MLM. Sustainable illa - scheme collapse aagum, last entrants lose pannuvaanga. Colleague genuine aa trust pannirupparu but scheme itself fraud. Politely decline pannunga.

instruction: Children parents-ai paarkaama vittuttaanga - law udhavumaa?
output: Maintenance and Welfare of Parents Act 2007: Children (including married daughters) parents-kku maintain seyyanum. Tribunal: SDM/Tahsildar level. Maintenance order: Rs.10,000/month max. Property revocation: Gift deed cancel possible if neglect proved.

instruction: National Scholarship Portal (NSP) எப்படி பயன்படுத்துவது?
output: Central Govt Scholarships ஒரே இடத்தில். Website: scholarships.gov.in. முக்கிய Scholarships: Pre-Matric SC (Class 1-10, ₹150-750/month), Post-Matric SC (Class 11+, ₹230-1,200/month), Merit-cum-Means (Technical edu, Tuition fee + ₹1,000/month), INSPIRE (Science top 1%, ₹80,000/year), NMMS (Class 9-12 EWS, ₹12,000/year). விண்ணப்பிக்க: scholarships.gov.in → Register, Aadhaar, Income Certificate, Marksheet upload, Institute verification, DBT மூலம் Bank-ல் வரும்

instruction: Sexual harassment face பண்றேன். யாரை approach பண்றது?
output: Report to: 1) Internal Complaints Committee (ICC) - mandatory in every college 2) Women Helpline: 181 3) Police: Women's cell 4) National Commission for Women: ncw.nic.in 5) UGC grievance cell. Evidence: Screenshot messages, note incidents. Support: Counselling available. Legal: Sexual Harassment at Workplace Act protects students too. Confidentiality maintained. Don't blame yourself. Speak up - silence enables harassers.

instruction: Vehicle fitness certificate எப்போது வேணும்?
output: Transport vehicles: Every year (8 years-க்குப் பிறகு every 6 months). Non-transport: 15 years-க்குப் பிறகு every 5 years. Test: Emission, brakes, lights, etc. Expired fitness: Rs.2,000 fine. Online booking: parivahan.gov.in.

instruction: TNPSC என்றால் என்ன? என்னென்ன exams நடத்துவாங்க?
output:
**TNPSC (Tamil Nadu Public Service Commission):**

**என்ன இது?**
- TN அரசு வேலைகளுக்கான தேர்வு நடத்தும் அமைப்பு
- Group 1, 2, 2A, 4 exams
- Technical, Non-technical posts

**Major Exams:**

**1. Group 1 (CSSE):**
- Posts: Deputy Collector, DSP, AD, RDO
- Eligibility: Any Degree
- Salary: ₹56,100-1,77,500
- Toughest TNPSC exam

**2. Group 2 (CCSE-II):**
- Posts: Sub-Registrar, Assistant, Audit Inspector
- Eligibility: Degree
- Salary: ₹35,400-1,12,400

**3. Group 2A:**
- Posts: Junior Assistant, Bill Collector, Typist
- Eligibility: Degree (most posts)
- Salary: ₹19,500-62,000

**4. Group 4 (CCSE-IV):**
- Posts: Junior Assistant, Typist, Village Admin Officer
- Eligibility: 10th/12th pass
- Salary: ₹19,500-62,000
- Most vacancies!

**5. Group 3 (Technical):**
- Posts: Junior Engineer, Surveyor
- Eligibility: Diploma/Degree
- Department-wise recruitment

**Exam Pattern (General):**

| Stage | Marks | Papers |
|-------|-------|--------|
| Prelims | 200 | GS + Aptitude |
| Mains | 300 | GS + Language |
| Interview | 40 (Group 1 only) | - |

**Age Limit:**
- General: 21-32 years
- BC/MBC: +5 years
- SC/ST: No limit

**Apply:** tnpsc.gov.in

instruction: Senior Citizen Savings Scheme (SCSS) endraal enna?
output: Best savings for 60+ years. Interest: 8.2% (2024 - very high!). Deposit: ₹1,000 to ₹30 lakh. Term: 5 years (extendable by 3 years). Tax: Section 80C deduction, Interest taxable but TDS threshold ₹50,000. Open: Post Office/Bank (SBI, ICICI, etc.). Early closure: Possible after 1 year, penalty applies. Nomination: Mandatory.

instruction: Clinical trial-ல் participate பண்ணலாமா? Risks என்ன?
output: Voluntary participation. Requirements: 1) Ethics Committee approval, 2) Detailed informed consent, 3) Insurance coverage for participants, 4) Right to withdraw anytime, 5) Compensation for injury. Risks: Unknown side effects, may receive placebo. Benefits: Access to new treatments, free care during trial, compensation. Verify: CTRI registration (ctri.nic.in). Never feel pressured.

instruction: Arranged marriage-kku oththukkolvadhaa vendaama?
output: 'Manamaatchi illaalkan illayin vaazhkkai enaimaatchith thaayinum il'. Nalla illaththarasi illaaVittaal endha selvamum payanillai. Melum: 'Pennin perunthakka yaavula' - penn enbadhu migapperiya varam. Decision ungaludayadhu - aanaal compatibility, values paarungal, external beauty mattum alla.

instruction: Revenge porn/intimate images share panninaal enna punishment?
output: IT Act 66E: 3 years imprisonment + Rs.2 lakh fine. 67/67A: 5-7 years imprisonment. IPC 354C (voyeurism). Women: Section 499/500 defamation. Platform takedown: CERT-In report. Victim support: NCW helpline 7827-170-170. Don't blame victim - legal protection undu.

instruction: 'Thelliya vaayudaiya mannarai' - nalla leader-oda tharam enna?
output: Kural: 'Solluga sollir payanudaiya sollarka sollir payanilaach sol'. Artham: Payanulla vaarthaigalaiye pesungal. Payanatra vaarthaigalai pesaadheeargal. Speak only what adds value. Avoid meaningless talk. Quality over quantity in communication!

instruction: Class 8-ku appuram enna padikkalam? Endha stream select seyvadhu?
output:

- Class 9-10: Same for all

instruction: Employment Exchange-ல் பதிவு எப்படி செய்வது?
output: Online at tnvelaivaaippu.gov.in → OTR (One Time Registration). Documents: Educational certificates, community certificate, Aadhaar, photo. Benefits: Govt job notifications, private opportunities, skill training. Renew every 3 years. Also available at District Employment Office.

instruction: Old Age Pension eppadi peruvadhu?
output: TN State: ₹1,000/month (60-79 years), ₹1,500/month (80+). Eligibility: BPL/low income, no other pension. Apply at tneservices.tn.gov.in or Taluk Office with age proof, income certificate, Aadhaar, bank account. VAO verification. Time: 30-60 days.

instruction: Bank account freeze aachu, yen? Enna seivathu?
output: Freeze reasons: 1) Court order (loan default, legal case), 2) IT department notice, 3) Suspicious transactions (PMLA), 4) KYC not updated. Steps: 1) Bank-kitta freeze reason kelunga (writing-la), 2) Court order = lawyer consult, 3) IT matter = CA consult, 4) KYC = documents update pannunga. Wrongful freeze: Banking Ombudsman complaint.

instruction: Complaint file panna enna documents collect pannanum?
output: Collect BEFORE filing: Screenshots of ALL conversations (WhatsApp, SMS, email), call recordings if available, scammer's phone numbers, scammer's bank account/UPI ID, transaction receipts/screenshots, bank statement showing debit, any links/websites shared, scammer's social media profiles, your Aadhaar/ID proof, your bank account details, timeline of events written down. Storage tip: Email screenshots to yourself (timestamp proof), Google Drive backup, don't delete anything from phone.

instruction: புதிய ஓட்டுநர் உரிமம் எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: Step 1: Apply for Learner's License (LLR) at parivahan.gov.in - age proof, address proof, medical declaration. Pass computer test. Step 2: After 30 days, apply for DL. Take driving test at RTO. Fee: ₹200-700. Age: 18+ for car/bike, 16+ for without gear.

instruction: Children-kku safe internet usage tips enna?
output: Parents: 1) Parental controls enable, 2) Screen time limits, 3) Open communication, 4) Monitor (not spy) activity, 5) Teach about online dangers. Children: Don't share personal info, stranger-kitta chat vendaam, uncomfortable content-a parents-kitta sollunga.

instruction: Neighbour veettu construction en veetukku damage - compensation kidaikkumaa?
output: Aama. Civil Court-la damages claim. Steps: 1) Written notice to neighbour, 2) Photos/videos of damage, 3) Engineer report (damage assessment), 4) Civil suit file. Compensation: Repair cost + inconvenience. Injunction to stop work-um possible.

instruction: 'SBI Special Senior Citizen FD - 12% interest, limited period offer' nu call vandhudhu. Regular FD 7% dhaan irukku, idhu genuine special offer aa?
output: 12% FD interest impossible ayya - RBI regulations 8-9% max allow pannum. 'Special offer' nu solluraanga, investment vaangitu kaanama poiruvaanga. SBI branch ku poi enquire pannunga - phone offers trust pannaadheenga. Too good to be true na, fraud dhaan.

instruction: Chennai-ல் Property Tax எப்படி கட்டுவது? Assessment தவறு என்றால் என்ன செய்வது?
output:
**Property Tax Payment (Chennai Corporation):**

**Online Payment:**
1. Website: chennaicorporation.gov.in
2. Click: Property Tax
3. Enter: Zone Number + Division + Bill Number
4. Or: Property Tax Assessment Number
5. View bill details
6. Pay: Net Banking / UPI / Card
7. Download receipt

**Offline Payment:**
- Corporation Zonal Office
- e-Seva Centers
- Common Service Centers

**Due Dates:**
- Half-yearly: April & October
- Advance payment: 5% discount
- Delay: 2% penalty per month

**Assessment Calculation:**
- Annual Rental Value (ARV) method
- Factors: Location, Area, Age, Usage
- Residential vs Commercial rates different

**Assessment தவறு என்றால்:**

**Step 1: Objection Filing**
- எங்கே: Zonal Office / Online
- Within 15 days of assessment
- Form + Supporting documents

**Step 2: Documents for Objection**
- Property document
- Previous tax receipts
- Building plan (approved)
- Area measurement proof
- Usage proof (Residential/Commercial)

**Step 3: Hearing**
- Revenue Inspector verification
- Assistant Revenue Officer hearing
- Your explanation

**Step 4: Revised Assessment**
- If accepted: New assessment
- If rejected: Appeal to Commissioner

**Appeal Process:**
- First Appeal: Commissioner
- Second Appeal: Small Causes Court
- Time limit: 30 days each stage

**Common Issues:**
- Wrong plinth area
- Commercial rate for residential
- Old building shown as new
- Vacant land taxed as building

**Tips:**
- Keep all tax receipts
- Update ownership after purchase
- Inform about demolition/modification
- Check assessment every revision cycle

instruction: Ex-servicemen pillaikkalukku padippu salugaigal enna?
output: Benefits: 1) TNPSC-la 2% horizontal reservation 2) Engineering/Medical admission-la reservation 3) Sainik School admission priority 4) AFMC, NDA-la priority 5) Fee concession pala colleges-la. Prime Minister's Scholarship: ₹36,000-60,000/year professional courses-ku. Kendriya Sainik Board scholarship available. Apply with father's discharge certificate.

instruction: 12th padikkumbodhae enna competitive exams-ku prepare aagalam?
output:
**Competitive Exams During 12th:**

**1. NEET (Medical):** PCB, May exam, Start from 11th

**2. JEE (Engineering):** PCM, Jan & April, Start from 11th

**3. CUET (Central Universities):** Domain + Language + GK

**4. CLAT (Law):** English, GK, Legal, Logical, Maths - Dec exam

**5. NDA (Defence):** 16.5-19.5 age, April & Sept exam, 12th appearing eligible

**6. KVPY:** Science scholarship, Class 11-12, Nov exam

**Timeline:**
- NEET/JEE: Start Class 11
- CLAT: Start Class 11
- NDA: Class 12

**Tips:**
- Board = 60-70% competitive syllabus
- Identify extra topics
- Join test series early
- Balance both preparations

instruction: WhatsApp message 'ICSI membership upgrade offer. Company Secretary certification with 50,000 fast-track fee.' Career advancement ku useful aa?
output: ICSI membership only through official exam and training route, no 'fast-track' exists. Company Secretary is regulated profession with mandatory exams. Check icsi.edu for genuine membership process. Shortcuts to professional certification are always fraudulent.

instruction: Job மாறும்போது PF transfer எப்படி?
output: Same UAN continue ஆகும் - transfer தேவையில்லை (auto-transfer). Old account + new account merge: EPFO portal → Online Services → Transfer Request. New employer-கிட்ட UAN கொடுங்க. Transfer: 10-15 days. Withdrawal பண்ணாம transfer பண்றது tax-efficient.

instruction: Sugar patient - enna food saappidalaam?
output: Eat freely: 1) Most vegetables (leafy greens, bitter gourd, lady finger), 2) Whole grains (millets, brown rice - portion control), 3) Lean protein (fish, chicken, dal), 4) Nuts (limited). Limit: 1) White rice, maida, 2) Sweets, 3) Sugary drinks, 4) Fruits (portion control - 1 small fruit). Avoid: 1) Refined sugar, 2) Packaged juices, 3) Deep fried. Tip: Eat regularly, don't skip meals. Dietitian consultation: Free at government hospitals.

instruction: NEET fail ஆனால் என்ன alternatives இருக்கிறது?
output: Medical field alternatives: 1) B.Sc Nursing - no NEET 2) BDS (Dental) - lower cutoff 3) BAMS/BHMS/BUMS - Ayurveda/Homeopathy 4) B.Sc Allied Health Sciences 5) Pharmacy (B.Pharm) 6) Physiotherapy (BPT) 7) Veterinary (NEET separate cutoff). Other options: 1) Dropper year - many succeed 2) B.Sc Biology → Research 3) Biotechnology. Reality check: 18 lakh applicants, 1 lakh seats - alternatives are not failure, different path.

instruction: Fake medicine கிடைச்சது - complain எங்கே?
output: Serious offence! Complaint: 1) Drug Inspector (District Drug Control Office), 2) State Drugs Control Department, 3) FDA helpline, 4) Police (criminal case possible). Evidence: Keep medicine, bill, pack with batch number. Verification: Check authenticity - company website, QR code (some have), call company. Punishment: Up to life imprisonment for spurious drugs causing death. CDSCO: Central regulator.

instruction: 'SEBI registered advisor, daily 2-3 stocks, 100% profit guaranteed, monthly subscription 10,000' nu call vandhudhu. Side income aagum nu paakkuren.
output: '100% profit guaranteed' - SEBI regulations la illegal claim. Registered advisors ipdi cold calls pannaadhu. Subscription vaangitu random tips kuduppaanga - loss vandha responsibility illa. SEBI registered check pannunga sebi.gov.in la - most callers fake registration claim pannuvaanga.

instruction: Enna disease-kku endha yoga?
output: Condition-specific yoga: 1) Diabetes - Surya Namaskar, twists, Pranayama, 2) BP - Shavasana, forward bends, slow breathing, 3) Back pain - Cat-cow, child's pose, sphinx, 4) Anxiety/stress - Pranayama, meditation, restorative poses, 5) Obesity - Power yoga, Surya Namaskar, 6) Asthma - Pranayama, chest opening poses, 7) Insomnia - Yoga Nidra, legs up wall. Important: Learn from qualified teacher, start slow, inform about conditions.

instruction: MD/MS (medical postgraduate) admission eppadi?
output: NEET PG exam compulsory. Steps: 1) MBBS + 1 year internship complete pannunga 2) NEET PG ezhuthunga 3) State counselling/All India quota counselling 4) Seat allotment. Govt college fee: ₹50,000-1 lakh/year. Private: ₹10-50 lakhs. Duration: 3 years. Bond service required in TN.

instruction: Government Arts and Science colleges-la BA/BSc admission eppadi?
output: Steps: 1) www.tngasa.in-la online apply 2) +2 marks basis rank 3) Counselling date announcement 4) Certificate verification 5) College allotment. Fee: Govt colleges-la yearly ₹500-2000 only. 7.5% reservation government school students-ku irukku.

instruction: Pudhiya PAN Card eppadi peruvadhu?
output: Easiest: Instant e-PAN at eportal.incometax.gov.in using Aadhaar - FREE and instant! Alternative: Apply at onlineservices.nsdl.com or pan.utiitsl.com - ₹107 for physical card, 15-20 days. Need ID proof, address proof, DOB proof, photo, and signature.

instruction: ITI Course patri full details thanga. Free-ya padikkalamaa?
output:

instruction: 'Yaadhanum naadaamaal ooraamaal' - indha pugazh petra kural enna solludhu?
output: Kural: 'Yaadhanum naadaamaal ooraamaal ennoruvan saandhunaiyum kallaadha vaaru'. Artham: Endha naadum endha oorum kalvi katravanukku sondham. Avan engu sendraalum madhippu peruvaan. Aanaal kalvi illadhavan saagum varai ondrum illaadhavanagave iruppaan. Kalviyoda avasiyathai valiyuruththum kural.

instruction: Restaurant-la food poisoning aanaal case podalaamaa?
output: Aama. 1) Medical report vaangunga (treatment evidence), 2) Food Safety Officer-kku complaint, 3) Consumer forum case, 4) Serious case - Police complaint (IPC 269, 270). Medical expenses + compensation kidaikkum. Restaurant license suspend/cancel aagalam.

instruction: Part-time job student-aaga irukkumbodhu seiyalaamaa?
output: Part-time options: 1) Tuition teaching - ₹200-500/hour 2) Content writing - freelance 3) Data entry - weekend work 4) Campus jobs - library, canteen assistance 5) Internships - stipend based 6) Online tutoring - Chegg, Vedantu 7) Weekend coaching classes assistant. Rules: College permission may be needed. Balance: Studies first priority. Tax: Above ₹2.5 lakh/year - tax applicable. Skills: Communication, time management develop.

instruction: Senior citizen pension apply எப்படி செய்வது?
output: Eligibility: 60+ years, BPL/low income. Schemes: IGNOPS (Rs.1,000/month), TN Old Age Pension (varies). Apply: e-Sevai centre, Taluk office. Documents: Age proof, income certificate, Aadhaar, bank account. Widow pension: Additional scheme available.

instruction: Myth or Fact: Myth: 30 vayasu kadandhaal padikka late
output: Fact: Fact: Learning has no age limit! Distance education: IGNOU, TNOU - no age bar. Success stories: People completing degrees at 40, 50, even 60. Benefits: Career switch, personal satisfaction, promotion eligibility. Government job age limit = only restriction (up to 35-40 for many). Skill courses: No age limit. Your motivation to learn > Your age. Start today!

instruction: TN Free Bus Pass for students enna?
output: Free bus travel for all students. Coverage: School students - Govt/Private, College students - UG/PG/Professional. Type: Free travel in ordinary buses. Process: Apply at School/College, get ID card. Documents: Bonafide certificate, Photo, Aadhaar. Validity: Academic year. Not for: AC buses, special buses.

instruction: Sports quota-la college admission vaanga enna thaguthi venum?
output: State/National level-la participate panniyirukkanum. Sports certificate (SAI/Association certified) venum. District, State, National - edha level-la play panniyirundhalum quota-kku apply pannalam. Trials nadakkum.

instruction: Generic medicine weak, branded strong - உண்மையா?
output: MYTH! Same active ingredient, same dose = same effect. Why generic cheaper: No brand marketing cost, no patent royalty. Quality: Government-approved generics meet same standards. Proof: Government hospitals use generic - same results. Jan Aushadhi: WHO-GMP certified, 50-90% cheaper. Don't fall for: Marketing claims, fancy packaging. Ask pharmacist: Generic alternative for any branded medicine.

instruction: Wedding hall booking cancel, advance திரும்ப தரல, legal action?
output: Depends on: 1) Cancellation policy in agreement, 2) How early cancelled, 3) Reason for cancellation. Rights: 1) Unreasonable forfeiture = challenge பண்ணலாம், 2) Hall's fault (double booking, not available) = full refund + compensation, 3) Consumer Forum: Unfair trade practice claim. Force majeure (COVID type): Special consideration. Always get cancellation policy in writing!

instruction: NEET Tamil Medium-ல் எழுதலாமா? Translation problem இருக்குமா?
output:
**NEET Tamil Medium:**

**ஆம், Tamil-ல் எழுதலாம்!**

**Available Languages:**
- Tamil, English, Hindi
- Assamese, Bengali, Gujarati
- Kannada, Malayalam, Marathi
- Odia, Punjabi, Telugu, Urdu

**How to Choose:**
- Application form-ல் medium select
- Exam day-ல் bilingual paper கிடைக்கும்
- Tamil + English இரண்டும் printed

**Translation Issues (Past):**
- Some years translation errors reported
- Medical terms translation சில நேரம் confusing
- NTA has improved over years

**Tips for Tamil Medium Students:**

1. **NCERT Tamil Version படிக்கவும்**
   - TN Textbook Corporation version
   - Terminology same as NEET

2. **English Terms-உம் தெரிஞ்சிருக்கணும்**
   - Scientific names English-ல் தான்
   - Chemical formulas same
   - Diagrams labeling English

3. **Both Versions படிக்கவும்**
   - Tamil-ல் concept புரிஞ்சுக்கவும்
   - English terminology remember

4. **Mock Tests Tamil-ல் எழுதுங்க**
   - Translation style புரியும்
   - Time management practice

**Exam Day Tips:**
- Question confusing-னா English version பாருங்க
- Both languages printed in same booklet
- Scientific terms same in both

**Success Stories:**
- Many Tamil medium students cleared NEET
- Govt school 7.5% reservation helps
- Language is not a barrier!

instruction: Diagnostic lab report-la doubt - retest ketkalaamaa?
output: Yes! Your right. Options: 1) Same lab - request repeat test (may charge or free depending), 2) Different NABL-accredited lab, 3) Hospital lab if admission. Red flags: 1) Result doesn't match symptoms, 2) Drastic change from previous, 3) Clerical errors visible. Lab liability: Wrong report causing harm = negligence. Verify: NABL accreditation for reliability.

instruction: Hospital bill excessive-ஆ இருக்கு - என்ன செய்யலாம்?
output: Itemized bill கேளுங்க - hospital தர வேண்டும். Rate list display கட்டாயம் (Clinical Establishments Act). Overcharging complaint: 1) State Health Department, 2) District Collector, 3) Consumer forum. Insurance involved-ஆ இருந்தால் TPA-க்கும் complaint போடுங்க.

instruction: Coimbatore-la textile/fashion industry-related courses ulladha?
output: Coimbatore textile hub courses: 1) PSG Tech - B.Tech Textile Technology 2) Kumaraguru - Textile courses 3) NIFT Coimbatore - Fashion (opening soon) 4) Government Polytechnic - Textile 5) ITI - Textile trades. Industry connect: Internships in mills, design houses. Job placement: Tirupur garment cluster nearby = excellent opportunities. Specialized: Knitwear technology, Apparel production.

instruction: Kondraivendhan endraal enna?
output: Kondraivendhan - Avvaiyaaroda matroru needhi nool. Aathichudiyai vida virivaanadhu - ovvondrum irandu varigal. 'Kondrai' enbadhu oru poo - Sivanukku uriyathu. Famous examples: 1) 'Annaiyum pithavum munnarri deivam' - parents are first gods, 2) 'Eeyaar thettai theeyaar kolvar' - misers' wealth goes to bad people, 3) 'Undi surungudhal pendirkku azhagu' - modesty in eating is beauty for women. Values andha kaalathirkku etravai - sila indru discuss seiyalam.

instruction: PM Janaushadhi Kendra endraal enna?
output: Affordable medicines store. 50-90% less than MRP. 1,800+ medicines + 285+ Surgical items. Quality: NABL tested, WHO-GMP certified. Find: janaushadhi.gov.in → Store Locator. 1,000+ stores in Tamil Nadu. Example: Paracetamol 500mg (10 tabs) - Market ₹15, Janaushadhi ₹2.50; Metformin 500mg - Market ₹25, Janaushadhi ₹3.50

instruction: PM Shram Yogi Maan-Dhan (PM-SYM) என்றால் என்ன?
