output: Unorganized Workers-க்கு Pension. தகுதி: 18-40 வயது, மாத வருமானம் ₹15,000-க்கு கீழ், EPFO/ESIC/NPS இல் இல்லாதவர், Street vendors, Domestic workers, Construction workers, etc. Contribution: ₹55-200/month (வயது பொறுத்து). 60 வயதில்: ₹3,000/month pension. Government: Equal matching contribution. சேர: CSC (Common Service Center), maandhan.in. Aadhaar + Savings Account தேவை

instruction: Seasonal diseases-க்கு Siddha prevention?
output: Monsoon (Kaar kaalam): Nilavembu, avoid raw foods, warm water. Winter (Munpani): Chukku preparations, oil massage. Summer (Mudhuvenil): Cooling preparations, Nannari, tender coconut. Flu/dengue season: Papaya leaf juice, Nilavembu Kudineer. Government distribution: During epidemics, free Siddha immunity medicines distributed through PHC. Lifestyle: Seasonal diet (Paruva Unavugal) as per traditional calendar.

instruction: Doctor-மேல் criminal case போடலாமா?
output: Yes, for: 1) Death due to negligence (Section 304A IPC / Section 106 BNS), 2) Grievous hurt (Section 338 IPC), 3) Hurt (Section 337 IPC). Punishment: 304A - 2 years imprisonment + fine. Requirement: Gross negligence, not just error. Supreme Court: Doctors shouldn't be arrested for bona fide errors. But criminal recklessness = liable. FIR: Police can register on complaint.

instruction: Builder common area handover vaangaama irukku - enna seivathu?
output: RERA-la complaint podunga - builder conveyance deed execute seyyanum endru order vaangalam. 50%+ flats occupied aanaal association form panni legal notice anuppunga. Non-compliance-kku penalty, imprisonment provisions undu.

instruction: TB (Tuberculosis) treatment free-yaa kidaikkumaa?
output: Yes! National TB Elimination Program - completely FREE. Services: 1) Diagnosis (sputum test, X-ray), 2) Medicines (6-9 months course), 3) Follow-up tests, 4) DOTS therapy supervision, 5) Nutrition support (Rs.500/month), 6) Transport allowance. Where: Government hospitals, designated TB centres. Private diagnosis: Government will still provide free treatment. Nikshay Poshan Yojana: DBT nutrition support.

instruction: BC/MBC மாணவர்களுக்கு என்ன scholarship உண்டு?
output: Tamil Nadu BC/MBC scholarship: Tuition fee, maintenance allowance கிடைக்கும். தமிழ்நாடு scholarship portal-ல் apply செய்யவும். Caste certificate, income certificate தேவை.

instruction: Call vandhudhu 'ICAI CPE compliance issue detected. Pay 15,000 clearance fee or membership suspended.' CA membership suspend aagidumaa?
output: CPE compliance tracked through ICAI portal - check your actual status there. No 'clearance fee' exists, only structured course fees. ICAI communicates through official letters and portal notifications. Suspension doesn't happen overnight - proper show cause process exists.

instruction: JEE Main & Advanced என்றால் என்ன? IIT-க்கு எப்படி போவது?
output:
**JEE (Joint Entrance Examination):**

**Two Levels:**

**1. JEE Main:**
- For: NITs, IIITs, GFTIs, State Engineering Colleges
- Conducted by: NTA
- Sessions: January & April (2 attempts/year)
- Based on: JEE Main rank

**2. JEE Advanced:**
- For: IITs only
- Eligibility: Top 2.5 lakh in JEE Main
- One attempt/year (June)
- Toughest engineering exam!

**JEE Main Pattern:**

| Subject | Questions | Marks |
|---------|-----------|-------|
| Physics | 30 | 100 |
| Chemistry | 30 | 100 |
| Maths | 30 | 100 |
| **Total** | **90** | **300** |

- Mode: Online (Computer Based)
- Duration: 3 hours
- Negative Marking: -1 for wrong

**JEE Advanced Pattern:**
- Paper 1 & Paper 2 (3 hours each)
- Multiple question types
- More complex than Main

**IIT Admission Path:**
```
12th PCM (75%+) → JEE Main (Top 2.5L) → JEE Advanced → IIT!
```

**Tamil Nadu Students:**
- TNEA (State counselling) accepts JEE Main score
- Anna University, Govt colleges through TNEA
- tneaonline.org

**Eligibility:**
- 12th pass with PCM
- 75% aggregate (65% for SC/ST)
- Max 2 consecutive attempts in 3 years

instruction: Thirukkural UN-la recognize aanadha?
output: Thirukkural formally UN-aal recognize aagavillai, aanaal: 1) UN conferences-la Thirukkural quotes cite aagiyullana, 2) UNESCO Tamil-a classical language-aaga recognize panniyabodhu Thirukkural-a highlight panniyathu, 3) International scholars Thirukkural-a 'Universal ethical text' endru praise panraanga. Thirukkural-a UN officially recognize panna vendum endru campaign nadakkiradhu.

instruction: Passport first time apply pannanum - complete process enna?
output:
Step 1 - Online Registration:
1. passportindia.gov.in → 'New User Registration'
2. Create account
3. Login

Step 2 - Fill Application:
1. 'Apply for Fresh Passport'
2. Select: Normal/Tatkaal
3. Fill: Personal, Family, Address, Emergency contact
4. Save and continue

Step 3 - Book Appointment:
1. Select PSK (Passport Seva Kendra)
2. Choose date/time
3. Pay: Normal 36 pages ₹1,500, 60 pages ₹2,000, Tatkaal +₹2,000
4. Print Application Receipt

Step 4 - PSK Visit:
Documents: Printed application, Aadhaar, PAN, Voter ID/DL, Birth Certificate/SSLC, Address proof (EB bill/Bank statement)

At PSK: Token → Document verification → Biometric → Photo → Final verification → Acknowledgment

Step 5 - Police Verification:
- Police visit address (1-2 weeks)
- Keep documents ready
- Neighbors may be asked

Step 6 - Delivery:
- Speed Post
- Track: passportindia.gov.in
- Normal: 15-30 days
- Tatkaal: 1-7 days

Tips: Same name spelling in all docs, Recent address proof, Reach PSK 15 mins early

instruction: Thanjavur Oviyam endraal enna?
output: Thanjavur Oviyam - Tamil Nadu-oda traditional painting style. 16th century-la Nayak period-la develop aanadhu. Sirappugal: 1) Gold foil work - relief, 3D effect, 2) Semi-precious stones embedded, 3) Vibrant colors, 4) Hindu gods, goddesses themes, 5) Wooden base with cloth coating. GI (Geographical Indication) tag petradhu. Prices: ₹500 (small) to ₹50,000+ (large). Thanjavur-la niraiya shops. Wedding gift-aaga popular. Museum quality pieces collectors buy panraanga.

instruction: Phone vandhudhu 'Domestic workers association scheme. Pay 500 membership for PF and health benefits.' Membership edukkalam aa?
output: Domestic workers can register under various state schemes - process through labour department. Legitimate associations have proper offices, not just phone numbers. Check if association registered with labour commissioner. Government schemes like E-Shram free to register.

instruction: வேலையில இருந்து நிறுத்திட்டாங்க, F&F எப்ப கிடைக்கும்?
output: Full and Final settlement: 30-45 days-ல் கிடைக்கணும். Include: Salary, leave encashment, bonus, gratuity (if eligible), notice pay, reimbursements. Delay ஆனா Labour Commissioner-க்கு complaint. Documents: Relieving letter, experience letter, salary slip, Form 16 - எல்லாம் கேளுங்க.

instruction: Cervical/breast cancer screening free-யா?
output: Yes! Population-based screening program. Available: PHC, government hospitals. Cervical: VIA (Visual Inspection with Acetic Acid) - simple, painless. Breast: Clinical breast examination. Age: 30+ years, every 3-5 years. HPV vaccine: Available for cervical cancer prevention (9-26 years ideal). Early detection: Curable. Camps: Regular screening camps conducted. Ask at PHC.

instruction: உண்மையா பொய்யா: Myth: Coaching இல்லாம NEET/JEE crack பண்ண impossible
output: உண்மை: Fact: Self-study toppers exist every year! Free resources: YouTube (Physics Wallah, Unacademy), NPTEL, SWAYAM, Government free coaching. Key factors: Discipline, proper study plan, consistent practice. Coaching helps but not mandatory. Many poor students crack using library + free online resources. Your determination > coaching centre brand.

instruction: Operation-la scissors/gauze ulle vittuttaanga - enna seivathu?
output: Classic negligence case (Res Ipsa Loquitur - thing speaks for itself). Steps: 1) Get X-ray/CT evidence, 2) Medical records collect, 3) Complaint to hospital, 4) Consumer Forum case, 5) Criminal complaint (Section 338 IPC - grievous hurt). Compensation: Cost of removal surgery + damages + mental agony + loss of income. Hospital cannot deny - clear negligence.

instruction: NMMS Exam என்றால் என்ன? எப்படி prepare செய்வது?
output:
**National Means-cum-Merit Scholarship (NMMS):**

**என்ன இது?**
- Class 8 மாணவர்களுக்கான scholarship exam
- Pass ஆனால் Class 9-12 வரை ₹12,000/year

**தகுதி:**
- Class 8 Govt/Govt-aided school student
- Class 7-ல் 55%+ marks (SC/ST: 50%)
- Parent income < ₹3.5 lakh/year

**Exam Pattern:**

| Paper | Questions | Marks | Time |
|-------|-----------|-------|------|
| MAT (Mental Ability) | 90 | 90 | 90 min |
| SAT (Scholastic Aptitude) | 90 | 90 | 90 min |

**MAT Topics:**
- Reasoning (Series, Analogy, Classification)
- Coding-Decoding
- Blood Relations
- Direction sense
- Mirror/Water images

**SAT Topics:**
- Science (Class 7-8 syllabus)
- Social Science (History, Geography, Civics)
- Mathematics

**Preparation Tips:**
1. Class 7-8 NCERT/State Board thorough படிக்கவும்
2. Previous year papers practice
3. Online mock tests
4. Reasoning books (RS Aggarwal Junior)

**Important Dates:**
- Application: July-August
- Exam: November
- Result: January

**Apply:** School HM மூலம்

instruction: Email vandhuchu 'UDIN verification failed for your recent certification. Pay 5000 for manual verification.' UDIN important for attestation work, pay pannidlama?
output: UDIN generated through ICAI portal with no extra fees. Verification is automatic system process. Check your UDIN status on udin.icai.org directly. Manual verification doesn't exist - this is targeting CA attestation anxiety.

instruction: Abhyanga massage vs regular massage - difference?
output: Abhyanga = Ayurvedic whole body oil massage. Difference: 1) Medicated oils specific to condition/Prakriti, 2) Specific direction strokes (towards heart), 3) Marma points included, 4) Part of treatment protocol (not just relaxation), 5) Followed by steam bath typically. Benefits: Toxin removal, circulation, joint lubrication, skin health, relaxation. Self-Abhyanga: Daily oil massage at home recommended in Ayurveda. Professional: For treatment purposes.

instruction: மாற்றுத்திறனாளி குழந்தைக்கு என்ன சலுகைகள் உள்ளன?
output:
**மாற்றுத்திறனாளி மாணவர் சலுகைகள்:**

**Inclusive Education:**
- Regular school-ல் படிக்கலாம்
- Special educator support
- Resource room facility

**Special Schools:**
- Blind schools
- Deaf schools
- Intellectually disabled schools
- All FREE

**Financial Benefits:**
- Scholarship: ₹1,000-3,000/month
- Transport allowance
- Reader allowance (visually impaired)
- Scribe allowance

**Exam Concessions:**
- Extra time: 20-30 minutes/hour
- Scribe facility
- Separate room
- Computer/Laptop allowed

**Assistive Devices (FREE):**
- Wheelchairs
- Hearing aids
- Braille kit
- Crutches
- ADIP Scheme through District Differently Abled Welfare Office

**Apply:**
- District Differently Abled Welfare Officer
- UDID Card mandatory: swavlambancard.gov.in

**Documents:**
- Disability Certificate (Medical Board)
- UDID Card
- Aadhaar
- School TC/Bonafide

instruction: Chennai-la Thiruvalluvar thodarbaana idangal enna?
output: 1) Valluvar Kottam, Nungambakkam - auditorium + museum, 2) Thiruvalluvar Silai, Marina Beach - 39 feet uyaram, 3) Mylapore - pirandha idam endru nambappadugiradhu, 4) Thiruvalluvar Statue, Egmore - near museum, 5) DPI campus Thiruvalluvar statue. Ovvoru government office-lum Thiruvalluvar photo irukkum!

instruction: Fake news share panninaal legal trouble varumaa?
output: Yes, possible: IPC 505 (public mischief), 153A (promoting enmity), Epidemic Diseases Act (health misinformation). IT Rules 2021: Platforms must remove fake news. Knowingly spreading = higher liability. Before sharing: Verify from trusted sources. Fact-check websites use pannunga.

instruction: Exam day-la sick aayitten, alternative option irukkaa?
output: Options vary by exam: Board exams - No re-exam, arrear attempt only. Competitive exams - Generally no re-test. College internal - Medical certificate submit, re-test possible. Medical emergency: 1) Get doctor certificate immediately 2) Inform exam authority same day 3) Apply for special consideration. Some exams: PWD/Medical emergency provisions exist. NEET/JEE: One attempt lost, next year continue. Prevention: Health priority before exams, insurance coverage.

instruction: சித்தர் பாடல்களை எங்கே கேட்கலாம்/படிக்கலாம்?
output: சித்தர் பாடல்கள் access செய்ய: 1) Project Madurai - free Tamil texts online (projectmadurai.org), 2) Tamil Virtual Academy - government site, 3) YouTube - விளக்கங்களோடு பாடல்கள், 4) Books - சென்னை Higginbothams, பரி நிலையம், 5) Apps - Siddhar Paadalgal app, 6) Libraries - University of Madras, Connemara Library. Original palm leaves Saraswathi Mahal Library (Thanjavur)-ல் preserve செய்யப்பட்டுள்ளன.

instruction: Maintenance கொடுக்காவிட்டால் என்ன action எடுக்கலாம்?
output: Options: 1) Execution petition - salary attachment, property attachment, 2) Contempt of court - imprisonment up to 3 months, 3) Section 125 CrPC - Magistrate can order payment + imprisonment. Arrears + future maintenance கேட்கலாம். Don't delay - act immediately.

instruction: Call vandhudhu 'Arts council grant application. 10,000 processing fee for 5 lakh project grant.' Grant apply pannalama?
output: Government arts grants through official channels - Ministry of Culture, State Cultural departments. No processing fees for grant applications. Selection based on merit and proposal quality. Check official government cultural affairs websites for legitimate grant schemes.

instruction: Delivery government hospital-la free-yaa?
output: Yes! Completely free. Includes: 1) Normal delivery, 2) C-section if needed, 3) Anesthesia, 4) Medicines, 5) Post-delivery care, 6) Baby care. Additional: 1) 102 ambulance free transport, 2) JSY cash incentive for institutional delivery, 3) Dr. Muthulakshmi scheme Rs.18,000. Private: CMCHIS covers complicated deliveries. Register: PHC for referral chain.

instruction: TNSDC (Tamil Nadu Skill Development Corporation) free courses என்ன?
output: TNSDC offers 100+ free courses: 1) IT/Software - Web development, Data entry 2) Manufacturing - CNC, Welding 3) Healthcare - Nursing assistant, Lab technician 4) Retail - Sales, customer service 5) Hospitality - Hotel management basics 6) Construction - Mason, plumber. Duration: 1-6 months. Certification + placement assistance. Apply: www.tnskill.tn.gov.in. Age: 18-35. Free hostel for outstation candidates.

instruction: Govt school-la ennenna free-ya kidaikkum?
output:
**Govt School Free Benefits:**

1. **Education:** Fully free
2. **Books:** All textbooks free
3. **Uniform:** 2 sets/year + Shoes, Socks
4. **Mid-Day Meal:** Breakfast + Lunch + Weekly egg, milk, banana
5. **Bus Pass:** Free travel
6. **Stationery:** Notebook, Pen, Pencil, Geometry box
7. **School Bag:** Some schools
8. **Footwear:** Canvas shoes
9. **Health Checkup:** 2 times/year + Free spectacles
10. **Scholarship:** Additional for SC/ST/BC/MBC

instruction: Thirukkural pottikkal engge nadakkinrana? Parisu enna?
output: 1) Tamilnadu government Thirukkural potti - ovvoru varudamum January-la, 2) School/college pottikkal - Thiruvalluvar Dhinathil, 3) All India Thirukkural Competition - various organizations conduct, 4) Online quiz competitions - apps moolam. Parisugal: Panam, certificates, medals, scholarships kooda undu sila pottikkalil.

instruction: Ayushman Bharat (PM-JAY) endraal enna?
output: ₹5 lakh free treatment. Coverage: ₹5 lakh per family per year. Eligibility: BPL families as per SECC 2011 data. Treatments: 1,500+ procedures covered. Check eligibility: pmjay.gov.in → Am I Eligible, Enter Aadhaar/Ration Card number. Get card: Ayushman Mitra/Government Hospital, Need Aadhaar + Ration Card + Photo, Free. In TN: Integrated with CMCHIS

instruction: Naturopathy centres TN-ல் எங்கே இருக்கு?
output: Government: 1) Government Yoga and Naturopathy Medical College, Chennai, 2) District AYUSH hospitals (Naturo units). Private: 1) Jindal Naturecure Institute, Bangalore (near TN), 2) Nature Cure Hospital, Chennai, 3) Various wellness resorts. Services: Hydrotherapy, mud therapy, massage, diet therapy, yoga. Duration: 7-21 days programs. Cost: Government free/nominal, Private Rs.2,000-8,000/day. Good for: Diabetes, BP, obesity, stress, detox.

instruction: Job fraud - advance vaangittu mosam pannitaanga
output: Complaint: 1) cybercrime.gov.in, 2) Local police FIR, 3) Labour Department (if company involved). Legal sections: IT Act 66D (cheating using computer), IPC 420 (cheating). Red flags: Advance fee, unrealistic salary, gmail/yahoo recruiter. Legitimate companies never ask money.

instruction: 'Get Instagram Blue Tick - 5000 only, guaranteed in 7 days' nu DM vandhudhu. Influencer aaganum, verification useful.
output: Instagram verification free - eligibility criteria meet pannunga. 'Paid verification' scammers account access vaanguvaanga - hijack or scam others using your account. Blue tick Instagram directly kudukum, third-party impossible. Don't share login credentials.

instruction: Email vandhuchu 'Conference registration - International Medical Symposium Dubai. Early bird 50,000, free accommodation. Limited seats.' Attend pannalama?
output: Verify conference from official medical body websites. Legitimate conferences listed in IMA/specialty association calendars. 'Free accommodation with paid registration' is common scam pattern. Check if organizers are recognized medical institutions.

instruction: Ondrukku merpatta PAN irundhaal enna seyvadhu?
output: Illegal! ₹10,000 penalty possible. To surrender duplicate PAN: 1. onlineservices.nsdl.com → 'Request for New PAN Card or/and Changes' 2. In Item 11, write PAN numbers to surrender 3. Send original PAN Cards 4. Fee: ₹107. Keep only one PAN

instruction: Kerala border-la irukkindrom, TN scholarship kidaikkumaa?
output: Kidaikkum! TN nativity certificate irundha all TN scholarships eligible. Kanyakumari district fully TN - no issue. Apply: NSP portal for central, TN department portals for state scholarships. Documents: Nativity certificate, income certificate from TN Tahsildar. Same benefits as other TN districts. BC/MBC/SC/ST applicable based on TN categorization.

instruction: First generation graduate-ku enna salugaigal ullana?
output: Benefits: 1) First generation graduate scholarship - ₹2,000-5,000/year 2) Fee concession pala colleges-la 3) Book grant 4) Hostel fee waiver 5) MHRD scholarship. Eligibility: Parents yarumae degree padikkavillai endru certificate. Apply: College scholarship cell moolam. Income certificate theva.

instruction: Pradhan Mantri Matru Vandana Yojana (PMMVY) endraal enna?
output: Support for pregnant women. Amount: ₹5,000 (in 3 installments) - ₹1,000 pregnancy registration (within 150 days), ₹2,000 - 6 month checkup, ₹2,000 - birth registration + vaccination. Eligibility: Women having first child. Apply: Nearby Anganwadi/Government Hospital. Need MCP Card, Aadhaar, Bank Account. In TN: Additional Dr. Muthulakshmi Maternity Benefit Scheme (₹18,000)

instruction: TN Slum Clearance Board veedu eppadi peruvadhu?
output: Rehabilitation for slum-dwellers. Eligibility: 10+ years in recognized slum, Name in survey. Types: In-situ development (same location), Resettlement (new location). Cost: Free or subsidized (based on income). Facilities: Basic amenities - water, electricity, toilet. Apply: TNSCB office/Local body. Documents: Slum survey ID, Aadhaar, Ration card. Projects: Multi-storey tenements in Chennai, other cities.

instruction: Mental illness reason-aa job reject panninaanga - action?
output: Illegal discrimination! RPD Act + MHCA protection. Action: 1) Written reason kelunga, 2) State Commissioner for Disabilities complaint, 3) Labour court if existing job, 4) Court (writ petition). Exceptions: Very limited safety-critical jobs with specific requirements. Proof: Email/written rejection citing mental health. Remedy: Reinstatement, compensation, policy change order.

instruction: Marriage-kku minimum age enna?
output: Penn - 18 years, Aan - 21 years. Underage marriage illegal (Child Marriage Restraint Act). Underage marriage voidable (annul seyyalam). Parents/guardians-kku 2 years imprisonment + Rs.1 lakh fine. Marriage fix pannuravarkalum liable.

instruction: Traffic police wrongly fine போட்டால் என்ன செய்வது?
output: Options: 1) On-spot - evidence காட்டி argue (dashcam, photos), 2) Court-ல் contest (challan dispute), 3) Online grievance: tnpolice.gov.in, 4) RTO officer complaint. Challan copy கேளுங்க. Court contest-க்கு time limit உண்டு.

instruction: TN Widow Pension evvalavu? Eligibility enna?
output: Monthly pension for widows. Amount: ₹1,000/month (State) + ₹300 (Central IGNWPS). Eligibility: 18-60 years widow, annual income below ₹72,000, not remarried. Destitute Widow: ₹1,500/month. Apply: Panchayat/Taluk office. Documents: Husband death certificate, Age proof, Income certificate, Aadhaar. 60+: Transferred to IGNOAPS.

instruction: Srirangam kovil la donation box QR scan potten pa, 100 rupees ku. 8000 debit aaidichu! Kovil QR dhaan, enna aachchu?
output: Aiyyo pa! Fraud gang original QR mela fake sticker ottirukkaanga. PIN enter pannumbodhu amount check pannama pottiye. Srirangam, Samayapuram la idhu romba nadakkudhu. Bank ku complaint pannu, cyber crime la FIR podu.

instruction: Gratuity தர மறுத்தால் என்ன செய்வது?
output: Steps: 1) Written application to employer, 2) 30 days-க்குள் pay பண்ணணும், 3) Refuse பண்ணால் Controlling Authority (Labour Commissioner)-க்கு complaint, 4) Labour Court appeal. Delay-க்கு 10% interest கிடைக்கும். Forfeiture: Only if dismissed for serious misconduct.

instruction: 'Complete Web Development Course - Get job in 3 months, course fee 2000 (worth 20,000)' nu ad. Career ku useful, join pannalama?
output: 'Job guaranteed' no course can promise. 2000 course - usually outdated content, no proper support. Free quality content - freeCodeCamp, Coursera (audit), YouTube - available. Paid courses - Udemy sales (500-1000), verified platforms use pannunga.

instruction: +2 mudicha aprom enna padikkalaam? Eppadi mudivu seivathu?
output: Mudivedukka yosikka vendiyavai: 1) Ungal aarvam - Science/Commerce/Arts 2) Family financial situation 3) Job opportunity 4) Course duration. Options: Engineering, Medical, Arts/Science, Law, Management, Vocational. Free career counselling: District Employment Office, government schools. TNSDC skill assessment free-ya seiyalam.

instruction: Jan Dhan Account endraal enna?
output: FREE zero-balance bank account for any Indian. Benefits: Free RuPay card, ₹2 lakh accident insurance, ₹30,000 life insurance (new accounts), overdraft up to ₹10,000, DBT transfer enabled. Open at any bank/Bank Mitra with just Aadhaar or Voter ID.

instruction: Fashion Design padikka Tamil Nadu-la enge povadhu?
output: Top institutes: 1) NIFT Chennai - National level 2) AIFD Chennai 3) JD Institute of Fashion. Admission: NIFT - entrance exam (January). Courses: B.Des Fashion Design (4 years), Diploma (1-2 years). Eligibility: 12th any stream. Fees: NIFT ₹2-3 lakh/year, Private ₹50,000-1.5 lakh/year. Jobs: Fashion houses, Garment industry, Freelance designer. Chennai = garment hub = good placement.

instruction: மத்திய அரசு உதவி எண்கள் என்ன?
output: Aadhaar: 1947, PAN/Income Tax: 1800-180-1961, PM-KISAN: 155261, Ayushman Bharat: 14555, NSP Scholarship: 0120-6619540, PMKVY Skill: 1800-123-9626, Consumer: 1915, Women Helpline: 181, Cyber Crime: 1930

instruction: Friend/family member suicidal-aa irukaanga - enna seivathu?
output: Dos: 1) Listen without judgment, 2) Take them seriously, 3) Stay with them, 4) Remove means (medicines, sharp objects), 5) Encourage professional help, 6) Call helpline together. Don'ts: 1) Don't leave alone if immediate risk, 2) Don't promise secrecy, 3) Don't argue or lecture, 4) Don't dare them. Emergency: Take to hospital emergency if attempt made or imminent risk. You're not alone - helplines guide you too.

instruction: Yearly எவ்வளவு percentage rent increase நியாயமானது?
output: சட்டத்தில் fixed percentage இல்லை. Practice-ல் 5-10% yearly increase normal. ஆனால் market rate, inflation, property value increase ஆகியவை consider ஆகும். Unreasonable increase-ஐ Rent Authority மூலம் dispute செய்யலாம்.

instruction: Flipkart/Amazon la seller scam - report and refund process enna?
output: Amazon: Orders → Problem with order, A-to-Z Guarantee claim if seller unresponsive, call 1800-3000-9009, refund 5-10 days. Flipkart: My Orders → Need Help, call 1800-208-9898, email cs@flipkart.com. Meesho: My Orders → Help → Report, call 080-61799600, refund 7-15 days. OLX/Quikr: No buyer protection - Police complaint route, olx.in/support. For all platforms escalation: Consumer Forum consumerhelpline.gov.in, National Consumer Helpline 1800-11-4000.

instruction: Body hospital-la detain panraanga bill kattum varai - legal-aa?
output: ILLEGAL! Dead body detention prohibited. Supreme Court + High Court orders: 1) Body cannot be held for bill payment, 2) Hospital can pursue legal recovery of dues, 3) Detention = criminal offence. Action: 1) Police complaint, 2) Magistrate petition, 3) Human Rights Commission. Bill dispute: Settle later through legal means - body must be released. Report: DHS, State Medical Council.

instruction: 'Italy buyer baa, 10 lakh leather order, advance transfer pannuren' nu WhatsApp message. QR anuppinaan baa. Genuine order aa?
output: QR scan panna nee KUDUKKA dhaan mudiyum baa, vaanga mudiyaadhu! Ambur, Vaniyambadi leather exporters specifically target aaguraanga baa. 'Foreign buyer' nu excitement create pannuraanga. Verified buyer, LC through dhaan deal pannu baa.

instruction: Visitation rights என்றால் என்ன?
output: Custody இல்லாத parent-க்கு child-ஐ சந்திக்கும் right. Court order: Weekly/monthly visits, holiday stays, phone/video calls. Visitation deny பண்ணினால் contempt of court. Both parents cooperate செய்வது child-க்கு நல்லது.

instruction: Lawyer கொஞ்சம் expensive-ஆ இருக்கு, free-யா யாராவது help பண்ணுவாங்களா?
output: Free legal aid: DLSA (District Legal Services Authority) - income <Rs.3 lakh, women, SC/ST, disabled எல்லாருக்கும் free lawyer. Toll-free: 15100. Taluk Legal Services Committee-லும் apply பண்ணலாம். Court-ல் directly legal aid request பண்ணலாம்.

instruction: HIV/AIDS treatment எங்கே free-யா கிடைக்கும்?
output: Free at ART (Anti-Retroviral Therapy) Centres. TN has 100+ ART centres. Services: 1) HIV testing (free, confidential), 2) ART medicines (lifelong free), 3) CD4 count tests, 4) Opportunistic infection treatment, 5) Counseling, 6) PPTCT (pregnant women). Location: District hospitals, medical colleges. TANSACS: State AIDS control body. Helpline: 1097 (AIDS helpline). Confidentiality guaranteed.

instruction: Siddha medicine-ல் heavy metals இருக்குமா? Safe-ஆ?
output: Some Siddha medicines use: Metals (பாஷாணம்), mercury (ரசம்), arsenic (பாடாணம்) - after purification (சுத்தி). Licensed products: Processed as per traditional methods, tested for safety limits. Risk: Unregulated products, improper preparation. Safety: 1) Buy only licensed products, 2) Consult qualified doctor, 3) Inform if taking other medicines, 4) Follow dosage strictly. Research: CCRS validates safety of traditional preparations.

instruction: Case ethanai years oodum? Settlement pannalaamaa?
output: Timeline: Consumer Forum 1-3 years, Civil court 5-10 years, Criminal 3-7 years. Settlement: 1) Lok Adalat (mutually agreed), 2) Mediation (court-annexed), 3) Direct negotiation. Benefits: Faster resolution, certain outcome, lower legal costs. Caution: Don't settle too low - get legal opinion on fair amount. Hospital insurance: Usually pushes for settlement.

instruction: Naan thirumaanam seiya porein. Marriage registration, documents maatram, benefits ellam ennenna seiyya vendum?
output:
Before marriage:
1. Marriage Assistance Scheme - Apply 40 days before (if eligible) - 8 gram Gold + ₹25,000-50,000

After marriage (within 1 month):
2. Marriage Registration - Sub-Registrar Office - ₹100-500

Document changes (for bride):
3. Aadhaar - Name & Address change at ASK (₹50)
4. PAN Card - Name change online (₹107)
5. Voter ID - Form 8 at voters.eci.gov.in
6. Passport - Re-issue with new name (₹1,500)
7. Bank Account - Name & Nominee change
8. Ration Card - Add to husband's or new card
9. Insurance/EPF - Nominee update

instruction: Heart surgery-க்கு CMCHIS use செய்யலாமா?
output: ஆம், cardiac surgeries CMCHIS-ல் covered. Bypass, valve replacement, angioplasty எல்லாம் cashless. Empaneled cardiac hospitals-ல் treatment பெறலாம். Pre-authorization தேவை.

instruction: Madurai Chithirai Thiruvizha eppadi nadakkum?
output: Tamil Nadu-oda migapperiya thiruvizha. Oru maadham nadakkum. Mukkiya events: 1) Thirukalyanam - Meenakshi-Sundareswarar thirumanam, 2) Azhvaar Thiruveedhi purapaadu - Vishnu's brother role, 3) Therthiruvizha - huge temple car, 4) Theppathiruvizha - float festival at Mariamman Teppakulam. 1 million+ people varuvaargal. Hotels, transport early book seiya vendum. April/May-la veyil adhigam - prepare accordingly.

instruction: Spoken English course free-ya enge ulladhu?
output: Free English training: 1) TNSDC - Communicative English 2) British Council online resources 3) NPTEL/SWAYAM - English courses 4) Employment exchange - soft skills training 5) NGOs - Pratham, Teach India. Apps: Duolingo, Hello English (free tier). Library-based conversation clubs. Government college students - Language lab access free. Interview skills + English combined courses available through TNSDC.

instruction: Instagram la 'model' DM pannaa - chatting aachhu, 'exclusive content subscription 2000/month' nu, payment link anuppunaa.
output: Fake profiles using stolen photos. 'Exclusive content' sites usually malware or card theft. Payment pannina - more demands, blackmail possibility. Reverse image search pannunga photos - vera sites la irukkum. Don't pay strangers for 'content.'

instruction: College-ku poga panam illai. Free-ya padikka mudiyumaa?
output: Mudiyum da! Government colleges-la fees romba kammi - yearly ₹1000-5000 only. Scholarship apply pannu - BC/MBC/SC/ST full scholarship kidaikkum. Distance education - IGNOU, TNOU almost free. Skill training - TNSDC 100% free. Padikka aasai irundhaa vazhi irukku!

instruction: Advance/Security deposit evvalavu ketkalam?
output: Tamil Nadu-la sattapadi maximum 3 months rent mathume advance-aa vaangalam. But practice-la 6-10 months advance kekkuranga. Idhu illegal. Rent Authority-kku complaint seyyalam.

instruction: வாக்காளர் அடையாள அட்டை எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: Apply at voters.eci.gov.in or Voter Helpline App. Fill Form 6. Documents: Age proof (18+ on Jan 1), address proof, passport photo. BLO will visit for verification. e-EPIC downloadable on app. Time: 30-45 days. FREE.

instruction: Bro, Telegram group la join aanen - hotel review task ku 50 rupees kudupaanga. Now 10K invest pannunga premium task unlock aagum nu solraanga. Try pannalama?
output: Maatikitae da! First la small amount kuduppaanga hook panna. 10K pottaa 'withdraw ku 20K more podra' nu loop la maatikuvae. T Nagar, Velachery la students, IT guys - ellam ipdi dhaan maatinanga. Pull out pannu NOW.

instruction: JEE Main vs JEE Advanced - என்ன difference?
output: JEE Main: NITs, IIITs, GFTIs admission. JEE Advanced: IITs only. Eligibility: JEE Main top 2.5 lakh → JEE Advanced eligible. Difficulty: Advanced >> Main. Pattern: Main - 90 Qs, 300 marks, 3 hours. Advanced - 2 papers, 3 hours each, complex patterns. Attempts: Main - 6 (3 years × 2 sessions), Advanced - 2 consecutive years. Strategy: First secure good Main rank, then focus Advanced.

instruction: Sleeping pills வாங்க prescription வேணுமா?
output: Yes! Most sleeping pills = Schedule H1/X - strict prescription control. Schedule H1: Alprazolam, Clonazepam, etc. - prescription + ID proof + register entry. Schedule X: Stronger sedatives - even stricter. Why: Addiction potential, misuse risk, suicide risk. Alternative: Melatonin (less restricted), lifestyle changes. Doctor: Will evaluate sleep issue cause first.

instruction: Thirumoolar yoga patri enna solliyirukkaar?
output: Thirumandhirathil yoga-vukku arppanikkappattta paguthigal ullana: 1) Ashtaanga Yogam - 8 padigal vilakkam, 2) Praanaayaamam - breathing techniques, 3) Kundalini Yogam - chakra activation, 4) Samaadhi nilai - highest state. 'Udambai valarththen uyir valarththene' - udal paenuvathum aanmeegam endru sonnavar. Hatha yoga-voda Tamil roots inge ullana!

instruction: TB (Tuberculosis) treatment free-யா கிடைக்குமா?
output: Yes! National TB Elimination Program - completely FREE. Services: 1) Diagnosis (sputum test, X-ray), 2) Medicines (6-9 months course), 3) Follow-up tests, 4) DOTS therapy supervision, 5) Nutrition support (Rs.500/month), 6) Transport allowance. Where: Government hospitals, designated TB centres. Private diagnosis: Government will still provide free treatment. Nikshay Poshan Yojana: DBT nutrition support.

instruction: Calculator/Mathematical tables exam-ல் allowed-ஆ?
output: Depends on exam: Board exams (10th, 12th): Not allowed. NEET: Not allowed. JEE: Virtual calculator on screen only. Engineering semester: Usually allowed (non-programmable). CA/CMA: Specific models allowed. GATE: Virtual calculator. SSC/Banking: Not allowed. Mathematical tables: Some exams provide, some allow bringing. Always check: Admit card instructions. Penalty for unauthorized items: Disqualification possible.

instruction: Varmam therapy endraal enna?
output: Varmam = Vital points in body (108 main points). Uses: 1) Treatment of pain, paralysis, injuries, 2) Martial arts (Varma Kalai), 3) Emergency first aid. How: Pressure, manipulation on specific points. Conditions treated: Back pain, joint problems, neurological issues, sports injuries. Training: Requires specialized Varmam training. Caution: Wrong application can be harmful - only trained practitioners.

instruction: SMS vandhuchu 'GPF balance verification required. Click link to confirm account or interest payment affected.' GPF very important for future, verify pannalama?
output: GPF statements come through department annually. Check balance through official AG website or PFMS portal. Never click SMS links for financial verification. Your GPF is safe with government - scammers create fear about retirement savings.

instruction: Loan app install panni 5000 vanginen, ippove 25000 thirumba ketturaanga, photo leak pannuvom-nu miraturaanga
output: Chinese loan app scam ithu. Police la complaint podunga - Cyber Crime 1930. Photo leak threat-ku bayapadaadheenga, avanga legal action edukka mudiyum, neenga mudiyum.

instruction: Staff rude-ஆ behave பண்றாங்க - complain?
output: Patient dignity is a right. Complaint: 1) Duty manager/nursing superintendent, 2) Hospital administrator, 3) Written complaint for record, 4) Consumer Forum if serious/repeated. Include: Date, time, staff name/description, what happened, witnesses. Outcome: Apology, warning to staff, policy reminder. Serious (abuse/harassment): Police complaint possible.

instruction: Burns-க்கு first aid என்ன?
output: Immediate: 1) Cool water (not ice) for 10-20 minutes, 2) Remove jewelry/tight items, 3) Cover with clean cloth (not cotton wool), 4) Don't apply toothpaste/butter/egg - myth!, 5) Don't break blisters. Hospital needed: 1) Large burns, 2) Face/hands/genitals, 3) Deep burns (white/charred), 4) Chemical/electrical burns, 5) Difficulty breathing (smoke inhalation). Free treatment: Government hospitals for burns.

instruction: புதிய மின் இணைப்பு எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: Apply at nsc.tnebnet.org with ownership proof (sale deed/rent agreement), Aadhaar, building certificate. Inspection by TANGEDCO. Charges: Deposit ₹500-15,000 based on load. Time: 7-15 days. Agricultural connection: FREE electricity for farming.

instruction: RTI fee எவ்வளவு? எப்படி pay பண்றது?
output: Central Government: Rs.10 (postal order, DD, cash). Tamil Nadu State: Rs.10. BPL card holders: Fee exempted. Additional: Rs.2 per page for copies. Online: rtionline.gov.in (central), rtionline.tn.gov.in (state). Court fee stamp-உம் accept.

instruction: 5000 rupees dhaan poachu. Complaint file panna worth aa?
output: Worth filing because: Police track patterns - your complaint + others = arrests, cyber crime data prevents future scams, scammer accounts get flagged. Quick process: cybercrime.gov.in (15 min), Bank complaint via app (10 min), organize evidence. Skip if: Time investment too high, evidence insufficient, no scammer financial details. Alternative: Report scammer profiles on platforms, warn others on social media, contribute to scam number databases. Recovery chance: Low for small amounts. But reporting value: HIGH (helps others).

instruction: Bank account-la kaasu pochu, yaaro OTP vaangi eduthuttaanga (Madurai style)
output: Udane: 1) Bank-kku call - 24/7 helpline, account freeze kelunga, 2) 1930 helpline call, 3) Net banking-la transactions block, 4) ATM card block. 3 days-kkul report pannaa liability kuraiyum. Debit card insurance check pannunga.

instruction: District hospital vs Medical college hospital - enna difference?
output: District Hospital: 1) Every district headquarters, 2) General specialties, 3) Emergency, surgery, maternity, 4) 100-300 beds typical. Medical College Hospital: 1) Teaching hospital, 2) Super-specialties available, 3) Better equipment, 4) 500-1000+ beds, 5) Complex cases referred here. Both free. Medical colleges: Chennai, Madurai, Coimbatore, Trichy, Salem, Thanjavur, Tirunelveli, etc.

instruction: Daughter wedding fix aachhu, budget shortage. 'Wedding loan - instant approval, no income proof, 3 lakh in 24 hours' nu ad paathen.
output: 'No income proof' loans usually illegal lending apps with 100%+ interest. '24 hours disbursement' - desperation exploit pannuvaanga. Harassment, contact list access, morphed photo blackmail varum later. Bank personal loan apply pannunga - legitimate lenders income verify pannuvaanga.

instruction: Scam aana aprom inime secure aa irukkanum. Enna measures follow pannanum?
output: Immediate: Change ALL passwords, enable 2FA everywhere, check bank standing instructions, cancel unknown auto-pay mandates, change ATM PIN, request new cards if details shared. Device: Scan for malware, uninstall suspicious apps, check app permissions, update OS, check browser extensions. Accounts: Review login sessions, revoke suspicious connected apps, set login alerts, check email forwarding rules. Financial: Transaction alerts (every transaction), set limits, disable international if not needed, enable SIM lock, consider CIBIL lock. Data: Check haveibeenpwned.com, Google Alerts for your name, Aadhaar lock at uidai.gov.in, check CIBIL for unauthorized loans. Long-term: Password manager, never share OTP, verify calls via official numbers, two-person rule for large transactions, monthly statement review.

instruction: SMS vandhuchu 'E-courts registration update required. Click link to verify advocate ID or case filing affected.' E-courts use pannuren, verify pannalama?
output: E-courts registration done through ecourts.gov.in with Bar Council enrollment number. Never click SMS links - access portal directly. Case filing not 'affected' by link clicks - this is scare tactic. Report such messages to cyber cell.

instruction: Engineering padicha piragu job kedaikkalaye, enna seiyalam?
output: Kedaikkum, konjam time agum. Options: 1) Skill upgrade - Python, Data Science courses 2) GATE ezhudhu - PSU jobs, ME admission 3) Government jobs - SSC JE, RRB 4) Freelancing start pannu 5) Startup try pannu - PMEGP loan irukku. Tirupur, Coimbatore industry hub - networking pannu. Patience venum.

instruction: Jan Aushadhi store என்றால் என்ன? Medicines cheap-ஆ கிடைக்குமா?
output: Jan Aushadhi = Government generic medicine stores. Prices: 50-90% cheaper than branded. Quality: Same as branded (WHO-GMP certified). Available: 1,800+ medicines, 280+ surgical items. Locations: Major hospitals, standalone stores. Find: janaushadhi.gov.in or app. Example: Paracetamol 500mg (10 tablets) - Rs.2-3 vs branded Rs.15-20. Prescription needed for schedule drugs.

instruction: Fever-kku traditional treatment enna?
output: Traditional fever remedies: 1) Nilavembu Kudineer (best for viral), 2) Papaya leaf juice (dengue prevention), 3) Coriander seed water, 4) Tulsi + ginger tea, 5) Vetiver (Khus) water for cooling, 6) Light food - kanji (rice porridge), 7) Rest and hydration. Wet cloth: On forehead for high fever. When doctor needed: >103°F, convulsions, rash, severe headache, confusion, lasting >3 days.

instruction: Hit and run case-ல் compensation எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: FIR போடுங்க (vehicle details தெரியாவிட்டாலும்). Motor Accident Claims Tribunal (MACT)-ல் claim. Hit and run compensation: Death - Rs.2 lakh, Grievous injury - Rs.50,000 (Solatium Scheme). Driver identify ஆனால் full compensation + criminal case.

instruction: Email vandhudhu 'Copyright society royalty pending. Pay 5000 membership renewal for collection.' Royalty kedaikum aa?
output: IPRS (music), PPL (sound recording) are legitimate copyright societies with official registration process. Royalty payment doesn't require fee from artist. Check official websites for membership. Scammers know artists have pending royalties - exploiting this hope.

instruction: Oru school-la irundhu innooru school-ku TC eppadi vaanguvadhu?
output:
**Transfer Certificate (TC) Process:**

**Step 1:** Written application to Headmaster with reason

**Step 2:** Clear dues - Library books, Fees, ID card

**Step 3:** TC Issue
- Govt: 3-7 days (Free)
- Private: 7-15 days (₹100-500)

**TC Contains:** Name, DOB, Class, Conduct, Medium, Community

**New School Admission:** TC + Marksheets + Aadhaar + Community certificate

**TC Refused?** Complain to DEO (District Education Officer)

instruction: Acid attack victim-க்கு என்ன rights/compensation?
output: Rights: 1) Free medical treatment (government hospitals), 2) Compensation: Rs.3 lakhs minimum (state victim compensation), 3) Disability pension, 4) Acid sale regulation - ID proof mandatory, 5) Fast track court trial. TN: CM's Public Relief Fund additional support. Accused: 10 years to life imprisonment. NGO support: Stop Acid Attacks, Chhanv Foundation.

instruction: Sore throat-kku gargle options?
output: Gargle remedies: 1) Salt + warm water (most common), 2) Turmeric + salt + warm water, 3) Honey + warm water, 4) Apple cider vinegar diluted, 5) Licorice (Athimathuram) decoction. Frequency: 3-4 times daily. Drinks: 1) Warm water throughout day, 2) Honey + lemon + warm water, 3) Tulsi tea. Avoid: Cold drinks, spicy food, shouting. Persistent: If >1 week, see ENT doctor.

instruction: Dubai job offer vannille - 'Salary 50,000, visa ready, 30,000 processing fee anuppulle' nu. Agent WhatsApp la photos anuppinaan. Genuine aano?
output: Scam alle idhu! Legitimate recruitment agencies upfront fee vaangillalle. 'Visa ready' nu photos fake alle. Gulf job scam la Kanyakumari youth romba maatikittanga - Colachel, Thuckalay la cases irukku. Only POE (Protector of Emigrants) registered agencies vazhiya apply pannu.

instruction: முக்கிய உதவி எண்கள் என்ன?
output: Emergency: 112, Women Helpline: 181, Child Helpline: 1098, CM Cell: 1100, Legal Aid: 15100, Consumer: 1915, Electricity: 94987-94987, Water: 1916, Ration Card: 1967

instruction: Pregnancy-la free checkup enge kidaikkum?
output: Free at: 1) PHC (Primary Health Centre), 2) Government hospitals, 3) Urban health centres. Services: 1) Registration (first trimester), 2) Regular checkups (minimum 4 ANC visits), 3) Blood/urine tests, 4) Ultrasound scans, 5) Iron/folic acid tablets, 6) Tetanus injection, 7) High risk identification. Documents: Mother and Child Protection Card issued. Important: Register early for complete care.

instruction: 5 lakhs fraud la poachu. Maximum recovery ku enna ellam pannanum?
output: Day 1: All standard steps PLUS lawyer consultation, multiple bank calls (yours + beneficiary), social media warning post. Week 1: Detailed FIR with all sections ✓, Cyber cell case assignment ✓, Personal visit to cyber cell ✓, Newspaper complaint ✓, RTI to bank ✓. Week 2-4: IO follow-up ✓, SP Cyber Crime application ✓, Banking Ombudsman parallel ✓, Find other victims ✓, Collective complaint ✓. Month 2: Legal notice to bank ✓, Consumer Forum prep ✓, ED complaint if >5L ✓, Media approach ✓. Month 3-6: Consumer Forum case ✓, Court attendance ✓, Bank settlement negotiation ✓. Recovery: 40-60% with aggressive pursuit. Timeline: 6-18 months.

instruction: Menstrual cramps-kku natural relief?
output: Remedies: 1) Hot water bag on abdomen, 2) Ginger tea, 3) Ajwain water, 4) Fenugreek (Vendhayam) soaked water, 5) Sesame seeds (til) with jaggery, 6) Light exercise/yoga (child's pose, cat-cow), 7) Massage with warm sesame oil. Diet: Avoid cold foods, have warm foods. Long-term: Regular exercise, healthy weight help. Severe pain: Check for PCOS, endometriosis - see gynecologist.

instruction: Accident compensation evvalavu kidaikkum?
output: Formula based: Age, income, dependency, injury severity. Death case: Multiplier method (age based - 12 to 18 times annual income). Injury: Medical expenses + loss of income + pain & suffering + disability percentage. Third party insurance: Unlimited liability.

instruction: Doctor sex sonnaar/kettaar - complain enge?
output: Report immediately! Complaint to: 1) District Appropriate Authority (Collector office), 2) State Supervisory Board (DHS), 3) Police FIR, 4) Medical Council. Evidence: If possible, record/witness. Confidential complaint: Identity protected. Reward: Some states offer reward for reporting. Action: Center sealed, license cancelled, criminal prosecution. Even asking = offence for both parties.

instruction: Voter ID eppadi peruvadhu?
output: Apply at voters.eci.gov.in or Voter Helpline App. Fill Form 6. Documents: Age proof (18+ on Jan 1), address proof, passport photo. BLO will visit for verification. e-EPIC downloadable on app. Time: 30-45 days. FREE.

instruction: 'Virtual internship + Certificate from [Big Company Name], registration 1500' nu LinkedIn post.
output: Real companies internship fee kekaadhu - they pay stipend. 'Certificate from Big Company' - fake or unofficial. LinkedIn la fake internship posts common. Official company career pages la apply pannunga. Paid certificates value illa in job market.

instruction: Appeal eppadi poduvadhu?
output: Hierarchy: District Court → High Court → Supreme Court. Time limit: 30-90 days (varies). Appeal grounds: Law error, fact error, procedure violation. Memorandum of Appeal + certified copy of judgment. Stay application-um file pannalam. Delay condone petition if late.

instruction: 'Eid special biryani 50% off - order now, pay after delivery' unknown restaurant offer. Order பண்ணலாமா?
output: Careful! Eid-ல fake food delivery scams increase. 'Pay after delivery' bait, substandard food deliver பண்ணுவாங்க or nothing at all. Known restaurants/Swiggy/Zomato use பண்ணுங்க. Unknown number order avoid பண்ணுங்க.

instruction: Engineering படித்து வேலை கிடைக்கவில்லை, என்ன செய்வது?
output: மாற்று வழிகள்: 1) Skill upgrade - Online courses (Coursera, NPTEL) 2) GATE எழுதி PSU/ME சேர்க்கை 3) MBA படித்து management-க்கு மாறுங்கள் 4) Government jobs - SSC JE, RRB JE 5) Startup/Freelancing 6) TNSDC free skill training 7) Entrepreneurship - PMEGP loan மூலம் சொந்த தொழில். District Employment Exchange-ல் register செய்யுங்கள்.

instruction: Adakkam (humility) patri enna kuralgal ullana?
output: Kural: 'Adakkam amararul uykkum adangaamai aaarirul uyththu vidum'. Adakkam sorgaththukkku kondu sellum, adangaamai naragaththukkku. Melum: 'Kaakka porulaa adakkaththai aakkam adhaninnooung killai uyirkku'. Adakkaththai uyiraip pol kaappaatrungal. Humility = gateway to success!

instruction: Fever-க்கு traditional treatment என்ன?
output: Traditional fever remedies: 1) Nilavembu Kudineer (best for viral), 2) Papaya leaf juice (dengue prevention), 3) Coriander seed water, 4) Tulsi + ginger tea, 5) Vetiver (Khus) water for cooling, 6) Light food - kanji (rice porridge), 7) Rest and hydration. Wet cloth: On forehead for high fever. When doctor needed: >103°F, convulsions, rash, severe headache, confusion, lasting >3 days.

instruction: Site vaangap poren, ennenna paakkanum? (Chennai casual)
output: Mudhalila: 1) Patta yaar perla irukku, 2) EC 30 years clear-aa, 3) Survey number match aagudhaa, 4) Poramboke illaiye, 5) Approval (DTCP/CMDA) irukkaa. Ellaathaiyum lawyer-kitta verify pannunga. Rush-la vaangaadheenga.

instruction: Death certificate eppadi peruvadhu?
output: Register within 21 days at place of death's Municipality/Panchayat - FREE! Documents: Medical death certificate, deceased's Aadhaar, informant's ID. After 21 days: Late fee + affidavit. Online at tnreginet.gov.in.

instruction: Power of Attorney எத்தனை types? எது safe?
output: Types: 1) General POA - all acts (risky), 2) Special POA - specific acts only (safer), 3) Durable POA - continues even if principal incapacitated. Registration: Property transactions - compulsory registration. Revocation: Written revocation + newspaper publication. Safe practice: Special POA with specific purpose + time limit. Never give blank POA!

instruction: Kovil darshan timings eppadi therindhukolvathu?
output: Darshan timings theriya: 1) Official temple websites - major temples maintain, 2) Dinamalar/Dinakaran temple section, 3) Temple phone numbers - call and ask, 4) Google Maps reviews - visitors update timings, 5) TN Tourism website. General pattern: Morning 6-12, Evening 4-8. Noon break (Uchchi Saandhi) 12-4pm closed. Special darshan (VIP) tickets available in big temples - book online. Festivals-la extended hours. Arrive early for popular temples!

instruction: En pullaikku fever vandhirukku, GH pogalaamaa? (Chennai style)
output: GH ponga, free treatment. Aana mild fever-kku PHC podhum. High fever, 3 days+ fever, fits, rash irundhaa GH immediately. Chennai: 1) GH (Egmore/Stanley/Kilpauk), 2) ICH Egmore (children specialist). Token system - early ponga. Documents: Ration card/Aadhar irundhaa good. Emergency-kku endha document-um vendaam.

instruction: என் புள்ள school-ல அடிச்சிட்டாங்க, action எடுக்கணும்
output: Corporal punishment banned! RTE Act + NCPCR guidelines. Actions: 1) School principal-கிட்ட written complaint, 2) Education Department (DEO), 3) Child Welfare Committee, 4) Police (if serious injury). Evidence: Photos, medical certificate. Teacher action: Suspension, termination possible. School license: Risk of cancellation. Child helpline: 1098.

instruction: Law padippu (LLB) Tamil Nadu-la eppadi seruvathu?
output: Two ways: 1) 5-year BA LLB (+2 passed students-ku) - CLAT/TNDALU entrance exam 2) 3-year LLB (graduates-ku). Dr. Ambedkar Law University counselling nadathum. CLAT score pala colleges-la accept aagum. Govt college fee: ₹5,000-15,000/year.

instruction: District hospital vs Medical college hospital - என்ன difference?
output: District Hospital: 1) Every district headquarters, 2) General specialties, 3) Emergency, surgery, maternity, 4) 100-300 beds typical. Medical College Hospital: 1) Teaching hospital, 2) Super-specialties available, 3) Better equipment, 4) 500-1000+ beds, 5) Complex cases referred here. Both free. Medical colleges: Chennai, Madurai, Coimbatore, Trichy, Salem, Thanjavur, Tirunelveli, etc.

instruction: Caste, religion paarthu treatment refuse pannalaamaa?
output: Absolutely ILLEGAL! Non-discrimination is fundamental right. Prohibited: 1) Caste-based denial, 2) Religion-based denial, 3) Gender discrimination, 4) Economic status discrimination, 5) Disease-based discrimination (HIV, leprosy). Action: 1) Police complaint (SC/ST Act if applicable), 2) Human Rights Commission, 3) State Medical Council, 4) Consumer Forum. Hospital license: Can be cancelled.

instruction: Nilavembu Kudineer eppadi thayaarippadhu?
output: Ingredients: Nilavembu (Andrographis), Vetiver, Coriander, Dry ginger, Pepper, and 5 more herbs. Ready-made: Government distributes, pharmacies sell. Home preparation: 1) Get powder from Siddha pharmacy, 2) Boil 5g in 100ml water, 3) Reduce to 50ml, 4) Strain and drink warm. Dosage: 30-60ml, twice daily. When: Viral fever, dengue prevention, monsoon season. Avoid: Pregnancy, very young children - consult doctor.

instruction: Defence force join aaga training enge kidaikkum?
output: Defence training options: 1) Sainik Schools - Class 6 admission (for NDA prep) 2) Army rally coaching - District soldiers boards 3) NDA coaching - Government free centers 4) Agnipath training - TNSDC centers 5) Private coaching institutes. Physical fitness: Running, pull-ups, sit-ups practice daily. Written exam: Maths, English, GK. Medical: Strict standards. Apply: www.joinindianarmy.nic.in. Age: 17.5-21 (varies by entry).

instruction: PMEGP loan-க்கு எப்படி apply செய்வது?
output: Prime Minister's Employment Generation Programme: Manufacturing-க்கு ₹50 lakh, Service-க்கு ₹20 lakh வரை. Subsidy: General 15-25%, SC/ST/Women 25-35%. Process: 1) www.kviconline.gov.in-ல் register 2) Business plan submit 3) Bank verification 4) Loan sanction 5) EDP training (mandatory) 6) Disbursement. Age: 18+. Education: 8th pass (₹10 lakh+), any (₹10 lakh வரை). District Industries Centre-ல் help available.

instruction: Thirukkural mental health-kku eppadi udhavum?
output: 1) Thunbam theerthal adhigaaram - depression-kku udhavum, 2) Ookkamudaimai - motivation loss-kku, 3) Adakkamudaimai - anger management-kku, 4) Poraiyudaimai - patience katrukolla, 5) Innaa seiyaamai - negative thoughts kuraikkA. 'Thunbam varum bodhu adhai eppadi face panradhu' endru Valluvar niraiya solliyirukkaar. Therapists kooda Thirukkural quotes payanpaduththuraanga.

instruction: Call vandhirukkappa - 'Unga account block aagumappa, KYC update pannungappa' nu. OTP kekkuraangappa. Enna pannalaamappa?
output: Fraud appa idhu! Bank phone la OTP kekkumappa? Kekaadhuappa! Branch ku neengappa poi pesungappa. Big Temple area, Vallam pakkathu la farmers ipdi maatikirukkanga. Phone la details kudukkaadheengappa.

instruction: நான் சிறிய கடை / தொழில் ஆரம்பிக்க விரும்புகிறேன். என்னென்ன license, loan, benefits கிடைக்கும்?
output:
Step 1 - Registration:
1. Udyam Registration (MSME) - udyamregistration.gov.in - இலவசம்
2. GST Registration - ₹40 லட்சம்+ turnover-க்கு கட்டாயம்

Step 2 - Local Licenses:
3. Trade License - நகராட்சி - ₹500-5,000
4. Shop & Establishment - tnlabour.tn.gov.in - ₹150-500
5. FSSAI License - உணவு வணிகம் - fssai.gov.in

Step 3 - Loans & Subsidies:
6. PMEGP - ₹50 லட்சம் வரை - 15-35% subsidy
7. MUDRA Loan - ₹10 லட்சம் வரை - No collateral
8. NEEDS (TN) - ₹25 லட்சம் வரை - 25-30% subsidy
9. Stand Up India (SC/ST/Women) - ₹1 கோடி வரை

Step 4 - Ongoing:
10. GST Returns - Monthly/Quarterly
11. Income Tax - Yearly

instruction: Orphan/single parent children-ku padippu udhavi enna?
output: Benefits: 1) Social Welfare Department scholarship 2) Free education in government schools 3) Hostel facility free 4) PM CARES for Children scheme (COVID orphans) - ₹10 lakh insurance + monthly stipend + free education till graduation 5) NGO scholarships. Required: Death certificate of parent(s), income certificate. District Social Welfare Officer-a anugugal.

instruction: Insurance claim reject aanadhu - enna seyyalam?
output: Steps: 1) Rejection letter-kku written reply kodunga, 2) IRDAI Grievance portal (igms.irda.gov.in)-la complaint, 3) Insurance Ombudsman-kitta appeal (Rs.30 lakh varai), 4) Consumer forum case. Claim rejection reason properly study pannunga - valid reason illaama reject panna mudiyaadhu.

instruction: Siddha maruththuvam endraal enna?
output: Siddha = Tamilnaattin paarambariya maruththuva murai. Origin: 18 Siddhars (gnaniyar) developed. Age: 5,000+ years old. Principle: Udal (body), Uyir (soul), Manam (mind) balance. Based on: Pancha bootham (5 elements), 96 thathuvangal, 3 doshas (Vatham, Pitham, Kabam). Treatment: Diet, herbs, minerals, yoga, lifestyle. Recognition: Government of India recognized AYUSH system.

instruction: மதுரை மண்டபம் என்றால் என்ன? ஏன் famous?
output: Chennai December Music Season - உலகின் மிகப்பெரிய cultural festival. December 15 - January 1 வரை. 1920s-ல் தொடங்கியது. சிறப்புகள்: 1) 2000+ concerts நடக்கும், 2) 100+ sabhas (cultural organizations) organize பண்றாங்க, 3) Morning 9 AM to Night 10 PM non-stop programs, 4) Free entry பல sabhas-ல், 5) World-ல் இருந்து Carnatic musicians வருவார்கள். Famous sabhas: Music Academy, Narada Gana Sabha, Mylapore Fine Arts. Culture lovers' paradise!

instruction: TNPSC-க்கு Tamil medium vs English medium - எது better?
output: Both equal opportunity. Tamil medium advantages: 1) TN textbooks Tamil-ல் படிக்கலாம் 2) Answer writing easier 3) More candidates. English medium advantages: 1) Reference books availability 2) Current affairs sources more. Reality: Language doesn't matter, content matters. Toppers in both mediums. Choose your comfortable language. Paper can be written in either, no preference given. Focus on preparation, not medium.

instruction: Azhvaargal yaar? Eththanai per?
output: Azhvaargal - Vaishnava bhakthi iyakkathoda 12 punithargal. 'Azhvaar' endraal 'aazhndhu arindhavar' endru porul - iraivanaai aazhamaga anubhaviththavargal. Ivargal Thirumaalai (Vishnu) paadinaargal. Nalayira Divya Prabandham ivargaloda padaippu - 4000 paasurangal. 108 Divya Desangalai (Vishnu kovilgal) paadiyullanar. Vaishnava sampradhaayathoda aadharam.

instruction: Email vandhuchu 'AWS billing issue detected, verify card details to prevent service termination' nu AWS logo use panni. Company AWS use pannudhu, check pannalama?
output: Always access AWS through console.aws.amazon.com directly! AWS sends alerts through console and verified email, never asks card details via email. Check CloudWatch billing alerts. This is classic cloud service impersonation targeting DevOps engineers.

instruction: Senior citizens-ku Bus/Train concession enna?
output: TN State Bus: FREE travel in ordinary buses for 60+ (just show age proof). Railway: 40% discount for men 60+, 50% for women 58+ (auto-applied on IRCTC). Air India: 50% on select routes for 63+. Always carry age proof.

instruction: Single parent/orphan students-ku enna scholarship?
output: Support schemes: 1) AICTE Swanath Scholarship - ₹50,000/year orphans-ku 2) PM CARES for Children (COVID orphans) - full support till graduation 3) Social Welfare Department orphan scholarship 4) NGO support - SOS Children's Villages, Udayan Care. Documents: Parent death certificate, guardian affidavit. Priority in government hostel admission. Apply through respective department.

instruction: Papaya/Pineapple pregnancy-la miscarriage cause pannumaa?
output: Myth (mostly)! Ripe papaya: Safe in moderate amounts. Raw papaya: Contains latex - avoid (may cause contractions). Pineapple: Safe in normal amounts (contains bromelain but too little to cause harm). No food: Scientifically proven to cause miscarriage in normal amounts. Advice: 1) Eat varied diet, 2) Avoid raw/undercooked food, 3) Consult doctor for specific concerns. Miscarriage causes: Usually chromosomal abnormalities, not food.

instruction: Abortion legal-aa? Endha conditions-la allowed?
output: Legal under MTP Act (amended 2021). Conditions: 1) Up to 20 weeks - one doctor opinion, 2) 20-24 weeks - two doctors opinion (rape, contraceptive failure, fetal abnormality), 3) Any time - if fetal abnormality (medical board). Special: Rape survivors, minors - extended limits. Unmarried women: Also eligible. Consent: Woman's consent only (adult). Minor: Guardian consent needed.

instruction: Gym membership cancel panna vidala, enna seivathu?
output: Consumer rights: 1) Written cancellation request kodunga, 2) Refund policy check - pro-rata refund kelunga, 3) Unfair terms (no cancellation ever) = void under Consumer Protection Act, 4) Refuse pannaa: Consumer Forum complaint - Rs.1 lakh-kkul = District Forum. Medical reason cancellation: Doctor certificate koduththaa usually accept panraanga.

instruction: Hospital excessive bill pottaanga - dispute eppadi seivathu?
output: Steps: 1) Itemized bill demand (kattaayam tharanum), 2) Rate list compare (display mandatory), 3) Hospital grievance officer, 4) District Health Authority, 5) Consumer forum. Clinical Establishments Act: Rate display, itemized bill compulsory. Overcharging = unfair trade practice.

instruction: Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana (PMUY) endraal enna?
output: Free LPG Connection. Eligibility: BPL families, SC/ST, PM-Awas beneficiaries. Benefits: Free LPG Connection, First Cylinder + Stove deposit-free, EMI option for cylinder cost. Apply: Nearby LPG Distributor (HP, Bharat, Indane), pmuy.gov.in. Documents: Aadhaar, BPL Card, Bank Account. Refill Subsidy: Comes directly to Bank Account via DBT

instruction: 'SBI technical team la irundhu pesuren ayya, unga account la security issue, AnyDesk install pannunga remote la fix pannidurom' nu call vandhudhu. Bank officer nu sonnaan, nambalam aa?
output: NEVER install AnyDesk ayya! Bank technical team ipdi call pannave pannaadhu. AnyDesk install pannina unga phone/computer full aa paappaanga - banking app open panni all money transfer panniduvaanga. Immediately cut pannunga. Bank branch ku complaint pannunga.

instruction: RTI என்றால் என்ன? யார் file பண்ணலாம்?
output: RTI = Right to Information Act 2005 - Government information பெறும் உரிமை. Any Indian citizen file பண்ணலாம். NRI, Company, Trust - file பண்ண முடியாது. Government, PSU, government-funded NGO எல்லாத்துக்கும் RTI apply.

instruction: TN இலவச Bus Pass திட்டம் மாணவர்களுக்கு என்ன?
output: அனைத்து மாணவர்களுக்கும் இலவச பேருந்து பயணம். Coverage: School students - Govt/Private, College students - UG/PG/Professional. Type: Free travel in ordinary buses. Process: School/College-ல் apply, ID card வாங்க வேண்டும். Documents: Bonafide certificate, Photo, Aadhaar. Validity: Academic year. Not for: AC buses, special buses.

instruction: SMS vandhuchu 'Fire safety certificate renewal. 5000 online payment or inspection failed.' Fire safety matter serious, pay pannidlama?
output: Fire safety NOC through Tamil Nadu Fire and Rescue Services department. Inspection and certification has proper procedure and official fees. Never pay through SMS for 'instant clearance'. Apply through official channels or district fire office.

instruction: உண்மையா பொய்யா: Myth: Drop year waste of time, stigma உள்ளது
output: உண்மை: Fact: Drop year = Strategic investment. Many IIT/AIIMS toppers took drop. Reality: 60-70% NEET qualifiers are droppers. No employer asks about gap year for doctors/engineers. Better to take time and get right career than settle for less. Productive drop year > Rushed wrong decision. Society's opinion < Your career satisfaction.

instruction: Call vandhuchu 'This is Infosys IT security team. We detected unauthorized access from your credentials. Share OTP to verify your identity.' Naanum Infosys la dhaan velai paakkuren, genuine call aa?
output: Real IT security teams use internal communication, never ask OTP over phone. They can verify you through company systems. Call your manager or security team directly using known numbers. Internal breach attempts often come disguised as security calls.

instruction: Naturopathy endraal enna? Ayurveda-vida verupaadu?
output: Naturopathy = Treatment using nature's elements. Methods: Water (hydrotherapy), mud, air, sun, diet, fasting, yoga. Difference from Ayurveda: 1) No medicines (mostly), 2) Focus on lifestyle correction, 3) More recent system, 4) Emphasizes fasting/detox. Combined: Often practiced with Yoga. Qualification: BNYS (Bachelor of Naturopathy and Yogic Sciences). Good for: Lifestyle diseases, prevention, detoxification.

instruction: Coaching illaamal JEE crack panna mudiyumaa?
output: Possible but challenging. Self-study success factors: 1) Strong self-discipline 2) Proper study plan 3) Quality resources - YouTube (Physics Wallah, Unacademy free), NPTEL 4) Regular mock tests 5) Doubt clearing - online forums, Telegram groups. Advantages: Own pace, cost saving. Challenges: Motivation, structured approach, peer competition. Hybrid approach: Free online + self-study works well. Many toppers are self-study students.

instruction: Thiruvalluvar siddharaaga karudhapadugiraaraa?
output: Thiruvalluvar Siddhargaloda pattiyalil silaraal serkkapadugirar. Gnaani endra vagayil Siddhar pondra status. Aanaal Thirukkural maruththuvam, rasavaadham pondra Siddhar subjects patri pesavillai - ethics, morality, worldly wisdom patri pesugiradhu. Enavae 'Gnaani' endru solvathu more appropriate. Siddhargaloda spiritual depth, Thiruvalluvaroda practical wisdom - irandaum complementary. Tamil gnnaanathoda iru mugangal!

instruction: SC/ST students-ku ennenna scholarships kidaikkum?
output: Adi Dravidar Welfare Department: 1) Pre-matric scholarship - ₹500-1,500/year 2) Post-matric scholarship - ₹3,000-10,000/year 3) Professional course - full fee + maintenance 4) PhD scholarship 5) Foreign study - ₹20 lakh 6) Free laptop 7) Hostel free 8) Books, uniform free. Apply: www.adwelfare.tn.gov.in. Income limit: ₹2.5 lakh/year. Almost all courses-ku scholarship irukku.

instruction: Whistleblower protection இருக்கா?
output: Whistleblower Protection Act 2014: Corruption, misuse of power report பண்றவர்களுக்கு protection. Apply: Competent Authority (state level). Identity protection, victimization protection உண்டு. Retaliation-க்கு penalty. Anonymous complaints-உம் accept.

instruction: Free contraceptives enge kidaikkum?
output: Free at: 1) PHC, 2) Government hospitals, 3) Anganwadi centres, 4) Urban health centres. Available: 1) Condoms, 2) Oral contraceptive pills (Mala-N, Mala-D), 3) IUD (Copper-T), 4) Injectable contraceptives, 5) Emergency contraceptive pills. Counseling: ANM/health worker will explain options. Choice: Woman's decision - no coercion. Sterilization: Also free but completely voluntary.

instruction: Bogar Siddhar yaar? Avar sirappu enna?
output: Bogar Siddhar migavum pugazh petra Siddhargalil oruvar. Rasavaathathil (alchemy) expert. Pazhani Murugan kovilil ulla Moolavar silaiyai Navapashaanam (9 vagai vishangal) kondu seidhathaaga nambappadugiradhu. China-vukkum sendru Tao thaththuvathai karrathaagavum, angge 'Lao Tzu' endru azhaikkapattathagavum silar nambugiraargal (controversial claim).

instruction: ஆதாரில் முகவரி மாற்றம் எப்படி செய்வது?
output: Online: myaadhaar.uidai.gov.in → Login with OTP → Update Address → Upload new address proof → Pay ₹50. Address proof can be EB bill, bank statement, rent agreement. If no document, use Address Validation Letter (AVL) method where verifier at new address confirms.

instruction: Polytechnic-ல் எந்த branch select செய்வது? Job opportunity எப்படி?
output: Branch wise opportunities: 1) Mechanical - Manufacturing, automobile companies 2) Civil - Construction, PWD, real estate 3) Electrical - TNEB, industries, electrician 4) Electronics - IT companies, telecom 5) Computer Science - Software, IT support 6) Automobile - Service centers, companies. Highest demand: Mechanical, Civil. Growing: Computer Science. Government jobs: TNPSC Diploma level posts available.

instruction: Ranganathar Kovil (Srirangam) sirappu enna?
output: Srirangam Ranganathaswamy Kovil ulagin migapperiya functioning Hindu temple. Sirappugal: 1) 7 pirakarangal (walls) - 156 acres parappu, 2) 21 gopurangal, 3) Raja Gopuram - 236 adi (Asia's tallest), 4) 108 Divya Desangalil mudhalavadhu, 5) Vaikunta Ekadasi - ore naalil 10 lakh+ per varuvaargal. Kaveri nadhi naduvil island-la ulladhu. Vishnu temples-la miga mukkiyam.

instruction: முக்கிய health helplines என்னென்ன?
output: Emergency: 108 (ambulance), 102 (pregnant women). Health info: 104 (general health helpline), 1075 (COVID - still active). Disease specific: 1097 (HIV/AIDS), 1800-599-0019 (TB). Mental health: 9152987821 (iCALL), 1800-599-0019 (NIMHANS). Poison: 1066 (Chennai). Child: 1098 (Childline). Women: 181 (women helpline). All 24x7 and free.

instruction: Student budget eppadi manage panrathu?
output: Budget tips: 1) Monthly expenses list make 2) Essentials first - food, transport, stationery 3) Track spending - apps like Money Manager 4) Hostel food cheaper than outside 5) Second-hand books - seniors, book banks 6) Student discounts use everywhere 7) Part-time work if possible 8) Avoid peer pressure spending 9) Emergency fund small amount keep 10) Scholarship money wise use. Rule: Needs > Wants.

instruction: Cold/cough-க்கு வீட்டு வைத்தியம் என்ன?
output: Effective remedies: 1) Chukku Kaapi - Dry ginger + pepper + palm jaggery boiled in water, 2) Turmeric milk (Manjal Paal) - Before sleep, 3) Steam inhalation with tulsi/eucalyptus, 4) Honey + ginger juice, 5) Pepper rasam, 6) Tulsi kashayam, 7) Gargle with warm salt water. Avoid: Cold water, ice cream, curd. When to see doctor: Fever >3 days, breathing difficulty, blood in phlegm.

instruction: Amaichar / minister-oda thaguthi enna?
output: Kural: 'Karuviyum kaalamum seykaiyum seyyum aruvinaiyum maandadhu amaichu'. Tools, timing, method, execution - ellavatrilum thiramayaanavar nalla amaichar. Melum: 'Vankan kudikaaththal katrarridhal aalvinayodu ainDhudan maandadhu amaichu'. Dhairiyam, kudimakkalai kaaththal, kalvi, seyalthiran, nalla pecchu - minister-kku 5 qualities vendum.

instruction: Lab test results abnormal-aa vandhurucchu - panic aaganumaa?
output: Don't panic! First: 1) Consult doctor who ordered test - they know context, 2) Slightly abnormal ≠ disease, 3) Reference ranges vary by lab, 4) Single test may not be conclusive, 5) Repeat test may be needed. Common false positives: Dehydration, recent food, medications. Important: Don't Google and self-diagnose. Doctor will: Correlate with symptoms, order confirmatory tests if needed, explain significance.

instruction: Jan Dhan Account என்றால் என்ன?
output: FREE zero-balance bank account for any Indian. Benefits: Free RuPay card, ₹2 lakh accident insurance, ₹30,000 life insurance (new accounts), overdraft up to ₹10,000, DBT transfer enabled. Open at any bank/Bank Mitra with just Aadhaar or Voter ID.

instruction: Exam hall-la tension vandhaal enna seivathu?
output: Tension relief tips: 1) Deep breathing - 10 murai moochu vidunga 2) Easy questions mudhalil attempt 3) Stuck aanaal skip, later return 4) Water kudiyunga 5) Positive self-talk: 'Naan padiththirukkiren, ezhudha mudiyum' 6) Question paper muzhuvathum mudhalil padiyunga. Before exam: Proper sleep, light food, early arrival. Severe panic: Invigilator-ku sollunga, rest room break.

instruction: PAN card-ல் mistake இருக்கு - correct பண்றது எப்படி?
output: Online: tin-nsdl.com or onlineservices.nsdl.com. Form: Correction form + supporting documents. Fee: Rs.110 (Indian address) / Rs.1,020 (foreign). Documents: ID proof, address proof with correct details. Time: 15-20 days. Status track: UTI/NSDL websites.

instruction: ரம்ஜான் - 'Zakat collection online - transfer to this account for sadaqah' message வந்துச்சு. Genuine collection-ஆ?
output: Verify பண்ணுங்க! Ramadan-ல fake zakat collection scams அதிகம். Unknown account-க்கு transfer பண்ணாதீங்க. Local mosque treasurer-கிட்ட directly கொடுங்க. Online collection-னா mosque official handle verify பண்ணுங்க.

instruction: FSSAI License எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: Mandatory for food business. Basic (up to ₹12L turnover): ₹100/year. State (₹12L-₹20Cr): ₹2,000-5,000/year. Apply at fssai.gov.in with ID proof, address proof, business proof. Display license number on food products. Renewal annual.

instruction: Suicide attempt criminal offence-ஆ?
output: NO! Decriminalized under MHCA 2017. Old: Section 309 IPC punished attempt. Now: Person attempting suicide presumed to be under severe stress - needs care, not punishment. Police: Cannot arrest or prosecute. Government duty: Provide care, rehabilitation. Family: Support, not blame. Hospital: Must treat without police formality. Exception: Abetment of suicide still criminal.

instruction: PhD சேர்க்கை தமிழ்நாட்டில் எப்படி நடக்கிறது?
output: படிகள்: 1) PG படிப்பு 55% marks (SC/ST 50%) 2) UGC NET/CSIR NET/GATE/SLET தேர்ச்சி (fellowship-க்கு) 3) பல்கலைக்கழக entrance test + interview. Fellowship: JRF ₹31,000/மாதம், SRF ₹35,000/மாதம். Part-time PhD working professionals-க்கு available. Major universities: Anna, Madras, Bharathidasan, Bharathiar.

instruction: Employment Exchange-la register seivathu worth-aa?
output: Benefits: 1) Government job notifications 2) Seniority based on registration date 3) Free career guidance 4) Skill training opportunities 5) Private job placement 6) Self-employment scheme guidance. Register: District Employment Office with certificates. Renewal: Every year or seniority lost. Documents: Educational certificates, community certificate, Aadhaar. Online renewal available now. Some government jobs require Employment Exchange registration.

instruction: Corporate training-la Thirukkural eppadi use aagudhu?
output: Pala multinational companies Thirukkural-based training nadaththugindrana: 1) Leadership workshops - Arasiyal adhigaarangal, 2) Ethics training - Araththuppaal, 3) Team building - Natpu adhikaaram, 4) Communication skills - Solvanmai, 5) Decision making - Therindhu seyalvagai. Infosys, TCS pondra IT companies Tamil Nadu offices-la idhu popular. 'Ancient Indian wisdom meets modern management' endru promote panraanga.

instruction: Cancer treatment-க்கு government help உண்டா?
output: CMCHIS-ல் cancer treatment covered. Chief Minister's Public Relief Fund-லும் apply செய்யலாம். Tata Memorial போன்ற hospitals-ல் subsidized treatment உண்டு. Social worker-ஐ contact செய்யுங்கள்.

instruction: Student bank account open panrathu eppadi?
output: Student account: 1) Zero balance accounts - SBI, Indian Bank offer 2) Documents: Aadhaar, college ID, photo, address proof 3) Benefits: ATM card, mobile banking, UPI 4) Scholarship DBT requires bank account 5) Education loan same bank = easier 6) Joint account option with parent 7) Fixed deposit for savings. Important: Keep minimum balance if required, avoid bounce charges. Link Aadhaar for DBT.

instruction: Appeal எப்படி போடுவது?
output: Hierarchy: District Court → High Court → Supreme Court. Time limit: 30-90 days (varies). Appeal grounds: Law error, fact error, procedure violation. Memorandum of Appeal + certified copy of judgment. Stay application-உம் file பண்ணலாம். Delay condone petition if late.

instruction: PM-KUSUM scheme endraal enna? Solar pump eppadi vaanguvadhu?
output: Solar Energy scheme for farmers. Component A: Install solar power plants (500kW-2MW), sell electricity to grid. Component B: Standalone solar pumps (up to 7.5 HP), 60% subsidy (Central 30% + State 30%), farmer pays only 40%. Component C: Convert existing pump to solar. Apply: mnre.gov.in or State DISCOM. Benefit: Free electricity, reduced carbon footprint.

instruction: ATM-ல் பணம் போச்சு ஆனா account-ல் debit ஆச்சு, என்ன செய்வது?
output: Steps: 1) உடனே bank-க்கு call பண்ணுங்க (customer care), 2) Written complaint கொடுங்க - transaction ID mention பண்ணுங்க, 3) RBI rule: Bank 5 days-க்குள் refund பண்ணணும், 4) Delay ஆனால்: Rs.100/day compensation, 5) Resolve ஆகல = Banking Ombudsman complaint. Evidence: Transaction SMS, mini statement வச்சுக்கோங்க.

instruction: Maternity leave எவ்வளவு நாள் கிடைக்கும்?
output: Maternity Benefit Act 2017: 26 weeks paid leave (first two children), 12 weeks (third child onwards). Before delivery: 8 weeks max. Adoption/surrogate: 12 weeks. Miscarriage: 6 weeks. 10+ employees company-க்கு applicable. Creche facility mandatory (50+ employees).

instruction: 'Kedil vizhuch selvam kalvi' - kalviyoda mathippu enna?
output: Kural: 'Kedil vizhuch selvam kalvi oruvarku maadalla mattraiyavai'. Artham: Kalviye azhiyaadha selvam. Matra ella selvangalum (panam, thangam, soththu) oru naal poyvidum. Aanaal kalvi eppodhum unnudan irukkum. Education = permanent wealth. Investment in knowledge = best investment!

instruction: PM-KISAN registration eppadi seyvadhu? Status eppadi check pannuvadhu?
output:
Registration:

Method 1 - Online (Self):
1. Go to: pmkisan.gov.in
2. Click: 'New Farmer Registration'
3. Select: State → Tamil Nadu
4. Enter: Aadhaar Number
5. Fill: Personal, Bank, Land details
6. Upload: Land records (Patta/Chitta)
7. Submit

Method 2 - CSC / Agriculture Office:
- Documents kondu ponaa avanga seivanga
- ₹0 charge (free service)

Documents:
- Aadhaar Card
- Bank Passbook (first page)
- Land Records (Patta, Chitta, Adangal)

Status Check:
1. pmkisan.gov.in → 'Beneficiary Status'
2. Enter: Aadhaar / Mobile / Account Number
3. Check: Registration status, Payment history

Payment schedule: ₹2,000 x 3 (April-July, Aug-Nov, Dec-March)

Reject reasons: Income Tax payer, Govt employee, Wrong land records, Bank mismatch

instruction: Siddha treatment government hospital-ல் free-யா கிடைக்குமா?
output: Yes! TN has strong Siddha infrastructure. Free at: 1) Government Siddha Medical Colleges (Chennai, Palayamkottai, etc.), 2) District AYUSH hospitals, 3) Taluk level Siddha dispensaries, 4) PHC attached Siddha units. Services: OPD, IPD, medicines. National Institute of Siddha (Tambaram): Specialized centre. Research: Central Council for Research in Siddha (Chennai).

instruction: Pranayama types and benefits enna?
output: Main Pranayamas: 1) Anulom-Vilom (alternate nostril) - balance, calm, 2) Kapalbhati - energizing, weight loss, detox, 3) Bhramari (bee breath) - stress, sleep, 4) Ujjayi - focus, warmth, 5) Sheetali - cooling, BP reduction. Benefits: Lung capacity, stress relief, concentration, immunity. Start: 5-10 minutes daily. Precautions: 1) Empty stomach, 2) No forcing, 3) Heart/BP patients - gentle only, 4) Pregnancy - specific guidance needed.

instruction: Assault/Fighting case-க்கு என்ன ஆகும்?
output: Simple hurt (IPC 323/BNS 115): 1 year imprisonment. Grievous hurt (IPC 325/BNS 117): 7 years. Voluntarily causing hurt (IPC 324/BNS 118): 3 years. Self-defence valid excuse. Medical report severity decide செய்யும். Compromise possible in simple cases.

instruction: Hotel Management padippu Tamil Nadu-la enge ulladhu?
output: Top institutes: 1) IHM Chennai - Central Government 2) IHM Guruvayur - Private 3) SIHM Madurai - State 4) SRM Hotel School. Admission: NCHM JEE entrance + counselling. Eligibility: 12th pass 45-50%. Duration: 3 years BSc HM. Fees: Govt ₹50,000-80,000/year, Private ₹1-3 lakh/year. Jobs: Hotels, airlines, cruise ships, resorts. Good starting salary: ₹20,000-35,000.

instruction: License renewal eppodhu pannanum?
output: Non-transport: 20 years validity (age 50 varai), piragu 5 years. Transport: 3 years. Renewal: Expiry-kku 1 year mun or 1 year pin (late fee applicable). Online: parivahan.gov.in. Expired license-udan drive panninal fine Rs.5,000.

instruction: Email vandhudhu - 'Congratulations! Selected for XYZ Scholarship 50,000, processing fee 2000 required.'
output: Legitimate scholarships processing fee kekaadhu. 'Selected' without application - impossible. Email links phishing sites. NSP (National Scholarship Portal), university official scholarships apply pannunga - all free process.

instruction: முதல் தலைமுறை பட்டதாரி scholarship எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: Scheme: பெற்றோர் யாரும் degree படிக்காத குடும்பத்தின் முதல் பட்டதாரிக்கு. Amount: ₹2,000-5,000/ஆண்டு + fee concession. தகுதி: 1) Parents non-graduate certificate (Tahsildar) 2) Income ₹2 lakh கீழ் 3) UG படிப்பு. Apply: College scholarship committee மூலம். Documents: Parents education declaration, income certificate, community certificate, Aadhaar.

instruction: 'உங்கள் Aadhaar money laundering-ல் use ஆகிறது' என்று call வந்தது. True-ஆ இருக்குமா?
output: False claim. 'Money laundering', 'drug case', 'arrest warrant' என்று phone-ல் சொன்னால் scam. Real cases-க்கு official notice வரும், phone call அல்ல.

instruction: WhatsApp message 'Nursing abroad recruitment - Canada/UK. Pay 50,000 registration, guaranteed placement.' Abroad job chance, apply pannalama?
output: Legitimate foreign nursing recruitment through licensed agencies (check POE list at mea.gov.in). 50,000 upfront for 'guarantee' is scam pattern.
