Real process involves exams (NCLEX, IELTS), credential verification. Many nurses cheated by fake abroad job promises. Verify agency registration before any payment.

instruction: Police investigation-la cooperate pannanuumaa?
output: Aama, reasonable cooperation venum. Aanaal rights therinchukonga: 1) Self-incriminating statement kodukka vendaam, 2) Lawyer presence-la statement kodukkalam, 3) Illegal search oppose pannalam, 4) Narco test, brain mapping - consent venum.

instruction: Consumer forum-ல் case file செய்ய என்னென்ன documents வேணும்?
output: Required: 1) Written complaint (5 copies), 2) Bill/Invoice copy, 3) Warranty/Guarantee card, 4) Correspondence with seller (letters, emails), 5) ID proof, 6) Address proof, 7) Photos/Videos of defect. Online filing: edaakhil.nic.in portal மூலம்.

instruction: GPA (General Power of Attorney) moolam property sale valid-aa?
output: Supreme Court ruling (2011): GPA moolam property sale NOT valid. GPA holder sale deed execute pannalam, but final ownership transfer Principal neril vandhu sign seyyanum or properly registered Special Power of Attorney venum.

instruction: Important government websites enna?
output: All e-Services: tneservices.tn.gov.in, Property Registration: tnreginet.gov.in, Ration Card: tnpds.gov.in, Vehicle/DL: parivahan.gov.in, Pension: pensionschemes.tn.gov.in, Police: eservices.tnpolice.gov.in, Employment: tnvelaivaaippu.gov.in, Electricity: nsc.tnebnet.org, Land Records: eservices.tn.gov.in/landrecords

instruction: Exam time - 'TNPSC question paper leaked! Buy for 10000 Rs' WhatsApp message. Real leak-ஆ?
output: 100% scam and illegal! Paper leak என்றெல்லாம் இல்ல. Exam time-ல இந்த fraud peak. Money வாங்கி fake paper தருவாங்க. Plus legal trouble for you. Report to cyber crime. Study properly, shortcuts வேண்டாம்.

instruction: Phone vandhudhu, 'Namaskaaram, Treasury la irundhu pesuren, ungalukku pension arrears 50,000 pending irukku. Process panna Aadhaar number, bank account details sollunga' nu romba polite aa pesunaan. Genuine government officer aa?
output: Illa ayya, fraud dhaan. Treasury office phone la personal details kekaadhu. Pension arrears irundhaa written intimation varum. Phone la Aadhaar, bank details kuduthaa account la irundhu kaasu thirudiduvaanga. Treasury office ku neenga direct aa ponga, phone la yaarkum details kudukkaadhenga.

instruction: Kalaignar Magalir Urimai Thittam (₹1000 scheme) endraal enna?
output: ₹1,000/month for TN women household heads. Eligibility: Women 21-60 years, household head, annual income below ₹2.5 lakh, Rice card holder. Exclusions: Govt job, Income tax payer, 4-wheeler owner, AC owner. Apply: Taluk office/Village panchayat. Documents: Aadhaar, Ration card, Family photo, Bank account. DBT: Monthly to bank account.

instruction: NEET exam-ku ready aaga enna seiyandumay?
output: NCERT Biology, Physics, Chemistry - line by line read pannu/pannunga. Free coaching: Government centres-la apply pannu through school. Online free: YouTube (Physics Wallah), SWAYAM. 7.5% reservation govt school students-ku. Daily 6-8 hours padikka venum. Previous year papers practice important.

instruction: Shop employee rights enna?
output: TN Shops and Establishments Act: 1) 8 hours work/day, 48 hours/week, 2) Weekly off mandatory, 3) Leave: 12 days earned + 12 days sick + 5 casual, 4) Overtime double wages, 5) No child labour (<14 years). Violation: Labour Inspector complaint.

instruction: ESI hospital-la treatment eppadi peruvathu?
output: ESI card + ID proof kaattunga. Dispensary-la OP treatment free. Serious cases: ESI hospital referral. Tied-up hospitals-lum treatment available. Emergency-kku any hospital-la treatment petru reimbursement claim pannalam. Dependent family members-kkum cover undu.

instruction: Great Living Chola Temples endraal enna?
output: UNESCO World Heritage Site-aaga declare seiyappatta moondru Chozhar kovilgal: 1) Brihadeeswara Kovil, Thanjavur (1010 CE) - Rajaraja Chozhan, 2) Gangaikonda Cholapuram Kovil (1035 CE) - Rajendra Chozhan, 3) Airavateswara Kovil, Darasuram (12th century) - Rajaraja Chozhan II. 'Living' enbadhu indrum poojai nadakkum kovilgal enbadhaik kurikkum.

instruction: Fever 3 days ஆச்சு, hospital போகணுமா?
output: Go to hospital if: 1) Fever >103°F (39.4°C), 2) Fever with rash, 3) Severe headache/stiff neck, 4) Difficulty breathing, 5) Persistent vomiting, 6) Confusion, 7) Not responding to paracetamol, 8) Underlying conditions (diabetes, heart), 9) Children/elderly - earlier threshold. Dengue season: Blood test after day 3 of fever. Self-care: Hydration, rest, paracetamol (not aspirin for dengue suspected).

instruction: Extra income ku 'Amazon/Flipkart product listing work - daily 2 hours, earn 20,000/month, registration 5,000' nu ad paathen.
output: Amazon/Flipkart ipdi outsource pannaadhu. Registration fee = scam. Initial la small tasks, small payments kuduppaanga. Then 'premium access' ku more investment keppanga. Task-based work from home offers 99% scam.

instruction: PMJJBY/PMSBY Insurance என்றால் என்ன?
output: PMJJBY: Life insurance ₹2 lakh for ₹436/year (18-55 age). PMSBY: Accident insurance ₹2 lakh for just ₹20/year (18-70 age). Both together: ₹456/year for ₹4 lakh coverage! Enroll through bank with savings account. Auto-debit on June 1.

instruction: Affidavit எங்கே பண்றது? Cost என்ன?
output: Notary Public office (court complex nearby). Cost: Rs.50-200 (stamp paper) + Rs.100-500 (notary fee). Documents: ID proof, matter details. Self-drafted allowed. Notarized affidavit = legal document. e-Stamp paper available at banks.

instruction: Bail reject aanaal enna seivathu?
output: Appeal options: Lower court reject → Sessions Court. Sessions reject → High Court. High Court reject → Supreme Court. Fresh application: New grounds/changed circumstances irundhaal same court-layae fresh petition podalam. Legal aid available.

instruction: Phone vandhudhu 'Construction workers welfare board scheme. Pay 1000 registration for 50,000 marriage benefit.' Marriage varappodhu benefit kedaikum aa?
output: TN Construction Workers Welfare Board registration free through labour department. Benefits require continuous membership and proper application. No 'pay 1000 get 50,000' scheme exists. Register through district labour office or BOCW portal. Genuine benefits take time, not instant.

instruction: Class 6-8 மாணவர்களுக்கு என்ன scholarship கிடைக்கும்?
output:
**Middle School Scholarships (Class 6-8):**

**1. Pre-Matric Scholarship (SC/ST):**
- Day Scholar: ₹150/month
- Hosteller: ₹350/month
- Books/Stationery: ₹750/year
- Parent income: < ₹2.5 lakh
- Apply: scholarships.gov.in

**2. Pre-Matric Scholarship (BC/MBC/DNC):**
- Day Scholar: ₹100/month
- Hosteller: ₹250/month
- Parent income: < ₹2 lakh

**3. Pre-Matric Scholarship (Minorities):**
- For Muslim, Christian, Sikh, Jain, Buddhist, Parsi students
- ₹100/month + ₹500 yearly
- Apply: scholarships.gov.in

**4. National Means-cum-Merit Scholarship (NMMS):**
- Class 8 students
- ₹12,000/year (Class 9-12)
- Selection through exam
- Apply through school

**5. INSPIRE Awards - MANAK:**
- Science talent recognition
- ₹10,000 project grant
- For Class 6-10
- Apply: inspireawards-dst.gov.in

**Apply எப்படி:**
1. School-ல் form வாங்கவும்
2. scholarships.gov.in register
3. Documents upload
4. School verification
5. Bank account-ல் credit

instruction: India-la padippuku education loan eppadi vaanguvadhu?
output: Steps: 1) Admission letter vaangunga 2) Bank-la application 3) Documents submit (mark sheets, fee structure, income proof) 4) Loan sanction 5) College-ku direct disbursement. Up to ₹4 lakh - no collateral. ₹4-7.5 lakh - third party guarantee. Above ₹7.5 lakh - property collateral. Interest subsidy available for EWS.

instruction: Legal notice eppadi anuppuvadhu? Lawyer venumaa?
output: Self anuppalaam, but lawyer recommended for proper drafting. Format: 1) From/To addresses, 2) Subject, 3) Facts, 4) Legal grounds, 5) Demand/relief sought, 6) Time limit (usually 15-30 days), 7) Consequence warning. Send: Registered post AD (Acknowledgement Due). Keep copy + postal receipt. Reply not mandatory but advisable.

instruction: Paramparagat Krishi Vikas Yojana (PKVY) endraal enna?
output: Organic Farming promotion scheme. Cluster: 50+ farmers together on 50 acres. Support: ₹50,000/hectare (over 3 years) - Organic inputs, certification, marketing. PGS Certification: Participatory Guarantee System - free organic certification. Benefit: Premium price for organic produce, export opportunity, soil health improvement. Join: Agriculture Department, Krishi Vigyan Kendra. Training: Organic farming techniques, composting, bio-pesticides.

instruction: Bank loan EMI katta mudiyala, enna aagum?
output: EMI default aanaal: 1) 90 days delay = NPA (Non-Performing Asset), 2) Bank notice anuppum, 3) Recovery agent varalam - aanaal avanga threaten panna koodaadhu, 4) Restructure/one-time settlement kelunga, 5) Home loan: SARFAESI Act-in keezh property auction aagalam. RBI guidelines: Recovery agent harassment-kku complaint podalam.

instruction: Doctor-mela complaint poda enge poganum?
output: Tamil Nadu Medical Council (TNMC): For registered doctors. Address: 914, EVR Periyar Salai, Kilpauk, Chennai-10. Process: 1) Written complaint with evidence, 2) Inquiry by Council, 3) Hearing, 4) Action: Warning, suspension, removal from register. Timeline: 6 months - 2 years. Alternative: Consumer Forum for compensation. Criminal: Police if criminal negligence.

instruction: குறைபாடுள்ள மாணவர்களுக்கு competitive exam-ல் என்ன சலுகைகள் உண்டு?
output: Scribe facility, extra time (1 hour), separate seating, PWD quota (4% reservation), age relaxation (10 years), fee exemption, assistive devices permission ஆகிய சலுகைகள் கிடைக்கும். NEET, JEE, TNPSC எல்லாவற்றிலும் apply ஆகும்.

instruction: Ragging face பண்றேன். என்ன செய்யணும்?
output: Immediate action: 1) Don't comply with unreasonable demands 2) Note names, time, place 3) Report to Anti-Ragging Committee (every college has) 4) Online complaint: www.antiragging.in 5) Helpline: 1800-180-5522 (toll-free) 6) College principal/warden 7) Police if physical harm 8) UGC complaint portal. Protection: Your identity can be kept confidential. Punishment: Expulsion, criminal case against raggers. Don't suffer silently!

instruction: Government Schemes-க்கு apply செய்யும்போது பொதுவான தவறுகள் என்ன?
output:
Documentation Errors:
1. ❌ Expired Income Certificate submit → ✅ 6 months-க்குள் issue செய்யப்பட்டது தேவை
2. ❌ Aadhaar-Bank mismatch → ✅ Name, DOB exact match இருக்கணும், DBT fail ஆகும்
3. ❌ Wrong bank account (inactive/closed) → ✅ Active account with correct IFSC
4. ❌ Wrong photo size/format → ✅ Passport size, recent, white background

Eligibility Mistakes:
5. ❌ Income limit exceed ஆனாலும் apply → ✅ Rejection + blacklist possible
6. ❌ Same benefit multiple scheme-ல் claim → ✅ DBT catch பண்ணும், recovery + penalty
7. ❌ Family member already availed mention செய்யாமல் → ✅ Declaration-ல் சொல்லணும்

Timeline Mistakes:
8. ❌ Deadline miss → ✅ Academic scholarships especially strict
9. ❌ Renewal miss → ✅ Many schemes need yearly renewal
10. ❌ Status check செய்யாமல் wait → ✅ Regular check, deficiency correct பண்ணலாம்

instruction: Animation/VFX padippu career-ku nalladha?
output: Growing industry! Courses: 1) B.Sc Animation 2) Diploma (Arena, MAAC, Frameboxx) 3) Certificate courses. Duration: 6 months - 3 years. Skills: Maya, 3ds Max, After Effects, Photoshop. Jobs: Animation studios, Game companies, Ad agencies, Film industry (VFX). Chennai: Major hub for animation studios. Salary: ₹15,000-40,000 starting. Freelancing possible. Portfolio = key to jobs.

instruction: Hospital-la complaint eppadi poduvadhu?
output: Internal: 1) Grievance cell (every hospital must have), 2) Hospital administrator, 3) Medical superintendent. External: 1) District Health Department (DHS), 2) State Medical Council (for doctors), 3) Clinical Establishment Authority, 4) Consumer Forum (for deficiency in service). Written complaint: Keep copy with acknowledgment. Timeline: Response within 15-30 days typically.

instruction: விதை வாங்க subsidy கிடைக்குமா?
output: Certified seeds-க்கு 50% subsidy உண்டு. Agriculture department depot-ல் subsidized rate-ல் விதை வாங்கலாம். Paddy, millets, pulses-க்கு subsidy available.

instruction: BP tablet daily edukkanuumaa? Stop pannalaamaa?
output: Usually lifelong! Why: 1) BP medicine controls, doesn't cure, 2) Stopping = BP goes up again, 3) Sudden stop can cause rebound high BP. Safe: 1) Never stop without doctor advice, 2) Regular checkups, 3) Lifestyle changes may reduce dose (weight loss, diet, exercise). Myth: "I feel fine, so I don't need" - BP is silent killer, symptoms come late. Monitoring: Home BP monitor useful.

instruction: Bail bond amount evvalavu irukkum?
output: Offence severity based - Rs.10,000 to lakhs varai. Court discretion. Surety (guarantor) same amount-kku guarantee kodukkanum. Poor accused-kku personal bond (surety illaama) kidaikkum. Excessive bail unconstitutional.

instruction: Email vandhudhu 'Bar Council license renewal overdue. Pay 25,000 immediately or practice suspended.' License very important for practice, urgent aa pay pannanum?
output: Bar Council renewal done through State Bar Council office, not email payments. Check actual renewal date in your enrollment certificate. Bar Council sends official notices through post. Large amounts like 25,000 never asked via email - visit council office directly.

instruction: Gratuity-kku eligibility enna?
output: Minimum 5 years continuous service venum. 10+ employees ulla establishment-kku applicable. Death/disability case-la 5 years vendaam. Calculation: Last drawn salary × 15/26 × years of service. Maximum: Rs.20 lakhs.

instruction: Kuraipaaduulla kuzhanthaikalukkana sirappu pallikal Tamil Naattil engu ullan?
output: Ovvoru maavattathilum arasu sirappu pallikal ullan. NIEPMD (Adyar), hearing impaired schools, visually impaired schools, mentally challenged schools ellam irukku. Ellame free.

instruction: Call vandhudhu 'FSSAI license renewal urgent. 8000 fee or restaurant sealed tomorrow.' FSSAI license irukku, urgent aa renew pannanum?
output: FSSAI renewal through foscos.fssai.gov.in with fixed government fees (max 5000 for highest category). Sealing needs proper legal notice, not overnight. Check license validity and renew 30 days before expiry. Never pay phone callers claiming to be FSSAI.

instruction: BharatMatrimony la profile match aachhu - 'Software engineer in US, coming to India next month.' Now 'visa emergency, 50,000 need, will return personally.'
output: NRI matrimonial scams very common. 'Coming next month' keeps hope alive. Emergency always before meeting. Video call insist pannunga - excuses vandhaa red flag. Never send money before meeting in person with family verification.

instruction: 'Uram oruvatku ulla verukkai' - dhairiyam patriya kural enna?
output: Kural: 'Uram oruvarku ulla verukkai aqdhillaar maramakkal aadhalae veru'. Artham: Manam thidam (courage) iruppavane unmaiyaana manidhan. Adhu illadhavargal mara manithargal - uyiratra maram pondravargal. Inner strength illaamal verum body irundhu enna payan? Mental courage > Physical strength.

instruction: Bill இல்லாம வாங்கின product-க்கு complaint போடலாமா?
output: Bill இல்லாவிட்டாலும் complaint போடலாம். Alternative proofs: 1) Bank/card statement, 2) Online payment screenshot, 3) Warranty card, 4) Packaging with shop name, 5) Witness statement. ஆனால் bill இருந்தால் case strong ஆகும்.

instruction: Email vandhuchu 'Export license opportunity from DGFT. Pay 1 lakh processing for special quota allocation.' Export business start panna chance, apply pannalama?
output: DGFT doesn't offer special quotas via email solicitation. IEC (Import Export Code) registration is straightforward online process with minimal fees. 'Special quota allocation' is not how trade licensing works. Apply through dgft.gov.in for legitimate export registration.

instruction: Police ennai eppodhu arrest pannalaam?
output: Cognizable offence-kku warrant illama arrest pannalam. Non-cognizable-kku warrant venum. Bailable offence-kku arrest thevai illa - notice podhum. 7 years-kku keezh punishment offences-kku generally arrest avoid pannanum (Supreme Court guidelines).

instruction: Online-la fraud aayitten, police-kku ponaa ozhungaa case poduvaangalaa? (Chennai style)
output: Cyber crime special cell irukku - trained officers. cybercrime.gov.in-la first complaint podunga - track aagum. Local police-kkum FIR podunga. Both simultaneously pannalam. Evidence (screenshots, bank statements) ready-aa vachukonga.

instruction: LIC Golden Jubilee Scholarship என்ன?
output: LIC Golden Jubilee Foundation Scholarship: Economically weaker section students-க்கு. Amount: ₹10,000-20,000/ஆண்டு. Eligibility: 10th 60%+ marks, family income ₹2 lakh கீழ். Special quota: LIC employees' children. Apply: Through LIC branch or www.buddy4study.com. Covers: School fees, books, uniform. Renewable annually based on marks.

instruction: NEET Exam என்றால் என்ன? யார் எழுதலாம்?
output:
**NEET (National Eligibility cum Entrance Test):**

**என்ன இது?**
- Medical படிப்புகளுக்கான நுழைவுத் தேர்வு
- NTA (National Testing Agency) நடத்துகிறது
- ஒரே தேர்வு - All India + State quota

**எந்த படிப்புக்கு?**
- MBBS
- BDS (Dental)
- BAMS (Ayurveda)
- BHMS (Homeopathy)
- BUMS (Unani)
- BSMS (Siddha)
- BVSc (Veterinary)
- B.Sc Nursing

**தகுதி (Eligibility):**
- Age: 17 years as on Dec 31 of admission year
- No upper age limit (as of 2024)
- Education: 12th pass with PCB (Physics, Chemistry, Biology)
- Marks: General - 50%, OBC/SC/ST - 40%, PwD - 45%

**Attempts:**
- No limit on attempts

**Medium:**
- English, Hindi, Tamil உட்பட 13 languages

**Application:**
- Website: neet.nta.nic.in
- Usually: December-January (for May exam)
- Fee: ₹1,700 (General), ₹1,000 (SC/ST/PwD)

**TN Specific:**
- 7.5% reservation for Govt school students
- State quota: 85% seats
- All India quota: 15% seats

instruction: Sexual assault-kku piragu medical help enge?
output: Immediate: 1) Any hospital emergency (government or private), 2) One-Stop Centre (OSC) at district hospitals. Services: 1) Free medical examination, 2) Emergency contraception, 3) STI prevention, 4) Forensic evidence collection, 5) Counseling. Rights: 1) Treatment cannot be refused, 2) Female doctor if requested (if available), 3) Privacy maintained. Police: Hospital can help file FIR. Time: Evidence best collected within 72 hours.

instruction: SMS vandhuchu 'RTO license renewal online. Click link, pay 500 convenience fee.' License renew pannanum, online easy aa irukum nu nenaikkiren.
output: RTO renewals through parivahan.gov.in only. Official fees fixed by government, no extra 'convenience fee'. Never click SMS links for license renewal. Visit RTO office or use official portal. Scammers collect card details through fake renewal sites.

instruction: Will இல்லாமல் இறந்தால் property யாருக்கு போகும்?
output: Hindu Succession Act படி: Class I heirs (wife, sons, daughters, mother) சமமாக பங்கு பெறுவார்கள். Class I இல்லாவிட்டால் Class II (father, siblings, etc.). Muslim-க்கு Shariat law, Christian-க்கு Indian Succession Act apply.

instruction: Gramathula engalukku sontha veedu illai. PMAY-Gramin moola veedu katta udhavi eppadi peruvadhu?
output:
**PMAY-Gramin (Rural Housing):**

**Eligibility:**
- Houseless as per SECC 2011 data
- Kutcha house / Homeless
- Priority: SC/ST, Minorities, BPL

**Assistance:**
- Plain areas: ₹1,20,000
- Hilly areas: ₹1,30,000
- MGNREGA labor wages: 90/95 days
- Toilet: ₹12,000
- **Total: ₹1.5 lakh+**

**Process:**
1. SECC data based auto-selection
2. Gram Sabha approval
3. If not in list: Appeal at Gram Panchayat/BDO

**Check Eligibility:**
- pmayg.nic.in → Search your name

**Payment:** 3 installments based on construction stage

**Additional:** MGNREGA wages, Free LPG, Free electricity, Toilet

instruction: Phone vandhuchu 'Namaskaaram doctor, IMA meeting registration urgent. Pay 5000 now, tomorrow deadline. UPI ID sollunga.' IMA meeting genuine aa, pay pannalama?
output: IMA registrations go through official website and branch offices, not random phone calls. Call your local IMA branch directly to verify any meeting. Scammers use professional association names to target doctors knowing they'll respond to medical authority.

instruction: Consumer complaint enge kodukkalam?
output: Claim amount based: 1) Rs.1 crore varai - District Consumer Forum, 2) Rs.1-10 crore - State Commission, 3) Rs.10 crore mela - National Commission. Online: consumerhelpline.gov.in or NCH app moolam. Toll-free: 1800-11-4000.

instruction: Traffic police license vaangittu poyittaar, enna panradhu? (Chennai style)
output: Challan receipt vaangunga - license-kku padhil temporary receipt koduppaanga. Fine pay panni license collect pannunga (traffic police station/court). 60 days-kkul collect pannalnna cancelled aagalam. Online payment-um available.

instruction: 'Amma, naan Priya pesuren, US la passport stolen, embassy la stuck, urgent aa $2000 vendum Western Union la anuppu' nu call vandhudhu. En ponnu US la dhaan irukka, genuine aa?
output: Ayya, overseas emergency scam idhu. Voice similar aa irundhaalum, verify pannunga. Daughter original number ku WhatsApp video call pannunga. Real embassy situations la different procedures irukkum. Western Union immediate transfer request - big red flag. Verify first, send later.

instruction: Private company-kitta RTI podalaamaa?
output: Direct-aa poda mudiyaadhu. Aanaal government-kitta private company pattrina information ketkalam (permits, licenses, contracts, subsidies). Example: Builder RERA compliance pattri RERA Authority-kitta RTI podalam.

instruction: [Multi-turn dialogue] Marriage Registration After Hindu Wedding - Full conversation guide
output:
User: Last month wedding aachu. Marriage certificate vaanganum. Eppadi?

Assistant: Congrats! Marriage registration important - passport, visa, bank, property ellathukum use aagum.

**Quick Questions:**
1. Hindu marriage aa? Other religion?
2. Wedding enga nadandhuchu - TN or other state?
3. Bride & Groom - both TN residents aa?

Indha details sollunga, exact process sollren.

User: Hindu marriage. Chennai-la nadandhuchu. Both TN residents.

Assistant: Perfect! Hindu Marriage Act-la register pannalam:

**Two Options:**

**Option 1: Compulsory Registration (TN Rules)**
- Within 1 year of marriage
- No delay fee
- Easier process

**Option 2: After 1 year**
- Additional affidavit
- Newspaper notice
- More documents

Unga wedding evvalavu days aachu?

User: 3 weeks aachu. Online apply pannalaamaa?

Assistant: **Yes! Online Apply Available:**

**Step 1: tnreginet.gov.in**
1. Go to tnreginet.gov.in
2. Register / Login
3. Select: Marriage Registration
4. Choose: Hindu Marriage Act
5. Fill Form:
   - Husband details
   - Wife details
   - Marriage details (date, place, priest)
6. Upload documents
7. Pay fee online: ₹100-500
8. Book SRO appointment

**Step 2: Gather Documents**

**Both parties:**
- Age Proof (Aadhaar / DOB Certificate / SSLC)
- Address Proof
- Passport size photos (4 each)

**Marriage Proof (Any 2):**
- Wedding Invitation Card

instruction: Second opinion கேட்கலாமா? Doctor கோபப்படுவாரா?
output: Absolutely your right! Benefits: 1) Verify diagnosis, 2) Explore treatment options, 3) Confirm surgery necessity, 4) Peace of mind. How: 1) Ask for medical records, 2) Consult another specialist, 3) Get written opinion. Ethical doctors welcome this. Major decisions: Cancer, surgery, chronic illness - always get second opinion. Online: Telemedicine second opinions available.

instruction: School admission மறுக்கிறார்கள் - RTE-ல் seat இருக்கே?
output: RTE Act 25%: EWS/disadvantaged group-க்கு reserved. Apply: Online portal (rte.tn.gov.in). Rejection complaint: Block Education Officer, DEO, State RTE Authority. Documents: Income certificate, caste certificate, residence proof. Age: 6-14 years.

instruction: Tulsi plant benefits என்ன? எப்படி use பண்றது?
output: Tulsi (Holy Basil) benefits: 1) Immunity booster, 2) Respiratory health (cough, cold, asthma), 3) Stress relief (adaptogen), 4) Blood sugar regulation, 5) Antibacterial, 6) Heart health. Uses: 1) Fresh leaves - 3-5 daily (chew), 2) Tulsi tea - leaves boiled in water, 3) Tulsi drops - available commercially, 4) Tulsi honey - cold remedy. Note: Avoid during pregnancy (in large amounts), blood thinner users. Grow at home: Easy, brings positive energy (traditional belief).

instruction: Kannappa Nayanar kadhai enna?
output: Kannappar - Vedar kulathhai serndha Nayanar. Kaattil vettaiyaadum bodhu Kalahasti Sivalingatthai kandaar. Anbaal than vaayil irundha neeraal abhishekam, maamisathai naivethyam seydhaar. Oru naal Sivalingathoda kannilirundhu ratham vara, than kannai pidungi vaiththaar. Matroru kannilum ratham vara, adhaiyum pidunga murpatta bodhu Sivan thondri arul seydhaar. Unmayaana bhakthikku sadangu thevaiyillai enbadharkku udhaaranam!

instruction: Medicine MRP-kku mela vitraal complaint enge?
output: Complaint: Drug Inspector (District), State Drug Control. Legal Metrology Department-um complaint edukkum. Pharmacy license suspend/cancel aagalam. Consumer forum-la compensation. Evidence: Bill with MRP comparison. Toll-free: 1800-11-4000.

instruction: Neighbour waste என் வீட்டு பக்கம் போடுகிறார் - action என்ன?
output: Corporation/Municipality complaint: Solid Waste Management Rules violation. Police: IPC 268 (public nuisance), 269 (negligent act spreading disease). Photos/videos evidence. Tahsildar complaint-உம் possible. Fine up to Rs.5,000 for waste dumping violation.

instruction: Children parents-ஐ பார்க்காம விட்டுட்டாங்க - law உதவுமா?
output: Maintenance and Welfare of Parents Act 2007: Children (including married daughters) parents-க்கு maintain செய்யணும். Tribunal: SDM/Tahsildar level. Maintenance order: Rs.10,000/month max. Property revocation: Gift deed cancel possible if neglect proved.

instruction: ITI padicha piragu enna velai kidaikkum? Salary evvalavu?
output: Job opportunities: 1) Government - Railways, TNEB, PWD, Ordinance factories 2) Private - Hyundai, TVS, Ashok Leyland, L&T 3) Gulf countries - high demand 4) Self-employment - own workshop. Starting salary: ₹12,000-18,000/month. With experience: ₹25,000-40,000. Apprenticeship mudhalil seiyunga - stipend ₹8,000-12,000/month + experience.

instruction: Moovar (Thevaram Trio) yaar yaar?
output: Moovar - Thevaram paadiya moondru mukkiya Nayanmaargal: 1) Thirugnana Sambandhar - 3 vayathil Umaiyaval paal oottiyathaaga kadhai, 16 vayathil Samanargalai vaadhaththil vendavar, 2) Thirunavukkarasar (Appar) - mudhalil Jain Samanar, pin Saivar aanavar, 'Navukkarasar' endraal naavoda arasar, 3) Sundarar - 'Thozhamai' bhakthi, Sivanai nanbanaaga paadiyavar. Ivargal 274 kovilgalai Paadal petra thalangalaakkinaargal.

instruction: SMS vandhuchu 'ESI card renewal for domestic workers. Pay 300 processing fee.' ESI card renew pannanum aa?
output: ESI for domestic workers depends on employer registration. Renewal/registration through ESIC office, minimal official fees. Processing fee via SMS is scam. If employer provides ESI, they handle registration. Check esic.nic.in for genuine process.

instruction: Chit fund company பணம் தர மறுக்கிறது - complaint எங்கே?
output: Registered chit: Registrar of Chits (District). Unregistered: Police (cheating), Economic Offences Wing. TN Chit Funds Act violation. Consumer forum-உம் possible. Documents: Chit tickets, receipts, agreement. Collective complaint stronger.

instruction: SSC Exams என்றால் என்ன? TN students apply பண்ணலாமா?
output:
**SSC (Staff Selection Commission) Exams:**

**என்ன இது?**
- Central Government jobs recruitment
- All India level competition
- TN students definitely apply பண்ணலாம்!

**Major SSC Exams:**

**1. SSC CGL (Combined Graduate Level):**
- Posts: Inspector, Auditor, Tax Assistant
- Eligibility: Any Degree
- Age: 18-32 years
- Salary: ₹44,900-1,42,400

**2. SSC CHSL (Combined Higher Secondary Level):**
- Posts: DEO, LDC, PA/SA
- Eligibility: 12th pass
- Age: 18-27 years
- Salary: ₹25,500-81,100

**3. SSC MTS (Multi Tasking Staff):**
- Posts: Peon, Safaiwala, Gardener
- Eligibility: 10th pass
- Age: 18-25 years
- Salary: ₹18,000-56,900

**4. SSC GD Constable:**
- Posts: BSF, CISF, CRPF, SSB, ITBP
- Eligibility: 10th pass
- Age: 18-23 years
- Physical test required

**5. SSC Stenographer:**
- Posts: Stenographer Grade C & D
- Eligibility: 12th pass
- Skill test required

**TN Students Advantage:**
- Chennai posting preference possible
- South zone vacancies
- Tamil Nadu region allocation

**Exam Pattern (CGL Tier-1):**
| Section | Questions | Marks |
|---------|-----------|-------|
| Reasoning | 25 | 50 |
| GK | 25 | 50 |
| Quantitative | 25 | 50 |
| English | 25 | 50 |
| **Total** | **100** | **200** |

- Duration: 1 hour
- Negative: 0.5 marks
- Online exam

**Apply:** ssc.nic.in
**TN Region:** SSC Southern Region, Chennai

instruction: Pain killers addiction aagumaa? Control enna?
output: Some can! Opioids (Tramadol, Codeine, Morphine): High addiction potential - Schedule H/X. NSAIDs (Ibuprofen, Diclofenac): Lower risk but long-term issues (stomach, kidney). Paracetamol: Relatively safe but liver damage if overdose. Rules: Opioids = strict prescription, register entry. Chronic pain: Doctor supervision essential. Addiction help: De-addiction centres, psychiatrist.

instruction: Builder flat தர delay பண்றார் - என்ன செய்யலாம்?
output: RERA (Real Estate Regulatory Authority)-ல் complaint போடுங்க. tnrera.in - Tamil Nadu RERA portal. Delay-க்கு interest (SBI lending rate + 2%) கேட்கலாம். Full refund with interest-உம் கேட்கலாம். Consumer forum-லும் parallel-ஆ case போடலாம்.

instruction: Blood transfusion-la wrong blood koduthaanga - action enna?
output: Serious negligence! Life-threatening error. Blood bank + hospital liable. Action: 1) Medical records + blood bank records collect, 2) Consumer Forum, 3) Criminal case if death/serious injury, 4) Blood bank license complaint (State Blood Transfusion Council). Protocols violated: Blood matching, cross-matching, identification. Compensation: High - can be fatal mistake.

instruction: Diabetes, BP-க்கு free medicine கிடைக்குமா?
output: Yes! NCD (Non-Communicable Disease) Program. Free at: PHC, CHC, Government hospitals. Services: 1) Screening camps, 2) Blood sugar/BP check, 3) Basic medicines (Metformin, Amlodipine, etc.), 4) Diet counseling, 5) Regular monitoring. NCD clinics: Dedicated clinics at larger centres. Insulin: Available at district hospitals. Register: Health ID (ABHA) helps track records.

instruction: Apartment Association-ல் என்ன rights இருக்கு?
output: TN Apartment Ownership Act படி: 1) AGM-ல் vote செய்ய, 2) Committee member ஆக, 3) Accounts inspect செய்ய, 4) Common area use செய்ய, 5) Decisions-ல் participate. Arbitrary rules-க்கு object செய்யலாம். Discrimination-க்கு legal action எடுக்கலாம்.

instruction: Company PF kattala, complaint podanumaa? (Chennai style)
output: First salary slip check pannunga - PF deduction irukkaa paarunga. Deduct panni kattalnna serious offence. EPFO portal-la EPFiGMS complaint podunga. Regional PF office-lum pogalam. Company-kku heavy penalty + criminal case aagalam.

instruction: Farmer family students-ku special scholarship ulladha?
output: Agriculture family scholarships: 1) IFFCO Scholarship - ₹25,000/year 2) Kotak Kisan - ₹10,000-30,000 3) TNAU free education for farmers' children 4) Agriculture Department scholarships. Eligibility: Farmer certificate from VAO, small/marginal farmer category. Priority in agriculture courses. Krishi Vigyan Kendra (KVK) free training available. Apply through Agriculture office or online portals.

instruction: Copyright registration eppadi seivathu?
output: Online: copyright.gov.in. Categories: Literary, artistic, musical, cinematograph, sound recording. Fee: Rs.500-5,000 (work type based). Process: Application → Diary number → Objection period (30 days) → Registration. Note: Copyright automatic - registration = evidence.

instruction: 108 Ambulance service எப்படி use பண்றது?
output: Dial 108 - Free emergency ambulance. Services: 1) BLS (Basic Life Support) ambulance, 2) ALS (Advanced Life Support) for critical cases, 3) Trained paramedics, 4) GPS tracking, 5) Hospital coordination. Response time: 15-20 minutes (urban), 20-30 minutes (rural). Free: No charges for transport. Alternative: 102 for pregnant women transport.

instruction: Engineering counselling-ல் random number என்ன? எப்படி work ஆகும்?
output: Random number: Same marks students-க்கு tie-breaker. System generated, not controllable. Priority: 1st - Cutoff marks, 2nd - Random number (if same marks). Example: You 195 cutoff, random 50000. Another person 195 cutoff, random 10000. They get priority. Impact: Matters only when competing for last few seats in popular colleges. Strategy: Higher marks = random number irrelevant. Focus on marks, not luck.

instruction: Will contest பண்ணலாமா?
output: ஆம். Grounds: Undue influence, fraud, forgery, unsound mind, improper execution. Contest: Probate Court. Time: Before probate granted-க்கு எதிர்ப்பு, after = revocation suit. Evidence: Medical records, witnesses, handwriting expert. Burden of proof: Contestant.

instruction: Koviloda vevveru paguthigal enna?
output: Koviloda mukkiya paguthigal: 1) Gopuram - entrance tower, 2) Maha Dwaaram - main door, 3) Balipeedam - sacrificial altar, 4) Kodimaram - flag post, 5) Nandi/Vaahanam - deity's vehicle, 6) Mukhamandapam - front hall, 7) Artha Mandapam - intermediate hall, 8) Maha Mandapam - great hall, 9) Andharaalam - vestibule, 10) Garbhagriham/Karuvrai - sanctum sanctorum, 11) Prakaaram - circumambulatory path, 12) Kovil Kulam - temple tank.

instruction: Bogar ezhuthiya noolgal enna?
output: Bogaroda mukkiya noolgal: 1) Bogar 7000 - migapperiya nool, 7000 paadalgal, 2) Bogar Karpa Soothiram - rejuvenation medicine, 3) Bogar Vaiththiyam - maruththuvam, 4) Bogar Gnaanam - aanmeegam, 5) Bogar 12000 - virivana version, 6) Bogar Soothiram - formulas. Rasavaadham, maruththuvam, yoga ellam idhil ullana.

instruction: Aviation/Pilot training எங்கே படிப்பது? Cost எவ்வளவு?
output: Options: 1) Commercial Pilot License (CPL) - Flying schools 2) B.Sc Aviation 3) Air hostess/Cabin crew training. CPL institutes: Madras Flying Club, Rajiv Gandhi Aviation Academy. CPL cost: ₹25-40 lakh (high investment). Duration: 18 months - 2 years. Alternative: IAF through AFCAT/NDA (free training). Cabin crew: 6 months course, ₹1-2 lakh. Jobs with airlines after training.

instruction: Amma-vukku sugar adhigam, kaal la pun, enna doctor paarkanum? (Coimbatore style)
output: Diabetic foot ulcer - serious! Immediately: 1) General surgery or 2) Vascular surgery specialist. Don't delay - infection spread fast, amputation risk. Government: District hospital, medical college. Treatment: 1) Sugar control, 2) Wound care (daily dressing), 3) Antibiotics, 4) Maybe surgery. Prevention: 1) Daily foot check, 2) Proper footwear, 3) No walking barefoot, 4) Cut nails carefully. Coimbatore: CMC, GH has good diabetic foot care.

instruction: Home remedies eppodhu avoid pannanum?
output: Avoid home remedies when: 1) Serious symptoms (high fever, breathing difficulty, chest pain), 2) Symptoms lasting >2-3 days, 3) Children under 2 (many remedies not safe), 4) Pregnancy (many herbs contraindicated), 5) Taking prescription medicines (interactions), 6) Known allergies to ingredients, 7) Wounds with signs of infection (pus, spreading redness), 8) Chronic disease flare-up. Rule: Home remedies for minor, acute issues. Anything serious = doctor.

instruction: Siddhar samaadhigal engellam ullana?
output: Mukkiya siddhar samaadhigal: 1) Bogar - Pazhani, 2) Agathiyar - Podhigai Malai, Anuvi (Courtallam aruge), 3) Thirumoolar - Chidambaram, 4) Konganar - Tirupathi aruge, 5) Sattaimuni - Siruvachchoor, 6) Karuvoorar - Karuvoor (Karur), 7) Idaikaadar - Thiruvannamalai. Ovvoru samaadhiyilum special energy iruppathaga nambappadugiradhu.

instruction: Acid attack victim-kku enna rights/compensation?
output: Rights: 1) Free medical treatment (government hospitals), 2) Compensation: Rs.3 lakhs minimum (state victim compensation), 3) Disability pension, 4) Acid sale regulation - ID proof mandatory, 5) Fast track court trial. TN: CM's Public Relief Fund additional support. Accused: 10 years to life imprisonment. NGO support: Stop Acid Attacks, Chhanv Foundation.

instruction: Doctor death case-ல் என்ன compensation கிடைக்கும்?
output: Death case compensation: 1) Lost income (future earnings multiplied), 2) Funeral expenses, 3) Medical expenses before death, 4) Loss of consortium (spouse), 5) Loss of parental care (children), 6) Mental agony to family. Calculation: Age, income, dependents, life expectancy. Young earning member death: Higher compensation. Ceiling: No fixed limit - based on facts. Criminal: Separate from compensation.

instruction: Computer courses free-யாக எங்கே படிக்கலாம்?
output: Free computer training: 1) TNSDC IT courses - Web, Data entry, Tally 2) NIELIT (Government) - CCC, O Level 3) Digital India Programme - Basic computer 4) CSC (Common Service Centre) - Digital literacy 5) Library-based free classes. Online free: SWAYAM, NPTEL, Coursera (audit mode). Employment exchange computer labs free practice available. Apply through respective websites.

instruction: Police FIR போட மறுத்தால் என்ன செய்வது?
output: Options: 1) Written complaint கொடுத்து acknowledgment வாங்குங்க, 2) SP/DSP-க்கு complaint, 3) Judicial Magistrate-க்கு complaint (Section 156(3) CrPC), 4) State Human Rights Commission, 5) Online: tnpolice.gov.in. FIR மறுப்பது offence - police-க்கு action ஆகும்.

instruction: Call vandhuchu 'Samacheer kalvi book distribution issue. Teacher contribution 1500 for additional copies.' School books ku teacher pay pannumaa?
output: Textbook distribution is government responsibility, never requires teacher payment. Samacheer kalvi books distributed through education department. Contact BEO/DEO if any book shortage. This targets teachers' dedication to students - emotional manipulation.

instruction: Marriage Assistance Scheme endraal enna? Evvalavu kidaikkum?
output: Assistance for marriage of poor women. Amount: ₹25,000 (BC/MBC) to ₹50,000 (SC/ST) + 1 sovereign (8g) gold. Eligibility: Annual income below ₹72,000, bride 18+ years, extra ₹25,000 for degree holders. Apply: Taluk/DSW office, 40 days before marriage. Documents: Income certificate, Community certificate, Education certificate, Marriage invitation. Convert: Cash option instead of gold available.

instruction: ITI/Diploma holders-க்கு government jobs எவ்வளவு?
output: ITI holder jobs: 1) Railway Technician 2) TNEB Wireman/Lineman 3) Defence (Technical) 4) Ordinance Factory 5) PSU technician posts. Diploma holder jobs: 1) SSC JE (Junior Engineer) 2) RRB JE 3) TNPSC JA/AE 4) PWD Junior Engineer 5) PSU engineers. Salary: ITI ₹20,000-35,000, Diploma ₹35,000-60,000. Prepare: Technical subjects + General knowledge. Many vacancies yearly.

instruction: Avvaiyar Athiyamaanukku ezhuthiya paadalgal enna?
output: Sangam kaala Avvaiyar Athiyamaan Nedunchezhiyan endra mannaroda nerungiYa nanbar. Puranaanooru-vil avarukkaaga pala paadalgal paadiyuLLaar. Famous: 'Nellukku iraiththaa neer vaikkal vazhi odi pullukkkum aange posiyumaam' - nellukku thanni paaychum bodhu pullukkkum pogum, nallavargalukku udhavinaal avargal saarndhavargalukkum nanmai aagum. Athiyamaan nellikani kodutha kadhaiyum famous - neenda aayulukkaana pazham.

instruction: Medical negligence prove panna enna evidence venum?
output: Essential evidence: 1) Complete medical records (admission to discharge), 2) Prescription copies, 3) Test reports, 4) Bills (shows what was done), 5) Consent forms, 6) Photos if applicable, 7) Witness statements (family who were present), 8) Expert medical opinion. Preserve: Original documents, don't alter. Timeline: Note dates, times of events. Digital: Screenshots of online communications.

instruction: Chozhar venkala silaigal (Bronze sculptures) sirappu enna?
output: Chozhar kaalathu venkala silaigal ulaga pugazh petrravai. Lost wax technique (mezhugu neekkal murai) payanpaduththappattathu. Sirappugal: 1) Nataraja - migavum famous, cosmic dance, 2) Proportion perfection, 3) Dynamic poses, 4) Fine details, 5) Bronze alloy - centuries-aaga intact. Thanjavur Art Gallery, Chennai Museum-la collection ulladhu. Swamimalai (Kumbakonam aruge) indrum traditional bronze casting nadakkiradhu. GI tag petradhu.

instruction: Navapashaanam endraal enna? Pazhani silai eppadi seiyappattadhu?
output: Navapashaanam enbadhu 9 vagaiyaana minerals/poisons kalandha kalavai: 1) Vellai Paashaanam, 2) Kal Paashaanam, 3) Manosilai, 4) Kaavi, 5) Kandhagam, 6) Rasam (mercury), 7) Vedi uppu, 8) Ilingam, 9) Pooram. Ivattrai kurippittta vigithathil kalandhu, heat seidhu, Pazhani Murugan silai seiyappattathu endru nambappadugiradhu. Abhishekam seiyum bodhu idhu medicinal water aagudhu endru bhakthargal nambugiraargal.

instruction: Streedhan (woman's property) - husband eduthukalaamaa?
output: Streedhan = Woman's exclusive property (gifts at marriage, inheritance, earnings). Husband cannot: 1) Take without consent, 2) Sell or mortgage, 3) Claim ownership. Misuse: Criminal breach of trust (IPC 406) + Dowry Act violation if demand. Recovery: Civil suit + criminal complaint. Keep receipts, photos of jewelry. Joint locker: Inventory maintain pannunga.

instruction: Chennai-ல் free coaching centres எங்கே இருக்கு?
output: Free coaching Chennai: 1) Government Free Coaching Centre - Nungambakkam (UPSC, TNPSC) 2) Adi Dravidar Welfare coaching - Saidapet 3) BC/MBC coaching - Egmore 4) IAS Academy free batches - Anna Salai 5) Employment Exchange coaching - various locations. Apply: Respective department websites. Selection: Merit + income based. Also: Marina Library study hall, Connemara Library resources free.

instruction: TN அரசு websites என்னென்ன?
output: முக்கிய TN Government Portals: tn.gov.in (TN Govt main), tnpds.gov.in (Ration/PDS), cmchistn.com (Health Insurance), tnvelaivaaippu.gov.in (Employment), bcmbcmw.tn.gov.in (BC Welfare), adwb.tn.gov.in (SC/ST Welfare), tnhb.tn.gov.in (Housing Board), tangedco.gov.in (Electricity), tnreginet.gov.in (Registration), serviceonline.gov.in (e-Sevai). Mobile: UZHAVAN (Farmers), TNeGA (e-Governance).

instruction: Naanu transgender. College admission-la discrimination face pannuren. Enna pannalaam?
output: Your rights: 1) Transgender Persons Act 2019 - Equal education rights 2) Reservation for transgender in TN - 1% in education 3) Scholarship: Tamil Nadu Transgender Welfare Board scholarships 4) Discrimination complaint: National/State Human Rights Commission, UGC grievance. Support: Transgender welfare board, NGOs like Sangama, Nirangal. Legal help available. Don't give up - education is your right!

instruction: Scholarship எந்த websites-ல் தேடுவது?
output: முக்கிய websites: 1) scholarships.gov.in (NSP) - Government schemes 2) buddy4study.com - All scholarships aggregator 3) vidyalakshmi.co.in - Education loans + scholarships 4) respective state welfare department sites 5) University websites. Apps: Buddy4Study app, ScholarPlus. Set Google alerts for 'scholarship Tamil Nadu [year]'. Follow scholarship pages on social media.

instruction: Encumbrance Certificate (EC) எங்கே பெறுவது?
output: Online at tnreginet.gov.in (records from 1987 onwards) - instant download. Offline at Sub-Registrar Office - 3-5 days. Fee: ₹15 per year. Essential for property verification - shows if property has any legal dues or mortgages.

instruction: Veedu vadakaikku kodukka porein. Rent Agreement register seiyya venduma? Online seyyalamaa?
output:
**Rent Agreement Registration:**

**Mandatory?**
- Above 11 months: Registration mandatory
- Up to 11 months: Notarized enough (but register recommended)

**Why Register?**
- Legal validity, Court proof
- Easier tenant eviction
- Address proof for Passport/Bank

**Online Process:**
1. tnreginet.gov.in
2. E-stamping → Rent Agreement
3. Fill details (Landlord, Tenant, Property, Rent, Duration)
4. Pay stamp duty
5. Download e-stamp
6. Book SRO slot
7. Visit with parties + witnesses

**Costs:**
- Stamp Duty: 1% of (Annual Rent + Advance)
- Registration: 1%

**Example:** ₹15,000/month rent → ~₹4,200 total

**Documents:** Property document, Aadhaar, Photos, EB Bill, Tax receipt

**SRO Visit:** Both parties + 2 witnesses + Biometric

instruction: Banking மற்றும் Financial matters-ல் பொதுவான தவறுகள் என்ன?
output:
Bank Account:
❌ Jan Dhan-ல் minimum balance வேண்டும் → ✅ Zero balance account
❌ Nomination = Legal Heir → ✅ Nominee is trustee, not owner
❌ Joint Account holder-க்கு automatic rights → ✅ Either or Survivor clause check பண்ணுங்க

Insurance:
❌ PMJJBY/PMSBY auto-renew → ✅ Every year June 1-ல் renew, balance இருக்கணும்
❌ PMJJBY-ல் Suicide covered → ✅ முதல் year covered அல்ல
❌ PMSBY எல்லா accident-க்கும் → ✅ Permanent disability மட்டும்

Tax:
❌ Senior Citizens-க்கு tax இல்லை → ✅ ₹3 lakh வரை மட்டும் exempt (60-80)
❌ Agricultural income fully exempt → ✅ State tax apply ஆகலாம்
❌ PPF interest taxable → ✅ Fully exempt (EEE status)

Loan:
❌ Education loan-க்கு collateral கட்டாயம் → ✅ ₹7.5 lakh வரை collateral-free
❌ KCC interest 4% fixed → ✅ Timely repayment-க்கு மட்டும்

instruction: Flash sale-la order confirm aanadhu, piragu cancel pannitaanga - legal-aa?
output: Unilateral cancellation after confirmation unfair trade practice aagum. Consumer forum-la complaint podalam. Price difference + compensation ketkalam. 'Out of stock' excuse valid alla - stock management seller responsibility.

instruction: Telemedicine consultation legal-ஆ? Prescription valid-ஆ?
output: Legal! Telemedicine Practice Guidelines 2020. Valid for: 1) First consultation for non-emergency, 2) Follow-up consultations, 3) Second opinion. Prescription: Valid if signed digitally, has registration number. Limitations: 1) No controlled substances via telemedicine, 2) Physical exam needed cases - refer for in-person, 3) Emergency - not appropriate. Platforms: Practo, Tata 1mg, Apollo 247, government eSanjeevani.

instruction: 'Post Office Super Senior Citizen Scheme - Double your money in 3 years' nu pamphlet vandhudhu. Post office safe la, join pannalama ayya?
output: Post Office schemes money double pannave pannaadhu ayya - 3 years la impossible. Official schemes - SCSS, MIS - fixed returns only. Fake pamphlets senior citizens ku target pannuvaanga. Post office branch ku poi verify pannunga - random pamphlets trust pannaadheenga.

instruction: Two-wheeler-க்கு pillion rider helmet கட்டாயமா?
output: ஆம். Driver மற்றும் pillion rider இருவருக்கும் ISI marked helmet கட்டாயம். Fine: Rs.1,000 + 3 months license suspension (repeat offence). Children-க்கும் helmet வேண்டும். Fashion helmets not acceptable.

instruction: PhonePe/GPay/Paytm la fraud report eppidi pannuradhu?
output: PhonePe: App → Help → Report an Issue, or call 080-68727374, email support@phonepe.com. Google Pay: App → Help → 'Money sent to wrong person/scam', or call 1800-419-0157. Paytm: App → 24×7 Help → Fraud/Scam report, call 0120-4456456, email care@paytm.com. Amazon Pay: App → Help → 'Report unauthorized transaction', call 1800-3000-9009. BHIM: App → Profile → Help → Report Issue. For all UPI disputes: NPCI at npci.org.in for resolution if app doesn't help.

instruction: 12th முடிஞ்சாச்சு, வீட்ல college வேண்டாம், கல்யாணம் பண்ணிக்கோன்னு சொல்றாங்க. நான் படிக்கணும்.
output: Your education is your RIGHT! Support available: 1) Moovalur Ramamirtham - financial support for girl education 2) Free government college education 3) Women helpline: 181 4) District Women Protection Officer 5) NGOs: Pratham, CRY support. Convince family: Show scholarship opportunities, free education costs, earning potential after degree. Legal: Child Marriage Prevention Act (below 18 illegal). Study brings independence and better life. Don't give up your dreams!

instruction: Diabetes, BP-kku free medicine kidaikkumaa?
output: Yes! NCD (Non-Communicable Disease) Program. Free at: PHC, CHC, Government hospitals. Services: 1) Screening camps, 2) Blood sugar/BP check, 3) Basic medicines (Metformin, Amlodipine, etc.), 4) Diet counseling, 5) Regular monitoring. NCD clinics: Dedicated clinics at larger centres. Insulin: Available at district hospitals. Register: Health ID (ABHA) helps track records.

instruction: Juvenile home-la irundhen. Ippo padikka chance irukkaa?
output: Yes, absolutely! Rehabilitation includes education: 1) Continuation of education during detention 2) NIOS for school completion 3) Skill training provided 4) After release: Regular school/college admission possible 5) No mandatory disclosure of juvenile record. Support: Juvenile Justice Board, NGOs, Social Welfare Department. Records sealed - fresh start possible. Many have rebuilt lives through education. You deserve a second chance!

instruction: Hydrotherapy treatments ennenna?
output: Water treatments: 1) Hip bath (pelvic area) - digestive, urinary issues, 2) Spinal bath - spine problems, stress, 3) Arm/foot bath - circulation, 4) Steam bath - detox, skin, 5) Enema - colon cleansing, 6) Wet pack - fever, inflammation, 7) Hot and cold compress. Home: Alternate hot-cold shower, foot bath. Centre: Full treatments under supervision. Benefits: Circulation, toxin removal, pain relief. Caution: Heart patients, BP - consult before.

instruction: TN-ல் விதை/உரம் மானியம் எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: விவசாயிகளுக்கு subsidized விதை/உரம். Seed Subsidy: 50% discount on certified seeds, Agriculture dept office-ல் வாங்கலாம். Fertilizer Subsidy: Urea, DAP, MOP subsidized விலையில். UZHAVAN Card: Subsidy track, eligibility check. Distribution: Co-operative societies, Agri office. Documents: Patta, Farmer ID, Aadhaar. Season: Sowing season-க்கு முன் announce.

instruction: First generation graduate scholarship eppadi peruvathu?
output: Scheme: Parents yarumae degree padikkaadha family-oda mudhal graduate-ku. Amount: ₹2,000-5,000/year + fee concession. Eligibility: 1) Parents non-graduate certificate (Tahsildar) 2) Income ₹2 lakh kizha 3) UG course. Apply: College scholarship committee moolam. Documents: Parents education declaration, income certificate, community certificate, Aadhaar.

instruction: Senior citizen-ஐ பிள்ளைகள் பார்க்கல, maintenance கேட்கலாமா?
output: Maintenance and Welfare of Parents and Senior Citizens Act 2007: 1) Children/relatives maintenance தரணும், 2) Tribunal: SDM/Collector level, 3) Max: Rs.10,000/month per child, 4) Non-compliance: 1 month jail + fine. Property transfer-க்கு பின் neglect: Transfer cancel பண்ணலாம். Free legal aid: District Legal Services Authority. Helpline: 14567 (Elder helpline).

instruction: Mutual consent divorce evvalavu time aagum?
output: Minimum 6 months, maximum 18 months. Process: 1) Joint petition file, 2) 6 months cooling-off period, 3) Second motion, 4) Decree. 2023 Supreme Court ruling: Genuine cases-la 6 months waive aagalam. Contested divorce: 2-5 years.

instruction: UZHAVAN App endraal enna? Enna services ulladhu?
output: Single app for TN farmers. Services: Crop insurance apply, KCC loan status, Subsidy schemes apply, Weather updates, Market prices (UZHAVAR SANDHAI rates), Expert advice. Download: Play Store - UZHAVAN. Registration: Aadhaar + farmer ID. Alerts: SMS/notification for govt schemes, weather warning. Offline: Basic info works offline. Language: Tamil + English.

instruction: Government school student NEET crack panna mudiyumaa?
output: Absolutely yes! 7.5% reservation + determination = success. Resources: 1) Free coaching - Government NEET centres (apply through school) 2) Online free - NPTEL, SWAYAM, YouTube 3) NCERT books sufficient for Biology 4) Previous year papers - NTA website free. Success stories: Many govt school students top NEET. Challenges: English medium switch, lab exposure. Solutions: Tamil medium NEET option available, virtual labs online. Believe in yourself!

instruction: Semester exam-ku last minute preparation tips?
output: Last week strategy: 1) Previous year papers - pattern identify 2) Important questions list make 3) Short notes revise, not new topics 4) Formula sheets ready 5) Sleep properly - memory consolidation 6) Light food, hydration 7) Morning revision of previous day 8) Group discussion for doubt clearing 9) Hall ticket, stationery ready. Avoid: All-night study, new topics, junk food, negative people. Trust your preparation!

instruction: Drunk driving-kku enna punishment?
output: Blood alcohol limit: 30mg/100ml. First offence: Rs.10,000 fine + 6 months imprisonment. Second offence (3 years-la): Rs.15,000 + 2 years imprisonment. License suspension: 3 months - 1 year. Accident caused: Additional charges - up to 10 years imprisonment.

instruction: 274 Paadal Petra Sthalangal endraal enna?
output: 63 Nayanmaarkalaal (Saiva bhakthargal) Thevaram, Thiruvasagam aagiyavattril paadappatta 274 Sivan kovilgal. Ivattril perumbaalaanavai Tamil Nadu-la. 'Muththu Thiruppathigam' endru sirappup peyar. Thevaram - Sambandhar, Sundarar, Appar paadiyathu. Thiruvasagam - Manikkavasagar paadiyathu. Ovvoru kovilukkum sirappaana sthalapurana (history) undu.

instruction: Insurance claim reject aachu, appeal eppadi?
output: Steps: 1) Rejection reason writing-la kelunga, 2) Grievance to Insurance Company (Grievance Officer), 3) 15 days-kkul response illa = IRDAI IGMS portal (igms.irda.gov.in), 4) Still no resolution = Insurance Ombudsman (free, no lawyer needed), 5) Final option: Consumer Forum. Health insurance: TPA issues common - escalate to insurer directly.

instruction: Madhiya Unavu Thittam (Mid-day Meal) pathi sollunga. En paiyan saappiduvana?
output: Mid-day Meal Scheme: Government school students-ku free healthy lunch. Class 1-8 varai anaivarukum. Menu: Rice, dal, vegetables, egg (weekly 3 times), fruit. Cooking school-layae. Quality food - district officials inspect pannuvanga. Children grow healthy. Attendance increases. School-la serthaal automatic-aa kidaikkum.

instruction: Free laptop scheme-ku eppadi apply seivathu?
output: TN Government Free Laptop Scheme: College 1st year students-ku. Auto-selection based on: 1) Government/Aided college admission 2) +2 marks 3) Community (SC/ST/BC/MBC priority). Process: College alikkum list adippadiyil distribution. Thaniya apply seiya thevayillai. Laptop worth: ₹15,000-20,000. Pre-loaded educational software irukkum. Service warranty 3 years.

instruction: Oru call vandhuchchi saami - 'Unga account block aairum, KYC update pannunga urgent aa' nu. OTP kekkuraanga. Enna seyyanum?
output: Fraud saami idhu. Bank phone la OTP kekkave kekaadhu. 'Urgent' 'block aairum' nu bayamudhudhuraanga parunga. Branch ku neenga poi pesunganna. Phone la details kudukkaadhenga. Gandhipuram la businessmen ipdi maatikirukkanga.

instruction: New customer WhatsApp la contact panninaan yi - '10 lakh order, advance transfer pannuren' nu QR anuppinaan. Scan pannalaama yi?
output: Pannaadheyyi! QR scan panna nee KUDUKKA dhaan mudiyum yi, vaanga mudiyaadhu. Erode textile hub aachhu la, scammers specifically target pannuraanga yi. 'Big order' excitement la maatikkaadhe. LC through illana cash verify panni dhaan deal pannu yi.

instruction: Blood transfusion-ல் wrong blood கொடுத்தாங்க - action என்ன?
output: Serious negligence! Life-threatening error. Blood bank + hospital liable. Action: 1) Medical records + blood bank records collect, 2) Consumer Forum, 3) Criminal case if death/serious injury, 4) Blood bank license complaint (State Blood Transfusion Council). Protocols violated: Blood matching, cross-matching, identification. Compensation: High - can be fatal mistake.

instruction: Tinder/Bumble la match aanaen - 2 months pesinom, 'stuck abroad, wallet stolen, 20,000 need for hotel, will return when back.' Photos, video calls - genuine feel aagudhu.
output: Classic romance scam pattern. Video calls - pre-recorded or accomplice. 'Emergency abroad' - untraceable request. 2 months investment creates emotional bond - hard to say no. NEVER send money to people you haven't met in person. If genuine, they have other options - embassy, family.

instruction: தஞ்சாவூர் ஓவியம் என்றால் என்ன?
output: தஞ்சாவூர் ஓவியம் - தமிழ்நாட்டின் traditional painting style. 16th century-ல் Nayak period-ல் develop ஆனது. சிறப்புகள்: 1) Gold foil work - relief, 3D effect, 2) Semi-precious stones embedded, 3) Vibrant colors, 4) Hindu gods, goddesses themes, 5) Wooden base with cloth coating. GI (Geographical Indication) tag பெற்றது. Prices: ₹500 (small) to ₹50,000+ (large). Thanjavur-ல் நிறைய shops. Wedding gift-ஆக popular. Museum quality pieces collectors buy பண்றாங்க.

instruction: Naan Online-la Products vikkiren. GST Registration eppo kattaayam? Eppadi register seyvadhu?
output:
**GST for E-commerce:**

**When Mandatory?**
- E-commerce seller: ₹0 threshold - Need GST before first sale!
- Regular goods: ₹40 lakh
- Services: ₹20 lakh

**Registration Process:**

**Step 1:** gst.gov.in → New Registration → PAN/Mobile/Email verify → Get TRN

**Step 2:** Fill Part B - Business details, Address, Bank account

**Step 3: Documents**
- PAN, Aadhaar
- Address proof (Own: EB Bill / Rent: Agreement + NOC)
- Bank Statement / Cheque
- Photo

**Step 4:** Aadhaar OTP verification

**Step 5:** GSTIN in 3-7 days (FREE)

**After Registration:**
- Issue GST invoices
- File monthly returns
- Pay by 20th of next month

**Warning:** No registration = 10% penalty or ₹10,000

instruction: Kitchen herbs-ன் medicinal uses என்ன?
output: Common kitchen medicines: 1) Turmeric - Antiseptic, anti-inflammatory, immunity, 2) Ginger - Digestion, nausea, cold, 3) Pepper - Cold, metabolism, 4) Cumin - Digestion, iron source, 5) Coriander - Cooling, digestion, 6) Curry leaves - Diabetes, hair health, 7) Fenugreek - Blood sugar, lactation, 8) Garlic - Heart, infection, 9) Tulsi - Immunity, respiratory, 10) Neem - Skin, blood purifier. Daily use: Prevention better than cure!

instruction: Anger control panna mudiyavillai - endha kural udhavum?
output: 'Sinam ennum serndhaaraik kolli inam ennum emappunaiyai sudum'. Kobam enbadhu nammai serndhavargalaiyae (kudumbam, nanbargal) azhikkum. Melum: 'Aaruvadhu sinam' (Aathichudi) - kobatthai aaravidungal. Count to 10, take deep breaths, walk away. Anger hurts YOU more than others.

instruction: Bail bond amount எவ்வளவு இருக்கும்?
output: Offence severity based - Rs.10,000 to lakhs வரை. Court discretion. Surety (guarantor) same amount-க்கு guarantee கொடுக்கணும். Poor accused-க்கு personal bond (surety இல்லாம) கிடைக்கும். Excessive bail unconstitutional.

instruction: Minor child-kku yaar consent kodukkanum?
output: Parents/legal guardians. Rules: 1) Both parents equal right (married), 2) Single parent: That parent, 3) Guardian: Court-appointed guardian, 4) Emergency: Hospital can proceed without consent (life-saving), 5) Mature minor doctrine: 16+ may consent to some treatments. Conflict between parents: Court decides best interest of child. Orphan/abandoned: Child Welfare Committee.

instruction: Naan gramathula pengal Self Help Group (SHG) aarambikka virumburen. Eppadi register seyvadhu?
output:
**Starting SHG - Step by Step:**

**Step 1: Form Group**
- 10-20 women (same village/area)
- Like-minded people
- Age: 18-60

**Step 2: Start Meetings**
- Weekly meeting
- Small savings (₹50-100/week)
- Maintain minutes book

**Step 3: Open Bank Account**
- Show 3-month meeting records
- Joint account (President + Secretary)

**Step 4: Mahalir Thittam Registration**
- Where: Block Development Office
- TNSRLM
- Website: tnrd.gov.in

**Benefits:**
1. Revolving Fund: ₹15,000 (grant)
2. CIF: ₹50,000-1,00,000
3. Bank Loan: Up to ₹10 lakh
4. Free training
5. Market access

instruction: NEEDS (New Entrepreneur-cum-Enterprise Development Scheme) என்றால் என்ன?
output: இளைஞர்களுக்கு சுய தொழில் loan. Amount: ₹5 லட்சம் வரை (Project cost-ல் 25% subsidy). தகுதி: 21-35 வயது (SC/ST/Women 45 வரை), 8th pass, TN resident. Sectors: Manufacturing, Service, Trading. Subsidy: General 25%, SC/ST/Women 30%. Training: Free EDP training mandatory. Apply: DIC (District Industries Centre). Documents: Project report, Education proof, Community certificate, Bank no-objection. Repayment: 3-7 years.

instruction: Lock-out period-ல் rent கட்டணுமா?
output: Lock-in period (not lock-out): Agreement-ல் specify பண்ணிருக்கும். During lock-in: 1) Tenant vacate பண்ணினால் - remaining months rent pay பண்ணணும், 2) Owner evict பண்ண முடியாது. After lock-in: Normal notice period applies (usually 1-2 months). Negotiate: Lock-in waiver possible with mutual consent. Always read agreement before signing!

instruction: Rent Authority-ல் complaint எப்படி கொடுப்பது?
output: District Collectorate office-ல் written application கொடுக்கணும். Required documents: 1) Rental agreement copy, 2) Rent receipts, 3) Communication proof (notices, messages), 4) ID proof. Online-லும் e-district portal மூலம் apply செய்யலாம். Fee: Nominal (Rs.100-500).

instruction: TN-la free house site patta eppadi peruvadhu?
output: Free house site for poor. Eligibility: Houseless poor families, BPL card holder, No land ownership. Size: 2-3 cents (varies by area). Process: Apply at Panchayat/Taluk office, List published, Selection, Registration. Documents: Income certificate, Family card, Aadhaar, No property certificate. Priority: SC/ST, Widows, Differently abled. PMAY-G: ₹1.2 lakh + state share for house construction.

instruction: PMKVY scheme enna?
output: Central Government skill scheme. Features: 1) Free training - 200+ job roles 2) Certification - NSDC recognized 3) ₹500-2,000 reward on certification 4) Placement support 5) Recognition of Prior Learning (RPL) - existing skills-ku certificate. Duration: 150-300 hours. Training centers: Skill India centres across TN. Register: www.pmkvyofficial.org. Age: 15-45 years. 10th pass preferred.

instruction: Tree cut பண்ண permission வேணுமா?
output: ஆம். TN Forest Act + TN Preservation of Private Forests Act. Permission: District Forest Officer (forest land), Corporation/Municipality (urban area). Violations: Fine + imprisonment. Protected species: Sandalwood, Rosewood - strict restrictions. Compensatory plantation required.

instruction: PM Krishi Sinchayee Yojana (PMKSY) என்றால் என்ன?
output: நீர் பாசன விரிவாக்க திட்டம். Components: Har Khet Ko Pani (நீர் கிடைக்கச் செய்ய), Per Drop More Crop (Micro irrigation - Drip/Sprinkler, 55% subsidy), Watershed Development. Benefit: Drip irrigation-க்கு 55% subsidy, நீர் சேமிப்பு 30-50%, yield increase 20-40%. Apply: Agriculture Department/Horticulture Department. Micro Irrigation Fund: ₹5,000 crore for states. Water Sources: Bore well, farm pond, check dam support.

instruction: TNPDS Online Services - Ration card apply, name add/remove, address change?
output:
All services at: tnpds.gov.in

New Ration Card:
1. tnpds.gov.in → 'New Card Application'
2. Enter family details
3. Upload: All Aadhaar, Address proof, Income certificate, Gas details, Photos
4. Submit → RI inspection → Card issue (30-45 days)

Add Name (Birth/Marriage):
1. tnpds.gov.in → 'Add Member'
2. Select card number
3. Enter new member details
4. Upload: Birth/Marriage Certificate + Aadhaar
5. Submit → Verification → Approval (15-30 days)

Remove Name (Death/Transfer):
1. tnpds.gov.in → 'Delete Member'
2. Select card and member
3. Reason: Death/Transferred/Left
4. Upload: Death Certificate (if death)
5. Submit → Approval (15 days)

Address Change:
1. tnpds.gov.in → 'Address Modification'
2. Enter new address
3. Upload new address proof
4. Submit → Inspection → Shop change if different area (30-45 days)

Change Card Type (NPHH to PHH):
- Apply at Taluk Office with new Income Certificate

Track: tnpds.gov.in → 'Application Status'

instruction: e-NAM என்றால் என்ன? எப்படி பயனடைவது?
output: Electronic National Agriculture Market. Online trading platform - இந்தியா முழுவதும் விற்கலாம். Benefit: நல்ல விலை கிடைக்கும், middlemen குறையும், transparent bidding. Register: enam.gov.in, அருகிலுள்ள e-NAM mandi. Process: Produce → Quality testing → Online auction → Highest bidder wins → Payment to bank. TN-ல்: UZHAVAR SANDHAIS connected. Quality Parameters: Moisture, foreign matter, damaged grains-க்கு grade.

instruction: TNPSC Group 1/2/4 - enna viththiyaasam? Edhu easy?
output: Groups comparison: Group 4 - 10th/12th pass, Clerk/Typist posts, easiest. Group 2/2A - Degree, Assistant/Accountant posts, medium. Group 1 - Degree, DSP/Deputy Collector, hardest. Exam pattern: All MCQ. Syllabus: 6th-12th TN textbooks + Current affairs. Group 4: 1.5 lakh+ applicants, 5000+ posts. Group 1: 50,000 applicants, 50-100 posts. Start with Group 4, then progress. Same preparation works for all.

instruction: Common Ayurvedic medicines - uses என்ன?
output: Popular medicines: 1) Triphala - Digestion, detox, constipation, 2) Ashwagandha - Stress, energy, immunity, 3) Brahmi - Memory, concentration, 4) Chyawanprash - General tonic, immunity, 5) Guggulu - Cholesterol, joints, weight, 6) Dashamoola - Pain, inflammation, 7) Kumkumadi Thailam - Skin glow. Available: Pharmacies, AYUSH stores. Self-use: Some general tonics okay. Specific treatment: Need doctor consultation.

instruction: Cosmetic surgery gone wrong - refund/compensation கிடைக்குமா?
output: Trickier than medical treatment cases. Issues: 1) Subjective expectations, 2) Inherent risks, 3) No guaranteed outcomes. Claim if: 1) Promised results not delivered, 2) Complications due to negligence, 3) Unqualified surgeon, 4) No proper consent. Proof: Before/after photos, advertisements/promises made, consent form, expert opinion. Consumer Forum: Deficiency in service.

instruction: WhatsApp message vandhuchu 'Your GitHub account reported for copyright violation. Verify identity within 24 hours or account suspended. Click link.' GitHub account work ku important, verify pannalama?
output: GitHub sends violations to registered email, not WhatsApp! Check github.com directly for any notifications. This phishing attempt wants your GitHub credentials - once stolen, attackers can access all your repositories and inject malicious code.

instruction: Shop employee rights என்ன?
output: TN Shops and Establishments Act: 1) 8 hours work/day, 48 hours/week, 2) Weekly off mandatory, 3) Leave: 12 days earned + 12 days sick + 5 casual, 4) Overtime double wages, 5) No child labour (<14 years). Violation: Labour Inspector complaint.

instruction: Hospital body thara marukkiradhu - death case
output: Bill non-payment-kkaaga body thara marukka mudiyaadhu - Supreme Court ruling. Contact: Police, District Collector, Human Rights Commission. Hospital against action possible. MLC case-la police formalities undu - legitimate delay. But payment reason illegal.

instruction: COD order reject pannalaamaa? Penalty irukkaa?
output: Product open pannama reject pannalam - penalty illa. Aanaal repeated COD rejection seydhaal account block aagalam. Product damaged/wrong na kandippaaga reject pannunga, delivery person munnaal video edunga.

instruction: Spam calls/SMS stop பண்ண என்ன செய்யணும்?
output: DND registration: 1909 call/SMS அல்லது TRAI DND app. Complaint: 1909-ல் spam report. DND-க்குப் பிறகும் spam வந்தால் company-க்கு Rs.1,000/violation fine. Truecaller-type apps-ல் report. Bank/company opt-out options use பண்ணுங்க.

instruction: 'Azhukkaaru avaa veguli' - theeya gunangal patriya kural enna?
output: Kural: 'Azhukkaaru avaaveguli innaachol naangum izhukkaarau iyandradhu il'. Artham: 1) Azhukkaaru (jealousy), 2) Avaa (greed), 3) Veguli (anger), 4) Innaachol (harsh words) - indha naangum illadhavan ozhukkamaanavan. Four enemies of good character!

instruction: TNPSC-க்கு Free Coaching எங்கே கிடைக்கும்?
output:
**TNPSC Free Coaching Centers:**

**1. Government Free Coaching:**

**a) TNSF (TN Science Forum):**
- Free TNPSC coaching
- Residential programs
- For SC/ST/MBC students
- Apply: tnsf.org.in

**b) Dr. Ambedkar Free Coaching:**
- For SC/ST students
- All TNPSC groups
- District-level centers
- Apply: adwelfare.tn.gov.in

**c) BC/MBC Free Coaching:**

- All districts available
- Apply: bcmbcmw.tn.gov.in

**d) Minorities Free Coaching:**

- Apply: tamilnaduminoritywelfare.org

**2. University Free Coaching:**

- Madras University

- For students & alumni

**3. District Collector Coaching:**

- Apply through Collectorate

**4. NGO/Trust Coaching:**

instruction: Fine Arts படிச்சா future என்ன?
output: BFA (Bachelor of Fine Arts): 4 years. Specializations: Painting, Sculpture, Applied Art, Graphic Design. Colleges: Govt College of Fine Arts Chennai, Kumbakonam. Jobs: Art galleries, Advertising agencies, Film industry (Art director), Teaching, Freelance artist. Digital art growing field. Salary varies widely: ₹15,000-1 lakh+ based on skill and reputation. Portfolio and networking crucial.

instruction: Women entrepreneurs-க்கு special schemes உள்ளதா?
output: Women-specific schemes: 1) Stand-Up India - ₹10 lakh to ₹1 crore (SC/ST/Women) 2) Mudra Yojana - Women priority 3) TANSIDCO - Women Entrepreneurship Programme 4) State Industries Department - 30% subsidy 5) TNCDW (Corporation for Development of Women) - interest-free loans. Training: TNSDC women skill programmes, TRYSEM. Self-help groups மூலமும் loans available. Apply: Respective department websites.

instruction: Subletting pannalaamaa? Owner-kku theriyaama pannina enna aagum?
output: Agreement check pannunga - usually subletting prohibited. Without permission subletting: 1) Agreement breach, 2) Immediate eviction ground, 3) Deposit forfeit possibility. Commercial property: Subletting common but written permission venum. Safe approach: Owner consent in writing vaangunga before subletting.

instruction: Pregnant women-kku enna free schemes irukku?
output: TN schemes: 1) Dr. Muthulakshmi Maternity Benefit Scheme - Rs.18,000 cash assistance, 2) Free delivery at government hospitals, 3) Free antenatal checkups, 4) Iron/folic acid tablets free, 5) Free ultrasound scans, 6) 102 ambulance for transport, 7) Post-delivery nutrition support. Register: PHC/Government hospital within first trimester. Amma Baby Care Kit: Free baby items.

instruction: EC (Encumbrance Certificate) enga peruvadhu?
output: Online: tnreginet.gov.in (1987 onwards available). Offline: Sub-registrar office. Fee: ₹15 per year. Time: Online instant, offline 3-5 days.

instruction: Government hostel-ல் seat எப்படி கிடைக்கும்?
output: Process: 1) Apply through college/department 2) Priority: Distance from home, family income, caste category 3) Documents: Income certificate, nativity, distance proof 4) BC/MBC/SC/ST welfare hostels - apply through respective departments 5) Working women's hostel - separate application. Fees: Government hostel very subsidized (₹100-500/month). Free for eligible SC/ST. Apply early - seats limited. Waiting list exists.

instruction: Online resources effectively use panrathu eppadi?
output: Best free resources: 1) NPTEL - IIT professors lectures 2) SWAYAM - certificate courses 3) Khan Academy - basics strong 4) YouTube - Physics Wallah, Unacademy 5) MIT OpenCourseWare - advanced topics 6) Coursera audit mode - free learning 7) Google Scholar - research papers 8) LibGen - textbooks (use responsibly). Tip: Schedule online study time, avoid distraction rabbit holes. Download for offline access.

instruction: Pradhan Mantri Jeevan Jyoti Bima Yojana (PMJJBY) enna?
output: Life Insurance scheme. Premium: Only ₹436 per year. Coverage: ₹2 lakh (on death). Age: 18-55 years. Eligibility: Those with Jan Dhan/Savings Account. How to join: Fill form at Bank, Give auto-debit consent. Renews every June 1

instruction: Marriage-la mental illness ground for divorce-aa?
output: Complex issue. Law: Mental disorder is a ground under Hindu Marriage Act, but: 1) Must be incurable/very severe, 2) Must be before marriage or continuous after, 3) Court considers treatment possibility, 4) Living together impossible. Safeguards: 1) Medical evidence needed, 2) Treatment efforts considered, 3) Maintenance rights protected. Progressive interpretation: Courts increasingly protective of mentally ill spouse.

instruction: TN Helpline Numbers என்னென்ன?
output: முக்கிய TN Helplines: 1967 (Ration complaints), 1077 (CM Helpline), 108 (Emergency Ambulance), 104 (Health Helpline), 100 (Police), 101 (Fire), 1091 (Women Helpline), 1098 (Child Helpline - Childline), 181 (Women Helpline - central), 1912 (Anti-Corruption), 155300 (Cyber Crime), 14461 (Kisan Call Centre), 1800-180-1111 (Pensioners). Free: Most are toll-free 24x7.

instruction: Domicile certificate vs Nativity certificate - என்ன difference?
output: Nativity: Born in Tamil Nadu என்று prove. Issued by: Tahsildar. For: Reservation benefits, state quota seats. Domicile: Residing in state for specified period (usually 5+ years). For: Some central institution admissions. Both different! Don't confuse. TN admissions mostly need: Nativity OR studied in TN for specific years (varies by counselling). Documents: Birth certificate, school TC, Aadhaar showing TN address.

instruction: Antibiotics எல்லா infection-க்கும் வேலை செய்யுமா?
output: NO! Antibiotics only for: Bacterial infections. Useless for: Viral infections (cold, flu, most fevers, COVID). Problem: Overuse = antibiotic resistance (serious global threat). When needed: Doctor decides based on examination/tests. Don't: 1) Self-prescribe antibiotics, 2) Demand antibiotics for every fever, 3) Stop course early. Most colds/fevers: Viral - need rest, fluids, paracetamol only.

instruction: TN-ல் Govt Hospital-ல் என்ன இலவசமாக கிடைக்கும்?
output: TN Govt Hospitals-ல் அனைத்தும் இலவசம். Free Services: OPD consultation, All tests (Blood, X-ray, CT, MRI), Medicines, Surgery, ICU, Dialysis, Cancer treatment. Specialty: Govt Medical College Hospitals-ல் advanced treatment. 108 Ambulance: Emergency-க்கு இலவசம். Referral: PHC → GH → Medical College Hospital chain. CGHS/ESIC: Central employees-க்கு separate.

instruction: DDU-GKY (Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Grameen Kaushalya Yojana) endraal enna?
output: Skill Training + Placement for rural youth. Eligibility: 15-35 years (up to 45 for SC/ST), BPL/Low income family, rural. Training: Minimum 576 hours, Residential (food/stay free). Sectors: IT, Healthcare, Retail, Hospitality, Automotive. Placement: 70% mandatory placement, ₹6,000+ salary. Incentive: Bonus for employment within 3 months of training. Apply: Gram Panchayat, Block office, ddugky.gov.in

instruction: Sleeping pills vaanga prescription venumaa?
output: Yes! Most sleeping pills = Schedule H1/X - strict prescription control. Schedule H1: Alprazolam, Clonazepam, etc. - prescription + ID proof + register entry. Schedule X: Stronger sedatives - even stricter. Why: Addiction potential, misuse risk, suicide risk. Alternative: Melatonin (less restricted), lifestyle changes. Doctor: Will evaluate sleep issue cause first.

instruction: UZHAVAN App என்றால் என்ன? என்ன services உள்ளது?
output: TN விவசாயிகளுக்கான ஒரே App. Services: Crop insurance apply, KCC loan status, Subsidy schemes apply, Weather updates, Market prices (UZHAVAR SANDHAI rates), Expert advice. Download: Play Store - UZHAVAN. Registration: Aadhaar + farmer ID. Alerts: SMS/notification for govt schemes, weather warning. Offline: Basic info works offline. Language: Tamil + English.

instruction: Instagram ad - 'Made 10 lakhs in 3 months with crypto trading bot, DM for access.' Friend um try pannaan, initial la profit vandhudhu nu sonnaan.
output: Initial profits = their own money returning, creates trust. 'Trading bot' access ku investment keppanga. Friend um eventually lose pannuvaan - Ponzi structure. Crypto invest pannanum na - Binance, WazirX legitimate exchanges use pannunga, 'bots' and 'signals' avoid.

instruction: Nandri (gratitude) patri enna kuralgal ullana?
output: Kural: 'Seiyaamal seidha uthavikku vaiyagamum vaanagamum aatral aridhu'. Edhirpaarkkamal yaaro seidha uthavikku bhoomiyum sorgamum kooda eedaagaadhu. Melum: 'Kaalaththinaal seidha nandri siRidheninum gnaalaththin maanap peridhu'. Right time-la seidha siriya uthaviyum ulagathai vida periyadu.

instruction: Doctor-மேல் complaint போட எங்கே போகணும்?
output: Tamil Nadu Medical Council (TNMC): For registered doctors. Address: 914, EVR Periyar Salai, Kilpauk, Chennai-10. Process: 1) Written complaint with evidence, 2) Inquiry by Council, 3) Hearing, 4) Action: Warning, suspension, removal from register. Timeline: 6 months - 2 years. Alternative: Consumer Forum for compensation. Criminal: Police if criminal negligence.

instruction: Income certificate enge vaanguvadhu? Online-la apply pannalaamaa?
output: Online apply: www.tnedistrict.tn.gov.in or e-Sevai centres. Offline: VAO → RI → Tahsildar. Documents: Aadhaar, ration card, employment proof (if any), self-declaration for non-employed. Time: 7-15 working days. Fee: ₹10-50. Validity: Usually 1 year, some schemes accept older. Types: Annual income certificate, income certificate for specific scheme. Tip: Apply in advance before scholarship deadline.

instruction: HDFC Bank Parivartan's ECSS scholarship enna?
output: Educational Crisis Scholarship Support (ECSS): Financial crisis-la ulla students-ku. Amount: Up to ₹75,000. Eligibility: Family crisis (death, illness, job loss), income ₹6 lakh kizha, 55%+ marks. Covers: School/College fee. Apply: www.hdfcbankecss.com. Documents: Crisis proof, income proof, marks, Aadhaar. One-time emergency support.

instruction: College-ku poga budget illa da. Free-ya padikka mudiyuma?
output: Mudiyum da! Government colleges-la fees romba kammi - yearly ₹1000-5000 only. Scholarship apply pannu - BC/MBC/SC/ST full scholarship kidaikkum. Distance education - IGNOU, TNOU almost free. Skill training - TNSDC 100% free. Padikka aasai irundhaa vazhi irukku!

instruction: Old Age Pension TN-la eppadi apply pannuvadhu?
output:
Eligibility: Age 60+, BPL/Low income, No other pension, TN resident

Amount: 60-79 years: ₹1,000/month | 80+: ₹1,500/month

Apply:

Method 1 - Online:
1. tneservices.tn.gov.in → 'Social Security Pension'
2. Register with mobile
3. Select: Old Age Pension
4. Fill application
5. Upload documents
6. Submit

Method 2 - Offline:
1. Taluk/Block Office pogga
2. Application form vaangunga
3. Fill pannunga
4. Documents attach
5. Submit with acknowledgment

Documents:
- Age Proof (Aadhaar/Voter ID/Birth Certificate)
- Address Proof
- Income Certificate (< ₹24,000/year)
- Ration Card
- Bank Passbook (first page)
- 2 Passport photos

Process: Application → Field verification (VAO/RI) → Tahsildar approval → Sanction → Monthly DBT

Time: 30-60 days
Status: tneservices.tn.gov.in → Track Application

instruction: Employer notice illaama terminate pannalaamaa?
output: Mudiyaadhu (except gross misconduct). Notice period: Agreement-la ullapadiye (usually 1-3 months). Notice illaattal notice pay kodukkanum. Probation period-lum reasonable notice venum. Termination reason writing-la kelunga.

instruction: Bank Jobs-க்கு என்னென்ன exams இருக்கு? Eligibility என்ன?
