instruction: Tirupati darshan ku donation pannunga nu call vandhuchchi ayyaa. TTD la irundhu nu sonnanga ayyaa.
output: TTD phone la donation kekkaadhu ayyaa! Official website la mattum pannunga. Phone call scam ayyaa, paisa pogum.

instruction: Machan, PhonePe la issue, Google la number search panni call potten. AnyDesk install pannu remote la fix pannidurom nu solraanga. Panna okay va?
output: Dai NO! Google la fake numbers ad la varum da. AnyDesk kuduthaa unga phone full aa paappaanga - banking app open panni kaasu thookiduvaanga. Customer care number app la irundhu dhaan edukanam. Google search result trust pannaadhada.

instruction: விவசாய குடும்ப மாணவர்களுக்கு சிறப்பு scholarship உள்ளதா?
output: Agriculture family scholarships: 1) IFFCO Scholarship - ₹25,000/ஆண்டு 2) Kotak Kisan - ₹10,000-30,000 3) TNAU free education for farmers' children 4) Agriculture Department scholarships. Eligibility: Farmer certificate from VAO, small/marginal farmer category. Priority in agriculture courses. Krishi Vigyan Kendra (KVK) free training available. Apply through Agriculture office or online portals.

instruction: Mediation vs Arbitration enna difference?
output: Mediation: Neutral person facilitates, parties decide, non-binding. Arbitration: Arbitrator decides, binding like court order, faster. Pre-litigation mediation: Compulsory for some cases. Arbitration agreement: Contract-la clause irukkanum. Both: Court-ai vida faster, cheaper.

instruction: Court-ல case போட பயமா இருக்கு, வேற option இல்லையா?
output: Alternatives: 1) Lok Adalat - free, quick, 2) Mediation centre - court-attached, 3) Consumer forum - simple procedure, 4) Labour Commissioner - workplace issues, 5) Legal Services Authority - free guidance. எல்லாமே Court-ஐ விட easy-யும் cheap-உம்.

instruction: Consumer complaint-kku lawyer venumaa?
output: Vendaam. Consumer forum-la neengale directly case nadathalaam. Simple procedure, no court fee for claims up to Rs.5 lakh. Complex cases-kku lawyer udhaviyaa irukum. But mandatory illa.

instruction: Vehicle fitness certificate eppodhu venum?
output: Transport vehicles: Every year (8 years-kkup piragu every 6 months). Non-transport: 15 years-kkup piragu every 5 years. Test: Emission, brakes, lights, etc. Expired fitness: Rs.2,000 fine. Online booking: parivahan.gov.in.

instruction: Free uniform, books எல்லாம் school கொடுக்குமா? Apply பண்ணணுமா?
output: Government school benefits: 1) Free textbooks - எல்லா subjects 2) Free notebooks - 4-5 books 3) Free uniform - 2 sets (₹600 worth) 4) Free footwear - Class 1-5 5) Free school bag - select schools. Apply: Admission-ஆனவுடன் automatic. Documents: Birth certificate, Aadhaar, parent Aadhaar, address proof. Private aided schools-லும் books free. Distribution: June-July school opening.

instruction: ஆதார் - மொபைல் எண் மாற்றம் எப்படி?
output: Cannot be done online for security reasons. Must visit Aadhaar Seva Kendra (ASK) with original Aadhaar and new active SIM. Biometric verification required. Fee: ₹50. Update is immediate with SMS confirmation.

instruction: Papaya/Pineapple pregnancy-ல் miscarriage cause பண்ணுமா?
output: Myth (mostly)! Ripe papaya: Safe in moderate amounts. Raw papaya: Contains latex - avoid (may cause contractions). Pineapple: Safe in normal amounts (contains bromelain but too little to cause harm). No food: Scientifically proven to cause miscarriage in normal amounts. Advice: 1) Eat varied diet, 2) Avoid raw/undercooked food, 3) Consult doctor for specific concerns. Miscarriage causes: Usually chromosomal abnormalities, not food.

instruction: SMS vandhudhu 'Drug license renewal pending. Pay 8000 online to avoid clinic seal.' Drug license matter serious, pay pannidlama?
output: Drug licenses renewed through State Drug Control department, not SMS links. Check actual renewal date in your license. Visit drug controller office or official portal. Scammers know doctors fear drug license issues - exploiting regulatory anxiety.

instruction: 'Arivinaan aaguvadhu undo' - arivoda mathippu enna?
output: Kural: 'Arivinaan aaguvadhu undo piridhinoy thanseyy vinaiyaan varum'. Artham: Arivaal ellam adaiyalam. Aanaal arivillaamai endra noi, nam seyalgalaaleyae varum. Ignorance is a self-inflicted disease. Knowledge is the cure - and it's up to you to acquire it!

instruction: WhatsApp message 'PIB card renewal urgent. 5000 processing for continued access.' PIB card irukku, renew pannanum aa?
output: PIB accreditation renewal through official PIB website, process is free. Media organization applies on behalf of journalist. No WhatsApp-based renewal or 'processing fee'. Contact PIB regional office for genuine process. Scammers know journalists need PIB access.

instruction: Sandwich pattern diploma enna? Regular-lirundhu enna viththiyaasam?
output: Sandwich Diploma: Theory + Industrial training combined. Pattern: 1st year theory → 2nd year industry (6 months paid training) → 3rd year theory. Benefits: 1) Real work experience 2) Stipend during training ₹5,000-8,000/month 3) Job placement better 4) Industry connections. Offered at: NTTF, Central Polytechnics, select government colleges. Duration: Same 3 years. Highly recommended for practical learning.

instruction: Divorce-la child custody yaarukku kidaikkum?
output: 'Welfare of child' principle - yaar better care kodukka mudiyumo avarkalukku. General preference: Below 5 years - mother. 5+ years - child's preference consider aagum. Father-kkum custody kidaikkalam if mother unfit. Joint custody possible.

instruction: Life-la ellaamae wrong aagikittu irukku - enna seivadhu?
output: 'Idukkan varungaal naguga adhanai aduththoorvadhu aqdhoppa thil'. Kashta kaalathil siriyungal - adhuvae best remedy. Melum: 'Oozhayum uppakkam kaanbar ulaivindrith thaazhAdhu unjarru pavar'. Thodarndu muyarchi seipavargal fate-aiyum maatrruvaargal. This too shall pass!

instruction: Flash sale-ல் order confirm ஆனது, பிறகு cancel பண்ணிட்டாங்க - legal-ஆ?
output: Unilateral cancellation after confirmation unfair trade practice ஆகும். Consumer forum-ல் complaint போடலாம். Price difference + compensation கேட்கலாம். 'Out of stock' excuse valid அல்ல - stock management seller responsibility.

instruction: பிரதான் மந்திரி கௌசல் விகாஸ் யோஜனா (PMKVY) என்றால் என்ன?
output: இலவச Skill Training. காலம்: 150-300 மணி நேரம். Courses: IT, Healthcare, Construction, Retail, etc. நன்மைகள்: இலவச Training, Certificate (Industry recognized), Placement assistance, ₹8,000 வரை reward (assessment pass செய்தால்). சேர: pmkvyofficial.org → Find Training Center, அருகிலுள்ள PMKVY Training Center, Aadhaar, Photo தேவை. RPL: ஏற்கனவே skill உள்ளவர்களுக்கு Certificate, ₹500 assessment fee (refundable)

instruction: Medicine MRP-kku mela charge panraanga - legal-aa?
output: ILLEGAL! MRP = Maximum Retail Price. Law: Legal Metrology Act - selling above MRP is punishable. Hospital excuse: "Service charges" - not valid for medicines. Action: 1) Point out MRP on strip/bottle, 2) Refuse to pay excess, 3) Weights and Measures Department complaint, 4) Consumer Forum. Penalty: Fine + compensation. Document: Photo of MRP vs bill amount.

instruction: [Multi-turn dialogue] Cyber Fraud Recovery Process - Full conversation guide
output:
User: Ennoda account-la irundhu 25,000 online-la poyiduchu. Enna pannanum?

Assistant: **URGENT! Immediately pannunga:**

**RIGHT NOW (Next 5 minutes):**

1. **Bank-ku Call:**
   - SBI: 1800-111-111
   - HDFC: 1800-202-3344
   - ICICI: 1800-102-4242
   - Tell: "Unauthorized transaction, block my account"

2. **Note down:**
   - Transaction date & time
   - Amount
   - Transaction ID (SMS-la irukkum)

Bank call panniteengala? Enna bank?

User: SBI. Call pannitein, account freeze pannittanga

Assistant: Good! Fast action. Now next steps:

**Next 30 Minutes - Cyber Crime Report:**

**Step 1: Online Complaint (Fastest)**
1. Website: **cybercrime.gov.in**
2. Click: "Report Cyber Crime"
3. Select: "Financial Fraud"
4. Fill:
   - Your details
   - Bank details
   - Transaction details
   - Suspect details (if any)
5. Upload: Bank SMS screenshot
6. Submit
7. **Note: Complaint Number**

**Step 2: Call 1930**
- National Cyber Crime Helpline
- 24x7 available
- They'll also register complaint
- Helps freeze suspect's account faster!

**Why urgency matters:**
- Within 24 hours = 70-80% recovery chance
- After 48 hours = Drops to 30-40%
- After 1 week = Very difficult

cybercrime.gov.in complaint panniteengala?

User: Complaint panniten, number kedaichuchu. Ippo enna pannanum?

Assistant: **Complaint Number - KEEP SAFE!**

**Next Steps:**

**Step 1: Written Bank Complaint (Within 24 hours)**
1. Go to your SBI branch
2. Write complaint letter:
   - "Unauthorized transaction of ₹25,000 on [date]"
   - Transaction ID
   - Cyber complaint number
   - Request: "Reverse transaction and investigate"
3. Get acknowledgment with date stamp
4. Keep copy

**Step 2: Police FIR (Within 24 hours)**

**Online:** eservices.tnpolice.gov.in → Cyber Crime

**Or Visit:** 
- Cyber Crime Police Station
- Any Police Station (they'll transfer)

**Documents for FIR:**
- Bank statement showing fraud transaction
- SMS screenshots
- Cyber crime complaint number
- ID proof

**Step 3: Email to Bank Nodal Officer**
- SBI Nodal Officer: cms.gm@sbi.co.in
- Subject: "Cyber Fraud - Urgent - ₹25,000"
- Attach: Cyber complaint, Transaction details

Bank branch pogureengala ippo?

User: Poittu vandhutein. FIR-um panniten. Panam thirumba varum?

Assistant: Good work! Recovery chances:

**RBI Rules - Bank's Liability:**

| Reporting Time | Your Loss (Max) |
|----------------|----------------|
| Within 3 days | ₹0 (Full refund if not your fault) |
| 4-7 days | ₹10,000 max |
| After 7 days | Bank's discretion |

**Your Case:**
- Reported same day ✓
- You should get **FULL REFUND** if:
  - You didn't share OTP
  - You didn't share password
  - No negligence from your side

**Bank Investigation Process:**
1. Bank has **10 working days** to investigate
2. They'll check: Was it system failure or user error?
3. **90 days maximum** to resolve

**If Bank Denies:**
1. First Appeal: Branch Manager
2. Second: Bank's Grievance Officer
3. Third: **Banking Ombudsman** (cms.rbi.org.in)
4. Final: Consumer Court

**Track Your Case:**
- Bank complaint status: Call branch
- Cyber complaint: cybercrime.gov.in → Track

**Question:** Eppadi panam poachu? OTP share panneenga? Link click panneenga?

User: Link click pannitein - SBI update nu message vandhuchu, adha click pannein

Assistant: Ah, **Phishing Scam** - Very common!

**What Happened:**
- Fake SBI SMS
- Fake website (looks real)
- You entered details
- They used it to transfer money

**Impact on Refund:**

**Honest Assessment:**
- Bank may argue "customer negligence"
- But still fight for refund!
- Many cases - bank still refunds 50-100%

**Strengthen Your Case:**

**Argument 1:** "Sophisticated scam"
- SMS looked genuine
- Website looked real
- Not obvious fraud

**Argument 2:** "Bank's responsibility too"
- Why did bank allow suspicious transaction?
- Why no OTP for large amount? (Wait - OTP vandhucha?)

**Argument 3:** "Immediate reporting"
- You reported within hours
- Shows you're genuine victim

**What to Write in Bank Complaint:**
"I was victim of sophisticated phishing scam using fake bank communication. Despite being a careful customer, the fraudulent website was indistinguishable from genuine SBI website. I reported immediately upon discovering fraud. As per RBI circular, bank should credit the amount within 10 days."

OTP message vandhucha? Enter panneenga?

User: OTP vandhuchi, enter pannitten nu nenaikkuren. Full details nenaivila illa tension-la

Assistant: **Understandable. Let's document everything:**

**For Your Records (Write down now):**

1. **Timeline:**
   - Date: ?
   - Time of SMS received: ?
   - Time you clicked link: ?
   - Time you noticed money gone: ?
   - Time you called bank: ?

2. **What you entered on fake site:**
   - Card number? (Probably yes)
   - CVV? (Maybe)
   - OTP? (Yes)
   - Net banking password? (Maybe)

**Immediate Security Actions:**

**Do RIGHT NOW:**
1. **Change SBI Net Banking Password**
   - onlinesbi.sbi.co.in → Forgot Password
   
2. **Change ATM PIN**
   - Call SBI or use SBI YONO app

3. **Request New Debit Card**
   - Old card details compromised
   - Block old card, request new

4. **Check Other Accounts**
   - Same password used elsewhere?
   - Change those too!

5. **Enable Transaction Alerts**
   - SMS + Email alerts ON
   - Transaction limit set

**Fraudsters may try again!** - Common pattern

Net banking password change panniteengala?

User: Pannitten. Bank eppo reply pannuvanga? Vera enna pannanum?

Assistant: **Bank Timeline & Next Steps:**

**Bank Response Timeline:**
| Stage | Time |
|-------|------|
| Acknowledgment | 24-48 hours |
| Investigation | 10 working days |
| Resolution | Up to 90 days |
| Credit (if approved) | Within 10 days of decision |

**What to Do Now:**

**Week 1:**
- [ ] Follow up call to branch (after 3 days)
- [ ] Get written acknowledgment if not received
- [ ] Check cyber complaint status: cybercrime.gov.in

**Week 2:**
- [ ] If no response, email escalation:
  - Branch Manager
  - cms.gm@sbi.co.in (Nodal Officer)
- [ ] Reference: RBI Circular on Limiting Liability

**Week 3-4:**
- [ ] If rejected/no response: Banking Ombudsman
- [ ] cms.rbi.org.in → Lodge Complaint
- [ ] Free service, usually effective

**Keep Ready:**
- All complaint numbers
- Bank acknowledgments
- FIR copy
- SMS/Email screenshots
- Timeline document

**Realistic Expectation:**
- Phishing with OTP = Partial to Full refund possible
- Fight ka laga - don't give up!
- Ombudsman usually sides with customer

Vera doubt?

User: Thanks! Future-la eppadi safe-aa irukkuradhu?

Assistant: **Cyber Safety Tips - MUST FOLLOW:**

**SMS/Email Safety:**
| Red Flag | What to Do |
|----------|------------|
| "Click urgent link" | NEVER click - Go to official app/website directly |
| "Your account blocked" | Call bank directly, don't use number in SMS |
| "Update KYC immediately" | Banks never ask via SMS link |
| Shortened URLs (bit.ly) | Never click from unknown source |

**OTP Rules:**
- **NEVER share OTP with anyone** - Even if they say "bank officer"
- OTP valid for YOUR transactions only
- Bank staff will NEVER ask OTP

**Banking Safety:**

1. **SBI YONO App** - Use app, not website
   - Genuine app from Play Store/App Store
   - Biometric login

2. **Transaction Limits**
   - Set daily limit (₹25,000 for example)
   - UPI limit separate

3. **Alerts**
   - SMS + Email both ON
   - Immediate notification

4. **Two Accounts Strategy**
   - Savings account: Large amounts (no net banking)
   - Current/separate: Daily use (limited balance)

**Mobile Safety:**
- Don't install apps from links
- Keep phone updated
- Use official banking apps only

**If Suspicious Call:**
- Hang up
- Call bank official number
- Report to 1930

**Quick Reference Card:**
```
✓ Official app only
✓ Never share OTP
✓ Never click SMS links
✓ Set transaction limits
✓ When in doubt - CALL BANK
```

**Emergency Numbers:**
- Cyber Crime: 1930
- SBI: 1800-111-111
- RBI Ombudsman: 14448

Stay safe! Anything else?

instruction: [Multi-turn dialogue] Farmer Applying for PM-KISAN and Crop Insurance - Full conversation guide
output:
User: Naan vivasaayi. PM-KISAN scheme-la register aagala. Eppadi pannuvadhu?

Assistant: PM-KISAN register panna simple process. First few questions:

1. Unga peyarla land irukka? (Patta unga name-la?)
2. Evvalavu land irukku?
3. Neengal income tax file pannuveengalaa?

Indha details sollunga, eligibility check pannalam.

User: Aamaa, 3 acre peyarla irukku. Income tax file pannala.

Assistant: Perfect! Neengal eligible:

**PM-KISAN Eligibility ✓**
- Land owner: ✓
- Not Income Tax payer: ✓

**Benefits:** ₹6,000/year (₹2,000 x 3 installments)

**Registration Options:**

**Option 1: Online (Self)**
1. pmkisan.gov.in
2. "New Farmer Registration"
3. State: Tamil Nadu
4. Aadhaar number enter
5. Fill details
6. Upload: Patta/Chitta
7. Submit

**Option 2: CSC / Agriculture Office**
- Nearest Common Service Center
- Agriculture Officer office
- Avanga free-ya register pannuvanga

Online try pannuveengalaa? Documents ready irukka?

User: Online try panren. Enna documents scan pannanum?

Assistant: **PM-KISAN Registration Documents:**

**Mandatory:**
1. **Aadhaar Card** - Front & Back scan
2. **Bank Passbook** - First page (Name, Account No, IFSC)
3. **Land Records:**
   - Patta (latest)
   - Chitta
   - OR Adangal extract

**Details you need:**
- Aadhaar Number
- Mobile Number (Aadhaar linked better)
- Bank Account Number
- IFSC Code
- Survey Numbers (land)
- Land area (hectares)

**Important:**
- Bank account unga name-la irukkanum
- Aadhaar-Bank name match aaganum
- Mobile number active irukkanum

Ellaam ready aa?

User: Documents ready. Oru doubt - crop insurance-um pannanum. Adhukku separate aa apply pannumaa?

Assistant: Good question! Yes, Crop Insurance (PMFBY) separate application:

**PM-KISAN vs PMFBY:**
| | PM-KISAN | PMFBY |
|--|----------|-------|
| What | Direct cash | Crop Insurance |
| Amount | ₹6,000/year fixed | Claim based on loss |
| Apply | Once (auto-renew) | Every season |

**PMFBY Apply:**
- **When:** Before sowing - deadline irukku
- **Where:** Bank / CSC / pmfby.gov.in / UZHAVAN App

**Premium (You pay):**
- Kharif crops: 2% of Sum Insured
- Rabi crops: 1.5%
- Commercial crops: 5%

**Example:** 3 acres paddy
- Sum Insured: ~₹1,50,000
- Your Premium: ₹3,000 (2%)
- Govt pays rest

**Claim:** Natural calamity, pest attack la loss na compensation

Neengal enna crop poda porreenga? Deadline check pannalam.

User: Paddy podalaam nu irukken. Deadline eppo?

Assistant: **Paddy (Samba/Thaladi) - Kharif Season:**

**Deadline:** Usually August-September (exact date varies yearly)

**Check Current Deadline:**
1. pmfby.gov.in → Crop Insurance tab
2. Select: State (TN) → District → Season → Crop
3. Shows: Last date, Premium, Sum Insured

**Or:** UZHAVAN App la notification varum

**Apply Process:**

**Option 1: Through Bank (Easiest)**
- KCC (Kisan Credit Card) irukka?
- KCC loan vaangunavanga-ku auto-enrollment
- Premium loan-layae deduct aagum

**Option 2: Online Self**
1. pmfby.gov.in → "Farmer Corner"
2. Register with mobile
3. Fill crop details
4. Upload: Land records, Sowing certificate
5. Pay premium online

**Option 3: CSC / Agriculture Office**
- Documents kondu poganum
- Avanga apply pannuvanga

KCC irukka ungakitta?

User: KCC illa. Vaangalaamaa? Interest evvalavu?

Assistant: **KCC (Kisan Credit Card) - Must Have for Farmers!**

**Benefits:**
- **Interest:** Only 4% (Normal 7% - 3% Govt subsidy)
- **Collateral Free:** Up to ₹1.6 lakh
- **Flexible:** Withdraw anytime, pay after harvest
- **Crop Insurance:** Auto-enrolled
- **PM-KISAN link:** Easy processing

**Eligibility:**
- Land owner ✓ (You qualify!)
- Tenant farmers - also eligible
- Even oral lessees can apply

**KCC Loan Amount:**
- Based on: Crop + Area + Scale of Finance
- 3 acres paddy: ~₹60,000-90,000 per season

**Apply:**

**Option 1: Bank**
- Nearest Commercial Bank / Co-operative Bank
- Documents: Aadhaar, Patta, Chitta, Photos
- Time: 7-14 days

**Option 2: Through PM-KISAN**
- pmkisan.gov.in → KCC tab
- Auto-forward to bank
- Easier process for PM-KISAN beneficiaries

**My Suggestion:** Apply KCC first, then:
- PM-KISAN registration easier
- Crop insurance auto
- 4% interest loan ready

Bank pogalaamaa? Cooperative irukka near-by?

User: Okay, KCC first apply panren. Complete process sollunga

Assistant: **KCC Application - Complete Process:**

**Step 1: Choose Bank**
- Primary Agricultural Credit Society (PACS) - Easiest for farmers
- Co-operative Bank
- Any Commercial Bank (SBI, Indian Bank, etc.)

**Step 2: Collect Documents**
1. Aadhaar Card (Original + 2 copies)
2. PAN Card (if available)
3. Patta (Original + copy)
4. Chitta & Adangal (from VAO)
5. Sowing Certificate (from VAO) - optional initially
6. Passport Photos - 4
7. Bank passbook (if existing account)

**Step 3: Visit Bank**
- Ask for "KCC Application Form"
- Fill the form
- Attach documents
- Submit

**Step 4: Bank Process**
- Document verification
- Land record check
- Credit limit calculation
- Field visit (sometimes)

**Step 5: Sanction**
- Sanction letter
- KCC card issue
- Cheque book (optional)
- **Time:** 7-14 days

**Step 6: Disbursement**
- Go to bank
- Withdraw as needed
- Repay after harvest
- **Interest:** 4% if timely repayment!

**After KCC Ready:**
- PM-KISAN auto-link
- PMFBY premium auto-deduct
- Soil Health Card link

**One tip:** Sowing certificate VAO kitta vaangunga - multiple uses irukku.

All clear aa? Vendum na summary sheet tharattumaa?

User: Thanks! Oru last doubt - Soil Health Card enna? Free aa?

Assistant: **Soil Health Card - Free & Very Useful!**

**What is it?**
- Unga nilathoda soil test report
- Nutrients (N, P, K, etc.) evvalavu irukku
- pH level, Organic carbon
- Enna fertilizer evvalavu podanum - recommendation

**Benefits:**
- Right fertilizer = Less cost
- Better yield
- Soil damage prevent

**How to Get (FREE):**

**Option 1: Online Request**
1. soilhealth.dac.gov.in
2. Register with Aadhaar
3. Enter land details
4. Request soil testing
5. Sample collection by Agri Dept
6. Report online + Card by post

**Option 2: Agriculture Office**
- Visit Block Agriculture Office
- Give land details
- They'll collect soil sample
- Report in 2-3 weeks

**Option 3: KVK (Krishi Vigyan Kendra)**
- Nearby KVK-la free testing
- Plus free advice

**When to Test:**
- Before sowing season
- Every 3 years recommended

**Pro Tip:** Soil test result based-la fertilizer vaangunga - waste avoid, yield increase!

**Summary ungalukku:**
1. KCC Apply → Bank
2. PM-KISAN Register → pmkisan.gov.in
3. Crop Insurance → Auto with KCC or pmfby.gov.in
4. Soil Health Card → soilhealth.dac.gov.in

All the best for your farming! Vendum na kekuinga.

instruction: Pulan adakkam (self-control) patri enna kuralgal ullana?
output: Kural: 'Aindhaviththaan aatral agalvisumbu laarkoman indhiranae saalum kari'. Aimpulangalai adakkiyavan Indhiranukkku samam. Melum: 'Serivarindhu seermai payakkum arivarindhu aatrin adangap perin'. Self-control ullavanukkaec sirappu kidaikkum. Master your senses = master your life!

instruction: Employer insurance ponaa personal insurance venumaa?
output: Yes, recommended! Reasons: 1) Job change = coverage gap, 2) Corporate cover usually basic (Rs.3-5 lakhs), 3) Family may not be covered, 4) Age increases premium later, 5) Pre-existing conditions develop. Strategy: 1) Corporate as primary, 2) Personal as top-up, 3) Super top-up for high coverage. Start early: Lower premium, no waiting period issues later.

instruction: Mental health insurance cover ஆகுமா?
output: Yes! Mandatory since MHCA 2017 + IRDAI guidelines. Coverage: 1) Psychiatric hospitalization, 2) Day care treatment, 3) OPD (some policies), 4) Medicine costs. Exclusions: Some policies exclude substance abuse (check terms). Claim: Same as physical illness - cashless/reimbursement. Denied: Complaint to IRDAI, Insurance Ombudsman. Important: Don't hide history - disclose for valid claims.

instruction: Hospital insurance claim-kku cooperate pannala - enna seivathu?
output: Hospital must cooperate for cashless. Issues: 1) Won't file pre-auth, 2) Asking cash despite insurance, 3) Not providing documents. Action: 1) Escalate to hospital administration, 2) Call TPA directly, 3) Insurer helpline, 4) Pay and claim reimbursement (last resort). Network hospital agreement: They must facilitate cashless. Complaint: Insurer can de-empanel non-cooperative hospitals.

instruction: SMS vandhuchu 'Free cement scheme for house construction. Register with 2000 for 50 bag cement.' Cement kedaikum aa free la?
output: Government housing schemes provide materials through proper application and verification. No 'free cement' scheme with cash registration. Housing subsidies through PMAY/CM housing scheme with extensive documentation. Scammers target construction workers' building material needs.

instruction: Bank exam-க்கு prepare ஆவது எப்படி? SBI/IBPS difference?
output: Banking exams: IBPS - Public sector banks (PNB, Canara, etc). SBI - Separate recruitment. Pattern similar: Prelims + Mains + Interview. Sections: English, Reasoning, Quantitative, General Awareness, Computer. Preparation: 1) RS Aggarwal for Maths/Reasoning 2) Word Power Made Easy for English 3) Banking Awareness - Arihant 4) Daily mock tests. Difference: SBI slightly tougher, more vacancies. Start with IBPS, apply SBI also.

instruction: WhatsApp group add pannidaanga 'Hospital accreditation assistance. We help with NABH/NABL. 1 lakh consultation fee, 100% success.' Clinic ku accreditation venum, join pannalama?
output: Real accreditation consultants work through proper contracts and meetings. WhatsApp groups promising 'guaranteed accreditation' are scams. NABH/NABL accreditation requires genuine compliance, no shortcuts. Contact official empaneled consultants from NABH website only.

instruction: கடும் மழையால் என் பயிர் முழுவதும் நாசமாகிவிட்டது. என்ன compensation, help கிடைக்கும்?
output:
உடனடியாக (72 மணி நேரத்திற்குள்):
1. PMFBY Claim - pmfby.gov.in / 14447 - Photos எடுத்து வைக்கவும்
2. VAO/Agriculture Officer-க்கு Written complaint

Assessment:
3. Crop Cutting Experiment - Agriculture Dept + Insurance
4. Claim Amount - Yield loss % படி

Other Relief:
5. SDRF - District Collector - இயற்கை பேரிடர் relief
6. Input Subsidy - ₹6,800/hectare (Rainfed), ₹13,500 (Irrigated)
7. CM Relief Fund - Severe cases

Loan Relief:
8. Loan restructuring - Bank apply
9. Fresh KCC Loan - 4% interest - அடுத்த season-க்கு

instruction: Mentally ill person treatment-kku yaar consent taranum?
output: Mental Healthcare Act 2017 rules: 1) Nominated representative (patient designates when competent), 2) Family members (spouse, parents, sibling - in order), 3) No one available: Hospital board decision. Advance directive: Patient can write treatment preferences when competent. Involuntary admission: Only if danger to self/others - magistrate approval needed within 24 hours.

instruction: Avvaiyar yaar? Eththanai Avvaiyargal irundhaargal?
output: Avvaiyar - Tamilin migap pugazh petra penn kavignar. 'Avvai' endraal 'moodhaatti' alladhu 'thaay' endru porul. Pala kaalakattangalil vevveru Avvaiyargal irundhathaaga scholars karudhugirar: 1) Sangam kaala Avvaiyar - Puranaanooru paadiyavar, Athiyamaan Nedunchezhiyanoda nanbar, 2) Bhakthi kaala Avvaiyar - Aathichudi, Kondraivendhan ezhuthiyavar, Murugan bhakthai. Irandaavadhu Avvaiyar migavum popular - kuzhanthaigalukkku needhi karpikkum paadalgal ezhuthiyavar.

instruction: Ore nerathula pala scholarships-ku apply seiyalama?
output: Aam, aanaal rules parunga: 1) Different sources (central + state + private) - usually OK 2) Same department multiple schemes - one only 3) NSP-la one scholarship per year rule ulladhu 4) Disclose other scholarships if asked. Strategy: Government first (guaranteed), then private (competitive). Keep track of all applications in a spreadsheet. Renewal applications separate apply.

instruction: Important helpline numbers enna?
output: Emergency: 112, Women Helpline: 181, Child Helpline: 1098, CM Cell: 1100, Legal Aid: 15100, Consumer: 1915, Electricity: 94987-94987, Water: 1916, Ration Card: 1967

instruction: Veetuku oru van vandhudhu, 'Free health checkup, Ayushman Bharat registration' nu. Aadhaar card kuduthen, fingerprint machine la vachanga. Aprom bank la irundhu kaasu poiduchu. Eppidi possible?
output: Aiyyo ayya! Ivanga Aadhaar fingerprint capture panni AEPS (Aadhaar Enabled Payment System) la unga bank account la irundhu kaasu eduthirukkanga. Ayushman Bharat door-to-door biometric collect pannaadhu. Immediately bank ku ponga, AEPS disable pannunga, police complaint kudungal.

instruction: Government Polytechnic college-la admission eppadi?
output: DOTE counselling: 1) www.tndte.gov.in-la online registration 2) 10th marks upload 3) Choice filling - college + branch 4) Rank list based on marks 5) Counselling date - certificate verification 6) Seat allotment. Fee: Government polytechnic ₹1,500-3,000/year. Reservation applicable. Cutoff marks: Top colleges-ku 400+ (out of 500).

instruction: PM-AJAY grama sugadhara thittam endraal enna?
output: Pradhan Mantri Ayushman Arogya Yojana - Rural healthcare. Components: Health & Wellness Centres (HWC) - Primary healthcare, Teleconsultation. Services: 12 essential services - Maternal care, Child health, Communicable diseases, NCD screening (Diabetes, BP), Mental health, Dental, Eye care. Free: All services free at HWC. Location: Sub-centre/PHC within 30 min travel. Access: Aadhaar/ration card enough, registration required.

instruction: Panchakarma treatment TN-ல் எங்கே கிடைக்கும்?
output: Panchakarma = 5 detoxification therapies. Where in TN: 1) Government AYUSH hospitals (limited), 2) Private Ayurveda centers - Arya Vaidya Pharmacy branches, 3) Kerala-based resorts with TN branches, 4) Integrated wellness centers. Cities: Chennai, Coimbatore, Madurai have more options. Cost: Private Rs.2,000-10,000/day. Duration: 7-21 days typically. Best: Kerala for authentic Panchakarma (closer option).

instruction: SMS - 'Income Tax Refund Rs.23,450 approved. Update bank account: [link] to receive refund.' Refund expect pannuren, click pannalama?
output: IT department refund registered bank account ku automatic credit aagum - link update vendaam. SMS links phishing sites. Login details enter pannina - real IT account hacked, bank details stolen. incometax.gov.in direct login panni check pannunga.

instruction: Myth or Fact: Myth: Arts padichaa future illai
output: Fact: Fact: Arts graduates options: IAS/IPS (UPSC - Arts background preferred), Banking, Teaching, Law, Journalism, Civil Services, HR, Social Work. Many IAS toppers are Arts graduates. Salary depends on job not degree. BA + competitive exam preparation = excellent career. Arts graduates excel in UPSC due to writing skills. Don't underestimate humanities!

instruction: Crypto/Stock trading scam la lakhs poachu. Recovery possible aa?
output: Report to: SEBI (stock related) at scores.sebi.gov.in, ED Economic Offences (>10 lakhs) through Police escalation, cybercrime.gov.in, Platform fraud team (Binance, WazirX). Recovery channels: Bank reversal (within 24-48 hours), Crypto tracing (blockchain traceable, specialized cyber cells), Civil suit if scammer identified, Collective action with other victims. Recovery reality: Crypto 5-10%, Stock scams 10-20% if SEBI acts, Ponzi depends on assets seized.

instruction: GPA (General Power of Attorney) மூலம் property sale valid-ஆ?
output: Supreme Court ruling (2011): GPA மூலம் property sale NOT valid. GPA holder sale deed execute பண்ணலாம், but final ownership transfer Principal நேரில் வந்து sign செய்யணும் அல்லது properly registered Special Power of Attorney வேண்டும்.

instruction: TN Old Age Pension evvalavu? Eppadi peruvadhu?
output: Monthly pension for 60+ years. Amount: ₹1,000/month (State) + ₹200-500 (Central IGNOAPS) = ₹1,200-1,500. Eligibility: 60+ years, annual income below ₹72,000, BPL preferred. Destitute: ₹1,500/month for destitute elderly. Apply: Panchayat/Taluk office. Documents: Age proof, Income certificate, Aadhaar, Bank account. Dearness Allowance: Periodic increases announced.

instruction: Nalayira Divya Prabandham endraal enna?
output: Nalayira Divya Prabandham - 12 Azhvaargalaal paadappatta Vaishnava bhakthi ilakkiyam. 4,000 paasurangal (paadalgal). 108 Divya Desangalai (Vishnu kovilgal) paadiyathu. Naadhamunikal thoguthThaar. Mukkiya paguthigal: Thiruppaavai (Aandaal), Thiruvaaimozhi (Nammazhvaar), Periya Thirumozhi (Thirumangai Azhvaar). 'Tamil Vedam' endru azhaikkapadugiradhu.

instruction: Income tax refund pending-nu email vandhudhu, bank details update pannanum-nu link irukku
output: Phishing email ithu! IT department email-la bank details kettuka maattaanga. incometax.gov.in-la direct-a login pannunga. Link click pannaadheenga.

instruction: Polytechnic Diploma enna? ITI-lirundhu enna viththiyaasam?
output: Difference: ITI = Trade training (practical focused), Diploma = Technical education (theory + practical). Diploma: 3 years after 10th. Branches: Mechanical, Civil, Electrical, Electronics, Computer Science, Automobile. Job level: Supervisor/Junior Engineer. ITI: Technician/Operator level. Salary difference: Diploma holders ₹5,000-10,000 more starting. Higher studies: Diploma → B.E. lateral entry possible.

instruction: Maintenance and Welfare of Parents and Senior Citizens Act endraal enna?
output: Law for care of parents/elders. Children's Duty: Legal obligation to maintain parents. Maintenance Amount: Tribunal decides (max ₹10,000/month). Tribunal: In every district, order within 90 days. Property: Transfer to children can be void if neglected after transfer. Old Age Homes: Government run, at least one per district. Penalty: ₹5,000 fine / 3 months imprisonment. Complaint: Maintenance Tribunal/SDM office.

instruction: Yoga therapy எங்கே learn பண்ணலாம்?
output: Free options: 1) Government Yoga centres (every district), 2) AYUSH hospitals - yoga unit, 3) Parks - morning free sessions (many cities), 4) Schools/colleges - yoga programs. Paid: 1) Private yoga studios, 2) Art of Living, Isha centres, 3) Online courses (after basics learned). Certification: If want to teach - AYUSH certified courses. Therapy: For specific conditions - consult yoga therapist (BNYS or certified).

instruction: High-risk pregnancy endraal enna? Special care enge?
output: High-risk factors: 1) Age <18 or >35, 2) Previous C-section/complications, 3) Multiple pregnancy (twins), 4) Diabetes/BP/heart disease, 5) Rh negative blood, 6) Previous stillbirth/miscarriage. Care: 1) Referred to district hospital/medical college, 2) More frequent monitoring, 3) Specialist care. Identification: During ANC visits. Don't hide history - affects baby's safety.

instruction: En ponnu NEET-la fail aayitta - aduthu enna vazhi?
output: Discourage pannaadheenga. Options: Next year NEET retry, BSc Nursing/Allied Health Sciences, BDS (dental), BAMS/BHMS (alternative medicine), BSc Life Sciences. NEET-kku 8 attempts varai try pannalam. Age limit: 25 years.

instruction: AICTE scholarship engineering students-ku enna ulladhu?
output: AICTE Scholarships: 1) Pragati - Women in technical education, ₹50,000/year 2) Saksham - Differently abled students, ₹50,000/year 3) Swanath - Orphan students 4) PM's Special Scholarship - J&K students. Additional: GATE qualified students-ku ₹12,400/month scholarship ME/M.Tech-la. Apply: www.aicte-india.org. Income limit: ₹8 lakh/year.

instruction: Fake product vitra e-commerce site-kku case podalaamaa?
output: Aama. Counterfeit/fake products virpathu illegal. Consumer forum-la compensation claim seyyalam. Trademark owner-kkum report pannalam. Police complaint (IPC 420 - cheating) podalam. E-commerce platform-um liable.

instruction: நான் Tuition Center / Coaching Institute தொடங்க விரும்புகிறேன். என்ன permission வேண்டும்?
output:
**Coaching Center / Tuition Classes - Permissions:**

**Basic Requirements:**

**1. Shop & Establishment Registration**
- எங்கே: tnlabour.tn.gov.in
- Fee: ₹500-1,500
- 30 நாட்களுக்குள் opening-க்கு பின்

**2. Trade License**
- எங்கே: Corporation / Municipality
- Category: Educational Services
- Fee: ₹1,000-5,000

**3. Fire Safety NOC**
- 50+ students கட்டாயம்
- Fire extinguishers
- Emergency exit
- Fire Dept inspection

**4. Building Safety**
- Structural stability certificate
- Rent agreement (if rented)
- No residential area violation

**Large Institute-க்கு கூடுதல்:**

**5. Society/Trust/Company Registration**
- Trust: Registrar of Trusts
- Society: Registrar of Societies
- Company: MCA (LLP/Pvt Ltd)

**6. GST Registration**
- Turnover > ₹20 lakh
- Or: If franchising

**7. PF/ESI (if employees)**
- PF: 20+ employees
- ESI: 10+ employees

**Specific Coaching:**

**Competitive Exam Coaching (IAS/JEE/NEET):**
- Standard permissions enough
- No special license

**Foreign Language:**
- No special permission
- Certification from foreign body (optional)

**Driving School:**
- RTO approval mandatory
- Special license

**Computer Training:**
- Standard permissions
- IT company as optional

**Staff Requirements:**
- Qualified teachers
- Background verification (recommended)
- PF/ESI for permanent staff

**Infrastructure:**
- Proper ventilation
- Clean drinking water
- Toilet facilities
- Adequate space per student

**Insurance:**
- Public liability (recommended)
- Fire insurance

**Advertising:**
- No false claims
- Success rate proof
- Corporation permission for banners

**Timeline:**
- Basic setup: 2-4 weeks
- Large institute: 1-2 months

instruction: Succession certificate eppodhu venum?
output: When needed: Bank accounts, shares, securities claim seyya. Will illaadha cases-kku. Apply: District Court. Documents: Death certificate, legal heir proof, asset details. Fee: Asset value based. Time: 3-6 months. Alternative: Nominee-aa irundhaal thevai illa.

instruction: ITI/Diploma holders-ku government jobs evvalavu?
output: ITI holder jobs: 1) Railway Technician 2) TNEB Wireman/Lineman 3) Defence (Technical) 4) Ordinance Factory 5) PSU technician posts. Diploma holder jobs: 1) SSC JE (Junior Engineer) 2) RRB JE 3) TNPSC JA/AE 4) PWD Junior Engineer 5) PSU engineers. Salary: ITI ₹20,000-35,000, Diploma ₹35,000-60,000. Prepare: Technical subjects + General knowledge. Many vacancies yearly.

instruction: Instagram la 'Valorant account with rare skins, 2000 only (worth 10,000)' nu post paathen. Buy pannalama?
output: Account selling - game ToS violation, ban risk anyway. Payment pannina - account credentials varaadhu or credentials vandhu password change panniduvaanga. Skins officially game store la vaangunga. Third-party account sales almost always scam.

instruction: Thiruvannamalai koviloda sirappu enna?
output: Arunachaleswarar Kovil - Agni Lingam (Pancha Bhoota Sthalams-la ondru). Sirappugal: 1) Karthigai Deepam - malai uchchiyil periya deepam, lakhs of people varuvaargal, 2) Girivalam - malaiyai sutri nadappadu (14 km) - full moon-la latchakkanakkaaanor, 3) Ramana Maharishi Ashram arugil, 4) 4 gopurangal - kizhakku Rajagopuram 217 adi. Spiritual capital of Tamil Nadu endru sollalam.

instruction: Nammaazhvar yaar? Thiruvaaimozhi endraal enna?
output: Nammaazhvar - Azhvaargalil miga mukkiyamaanavar. Azhvaar Thirunagari (Tirunelveli) pirandha idam. Puliya maraththadiyil 16 aandugal dhiyaanathil irundhathaaga kadhai. Thiruvaaimozhi - 1102 paasurangal, 'Tamil Vedam' endru azhaikkapadugiradhu. Vaishnava thaththuvathoda aazham idhil ulladhu. 'Thaaye thandhaiye' endra paasuram migavum famous. Vaikunda Ekaadasiyil ivaradhu uruvam sorgavaasal vazhiyaaga sellum nigazhchi Srirangam-la nadakkum.

instruction: 11th Admission eppadi? Online counselling process enna?
output:
**11th Admission Process:**

**Step 1:** Online registration at tnschools.gov.in (May-June)

**Step 2:** 10th marks auto-fetch

**Step 3:** Select 10-15 school preferences

**Step 4:** Seat allotment based on marks + reservation:
- SC 18%, ST 1%, MBC 20%, BC 26.5%

**Step 5:** Report to school with documents

**Stream Options:**
- Science-Maths → Engineering
- Science-Bio → Medicine
- Commerce → CA
- Arts → Law

**Documents:** 10th Mark, TC, Community, Income, Aadhaar, Photos

**Fees:** Govt FREE, Aided minimal, Matric higher

instruction: Online resources effectively use பண்றது எப்படி?
output: Best free resources: 1) NPTEL - IIT professors lectures 2) SWAYAM - certificate courses 3) Khan Academy - basics strong 4) YouTube - Physics Wallah, Unacademy 5) MIT OpenCourseWare - advanced topics 6) Coursera audit mode - free learning 7) Google Scholar - research papers 8) LibGen - textbooks (use responsibly). Tip: Schedule online study time, avoid distraction rabbit holes. Download for offline access.

instruction: Retrenchment compensation எவ்வளவு கிடைக்கும்?
output: Formula: 15 days average pay × years of service. Applicable: 100+ employees company, 1 year+ service. Notice: 3 months advance or 3 months pay. LIFO principle (Last In First Out) follow ஆகணும். Re-employment preference உண்டு.

instruction: Call vandhudhu 'CGHS card renewal urgent. Pay 2000 online or medical benefits stopped.' CGHS card medical ku use pannuren, renew pannidlama?
output: CGHS renewal done through CGHS portal with minimal official fee. Never pay through phone call instructions. Check cghs.gov.in for actual renewal process. Scammers know government employees depend on CGHS for medical - exploiting healthcare anxiety.

instruction: Maternity leave evvalavu naal kidaikkum?
output: Maternity Benefit Act 2017: 26 weeks paid leave (first two children), 12 weeks (third child onwards). Before delivery: 8 weeks max. Adoption/surrogate: 12 weeks. Miscarriage: 6 weeks. 10+ employees company-kku applicable. Creche facility mandatory (50+ employees).

instruction: Scholarship-ku apply panna enna document vendumay?
output: Aadhaar, bank passbook (student name-la), income certificate, community certificate, marks card, photo, bonafide - ipdi ellam venum. Original + xerox + scan ready-a vechikko/vechikunga.

instruction: MUDRA Loan எப்படி வாங்குவது?
output: Collateral-free business loan from any bank. Shishu: up to ₹50,000, Kishore: up to ₹5 lakh, Tarun: up to ₹10 lakh. Apply at bank or mudra.org.in with business plan, ID proof, address proof. Interest: 8-12%. Good for starting/expanding small business.

instruction: நான் கிராமத்தில் பெண்கள் சுய உதவிக் குழு (SHG) ஆரம்பிக்க விரும்புகிறேன். எப்படி பதிவு செய்வது?
output:
**SHG துவக்குதல் - படிப்படியாக:**

**Step 1: குழு அமைத்தல்**
- 10-20 பெண்கள் (ஒரே கிராமம்/பகுதி)
- ஒத்த சிந்தனை உடையவர்கள்
- வயது: 18-60

**Step 2: Meetings தொடங்குதல்**
- வாரம் ஒரு முறை கூட்டம்
- சிறிய தொகை சேமிப்பு (₹50-100/week)
- Minutes book maintain

**Step 3: Bank Account திறத்தல்**
- 3 மாத meeting records காட்டி
- Joint account (President + Secretary)
- Nationalized Bank / Co-operative Bank

**Step 4: Mahalir Thittam பதிவு**
- எங்கே: Block Development Office
- TNSRLM (Tamil Nadu State Rural Livelihoods Mission)
- Website: tnrd.gov.in

**தேவையான ஆவணங்கள்:**
- உறுப்பினர்கள் Aadhaar
- குழு தீர்மானம் (Resolution)
- Member list with photos
- Savings passbook
- Minutes book

**Benefits after registration:**
1. **Revolving Fund:** ₹15,000 (grant)
2. **Community Investment Fund:** ₹50,000-1,00,000
3. **Bank Loan:** Up to ₹10 lakh (low interest)
4. **Training:** Free skill training
5. **Market access:** Exhibition, Melas

**Loan வாங்குதல்:**
- 6 மாத savings record
- Regular meetings
- Good credit history
- Interest: 4-7%

instruction: Coimbatore-ல் textile/fashion industry-related courses உள்ளதா?
output: Coimbatore textile hub courses: 1) PSG Tech - B.Tech Textile Technology 2) Kumaraguru - Textile courses 3) NIFT Coimbatore - Fashion (opening soon) 4) Government Polytechnic - Textile 5) ITI - Textile trades. Industry connect: Internships in mills, design houses. Job placement: Tirupur garment cluster nearby = excellent opportunities. Specialized: Knitwear technology, Apparel production.

instruction: பிறப்பு சான்றிதழ் எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: Register within 21 days at hospital location's Municipality/Panchayat - FREE! After 21 days: ₹50 late fee + affidavit. Documents: Hospital discharge summary, parents' Aadhaar. Online at tnreginet.gov.in or crsorgi.gov.in. Certificate in 3-5 days.

instruction: ஒரே நேரத்தில் பல scholarships-க்கு apply செய்யலாமா?
output: ஆம், ஆனால் rules பாருங்கள்: 1) Different sources (central + state + private) - usually OK 2) Same department multiple schemes - one only 3) NSP-ல் one scholarship per year rule உள்ளது 4) Disclose other scholarships if asked. Strategy: Government first (guaranteed), then private (competitive). Keep track of all applications in a spreadsheet. Renewal applications separate apply.

instruction: NEET Physics hard-ஆக இருக்கு, எப்படி improve ஆவது?
output: Physics improvement: 1) Concepts first - derivations later 2) Formula list chapter-wise 3) Daily 20-30 numericals practice 4) HC Verma for conceptual clarity 5) DC Pandey for NEET level. High weightage topics: Mechanics, Electrostatics, Modern Physics, Optics. Weak students: Start with easy chapters (Units, Motion, Thermodynamics). Video lectures: Physics Wallah, Unacademy free. Avoid formula memorization without understanding.

instruction: RTI endraal enna? Yaar file pannalaam?
output: RTI = Right to Information Act 2005 - Government information perum urimai. Any Indian citizen file pannalam. NRI, Company, Trust - file panna mudiyaadhu. Government, PSU, government-funded NGO ellaathukkum RTI apply.

instruction: EB office la irundhu call vandhudhu - '2 hour la current poirum, immediately pay pannunga link la' nu. Current pona enna pannuradhu, pay pannalaamaa?
output: Oy summa irudhaa! EB 2 hour la current cut pannaadhu da, proper notice tharum. Official app la illana EB office la dhaan pay pannanum. Ivanga anuppura link click panninae - card details thirudiruvaanga. Meenakshi Amman kovil pakkathu la oru thatha ipdi 50,000 lose pannittaan.

instruction: Email vandhuchu 'Service record verification required. Submit documents with 5000 processing fee for pension eligibility.' Pension important, submit pannalama?
output: Service record verification is internal department process, no fees involved. Pension processed through AG office, not email requests. All government employees have service books maintained by departments. Contact your establishment section, not random emails.

instruction: Plus One admission-க்கு எப்போது apply பண்ணணும்?
output: Timeline: 10th result வந்த பிறகு 1 week-ல் notification. Usually May-June. Online application: www.tnschooleducation.in. Documents ready: 10th marks card, TC, community certificate, income certificate, Aadhaar. Choice filling: Preferred schools + subjects. Random allocation for government schools. Cutoff based for popular schools. Don't miss deadline - late applications not accepted.

instruction: Fake news share பண்ணினால் legal trouble வருமா?
output: Yes, possible: IPC 505 (public mischief), 153A (promoting enmity), Epidemic Diseases Act (health misinformation). IT Rules 2021: Platforms must remove fake news. Knowingly spreading = higher liability. Before sharing: Verify from trusted sources. Fact-check websites use பண்ணுங்க.

instruction: SSC CGL என்ன? Tamil Nadu students apply பண்ணலாமா?
output: SSC CGL (Combined Graduate Level): Central Government Group B & C posts. Posts: Tax Inspector, Auditor, Assistant, SI, etc. Tamil Nadu students - Yes, apply possible! Posting: All India basis, TN postings available. Exam: Tier 1, 2, 3, 4. Syllabus: English, Maths, Reasoning, GK. Salary: ₹35,000-1,50,000. Age: 18-32 (varies by post). Apply: www.ssc.nic.in. Notification: Usually December. Very good career option.

instruction: Velai seithukonde padikka enna vazhi irukkudhu?
output: Distance Education options: 1) IGNOU - biggest open university 2) Tamil Nadu Open University (TNOU) 3) University of Madras - IDE 4) Annamalai University Distance. UG/PG/Diploma ellam available. Fee: ₹5,000-20,000/year. Exams: 2 times per year. Work experience + degree rendu kidaikkum.

instruction: Dialysis free-yaa seyyalaamaa?
output: Yes! Pradhan Mantri National Dialysis Program. Free dialysis: Government hospitals, empanelled private centres. Eligibility: BPL/low income patients. Sessions: Usually 2-3 per week. CMCHIS: Also covers dialysis. Kidney transplant: Covered under CMCHIS (Rs.5 lakh). Location: District hospitals, medical colleges. Registration: Through nephrologist referral. Medicines: EPO injections also subsidized.

instruction: JEE-க்கு எந்த books படிக்கணும்?
output: Essential books: Physics - HC Verma, DC Pandey, Irodov (Advanced). Chemistry - NCERT (must), OP Tandon (Physical), Himanshu Pandey (Organic), JD Lee (Inorganic). Maths - RD Sharma, Cengage series, Arihant. NCERT = Foundation. Beyond NCERT for JEE Advanced. Online: PYQs from NTA website, mock tests from coaching platforms. Quality > Quantity - one book per subject master பண்ணுங்கள்.

instruction: En vivasaaya nilaththa veettu manaiyaaga maatra enna seiyya vendum?
output:
**Agricultural Land Conversion:**

**Where to Apply:**
- District Collector Office
- Online: eservices.tn.gov.in

**Types:**
1. **NA Conversion** - Agri to Residential/Commercial
2. **Layout Approval** - Multiple plots, need DTCP

**Documents:**
- Patta (your name)
- Chitta & Adangal
- FMB
- EC (30 years)
- Tax receipts
- Location sketch
- Agriculture Dept NOC (some cases)

**Fee:** 1-3% of land value + stamp duty difference

**Time:** 2-6 months

**Restrictions:**
- Wet land = difficult
- Prime agri zone = not allowed
- Above 2 acres = special permission

instruction: Online fraud-kku complaint enge poduvadhu?
output: 1) Cyber Crime portal: cybercrime.gov.in (national), 2) Local Cyber Crime police station, 3) 1930 helpline (financial fraud), 4) Bank-kku immediately inform. Screenshots, transaction details, communication records - ellam save pannunga. 24 hours-kkul report panninaal money recover chance adhigam.

instruction: Police station-la complaint kudukka poren, enna pannanum? (Chennai casual)
output: Mudhalla enna nadandhuchunnu clear-aa ezhudhi vachukonga. ID proof, evidence (photos, messages) eduthutu ponga. FIR copy kelunga - free-dhaan. Register panna maruttha SP office-kku complaint podunga. Calm-aa irunga.

instruction: Isai Kuzhu, Naatiya Kuzhu போட்டிகளில் win பண்ணினால் என்ன benefit?
output: District/State level-ல் win பண்ணினால் certificate, cash prize கிடைக்கும். College admission-ல் extra marks weightage உண்டு. Cultural quota-வில் admission பெறலாம். State artist-ஆக recognition கிடைக்கும்.

instruction: Facebook la friend emergency-nu panam ketkaraanga - send pannalama?
output: Account hack aayirukalam. Phone la call pannunga first - avanga thaan-a confirm pannunga. Message mathiri panam kettaa always verify pannunga.

instruction: Ration card complaint enge koduppadhu?
output: Options: 1) Ration shop-la complaint book, 2) Taluk Supply Officer, 3) District Supply Officer, 4) Food helpline: 1967, 5) TNCSC website. Issues: Fake entries, quantity shortage, quality issues, dealer misbehavior. Aadhaar seeding problems: UIDAI + DSO.

instruction: Fee katta mudiyala, college-la exam ezhudha vidamaattengiraanga
output: Immediate options: 1) Talk to Principal - installment arrangement 2) Education loan - bank/college tie-up 3) Student Aid Fund (most colleges have) 4) Scholarship if eligible - pending payment proof show 5) NGO support - Rotary, Lions Club. Legal: College cannot deny exam for genuine financial difficulty. Escalate: University Registrar, UGC grievance. Documentation: Keep written request, college response. Prevention: Apply for scholarships, loans in advance.

instruction: Enna madam, police station-la irunndhu call - unga Aadhaar-la problem, fine kattanum-nu solraanga
output: Fake call ithu! Real police phone-la fine kettuka maattaanga. Station-ku vara solluvanga. Bayapadaadheenga, phone cut pannunga. 1930-la report pannunga.

instruction: Chennai-ல் Apartment வாங்க போகிறேன். என்னென்ன சரிபார்க்க வேண்டும்? RERA என்றால் என்ன?
output:
**Apartment வாங்கும் முன் Checklist:**

**1. RERA Registration (கட்டாயம்!)**
- Website: rera.tn.gov.in
- RERA Number verify செய்யவும்
- Project details, Completion date பாருங்க
- Complaint history check

**RERA என்றால் என்ன?**
- Real Estate Regulatory Authority
- Builder accountability
- Buyer protection
- Delayed delivery compensation

**2. Legal Documents Check:**

| Document | என்ன பார்க்கணும் |
|----------|------------------|
| Mother Deed | Land ownership chain |
| EC (30 years) | Encumbrance இல்லை |
| Approved Plan | CMDA/DTCP approval |
| Building Permit | Corporation approval |
| Completion Certificate | Building complete |
| Occupancy Certificate | Stay permission |

**3. CMDA/DTCP Approval**
- Approved layout verify
- FSI/FAR compliance
- Setback rules followed
- cmdachennai.gov.in

**4. Builder Check:**
- Previous projects visit
- Delivery track record
- Legal cases check
- RERA complaints

**5. Financial Check:**
- All inclusive price
- Hidden charges (Parking, Club, etc.)
- GST: 5% (affordable) / 12% (luxury)
- Stamp Duty: 7%
- Registration: 4%

**6. Home Loan:**
- Bank approved project?
- Easier loan if approved
- PMAY benefit (First home): 3-6.5% subsidy

**7. Society/Association:**
- Association formed?
- Common area ownership
- Maintenance charges

**Red Flags:**
- No RERA registration
- No approved plan
- Unapproved deviation
- Multiple legal cases
- Land dispute

instruction: Abortion legal-ஆ? எந்த conditions-ல் allowed?
output: Legal under MTP Act (amended 2021). Conditions: 1) Up to 20 weeks - one doctor opinion, 2) 20-24 weeks - two doctors opinion (rape, contraceptive failure, fetal abnormality), 3) Any time - if fetal abnormality (medical board). Special: Rape survivors, minors - extended limits. Unmarried women: Also eligible. Consent: Woman's consent only (adult). Minor: Guardian consent needed.

instruction: Adoption-kku eligibility criteria enna?
output: CARA rules: 1) Age: 25-55 years, 2) Married couple: 2 years stable marriage, 3) Single parent: allowed (restrictions apply), 4) Income: sufficient to raise child, 5) Medical: physically/mentally fit, 6) No criminal record. Age difference with child: max 45 years.

instruction: Data Science, AI courses-kku endha college best?
output: IIT Madras (BSc in Data Science - online), Anna University, VIT, SRM, PSG Tech-la AI/ML courses irukku. IIT Madras online degree affordable-aagavum flexible-aagavum irukku.

instruction: 'Ulluvadhu ellam uyarvullal' - sindhhanai patriya kural enna?
output: Kural: 'Ulluvadhu ellam uyarvullal matradhu thalinum thallaamai neerthu'. Artham: Eppodhum uyarndha ennangalaiye ninaikkA vendum. Nadakkaaviittaalum paravaayillai, uyarvaga ninaippadu nalladhu. Think big even if you fail! Positive thinking-a 2000 aandugalukkku munnbae sonnaar.

instruction: Government Polytechnic college-ல் admission எப்படி?
output: DOTE (Directorate of Technical Education) counselling: 1) www.tndte.gov.in-ல் online registration 2) 10th marks upload 3) Choice filling - college + branch 4) Rank list based on marks 5) Counselling date - certificate verification 6) Seat allotment. Fee: Government polytechnic ₹1,500-3,000/year. Reservation applicable. Cutoff marks: Top colleges-க்கு 400+ (out of 500).

instruction: PMVVY (Pradhan Mantri Vaya Vandana Yojana) endraal enna?
output: LIC Pension scheme for 60+ years. Investment: ₹1,62,162 to ₹15 lakh. Pension: 7.4% guaranteed return (subject to change). Payment: Monthly/Quarterly/Half-yearly/Yearly. Term: 10 years. Loan: Can take 75% loan after 3 years. Premature Exit: 98% return for serious illness. Buy: LIC website/branch, need Aadhaar, Age proof.

instruction: Divorce-la wife-kku enna rights irukku?
output: Rights: 1) Maintenance (permanent alimony), 2) Streedhan (gifts given at marriage), 3) Share in husband's property (if jointly acquired), 4) Child custody preference (especially below 5 years), 5) Residence right till divorce. Interim maintenance during case nadakkumbodhe kidaikkum.

instruction: 'EPFO la irundhu pesuren ayya, Life Certificate submit pannanum, illa na pension stop aaidum. Video call la face verification pannanum' nu sonnanga. Enna pannanum?
output: EPFO video call la verification pannaadhu ayya. Jeevan Pramaan app use pannalam, illa bank la submit pannalam, illa postman door la varuvaaru. 'Pension stop aaidum' nu bayamudhuthuraanga. Video call pannina face data misuse aagum. EPFO office ku direct ponga.

instruction: Minimum wages Tamil Nadu-ல் எவ்வளவு?
output: Varies by industry and skill level. Unskilled: Rs.410-450/day, Semi-skilled: Rs.430-500/day, Skilled: Rs.480-600/day (approximate, 2024). Labour Department website-ல் exact rates. Less கொடுத்தால் Labour Inspector-க்கு complaint.

instruction: Single mother rights ennenna? Documents-la father name venumaa?
output: Rights: 1) Birth certificate - mother name only acceptable, 2) School admission - father name not mandatory (Supreme Court), 3) Passport - mother as sole guardian okay, 4) Aadhar - single parent sufficient. Challenges: Some private institutions insist - quote Supreme Court judgment. Government schemes: Single mother pension available in TN. Child custody: Automatic to mother (unwed).

instruction: Guideline value endraal enna? Enge check panrathu?
output: Government nirnnayitha minimum property value - idhukku keezhe register panna mudiyaadhu. Check: tnreginet.gov.in → Guideline Value Search → Zone/Village select. Actual sale higher-aa irundhaal actual value-kku stamp duty.

instruction: SSC CHSL enna post kidaikkum? 12th pass-ku best option?
output: SSC CHSL (Combined Higher Secondary Level): 12th pass Central Govt jobs. Posts: LDC (Lower Division Clerk), DEO (Data Entry Operator), Postal Assistant, Sorting Assistant. Salary: ₹20,000-60,000. Exam: Tier 1 (CBT) + Tier 2 (Descriptive). Syllabus: English, Maths, Reasoning, GK. Typing test required. Age: 18-27. Best option for 12th pass - stable central govt job. Apply: www.ssc.nic.in.

instruction: Phone vandhudhu 'Ola/Uber premium driver program. Pay 5000 registration for higher earning zones.' Income increase aagum nu solluraanga, join pannalama?
output: Ola/Uber premium programs announced through official app only. No external 'registration fee' for driver programs. Higher earning depends on location and time, not paid programs. Scammers target drivers' income improvement hopes. Check official app for any programs.

instruction: Online-ல ஃப்ராட் ஆயிட்டேன், police-க்கு போனா ஒழுங்கா case போடுவாங்களா?
output: Cyber crime special cell இருக்கு - trained officers. cybercrime.gov.in-ல் first complaint போடுங்க - track ஆகும். Local police-க்கும் FIR போடுங்க. Both simultaneously பண்ணலாம். Evidence (screenshots, bank statements) ready-ஆ வச்சுக்கோங்க.

instruction: Sexual harassment complaint eppadi seivathu?
output: Internal Complaints Committee (ICC)-kku written complaint. ICC illaattal Local Complaints Committee (District level). Time limit: 3 months from incident. POSH Act 2013 protection. Anonymous complaint-um valid. Retaliation-kku protection undu.

instruction: Board exam-ல் fail ஆயிட்டேன். Life waste ஆயிடுச்சு என்று feel ஆகுது. என்ன செய்வது?
output: First: You are NOT a failure! Exam failure ≠ Life failure. Many successful people failed exams: Abdul Kalam, Dhirubhai Ambani. Immediate steps: 1) Supplementary exam-க்கு prepare - 3 months time 2) Talk to parents/teacher openly 3) If severe stress - school counsellor or helpline iCALL: 9152987821. Future: Many paths to success - ITI, Diploma, NIOS, Skill training. One exam doesn't define you. Rise again stronger!

instruction: Will contest pannalaamaa?
output: Aama. Grounds: Undue influence, fraud, forgery, unsound mind, improper execution. Contest: Probate Court. Time: Before probate granted-kku ethirppu, after = revocation suit. Evidence: Medical records, witnesses, handwriting expert. Burden of proof: Contestant.

instruction: Trichy-ல் best medical colleges எவை?
output: Medical colleges Trichy region: 1) KAPV Government Medical College Trichy - MBBS, affordable 2) Thanjavur Medical College - Oldest in region 3) Dhanalakshmi Srinivasan Medical College - Private 4) Nursing colleges: Government + private multiple. MBBS admission: NEET + state counselling. Govt college fees: ₹13,500/year. Bond service required. Allied health courses also available.

instruction: Suddenly phone 'No Network' for hours. Network vandra time - bank OTPs went somewhere, 2 lakhs transferred. OTP yaarkum sollala, eppidi?
output: SIM swap fraud - your data (Aadhaar, phone, bank) leaked/bought, scammers duplicate SIM vaanguvaanga telecom store la with fake ID. Your SIM deactivates, OTPs go to them. Immediately when network lost - call bank, call telecom. Enable SIM lock, app-based 2FA use pannunga.

instruction: Kaadhali/Kaadhalan kobamaa irukkum bodhu enna kural ninaikkalam?
output: 'Oodalin thondrum siruthuni nallali vaadinum paadu perum'. Siriya oodal (fight) kaadhalai innum inimaiyaakkum. Normal-thaan! Melum: 'Thanindhamai sellaadhu ulagam thalarnDhamai ooduvadhu ellaarkum varum'. Cool down, then talk. Love grows after reconciliation!

instruction: Employer PF kattala - enna seyyalam?
output: Complaint options: 1) EPFO portal: EPFiGMS (online grievance), 2) Regional PF Commissioner office, 3) Labour Commissioner. Employer liability: PF amount + 12% interest + damages (up to 100%). Criminal prosecution-um possible. Salary slip-la PF deduction check pannunga.

instruction: School/College புகார் எங்கே கொடுப்பது?
output: Complaint hierarchy: School: 1) Class teacher → Headmaster → DEO (District Education Officer). College: 1) HOD → Principal → University Registrar → UGC (for serious issues). Online: 1) CM Cell - www.cm.tn.gov.in 2) MHRD grievance portal 3) Anti-ragging: www.antiragging.in. Fee issues: Fee Committee. Documents: Keep written complaints, get acknowledgment. Serious cases: Police, Women's Commission (harassment).

instruction: PCOS/PCOD treatment enge kidaikkum?
output: Available at: 1) Government hospital gynecology OPD - free, 2) Medical college hospitals - specialized care. Treatment: 1) Lifestyle modification (diet, exercise), 2) Medicines for hormonal balance, 3) Metformin if diabetic tendency, 4) Fertility treatment if trying to conceive. Tests: Ultrasound, hormonal tests - available free at government. Long-term: Regular monitoring needed.

instruction: Second opinion ketkalaamaa? Doctor kobappaduvaaraa?
output: Absolutely your right! Benefits: 1) Verify diagnosis, 2) Explore treatment options, 3) Confirm surgery necessity, 4) Peace of mind. How: 1) Ask for medical records, 2) Consult another specialist, 3) Get written opinion. Ethical doctors welcome this. Major decisions: Cancer, surgery, chronic illness - always get second opinion. Online: Telemedicine second opinions available.

instruction: Rental housing scheme ஏதாவது உள்ளதா?
output: Affordable Rental Housing Complex (ARHC) scheme urban poor-க்கு உண்டு. Industrial workers, migrants-க்கு subsidized rent-ல் வீடு. State urban development department-ல் விசாரிக்கவும்.

instruction: En appa construction worker, vera vera place-ku porom. School admission eppadi?
output: Migrant children rights: 1) RTE Act - Free education anywhere in India 2) Admission without TC - Self-declaration accepted 3) Mid-year admission allowed 4) Age-appropriate class placement 5) SSA support. Contact: Nearest government school, District Education Officer. Documents: Aadhaar (if any), parent ID. Free: Books, uniform, mid-day meal. Language support provided for transition.

instruction: புதிய கடைக்கு Commercial Electricity Connection எப்படி வாங்குவது?
output:
**Commercial Electricity Connection (TANGEDCO):**

**Step 1: Online Application**
- Website: nsc.tnebnet.org
- Select: LT Commercial / HT Commercial
- Fill application form

**Step 2: Documents Upload**
- Ownership proof:
  - Own building: Sale Deed / Patta
  - Rent: Registered Rent Agreement
- Identity: Aadhaar + PAN
- Trade License / GST (if available)
- Building Completion Certificate
- Passport photo

**Step 3: Load Calculation**
- AC, Refrigerator, Lights, etc.
- Select appropriate load (kW)
- Higher load = Higher deposit

**Step 4: Inspection**
- TANGEDCO engineer visit
- Wiring check
- Meter location finalize
- Earthing check

**Step 5: Payment**

| Item | Amount (Approx) |
|------|----------------|
| Security Deposit | ₹1,500-15,000 |
| Service Connection | ₹500-2,000 |
| Meter Cost | ₹1,000-3,000 |
| Test Fee | ₹200-500 |

**Step 6: Connection**
- Meter installation
- Supply start
- **Time: 7-15 days**

**Tariff (Commercial LT):**
- Slab based
- Higher than domestic
- ToD (Time of Day) metering option

**HT Connection (Large Shops/Malls):**
- Load > 112 kW
- Separate application
- Transformer may be needed
- Higher deposit

**Tips:**
- Apply load slightly higher than need
- Load enhancement later is tedious
- Temporary connection available for construction

**Complaints:**
- 94987-94987
- TANGEDCO App
- EB Office visit

instruction: Interview-la common questions enna? Eppadi answer panrathu?
output: Common questions: 1) Tell about yourself - 2 min summary, relevant points 2) Strengths - with example proof 3) Weakness - genuine + improvement action 4) Why this company - research based answer 5) Where do you see yourself in 5 years - realistic goals 6) Why should we hire you - value proposition 7) Any questions - always ask 2-3 thoughtful ones. Practice: Mirror practice, record yourself, mock interviews. Dress: Formals, neat appearance.

instruction: Degree முடிஞ்சாச்சு. Job search பண்றதா, PG படிக்கறதா? Confused-ஆ இருக்கேன்.
output: Decision framework: Job now if: 1) Financial need urgent 2) Work experience wanted 3) Industry-specific UG sufficient. PG if: 1) Academic/Research interest 2) Specific career needs PG (MBA for management) 3) Higher salary jump. Middle path: Job + Distance PG (IGNOU, University) OR Work 2-3 years → PG. Reality: Both paths successful. No 'wrong' choice. Career isn't linear. Many do job → PG → better job. Decide based on YOUR goals, not others' opinions.

instruction: Kanchi Periyavar yaar?
output: Kanchi Periyavar (Chandrasekarendra Saraswati, 1894-1994) - Kanchi Kamakoti Peedathoda 68-vadhu Sankaracharyar. 13 vayathil sanniyaasam. 100 aandugal vaazhndaar. 'Walking God' endru azhaikkapattavar. India muzhuvathum nadanthe payanam seydhaar. Vedam, Saasthram, Dharmam ellavatrilum expert. 'Deivathin Kural' (Voice of God) - ivar pechugaloda collection, pala volumes. Hindu renaissance leader!

instruction: Workplace-la sexual harassment, POSH Act enna solluthu?
output: POSH Act 2013 (Prevention of Sexual Harassment): 1) Every office with 10+ employees - Internal Committee (IC) irukkanum, 2) Complaint: IC-kku 3 months-kkul, 3) Inquiry: 90 days-kkul complete, 4) Action: Transfer, warning, termination. No IC: Local Committee-kku complaint. Retaliation protection undu. Anonymous complaint-um valid.

instruction: Adakkamai-yoda vilaivuu enna?

instruction: Dr. Muthulakshmi Maternity Benefit Scheme என்ன?
output: TN government scheme: Rs.18,000 cash assistance. Eligibility: 1) TN resident, 2) Family income limit, 3) First two live births, 4) Institutional delivery, 5) Age 19+. Payment: 3 installments - during pregnancy, after delivery, after vaccination completion. Apply: PHC/Government hospital during registration. Documents: Ration card, Aadhar, bank account. Working women: Separate maternity benefit also applicable.

instruction: Oozhal / corruption patri enna solludhu Thirukkural?

instruction: உண்மையா பொய்யா: Myth: Tamil medium-ல் படிச்சா job கிடைக்காது
output: உண்மை: Fact: Language of education ≠ Job success. Tamil medium students succeed in: Government jobs (TNPSC, SSC), Teaching, Banking, Law, Business. English skill = learnable later. Many successful entrepreneurs, politicians, officers are Tamil medium. Focus: Strong foundation in concepts. English proficiency courses available free. Communication skills matter, not medium of instruction.

instruction: PM Krishi Sinchayee Yojana (PMKSY) endraal enna?
output: Water irrigation expansion scheme. Components: Har Khet Ko Pani (water availability), Per Drop More Crop (Micro irrigation - Drip/Sprinkler, 55% subsidy), Watershed Development. Benefit: 55% subsidy for drip irrigation, 30-50% water saving, 20-40% yield increase. Apply: Agriculture Department/Horticulture Department. Micro Irrigation Fund: ₹5,000 crore for states. Water Sources: Bore well, farm pond, check dam support.

instruction: Interview-ல் common questions என்ன? எப்படி answer பண்றது?

instruction: Thevaram, Divyaprabandham engge ketkalaam/padikkalaam?
output: Ketka/padikka vazhigal: 1) Kovilkalil - daily odhuvaargal paaduvaargal, 2) YouTube - Sirkali Govindarajan, DKJ, Bombay Sisters versions famous, 3) Spotify, Gaana apps - playlists ullana, 4) Project Madurai - free text online, 5) Tamil Virtual Academy, 6) Books - Giri Trading, Higginbothams, 7) Apps - Thevaram app, Divya Prabandham app. Morning/evening kettaal peaceful feeling. instruction: Pet animal-kku enna legal responsibilities?
output: Responsibilities: Registration (some municipalities), vaccination, leash in public, damage liability. Pet cruelty: PCA Act - 3 months imprisonment + Rs.100 fine (old law, amendments pending). Noise nuisance: Neighbour complaint valid. Banned breeds: Check local rules.

instruction: Antibiotics ellaa infection-kkum velai seyyumaa?
output: NO! Antibiotics only for: Bacterial infections. Useless for: Viral infections (cold, flu, most fevers, COVID). Problem: Overuse = antibiotic resistance (serious global threat). When needed: Doctor decides based on examination/tests. Don't: 1) Self-prescribe antibiotics, 2) Demand antibiotics for every fever, 3) Stop course early. Most colds/fevers: Viral - need rest, fluids, paracetamol only.

instruction: Wife maintenance எவ்வளவு கேட்கலாம்?
output: Fixed formula இல்லை. Consider: 1) Husband income, 2) Wife income/earning capacity, 3) Standard of living, 4) Children custody, 5) Liabilities. Rough guide: Husband income-ன் 25-30%. Interim maintenance: 20-25%. Court discretion based on facts.

instruction: Rameswaram koviloda sirappu enna?
output: Ramanathaswamy Kovil - 12 Jyotirlingam-kalil ondru. Sirappugal: 1) Neelamaana corridor - 1200+ meters (longest in India), 2) 22 theerthangal (sacred wells) - ellavatrilum kulippadu tradition, 3) Ramar kattiya kovil endra nambikkai, 4) Agni Theertham - kadalil kulippadu, 5) Sethu Bandhanam - Adam's Bridge nearby. Char Dham-la ondru. Varanasi-kku povatharkku mun inge varuvaargal.

instruction: என் புள்ளைக்கு fever வந்திருக்கு, GH போகலாமா?
output: GH போங்க, free treatment. ஆனா mild fever-க்கு PHC போதும். High fever, 3 days+ fever, fits, rash இருந்தா GH immediately. Chennai: 1) GH (Egmore/Stanley/Kilpauk), 2) ICH Egmore (children specialist). Token system - early போங்க. Documents: Ration card/Aadhar இருந்தா good. Emergency-க்கு எந்த document-உம் வேண்டாம்.

instruction: Infertility-க்கு Siddha treatment effective-ஆ?
output: Used traditionally for: Male infertility (low sperm count, motility), Female infertility (PCOS, irregular periods, hormone balance). Treatments: 1) Karpam (fertility medicines), 2) Nei Prasham (ghee preparations), 3) Specific Lehyams, 4) Shodhana (detoxification). Consultation: Detailed history, examination. Duration: 3-6 months typically. Combined: Many take with modern treatment. NIS: Fertility clinic available. Evidence: Research ongoing, traditional success claims.

instruction: Kovilukku pogum bodhu enna dress code follow pannanum?
output: Dress code guidelines: 1) Men - veshti/thundu preferred, lungi ok, shorts allowed in some temples, 2) Women - saree/churidar preferred, dress with dupatta ok, 3) No sleeveless, revealing clothes, 4) Remove footwear at entrance, 5) Big temples may rent dhotis if needed. Specific temples like Padmanabhaswamy (Kerala) strict - only traditional dress. Tirumala moderately strict. Most TN temples flexible but modest dress respectful. Carry plastic bag for footwear.

instruction: Maternity leave rights என்னென்ன?
output: Maternity Benefit Act 2017: 1) 26 weeks paid leave (first 2 children), 2) 12 weeks (3rd child onwards), 3) 12 weeks (adoption/surrogacy), 4) Work from home option (post leave), 5) Creche facility (50+ employees). Cannot terminate during pregnancy/leave. ESI: Maternity benefit through ESI if covered. Miscarriage: 6 weeks leave.

instruction: SIM swap fraud la account empty aaiduchu. Special procedure irukka?
output: Step 1 (FIRST): Call telecom - Airtel: 121/1800-103-4444, Jio: 198/1800-889-9999, Vi: 199/1800-119-1199, BSNL: 1800-180-1503. Say: 'Unauthorized SIM swap happened, block my number immediately.' Step 2: Call ALL banks simultaneously, freeze accounts, disable mobile/UPI banking. Step 3: Visit telecom store with original ID and police complaint, get new SIM. Step 4: FIR mentioning IT Act Section 66C (Identity Theft), Section 420 IPC (Cheating). Recovery chance: 30-50% if acted within 2-3 hours.

instruction: RTI-ல் என்ன information கேட்க முடியாது?
output: Exemptions (Section 8): 1) National security, 2) Foreign relations, 3) Trade secrets, 4) Cabinet papers, 5) Personal information (no public interest), 6) Investigation documents (pending case), 7) Fiduciary relationship. Public interest override possible for some exemptions.

instruction: Case status online-la eppadi check panradhu?
output: Websites: ecourts.gov.in (all courts), highcourtmadras.gov.in (Madras HC), sci.gov.in (Supreme Court). Search by: CNR number, party name, case number, advocate name. e-Courts app-um available. Cause list (daily hearing list) check pannalam.

instruction: Nayanmaar, Azhvaar samaadhigalai engge visit seiyalam?
output: Mukkiya samaadhigal: Nayanmars: 1) Thirugnana Sambandhar - Nalloor, 2) Appar - Thiruvaamoor, 3) Sundarar - Thiruvanchaikalam, 4) Manikkavasagar - Chidambaram, 5) Karaikkal Ammaiyar - Karaikkal. Azhvars: 1) Aandaal - Srivilliputhoor, 2) Nammaazhvar - Azhvaarthirunagari, 3) Periyaazhvar - Srivilliputhoor. Temple visit-la samaadhi darshan common practice.

instruction: Medical negligence case-க்கு என்ன evidence வேணும்?
output: Required: 1) All medical records (hospital bound to give), 2) Prescriptions, 3) Test reports, 4) Bills, 5) Expert medical opinion (another doctor's opinion), 6) Death certificate (if applicable). RTI மூலம் government hospital records பெறலாம்.

instruction: WhatsApp message 'GST special scheme for jewellers. 5000 registration for reduced compliance.' GST compliance easy aagum aa?
output: GST rules same for all jewellers - no 'special scheme' with reduced compliance. Composition scheme exists but through official GST portal. Anyone offering 'easy compliance' for payment is likely offering illegal shortcuts. Follow proper GST rules through gst.gov.in.

instruction: Online-la vaanguna phone-la problem, return panna maattengaraanga (Coimbatore style)
output: First screenshot ellam edunga. App-la complaint raise pannunga. Email-la grievance officer-kku complaint anuppunga. 7 days-la response illanna NCH-la complaint podunga. Consumer forum-la case podalam - free-dhaan 5 lakh varai.

instruction: Ayurveda doctor qualification enna?
output: Qualification: BAMS (Bachelor of Ayurvedic Medicine and Surgery) - 5.5 years. Higher: MD (Ayurveda), MS (Ayurveda surgery). Registration: Central/State Ayurveda Council. Verify: CCIM register online, displayed certificate. In TN: Fewer Ayurveda practitioners than Siddha. Colleges: Limited in TN - most trained elsewhere. Practice: Registered practitioners can practice across India.

instruction: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana (PMAY) - TN-la eppadi peruvadhu?
output: PMAY-Urban: Eligibility - EWS (income up to ₹3 lakh), LIG (₹3-6 lakh), MIG-I (₹6-12 lakh), MIG-II (₹12-18 lakh). Benefit: Interest subsidy 3-6.5%. Apply: pmay-urban.gov.in/CSC/Bank. PMAY-Gramin: Houseless as per SECC data. Assistance: ₹1.20 lakh (Plain)/₹1.30 lakh (Hilly). Apply: Gram Panchayat/Block Office. TN: Can also apply through TNHB

instruction: Accident case-ல் police இல்லாம treat பண்றாங்களா?
output: Yes! Supreme Court ruling - treat first. Good Samaritan Law: 1) Bystanders can help without legal hassle, 2) Hospital must treat without police clearance, 3) MLC formalities = AFTER stabilization, 4) No detention of patient/helper. Police role: Come to hospital for statement - not a condition for treatment. Refusal to treat: Report to police, Health Department, media.

instruction: Dowry demand-க்கு என்ன action எடுக்கலாம்?
output: Dowry கேட்பது/கொடுப்பது illegal (Dowry Prohibition Act). Complaint: Police, Women helpline 181, Protection Officer. Punishment: 5 years imprisonment + fine. Dowry death (304B IPC): 7 years to life imprisonment. Evidence: Messages, recordings, witness statements.

instruction: என்ன disease-க்கு எந்த yoga?
output: Condition-specific yoga: 1) Diabetes - Surya Namaskar, twists, Pranayama, 2) BP - Shavasana, forward bends, slow breathing, 3) Back pain - Cat-cow, child's pose, sphinx, 4) Anxiety/stress - Pranayama, meditation, restorative poses, 5) Obesity - Power yoga, Surya Namaskar, 6) Asthma - Pranayama, chest opening poses, 7) Insomnia - Yoga Nidra, legs up wall. Important: Learn from qualified teacher, start slow, inform about conditions.

instruction: மற்ற districts-ல் Siddha hospital இருக்கா?
output: Yes! TN Siddha infrastructure: 1) Government Siddha Medical Colleges - Palayamkottai, Tirunelveli (oldest), 2) District AYUSH hospitals - Every district, 3) Taluk level Siddha dispensaries, 4) PHC attached Siddha units. Major colleges: Tirunelveli, Chennai (2), Palani. All services free. Find: tnhealth.tn.gov.in or AYUSH department website. Total: 100+ government Siddha facilities in TN.

instruction: Nanban thurOgam seidhaal enna seivadhu?

instruction: Business fail ஆனால் என்ன குறள் motivate பண்ணும்?
