**Deadline:** August-October

instruction: 108 Divya Desangal endraal enna?
output: 12 Azhvaargalaal paadappatta 108 Vishnu kovilgal. Ivattril: 84 Tamil Nadu-la, 11 Kerala-la, 2 Andhra-la, 1 Gujarat-la, 2 Uttar Pradesh-la, 6 Nepal-la (Vaikunta), 2 mattravai. Ovvondrilum Perumal vevveru peyaril, vevveru form-la iruppaar. 'Nalayira Divya Prabandham' indha kovilgalai paadugiradhu. 108-m visit seivathu spiritual achievement.

instruction: Doctor prescription படிக்க முடியல - என்ன செய்வது?
output: Options: 1) Ask doctor to write clearly/print, 2) Request pharmacist to explain, 3) Ask doctor to explain each medicine - when, how many, how long, 4) Take photo and ask family member/friend, 5) Pharmacy apps can help identify. Rights: Doctor should explain medicines in your language. Tip: Ask doctor to write in capital letters. Important: Understand dosage, timing, food relation (before/after meals).

instruction: Minority scholarship (Muslims, Christians, Sikhs) eppadi apply seivathu?
output: Ministry of Minority Affairs Scholarships: 1) Pre-matric - Class 1-10, ₹1,000-6,000/year 2) Post-matric - Class 11 onwards, ₹3,000-11,000/year 3) Merit-cum-Means - Professional courses, ₹20,000+/year. Eligibility: Minority certificate, income ₹2-2.5 lakh/year kizha. Apply: NSP portal moolam. Muslims, Christians, Sikhs, Buddhists, Parsis, Jains eligible.

instruction: ஆயுஷ்மான் பாரத் (PMJAY) என்றால் என்ன?
output: ₹5 lakh free health insurance per family per year. Eligibility based on SECC 2011 BPL data. Check eligibility at pmjay.gov.in. Get card FREE at govt hospital/CSC with Aadhaar + ration card. Covers 1,500+ procedures at empanelled hospitals. In TN, combined with CMCHIS.

instruction: EC (Encumbrance Certificate) endraal enna?
output: Property-kku loan, mortgage, legal dispute irukkaa endru kaattum certificate. Vaangum mun 30 years EC check pannanum. Online: tnreginet.gov.in-la apply. Fee: Rs.120/year. 'Nil EC' = clear property.

instruction: Office-la boss unfair-aa nadandhukkondaal enna kural udhavum?
output: 'Poraiyudaimai porludaimai potrrich sirandhaan serivudaimai avviraN en'. Porumai enbadhu migapperiya selvam. Unfair situation-la porumaiyaaga irundhu, right time-la action edukavum. Emotional reaction avoid pannunga. Document everything, stay professional.

instruction: Democracy / jananayagam concept Thirukkuralil ulladha?
output: Neradiyaaga 'democracy' illai, aanaal concepts ullana: 'Iraimaatchi' - nalla aatchiyoda adaiyaалangal. 'Kudiseyalvagai' - makkal pangaetpu. Melum: 'Sevikkuna villAdha pozhdu siRidhum ivakkum iraachchiyam il'. Makkal kural ketkkaadha arasu veezhum. Accountability to people - democratic principle in ancient text!

instruction: Piles/hemorrhoids-kku Siddha treatment?
output: Effective Siddha treatment! Moola Noi (piles) treatments: 1) Internal - Chitramutti Lehyam, Abhaya Arishtam, 2) External - Elathi Choornam application, Sitz bath with herbal decoction, 3) Agni karma (cauterization) for advanced, 4) Kshara application. Diet crucial: High fiber, avoid spicy. Duration: 1-2 months for mild, longer for severe. Surgery alternative: Siddha procedures for Grade 2-3 piles.

instruction: Instagram la someone friend aachhu - same interests, daily chat, now 'send your photo, I'll send mine' nu kekuraan. Vera personal questions um kekkuraan.
output: DANGER - this is grooming pattern. Adults pretend as teens, build trust, ask for photos/info. NEVER share personal photos, address, school name with online strangers. Tell parents/trusted adult immediately. Block and report the account.

instruction: Chennai-la Metro Water Connection eppadi?
output: Apply at chennaimetrowater.tn.gov.in with property document, building plan, tax receipt, Aadhaar. Site inspection for feasibility. Charges: Connection ₹500-2,000, deposit ₹500-1,000, road cutting extra. Monthly bill ₹70-400 (domestic). Helpline: 044-4567 4567.

instruction: National Institute of Siddha (NIS) special treatments என்ன?
output: NIS Tambaram specialties: 1) Noi Naadal (diagnostics), 2) Maruthuvam (general medicine), 3) Kuzhanthai Maruthuvam (pediatrics), 4) Sirappu Maruthuvam (specialties), 5) Nanju Nool (toxicology), 6) Gunapadam (pharmacology), 7) Pothu Maruthuvam. Special: 1) Varmam unit, 2) Panchakarma therapies, 3) Yoga therapy, 4) Research wing. Referral: Complex cases from all over India. Contact: 044-22411611.

instruction: Medicine missed dose - double dose எடுக்கலாமா?
output: Generally NO! Rules vary: 1) Most medicines - take when remembered, skip if close to next dose, 2) Never double dose unless doctor says, 3) Blood pressure/diabetes - specific rules, 4) Antibiotics - complete course important. Dangerous to double: Blood thinners, heart medicines, insulin. Safe practice: 1) Set reminders, 2) Pill boxes, 3) Ask pharmacist/doctor specific instructions. If unsure: Call doctor before taking.

instruction: Employer-கிட்ட mental health issue சொல்லணுமா?
output: Not mandatory to disclose. Rights: 1) No termination for mental illness (disability discrimination), 2) Reasonable accommodation (flexible hours, WFH), 3) Medical leave like any illness, 4) Confidentiality if disclosed. When to consider: If need accommodation, if affecting work significantly. Protection: RPD Act 2016 + MHCA 2017. Termination for mental illness: Challenge in labor court.

instruction: Salary thara maattengaraanga, 3 months pending - enna seivathu?
output: Options: 1) Written demand to employer, 2) Labour Inspector complaint, 3) Labour Court (if >Rs.15,000 dispute), 4) Civil Court recovery suit. Payment of Wages Act: Salary delay = interest + penalty. Documents: Appointment letter, salary slips, bank statements.

instruction: Medical negligence endraal enna?
output: Medical negligence = Doctor/hospital standard of care fail. Elements: 1) Duty of care existed, 2) Breach of duty (below standard), 3) Injury occurred, 4) Injury caused by breach. Examples: Wrong surgery, missed diagnosis, wrong medicine, surgical tools left inside, infection due to poor hygiene. Not negligence: Treatment failure despite proper care, known complications.

instruction: NEET Result-ku appuram Counselling eppadi nadakkum? TN-la seats eppadi kidaikkum?
output:
**NEET Counselling:**

**Types:**
1. All India Quota (15%) - MCC
2. State Quota (85%) - TN Selection Committee

**TN Website:** tnmedicalselection.org

**Process:**
1. Online Registration + Documents + Fee
2. Choice Filling - List colleges in preference
3. Seat Allotment - Based on rank + choice + category
4. Reporting - Go to college, verify, pay, confirm

**TN Reservation:**
- OC 31%, BC 26.5%, MBC 20%, SC 18%, ST 1%
- 7.5% Govt school within each

**Fees:**
- Govt: ₹15,000/year
- Self-Finance: ₹5-15 lakh/year
- Deemed: ₹10-25 lakh/year

**Timing:** July-August usually

instruction: நான் நிலம் / வீடு வாங்க போகிறேன். என்னென்ன சரிபார்க்க வேண்டும்? Registration எப்படி செய்வது?
output:
வாங்குவதற்கு முன் சரிபார்க்க வேண்டியவை:
1. Title Verification - 30 வருட Parent Document Chain - Lawyer verify
2. EC (Encumbrance Certificate) - tnreginet.gov.in - 30 years
3. Patta & Chitta - eservices.tn.gov.in/landrecords
4. TSLR Extract (FMB) - நிலத்தின் அளவு
5. Tax Receipts - Property Tax paid-ஆ?
6. Approved Layout - DTCP/CMDA/RERA
7. Land Use - Agricultural/Residential?

Registration:
8. Stamp Duty: 7% + Registration: 4% = ~11%
9. Sale Deed - Lawyer-உடன் prepare
10. Sub-Registrar - Both parties + 2 witnesses
11. Post-Registration: Patta transfer at Taluk Office

PMAY Benefit: முதல் வீடு - 3-6.5% வட்டி மானியம்

instruction: UGC scholarship MA/MSc/PhD students-ku enna?
output: UGC Scholarships: 1) Non-NET Fellowship - ₹8,000/month MPhil/PhD 2) JRF (through NET) - ₹31,000/month 3) SRF (2 years after JRF) - ₹35,000/month 4) Rajiv Gandhi National Fellowship (SC/ST PhD) - ₹31,000-35,000/month 5) Maulana Azad National Fellowship (Minorities PhD). Apply: www.ugc.ac.in. NET exam pass aanaal automatic JRF.

instruction: JEE Main & Advanced endraal enna? IIT-ku eppadi povadhu?
output:
**JEE Exam:**

**Two Levels:**
1. **JEE Main:** For NITs, IIITs, State colleges
2. **JEE Advanced:** For IITs only (after Main qualify)

**JEE Main Pattern:**
- Physics, Chemistry, Maths - 100 marks each
- Total: 300 marks, 90 questions
- Online exam, 3 hours
- Negative marking: -1

**IIT Path:**
12th PCM (75%) → JEE Main (Top 2.5L) → JEE Advanced → IIT

**TN Students:**
- TNEA uses JEE Main score option
- Anna University through TNEA: tneaonline.org

**Attempts:** 2 per year, Max in 3 consecutive years

instruction: Divorce case pending-la irukkum bodhu remarry pannalaamaa?
output: Mudiyaadhu - Bigamy (IPC 494) aagividum. Decree kidaitha piragu 90 days appeal period undu. Appeal period mudinja piragae remarry pannalam. Bigamy-kku 7 years imprisonment.

instruction: Inter-caste/Inter-religion marriage register eppadi seivathu?
output: Special Marriage Act 1954-in keezh register seyyalam. 30 days notice period undu. Any religion/caste manamaakkal register pannalam. Parents consent not required (if major). Inter-caste marriage-kku TN government Rs.50,000 incentive scheme undu.

instruction: Myth or Fact: Myth: Marks mattum important, extra-curricular waste
output: Fact: Fact: Balanced development essential. Extra-curricular benefits: 1) Sports quota admission 2) Stress relief = better study 3) Personality development 4) College applications value it 5) Soft skills development. Reality: Toppers also play sports, music, participate in activities. Time management skill learned. All-rounder students more successful in career long-term.

instruction: Depression-kku disability certificate kidaikkumaa?
output: Yes, if severe. RPD Act 2016: Mental illness included as disability. Requirements: 1) Benchmark disability (40%+), 2) Certified by medical board (district hospital), 3) UDID card application. Benefits: 1) Reservation in education/jobs, 2) Income tax exemption, 3) Travel concession, 4) Scholarship eligibility. Process: Apply at district hospital disability assessment camp or SADAREM.

instruction: Generic medicine weak, branded strong - unmaiyaa?
output: MYTH! Same active ingredient, same dose = same effect. Why generic cheaper: No brand marketing cost, no patent royalty. Quality: Government-approved generics meet same standards. Proof: Government hospitals use generic - same results. Jan Aushadhi: WHO-GMP certified, 50-90% cheaper. Don't fall for: Marketing claims, fancy packaging. Ask pharmacist: Generic alternative for any branded medicine.

instruction: Lawyer fees எவ்வளவு reasonable?
output: Varies: Junior lawyer - Rs.5,000-25,000 per case, Senior - Rs.50,000-5 lakhs+, Supreme Court - Rs.2 lakhs+. Fee agreement writing-ல் வாங்குங்க. Excessive fee: Bar Council complaint. Free legal aid: DLSA (income <Rs.3 lakh). Legal fee insurance available.

instruction: 'Nayanilan enbadhu sollum' - selfish person patriya kural enna?
output: Kural: 'Nayanilan enbadhu sollum payanila sollizhuk kuttravar natpu'. Artham: Payanatra pecchu pesupavargaloda natpu, 'ivar selfish' endru kaattiVidum. Quality of friendship shows character. Your friends reflect who you are!

instruction: PAN Card தொலைந்துவிட்டது - Duplicate எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: 1. e-PAN Download (Free): eportal.incometax.gov.in → Instant e-PAN, Aadhaar OTP verification, PDF download. 2. Physical Duplicate: onlineservices.nsdl.com → 'Reprint of PAN Card', கட்டணம் ₹50, 15-20 நாட்களில் வரும். 3. PAN Number மறந்துவிட்டால்: incometax.gov.in → Know Your PAN, Name + DOB + Mobile கொடுத்து கண்டுபிடிக்கலாம்

instruction: MRP-க்கு மேல charge பண்றாங்க - complain எப்படி?
output: Illegal! Legal Metrology Act violation. MRP = Maximum Retail Price (inclusive of all taxes). Action: 1) Point out MRP printed on pack, 2) Refuse to pay excess, 3) Complaint: Weights and Measures Department (Legal Metrology), 4) Consumer helpline: 1800-11-4000. Evidence: Bill + photo of MRP on pack. Penalty: Fine on seller. Hospital pharmacy also bound by MRP.

instruction: Power of Attorney ethanai types? Edhu safe?
output: Types: 1) General POA - all acts (risky), 2) Special POA - specific acts only (safer), 3) Durable POA - continues even if principal incapacitated. Registration: Property transactions - compulsory registration. Revocation: Written revocation + newspaper publication. Safe practice: Special POA with specific purpose + time limit. Never give blank POA!

instruction: Aadhaar address update online eppadi seyvadhu?
output:
Online Method (easiest):
1. Login: myaadhaar.uidai.gov.in
2. OTP: Registered mobile-la varum
3. Select: 'Update Address'
4. Enter new address
5. Upload document: Passport/Bank Statement/EB Bill/Rent Agreement (PDF < 2MB)
6. Pay: ₹50 online
7. Note URN (Update Request Number)
8. Time: 2-3 weeks-la new Aadhaar varum

Address Validation Letter (Document illaadha case):
1. myaadhaar → Address Update → 'Request for AVL'
2. Enter Verifier details (relative/friend at new address)
3. Verifier-ku letter pogum
4. Verifier consent kodutha update aagum

instruction: Pudhiya ration card eppadi peruvadhu?
output: Apply at tnpds.gov.in or Taluk Office. Documents: All family members' Aadhaar, address proof, income certificate, gas connection details, photos. Types: PHH (₹1 rice), AAY (free rice), NPHH. RI inspection, 30-45 days processing.

instruction: TNEB electricity complaint எப்படி போடுவது?
output: Options: 1) TANGEDCO helpline: 1912, 2) Online: tangedco.gov.in, 3) TNEB app, 4) Local section office. Issues: Billing errors, connection delay, power cut, meter fault. Escalation: AE → EE → SE → CE. Consumer Grievance Redressal Forum (CGRF) for unresolved issues.

instruction: NMMS Exam endraal enna? Eppadi prepare seyvadhu?
output:
**NMMS Exam:**

**What:** Scholarship exam for Class 8
**Benefit:** ₹12,000/year for Class 9-12

**Eligibility:**
- Class 8 Govt school student
- 55%+ in Class 7 (SC/ST: 50%)
- Income < ₹3.5 lakh

**Exam:**
- MAT: 90 questions (Reasoning)
- SAT: 90 questions (Science, Social, Maths)
- 90 minutes each

**Preparation:**
1. Class 7-8 NCERT/State Board
2. Previous papers practice
3. Reasoning books

**Timeline:** Apply July-Aug, Exam Nov, Result Jan
**Apply:** Through School HM

instruction: Important exam dates 2024-25
output: Board Exams: 10th March, 12th March. NEET: May first week. JEE Main: January & April sessions. TNPSC Group 4: Throughout year. TNEA counselling: June-July. College admissions: June-August. GATE: February. CAT: November. CLAT: December.

instruction: Poramboke land என்றால் என்ன? அதை வாங்கலாமா?
output: Poramboke = Government reserved land (roads, water bodies, grazing land). இதை யாரும் own பண்ண முடியாது, sell/buy பண்ண முடியாது. Poramboke land-ல் construction illegal - demolish ஆகும். Land classification: eservices.tn.gov.in-ல் check பண்ணுங்க.

instruction: Live-in relationship legal-aa?
output: Aama, adult consenting partners-kku legal. Supreme Court recognized. DV Act protection apply aagum. Aanaal marriage benefits (inheritance, maintenance as spouse) automatic illa. Long-term live-in partners-kku certain rights undu.

instruction: Free legal aid எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: Eligible: Women, children, SC/ST, disabled, victims of trafficking, industrial workers, custody persons, income < Rs.3 lakh/year. Apply: District Legal Services Authority (DLSA), Taluk Legal Services Committee. Court-லும் request பண்ணலாம். Toll-free: 15100.

instruction: கிராமப்புற மாணவர்களுக்கு என்ன special schemes இருக்கு?
output:
**கிராமப்புற மாணவர் சலுகைகள்:**

**1. PMSSS (PM Special Scholarship - J&K pattern for TN):**
- For rural meritorious students
- Full fee + Maintenance

**2. Rural Talent Search:**
- Special exams for rural students
- Winners get scholarship

**3. Eklavya Model Residential Schools:**
- For tribal areas
- Free education + Hostel + Food
- CBSE curriculum
- emrs.tribal.gov.in

**4. Kasturba Gandhi Balika Vidyalaya (KGBV):**
- For rural girls (Class 6-12)
- Residential schools
- SC/ST/OBC/Minority focus

**5. Free Hostel Scheme:**
- BC/MBC/SC/ST hostels in all districts
- Free accommodation + Food
- Apply: Respective welfare departments

**6. Transport Allowance:**
- For students traveling from villages
- ₹500-1,000/month

**7. Special Coaching (Rural):**
- TNSF rural NEET coaching
- Block-level coaching centers
- Weekend residential programs

**8. Agriculture Education:**
- Special quota for rural students in Agri colleges
- TNAU reservations

**9. Rural Internship Priority:**
- Govt jobs rural posting preference
- Medical seats rural bond

**10. Distance Education:**
- IGNOU, TNOU centers in rural areas
- Study materials delivered

**How to Avail:**
- Get rural area certificate from VAO
- Apply through school
- Contact Block Education Officer

instruction: Defence force join ஆக training எங்கே கிடைக்கும்?
output: Defence training options: 1) Sainik Schools - Class 6 admission (for NDA prep) 2) Army rally coaching - District soldiers boards 3) NDA coaching - Government free centers 4) Agnipath training - TNSDC centers 5) Private coaching institutes. Physical fitness: Running, pull-ups, sit-ups practice daily. Written exam: Maths, English, GK. Medical: Strict standards. Apply: www.joinindianarmy.nic.in. Age: 17.5-21 (varies by entry).

instruction: Employment Exchange-la register eppadi seyvadhu?
output: Online at tnvelaivaaippu.gov.in → OTR (One Time Registration). Documents: Educational certificates, community certificate, Aadhaar, photo. Benefits: Govt job notifications, private opportunities, skill training. Renew every 3 years. Also available at District Employment Office.

instruction: AICTE scholarship engineering students-க்கு என்ன உள்ளது?
output: AICTE Scholarships: 1) Pragati - Women in technical education, ₹50,000/ஆண்டு 2) Saksham - Differently abled students, ₹50,000/ஆண்டு 3) Swanath - Orphan students 4) PM's Special Scholarship - J&K students. Additional: GATE qualified students-க்கு ₹12,400/மாதம் scholarship ME/M.Tech-ல். Apply: www.aicte-india.org. Income limit: ₹8 lakh/ஆண்டு.

instruction: TN மாற்றுத்திறனாளி ஓய்வூதியம்/உதவி என்ன?
output: மாற்றுத்திறனாளிகளுக்கு TN benefits. Pension: ₹1,500/month (40%+ disability). Aids: Free wheelchair, hearing aid, artificial limbs, crutches. Education: Free education + special hostels. Employment: 4% reservation in govt jobs. Bus: Free travel (ordinary buses). Loan: Subsidy loan for self-employment. UDID Card: Unique Disability ID - all benefits-க்கு கட்டாயம். Apply: Social Welfare dept/Taluk office.

instruction: தெருக்கூத்து என்றால் என்ன?
output: தெருக்கூத்து - தமிழ்நாட்டின் traditional street theatre. இரவு முழுவதும் நடக்கும். Mahabharata, Ramayana கதைகள் popular. சிறப்புகள்: 1) வண்ண makeup - face painting, 2) Elaborate costumes, 3) Live music - harmonium, thavil, 4) Dialog + song + dance, 5) Audience participation. Kanchipuram, Villupuram areas-ல் famous. UNESCO Intangible Cultural Heritage list-ல் consideration-க்கு. Village entertainment before TV/cinema வந்தது!

instruction: Gangaikonda Cholapuram koviloda sirappu enna?
output: Rajendra Chozhan thandhaiyoda ninaivaga kattiya kovil. Sirappugal: 1) Thanjai kovilai pondrae aanaal satru siriya alavu, 2) Lion base pilasters - unique feature, 3) Sirpangal miga azhagu - Nataraja, Saraswati, 4) Gangaiyai vendradhoda ninaivaga indha peyar, 5) Oru kaalathil pudhiya thalainagaram ingethan. Ariyalur district-la ulladhu. Thanjai alavu crowd illai - peaceful visit possible.

instruction: Anesthesia-ல் problem ஆச்சு - claim?
output: Anesthesia complications: 1) Awareness during surgery, 2) Brain damage from hypoxia, 3) Allergic reaction (if not checked), 4) Nerve damage, 5) Death. Liability: 1) Anesthesiologist (primary), 2) Surgeon (team), 3) Hospital. Evidence: Anesthesia chart, monitoring records, drug records. Pre-op assessment: Should identify risks. Informed consent: Specific to anesthesia needed.

instruction: Coimbatore-la engineering padikka nalla college edhu?
output: PSG Tech (autonomous - best ranking), GCT (government), CIT, Amrita, KGISL ellam top colleges. PSG-kku TNEA counselling la high cutoff varum. GCT government college - fees romba koraivau.

instruction: என் பையன்/பொண்ணு college-ல் வெளியூர் போறாங்க. எப்படி support பண்றது?
output: Parent support tips: 1) Regular communication - but not controlling 2) Visit once in first month - help settle 3) Emergency contact with warden establish 4) Bank account with adequate funds 5) UPI/GPay teach for daily expenses 6) Health insurance ensure 7) Trust them - allow independence 8) Listen without judging when they share problems 9) Homesickness normal - patience. Balance: Support without helicopter parenting. They're growing up!

instruction: Konganar Siddhar yaar? Avar contributions enna?
output: Konganar (Kongana Siddhar) Bogar-oda sishyar. Kongu naattai serndavar enbathaal indha peyar. Siddha medicine-la miga mukkiyamaana contributions seidhavar. Noigaloda diagnosis methods, marundhu thayaarippu muraigal patri virivaga ezhuthiyavar. 'Konganar Vaiththiya Soothiram' migavum famous.

instruction: முக்கிய மத்திய அரசு இணையதளங்கள் என்ன?
output: All Services: services.india.gov.in, Aadhaar: uidai.gov.in / myaadhaar.uidai.gov.in, PAN: incometax.gov.in, Scholarships: scholarships.gov.in, Pension: maandhan.in, PM-KISAN: pmkisan.gov.in, Ayushman Bharat: pmjay.gov.in, PMAY Housing: pmay-urban.gov.in, Education Loan: vidyalakshmi.co.in, Skill Training: pmkvyofficial.org, MUDRA Loan: mudra.org.in, Street Vendor: pmsvanidhi.mohua.gov.in, LPG: mylpg.in, DigiLocker: digilocker.gov.in

instruction: Defective product vaangiten - enna seyyalam?
output: Options: 1) Replacement - same product pudhiyathaa, 2) Refund - full amount thirumba, 3) Repair - free of cost sari seyya, 4) Compensation - loss-kku extra amount. Mudhalil seller-kitta written complaint kodunga. Response illaattal consumer forum ponga.

instruction: Primary Health Centre (PHC) என்றால் என்ன? என்ன services கிடைக்கும்?
output: PHC = Village/block level government health facility. Free services: 1) Basic consultation, 2) Common illness treatment, 3) Maternal care, 4) Child immunization, 5) Family planning, 6) Minor wound dressing, 7) Basic lab tests, 8) Medicine dispensing, 9) Health education. Timings: Usually 9 AM - 4 PM. Staff: Doctor, nurse, pharmacist, lab technician. Referral: To CHC/District Hospital if needed.

instruction: NEET exam pattern என்ன? எத்தனை marks?
output: NEET UG Pattern: Total 200 questions (180 attempt), 720 marks. Subjects: Physics 45+15 Qs, Chemistry 45+15 Qs, Biology 90+10 Qs. Marking: +4 correct, -1 wrong. Duration: 3 hours 20 minutes. Cutoff 2024: General 720-137, OBC 136-107, SC/ST 136-107. Language: English, Hindi, Tamil + 10 regional. Exam: May (yearly). Syllabus: Class 11 & 12 NCERT Physics, Chemistry, Biology.

instruction: Evening college-la padikkalamaa? Working people-ku option?
output: Evening college options: 1) University of Madras evening courses 2) Annamalai University distance + contact 3) IGNOU weekend classes 4) Polytechnic evening batches (limited). Timings: Usually 6-9 PM. Courses: BA, B.Com, BBA, LLB. Benefits: Work + study together, degree = regular degree value. Alternative: Distance education from TNOU, IGNOU - study anytime. Some employers sponsor employee education.

instruction: Data Science, AI courses-க்கு எந்த college best?
output: IIT Madras (BSc in Data Science - online), Anna University, VIT, SRM, PSG Tech ஆகியவற்றில் AI/ML courses உள்ளன. IIT Madras online degree affordable-ஆகவும் flexible-ஆகவும் இருக்கு.

instruction: Divorce-க்கு என்னென்ன grounds இருக்கு?
output: Hindu Marriage Act grounds: 1) Adultery, 2) Cruelty (physical/mental), 3) Desertion (2+ years), 4) Conversion to another religion, 5) Unsound mind, 6) Venereal disease, 7) Renunciation (sanyasa), 8) Not heard alive for 7 years. Wife additional ground: Husband has another wife.

instruction: WhatsApp group 'TET/TRB coaching material - 10,000 for complete package with question papers and answers.' Exam prepare pannanum, buy pannalama?
output: Official TET/TRB materials available free on TRB website. Many YouTube channels provide free coaching. 'Question papers with answers' promise is fraudulent - papers are confidential. If they have papers, it's either fake or illegal.

instruction: Pudhiya electricity connection eppadi peruvadhu?
output: Apply at nsc.tnebnet.org with ownership proof (sale deed/rent agreement), Aadhaar, building certificate. Inspection by TANGEDCO. Charges: Deposit ₹500-15,000 based on load. Time: 7-15 days. Agricultural connection: FREE electricity for farming.

instruction: Vellinaadu padippuku education loan eppadi vaanguvadhu?
output: Bank loan options: 1) SBI Scholar Loan - up to ₹1.5 crore 2) Bank of Baroda Vidya Lakshmi 3) HDFC Credila 4) Avanse. Requirements: Admission letter, I-20/CAS, collateral (₹7.5 lakh mela loan-ku). Vidya Lakshmi Portal (www.vidyalakshmi.co.in) - ore idathula pala banks-la apply pannalam. Interest: 8-12%.

instruction: Ayurveda/Siddha medicine safe-aa? Regulation irukkaa?
output: Regulated under AYUSH Ministry. Safety: Licensed products from registered manufacturers = regulated. Risks: 1) Heavy metals in some (lead, mercury), 2) Unlicensed products dangerous, 3) Interactions with allopathy. Verify: 1) AYUSH license number on pack, 2) Manufacturing license, 3) Batch number, expiry. Government: AYUSH hospitals provide regulated treatment. Caution: Inform allopathic doctor if taking AYUSH medicines.

instruction: Kadai thodanga enna permission vendum?
output: 1. GST registration (above ₹40 lakh turnover) 2. Trade License: Municipality/Gram Panchayat 3. Shop & Establishment Act: tnlabour.tn.gov.in 4. FSSAI License (food business): fssai.gov.in 5. Fire Safety Certificate (large shops)

instruction: Advocate hire panna budget illa. Free legal help eppidi kedaikum?
output: District Legal Services Authority (DLSA): Every district has one, free lawyers for eligible (income <₹3L), application at District Court. Taluk Legal Services Committee: Taluk level. State Legal Services: tnsla.gov.in (Tamil Nadu), Helpline 15100 (NALSA). Law School Clinics: NLU, NLSIU - free consultation. NGOs: Human Rights Law Network, Alternative Law Forum, PUCL. Eligible: SC/ST, Women/Children, Senior citizens, Disabled, Industrial workmen, Trafficking/disaster victims, Below income threshold. Documents: Income certificate, ID proof, case documents.

instruction: NEET-ஆ JEE-ஆ? Doctor-ஆ Engineer-ஆ? எப்படி decide பண்றது?
output: Decision factors: 1) Interest - Patient care vs Problem solving 2) Study style - Memory vs Logic 3) Duration - MBBS 5.5 years vs Engineering 4 years 4) Investment - Medical costlier 5) Lifestyle - Doctor on-call vs Engineer 9-5. Self-assessment: Biology enjoy பண்றீங்களா = NEET. Maths/Physics enjoy = JEE. Both attempt possible (Science stream). Shadow a doctor and engineer if possible. Final call: Your genuine interest, not family pressure.

instruction: Small claims court-ல் case போடலாமா? Procedure என்ன?
output: Consumer disputes-க்கு: District Consumer Forum (Rs.1 crore வரை). Civil disputes: Regular civil court. Small Causes Court: Chennai-ல் available - Rs.1 lakh-க்குள் claims, fast track. Procedure: 1) Complaint draft, 2) Court fee pay (nominal), 3) Filing, 4) Hearing dates, 5) Judgment. Lawyer optional for small claims. E-filing: ecourts.gov.in

instruction: 'Anangukkol aaimayil kollo' - kaadhaloda mudhal paarvai patriya kural enna?
output: Kural: 'Anangukkol aaimayil kollo kanangkuzhai maatharkkol maalum en nenju'. Artham: Ival devadhaya, azhagiya mayila, penna? En manam kuzhambugiradu. Love at first sight-a azhagaga vivarikkum kural. Kaadhaloda dhigaippai idhu kaattugiradu.

instruction: Respiratory problems-க்கு (asthma, bronchitis) Siddha?
output: Siddha for Swasakasam (respiratory): Asthma, bronchitis, allergic rhinitis, sinusitis. Medicines: 1) Thalisathi Choornam, 2) Adathodai Kudineer, 3) Kantharasam, 4) Poorna Chandrodayam. Therapies: 1) Steam inhalation with herbs, 2) Nasiyam (nasal drops), 3) Chest application with specific oils. Preventive: Build immunity, avoid triggers. Works well: For chronic management, reducing frequency of attacks.

instruction: ஒருத்தன் கடன் வாங்கிட்டு திரும்ப தரல, என்ன பண்றது?
output: Steps: 1) Written reminder அனுப்புங்க, 2) Legal notice (registered post), 3) Response இல்ல = court case. Evidence: Cheque/transfer proof, WhatsApp messages, witnesses. Rs.20 lakh-க்குள்: Summary suit (faster). Criminal: Cheque bounce ஆனா Section 138 case. Limitation: 3 years. Pro tip: Promissory note வாங்கியிருந்தா strong case.

instruction: MUDRA Loan eppadi vaanguvadhu?
output: Collateral-free business loan from any bank. Shishu: up to ₹50,000, Kishore: up to ₹5 lakh, Tarun: up to ₹10 lakh. Apply at bank or mudra.org.in with business plan, ID proof, address proof. Interest: 8-12%. Good for starting/expanding small business.

instruction: NEET/JEE-க்கு Free Coaching எங்கே கிடைக்கும்?
output:
**Free NEET/JEE Coaching in Tamil Nadu:**

**1. Tamil Nadu Government Free Coaching:**

**a) Naan Mudhalvan Program:**
- Free NEET/JEE coaching
- Online + Offline
- Apply: naanmudhalvan.tn.gov.in

**b) District-level Free Coaching:**
- Collector Office conducts
- Weekend classes
- Free materials
- Apply through school HM

**2. TNSF (Tamil Nadu Science Forum):**
- Free NEET coaching for rural students
- Residential program
- tnsf.org.in

**3. Super 30 Programs:**
- Various NGOs run
- Selection through test
- Free coaching + Hostel + Food
- Mainly for SC/ST/EWS

**4. ANTHE (Aakash National Talent Hunt):**
- Scholarship exam
- Up to 100% fee waiver
- aakash.ac.in

**5. Allen Scholarship Test (TALLENTEX):**
- Up to 90% scholarship
- allen.ac.in

**6. Government Residential Schools:**
- Eklavya Model Schools (Tribal)
- Jawahar Navodaya Vidyalaya
- Free coaching included

**7. Online Free Resources:**

| Platform | Content |
|----------|--------|
| SWAYAM | Free courses |
| Khan Academy | All subjects |
| Physics Wallah | NEET/JEE |
| Unacademy Free | Limited access |
| Vedantu Free | Basic content |
| Kalvi TV | TN syllabus |

**8. SC/ST/BC Specific:**
- Dr. Ambedkar Free Coaching
- BC/MBC Free Coaching Scheme
- Apply: bcmbcmw.tn.gov.in

**How to Find:**
1. Ask school HM
2. District Collector Office
3. Social Welfare Department
4. Local MLAs often sponsor

**Tip:** Apply to multiple programs - increase chances!

instruction: Naanga Sri Lankan Tamil refugee. En pillaikku education kidaikkuma?
output: Sri Lankan Tamil refugee education: 1) Government schools - Free admission for refugee camp children 2) Special coaching provided 3) TN Government scholarship for refugee students 4) UNHCR education support 5) Higher education: Special quota in some colleges. Documents: Camp registration, UNHCR certificate. Support organizations: READ, OFERR. Many refugee children have succeeded - IIT, Medical, Government jobs. Don't lose hope!

instruction: Medicine MRP-க்கு மேல charge பண்றாங்க - legal-ஆ?
output: ILLEGAL! MRP = Maximum Retail Price. Law: Legal Metrology Act - selling above MRP is punishable. Hospital excuse: "Service charges" - not valid for medicines. Action: 1) Point out MRP on strip/bottle, 2) Refuse to pay excess, 3) Weights and Measures Department complaint, 4) Consumer Forum. Penalty: Fine + compensation. Document: Photo of MRP vs bill amount.

instruction: Divorce-kku ennenna grounds irukku?
output: Hindu Marriage Act grounds: 1) Adultery, 2) Cruelty (physical/mental), 3) Desertion (2+ years), 4) Conversion to another religion, 5) Unsound mind, 6) Venereal disease, 7) Renunciation (sanyasa), 8) Not heard alive for 7 years. Wife additional ground: Husband has another wife.

instruction: Aadhaar biometric lock eppadi seyvadhu? Yen seiyyanum?
output:
Yen Lock seiyyanum:
- Yaarum unga Aadhaar misuse seiyya mudiyaadhu
- Fake SIM, fake bank account open panna mudiyaadhu
- Only you can unlock when needed

Eppadi Lock seyvadhu:
1. Go to: myaadhaar.uidai.gov.in
2. Login: Aadhaar + OTP
3. Click: 'Lock/Unlock Biometrics'
4. Select: 'Lock'
5. Confirm: Done!

Unlock seiyya:
- Same process, 'Unlock' select
- Temporarily unlock for specific use
- Auto re-lock option available

Virtual ID (VID) - Better option:
1. myaadhaar → VID Generator
2. 16-digit temporary number kidaikum
3. Aadhaar-ku badhila VID kodukalam
4. Anytime new VID generate pannalam

instruction: Employer experience letter/relieving letter தர மறுக்கிறார்
output: Steps: 1) Written request (email/letter), 2) HR head escalation, 3) Labour Commissioner complaint, 4) Civil Court mandatory injunction. Documents rightfully yours. Background verification-ல் issue வரும் - previous employer-க்கு new employer-கிட்ட explain பண்ணுங்க.

instruction: Fake job offer ku processing fee potten, now company traceable illa. Recovery eppidi?
output: Immediate: Collect company details, analyze email headers, note payment beneficiary details. Report to: cybercrime.gov.in (Job fraud category), Labour Department labour.gov.in, Company impersonated (fake TCS/Infosys letter - report to real company), Job portal used, Bank complaint for beneficiary account freeze. Recovery: Police tracing beneficiary, if domestic scammer caught - court recovery, if international - very difficult. Prevention for others: Share fake offer on LinkedIn, report to portals.

instruction: Engineering counselling-la random number enna? Eppadi work aagum?
output: Random number: Same marks students-ku tie-breaker. System generated, not controllable. Priority: 1st - Cutoff marks, 2nd - Random number (if same marks). Example: You 195 cutoff, random 50000. Another person 195 cutoff, random 10000. They get priority. Impact: Matters only when competing for last few seats in popular colleges. Strategy: Higher marks = random number irrelevant. Focus on marks, not luck.

instruction: 12th exam-la centum vaanga mudiyumaa? Eppadi?
output: Centum possible subjects: Maths, Physics, Chemistry, Computer Science, Accountancy. Tips: 1) NCERT concepts thelivaaga purindhukollunga 2) Formula sheet thayaariyunga 3) Numerical problems: 50+ types practice 4) Diagram neat-aa draw pannunga 5) Answer writing: Steps muzhmaiyaaga 6) Time management: 3 hours mock tests. Centum scorers: 6 AM study, revision before sleep, doubt clearing same day.

instruction: Statement record seyyum bodhu enna kavanikkannum?
output: Tips: 1) Truth mathum sollunga, 2) Theriyaadhatha theriyaadhu endru sollunga, 3) Guess pannaadheenga, 4) Statement padithu sign pannunga, 5) Copy kelunga. 161 CrPC statement court-la evidence aagaadhu, 164 statement (Magistrate mun) aagum.

instruction: Minimum wages Tamil Nadu-la evvalavu?
output: Varies by industry and skill level. Unskilled: Rs.410-450/day, Semi-skilled: Rs.430-500/day, Skilled: Rs.480-600/day (approximate, 2024). Labour Department website-la exact rates. Less koduthal Labour Inspector-kku complaint.

instruction: Naan Tuition Center / Coaching Institute thodanga virumburen. Enna permission vendum?
output:
**Coaching Center Permissions:**

**Basic Requirements:**
1. **Shop & Establishment** - tnlabour.tn.gov.in (₹500-1,500)
2. **Trade License** - Corporation (₹1,000-5,000)
3. **Fire Safety NOC** - If 50+ students
4. **Building Safety** - Structural certificate

**Large Institute Additional:**
5. **Trust/Society Registration** - If structured entity
6. **GST** - If turnover > ₹20 lakh
7. **PF/ESI** - If employees

**No special license for:** IAS/JEE/NEET coaching, Language classes, Computer training

instruction: Family member-kku patient condition sollalaamaa?
output: Only with patient consent (if patient is conscious/competent). Rules: 1) Adult patient decides who gets information, 2) Unconscious patient: Next of kin informed, 3) Minor: Parents/guardians informed, 4) Psychiatric patient: Rules vary. Sensitive info (HIV, mental health): Extra careful - patient must specifically consent. Nominated person: Patient can designate specific family member for communication.

instruction: Urgent 30,000 vendum. Play Store la 'Instant Loan - No Documents' app download potten. Loan vandhudhu but interest 50% per month, daily harassment calls.
output: Illegal loan apps - RBI registered illa. Installation la contacts, photos access vaanguvaanga. Default pannaa - contacts ku call, morphed photos threat. Already trapped aa - cyber crime complaint pannunga, don't pay more (harassment won't stop with payment). RBI registered NBFCs only use pannunga.

instruction: Free laptop scheme-க்கு எப்படி apply செய்வது?
output: Tamil Nadu-ல் government school 11th, 12th students-க்கு free laptop scheme உண்டு. Separate application தேவையில்லை, school மூலம் automatically பெறலாம். Aadhaar linking கட்டாயம்.

instruction: Bharatanatyam, Carnatic music படிக்க government institution இருக்கா?
output: Tamil Nadu Music and Fine Arts University, Kalakshetra Foundation (Chennai), Government Music Colleges உள்ளன. Diploma, Degree courses available. Fee மிகக் குறைவு. Talented students-க்கு scholarship உண்டு.

instruction: Chennai Music Season endraal enna? Yaen famous?
output: Chennai December Music Season - ulagin migapperiya cultural festival. December 15 - January 1 varai. 1920s-la thodangiyathu. Sirappugal: 1) 2000+ concerts nadakkum, 2) 100+ sabhas (cultural organizations) organize panraanga, 3) Morning 9 AM to Night 10 PM non-stop programs, 4) Free entry pala sabhas-la, 5) World-la irundhu Carnatic musicians varuvaargal. Famous sabhas: Music Academy, Narada Gana Sabha, Mylapore Fine Arts. Culture lovers' paradise!

instruction: நான் Online-ல் Products விற்கிறேன். GST Registration எப்போது கட்டாயம்? எப்படி register செய்வது?
output:
**GST Registration for E-commerce:**

**எப்போது கட்டாயம்?**

| Category | Threshold |
|----------|----------|
| Goods (Inter-state) | ₹0 - Immediately! |
| Goods (Intra-state) | ₹40 lakh turnover |
| Services | ₹20 lakh turnover |
| E-commerce Seller | ₹0 - Immediately! |

**E-commerce-ல் விற்றால்:**
- Amazon, Flipkart, Meesho, etc.
- Turnover limit இல்லை
- முதல் sale-க்கு முன்னே GST வேண்டும்!

**Registration Process:**

**Step 1: gst.gov.in**
1. Services → Registration → New Registration
2. Part A: PAN, Mobile, Email verify
3. TRN (Temporary Reference Number) கிடைக்கும்

**Step 2: Part B - Details**
1. Business Information
2. Promoter/Partner details
3. Principal place of business
4. Additional place (if any)
5. Goods/Services categories
6. Bank account details
7. Document upload

**Step 3: Documents**
- PAN Card
- Aadhaar Card
- Business Address Proof:
  - Own: Electricity Bill + Property Tax
  - Rent: Rent Agreement + NOC from owner
- Bank Statement / Cancelled Cheque
- Photo (Passport size)
- Digital Signature (Partnership/Company)

**Step 4: Verification**
- Aadhaar OTP / EVC
- Or: Physical verification by officer

**Step 5: GSTIN Issue**
- Time: 3-7 working days
- 15-digit GSTIN
- Certificate download

**Fee:** FREE (No government fee)

**After Registration:**
1. Issue GST invoices
2. Collect GST from customers
3. File monthly returns (GSTR-1, GSTR-3B)
4. Pay GST by 20th of next month

**Composition Scheme:**
- Turnover < ₹1.5 Cr
- Pay 1% tax (instead of regular)
- No input credit
- Quarterly return
- Not for e-commerce sellers!

**Penalties (no registration):**
- 10% of tax due or ₹10,000 (whichever higher)
- Serious offense: Imprisonment possible

instruction: YouTube video paathen - 'Free V-Bucks generator, unlimited Fortnite currency, link in description.'
output: 'Generators' work pannaadhu - game currency server-side stored. Links malware, surveys that steal data, or 'human verification' scams. Parents credit card details risk. Never click 'free currency' links - all fake.

instruction: Doctor wrong treatment கொடுத்தாங்க, sue பண்ணலாமா?
output: Yes, if negligence proved. Options: 1) Consumer Forum (compensation), 2) Civil court (damages), 3) Criminal court (if death/grievous hurt), 4) Medical Council (disciplinary action). Proof needed: Medical records, expert opinion, treatment protocol violation. Not every bad outcome = negligence. Consult medical-legal expert before proceeding. Time limit: 2-3 years.

instruction: NEET exam pattern enna? Ethanai marks?
output: NEET UG Pattern: Total 200 questions (180 attempt), 720 marks. Subjects: Physics 45+15 Qs, Chemistry 45+15 Qs, Biology 90+10 Qs. Marking: +4 correct, -1 wrong. Duration: 3 hours 20 minutes. Cutoff 2024: General 720-137, OBC 136-107, SC/ST 136-107. Language: English, Hindi, Tamil + 10 regional. Exam: May (yearly). Syllabus: Class 11 & 12 NCERT Physics, Chemistry, Biology.

instruction: Government officer lancham kettaal enna seivathu?
output: Options: 1) Vigilance and Anti-Corruption (DVAC): 1064 helpline, 2) Lokayukta, 3) CBI (central government). Trap operation request pannalam. Evidence: Recording (legal in TN), witnesses. Bribe giver-kkum protection undu (if reports).

instruction: DCA/PGDCA course enna? Value irukkaa?
output: DCA (Diploma in Computer Applications): 6 months - 1 year. PGDCA (Post Graduate): 1 year after graduation. Contents: MS Office, Internet, Basic programming, Database. Value: Government jobs-la DCA mandatory sila posts-ku. Private sector: Entry level IT support, data entry. Better alternative: BCA degree or specific skill courses (Python, Web development). DCA sufficient for basic computer operator roles.

instruction: PMAY-Gramin எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: House construction assistance for rural poor. Amount: ₹1.20 lakh (plain) / ₹1.30 lakh (hilly). Selection from SECC 2011 data. Check eligibility at pmayg.nic.in. If not in list: Appeal at Gram Panchayat. Additional: MGNREGA wages, toilet under SBM. Total: ₹1.5 lakh+

instruction: Hospital-la cleanliness illa, infection risk - complain pannalaamaa?
output: Yes! Infection control mandatory. Complaint: 1) Hospital management first, 2) DHS office (District Health Services), 3) Clinical Establishment Authority, 4) Municipal health officer (for general sanitation). Evidence: Photos, videos (if possible). Severe: Hospital license can be suspended. Also check: Bio-medical waste disposal, hand hygiene stations, clean linens.

instruction: Online-la medicine order pannalaamaa? Legal-aa?
output: Legal with conditions. Rules: 1) Prescription medicines - must upload valid prescription, 2) Pharmacy must be licensed, 3) Schedule X (narcotics) - cannot be sold online. Platforms: Pharmeasy, 1mg, Netmeds, Apollo Pharmacy (licensed). Verify: Check if platform has Drug License. Benefits: Convenience, price comparison, home delivery. Caution: Verify medicine authenticity on receipt.

instruction: Daily immunity-kku Siddha tips enna?
output: Daily practices: 1) Nilavembu Kudineer (immune booster), 2) Chukku Kaapi (dry ginger coffee), 3) Turmeric milk, 4) Kabasura Kudineer (respiratory immunity), 5) Oil pulling (Gandusha), 6) Sesame oil application on head, 7) Pranayama. Seasonal: Different recipes for different seasons. Government: Distributed free during dengue, COVID seasons. Home preparation: Simple recipes available online from authentic sources.

instruction: Staff rude-aa behave panraanga - complain?
output: Patient dignity is a right. Complaint: 1) Duty manager/nursing superintendent, 2) Hospital administrator, 3) Written complaint for record, 4) Consumer Forum if serious/repeated. Include: Date, time, staff name/description, what happened, witnesses. Outcome: Apology, warning to staff, policy reminder. Serious (abuse/harassment): Police complaint possible.

instruction: 10th public exam-க்கு எப்படி prepare ஆவது? Topper tips என்ன?
output: Topper strategies: 1) Textbook முழுமையாக படியுங்கள் - 80% questions textbook-இலிருந்து 2) Previous 5 years question papers practice 3) Blue print படி chapter-wise weightage கவனியுங்கள் 4) Maths & Science: daily problem solving 5) Tamil/English: grammar + essay practice 6) Social: Map pointing + dates memorize. Time: Daily 6-8 hours. Last month: Revision only. TN Government question bank: www.dge.tn.gov.in

instruction: NEET Result-க்கு பிறகு Counselling எப்படி நடக்கும்? TN-ல் seats எப்படி கிடைக்கும்?
output:
**NEET Counselling Process:**

**Two Types:**
1. **All India Quota (AIQ):** 15% seats - MCC conducts
2. **State Quota:** 85% seats - State conducts

**Tamil Nadu State Counselling:**

**Conducting Body:** Medical Admission Committee (Selection Committee)

**Website:** tnmedicalselection.org

**Process:**

**Round 1: Registration**
- Online registration
- Upload documents
- Pay registration fee (~₹1,000)

**Round 2: Choice Filling**
- List all colleges in preference order
- Government, Self-Finance, Deemed all options
- Lock choices before deadline

**Round 3: Seat Allotment**
- Based on NEET rank + Preference + Category
- Result announced online

**Round 4: Reporting**
- Go to allotted college
- Document verification
- Pay fees
- Admission confirmed

**TN Reservation:**

| Category | Percentage |
|----------|------------|
| OC (General) | 31% |
| BC | 26.5% |
| BCM | 3.5% |
| MBC/DNC | 20% |
| SC | 18% |
| ST | 1% |
| Govt School 7.5% | Within each category |

**Colleges in TN:**
- Govt Medical Colleges: 36+
- Self-Finance: 20+
- Deemed Universities: 15+

**Fees:**
- Govt College: ~₹15,000/year
- Self-Finance: ₹5-15 lakh/year
- Deemed: ₹10-25 lakh/year

**Important Dates:**
Counselling usually starts July-August after results.

instruction: Menstrual cramps-க்கு natural relief?
output: Remedies: 1) Hot water bag on abdomen, 2) Ginger tea, 3) Ajwain water, 4) Fenugreek (Vendhayam) soaked water, 5) Sesame seeds (til) with jaggery, 6) Light exercise/yoga (child's pose, cat-cow), 7) Massage with warm sesame oil. Diet: Avoid cold foods, have warm foods. Long-term: Regular exercise, healthy weight help. Severe pain: Check for PCOS, endometriosis - see gynecologist.

instruction: Informed consent என்றால் என்ன? எதுக்கெல்லாம் consent வேணும்?
output: Informed consent = Patient understanding and agreeing to treatment. Required for: 1) Any surgery, 2) Anesthesia, 3) Blood transfusion, 4) Invasive procedures, 5) Clinical trials, 6) HIV testing. Must explain: Procedure, risks, alternatives, success rate. Language: Patient's language (Tamil). Without consent: Medical negligence. Exception: Life-threatening emergency - implied consent.

instruction: 12 Azhvaargal yaar yaar?
output: 12 Azhvaargal: 1) Poigaiyazhvar, 2) Boodhaththaazhvar, 3) Peyaazhvar - immovaruum 'Mudhalazhvaargal', 4) Thirumazhisaiyaazhvar, 5) Nammaazhvar - Thiruvaaimozhi paadiyavar, miga mukkiyamaanavar, 6) Madhurakaviyaazhvar, 7) Kulasekaraazhvar, 8) Periyaazhvar, 9) Aandaal - ore penn Azhvaar, Thiruppaavai paadiyavar, 10) Thondaradippodiyaazhvar, 11) Thiruppaanaazhvar, 12) Thirumangaiyaazhvar.

instruction: Paramparagat Krishi Vikas Yojana (PKVY) என்றால் என்ன?
output: Organic Farming ஊக்குவிப்பு திட்டம். Cluster: 50+ விவசாயிகள் சேர்ந்து 50 ஏக்கர். Support: ₹50,000/hectare (3 வருடத்தில்) - Organic inputs, certification, marketing. PGS Certification: Participatory Guarantee System - free organic certification. Benefit: Premium price for organic produce, export opportunity, soil health improvement. Join: Agriculture Department, Krishi Vigyan Kendra. Training: Organic farming techniques, composting, bio-pesticides.

instruction: Generic medicine vs Branded - quality same-ஆ?
output: Yes! Same active ingredient, same dose, same effect. Difference: Brand name vs chemical name. Why cheaper: No advertising cost, no brand royalty. Quality: WHO-GMP certified generics = equal quality. Example: Paracetamol (generic) = Crocin/Dolo (branded). Verify: ISI mark, batch number, expiry date. Jan Aushadhi: Government generic stores - same quality, 50-90% cheaper.

instruction: NEET Tamil Medium-la ezhudhalamaa? Translation problem irukkumaa?
output:
**NEET Tamil Medium:**

**Yes, Tamil-la ezhudhalaam!**

**Paper:** Bilingual - Tamil + English both printed

**Translation Tips:**
1. NCERT Tamil version read
2. English terms-um therinjirukanum (Scientific names, formulas)
3. Both versions study
4. Mock tests Tamil-la practice

**Exam Day:**
- Question confusing? Check English version
- Scientific terms same in both

**Past Issues:**
- Some translation errors reported
- NTA improved now

**Success:** Many Tamil medium students cleared!
7.5% reservation for Govt school students helps.

**Language is NOT a barrier!**

instruction: Discord DM vandhudhu - 'Valorant Riot employee, your account flagged for review, login here to verify: [link].'
output: Game companies DM through contact pannaadhu. 'Employee' DMs always fake. Link = phishing site, login details steal. Report and block. Two-factor authentication enable pannunga all gaming accounts la.

instruction: Loan app harassment - illegal collection practices
output: RBI unregistered apps = illegal. Complaint: 1) RBI Sachet portal, 2) cybercrime.gov.in, 3) Police FIR (extortion, harassment). Harassment includes: Contact list access, morphed photos, threatening calls. Do NOT install unknown loan apps. Legal apps: RBI registered NBFC list check.

instruction: Fake product விற்ற e-commerce site-க்கு case போடலாமா?
output: ஆம். Counterfeit/fake products விற்பது illegal. Consumer forum-ல் compensation claim செய்யலாம். Trademark owner-க்கும் report பண்ணலாம். Police complaint (IPC 420 - cheating) போடலாம். E-commerce platform-உம் liable.

instruction: HIV status employer-கிட்ட சொல்லணுமா?
output: NO! HIV status = highly confidential. HIV/AIDS Act 2017: 1) No mandatory testing for employment, 2) No disclosure to employer without consent, 3) No termination based on HIV status, 4) Anti-discrimination protection. Violation: Legal action against employer. Medical fitness: Can be declared fit without disclosing diagnosis. Exception: Healthcare workers - restricted duties (not termination).

instruction: First Generation Graduate-ku enna special benefits?

instruction: Customs officer-nu call pannunga, unga peru-la parcel irukku drugs-oda, jail poganum-nu bayamuruturaanga
output: 100% scam call sir. Customs ivalo call pannudhu illa. Settlement-nu panam kettaa - fraud. Bayapadaadheenga, 1930 call pannunga.

instruction: Women-க்கு special ITI courses உள்ளதா?
output: ஆம், Women ITI-கள் உள்ளன. Special trades: 1) Dress Making 2) Embroidery & Needle Work 3) Hair & Skin Care 4) Stenography 5) Desktop Publishing 6) Data Entry Operator 7) Secretarial Practice. Chennai, Coimbatore, Madurai-ல் exclusive Women ITIs. Regular ITI-லும் co-ed batches உள்ளன. Hostel facility free. Employment: Garment industry, salons, corporate offices.

instruction: Medical negligence case-kku enna evidence venum?
output: Required: 1) All medical records (hospital bound to give), 2) Prescriptions, 3) Test reports, 4) Bills, 5) Expert medical opinion (another doctor's opinion), 6) Death certificate (if applicable). RTI moolam government hospital records peralaam.

instruction: Aviation/Pilot training enge padippathu? Cost evvalavu?
output: Options: 1) Commercial Pilot License (CPL) - Flying schools 2) B.Sc Aviation 3) Air hostess/Cabin crew training. CPL institutes: Madras Flying Club, Rajiv Gandhi Aviation Academy. CPL cost: ₹25-40 lakh (high investment). Duration: 18 months - 2 years. Alternative: IAF through AFCAT/NDA (free training). Cabin crew: 6 months course, ₹1-2 lakh. Jobs with airlines after training.

instruction: PAN-Aadhaar Link எப்படி செய்வது?
output: Online: eportal.incometax.gov.in → Link Aadhaar → Enter PAN and Aadhaar → OTP verify → Pay ₹1,000 late fee. SMS method: Send 'UIDPAN <Aadhaar> <PAN>' to 567678. MANDATORY - unlinked PAN becomes inoperative!

instruction: Medicine MRP-க்கு மேல் விற்றால் complaint எங்கே?
output: Complaint: Drug Inspector (District), State Drug Control. Legal Metrology Department-உம் complaint எடுக்கும். Pharmacy license suspend/cancel ஆகலாம். Consumer forum-ல் compensation. Evidence: Bill with MRP comparison. Toll-free: 1800-11-4000.

instruction: Dhanteras - 'Gold coin free with jewellery purchase! WhatsApp to reserve' jeweller offer. Genuine-ஆ?
output: Verify the jeweller! Dhanteras-ல fly-by-night jewellers அதிகம். 'Free gold coin' bait வச்சு low quality sell பண்ணுவாங்க. Known jewellers மட்டும் trust பண்ணுங்க. BIS hallmark check பண்ணுங்க. WhatsApp booking avoid பண்ணுங்க.

instruction: நீலகிரி மலை ரயில் (UNESCO) பற்றி சொல்லுங்கள்?
output: நீலகிரி மலை ரயில் - UNESCO World Heritage Site (2005). 1899-ல் British-கள் கட்டினார்கள். Mettupalayam-லிருந்து Ooty வரை 46 km. சிறப்புகள்: 1) Rack and pinion system - steep gradient-ல் climb செய்ய, 2) Steam locomotive - இன்றும் ஓடுகிறது, 3) 16 tunnels, 250 bridges, 4) 208 curves, 5) Max altitude 2203 meters. 5 hours journey - scenic beauty அருமை. Morning train popular. Book in advance - IRCTC.

instruction: Kalakshetra endraal enna?
output: Kalakshetra - 1936-la Rukmini Devi Arundale Chennai-la niruviya arts institution. Bharatanatyam matrum Carnatic music-a revive panniya maiyam. Sirappugal: 1) Traditional Bharatanatyam style, 2) Weaving centre - Kalakshetra sarees famous, 3) Periya campus - Thiruvanmiyur beach area, 4) Annual dance festival. Deemed University status. Ulagengum graduates irukiraargal. Tamil cultural renaissance-oda symbol!

instruction: Apartment vaangum podhu UDS endraal enna?
output: UDS = Undivided Share of Land. Flat owner-kku land-la proportionate share. Building collapse/demolish aanalum land share ungalukku. Higher UDS = Better value. UDS % sale deed-la clearly mention irukkanum. UDS illaama flat vaangaadheenga.

instruction: Social media comparison-la jealous feel aagiren - enna seivadhu?
output: 'Azhukkaaru udaiyaarai aakkam thaedum ozhukkaarau' - poraamai ullavanai selvam thaedi varaadhu. Melum: 'Avviththu azhukkaaru udaiyaanai seiyaval thavvaiyai kaatti vidum'. Jealousy-a let go pannungal. Focus on YOUR journey. Others' highlight reel vs your behind-the-scenes - don't compare!

instruction: Family-la yaarum college ponadhilla. Ennaal handle panna mudiyumaa? Enna expect panrathu?
output: Proud moment - You're breaking the barrier! Tips: 1) Seniors-a approach pannunga - guidance 2) College orientation attend pannunga 3) Professors approachable - doubt clear pannunga 4) First generation scholarship apply pannunga 5) Library, labs utilize pannunga 6) Peer groups join - study circle. Common challenges: Imposter syndrome normal, English medium adjustment, new environment. Support: College counsellor, senior mentor programs. You CAN do this!

instruction: Civil case file seyya enna procedure?
output: Steps: 1) Lawyer consult, 2) Plaint draft, 3) Court fee pay, 4) Filing, 5) Summons to defendant, 6) Written statement, 7) Issues framing, 8) Evidence, 9) Arguments, 10) Judgment. Time: 2-5 years (varies). e-Courts: ecourts.gov.in case status track.

instruction: Women-ku special ITI courses ulladha?
output: Aam, Women ITI-gal ullana. Special trades: 1) Dress Making 2) Embroidery & Needle Work 3) Hair & Skin Care 4) Stenography 5) Desktop Publishing 6) Data Entry Operator 7) Secretarial Practice. Chennai, Coimbatore, Madurai-la exclusive Women ITIs. Regular ITI-layum co-ed batches ullana. Hostel facility free. Employment: Garment industry, salons, corporate offices.

instruction: WhatsApp message 'Maid insurance scheme government. 1000 premium, 2 lakh coverage, accident and health.' Government scheme aa really?
output: PMJJBY (life) and PMSBY (accident) available for Rs 330-430 total through any bank account. No separate 'maid insurance scheme'. Ayushman Bharat for health is free for eligible families. Register for E-Shram card for unorganized workers benefits. Don't pay WhatsApp strangers.

instruction: TN Government websites enna enna?
output: Important TN Government Portals: tn.gov.in (TN Govt main), tnpds.gov.in (Ration/PDS), cmchistn.com (Health Insurance), tnvelaivaaippu.gov.in (Employment), bcmbcmw.tn.gov.in (BC Welfare), adwb.tn.gov.in (SC/ST Welfare), tnhb.tn.gov.in (Housing Board), tangedco.gov.in (Electricity), tnreginet.gov.in (Registration), serviceonline.gov.in (e-Sevai). Mobile: UZHAVAN (Farmers), TNeGA (e-Governance).

instruction: Advance thirumba thara ethanai naal time irukku?
output: Sattapadi veedu kaali seydha 30 days-kkul advance thirumba thara venum. Delay aanaal 6% interest-udan thara venum. Idhu 2017 Act-la clearly mention aagiyirukku.

instruction: Panchakarma treatment TN-la enge kidaikkum?
output: Panchakarma = 5 detoxification therapies. Where in TN: 1) Government AYUSH hospitals (limited), 2) Private Ayurveda centers - Arya Vaidya Pharmacy branches, 3) Kerala-based resorts with TN branches, 4) Integrated wellness centers. Cities: Chennai, Coimbatore, Madurai have more options. Cost: Private Rs.2,000-10,000/day. Duration: 7-21 days typically. Best: Kerala for authentic Panchakarma (closer option).

instruction: Insurance claim reject ஆனால் என்ன செய்வது?
output: Steps: 1) Rejection reason written-ஆ கேளுங்க, 2) Insurance company grievance cell, 3) Insurance Ombudsman (igms.irda.gov.in), 4) Consumer forum, 5) MACT (accident claims). Common rejection reasons: Policy lapse, drunk driving, unlicensed driver. Documentation முக்கியம்.

instruction: Cashless hospitalization எப்படி வேலை செய்யும்?
output: Process: 1) Check hospital in network list, 2) Inform TPA/insurer before admission (planned), 3) Show health card at admission, 4) Hospital sends pre-auth request, 5) TPA approves amount, 6) Treatment happens, 7) Final bill - approved amount deducted, balance you pay. Emergency: Inform within 24 hours. Rejected: Appeal to insurer, pay and claim reimbursement.

instruction: Transgender patient-kku sariyaana treatment kidaikkumaa?
output: Legal right! Transgender Persons Act 2019 + NALSA judgment. Rights: 1) Treatment in preferred gender ward (with certificate), 2) No discrimination, 3) Respectful treatment, 4) SRS (Sex Reassignment Surgery) available at government hospitals (Chennai, limited centres). TN: Progressive policies, transgender welfare board. Complaint: Social Welfare Department, Human Rights Commission.

instruction: Kitchen herbs-in medicinal uses enna?
output: Common kitchen medicines: 1) Turmeric - Antiseptic, anti-inflammatory, immunity, 2) Ginger - Digestion, nausea, cold, 3) Pepper - Cold, metabolism, 4) Cumin - Digestion, iron source, 5) Coriander - Cooling, digestion, 6) Curry leaves - Diabetes, hair health, 7) Fenugreek - Blood sugar, lactation, 8) Garlic - Heart, infection, 9) Tulsi - Immunity, respiratory, 10) Neem - Skin, blood purifier. Daily use: Prevention better than cure!

instruction: Velaiku poren, aanaa degree complete pannala. Ippo padikka mudiyumaa?
output: 100% possible! Options: 1) IGNOU - most flexible, exams twice yearly 2) Tamil Nadu Open University (TNOU) - Tamil medium available 3) University of Madras Distance 4) Evening colleges in Chennai 5) Online degrees - recognized universities. Process: Work continues + study weekends + exams during leave. Duration: UG 3 years, PG 2 years. Benefits: Promotion eligibility, government job apply, self-satisfaction. Many working people complete degrees in 30s, 40s. Never too late!

instruction: Myth or Fact: Myth: Coaching illaamal NEET/JEE crack panna impossible
output: Fact: Fact: Self-study toppers exist every year! Free resources: YouTube (Physics Wallah, Unacademy), NPTEL, SWAYAM, Government free coaching. Key factors: Discipline, proper study plan, consistent practice. Coaching helps but not mandatory. Many poor students crack using library + free online resources. Your determination > coaching centre brand.

instruction: Aadhaar mobile number change eppadi?
output: Cannot be done online for security reasons. Must visit Aadhaar Seva Kendra (ASK) with original Aadhaar and new active SIM. Biometric verification required. Fee: ₹50. Update is immediate with SMS confirmation.

instruction: WhatsApp message 'Business loan pre-approved. 10 lakh at 8% interest. Processing fee 25,000.' Business ku loan venum, apply pannalama?
output: Banks don't pre-approve loans via WhatsApp. Processing fees deducted from loan, not paid upfront. 8% interest too low to be true for business loans. Apply through official bank branches or verified digital lenders only. This is advance fee fraud.

instruction: Journalism/Mass Communication padikka sirantha college?
output: Top colleges: 1) Asian College of Journalism Chennai 2) Loyola College MA Journalism 3) Stella Maris 4) Anna University Media Sciences 5) SRM Mass Comm. Courses: BA/B.Sc Mass Comm (3 years), PG Diploma (1 year), MA Journalism (2 years). Jobs: TV channels, Newspapers, Digital media, PR agencies, Advertising. Skills: Writing, communication, current affairs knowledge. Internships important.

instruction: Passport reject aanadhu - enna seivathu?
output: Rejection reason check: passportindia.gov.in. Common reasons: Police verification issue, document mismatch, pending cases. Appeal: Regional Passport Officer. Court case pending: NOC from court required. Reapply with correct documents. Tatkaal for urgent cases.

instruction: Social media-la abuse/trolling - complaint podalaamaa?
output: Aama. Sections: IT Act 66A (struck down but alternatives exist), 67 (obscene content), IPC 509 (insult to modesty), 506 (criminal intimidation), 507 (criminal intimidation by anonymous). Platform report + cybercrime.gov.in complaint. Women: 181 helpline.

instruction: Newborn-kku free screening tests enna?
output: Newborn screening at government hospitals: 1) Hearing screening, 2) Heart defect screening (pulse oximetry), 3) Eye examination (for retinopathy if premature), 4) Hip examination, 5) Thyroid screening (heel prick blood test). Rashtriya Bal Swasthya Karyakram (RBSK): Regular health checkup for children 0-18 years. Follow-up: If abnormality found, referred to higher centre - treatment free.

instruction: Health insurance cashless reject ஆனால் reimbursement கிடைக்குமா?
output: ஆம். Cashless rejection ≠ claim rejection. Pay hospital, submit bills to insurer. Reimbursement claim: 15-30 days. Rejection-க்கு: IRDAI complaint, Ombudsman, Consumer forum. Pre-authorization issues: TPA (Third Party Administrator) contact. Network hospital outside-உம் claim possible.

instruction: SSC CGL enna? Tamil Nadu students apply pannalaamaa?
output: SSC CGL (Combined Graduate Level): Central Government Group B & C posts. Posts: Tax Inspector, Auditor, Assistant, SI, etc. Tamil Nadu students - Yes, apply possible! Posting: All India basis, TN postings available. Exam: Tier 1, 2, 3, 4. Syllabus: English, Maths, Reasoning, GK. Salary: ₹35,000-1,50,000. Age: 18-32 (varies by post). Apply: www.ssc.nic.in. Notification: Usually December. Very good career option.

instruction: Insurance claim reject aanaal enna seivathu?
output: Steps: 1) Rejection reason written-aa kelunga, 2) Insurance company grievance cell, 3) Insurance Ombudsman (igms.irda.gov.in), 4) Consumer forum, 5) MACT (accident claims). Common rejection reasons: Policy lapse, drunk driving, unlicensed driver. Documentation mukkiyam.

instruction: Credit card bill pay பண்ண முடியல, harassment வருது, என்ன செய்வது?
output: RBI Fair Practice Code: 1) Recovery agents 7AM-7PM only contact பண்ணலாம், 2) Office/relatives-கிட்ட போக கூடாது (without permission), 3) Threaten, abuse பண்ண கூடாது, 4) Violation: Bank-க்கு + RBI-க்கு complaint, 5) Settlement option கேளுங்க - usually 50-70% pay பண்ணி close பண்ணலாம். Police complaint-உம் போடலாம் harassment-க்கு.

instruction: Police torture seydhaal enna seivathu?
output: Complaint options: 1) SP/DIG-kku written complaint, 2) Judicial Magistrate-kku complaint, 3) State Human Rights Commission, 4) National Human Rights Commission, 5) High Court writ petition. Medical report, photos, witnesses - evidence vaangunga. Custodial torture serious offence.

instruction: Online degree programs Tamil Nadu-la enge kidaikkum?
output: UGC-approved online programs: 1) SWAYAM platform (free courses) 2) NPTEL (IIT courses) 3) Anna University online 4) Madras University online 5) Private universities (Amity, Manipal online). SWAYAM courses-ku credit transfer possible. MOOCs certificate-ku mathippu athigaritthulladhu. Coursera, edX courses-um payanpaduthalaam.

instruction: College hostel-ல் முதல் முறை stay பண்றேன். என்ன எடுத்துக்கணும்?
output: Essential items: 1) Bedding - mattress, pillow, blanket 2) Bucket, mug, toiletries 3) Clothes + hangers 4) Study materials, stationery 5) Lock for cupboard 6) Electric kettle (if allowed) 7) First aid basics 8) Important documents photocopies 9) Passport size photos 10) Emergency contact numbers. Don't bring: Costly items, too many clothes initially. Adjust first, buy locally if needed.

instruction: Bank/Company respond pannala, Consumer Forum la case file eppidi?
output: Jurisdiction: Up to ₹50 lakhs - District Forum, ₹50L-2Cr - State Commission, Above ₹2Cr - National Commission. Online filing: edaakhil.nic.in. Documents: Complaint in format, payment proof, correspondence, evidence, previous complaint acknowledgments, ID proof. Fees: Up to ₹5L = ₹100, ₹5-10L = ₹200, ₹10-20L = ₹300, ₹20-50L = ₹500. Process: Filing → OP notice (30 days) → Written statement → Hearings → Order (90-150 days). TN District Forums: confonet.nic.in for list.

instruction: TNEB electricity complaint eppadi poduvadhu?
output: Options: 1) TANGEDCO helpline: 1912, 2) Online: tangedco.gov.in, 3) TNEB app, 4) Local section office. Issues: Billing errors, connection delay, power cut, meter fault. Escalation: AE → EE → SE → CE. Consumer Grievance Redressal Forum (CGRF) for unresolved issues.

instruction: ரேஷன் அட்டையில் பெயர் சேர்க்க என்ன செய்வது?
output: For birth: Apply at tnpds.gov.in with birth certificate + baby's Aadhaar. For marriage: Marriage certificate + spouse's Aadhaar. Remove old card entry if transferring. Taluk Office verification. Time: 15-30 days.

instruction: PG/Hostel-kku rent laws apply aagumaa?
output: PG/Hostel license agreement-under varum, standard tenancy laws fully apply aagaadhu. But basic rights (security deposit refund, notice period, harassment protection) apply aagum. Specific PG rules follow pannanum.

instruction: Safe abortion enge kidaikkum? Cost enna?
output: Safe facilities: 1) Government hospitals - free, 2) Approved private clinics (check registration), 3) Medical college hospitals. Cost: Government = free. Private = Rs.3,000-15,000 (depends on weeks, method). Method: 1) Medical (pills) - early pregnancy, 2) Surgical - later stage. Unsafe abortion risks: Infection, hemorrhage, infertility, death. Never go to unregistered places.

instruction: National Institute of Siddha (NIS) special treatments enna?
output: NIS Tambaram specialties: 1) Noi Naadal (diagnostics), 2) Maruthuvam (general medicine), 3) Kuzhanthai Maruthuvam (pediatrics), 4) Sirappu Maruthuvam (specialties), 5) Nanju Nool (toxicology), 6) Gunapadam (pharmacology), 7) Pothu Maruthuvam. Special: 1) Varmam unit, 2) Panchakarma therapies, 3) Yoga therapy, 4) Research wing. Referral: Complex cases from all over India. Contact: 044-22411611.

instruction: Thervu bayam (exam fear) eppadi pokkuvathu?
output: Tips: 1) Nalla thayaarippu = confidence - syllabus complete pannunga 2) Mock tests ezhudhi pazhagunga 3) Exam-ku mundhina naal light revision mattum 4) Deep breathing exercises 5) Positive self-talk 6) Proper sleep (7-8 hrs) 7) Light, healthy food 8) Hall ticket, pen ready-a vaiyunga. Severe anxiety irundhal school counsellor-a santhiyunga.

instruction: Wrong medicine kodutthuttaanga - action enna?
output: Pharmacy negligence! Actions: 1) Don't use if noticed, 2) Return with bill, 3) If used and harm occurred - medical treatment first, 4) Complaint: Drug Inspector, Consumer Forum. Compensation: Medical expenses + damages if harm. Severe harm/death: Criminal case possible (Section 304A). Evidence: Wrong medicine pack, prescription, bill. Pharmacist license: Can be cancelled.

instruction: Free vaccination schedule என்ன? எங்கே போகணும்?
output: Universal Immunization Program - FREE for all children. Schedule: Birth - BCG, OPV, Hep B; 6 weeks - DPT, OPV, Hep B; 10 weeks - DPT, OPV; 14 weeks - DPT, OPV, Hep B; 9 months - Measles, Vitamin A; 16-24 months - DPT booster, OPV, Measles. Where: PHC, Government hospital, Anganwadi. Carry: Child's health card. Missed dose: Can catch up - consult ANM.

instruction: PMAY (Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana) eppadi peruvadhu?
output: Eligibility: Family without own house, EWS/LIG/MIG. Assistance: Up to ₹1.5-2.67 lakhs. Apply: pmay-urban.gov.in / Common Service Center. Documents: Aadhaar, Income certificate, Land document. Interest subsidy on bank loan available.

instruction: 'Perumai udaiyavar aatruvar' - perumai patriya kural enna solludhu?
output: Kural: 'Perumai udaiyavar aatruvar aatrin arumai udaiya seyal'. Artham: Perumai udaiyavargal kashtamaana seyalgalai sadhippaargal. Greatness enbadhu easy tasks seivathu alla - difficult things accomplish panradhu. 'Go big or go home' - Valluvar version!

instruction: PM-AJAY கிராம சுகாதார திட்டம் என்றால் என்ன?
output: Pradhan Mantri Ayushman Arogya Yojana - கிராம சுகாதாரம். Components: Health & Wellness Centres (HWC) - Primary healthcare, Teleconsultation facility. Services: 12 essential services - Maternal care, Child health, Communicable diseases, NCD screening (Diabetes, BP), Mental health, Dental, Eye care. Free: All services free at HWC. Location: Sub-centre/PHC within 30 min travel. Access: Aadhaar/ration card போதும், registration required.

instruction: Bail conditions என்னென்ன இருக்கும்?
output: Common conditions: 1) Court dates attend, 2) Don't leave jurisdiction without permission, 3) Don't tamper evidence/threaten witnesses, 4) Passport surrender (if flight risk), 5) Periodical police station visit, 6) Don't contact victim. Violation = bail cancel + arrest.

instruction: Weight loss-kku Ayurveda treatment?
output: Ayurveda approach: Not just weight loss - metabolic correction. Treatments: 1) Udvartana (herbal powder massage), 2) Vamana/Virechana (detox), 3) Lekhana Basti (specific enema), 4) Internal medicines (Triphala, Guggulu), 5) Diet as per Prakriti, 6) Lifestyle modifications. Duration: 3-6 months for sustainable results. Benefit: Addresses root cause, prevents regain. Not: Quick fix - gradual healthy weight loss.

instruction: Hospital-ல் cleanliness இல்ல, infection risk - complain பண்ணலாமா?
output: Yes! Infection control mandatory. Complaint: 1) Hospital management first, 2) DHS office (District Health Services), 3) Clinical Establishment Authority, 4) Municipal health officer (for general sanitation). Evidence: Photos, videos (if possible). Severe: Hospital license can be suspended. Also check: Bio-medical waste disposal, hand hygiene stations, clean linens.

instruction: 10th Public Exam-ku eppadi prepare seyvadhu? Pass mark enna?
output:
**10th Public Exam Preparation:**

**Pass Marks:** 35/100 each subject, 35% overall

**Subjects:** Tamil, English, Maths, Science, Social

**Strategy:**

**6 Months Before:**
- Complete syllabus
- Identify important topics
- Create formula lists

**3 Months Before:**
- Chapter revision
- Previous 5 years papers
- Model exams

**1 Month Before:**
- Quick revision
- Daily formulas
- Mock tests

**Subject Tips:**
- Tamil: Grammar, Poems
- English: Grammar, Letter format
- Maths: Daily practice
- Science: Diagrams, Equations
- Social: Maps, Dates

**Free Resources:** Kalvi TV, DIKSHA App, YouTube

instruction: National Scholarship Portal (NSP) மூலம் எந்தெந்த scholarships கிடைக்கும்?
output: NSP scholarships: 1) Pre-matric SC/ST/OBC 2) Post-matric SC/ST/OBC 3) MHRD Merit scholarship 4) PM scholarship for wards of defence personnel 5) Minority scholarships 6) Top class education scholarship. Apply: www.scholarships.gov.in. One portal for 100+ schemes. Documents: Aadhaar, bank account, income certificate, caste certificate, marks. Deadline: October-November usually.

instruction: Engineering padithu velai kidaikkavillai, enna seivathu?
output: Alternative options: 1) Skill upgrade - Online courses (Coursera, NPTEL) 2) GATE ezhudhi PSU/ME admission 3) MBA padithu management-ku switch 4) Government jobs - SSC JE, RRB JE 5) Startup/Freelancing 6) TNSDC free skill training 7) Entrepreneurship - PMEGP loan moolam own business. District Employment Exchange-la register pannunga.

instruction: Textile engineering padikka Coimbatore-thaan best-aa?
output: Aamam. PSG Tech, Kumaraguru, SITRA-la textile technology courses irukku. Tirupur textile hub kitta irukradhunala internship, placement opportunities niraiya. Industry exposure kedaikum.

instruction: 'BGMI Tournament - Entry fee 200, prize pool 50,000' nu Discord la post paathen. Entry fee pay potten, tournament nadakkala, admin kaanama poyittaan.
output: Fake gaming tournaments Discord, Telegram la romba varum. Entry fee collect pannitu server delete panniduvaanga. Verified organizers - Skyesports, Nodwin - trust pannunga. Random Discord admins avoid. Entry fee low nu risk worth illa.

instruction: SMS vandhudhu 'Security guard license renewal. Pay 500 online or license cancelled.' PSARA license renew pannanum aa?
output: PSARA license renewal through state home department portal. Official fees much lower and process different. License cancellation needs proper proceedings. Never pay through SMS links. Check with your security agency or state PSARA authority.

instruction: 'Idukkan varungaal naguga' - kashta kaalathil enna seiya vendum?
output: Kural: 'Idukkan varungaal naguga adhanai aduththu oorvadhu aqdhoppa thil'. Artham: Kashtam varum bodhu sirikka vendum. Andha kashtathai vella idhai vida nalla vazhi illai. Smile through difficulties - best medicine for tough times. Positive attitude wins!

instruction: Thirukkuraloda moondru pirivugal enna?
output: 1) Araththuppaal (Virtue) - 38 adhigaarangal, 2) Porutpaal (Wealth) - 70 adhigaarangal, 3) Kaamaththuppaal (Love) - 25 adhigaarangal. Ninaivil vaikka: A-Po-Ka (APK - like Android APK file!).

instruction: NEET-aa JEE-aa? Doctor-aa Engineer-aa? Eppadi decide panrathu?
output: Decision factors: 1) Interest - Patient care vs Problem solving 2) Study style - Memory vs Logic 3) Duration - MBBS 5.5 years vs Engineering 4 years 4) Investment - Medical costlier 5) Lifestyle - Doctor on-call vs Engineer 9-5. Self-assessment: Biology enjoy panreengala = NEET. Maths/Physics enjoy = JEE. Both attempt possible (Science stream). Shadow a doctor and engineer if possible. Final call: Your genuine interest, not family pressure.

instruction: Education loan EMI கட்ட முடியல, என்ன option?
output: Options available: 1) Moratorium extension request - bank will consider 2) EMI restructuring - lower EMI, longer tenure 3) Interest only payment temporarily 4) Parent co-borrower support 5) Government interest subsidy scheme check 6) Loan transfer to lower interest bank 7) Part-time income for EMI contribution. Don't do: Default silently - affects CIBIL score. Do: Communicate with bank proactively. Recovery harassment: Banking Ombudsman complaint.

instruction: Fasting therapy (Upvas) safe-aa? Eppadi seiradhu?
output: Therapeutic fasting types: 1) Fruit fast - only fruits, 2) Juice fast - fresh juices, 3) Water fast - only water (supervised only), 4) Intermittent fasting - 16:8 popular. Benefits: Detox, weight loss, digestive rest, autophagy (cell cleaning). Safe fasting: 1) Start slow (intermittent), 2) Stay hydrated, 3) Break fast gently (not heavy food), 4) Medical conditions - consult doctor. Avoid: Diabetes (uncontrolled), pregnancy, children, underweight.

instruction: Vehicle insurance types ennenna?
output: Types: 1) Third-party (mandatory) - others-kku damage cover, 2) Comprehensive - own vehicle + third party, 3) Own damage - only own vehicle. Third-party minimum kattaayam (MV Act). Without insurance driving: Rs.2,000 fine + vehicle seizure.

instruction: Swiggy/Zomato delivery partner-kku labour laws apply aagumaa?
output: Gig workers classified as 'independent contractors' - traditional labour laws fully apply aagaadhu. Code on Social Security 2020: Gig workers-kku social security provisions (implementation pending). Accident/injury-kku company insurance check pannunga. Union formation possible.

instruction: Unnecessary tests/procedures சொல்றாங்க - refuse பண்ணலாமா?
output: Yes! Your body, your choice. Rights: 1) Ask why each test needed, 2) Get written justification, 3) Refuse non-essential tests, 4) Second opinion for major procedures. Red flags: 1) Full body checkup push, 2) Expensive test for minor issue, 3) Surgery suggestion without trying medicine first. If pressured: Change doctor/hospital. Complaint: If unethical push - Medical Council.

instruction: படிப்பை நிறுத்த நிர்பந்தமாக இருக்கிறேன், emergency scholarship உள்ளதா?
output: Emergency options: 1) HDFC ECSS - crisis support ₹75,000 2) PM CARES (COVID affected) 3) Chief Minister's Public Relief Fund - apply to Collector 4) College Student Aid Fund 5) Rotary Club scholarships 6) Lions Club education support. Immediate help: District Social Welfare Officer-ஐ சந்தியுங்கள். NGOs: Pratham, Smile Foundation. Fee postponement request to college principal.

instruction: Dowry demand-kku enna action edukkalam?
output: Dowry ketpathu/koduppathu illegal (Dowry Prohibition Act). Complaint: Police, Women helpline 181, Protection Officer. Punishment: 5 years imprisonment + fine. Dowry death (304B IPC): 7 years to life imprisonment. Evidence: Messages, recordings, witness statements.

instruction: Siva Vaakkiyar yaar? Avaradhu paadalgal sirappu enna?
output: Siva Vaakkiyar migavum controversial siddhar. Samaya sadangukalai, poojaikkalai kadumayaga vimarsithavar. 'Jaadhi illai, samayam illai' endru pesiyavar. 'Natta kallai deivam endru naalu poo saaththiye, sutri vandhu munumunutthaal sollumO mundhai vinai?' - idol worship-a kelvi ketkum vari. Rational thinking-a 1000 varudangalukkku munnbae pesiyavar!

instruction: Free contraceptives எங்கே கிடைக்கும்?
output: Free at: 1) PHC, 2) Government hospitals, 3) Anganwadi centres, 4) Urban health centres. Available: 1) Condoms, 2) Oral contraceptive pills (Mala-N, Mala-D), 3) IUD (Copper-T), 4) Injectable contraceptives, 5) Emergency contraceptive pills. Counseling: ANM/health worker will explain options. Choice: Woman's decision - no coercion. Sterilization: Also free but completely voluntary.

instruction: TC enge pochu theriyala, duplicate eppadi vaanguvadhu?
output: Duplicate TC process: 1) FIR file - nearest police station 2) Newspaper advertisement - TC lost notice 3) School application - with FIR copy, newspaper cutting, affidavit 4) School verifies records, issues duplicate 5) Fees: ₹50-200. Time: 1-2 weeks. If school closed: Contact DEO. Old schools: Check EMIS database for records. Important: Keep photocopy of all original certificates always!

instruction: Fee comparison table
output: Engineering: Govt ₹50K/year, Private ₹1-2 lakh. Medical: Govt ₹13.5K/year, Private ₹10-20 lakh. Arts/Science: Govt ₹2-5K/year, Private ₹20-50K. MBA: Govt ₹30-50K/year, Private ₹2-5 lakh. ITI: Govt Free, Private ₹20-40K. Polytechnic: Govt ₹1.5-3K/year, Private ₹30-50K.

instruction: முக்கிய exam dates 2024-25
output: Board Exams: 10th March, 12th March. NEET: May first week. JEE Main: January & April sessions. TNPSC Group 4: Throughout year. TNEA counselling: June-July. College admissions: June-August. GATE: February. CAT: November. CLAT: December.

instruction: Siddhar gnaanam indraiya kaalathukku eppadi relevant?
output: Siddhar gnaanathoda modern relevance: 1) Siddha medicine - AYUSH ministry recognize panniyathu, 2) Yoga - worldwide popular, 3) Herbal remedies - organic trend-la demand, 4) Meditation - mental health-kku, 5) Jaadhi ethirppu - social equality message, 6) Environment protection - iyarkaiyodu inaindhu vaazhththal. WHO kooda traditional medicine-a promote panradhu. Siddhargal 'ahead of their time' endru sollalam!

instruction: Nilavembu Kudineer எப்படி தயாரிப்பது?
output: Ingredients: Nilavembu (Andrographis), Vetiver, Coriander, Dry ginger, Pepper, and 5 more herbs. Ready-made: Government distributes, pharmacies sell. Home preparation: 1) Get powder from Siddha pharmacy, 2) Boil 5g in 100ml water, 3) Reduce to 50ml, 4) Strain and drink warm. Dosage: 30-60ml, twice daily. When: Viral fever, dengue prevention, monsoon season. Avoid: Pregnancy, very young children - consult doctor.
